chinese_text: 如果没有人相信你，那就自己相信自己；如果没人欣赏你，那就自己欣赏自己；如果没人祝福你，那就自己祝福自己。用心去触摸属于自己的阳光，用爱去创造属于自己的时空。当自己读懂了自己，世界才能读懂你。
text: If no one believes in you, then believe in yourself; if no one appreciates you, then appreciate yourself; if no one bless you, then bless yourself. Touch your own sunshine with your heart and create your own time and space with love. Only when you understand yourself can the world understand you.

chinese_text: 浮躁风气较盛的今天，并不是没有认真做事的人。但是，“认真”的利益选择性和目的导向性，使很多表面光鲜、有好处的事做得一丝不苟、精益求精；而涉及他人利益、默默无闻的辛苦事大多敷衍了事、得过且过。到底有没有一个让人“认真”的普国价值？
text: Today, when impetuousness is prevalent, it does not mean that there are no people who work seriously. However, the "serious" interest selectivity and goal-oriented nature make many superficially glamorous and beneficial things done meticulously and strive for excellence; while the hard work that involves the interests of others and is obscure is mostly done perfunctorily and muddle along. Is there a universal national value that makes people "serious"?

chinese_text: 徐冰说：素描《大卫》的练习使他从一个粗糙的人变成了一个精致的人。在画的过程中，徐冰试图展现出自己的所有绘画能力，直到没有什么可以施展时为止，也就是把自己逼到画不下去的境地。他正是在这个“死地”发现了自己的擅长，也发现了自己的不擅长。并在这一过程中，学会了处理问题、控制问题的方法。
text: Xu Bing said: The practice of sketching "David" transformed him from a rough person into a refined person. In the process of painting, Xu Bing tried to demonstrate all his painting abilities until there was nothing left to display, that is, he pushed himself to the point where he could no longer paint. It was in this "death place" that he discovered what he was good at and what he was not good at. And in the process, I learned how to deal with and control problems.

chinese_text: 【爱鱼生的各位，要小心啦！】原来，日本人从来都不用三文鱼做刺身吃的。蔡澜："正统的日本铺子，绝对不会卖三文鱼刺身，因为他们老早知道它的虫极多，只能用盐腌制过后烧熟来吃......三文鱼鱼肉颜色一直保持鲜红，即使腐坏了也不变，又闻不出异味......" --- 爱鱼生的各位，要小心啦！via实用小百科
text: 【Everyone who loves Yu Sheng, be careful! 】It turns out that Japanese people never use salmon to make sashimi. Chua Lam: "Orthodox Japanese shops will never sell salmon sashimi, because they have known for a long time that it is full of worms and can only be eaten after being salted and cooked... The color of salmon meat has always remained bright red. , even if it goes bad, it will not change, and there is no smell..." --- Yu Sang lovers, be careful! viaPractical Encyclopedia

chinese_text: 《单身男女》据知情人称:其实大家看到的是删减版结局,因为导演不想得罪吴彦祖的粉丝而影响影片票房。真正的结局是：高圆圆在所有人离开后,对吴彦祖说:对不起,我不想骗你,其实我爱的是他,刚才太多人我不想你难堪.然后戴上古仔的戒指离去,在门口发现在一直在等的伤心的古仔,俩人相拥而泣。你觉得怎么样？
text: According to an insider of "Single Man and Woman": In fact, what everyone saw was the deleted version of the ending, because the director did not want to offend Daniel Wu's fans and affect the film's box office. The real ending is: After everyone left, Gao Yuanyuan said to Daniel Wu: I'm sorry, I don't want to lie to you. In fact, I love him. There were too many people just now and I don't want you to be embarrassed. Then she put on Goo Jai's ring and left at the door. They found the sad Goo Jai who had been waiting, and the two hugged each other and cried. what do you think?

chinese_text: 【水知道答案】王岳川：日本科学家江本胜把一杯水放在巴赫、莫扎特、贝多芬的音乐中“听”了20分钟，用摄像仪把分子结构拍出来，水分子结构像钻石般瑰丽。他又把这杯水搁到重金属摇滚音乐中“听”了20分钟，拍出的分子结构近似于癌细胞结构。您知道您身上有多少水吗？70%。人的大脑里有多少水？90%。
text: [Water Knows the Answer] Wang Yuechuan: Japanese scientist Masaru Emoto put a glass of water to the music of Bach, Mozart, and Beethoven and "listened" to it for 20 minutes. He used a camera to take pictures of the molecular structure. The water molecular structure was as magnificent as a diamond. He put the glass of water to "listen" to heavy metal rock music for 20 minutes, and the molecular structure he photographed was similar to the structure of cancer cells. Do you know how much water you have on your body? 70%. How much water is there in the human brain? 90%.

chinese_text: 【外媒：中国人结婚买房遏制全球经济复苏】西班牙《世界报》文章：按照中国传统，单身男子要想结婚就必须是自己房子的主人，而在今天，买房子需要一大笔钱。这就迫使很多人大幅度削减开支，控制消费以增加存款。如果说在全世界增长最快的市场上没有消费，那么全球经济就会停滞。http://t.cn/aomDRH
text: [Foreign media: Chinese people get married and buy houses to curb global economic recovery] Spanish "El Mundo" article: According to Chinese tradition, a single man must be the owner of his own house if he wants to get married. Today, buying a house requires a lot of money. This has forced many people to drastically cut back on spending and control consumption in order to increase their savings. Without consumption in the world's fastest-growing market, the global economy would stagnate. http://t.cn/aomDRH

chinese_text: 我们小时候没有汽车，骑自行车会很开心。我们没有华丽的衣服，穿的确良会也很自尊自爱。我们没有ipad，但是我们弹弹玻璃球也会开心快乐。我们在教室里是兄弟姊妹，内心没有贫富的差异。如今的孩子看上去得到了很多，其实却失去了一个少年儿童最应该具备的幸福感和健康身心。难道几十年中国教育错了吗？
text: We didn’t have cars when we were kids and would have had so much fun riding bikes. We don’t have fancy clothes, and when we wear them, we feel proud and self-respecting. We don’t have iPads, but we can still have fun bouncing glass balls. We are brothers and sisters in the classroom, and there is no difference between rich and poor in our hearts. Today's children seem to have gained a lot, but in fact they have lost the sense of happiness and physical and mental health that a teenager should have. Is China’s education wrong in the past few decades?

chinese_text: 现离开祥和的小堡画家村，北大一天课，晚到武汉给市委领导讲课。接着福州、徐州、内蒙、湘潭和重庆调研和讲座。人在旅途，少了激情，多了无奈。昨清华讲课时，一地方领导告诉我，春节时他那个地方有被强拆的男子到我家哭诉，我曾给过他二千元，＂您被骗了，他并不缺这点钱＂。我说：我在救自己和子孙。
text: Now I am leaving the peaceful Xiaobao Painting Village, attending classes at Peking University for one day, and arriving late at night in Wuhan to give lectures to the leaders of the municipal party committee. Then we conducted research and lectures in Fuzhou, Xuzhou, Inner Mongolia, Xiangtan and Chongqing. When people are traveling, they lose their passion and become more helpless. Yesterday when I was giving a lecture at Tsinghua University, a local leader told me that during the Spring Festival, a man who was demolished in his place came to my house crying and complained that I had given him 2,000 yuan, "You have been cheated, and he does not lack this money." I said: I am saving myself and my descendants.

chinese_text: “组织”就是在你遇到困难时，他说无能为力；在你遇到不公时，他说要正确对待；在你权益受到侵害时，他说要顾全大局；在你受到诬陷时，他说你要相信组织；在需要人做出牺牲时，他说组织考验你的时候到了；当需要人冲锋陷阵时，他说是你坚强后盾；在你取得成功时，他说是组织培养的--周立波
text: "Organization" means that when you encounter difficulties, it says that there is nothing you can do; when you encounter injustice, it says that you must treat it correctly; when your rights and interests are infringed upon, it says that you must take into account the overall situation; when you are framed, it says that you Believe in the organization; when you need people to make sacrifices, he says it's time for the organization to test you; when you need people to charge forward, he says it's your strong backing; when you succeed, he says it's the organization that has cultivated you - Zhou Libo

chinese_text: 今天小青大夫耍我签字，她要带全家去新加坡发展，巳被新加坡国立医院聘为住院医，她说在国内孩子教肓和住房的压力太大了。我非常伤心，精心从内科多位竞争者中挑选了她，来我科后多次送她到国外学习，为她做了长远的事业发展规划，应该说她的机会要远胜于她的内科同学们，这样的结局很无奈！
text: Today Dr. Xiaoqing asked me to sign. She is taking her family to Singapore for development. She has been hired as a resident doctor by the National Hospital of Singapore. She said that the pressure on children's education and housing in China is too great. I was very sad and carefully selected her from many competitors in the internal medicine department. After coming to our department, I sent her to study abroad many times and made a long-term career development plan for her. It should be said that her opportunities are far better than those in the internal medicine department. Classmates, this ending is very helpless!

text: Psychologists believe that staring at handsome men for 10 minutes a day has a fitness effect equivalent to doing 30 minutes of aerobic exercise. If you persist, the average life span can be extended by four to five years. . .

People who often experience muscle twitching must pay attention, as this indicates that your body function is not very good at this time.

text: [For the sake of family and friends, forward it] If you are kidnapped by a gangster and asked to enter the ATM password, you can indirectly notify the police by entering the password backwards. text: [Men and women who can look at each other for five seconds may consider getting married] "Scientific American" magazine reported that a group of human physiological research reports showed that if a man and a woman look at each other for less than 1 second, it means that they do not like each other; if they look at each other for 2 seconds, it means that There is a good impression; if you look at each other for 3 seconds, it may be secret love; if you look at each other for 4 seconds, it shows that you have deep feelings; if you look at each other for 5 seconds or more, you have reached the stage of marriage.

text: [Swatting a blood-sucking mosquito to death can cause death] The New England Journal of Medicine reminds: The remains of beaten mosquito corpses may enter the skin, causing fungal infection and even death! A 57-year-old woman in the United States died from a fungal infection in her muscles. Researchers speculate that the broken remains of mosquito corpses entered the skin and caused the infection. Experts remind that when you find a mosquito sucking blood, it is best to gently flick the mosquito away.

Unexpectedly, the fish and shrimp jumped away alive in a short time, as if these fish had just been caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also affects intelligence.

chinese_text: 两只乌龟在田边一动不动，一专家问老农，它们在干什么？老农说“在比耐力，谁先动谁就输了”专家指着一龟壳上有甲骨文的龟说:“据我多年研究，这只龟已死五千多年”另一只龟伸出头来说:“草！死了也不说一声，害得老子在这里干等”话刚说那只有甲骨文图案的龟伸头大笑“你输了吧，专家的话你也听“
text: Two turtles were motionless at the edge of the field. An expert asked the old farmer what they were doing. The old farmer said, "In a competition of endurance, whoever moves first will lose." The expert pointed to a turtle with oracle bones on its shell and said, "According to my many years of research, this turtle has been dead for more than five thousand years." Another turtle stretched out its head He said, "Fuck! You didn't even say a word when you died, so I'm just waiting here." Just after he said that, the turtle with the oracle bone pattern stretched out his head and laughed, "You lose, you should listen to the experts."

text: [Boao Special Report·@陈志武: China is now going to end the one-child policy] The average number of children per woman of childbearing age in China is now 1.4. This means that the population size of the younger generation will become smaller and smaller in the future. In the United States and Shanghai, many young couples do not want more children. Given their choice, many people tend to have fewer children. So there is no need to worry that China’s population will explode if the one-child policy is relaxed. http://t.cn/zOozfL4

chinese_text: 【日本大阪官员开车上班被停职3个月】大阪市政府宣布，一位56岁的主任级女官员今年以来开车上班110次，违反"禁止公务员开车上班"命令，处以停职3个月处分，被令交还4万日元的交通卡报销费。大阪市长认为，公务员开车上班，增加城市交通拥堵压力，影响市政府经营的地铁和公交车收入。（南方都市报）
text: [Osaka, Japan official suspended for 3 months for driving to work] The Osaka City Government announced that a 56-year-old director-level female official drove to work 110 times this year and violated the order "prohibiting civil servants from driving to work" and was suspended for 3 months. Ordered to return 40,000 yen for transportation card expense reimbursement. The mayor of Osaka believes that civil servants driving to work will increase the pressure of urban traffic congestion and affect the revenue from subways and buses operated by the municipal government. (Southern Metropolis Daily)

chinese_text: 湖北武汉，市少先队总队长、“五道杠”黄艺博小朋友如同一道炫目闪电，轰动全国，绝非偶然。4月1日，武汉建乐村小学，“小小交警队”同学们穿着标准交警制服，整齐列队，敬礼迎接乘坐本田轿车的某领导到校视察。培养奴才，为领导服务，武汉从孩子就抓起了~ @乐活武汉 @武汉同城会 @武汉校园 @三镇武汉
text: In Wuhan, Hubei Province, the captain of the city's Young Pioneers and the "Five Stripes" child Huang Yibo was like a dazzling lightning that shocked the whole country. It was no accident. On April 1, students from the "Little Traffic Police Team" of Jianle Village Primary School in Wuhan, dressed in standard traffic police uniforms, lined up neatly and saluted to welcome a leader in a Honda car who came to inspect the school. Cultivating slaves to serve the leaders, Wuhan started from childhood~ @乐生活武汉@武汉同城会@武汉Campus@三town武汉

chinese_text: “梅西，最伟大的”。“24岁，莱奥继续冲破所有可能的障碍”。“10大挑战：1.第四个欧冠冠军，2.第四个欧冠金靴，3.击败阿尔塔菲尼（14球），4.连续四次金球奖，5.第二个西甲金靴，6.第二个欧洲金靴，7.第六个西甲冠军，7.超越劳尔71球，9.第二个三冠王，10.击败穆勒（单赛季67球）”。《世界体育报》
text: "Messi, the greatest". "At 24 years old, Leo continues to break every possible barrier." "Top 10 challenges: 1. The fourth Champions League title, 2. The fourth Champions League golden boot, 3. Defeating Altafini (14 goals), 4. Four consecutive Ballon d'Or awards, 5. The second La Liga gold Boot, 6. Second European Golden Boot, 7. Sixth La Liga title, 7. Surpassing Raul with 71 goals, 9. Second Triple Crown, 10. Defeating Muller (67 goals in a single season)." "World Sports News"

chinese_text: 95岁《红楼梦》专家周汝昌，自1979年以来，一直蜷缩在北京东城一处蜗居中，居住条件从未改变，过着俭朴凄凉的老年生活。周老“目盲耳聩”，研究工作十分艰苦。老骥伏枥，在儿子、女儿帮助下靠亲情交流研究红学，出版多本学术著作。为海内外称颂。新华社记者唐师曾摄  http://t.cn/zOCwaso
text: Zhou Ruchang, a 95-year-old "Dream of Red Mansions" expert, has been huddled in a small house in Beijing's East City since 1979. His living conditions have never changed and he lives a simple and desolate old age. Mr. Zhou was "blind and deaf" and his research work was very difficult. Lao Ji Fufeng, with the help of his son and daughter, relied on family exchanges to study red studies and published many academic works. Praise at home and abroad. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Tang Shizeng http://t.cn/zOCwaso

chinese_text: 在铺天盖地的官方消息传播中，很吊诡的一个现实是：到现在为止，@染香 ，@吴法天 ，@窦含章 ，@孔庆东 ，@司马南 都没有发布或转发这条消息，只有@司马南 对其家人的合影做了一条转评。
text: Amidst the overwhelming spread of official news, a very paradoxical reality is: up to now, @Ranxiang, @武fatian, @豆汉 Zhang, @ Kongqingdong, and @思马南 have not published or forwarded this news. Only @思马南 has told his family made a comment about the group photo.

chinese_text: 【中国成世界垃圾最多国家 垃圾处理考验城市规划】尽管中国的人均垃圾量远少于美国等国家，但研究报告显示，中国每年垃圾总量已超过3亿吨，是世界上最多的国家，而且这个数字还在不断增长。外媒称，垃圾处理已成为中国城市规划者面临的最大问题之一。http://t.cn/zONf735
text: [China becomes the country with the most garbage in the world, testing urban planning for garbage disposal] Although China’s per capita amount of garbage is far less than that of countries such as the United States, research reports show that China’s total annual garbage has exceeded 300 million tons, making it the country with the largest amount of garbage in the world. This number is still growing. Foreign media said that garbage disposal has become one of the biggest problems facing Chinese urban planners. http://t.cn/zONf735

chinese_text: 新华社报道，美国加州一个餐馆因使用不卫生餐具，造成两百多名食客腹泻住院，但其中来自中国的食客，不仅没有感到任何不适，还参与了抢救工作，在场的美国记者感慨道：“中国人东亚病夫的时代一去不复返。”…… （转发）
text: Xinhua News Agency reported that more than 200 diners in a California restaurant were hospitalized with diarrhea due to the use of unhygienic tableware. However, the diners from China not only did not feel any discomfort, but also participated in the rescue work. The American reporter present lamented: " The era when the Chinese were the sick man of East Asia is gone forever.”… (Forward)

chinese_text: 你知道吗，因为太爱你就会怕失去你、怕别人抢走你，所以好几回我都想杀掉你算了。可是，每当我掏出枪又不小心把身边睡着的你惊醒时，还是不争气地抱紧你说：别怕，是我。
text: You know, because I love you too much, I am afraid of losing you or others taking you away, so I have wanted to kill you several times. However, every time I pull out my gun and accidentally wake you up from sleeping next to me, I still hug you tightly and say: Don't be afraid, it's me.

chinese_text: 【顾客逗留不去是星巴克中国扩张一障碍】中国大陆顾客太爱这些店了，他们一个小时接一个小时的坐着，有时甚至一杯咖啡也不买。星巴CEO克舒尔茨向路透社表示：“十年来，中国大陆星巴克的核心顾客一直是在华工作的外国人和境外游客。毫无疑问，今日的核心顾客是中国人。”http://t.cn/zO0DVc7
text: [Customers’ inability to stay is an obstacle to Starbucks’ expansion in China] Mainland Chinese customers love these stores so much that they sit there hour after hour, sometimes without even buying a cup of coffee. Starbucks CEO Ke Schultz told Reuters: "For the past ten years, the core customers of Starbucks in mainland China have been foreigners working in China and overseas tourists. There is no doubt that today's core customers are Chinese." http:/ /t.cn/zO0DVc7

chinese_text: 【基金总裁伤不起】@谭昊：京城一著名公募总经理在员工大会上说，“如果我死了就算了，但凡我还有一口气在，就一定要把投资者的钱赚回来。”这家公司目前有200多万持有人，6年间亏损173亿。他对投研部门唯一要求是，“你们怎么把钱赔出去的，就怎么给我赚回来，否则我死不瞑目。”此刻，他正在病中。
text: [The fund president cannot afford to be hurt]@tan昊: A well-known public equity general manager in Beijing said at a staff meeting, “It’s okay if I die, but as long as I am still alive, I must earn back investors’ money.” This company currently has more than 2 million holders and has lost 17.3 billion in six years. His only request to the investment research department is, "How can you make money back for me if you lose money, otherwise I will die with my eyes open." At this moment, he was ill.

chinese_text: 【吃砂锅粥小心了，商家添加“红虾粉”重则致癌】今日一线：一般虾蟹粥颜色有点红的，应该就是黑心店家在死虾蟹粥里添加了红虾粉扮新鲜货，用的香兰素和乙基麦芽酚，而专家说这是违规的，香兰素和乙基麦芽酚如果食用过量，肝肾会受损害，严重的会致癌，如果吃到死虾蟹……视频：http://t.cn/zOl7SGJ
text: [Be careful when eating casserole porridge, merchants adding "red shrimp powder" may cause cancer] Today's front line: Generally, the color of shrimp and crab porridge is a bit red. It should be that the unscrupulous store added red shrimp powder to the dead shrimp and crab porridge to pretend it is fresh. Vanillin and ethyl maltol, but experts say this is illegal. Excessive consumption of vanillin and ethyl maltol can damage the liver and kidneys, and can cause cancer in severe cases. If you eat dead shrimps and crabs... Video ：http://t.cn/zOl7SGJ

chinese_text: 【职场规划三支点】1、生存支点：把薪酬作为主要导向，但遇上职业瓶颈时，薪酬没了增长空间，身价便会每况愈下。2、发展支点：以自身进步作为导向，从工作中获取的经验和技能最为重要，可能会承受工作压力的考验。3、快乐支点：快乐为导向，享受工作的过程，对工作投入极大热情，前程无量。
text: [Three Pivot Points of Career Planning] 1. Survival Pivot: Taking salary as the main guide, but when encountering a career bottleneck, there is no room for salary growth, and the value will go from bad to worse. 2. Development fulcrum: guided by one's own progress, the experience and skills gained from work are the most important, and may withstand the test of work pressure. 3. Happy fulcrum: happiness-oriented, enjoying the process of work, putting great enthusiasm into work, and having a bright future.

chinese_text: 【晚安。土豆】如果有一天，我变得冷漠了，请记得，我曾经要人陪的时候你只说忙；如果有一天，我变得目中无人了，请记得，曾经也没人把我放在心里；如果有一天，我不再在乎你了，请记得，曾经也没人听过我的心事；如果有一天，我不再对你笑，请记得，你曾经也没问我过的快不快乐。http://t.cn/zO8cofX
text: 【Good night. Tudou] If one day, I become indifferent, please remember that when I asked for someone to accompany you, you just said you were busy; if one day, I become arrogant, please remember, no one ever took me into their heart; If one day, I no longer care about you, please remember that no one ever listened to my thoughts; if one day, I no longer smile at you, please remember that you never asked me if I was happy. http://t.cn/zO8cofX

chinese_text: 【几十年来语含义的变迁】1、小姐：从尊贵到低俗；2、美女：从惊艳到性别；3、老板：从稀有到遍地都是；4、鸡：从禽类到人类；5、同志：从亲切到敏感；6、公务员：从为首长服务者到特权拥有者；7、官员：从勤勤恳恳的公仆到高高在上的主人；8、房事：从个人隐私到大众痛苦。
text: [Changes in slang meanings over the past few decades] 1. Miss: from noble to vulgar; 2. Beauty: from stunning to gender; 3. Boss: from rare to ubiquitous; 4. Chicken: from poultry to human; 5. Comrade : From cordiality to sensitivity; 6. Civil servants: from those who serve the chief to privileged holders; 7. Officials: from diligent public servants to aloof masters; 8. Sexual intercourse: from personal privacy to public suffering.

chinese_text: 【@ mjjeje 身体和心灵都精疲力尽的时候，带走脑海中孤独和疲倦的是音乐，而治愈破损渺小灵魂的也是音乐。我不能停止也不能疏忽他。因为尽管睡不了几个小时而现在仍在写歌的我的样子向我证明着...这是什么。】马甲在在快去睡觉[din泪]

chinese_text: 【离校前要做的事】：1.和睡了三年的床合张影 2.清晨去操场跑步 3.整理好以前的证件 4拉一位异性再游一圈校园拍几张情侣照 5一个都不能少的集体活动 6认真记录下每个人的联系方式 7)告诉喜欢的异性：我曾经喜欢过你 8)重新在全班面前自我介绍 9)认真地醉一次 10) 去图书馆睡一下觉 11拥抱全班人。。
text: [Things to do before leaving school]: 1. Take a photo with the bed I have slept on for three years 2. Go for a run on the playground early in the morning 3. Organize your previous documents 4 Get a member of the opposite sex to walk around the campus and take some couple photos 5 A must-have group activity 6 Carefully record everyone’s contact information 7) Tell the opposite sex you like: I used to like you 8) Re-introduce yourself in front of the whole class 9) Get drunk seriously once 10) Go to the library to sleep Hug everyone when I wake up. .

chinese_text: 仲间由纪惠将主演夏季NTV土九日剧[幽灵妈妈搜查线]饰演不能成佛变成幽灵的警察官上原蝶子，为了留在人间自己的儿子和丈夫继续解决追捕犯人的凶恶事件，但是到了100日就要和他们分别.志田未来饰演沢村前妻的女儿，生瀬勝久饰演仲间上司.还有杰尼斯JR的真田佑馬以及塚地武雅出演
text: Yukie Nakama will star in the summer NTV local nine-day drama "Ghost Mom Search Line" as the police officer Uehara Choko who cannot become a Buddha and becomes a ghost. In order to stay in the world, her son and husband continue to solve the vicious events of chasing criminals, but when We will part with them on the 100th day. Mirai Shida plays the daughter of Sawura's ex-wife, and Katsuhisa Ikase plays the boss of Nakama. Yuma Sanada and Takemasa Tsukaji of Johnny's Jr. also star.

chinese_text: 常有人说“女人的黄金年龄很短，只有22—26岁，男人就不一样，到了30,40岁照样不着急”。其实男人的黄金年龄更短，只有16—18岁，在这段时期的他们，长得帅会有人喜欢，打球厉害会有人喜欢，学习好会有人喜欢，玩乐器会有人喜欢，但到了30岁以后只要他没钱，就很少有人喜欢了！
text: It is often said that "women's golden age is very short, only 22-26 years old, but men are different. They are still not in a hurry when they are 30 or 40 years old." In fact, the golden age of men is shorter, only 16-18 years old. During this period, if they are handsome, some people will like them, if they are good at playing, some people will like them, if they study well, some people will like them, and if they play musical instruments, some people will like them. But when they are 30 years old In the future, as long as he has no money, few people will like him!

chinese_text: 人社部拟推行推迟退休年龄，并适时提出弹性延迟领取基本养老金年龄，各地公务员为之精神一震，普通工薪族黯然神伤，不少手握实权的公务员抱着“再干五百年”的心态，无比焦急滴等待这个新政出台，而不少企业职工却由于用工市场化只能被退休却无法支取养老金——中国公共政策“谁设计，谁受益”？
text: The Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security plans to postpone the retirement age, and promptly proposes a flexible extension of the basic pension age. Civil servants from all over the country are shocked by this, and ordinary salarymen feel sad. Many civil servants with real power hold the hope of "working for another five hundred years." mentality, waiting extremely anxiously for the introduction of this new policy, but many corporate employees can only be retired due to the marketization of employment but cannot withdraw their pensions - "Who designs, who benefits" China's public policy?

chinese_text: 【英航CEO建议对中国游客签证开绿灯】英航首席执行官Willie Walsh，欧洲航空界最有影响的角色之一，今日炮轰英国政府，称政府对航空业增收税赋打击了整个行业；而对中国访客签证的严格限制也是中国人赴英旅行最大阻碍，建议政府针对中国旅客开绿灯，在申根签证之上增加一个特殊的英国签证。（郝倩）
text: [British Airways CEO suggests giving green light to visas for Chinese tourists] British Airways CEO Willie Walsh, one of the most influential figures in the European aviation industry, blasted the British government today, saying that the government's increase in taxes on the aviation industry has hit the entire industry; and Strict restrictions on Chinese visitor visas are also the biggest obstacle for Chinese people to travel to the UK. It is recommended that the government give the green light to Chinese tourists and add a special British visa on top of the Schengen visa. (Hao Qian)

chinese_text: 有这样一群人，他们分不清动车和高铁，他们不知道什么叫化合物，他们不懂律诗和绝句有什么区别，他们不认识F-16战斗机和虎式坦克，他们不知道金卢布有多贵，他们不知道延安整风都有什么人，他们不知道汪兆铭是干什么的，他们没见过刑讯椅，他们甚至不知道9月有几天——但是他们自称是知识分子。
text: There is a group of people who cannot distinguish between high-speed trains and high-speed trains. They don’t know what a compound is. They don’t know the difference between rhymed poetry and quatrains. They don’t know F-16 fighter jets and Tiger tanks. They don’t know how expensive the gold ruble is. , they don’t know who was involved in the Yan’an rectification movement, they don’t know what Wang Zhaoming does, they have never seen a torture chair, and they don’t even know how many days there are in September—but they claim to be intellectuals.

text: Father's Day is coming soon. If you have a dad who loves you and cares about you, and you love him very much, please forward this. . . Because he is the only man in the world who is willing to give everything for you. . . [Heart]

chinese_text: 【你2过吗？】1、坐车下错站；2、上楼走错层；3、上学进错班；4、回家开错门；5、短信发错人；6、招呼打错人；7、熟人叫错名；8、洗澡不拿毛巾或内衣；9、买东西忘拿找钱、忘付钱、不拿东西就走人；10、走路撞树、撞门、撞电杆；11、东西在手却找个不停。
text: [Have you ever had 2? 】1. Get off at the wrong stop by car; 2. Go upstairs to the wrong floor; 3. Go to the wrong class at school; 4. Open the wrong door when you get home; 5. Send the text message to the wrong person; 6. Greet the wrong person; 7. Call the wrong acquaintance. Name; 8. Not taking towels or underwear when taking a shower; 9. Forgetting to take change when shopping, forgetting to pay, and leaving without taking things; 10. Walking into trees, doors, or electric poles; 11. Looking for things when they are in hand Non-stop.

chinese_text: 【美国会为排华法案道歉】18日，美国众议院全票通过《排华法案》道歉案，加上去年10月参议院业已全票通过，就此美国正式以立法形式向曾经排斥歧视华人的做法道歉。1882年通过的排华法案系美国历史上唯一针对某一族裔的移民排斥法案，直到1943年才被废除。（中新社）http://t.cn/zWZZHSu
text: [The U.S. will apologize for the Chinese Exclusion Act] On the 18th, the U.S. House of Representatives unanimously passed the apology bill for the Chinese Exclusion Act. In addition, the Senate unanimously passed it in October last year. The United States has formally apologized in the form of legislation for its past practices of excluding and discriminating against Chinese. The Chinese Exclusion Act passed in 1882 was the only immigrant exclusion act in American history that targeted a certain ethnic group. It was not repealed until 1943. (China News Service) http://t.cn/zWZZHSu

chinese_text: Taste of Asia(亚洲美食节)23日(周六)12PM-12AM，24日(周日)12PM-6PM，Kennedy Rd.和Steeles Ave.现场有150多个美食摊位，去年的美食节更是吸引了100,000多名游客参加。只要是你想吃的，这里统统都有，烤肉、臭豆腐、肠粉、拌饭、生蚝、炸鸡扒等等已经开始流口水了吧?
text: Taste of Asia (Asian Food Festival) 12PM-12AM on the 23rd (Saturday) and 12PM-6PM on the 24th (Sunday). There are more than 150 food stalls on Kennedy Rd. and Steeles Ave.. Last year’s food festival was even more attractive. More than 100,000 tourists participated. As long as you want to eat, you can find it here. Barbecue, stinky tofu, rice rolls, bibimbap, oysters, fried chicken steak, etc. Are you already drooling?

chinese_text: 人肉“女版药家鑫”张彦，不肉不行了！你的良心是什么特殊材质做的？撞人后脱衣躺地阻挠救护车，又强行将四岁受伤的孩子抢来扔到地上导致孩子不治身亡，你还是人吗？张彦，山东省医专高等专科学校中医药教研办公室，现任讲师。曾教过多年人体解剖学和医学心理学与精神病学。http://t.cn/zWLgzL5
text: Human flesh "female version of Yao Jiaxin" Zhang Yan can't survive without flesh! What special material is your conscience made of? After hitting someone, you took off your clothes and lay on the ground to block an ambulance, and then forcibly snatched an injured four-year-old child and threw him to the ground, causing the child to die. Are you still a human being? Zhang Yan is currently a lecturer in the Traditional Chinese Medicine Teaching and Research Office of Shandong Medical College. Taught human anatomy and medical psychology and psychiatry for many years. http://t.cn/zWLgzL5

chinese_text: 【北京宣武门外国人猥亵女子案】据称已按照治安案件处理，拘留加罚款。1、是否强奸未遂？学刑法的都得承认证明故意很难，尤其面对一个言语不通又不敢刑讯逼供的家伙，所以一开始我就判断不可能按照强奸处理。2、应按照强制猥亵妇女罪处理，客观上已经在公共场所实施行为，在主观上当然伴随着认识。
text: [The case of a foreigner molesting a woman in Xuanwumen, Beijing] is said to have been handled as a public security case, with detention and fines. 1. Was there an attempted rape? Anyone who studies criminal law must admit that it is difficult to prove intentionality, especially when faced with a guy who cannot understand the language and dare not torture to extract a confession, so from the beginning I judged that it was impossible to treat it as rape. 2. It should be treated as the crime of forcible molestation of women. Objectively, the act has been committed in a public place. Subjectively, of course, it is accompanied by awareness.

chinese_text: 【深圳告别“以药养医”】今日起，深圳市所有公立医院医保目录药品15%-25%加成全部取消，医院药房卖药“零利润”，门诊患者可以自行到药店购药。深圳成为全国首个全面启动医药分开改革的城市，率先迈出从制度上遏制医疗腐败、打破“以药养医”怪圈的一大步。 新华社记者梁旭 摄
text: [Shenzhen bids farewell to "supporting medicine with medicines"] Starting today, all public hospitals in Shenzhen will cancel the 15%-25% markup on medicines listed in the medical insurance list. Hospital pharmacies will sell medicines at "zero profit", and outpatients can go to pharmacies to buy medicines on their own. Shenzhen became the first city in the country to comprehensively launch the reform of separating medicine and medicine, taking the first step to curb medical corruption from a systemic perspective and break the vicious cycle of "supporting medicine with medicine". Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Liang Xu

chinese_text: 【世界顶级歌手阿黛尔为武井咲新剧演唱主题曲】据日媒2日报道，在今年年初的格莱美大奖上凭借专辑《21》一举囊括六项格莱美大奖的英国歌手阿黛尔，将为武井咲主演的富士夏季新剧《无法呼吸的夏天》演唱主题曲。这也是阿黛尔首次打破自身惯例为电视剧演唱歌曲。http://t.cn/zWbYtTb
text: [The world's top singer Adele sings the theme song for Takei Saki's new drama] According to Japanese media reports on the 2nd, British singer Adele won six Grammy Awards at the Grammy Awards earlier this year for her album "21" You will be singing the theme song for Fuji's new summer drama "Breathless Summer" starring Takei Saki. This is also the first time Adele breaks her own convention to sing a song for a TV series. http://t.cn/zWbYtTb

chinese_text: 【来自腾讯微博的一张图】这是台北中心101大楼边一块菜地，属黄金地段。导游说：“那块地是私人的，人家不愿意出卖，就是想随便种点儿菜，根据法律，政府无权干涉，强行轰走他”。有人说，如果这事发生在大陆，即便不强拆，也会给这块地断水电，在其周边挖上5米宽3米深的壕沟...  @草根阿伯揭露专区
text: [A picture from Tencent Weibo] This is a vegetable patch next to the Taipei Center 101 building, which is a prime location. The tour guide said: "That piece of land is private. He doesn't want to sell it. He just wants to grow some vegetables. According to the law, the government has no right to interfere and forcibly evict him." Some people say that if this happened on the mainland, even if there was no forced demolition, the land would be cut off from water and electricity, and a 5-meter-wide and 3-meter-deep trench would be dug around it... @ Grassroot Aber Exposure Zone

chinese_text: 【算算再过20年，中国会剩下什么？】某官员酒后吐真言:算一笔简简单单的帐，目前中国5%的人掌握了中国95%财富，而这5%的人已经移民或者正在办理移民，这意味着，20年后这95%的财富不再是中国人所有，那是，中国还有什么？数亿老人+一片被污染的山川河流+地底下没有资源的土地！（@移民专家张跃辉）
text: [Calculate what will be left of China in another 20 years? 】An official drunkenly told the truth: Calculating a simple calculation, 5% of China’s people currently control 95% of China’s wealth, and these 5% of people have immigrated or are in the process of immigrating. This means that 20 years from now, This 95% of wealth is no longer owned by the Chinese. Then, what else does China have? Hundreds of millions of old people + a polluted mountains and rivers + a land with no resources underground! (@Immigration expert Zhang Yuehui)

chinese_text: 【DIY芝麻润颜面膜】芝麻放入搅拌机打成细粉状，质地呈湿润状。芝麻粉混合酸奶搅拌后敷在脸上8~10分钟，轻轻按摩后洗掉。酸奶能软化老化角质；芝麻含有丰富的亚麻油酸和维生素E，易被肌肤所吸收，滋润肌肤，恢复肌肤健康光采！ 学起来~[伸舌头]面膜神马的最有爱了，快关注@爱上面膜DIY
text: 【DIY Sesame Moisturizing Facial Mask】Put sesame seeds into a blender and grind into fine powder. The texture will be moist. Stir sesame powder mixed with yogurt and apply it on the face for 8 to 10 minutes, massage gently and then wash off. Yogurt can soften aging cuticles; sesame seeds are rich in linoleic acid and vitamin E, which are easily absorbed by the skin, moisturize the skin, and restore the healthy radiance of the skin! Let’s learn~[stick out tongue] Shenma is the most adorable facial mask, please follow @爱上面馆DIY

chinese_text: 本期视觉志专题精选 【摄影是什么】结束，摄影劳其筋骨，饿其体肤，空乏其身，摄影拓其视野，承载心情，传递感动，摄影是媒介，是手段，是工具，有人以摄影谋取财富，有人为摄影游走四方，有人为摄影付出生命......摄影有太多故事，太多可能，你说摄影是什么？
text: The special selection of this issue of Visual Journal [What is Photography] is over. Photography works its muscles and bones, starves its body and depletes its body. Photography expands its horizons, carries moods, and conveys emotions. Photography is a medium, a means, and a tool. There are people People make money through photography, some people travel around the world for photography, and some people sacrifice their lives for photography... Photography has too many stories and too many possibilities. What do you think photography is?

chinese_text: 如果没有信仰，就把旅行当做你的信仰，这一生，都走在朝圣的路上。
text: If you have no faith, consider traveling as your faith. You will be on the road of pilgrimage throughout your life.

chinese_text: 【白岩松语录】1、人的一生只有5%是精彩的，只有5%是痛苦的，另外的90%是平淡的；人们往往被5%的精彩诱惑着，忍受着5%的痛，在90的平淡中度过。2、生命原本脆弱，我们只能坚强地活着。3、年轻的最大魅力就是不断犯错误，而有时间去改正。乐观面对困难，好好培养一下自己的心理素质。
text: [Bai Yansong's Quotations] 1. Only 5% of a person's life is wonderful, only 5% is painful, and the other 90% is dull; people are often tempted by 5% of the wonderful, endure 5% of the pain, in the 90s Spend time in peace. 2. Life is fragile, we can only live strong. 3. The greatest charm of youth is that you keep making mistakes and have time to correct them. Face difficulties with optimism and cultivate your psychological quality.

chinese_text: 【寻！】7月12日晚8点，来深圳参加深视节目的新华社记者唐师曾，所乘汽车在罗湖建设路一饭店前停车场玻璃被砸，一狼棕色双肩背包被窃，内有红色记者证，身份证、国际驾照、银行卡、北大医院治疗卡、钱，还有佳能EOS 1D Mark IV 机身+ 28-300mm镜头，EOS 5D III 机身 + 16-35mm 镜头…盼奇迹出现。转！
text: 【Searching! 】At 8 pm on July 12, Xinhua News Agency reporter Tang Shizeng, who came to Shenzhen to participate in the Deep View program, had his car glass smashed in the parking lot in front of a hotel on Luohu Jianshe Road, and his brown backpack was stolen, which contained a red press card. , ID card, international driving license, bank card, Peking University Hospital treatment card, money, as well as Canon EOS 1D Mark IV body + 28-300mm lens, EOS 5D III body + 16-35mm lens... I hope a miracle will happen. change!

chinese_text: 【日本将暂时召驻华大使回国汇报中国情况】据日本共同社7月14日消息，日本外相玄叶光一郎当天晚上在越南河内回答媒体提问时表示，将于15日召日本驻华大使丹羽宇一郎暂时回国，汇报中国的情况。http://t.cn/zWMOCR9
text: [Japan will temporarily summon its ambassador to China to return to China to report on the situation in China] According to Kyodo News on July 14, Japanese Foreign Minister Koichiro Genba said in Hanoi, Vietnam, when answering media questions that evening that Japan’s ambassador to China, Uru Niwa, would be summoned on the 15th. Ichiro temporarily returned to China to report on the situation in China. http://t.cn/zWMOCR9

text: I just saw a signature: If you don't work hard, you can't raise a son, because if one day the son says, "Mom, I beat up my classmate, his parents want 50,000 for medical expenses." I can say, "What! 50,000." ! I’ll give you 200,000 and give you 3 more fights!!” In order to become such a great mother, I have to work hard! come on!

chinese_text: 《中国青年报》刊登评论员曹林文章：《“因言治罪”的网络邪气该清除》，。文中写道，“珍惜微博自由，从善待言论开始吧，“因言治罪”是微博最大的敌人。”新华网和人民网等官网都转载了。请全国各地的有关管理部门参阅和借鉴。
text: "China Youth Daily" published an article by commentator Cao Lin: "The Internet evil trend of "criminal punishment based on speech" should be eliminated." The article read, "Cherish the freedom of Weibo and start by treating speech kindly. "Punishing crimes based on speech" is Weibo's biggest enemy." Official websites such as Xinhuanet and People's Daily have reprinted it. Relevant administrative departments across the country are invited to refer to and learn from this.

chinese_text: 【昆明猫吧】在昆明有一家新型休闲场所——猫吧。TA是由一个咖啡馆和21只名贵猫咪组成。猫吧里有波斯猫、加菲猫、折耳猫等6个品种。猫咪们可以陪顾客喝咖啡、看书、上网。顾客也可以随时与猫咪玩耍。 [花心]  「中新网」
text: [Kunming Cat Bar] There is a new leisure place in Kunming - Cat Bar. TA consists of a cafe and 21 precious cats. There are 6 varieties of cats in the cat bar, including Persian cats, Garfield cats, and Fold-eared cats. Cats can accompany customers to drink coffee, read books and surf the Internet. Customers can also play with the cats at any time. [Favorite] "China News Network"

chinese_text: 上佛下智长老于公元2012年7月30日（佛历二五五六年六月十二日）21时52分在应天寺安祥示寂。世寿109岁，僧腊97年，戒腊89夏。谨定于公元2012年8月6日15：00在应天寺举行追思法会，17：00举行荼毗法会。2012年7月31日22：30起至8月6日15：00止，接受佛教信众和社会人士吊唁。@佛教微博
text: Elder Shangfoxiaozhi peacefully passed away at Yingtian Temple at 21:52 on July 30, 2012 (June 12, 2556 in the Buddhist calendar). Shishou was 109 years old, Sengla was 97 years old, and Jiela was 89 years old. We will hold a memorial ceremony at Yingtian Temple at 15:00 on August 6, 2012, and a Dabi ceremony at 17:00. From 22:30 on July 31, 2012 to 15:00 on August 6, 2012, we will accept condolences from Buddhist believers and public figures. @ Buddhist Weibo

chinese_text: 【超6成奥运纪念品中国造】7月31日讯，根据日前伦敦奥运会官方统计，对近900项不同种类的奥运纪念品出售和生产状况进行调查发现，官方纪念品中65%、627项产自中国。而各国队服的设计者多为本国知名设计师，但生产奥运服装制造商大多来自中国和俄罗斯。
text: [Over 60% of Olympic souvenirs are made in China] According to the official statistics of the London Olympics recently, a survey on the sales and production status of nearly 900 different types of Olympic souvenirs found that 65% and 627 of the official souvenirs were produced in China. . Most of the designers of national team uniforms are well-known designers in their own countries, but most of the manufacturers producing Olympic clothing come from China and Russia.

chinese_text: 八月六观音诞宜日行一善。提早出门。鼠勿粗心大意，牛利出门，忙碌，虎利签约，开会顺利，兔宜低调，多矛盾，龙宜把重要亊寫下来，蛇容易生气，馬容易破财，羊勿争论宜先耐心聆听，猴注意上司关糸，雞跑來跑去，琐碎事多，狗注意和伴侣不和，豬不宜張揭，慎言行。周一二上海，周三至周日广深州深圳香港
text: On August 6, Guanyin’s birthday, it is advisable to do one good deed on the day. Get out early. Rats should not be careless, Oxen will go out and be busy, Tigers will sign contracts, and meetings will go smoothly. Rabbits should be low-key and conflict-prone, Dragons should write down important matters, Snakes will get angry easily, Horses will lose money easily, Sheeps will not argue and listen patiently first, Monkeys Pay attention to the boss Guan Shi, the chicken is running around and there are too many trivial things, the dog is careful to be at odds with its partner, the pig should not be open to publicity, be careful in your words and deeds. Monday to Tuesday Shanghai, Wednesday to Sunday Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Shenzhen and Hong Kong

chinese_text: 【“国际左撇子日”】微软社交网站MsnNow报道，8月13日是“国际左撇子日”。为了庆祝这一日子，总部设在英国伦敦的“左撇子俱乐部”举办了一系列左对右竞赛、一次左撇子茶会，各地的酒馆也举办了一系列的庆祝活动。1992年8月13日，英国的左撇子团体发起了“左撇子日”活动，如今全世界都庆祝这一节日。
text: ["International Left-Handed Day"] Microsoft social networking site MsnNow reported that August 13 is "International Left-Handed Day". To celebrate the occasion, the London-based Left-Handed Club held a series of left-versus-right competitions, a left-handed tea party, and a series of celebrations in pubs across the country. On August 13, 1992, left-handed groups in the United Kingdom launched the "Left-Handed Day" event, which is now celebrated all over the world.

chinese_text: 【英超-两送点球10人利物浦0-3客负】http://t.cn/zWQb2FH 新赛季揭幕战，利物浦客场0比3负于西布罗姆维奇，格拉世界波先拔头筹。利物浦两送点球，阿格尔还被红牌罚下，雷纳一度扑出点球，但奥德姆温吉的点球扩大比分。替补出场的卢卡库锁定胜局。
text: [Premier League - 10-man Liverpool lost 0-3 away with two penalty kicks] http://t.cn/zWQb2FH In the opening game of the new season, Liverpool lost 0-3 away to West Bromwich Albion, and Guerra World Wave took the lead. Liverpool sent two penalty kicks, and Agger was sent off with a red card. Reina once saved the penalty kick, but Odemwingie's penalty kick expanded the score. Lukaku came off the bench to seal the victory.

chinese_text: 《凤求凰·琴歌》 有美人兮， 见之不忘。一日不见兮，思之如狂。 凤飞翱翔兮，四海求凰。无奈佳人兮，不在东墙。 将琴代语兮，聊写衷肠。何日见许兮，慰我旁徨。 愿言配德兮，携手相将。不得於飞兮，使我沦亡。
text: "Phoenix Seeking Phoenix·Qin Song" There is a beauty here, I will never forget it when I see it. Not seeing you for a day makes me miss you like crazy. The phoenix is soaring, and the phoenix is begging for it from all over the world. Unfortunately, the beauty is not on the east wall. Use the qin to express your words, and write your heartfelt chats. When will I see Xu Xi, I will comfort my hesitation. Wish to match virtue, hand in hand. If I can't fly, I will perish.

chinese_text: 【水做的假发 你爱哪一款?】水也能做假发？[偷笑]当然不能，不过可以制造出一种假发效果。美国摄影师塔德尔找了一群光头男，把水气球奋力掷向他们的光头，然后利用极高速度的照相技术，抓拍到水在他们头上溅开那一瞬间产生的形象。当然了，具有创意的灯光也起到一定作用。你喜欢哪一款?via@微天下
text: [Which wig made of water do you prefer?] Can water be used as a wig? [Laughing] Of course not, but it can create a wig effect. American photographer Tadel found a group of bald men, threw water balloons at their bald heads, and then used extremely high-speed photography technology to capture the image of the water splashing on their heads. Of course, creative lighting also plays a role. Which one do you like? via@微天下

chinese_text: “这是一场不可能赢的比赛”。这是教练组、德罗巴、阿内尔卡赛后反复说的一句话。他们什么大赛没经历过，不会因为一场比赛出离愤怒。究竟是为什么？我们也不知该如何和他们解释。这是大伙玩命拼下的一分，但或许已经是最好的结果了……
text: "This is an impossible game to win." This is what the coaching staff, Drogba and Anelka said repeatedly after the game. They have never experienced any major competitions and will not get angry because of a game. Why exactly? We don't know how to explain it to them. This is a point that everyone worked hard for, but perhaps it is the best result...

chinese_text: 一辈子虽然漫长，但过去了也就是弹指一挥。你会不断的遇见一些人，也会不停的和一些人说再见，从陌生到熟悉，从熟悉再回陌生，从臭味相投到分道扬镳，从相见恨晚到不如不见……不是每个人都会是你的伙伴，也不是每个朋友都能肝胆相见，无烦或恼，缘到，报之以大笑，缘散，报之以不厌。
text: Although a lifetime is long, it passes by in a blink of an eye. You will keep meeting some people, and you will keep saying goodbye to some people, from strangers to familiarity, from familiarity to strangers again, from familiarity to parting ways, from meeting each other too late to not seeing each other at all... Not everyone will be like this Your partners, not every friend can meet each other with sincerity, without any worries or annoyance. When fate comes, they will laugh in return, and when fate breaks up, they will never tire of repaying you.

chinese_text: 【你有没有下班沉默症】下班后，你是不是不想开口说话？数据:①83.1%的受访者有不同程度的下班沉默症；②IT行业的程序员、工程师、设计师等易患下班沉默症；③59.6%的人下班沉默是因为工作压力大身心疲惫，难以兴奋；④58.5的人认为下班沉默会让亲友之间产生隔阂矛盾。（via中国青年报）
text: [Do you suffer from mutism after get off work?] Do you not want to talk after get off work? Data: ① 83.1% of the respondents have varying degrees of silence after work syndrome; ② Programmers, engineers, designers, etc. in the IT industry are prone to silence after work syndrome; ③ 59.6% of people are silent after work because of high work pressure and physical and mental exhaustion , it is difficult to be excited; ④58.5 people believe that silence after work will cause estrangement and conflicts between relatives and friends. (via China Youth Daily)

chinese_text: 据外媒GSMArena爆料，三星将在IFA上发布一款安卓相机，采用4.8 英寸触摸屏，1600万像素传感器，10倍变焦镜头，内置闪光灯，比尼康刚发布的S800c更强大的是，这款相机不但拥有WiFi功能，还会带有3G模块，实现随时随地分享。http://t.cn/zWuSEVq

What is more powerful than the S800c just released by Nikon is that this camera not only It has WiFi function and also comes with a 3G module to enable sharing anytime and anywhere. http://t.cn/zWuSEVq

chinese_text: 【日本现摸胸募捐】在8月25日至26日播放的节目《24小时TV 工口拯救地球2012》中名为“用揉胸来贡献社会”的特别活动在东京新宿区直播会场举办。截至26日下午6时活动共有捐款者4690人次。募集善款420万4836日元。来场者和捐款额都是去年的两倍，甚至还有前后共捐款20次。（凤凰网）
text: [Japan’s Breast Touching Fundraiser] In the program "24 Hour TV Erotica Save the Earth 2012" broadcast from August 25th to 26th, a special event titled "Contributing to Society with Breast Rubbing" was held at the live broadcast venue in Shinjuku Ward, Tokyo. As of 6 p.m. on the 26th, a total of 4,690 people had donated to the event. A total of 4,204,836 yen was raised. The number of attendees and donations was double that of last year, and there were even 20 donations in total. (ifeng.com)

chinese_text: 【陕西山阳县一公立幼儿园:非公务员子女不得报名】近日网曝一帖子:9月1日在山阳县幼儿园,好多人为了给孩子报上名,半夜起来的也有,可是等到早上,学校大门却始终大门紧闭。为了维持现场秩序,校方连贴二张紧急通知,而通知中竟然称父母双方都必须在县直机关单位上班者才符合报名条件。http://t.cn/zWdfyKf
text: [A public kindergarten in Shanyang County, Shaanxi: Children of non-civil servants are not allowed to register] A post recently exposed on the Internet: On September 1st, in the kindergarten in Shanyang County, many people got up in the middle of the night to register their children, but in the morning, the school The door is always closed. In order to maintain order at the scene, the school posted two emergency notices, which actually stated that both parents must work in county government agencies to meet the registration requirements. http://t.cn/zWdfyKf

chinese_text: 【日媒称轻微处分拔旗事件当事人系日中共同想法】日本共同社昨日发文称，关于日本驻华大使座驾遇袭事件，中方4日对嫌疑人处以轻微处分而没有起诉是基于日中共同想法，避免走司法程序造成拖延以便尽早结束事端。文章说，日本正协调在亚太经合组织首脑会议上举行日中首脑会谈。http://t.cn/zWgUpVs
text: [Japanese media claimed that minor punishment for the parties involved in the flag-pulling incident was a common idea between Japan and China] Kyodo News Agency of Japan issued an article yesterday saying that regarding the attack on the car of the Japanese ambassador to China, China imposed minor punishment on the suspect on the 4th but did not prosecute because of the common sentiment between Japan and China. Ideas to avoid delays caused by judicial procedures so that the matter can be ended as soon as possible. The article said that Japan is coordinating the holding of Japan-China summit talks at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit. http://t.cn/zWgUpVs

chinese_text: 【美媒评052D型驱逐舰：已经与伯克级接近】美国战略之页网站报道，中国最新下水的052D型驱逐舰，排水量约7000吨，采用美式垂直导弹发射系统可兼容多种导弹，以及新的相控阵雷达。不过美国人对052D的评价却很耐人寻味，"中国海军用十年时间，造出了和已服役20余年的伯克级战斗力相似的舰艇。"(高凯)
text: [U.S. Media Comments on Type 052D Destroyer: Already Close to the Burke Class] The U.S. Strategy Page website reported that China’s newly launched Type 052D destroyer has a displacement of about 7,000 tons and uses an American vertical missile launch system that is compatible with a variety of missiles, as well as new Phased array radar. However, the Americans' evaluation of the 052D is very intriguing. "It took the Chinese Navy ten years to build a ship with similar combat effectiveness to the Burke-class ship that has been in service for more than 20 years." (Gao Kai)

chinese_text: 【俄一男子因挤不上车获赔】俄罗斯某法庭近日裁定，一家城铁运营商赔偿一名乘客约合人民币1500元，原因是这名男子高峰期间在车站滞留两个多小时、没有挤上列车。这名男子称在车站等候期间，他动弹不得，遭其他乘客挤来挤去。法官认定城铁运营商没为这名乘客提供安全、优质服务。（俄新社）@参考消息
text: [A Russian man was compensated for being unable to get on the train] A Russian court recently ruled that a city rail operator should compensate a passenger approximately RMB 1,500 because the man was stranded at the station for more than two hours during peak hours and did not get on the train. Get on the train. The man said that while waiting at the station, he could not move and was jostled by other passengers. The judge found that the urban rail operator failed to provide safe and quality service to the passenger. (Russian News Agency) @Reference News

chinese_text: 有时候，心里会突然冒出一种厌倦的情绪，觉得自己很累很累。只想放纵自己一回，希望能痛痛快快歇斯底里地疯一次。
text: Sometimes, a feeling of boredom suddenly arises in my heart, and I feel very tired. I just want to indulge myself once, and I hope I can go hysterically crazy once.

chinese_text: 有没有人和我一样，QQ上有很多这样的好友，从来没有聊过天，但也从来没想过把他们删掉，因为他们都默默地陪伴了我们很多年了。
text: Is anyone like me? There are many such friends on QQ who have never chatted with each other, but have never thought of deleting them because they have been silently accompanying us for many years.

chinese_text: 【历史上最长寿的人】李庆远 (1677-1933)，寿享256年，是清末民初的中医药学者。在他100岁时因在中医中药方面的杰出成就获政府特别奖励，在他200岁时，仍常去大学讲学。李庆远一生娶过24个妻子，子孙满堂
text: [The oldest person in history] Li Qingyuan (1677-1933), who lived for 256 years, was a scholar of traditional Chinese medicine in the late Qing Dynasty and the early Republic of China. When he was 100 years old, he received a special award from the government for his outstanding achievements in traditional Chinese medicine. When he was 200 years old, he still often lectured at universities. Li Qingyuan has married 24 wives in his life and has many descendants.

chinese_text: 【曾国藩的智慧人生】1.按本色做人，按角色办事。2.做人一定要像人，做官不可像官。3.把所有人都得罪了，也就谁都不得罪了。4.有油水地方常常最滑，爬起来站稳都难。5.沉默是一种态度，拖也是一种方法6.不怕群众骂你，就怕群众不找你7.可以得罪忙人，但不可得罪闲人8.小胜靠智，大胜靠德。
text: [Zeng Guofan’s Wisdom Life] 1. Be a person according to your true colors and act according to your role. 2. A person must be like a human being, but an official must not be like an official. 3. If everyone is offended, no one will be offended. 4. Places with oil and water are often the slipperiest, making it difficult to climb up and stand firm. 5. Silence is an attitude, and procrastination is also a method. 6. Don’t be afraid of the masses scolding you, but be afraid that the masses won’t look for you. 7. You can offend busy people, but you can’t offend idle people. 8. Small victories rely on wisdom, and big victories rely on virtue.

chinese_text: 【德媒爆台湾珍珠奶茶有毒 BoBoQ负责人反击】德国《明镜》周刊报道称，德国学者质疑“珍珠奶茶含有毒成分”；有研究发现，“珍珠”含对人体健康有害的禁用物质，可能提高致癌率或是引起过敏。旗下有100多家加盟店的BoBoQ负责人称：保证加盟店贩卖珍奶符合德国卫生规定。中新网http://t.cn/zWFdksM
text: [German media revealed that Taiwanese pearl milk tea is toxic, the person in charge of BoBoQ counterattacked] Germany’s Der Spiegel reported that German scholars questioned that “bubble milk tea contains toxic ingredients”; some studies have found that “pearls” contain banned substances that are harmful to human health and may increase Carcinogenicity or allergies. The person in charge of BoBoQ, which has more than 100 franchise stores, said that it ensures that the precious milk sold in franchise stores complies with German health regulations. China News Service http://t.cn/zWFdksM

chinese_text: 一不要攀、不要比、不要自己气自己；二活多干、话少说、群众心里有秤砣；三少吃盐、多吃醋、少打麻将多散步；四按时睡、按时起、跑步游泳健身体；五夫妻爱、子女孝、家和比啥都重要；六官再大、钱再多、阎王照样土里拖；七行点善、积点德、心里常念弥勒佛；八吃点亏、吃点苦、傻点笨点也是福。
text: First, don’t climb, don’t compare, and don’t make yourself angry; second, work more, talk less, and the masses have weights in their hearts; third, eat less salt, be more jealous, play less mahjong and walk more; fourth, go to bed on time, get up on time, run and swim for fitness body; five things: love between husband and wife, filial piety of children, and family harmony are more important than anything else; no matter how big the six sense organs are, no matter how much money, the King of Hell will still be dragging his feet in the dirt; seven do good deeds, accumulate some virtue, and always think of Maitreya Buddha in your heart; eight suffer some losses , endure a little hardship, be a little foolish and clumsy are also blessings.

chinese_text: 内忧外患亟待解决[泪]今日德罗巴尚未归来之时，申花俱乐部又遭遇了另一个麻烦：原本昨夜申花新闻官已经一一通知了沪媒明日球队赛前适应场地时间，但此刻却生变数。据悉，由于本场比赛申花方面少提供给球场方面20张票子，因此申花遭到了球场拒绝申花踩场的通知，目前交涉进展不顺利，申花可能无法踩场。
text: Internal and external troubles need to be resolved urgently [Tears] Today, before Drogba has returned, Shenhua Club has encountered another trouble: Shenhua's press officer had notified the Shanghai media one by one last night of the time for the team to adapt to the venue before tomorrow's game, but at this moment something happened variable. It is reported that because Shenhua provided 20 less tickets to the stadium for this game, Shenhua was notified by the stadium that Shenhua would not play on the court. The current negotiations are not going well and Shenhua may not be able to play on the court.

chinese_text: 【55岁世界最高龄鹦鹉去世 给主人留遗言“再见”】住在英国、号称是“全世界最老鹦鹉”的“塔布”(Tarbu)近日在家中去世，“享年”55岁。“塔布”去世前一晚，独居的主人摩根太太寡居打算去睡觉，却听到这只鸟儿虚弱地说了一句“再见”(Cheerio)。第二天，这只鸟儿便去世了……
text: [The world's oldest parrot dies at the age of 55, leaving a last word to his owner: "Goodbye"] "Tarbu", who lives in the UK and is known as "the world's oldest parrot", recently passed away at home at the age of 55. The night before "Tabu" died, the widowed owner Mrs. Morgan, who lived alone, was going to bed when she heard the bird weakly say "Cheerio". The next day, the bird died...

chinese_text: 你的手，我牵过。每次总是不自觉地捏一捏、揉一揉，就好像是自己最喜爱的玩具一般，总是放不下，总是松不了。当你的手在我的手心里，我会感到温暖，因为，我攥着一颗属于我的心。
text: I held your hand. Every time I pinch and knead it unconsciously, it's like my favorite toy that I can't put down or loosen. When your hand is in my hand, I will feel warm, because I am holding a heart that belongs to me.

chinese_text: 【中美护照对比】美国护照中写着：“不管你身处何方，美国政府都是你强大的后盾”。在中国护照中写着：“请严格遵守当地的法律，并尊重那里的风俗习惯”。微评：美国说，出去了有人欺负你，招呼一声，咱修理他！中国说，出去了老实点，听人家的话，好好干，少惹麻烦。[草泥马]
text: [Comparison of Chinese and American Passports] The American passport says: "No matter where you are, the U.S. government is your strong backing." In the Chinese passport it says: "Please strictly abide by local laws and respect local customs." Micro-comment: The United States says, if someone bullies you when you go out, say hello and we will fix him! China says, be honest when you go out, listen to others, work hard, and avoid getting into trouble. [Grass Mud Horse]

chinese_text: 【离散数学之把妹要诀】我们惊奇地发现，男生追到的女生，是他最好的选择。女生接受的男生，是她最差的选择。如果情况相反，即女生主动追求男生，那么结论也会相反。这个事实教导我们，主动表白是多么重要啊！【全文】http://t.cn/zlH3hgb
text: [Discrete Mathematics Tips for Picking Up Girls] We were surprised to find that the girl a boy pursues is his best choice. The boy a girl accepts is her worst choice. If the situation is reversed, that is, girls actively pursue boys, then the conclusion will be opposite. This fact teaches us how important it is to take the initiative to express your feelings! 【Full text】http://t.cn/zlH3hgb

text: 15 details to prevent acne: ⒈ 8 glasses of water a day; ⒉ defecate every day; ⒊ avoid staying up late; ⒋ wash your face thoroughly; ⒌ play less computer games; ⒍ don’t squeeze acne with your hands; ⒎ wash bed covers regularly to prevent mites; ⒏ go to bed before 11 o’clock Avoid late-night snacks; ⒐ Eat less irritating foods; ⒑ Choose skin care products according to your skin type; ⒒ Use pearl powder and honey as a facial mask to remove acne and marks; ⒓ White sugar to wash your face to remove marks; ⒔ Vitamin E to apply on acne marks; ⒕ Drink scented tea; ⒖Clamp Liuhai before going to bed to avoid acne on the forehead.

chinese_text: 【这一秒不放弃，下一秒就会有希望】1、人生像杯没糖咖啡，喝起来苦涩，回味却有久久余香；2、人生是场旅行，不在乎目的地，在乎的是沿途的风景以及看风景的心情；3、人生是条坎坷曲折路，即使不断的跌倒，也一定要爬起来，坚持自己的梦想。4、记住，这一秒不放弃，下一秒就会有希望。
text: [If you don’t give up this second, you will have hope in the next second] 1. Life is like a cup of coffee without sugar. It tastes bitter, but the aftertaste is long-lasting; 2. Life is a journey. It doesn’t matter the destination, but the journey along the way. The scenery and the mood of looking at the scenery; 3. Life is a bumpy and tortuous road. Even if you keep falling, you must get up and stick to your dreams. 4. Remember, if you don’t give up this second, there will be hope in the next second.

chinese_text: 【什么才是标准巨蟹座】1、没事爱抽风，易伤人，还后悔。2、总纠结，不听劝，死倔。3、大事谨慎，小事糊涂，聪明内敛。4、爱装，装坚强，装深沉，装成熟。5、对爱的人很好，柔情似水。6、喜欢音乐，幻想浪漫，更重现实。7、心太软，志不坚。8、生气后，很恐怖！杀气啊！
text: [What is a standard Cancer] 1. Loves convulsions when there is nothing wrong, easily hurts others, and even regrets it. 2. Always struggling, not listening to advice, and stubborn. 3. Be cautious in big things, confused in small things, smart and restrained. 4. Love to pretend, pretend to be strong, pretend to be deep, pretend to be mature. 5. Be kind to the people you love, and be as tender as water. 6. Like music, fantasy and romance, and pay more attention to reality. 7. The heart is too soft and the ambition is not strong. 8. It’s scary when you’re angry! Murderous!

chinese_text: 【酸辣肥牛粉】1.粉丝热水泡开,油菜焯水,蒜苗切丝;2.油热爆香葱姜蒜,入郫县豆瓣酱炒出红油,入清水,加料酒.糖.盐.陈醋调味;3.水开后,放入肥牛片和泡好的粉丝;4.焯好的油菜铺底,肥牛片变色后盛出,洒上蒜苗丝;5.锅加油,烧热后炸干辣椒和花椒,炸香后浇在蒜苗丝上即可~ →做健康美食,推荐关注@美食健康顾问
text: [Spicy and Sour Fatty Beef Noodles] 1. Soak the vermicelli in hot water, blanch the rapeseed, and cut the garlic sprouts into shreds; 2. Heat the oil and sauté the onion, ginger and garlic, add Pixian bean paste and fry until the red oil comes out, add water, add cooking wine and sugar. .Salt and vinegar to taste; 3. After the water boils, add beef slices and soaked vermicelli; 4. Place the blanched rapeseed on the bottom, take out the beef slices after they change color, and sprinkle with shredded garlic; 5. Add oil to the pot and heat After heating, fry the dried chili peppers and Sichuan peppercorns, fry until fragrant and then pour it on the shredded garlic sprouts ~ → To make healthy food, it is recommended to follow @foodhealthconsultant

chinese_text: 我无法理解一些女人在夜店整晚被N个搂抱亲吻还觉得特光荣，一有局就各种求偶遇。看到开跑车的人和稍微有点人样恨不得马上扒光自己。姑娘，这不叫交际花，这叫交妓花，叫不知耻！没局的时候就在家扯着胸罩露大半边乳房出来发微薄喊寂寞。这不叫性感，这叫阴部瘙痒！女人，最忌讳的就是把自己做烂！
text: I can't understand how some women feel so privileged to be hugged and kissed by n number of people in a nightclub all night long, and they seek casual encounters whenever there is a situation. When I see someone driving a sports car who looks a little bit human, I want to strip myself naked right away. Girl, this is not called a courtesan, this is called a courtesan, shameless! When there is no game, I pull on my bra at home to expose half of my breasts and go out to express my meagerness and loneliness. This is not called sexy, this is called vaginal itching! The most taboo thing for women is to ruin themselves!

chinese_text: 【木的时光切片】英国艺术家 Bryan Nash Gill 利用各种树木的截面做成大型画作。他寻找那些残损的树木，通过拓印截面后再创作，图像里面包含了一棵树的完整结构切面，及迷人的形状细节，将生命历程可视化再现。>http://t.cn/zlsv9Cv
text: [Wood Time Slices] British artist Bryan Nash Gill uses cross-sections of various trees to create large-scale paintings. He looks for damaged trees and creates them by rubbing cross-sections. The image contains a complete structural section of a tree and fascinating shape details, visually reproducing the life process. >http://t.cn/zlsv9Cv

chinese_text: 《涅槃经》中记载了一个公案：在波罗奈国有个屠夫，名叫广额，每天杀羊无数，后来见到舍利弗尊者，生起信敬之心，在一天一夜之中受持八关斋戒，以此因缘命终之后转生为北方毗沙门天王太子。持戒的功德是如此之大，因此持戒修行之人活着安乐、充实，死后也会更加幸福安宁，所以不枉得个人身。
text: There is a public case recorded in the "Nirvana Sutra": There was a butcher named Guang'e in the country of Parana, who killed countless sheep every day. Later, when he met the Venerable Shariputra, he developed faith and respect, and he practiced the eight tests in one day and one night. Fasting, this is the reason why he will be reincarnated as the prince of Bishamonten in the north after his death. The merits of observing the precepts are so great. Therefore, those who observe the precepts and practice life will be happy and fulfilled, and they will be even happier and more peaceful after death. Therefore, their life is not in vain.

chinese_text: 有一只小猴子， 肚肚被树枝划伤了，流了很多血。它见到一个猴子朋友就扒开伤口说， 你看我的伤口 ，好痛。每个看见它伤口的猴子都安慰它， 同情它， 告诉它不同的治疗方法它就继续给朋友们看伤口。 继续听取意见，后来它感染死掉了。 一个老猴子说， 它是自己伤自己而死的。痛，说一次就复习一次「转
text: There was a little monkey whose belly was scratched by a branch and bled a lot. When it saw a monkey friend, it opened the wound and said, "Look at my wound, it hurts." Every monkey who saw its wound comforted it, sympathized with it, and told it different treatment methods. Then it continued to show the wound to its friends. Continuing to listen to advice, it later became infected and died. An old monkey said that it hurt itself and died. It hurts, say it once and review it once

text: Today's quote: There is no strong enemy, only yourself who is not strong enough.

chinese_text: 今天参加了麻花年末戏的发布会！谢谢这位叫KUNKUN姑娘的画！神韵很足！而且把我画帅了！我在这表示深深的感谢！为啥我从来不提我干过什么！因为我不想让这么多素昧谋面的人为我操心！每个人都有属于自己生活！我们只是生活中的调剂品！千万别让自己生活失去重心！谢谢那些曾经为我操过心的人！保重！
text: Today I attended the press conference for Mahua’s end-of-year drama! Thank you to this girl named KUNKUN for her painting! Very charming! And it made me look handsome! I would like to express my deep gratitude! Why do I never mention what I did! Because I don’t want so many strangers to worry about me! Everyone has their own life! We are just spices in life! Don’t let your life lose focus! Thank you to those who have worried about me! Take care of yourself!

Subsequently, the cartoon invitations for the wedding were also exposed. At 4:09 Beijing time today and around 9 o'clock local time in New Zealand, Yao Chen posted a landscape photo on Weibo. Netizens couldn't help but sigh that they got married in the beautiful New Zealand. No wonder she was in such a good mood. Details: http://t.cn/zjZYFTI (新娱乐)

chinese_text: 【美国大学生长相酷似16世纪古画男主角】据外媒报道，美国大学生马克斯・盖鲁波日前来到美国费城艺术博物馆参观时，惊讶的发现一幅16世纪意大利油画中的男主角竟和他本人长得几乎一模一样。PS：哥们，你是穿越来的吧？
text: [An American college student looks exactly like the male protagonist of a 16th-century ancient painting] According to foreign media reports, when American college student Max Galupo visited the Philadelphia Museum of Art a few days ago, he was surprised to find that the male protagonist in a 16th-century Italian oil painting actually looked like him. I look almost exactly the same. PS: Bro, did you come from time travel?

chinese_text: 【促进孩子品行高尚的8句话】1、品德比分数更重要。 2、诚实是做人的第一美德。 3、竞争中的公平最可贵。 4、凡事都要问一问自己的良心。 5、要学会说一声：谢谢。 6、你知道关心父母，这让我很开心。 7、我很高兴你有一颗同情心。 8、我希望你是个懂礼貌的孩子。
text: [8 sentences to promote noble conduct in children] 1. Morality is more important than scores. 2. Honesty is the first virtue in life. 3. Fairness in competition is the most valuable thing. 4. Ask your own conscience about everything. 5. Learn to say: thank you. 6. You know you care about your parents, which makes me happy. 7. I’m glad you have a compassionate heart. 8. I hope you are a polite child.

text: #2012Sodium Green Walk together@ Guangzhou# The lead singer of "Visible Wings" = =! ! ! I can't look straight at the word "wings" now... (Actually, he left the stage at the Guangzhou show. When Angela was singing, Qingfeng kept screaming in the background to express his love. He suddenly ran in front of us while shouting, and imitated the enthusiastic fans dancing in the audience. He was shouting hahahahahahahaha~ and then he was surrounded by staff and security guards and left...

chinese_text: 【晚安】世上没有一件工作不辛苦，没有一处人事不复杂。如果命中注定是打工，便打好它。别把青春葬送，你在家跷二郎腿，青春也一样葬送，光阴不会过得慢点。有些人是不必工作的，但那不是你，反正都要做了，何不快乐一点去做？——李碧华
text: [Good night] There is no job in the world that is not hard, and no place in the world that is not complicated. If you are destined to work, then do it well. Don't ruin your youth. If you cross your legs at home, your youth will also be ruined. Time will not go by slower. Some people don’t have to work, but that’s not you. You have to do it anyway, so why not do it happily? ——Li Bihua

chinese_text: 【晚安】儿童流落街头无人照看，天寒地冻之下躲入垃圾桶烧火取暖，因一氧化碳中毒而亡。给人一种深入骨髓的伤痛。儿童的境遇是衡量社会良心的尺子。当地政府的缺位，社会路人的冷漠，导致了这一悲剧。但愿5位小天使在天堂不再有寒冷，每天都是阳光。但愿他们的离去，能让更多流浪儿童得到救助。
text: [Good Night] Children living on the streets with no one to look after them, hiding in trash cans and lighting fires to keep warm in the cold weather, died of carbon monoxide poisoning. It gives people a pain that goes deep into the bone marrow. The plight of children is a measure of society's conscience. The absence of the local government and the indifference of passersby led to this tragedy. I hope the five little angels will no longer be cold in heaven and there will be sunshine every day. I hope that their departure will allow more street children to be rescued.

chinese_text: 大喜易失言，大怒易失礼，大惊易失态，大哀易失颜，大乐易失察，大惧易失节，大思易失爱，大醉易失德，大话易失信，大欲易失命。——人生十鉴 。
text: When you are overjoyed, it is easy to lose your words, when you are angry, you are easy to lose your manners, when you are shocked, you are easy to lose your composure, when you are sad, you are easy to lose your face, when you are happy, you are easy to lose your sense, when you are afraid, you are easy to lose your integrity, when you are thinking too much, you are easy to lose your love, when you are drunk, you are easy to lose your virtue, when you talk big, you are easy to lose your trust, when you are big, you are easy to lose your desires. Life. ——Ten lessons on life.

chinese_text: 感觉自己什么也不缺，仔细想想又什么也没有 说的是你么？（转）
text: Are you the one who feels like you lack nothing, but when you think about it carefully, you have nothing to say? (change)

chinese_text: 我们每一个人都有自卑感，任何的英雄都有自卑感，受不了环境的刺激，环境的打击，自卑感自然就产生了。自卑感重了，自然就傲慢，因为那个傲慢，是对于自卑的防御。如果沒有自卑感的话，就很天然，你看得起我，我还是我，看不起我还是我，我就是我，我就是那个样子。——南怀瑾
text: Each of us has an inferiority complex, and any hero has an inferiority complex. If he cannot stand the stimulation or blow of the environment, the inferiority complex will naturally arise. If you have a strong sense of inferiority, you will naturally become arrogant, because that arrogance is a defense against inferiority. If you don't have an inferiority complex, it's natural. If you look up to me, I'm still me. If you look down on me, I'm still me. I'm who I am. That's who I am. ——Nan Huaijin

chinese_text: 沉默，是一个女人最大的哭声。女人有心事后，不想多说，感觉说话很累，或许是习惯了沉默，习惯了痛，习惯了安静。当一个女人不理你的时候，其实她已经受伤很深！

text: [Classic Quotations] 1. Only dreams that will be laughed at if you speak them have practical value. 2. Explanation is always redundant, because people who understand you don’t need it, and people who don’t understand you don’t need it. 3. Mentally disturbed people are those who try to adapt the real world to the ideas in their heads. 4. True bravery includes two aspects: one is to face what should not be feared, and the other is to be afraid of what should be feared.

text: I don't envy or envy those young couples who stick together every day. I don't have the time, interest, or energy to cross the time difference between two places to get angry, quarrel, lose my temper, and break up. All I can do is wrap up my coat when the wind blows, keep reading, participate in various activities, memorize a lot of words, go to bed early and get up early, and lose weight. I hope that no matter which day in the future, I can be qualified to stand by your side with the most unquestionable attitude. "change"

text: [A woman was teased after receiving a call from a scammer and was instigated to pour Coke into an ATM machine] Recently, in a bank in Shenzhen, a middle-aged woman took a large bottle of Coke and poured it into the bank's ATM machine. What's going on? It turned out that she received a money fraud call. She said she had no money, so the other party asked her to pour Coke into the ATM machine, "so that the money would be spit out automatically." This lady really believed it and went around looking for an ATM to pour it with a big Coke... Southern Metropolis Daily http://t.cn/zjVKz9g

chinese_text: 幸福就是重复。每天跟自己喜欢的人一起，通电话，旅行，重复一个承诺和梦想，听他第二十八次提起童年往事，每年的同一天和他庆祝生日，每年的情人节、圣诞节、除夕，也和他共度。甚至连吵架也是重复的，为了一些琐事吵架，然后冷战，疯狂思念对方，最后和好。@几米漫画集（转）
text: Happiness is repetition. Every day, I talk to the person I like, talk on the phone, travel, repeat a promise and a dream, listen to him mention childhood memories for the twenty-eighth time, celebrate his birthday with him on the same day every year, and celebrate Valentine’s Day, Christmas, and New Year’s Eve every year. Spend time with him. Even the quarrels were repetitive. They quarreled over trivial matters, then had a cold war, missed each other crazily, and finally reconciled. @Jimmy Comics Collection (reposted)

chinese_text: 叠衣服想到个事儿，前两年跟我妈逛街的时候，相中一件双排扣的风衣，我妈摇头不让买。等我们走远了，我妈告诉我原因：“瞅那两排大扣，跟猪奶子似的！”这句话导致我现在对双排扣的衣服仍然心有余悸。（via 稳稳的蜗牛）
text: I remembered something while folding clothes. When my mother and I were shopping two years ago, we spotted a double-breasted trench coat. My mother shook her head and refused to buy it. When we were far away, my mother told me the reason: "Look at those two rows of big buttons, they look like pig breasts!" This sentence caused me to still have lingering fears about double-breasted clothes. (via steady snail)

chinese_text: 赚钱的生意一般都不会很累，很累人的生意一般都不赚钱！如果你发现自己做生意特别累，那一定是方向和方法上出了问题！

chinese_text: 愿意吃亏的人，终究吃不了亏，吃亏多了，总有厚报；爱占便宜的人，定是占不了便宜，赢了微利，却失了大贵。再好的东西，你也不可能长久拥有，不必计一时回赠，莫如常怀怜悯之情，常施援助之爱，得到人心，他物不缺。别以为成败无因，今天的苦果，是昨天的伏笔；当下的付出，是明日的花开。
text: Those who are willing to suffer losses will not be able to suffer losses after all. If they suffer too much, they will always be rewarded generously; those who love to take advantage will definitely not be able to take advantage. They will win a small profit but lose a lot. No matter how good things are, you can't keep them for a long time. You don't need to think about giving them back for a while. It's better to always have compassion and help and love, so as to win people's hearts and have no shortage of other things. Don't think that success or failure has no cause. Today's bitter fruit is the foreshadowing of yesterday; the efforts made now are the flowers of tomorrow.

text: [Virgo Horoscope for January] Virgo’s fortune in January can be described as good luck; a good attitude makes everything simple and beautiful. As you accumulate and apply your knowledge, you will become more familiar with your career and studies. As your abilities are enhanced, your efficiency will naturally be improved. Jupiter will help you meet a noble person in your career in the middle of the month, which is likely to be helpful to you in the next year. After the 20th, you may have extra good luck! Good Luck: Sunshine.

chinese_text: 【湖南司法副厅长“警车门”调查】“宴席赛过皇宫，20警车助阵，百万礼金入囊”，这是近日网络盛传的湖南省司法厅副厅长王亲生儿子婚宴景象。“中国网事”记者调查核实，确有警车出现在婚宴现场，但网贴所曝“厅长率全省司法系统100余人助阵、敛财百万”，当事人却有不同说法。
text: [Investigation of Hunan Deputy Director of Justice’s “Police Car Gate”] “The banquet surpassed the palace, 20 police cars helped out, and millions of gifts were pocketed.” This is the scene of the wedding banquet of the son of Wang, the deputy director of the Hunan Provincial Department of Justice, that has been widely circulated on the Internet recently. "China Net Affairs" reporters investigated and verified that police cars did appear at the wedding banquet. However, according to the online post, "The director led more than 100 people from the province's judicial system to help out and made millions of dollars." However, the person involved had a different story.

chinese_text: 【昆明滞留旅客拨市长热线 被告知不归我们管】1月3日，昆明长水国际机场出现大雾，低于航班最低运行标准，造成440航班取消，7500名旅客滞留机场。4日，一位飞往西双版纳的旅客反映称，在他拨打了昆明市人民政府市长热线“12345”反映机场滞留情况后，得到的回答是“不归我们管”。 http://t.cn/zjnwRDZ
text: [Standard passengers in Kunming called the mayor’s hotline and were told they were not under our control] On January 3, heavy fog occurred at Kunming Changshui International Airport, which fell below the minimum operating standards for flights. As a result, 440 flights were canceled and 7,500 passengers were stranded at the airport. On the 4th, a passenger flying to Xishuangbanna reported that after he called the mayor's hotline "12345" of the Kunming Municipal People's Government to report the detention situation at the airport, the answer he received was "it is not under our control." http://t.cn/zjnwRDZ

chinese_text: 【注意！驾车用蓝牙耳机接电话也要被扣分！】淘宝上“蓝牙耳机”最近七天的搜索指数环比增长43.1%，与去年同期相比增长315.7%。不少店家在商品标题标明“不怕新交规”“新交规必备”字样。有交警表示，驾车时用蓝牙耳机接听电话仍属“妨碍安全驾驶”行为，会被罚款扣分。(财经网 )
text: 【Notice! Points will be deducted for using Bluetooth headsets to answer calls while driving! 】The search index for "Bluetooth headphones" on Taobao in the past seven days has increased by 43.1% month-on-month and 315.7% compared with the same period last year. Many stores put the words "Don't be afraid of the new traffic regulations" and "A must-have for the new traffic regulations" in their product titles. Some traffic police said that using Bluetooth headsets to answer calls while driving is still an act of "impeding safe driving" and will result in fines and points deductions. (Finance Network)

chinese_text: 【严冬中，谁抢走了流浪者棉被大衣】由中国社科院教授@于建嵘 发起的@街头随手救助 活动近日向北京街头流浪者发放棉被、大衣、棉鞋袜，但发放后不久就被一群不明身份的人收走。活动志愿者樊银华表示，这种情况去年冬天也曾出现。“不明身份”者究竟何人，为何这么做？（via 新华社中国网事）
text: [In the severe winter, who snatched away the quilts and coats of homeless people] The @street rescue activity initiated by Professor Yu Jianrong of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences recently distributed quilts, coats, and cotton shoes and socks to homeless people on the streets of Beijing. However, after the distribution, It was soon taken away by a group of unknown people. Fan Yinhua, an event volunteer, said that this situation also happened last winter. Who is the "unidentified" person and why did he do this? (via Xinhua News Agency China News)

chinese_text: 我依然不喜欢王家卫，故弄玄虚，假装深刻，乱七八糟，狗屁不通，整几个破词儿就以为看透了整个世界。
text: I still don't like Wong Kar-Wai, who is pretentious, pretends to be profound, messy, and makes no sense. He thinks he has seen the whole world through a few broken words.

chinese_text: 往往当一个人说：“不是我吹牛”，这句话的时候，他就开始要吹牛了。往往当一个人说：“不是我打击你”，这句话的时候，他就开始要打击你了。往往当一个人说：“不是我批评你”这句话的时候，他就要开始批评你了。往往卖东西的人说：“不是我骗你”这句话时，他就要开始骗你了~[转]
text: Often when a person says, "I'm not bragging," he begins to brag. Often when a person says, "I am not attacking you," he starts to attack you. Often when a person says, "I'm not criticizing you," he is about to criticize you. Often when a seller says, "I didn't lie to you," he is about to lie to you~[Repost]

chinese_text: 《人物》主笔 @赵涵漠 跟随柴静一路从广州，到深圳，再回北京。约6小时的采访后，柴静坦言，这是最近袒露内心最多的一次访谈。她谈到新闻与宣传，谈自己如何做主旋律报道，谈有人希望她成为新闻斗士而她却无志于此。回忆童年时，她哭了。此时此刻，她是记者柴静、女人柴静，不是女神柴静。
text: The main writer of "People" @ Zhao Hanmo followed Chai Jing all the way from Guangzhou to Shenzhen and back to Beijing. After about 6 hours of interview, Chai Jing said frankly that this was the most revealing interview in recent times. She talked about news and publicity, how she did the main theme reporting, and how some people wanted her to be a news warrior but she had no ambition to do so. She cried as she recalled her childhood. At this moment, she is reporter Chai Jing, woman Chai Jing, not goddess Chai Jing.

chinese_text: 来福小院又被扔来了几只狗 今天有人开车来说是在饭店买回来的狗 不然就被吃了 然后送来小院 该高兴还是该绝望 好吧 还是先给孩子找领养吧 先来这几只小狗 基本条件：北京本地或长期居住有独立住房或大点的租房 N多人合租的和非本地学生暂不考虑 不了解怀孕和养狗的也不考虑 详情可加QQ 468019397
text: A few more dogs were thrown into Laifu Xiaoyuan today. Someone drove up and said they were dogs bought at a restaurant, otherwise they would have been eaten and brought to the Xiaoyuan. Should I be happy or despair? Let’s find the children for adoption first. The basic requirements for these puppies: Beijing locals or long-term residents with independent houses or larger rental houses. Sharing with multiple people and non-local students are not considered for the time being. Those who are not familiar with pregnancy and raising dogs are not considered for details. Please add QQ 468019397.

chinese_text: 日本最贵的菜居然是吃屎！这道菜名称叫做金粒宴（说白了就是吃屎）。这是在日本上层社会所谓的高级享受，做法是挑选女婴。以极精细的食物喂大。到15 16岁就取其粪便烹之！太变态了！
text: The most expensive dish in Japan is eating shit! The name of this dish is called Golden Grain Feast (which means eating shit to put it bluntly). This is a so-called high-end enjoyment in Japan's upper class society, and the practice is to select baby girls. Feed them very fine food. When they reach the age of 15 or 16, cook their feces! So perverted!

In addition to losing more than 20 pounds to face the challenge, he also expressed that he is seeking to "sing while flying" at the Coliseum. "They are risking their lives to entertain the guests. It is known that the concert also cost up to 26 million Hong Kong dollars, throwing silver bullets at the fans. Report link: http://t.cn/zjDAnRm

chinese_text: 他是距离唐山仅65公里的青龙县委书记，1976年唐山大地震前夕，他顶着摘乌纱帽的风险拍了板，向全县预告地震灾情。7月25日，青龙县的人几乎全被赶到室外生活。7月28日，唐山全城毁灭，死24万人以上。青龙毁坏房屋1.8万间，完全坍塌7300余间，万幸！47万人无一伤亡。他用权力救了47万人！他是冉广岐！转
text: He is the party secretary of Qinglong County, which is only 65 kilometers away from Tangshan. On the eve of the 1976 Tangshan earthquake, he made the decision to warn the entire county of the earthquake disaster, despite the risk of being a black hat. On July 25, almost all people in Qinglong County were forced to live outdoors. On July 28, the entire city of Tangshan was destroyed, with more than 240,000 people dead. Qinglong destroyed 18,000 houses and more than 7,300 houses completely collapsed. Fortunately! There were no casualties among the 470,000 people. He used his power to save 470,000 people! He is Ran Guangqi! change

chinese_text: 【陆丰一民警持假身份证经商被查实】广东陆丰市公安机关纪检部门４日称，该市公安局党委委员赵海滨持假身份证办企业、投资房地产、向法院提交伪造虚假房产证一事部分被查实。赵海滨持有名为“赵勇”的身份证已被珠海市公安机关注销，赵海滨及其亲属拥有１７０多套房产问题尚待查证。记者詹奕嘉、黄浩苑
text: [A policeman in Lufeng was found to be doing business with a fake ID card] The Discipline Inspection Department of the Public Security Bureau of Lufeng City, Guangdong Province stated on the 4th that Zhao Haibin, a member of the Party Committee of the city’s Public Security Bureau, used a fake ID card to run a business, invest in real estate, and submit forged and false real estate certificates to the court. Verified. The ID card held by Zhao Haibin named "Zhao Yong" has been canceled by the Zhuhai Municipal Public Security Bureau. The issue of more than 170 properties owned by Zhao Haibin and his relatives has yet to be verified. Reporters Zhan Yijia and Huang Haoyuan

chinese_text: #春晚# 突然意识到刚刚那个小品可能马上犯一个会计及法律错误。。。那就是进来的现金和支出的现金不能混为一体。。。不能拿收回的现金付支出的现金。。要向银行报备和申请。。。。貌似是的。。。考验我中级会计的时候到了。。。
text: #春风# I suddenly realized that I might have made an accounting and legal mistake in that skit just now. . . That is, cash coming in and cash going out cannot be mixed. . . The cash received cannot be used to pay the cash paid out. . Report and apply to the bank. . . . It seems so. . . The time has come to test my intermediate accounting. . .

chinese_text: 2月18号那天简直就是一场噩梦！早上5点多，21岁的小陈姑娘在被窝里冷醒了，她想到用电暖宝取暖。当她把充好电的电暖宝拿在手上的时候，电暖宝在小陈的怀里爆掉了。滚烫的液体爆到小陈身上，烫得她哇哇大叫。http://t.cn/zYOcu87
text: February 18th was a nightmare! At around 5 o'clock in the morning, 21-year-old Xiao Chen woke up from the cold in her bed and thought of using an electric heater to keep warm. When she took the charged electric heater in her hand, it exploded in Xiao Chen's arms. The hot liquid exploded onto Xiao Chen, making her scream. http://t.cn/zYOcu87

chinese_text: 【你好，明天】大风驱散雾霾，却带来沙尘，天空从灰白到土黄，让人不禁疑惑：蓝天白云，究竟离我们有多远？必须警醒：透支环境的GDP不可持续，发展不能以未来为代价。美丽中国，不能光说不练。是时候了，行动起来，为子孙留一片青山绿水。现在就行动，也许还不晚。安。
text: [Hello, tomorrow] The strong wind dispersed the smog, but brought sand and dust. The sky turned from gray to khaki, making people wonder: How far are the blue sky and white clouds from us? We must be alert: GDP that overdrafts the environment is not sustainable, and development cannot be at the expense of the future. Beautiful China cannot be just talk without practice. It’s time to take action and leave a piece of green mountains and green waters for our descendants. Act now, it might not be too late. install.

chinese_text: 【通缉令•强奸幼女疑犯】2013年2月24日15时许，山西运城市芮城县永乐宫附近发生一起恶性强奸幼女案。芮城警方发布嫌疑人照片，对于提供线索查明疑犯身份者奖励3千元，对提供线索直接抓获或扭送到警局者奖励1万元。望疑犯主动投案自首，争取从宽处理。联系人张警官13834396668 @何兵 @于建嵘
text: [Wanted Order·Suspect of raping a young girl] At around 15:00 on February 24, 2013, a vicious rape case of a young girl occurred near Yongle Palace in Ruicheng County, Yuncheng City, Shanxi Province. Ruicheng police released a photo of the suspect and offered a reward of 3,000 yuan to anyone who provides clues to identify the suspect, and a reward of 10,000 yuan to anyone who provides clues to directly capture or transfer the suspect to the police station. We hope that the suspect will voluntarily surrender and strive for leniency. Contact police officer Zhang 13834396668 @He Bing @ Yu Jianrong

chinese_text: 有时候，你最想得到的人，其实是你最应该离开的人。
text: Sometimes, the person you want the most is actually the person you should leave the most.

chinese_text: #晚安#喜欢ipad你就去买，喜欢莱卡你就去赚，想喝港式奶茶你就过口岸，想当team leader你就努力学习然后努力去工作，想去威尼斯你就攒钱去，想爱谁你就去爱，想追谁你就去追，想到了就去做，拼命努力，拼命享受，忍着守着惦记着，青春就过去了，何必用40岁的心态过20岁的年华。（转）
text: #Goodnight# If you like ipad, go buy it. If you like Lycra, go earn it. If you want to drink Hong Kong milk tea, go through the border. If you want to be a team leader, study hard and then work hard. If you want to go to Venice, go save money. I want to Love whoever you love, chase whoever you want to chase, do it when you think of it, work hard, enjoy with all your strength, endure, guard and remember, youth is over, why spend your 20s with a 40-year-old mentality . (change)

chinese_text: 【海贼王作者急病，最新漫画休载】据Record Japan网站报道，《海贼王》作者尾田荣一郎突发疾病，漫画暂停连载。《海贼王》已经持续了15年的连载，现在突然因为疾病休载，让粉丝们也感觉非常震惊。网上一片关切之声，难以掩饰大家对《海贼王》的喜爱之情。据说尾田荣一郎是因过度劳累突发的疾病。新娱
text: [One Piece author suffers from sudden illness, latest manga series suspended] According to the Record Japan website, "One Piece" author Eiichiro Oda suffered a sudden illness, and the manga series has been suspended. "One Piece" has been serialized for 15 years. Now it is suddenly suspended due to illness, which makes fans very shocked. There are a lot of concerns on the Internet, and it is difficult to conceal everyone's love for "One Piece". It is said that Eiichiro Oda suffered a sudden illness due to overwork. new entertainment
