chinese_text: 【钱江夜话】她，事业有成，受万千歌迷追捧，却不骄傲，不娇气，外则勤于公益，宏扬社会正能量，跑遍雪域高原，边关哨卡，老少边穷，给基层送上一首首脍炙人口的歌曲。内则相夫教子，料理家务，孝敬公婆，为中国女性之楷模。她端庄美丽，大气朴实，甫一亮相，便是对传统的回归，这就是现实版的中国梦。
text: [Qianjiang Night Talk] She has a successful career and is sought after by thousands of fans, but she is not proud or squeamish. On the outside, she is diligent in public welfare and promotes the positive energy of society. She travels all over the snow-covered plateaus, checking checkpoints at the borders, old and young, and poor. The grassroots sent popular songs one after another. Internally, she looks after her husband and raises her children, takes care of the housework, and respects her parents-in-law. She is a role model for Chinese women. She is dignified, beautiful, and simple. When she appears, she is a return to tradition. This is a realistic version of the Chinese Dream.

chinese_text: #星品预告#周二【4月2日】，所有新品就要上架啦！[江南style]谁会是第一个来门店尝鲜的星粉呢？[得意地笑]
text: #星 Product Notice# On Tuesday [April 2], all new products will be on the shelves! [Gangnam Style] Who will be the first celebrity fan to come to the store to try it out? [smirking]

chinese_text: 一个已经拯救了100万人生命的图片，您的一次转发就有可能挽救一条生命。请动动手指吧！无论您是司机还是行人，请以后多多注意！@实用小百科（转）
text: A picture that has saved 1 million lives, your one repost may save another life. Please move your fingers! Whether you are a driver or a pedestrian, please pay more attention in the future! @practical encyclopedia (reposted)

chinese_text: #饭团剑三#【毒经是用来献祭的....】【<<才怪！！！】【以此纪念我的战友@-烁夜 ~哇哈哈哈有夸张XD~不许打我脸！..还有...你不在的时候，我就接替了被献祭的工作QuQ】~~说好的更新XDD~@剑网3有爱同人秀

chinese_text: 今天第一天進棚錄影，好歡樂喔，謝謝我的好姊妹送的豪華水果籃，還有喜憨兒烘焙屋的蛋糕，以及皇室嘉族和青春OBS的美麗花束，真是不好意思，讓你們破費啦，希望未來的錄影我能更盡興更享受，也祝福有情人一起去約會吧！！
text: Today is the first day of recording in the studio. It’s so fun. Thank you to my good sister for the luxurious fruit basket, the cake from Xihaner’s Bakery, and the beautiful bouquets from the royal family and youthful OBS. I’m really sorry for costing you so much. Well, I hope I can have more fun and enjoy my future recordings, and I also wish lovers to go on dates together! !

chinese_text: 【10个做法会把宝宝宠坏】1、有求必应；2、他出口成“脏”你一笑置之；3、从不训练他精神独立；4、从不告诉他你错了；5、替他收拾所有弄乱的东西；6、毫不限制他的读物；7、当他的摇钱树；8、满足他所有的口腹之欲；9、永远站在他这边；10、我就是拿他没办法。 @实用小百科（转）
text: [10 practices that will spoil your baby] 1. Respond to every request; 2. Just laugh it off when he says "dirty"; 3. Never train him to be mentally independent; 4. Never tell him you are wrong; 5. Clean up everything for him. Things that make things messy; 6. Do not limit his reading; 7. Be his cash cow; 8. Satisfy all his appetites; 9. Always stand by his side; 10. I just can't do anything with him. @practical encyclopedia (reposted)

chinese_text: 因为一些原因，有一次对象特别悲切的跟我说分手吧，我觉得那不是分手的理由，死活都不同意，冲他哭，哀求他，一点儿脸都不要。因为我知道，要脸没用，留住他最重要，不然一定会更难过。要脸不代表高兴，没脸没皮但是高高兴兴不挺好的嘛。高兴对我来说比什么都重要。对象能让我高兴，他就是最重要的人。
text: For some reasons, my partner once told me very sadly that we should break up. I felt that was not the reason for breaking up. I didn’t agree to it either dead or alive. I cried to him and begged him, without any shame at all. Because I know that there is no point in asking for face. The most important thing is to keep him, otherwise it will be even more sad. Being shameless doesn't mean being happy. Being shameless doesn't mean being happy, isn't it good? Happiness is more important to me than anything else. The person who makes me happy is the most important person.

chinese_text: 【百家姓排名变了，快来找找你的姓吧…】说起百家姓，人人可以脱口而出“赵钱孙李、周吴郑王...”可是你知道吗？新的百家姓排名已经发生了翻天覆地的变化，一项针对中国人姓氏的大规模调查，按照人口数量对姓氏进行了新的排名，被称之为新百家姓。快来看看你的姓氏排在多少位吧！http://t.cn/zT4BuDv
text: [The ranking of hundreds of surnames has changed, come find yours...] Speaking of hundreds of surnames, everyone can blurt out "Zhao Qian, Sun Li, Zhou, Wu and King Zheng..." But do you know? The New Hundred Family Surnames ranking has undergone earth-shaking changes. A large-scale survey on Chinese surnames has conducted a new ranking of surnames according to population, which is called the New Hundred Family Surnames. Come and see where your last name ranks! http://t.cn/zT4BuDv

chinese_text: #本报#【寻找初恋的越洋来信】广州一中49届校友叶铭业上月在美寄信回校寻初恋：50届李淑琚。两人当年互定白首之约，惜造化弄人，他因战火被迫远走，她在信中说：我会等你。后叶老多次回穗寻找未获。他说，但求有生之年能再见她一面。现寻人仍无果，如有信息可私信本报！为了这份牵挂，扩散！[话筒]
text: #本报# [Letter from across the ocean looking for first love] Ye Mingye, alumnus of the 49th class of Guangzhou No. 1 Middle School, sent a letter back to school in the United States last month looking for his first love: Li Shuju, the 50th class. The two made a promise to each other back then, but luckily, he was forced to leave due to the war. She said in the letter: I will wait for you. Later, Mr. Ye returned to Guangzhou many times to search but failed to find it. He said he hoped to see her again in his lifetime. The search for the person is still fruitless. If you have any information, please send a private message to this newspaper! For this concern, spread it! [microphone]

chinese_text: 【你的睡眠几星级？】好的睡眠有以下特点：能在10-20分钟入睡；睡眠中不醒或偶尔醒来又能很快入睡，直至第二天早晨；夜间睡眠无惊梦，做梦醒后很快忘记；早晨睡醒后精力充沛，心旷神怡，轻松愉快，无疲劳感，工作效率高；睡眠中没有或很少噩梦。夜已深，睡个“五星级”的好觉吧！
text: [What star rating is your sleep? 】Good sleep has the following characteristics: being able to fall asleep within 10-20 minutes; being able to fall asleep quickly without waking up during sleep or occasionally waking up until the next morning; being able to sleep without frightening dreams at night, and forgetting dreams quickly after waking up; After waking up, you will be energetic, refreshed, relaxed and happy, without fatigue, and your work efficiency will be high; there will be no or few nightmares during sleep. It’s late at night, let’s have a good “five-star” sleep!

chinese_text: #美丽说晚安#我们一生里有可能遇到很多人，有时正好同路，就会在一起走一段，直到我们遇到了真正想要共度一生的那个人，才会把余下的旅途全部交给这个人，结伴一起到终点。她来过，她 爱过，她努力过，得之是幸，不得是命。——《致我们终将逝去的青春》
text: #美说好夜# We may meet many people in our lives. Sometimes we happen to be on the same road, and we will walk together for a while. Until we meet the person we really want to spend our lives with, we will leave the rest of the journey to this person. People, go to the finish line together. She has been here, she has loved, she has worked hard, and she has been blessed but not her fate. ——"To our youth that will eventually pass away"

chinese_text: #晚安#以前的人，认识没多久就结婚了，然后心也定了。像烧一壶开水，也许没有马上沸腾，但可持续地维持一种常温。现代人，一认识就马上把水烧开，沸腾，爱得死去活来，没一会儿就烧干了。还有种情况，双方过于强调追求自我的空间，心想结不结婚是迟早的事情，这一拖，水凉透了，再也升不了温了。@读者
text: #好夜# People in the past got married not long after they met, and then their hearts were set. Like boiling a pot of water, it may not boil immediately, but it can sustainably maintain a normal temperature. Modern people will immediately boil the water as soon as they get to know each other. They will boil the water and fall in love with it to the point of death. After a while, it will be boiled dry. There is also a situation where both parties place too much emphasis on pursuing their own space, thinking that it will be a matter of time before they get married. After this delay, the water becomes cold and can no longer heat up. @reader

chinese_text: 【钱江夜话】湖州一养殖场被检出H7N9病毒，7000只鸭子全灭。从养殖场到餐桌，家禽产业有长长的产业链，关系到无数人的生计。养殖户们眼中含泪、心头滴血，将家禽一一掩埋。谁都知道，只要一加热，病毒就活不了，可城里的餐馆，连卤蛋都取消了。理性应对、科学防疫，别让农户伤上加伤，躺着也中枪。
text: [Qianjiang Night Talk] The H7N9 virus was detected in a Huzhou breeding farm, and 7,000 ducks were wiped out. From the farm to the table, the poultry industry has a long industrial chain, which is related to the livelihood of countless people. With tears in their eyes and blood in their hearts, the farmers buried the poultry one by one. Everyone knows that the virus cannot survive as long as it is heated, but restaurants in the city have even canceled braised eggs. Respond rationally and prevent the epidemic scientifically, so as not to make farmers more injured or get shot even while they are lying down.

chinese_text: “假如我又丑又穷又矮又笨，你还会爱我吗？”“别他妈假如了，你本来就又丑又穷又矮又笨。”（转）
text: "If I were ugly, poor, short, and stupid, would you still love me?" "Don't fucking pretend, you are already ugly, poor, short, and stupid." (Repost)

chinese_text: "我知道苦难无法使人更高贵，反而使人更卑微。它使人自私、猥琐、狭隘、猜忌。它把人们注意力吸引在细小的事情上面，它没有使人超越人本身，却使人称不上真正的人；我曾残忍地写道，我们不是从自己的苦难，而是从他人的苦难中才学会了顺从。"——《总结》毛姆
text: "I know that suffering cannot make people nobler, but makes people humbler. It makes people selfish, insignificant, narrow-minded, and jealous. It attracts people's attention to small things. It does not make people transcend themselves, but makes them inferior. Not truly human; I have cruelly written that we learn obedience not from our own suffering but from the suffering of others." - "Summary" Somerset Maugham

chinese_text: 聲音的名字： 物體在空氣中振動，擾動了空氣，於是空氣開始傳遞能量。當振動的速度快到每秒二十次，人類的耳朵就開始可以聽得到聲音，物體振動的聲音，振動越快，聲音在腦中的意象位置越高。但... http://t.cn/zTpDZH4 （使用新浪长微博工具发布 http://t.cn/zOXAaic）
text: Name of sound: Objects vibrate in the air, disturbing the air, and the air begins to transfer energy. When the vibration speed reaches twenty times per second, the human ear can begin to hear the sound of the vibrating object. The faster the vibration, the higher the image position of the sound in the brain. But... http://t.cn/zTpDZH4 (Use Sina Chang Weibo tool to publish http://t.cn/zOXAaic)

chinese_text: [猫扑大杂烩]武汉女环卫工怕费鞋赤脚扫积水 每年长4个月冻疮。她叫陈素珍，今年55岁。事实上，几乎凡遇有积水，15年来她都会打赤脚扫，即便在寒风刺骨的冬天，她亦如此。她说，这样“不坏鞋”，而她的鞋，全部都是地摊上买来的二手货，最贵的一双才20块钱......原帖：http://t.cn/zTOtMHz
text: [Maopu Hodgepodge] A female sanitation worker in Wuhan is afraid of spending money on shoes to sweep accumulated water on her bare feet and suffers from frostbite for 4 months every year. Her name is Chen Suzhen, she is 55 years old. In fact, almost every time there is stagnant water, she has been sweeping barefoot for 15 years, even in the bitterly cold winter. She said that these "won't ruin the shoes", and all her shoes were second-hand goods bought from street stalls. The most expensive pair only cost 20 yuan... Original post: http://t.cn /zTOtMHz

chinese_text: 这不是我青春的全部意义但却是不可或缺重要的一部分，我的青春回忆会因为爱着权志龙这样美好的人而更难忘，这也不只是一场演唱会它所带给我的能量会支撑着以后任何一段困难的时光，然后还有就是，凡是让我们喜欢到无力自拔的人我们都要去见上一面，这样才能安心的过好以后的生活虽然我们终究不能在一起
text: This is not the whole meaning of my youth, but it is an indispensable and important part. The memories of my youth will be more unforgettable because I love such a beautiful person like Quan Zhilong. This is not just a concert that it brings to me. The energy will support any difficult time in the future, and what’s more, we must meet anyone who we like so much that we can’t help ourselves, so that we can live our future lives with peace of mind, even though we can’t be together after all.

chinese_text: #晚安# 他大学毕业时应聘过30份工作，全部被拒绝：他想当警察和5个同学一起去，4个录取，他没有被录取；他在杭州第一家五星级宾馆开业的时候去应聘服务员，没有被录取；24个人一起应聘杭州肯德基，23个被录取，没有被录取的那个还是他。——他是马云。加油吧，年轻人，没什么了不起。
text: #好夜# When he graduated from college, he applied for 30 jobs, all of which were rejected: He wanted to be a policeman and went with 5 classmates, and 4 were accepted, but he was not accepted; when he opened the first five-star hotel in Hangzhou He applied for a job as a waiter, but was not accepted; 24 people applied for Hangzhou KFC together, and 23 were accepted, but he was the one who was not accepted. ——He is Jack Ma. Come on, young man, it's no big deal.

chinese_text: 【数学不好？电击一下试试？】哈佛大学最新研究成果表明，连续5天给大脑做20分钟电击，数字推理运算能力可提高28%。研究者称，他们所用的电流很轻，相当于5号电池，被电者不会有任何疼痛不适。他们希望将这项成果在世界各地中小型推广，帮助那些数学不好的孩纸。 via微天下
text: [Not good at math? Try an electric shock? 】The latest research results from Harvard University show that giving 20 minutes of electric shock to the brain for five consecutive days can improve numerical reasoning and computing ability by 28%. The researchers said that the current they used was very light, equivalent to a AA battery, and the person being electrified would not feel any pain or discomfort. They hope to promote this result to small and medium-sized enterprises around the world to help children who are not good at mathematics. via microtianxia

chinese_text: 我们都是娑婆世界的众生，对情爱有着难以抗拒的执着。看着唤云，我想问问大家，面对爱你的人和你爱的人，你会如何抉择？
text: We are all sentient beings in the Saha world and have an irresistible attachment to love. Looking at Huanyun, I want to ask everyone, how would you choose between the person who loves you and the person you love?

chinese_text: #晚安#【这一刻，520！[心]】2013·520——爱你一生·我爱你！[心]这一刻，进入今年最浪漫的日期，无论是枕边人，还是远方的他/她，说出彼此的爱吧。也可以把这条微博@ 给你心仪的他/她，作为表白哦！愿爱意和感恩温暖你我的心灵！晚安，亲们520！[心][爱心传递]
text: #好夜# [At this moment, 520! [Heart]] 2013·520——Love you all my life·I love you! [Heart] At this moment, we have entered the most romantic date of the year. Whether it is the person next to you or the one from far away, let’s express our love to each other. You can also send this Weibo @ to your favorite person as a confession! May love and gratitude warm your and my hearts! Good night, dear 520! [Heart][Love delivery]

chinese_text: 好害怕!!!晚飯後回家發現有一隻死蟑螂（圖左），估計是貓咪mike mike 救了我。我鼓起勇氣用tissue 蓋住屍體，但我實在沒勇氣拾起牠。（家傭又未返家）😭😂😭好害怕喔
text: So scared!!! I came home after dinner and found a dead cockroach (left in the picture). It was probably my cat Mike who saved me. I mustered up the courage to cover the body with tissue, but I really didn't have the courage to pick it up. (The domestic helper hasn’t returned home yet)😭😂😭I’m so scared

chinese_text: 今天发布会群访结束后,其他演员都在各自休息室单独接受采访,刘心悠赶时间得先走,跟她打了声招呼,那时她的助理已经架着她快步下楼梯,连电梯都等不及.我在紫毯边上坐着时正好刘诗诗走过来去休息室,她的采访排得很多,可能要到很晚,明天全组,还要飞到香港继续拍,看吴奇隆,陈翔也很疲惫,真都挺不容易的
text: After the group interview at today's press conference, other actors were interviewed individually in their respective lounges. Liu Xinyou was in a hurry and had to leave first, so I said hello to her. By then, her assistant had already carried her down the stairs quickly, and even the elevator was gone. I can't wait. When I was sitting on the edge of the purple carpet, Liu Shishi happened to come over to the lounge. She has a lot of interviews scheduled and may go until very late. Tomorrow, the whole team will fly to Hong Kong to continue filming and watch Wu Qilong and Chen Xiang. I'm also very tired. It's really not easy.

chinese_text: 年轻时无论如何要确立一个目标。一克服懒惰消极靠目标。没目标就瞎混，一天到晚打牌玩游戏睡懒觉。二克服怨天尤人靠目标。没目标就牢骚满腹，小小年纪，什么都没干就学出一付失意老者的尖酸刻薄，一肚皮不合时宜，一脑子愤愤不平，觉得全世界对不起你。最无聊。古语说：“品卑由于无志。”定方向要努力
text: No matter what, you should set a goal when you are young. To overcome laziness and passivity, rely on goals. I just mess around without a goal, play cards and games all day long and sleep in. 2. Overcoming resentment depends on goals. When you have no goals, you are full of complaints. At a young age, you have learned the bitterness of a frustrated old man without doing anything. Your belly is inappropriate, your head is indignant, and you feel that the whole world is sorry for you. Most boring. As the old saying goes: "Being humble is due to lack of ambition." We must work hard to set the direction.

chinese_text: @于建嵘 有一个叫托尼的英国人，卖掉自己在英国老家的三个公司，一个庄园，两辆跑车来到中国，在西安给流浪汉发包子，一干就是7年。西安的许多流浪人每周一、三、五的下午，在五星街的一间简易房中，领走他们的免費晚餐：几个包子，一碗稀饭。评：扶危济困才是真正的慈善，而不是做秀。@文史女教师
text: @読徘 There is an Englishman named Tony. He sold three companies, a manor, and two sports cars in his hometown in England and came to China. He distributed buns to homeless people in Xi'an and worked there for 7 years. Many homeless people in Xi'an receive their free dinner: a few steamed buns and a bowl of porridge in a simple room on Wuxing Street every Monday, Wednesday and Friday afternoon. Comment: Helping those in need is true charity, not just a show. @literary female teacher

chinese_text: 【2013上海国际足球邀请赛.回放#上海申花0:1大田市民#】2013上海国际足球邀请赛开战，上海申花坐镇虹口足球场0-1不敌大田市民。申花全替补出战投资人@朱骏 身披18号球衣首发出战并打满全场，下半场朱骏曾补射打入一球但被判越位无效。大田市民在第50分钟由韩德熙打入制胜一球。http://t.cn/zHpnFHk
text: [2013 Shanghai International Football Invitational Tournament. Replay # Shanghai Shenhua 0:1 Daejeon Citizen#] The 2013 Shanghai International Football Invitational Tournament started, Shanghai Shenhua lost 0-1 to Daejeon Citizens at the Hongkou Football Stadium. Shenhua came on the bench and investor @ Zhu Jun started the game wearing the No. 18 jersey and played the entire game. In the second half, Zhu Jun scored a goal from a supplementary shot but was ruled invalid for offside. Han Deok-hee scored the winning goal for Daejeon Citizens in the 50th minute. http://t.cn/zHpnFHk

chinese_text: 很多年前拿着老款手机和他发信息，手机只能存200条，从来都是删掉我的只装他发的。每次到200条都要把信息再精挑细选一下，舍不得删。那时候最希望有一个可以收1000条信息的手机来储存我们的爱。现如今我有了一个可以收无限多信息的手机，可是却没有跟我发200条值得回味珍藏信息的那个人了... [转]
text: Many years ago, I used an old mobile phone to send messages to him. The phone could only store 200 messages, so I always deleted mine and only loaded his messages. Every time I reach 200 items, I have to carefully select the information and be reluctant to delete it. At that time, we most wished for a mobile phone that could receive 1,000 messages to store our love. Nowadays, I have a mobile phone that can receive unlimited messages, but I don’t have the person who sent me 200 memorable and treasured messages... [Repost]

chinese_text: 【忠犬为救主人被毁容  结束治疗返乡受热捧[心]】2011年，2岁的混血犬卡邦以肉身阻挡机车，保护主人的女儿和侄女免于受伤，但它却被撞成重伤，失去了口鼻和上颚。后来，卡邦在美国进行了8个月的治疗和面部重塑。6月8日结束治疗回到菲律宾和主人团聚，受到英雄般礼遇。 http://t.cn/zHjkqea中国台湾网
text: [Loyal dog was disfigured to save his owner and returned home after treatment and became popular [Heart]] In 2011, the 2-year-old mixed-breed dog Kabang blocked a motorcycle with his body to protect the owner’s daughter and niece from being injured, but he was hit. Severely injured, losing his mouth, nose and roof of his mouth. Later, Capone underwent eight months of treatment and facial reconstruction in the United States. After treatment on June 8, he returned to the Philippines to reunite with his owner and was treated like a hero. http://t.cn/zHjkqeaChina Taiwan Net

chinese_text: 尝试两手交握，你是右手拇指在上(上图) 还是左手拇指在上 (下图)？尝试换一下，是不是感觉像手长在别人身上一样别扭？刚看了份文献，说这会反映人的思维习惯。右手拇指在上显示接受信息时优先使用左脑，主理性、语言、计算、分析、男性多；左手拇指在上则是右脑思维，主感性、直觉、想象，女性多。[转]
text: Try holding your hands together. Is your right thumb on top (picture above) or your left thumb on top (picture below)? Try changing it. Does it feel as awkward as if your hands are on someone else’s body? I just read a document that said this will reflect people's thinking habits. If the thumb of the right hand is on top, it means that the left brain is used first when receiving information, which is mainly rational, language, calculation, and analysis, and men are more likely to do so; if the thumb of the left hand is on top, the right brain is thinking, which is dominated by sensibility, intuition, and imagination, and women are more likely to do so. [change]

chinese_text: 如果可以接受自己也不那么完美，就不用忙着去粉饰了；如果可以承认自己并不那么伟大，就不用急着去证明；如果可以去放弃自己的种种成见，就不用吵着去反驳了；如果可以不在乎别人怎么看自己，就不用哭着去申诉了；如果可以慢半拍，静半刻，低半头，就可以一直微笑了。《喃喃》安
text: If you can accept that you are not so perfect, you don’t have to be busy whitewashing it; if you can admit that you are not that great, you don’t have to rush to prove it; if you can give up your various prejudices, you don’t have to rush to refute it; If you don't care what others think of you, you don't have to cry to complain; if you can slow down for a moment, be still for a moment, and lower your head for a moment, you can keep smiling. "Mumbling" Ann

chinese_text: 有些故事，不一定要讲给所有人听；有些悲伤，不一定谁都会懂；有些伤口，时间久了就会慢慢长好；有些委屈，受过了想通了也就释然了；有些伤痛，忍过了疼久了也成习惯了；有些藏在心底的话，不想说也就没必要说了。其实，并不是所有的痛，都可以呐喊；不是所有的爱，都可以表白。@几米漫画集（转）
text: Some stories do not have to be told to everyone; some sorrows may not be understood by everyone; some wounds will slowly heal over time; some grievances can be relieved after they have been dealt with and thought about; some pains , after enduring the pain for a long time, it has become a habit; there are some things hidden in my heart that I don’t want to say, so there is no need to say them. In fact, not all pain can be shouted out; not all love can be expressed. @Jimmy Comics Collection (reposted)

chinese_text: 不要害怕单身，害怕单身其实是害怕一种孤独感。而想象一下当你结了婚有了小孩你可能有时候却怀念单身的日子，那种潇洒的可以说走就走的日子。孤独只是没有学会和自己作伴。一生只有自己是陪自己真正走下去的人。提升幸福敏感度比抱怨没人要好太多了，起码主控权在自己，你才是那个控制自己幸福的人。
text: Don't be afraid of being single. The fear of being single is actually the fear of loneliness. And imagine that when you get married and have children, you may sometimes miss the days when you were single, the kind of chic days when you could just leave at a moment's notice. Loneliness is just not learning to keep company with yourself. You are the only one who can truly go on with you in your life. Improving happiness sensitivity is much better than complaining about no one. At least the control lies with you, and you are the one who controls your own happiness.

chinese_text: 两人在一起，有回忆就是幸福！——心灵鸡汤。今晚跟大伙煲个鸡汤，有同感转给喜欢的人。晚安。图转。
text: When two people are together, having memories is happiness! ——Chicken Soup for the Soul. I'm going to make some chicken soup with you tonight, and I'll share my feelings with the people I like. Good night. Picture transfer.

chinese_text: 我们记忆最精华的部分保存在我们的外在世界，在雨日潮湿的空气里、在幽闭空间的气味里、在刚生起火的壁炉的芬芳里，也就是说，在每一个地方，只要我们的理智视为无用而加以摒弃的事物又重新被发现的话。那是过去岁月最后的保留地，是它的精粹，在我们的眼泪流干以後，又让我们重新潸然泪下（普鲁斯特）
text: The best parts of our memories are preserved in our external world, in the humid air of rainy days, in the smell of claustrophobic spaces, in the fragrance of a freshly lit fireplace, that is, everywhere, as long as we When things that have been dismissed as useless by the mind are rediscovered. It is the last remnant of the past, its essence, which makes us shed tears again after our tears have dried up (Proust)

text: [Hello, tomorrow] Inner Mongolia Wang Suyi and Guangxi Li Daqiu, two deputy provincial officials were double fired in one day. This warning: Use power with awe and always be wary. chinese_text: 《世界再大 也要回家[心] 》你跑的越来越快，却没注意到他们越来越慢；你越来越强大的同时，他们也越来越老。你习惯了他们存在的日子，竟然忘记了他们也会...离开；趁现在，一切都来得及，快回家吧！值得你画两分钟看完的一幅漫画[泪]  图自Trixy
text: "No matter how big the world is, you still have to go home [Heart]" You run faster and faster, but you don't notice that they are getting slower and slower; while you are getting stronger and stronger, they are getting older and older. You are used to their existence, and you actually forget that they will also...leave; now, everything is too late, go home quickly! A cartoon worth drawing and reading in two minutes [tears] Picture from Trixy

chinese_text: #买书送作者# 现场直播图。今天很荣幸与武汉妹子@Tweeme 烛光晚餐，我请她吃了好吃的蜂窝煤，她问了我一堆爆猛的问题。她刚武大毕业，人很秀气又爱读书。这么好的女孩子居然单身实在没天理，现替天行道，帮这枚小姑娘征男友，抓紧粉她去吧。（应广大同学要求，买书送作者这一变态活动将持续进行下去）
text: #BUYBookSend to Author# Live broadcast picture. I was honored to have a candlelight dinner with Wuhan girl @Tweeme today. I treated her to delicious briquettes, and she asked me a bunch of exciting questions. She just graduated from Wuhan University. She is very delicate and loves reading. It's unreasonable for such a good girl to be single. I'm going to do justice to this little girl and help her find a boyfriend. Go and follow her now. (At the request of the majority of students, this abnormal activity of buying books and giving them to authors will continue)

chinese_text: 【68岁老人被继子撵出家 继子称:我又没让他养 是她自愿的[怒] 】68岁的孙桂枝作为继母把3个子女含辛茹苦养大。现在她行动不便,老伴有病卧床,却被继子多次赶出家门,只好回到娘家与90岁母亲蜗居在破房内。提到孙桂枝20多年的养育情,继子冷漠地说:"我又没让她养,是她自愿的,反正我不会养活她"[怒] @大河报
text: [A 68-year-old man was kicked out of the home by his stepson and his stepson said: I didn’t let him raise her because she did it voluntarily [angry]] As a stepmother, 68-year-old Sun Guizhi raised her three children through hardships. Now she has difficulty moving, her husband is sick and bedridden, but she has been kicked out of the house by her stepson many times, so she has no choice but to return to her parents' home and live in a shabby house with her 90-year-old mother. Referring to Sun Guizhi's 20-plus years of nurturing, the stepson said coldly: "I didn't let her raise her. She did it voluntarily. Anyway, I won't support her." [Anger] @大河报

chinese_text: #晚安中国#时光越老，人心越淡。曾经说好了生死与共的人，到最后老死不相往来。岁月是贼，总是不经意偷去许多，美好的容颜，真实的情感，幸福的生活。也许我们无法做到视若无睹，但也不必干戈相向。毕竟谁都拥有过花好月圆的时光，那时候，就要做好有一天被洗劫一空的准备。——《岁月静好 现世安稳》
text: #GoodnightChina# The older we get, the weaker our hearts become. People who once promised to share life and death together ended up not being in contact with each other until death. Time is a thief, always stealing many beautiful faces, true emotions, and a happy life inadvertently. Maybe we can't turn a blind eye, but we don't have to fight each other. After all, everyone has had time to spend the full moon, and at that time, they should be prepared to be robbed one day. ——"The years are quiet and the world is stable"

chinese_text: 【律师是天生的反对派】法治国家，需要有天生的反对派，律师就是天生的反对派，有限政府，如何限制政府权力，如何制约权力，人民如何监督政府，这就是律师的专业，律师就是要替人民看住政府，看住权力，把权力关进笼子里，律师就是栏杆，所以不要敌视律师的反对，因为反对就是律师的天职和爱国的表现！
text: [Lawyers are natural opponents] A country governed by law needs natural opposition. Lawyers are natural opponents. Limited government means how to limit government power, how to restrict power, and how the people supervise the government. This is the profession of lawyers. Lawyers are We must guard the government and power for the people, and put power in a cage. Lawyers are the railings, so don’t be hostile to lawyers’ opposition, because opposition is a lawyer’s bounden duty and an expression of patriotism!

text: [He Jiahong: Ten major misunderstandings in China's criminal justice] The investigation model from confession to evidence; solving the case within a time limit that violates the rules; preconceived one-sided evidence collection; improper interpretation of scientific evidence; repeated torture to extract confessions; abandoning principles to follow public opinion; mutuality in name only. Restrictions; ineffective court trials; overdue detention that is too difficult to get off; leniency for suspected crimes with insufficient evidence... http://t.cn/zRt8NEV

chinese_text: 跟我一朋友的男朋友聊天，他说：“其实有时我也不知道她怎么了，莫名其妙就会吵会闹。” 我问：“那你会怎样？” 他说：“三年多都是这样哄过来的，她就像个小孩子，爱她就宠她呗！“我问：”不累吗“他说：“失去她才是最累的，我无法想象那种痛。”（转）
text: I was chatting with the boyfriend of a friend of mine, and he said: "Actually, sometimes I don't know what's wrong with her, and she gets into trouble out of nowhere." I asked, "Then what will you do?" He said, "It's been the same for more than three years. After being coaxed like this, she is like a child. If you love her, just spoil her!" I asked, "Aren't you tired?" He said, "Losing her is the most tiring thing. I can't imagine the pain." (Reposted) )

chinese_text: 本“恢畅笑话集团”有一女汉子，把她的QQ昵称改成了“我老婆”，后来我们集团很多男的回家后都跪了搓衣板。。。由此，恢畅笑话集团决定借鉴性更改本微博昵称；定位为：『恢畅笑话，非常消化』原昵称：#醉多粉# ；稍早前昵称：#开心互动歪爽爽#全部弃用，特此通告，谢谢大家！
text: There was a female man in this "Huichang Joke Group" who changed her QQ nickname to "My Wife". Later, many men in our group knelt on the washboard after returning home. . . As a result, Huichang Joke Group decided to change the nickname of this Weibo as a reference; it is positioned as: "Huichang joke, very digestible" original nickname: #zuiduofen#; earlier nickname: #happyinteractivewaishuangshuang# All discarded Yes, this is notified, thank you all!

chinese_text: 中美电影节颁奖礼结束时，他在我离开前找到我，跟我讲他是电影＜好奇害死猫＞的作曲，他说一定要来告诉我，他很喜欢我在那部电影中的表演，那些电影片段让他十分难忘。我们来了个大大的拥抱。我喜欢这温暖而又让人骄傲的际遇，比拿奖更动人。谢谢你带给我这样的感动，也谢谢各位。[太阳]
text: At the end of the China-American Film Festival awards ceremony, he came to me before I left and told me that he was the composer of the movie "Curiosity Killed the Cat". He said he must come and tell me that he liked my performance in that movie. The performances and those movie clips were very unforgettable for him. We had a big hug. I like this warm and proud opportunity, which is more touching than winning a prize. Thank you for bringing me such a touch, and thank you all. [sun]

chinese_text: 刚刚我趴在楼上阳台吃葱油饼,听到楼下有一对男女的谈话.男的脸红说:"你能和我交往吗?"女孩冷冷地说:"只要天上掉葱油饼我就和你交...."我一听,顺势就把葱油饼丢到了女孩头上...加油吧!小兄弟!只能帮你到这了!
text: Just now I was lying on the balcony eating scallion pancakes when I heard a conversation between a man and a woman downstairs. The man blushed and said, "Can you date me?" The girl said coldly, "I will date you as long as scallion pancakes fall from the sky." You hand it over..." As soon as I heard this, I threw the scallion pancake on the girl's head... Come on, little brother! I can only help you so far!

text: A colleague broke up with his boyfriend and made a very strange move. He logged into his boyfriend's QQ and sent a message to every woman in his friends: I broke up because I found out that I love you! ! This includes classmates, colleagues, friends, etc. that I know and don’t know. After sending it, she calmly quit and left a message to her ex-boyfriend on her QQ: As an ex-girlfriend, I can only help you so much...

chinese_text: 每次开始的时候，都迫不及待地爱别人。可是真正在一起以后，就忘记了小心翼翼的疼爱。原来，喜欢上一个人很容易。可是，要在心里最深刻的地方，去珍惜，就很难！—— 安东尼《这些都是你给我的爱》
text: Every time I start, I can’t wait to love others. But after we were really together, we forgot about our careful love. It turns out that falling in love with someone is easy. However, it is difficult to cherish it in the deepest place in your heart! ——Anthony "These are the love you gave me"

chinese_text: 网传2013年十大酷刑：1.减肥（特别是晚上不吃饭）。2.早起。3.断WIFI。4.剧透。5.想念一个人。6.吃伍仁月饼。7.说话不说完。8.午餐吃什么。9.挤公交。10.眉毛乱的不行。你最受不了哪个？
text: The top ten tortures in 2013 were reported online: 1. Losing weight (especially not eating at night). 2. Get up early. 3. Disconnect WIFI. 4. Spoilers. 5. Miss someone. 6. Eat Wuren mooncakes. 7. Don’t finish talking. 8. What to have for lunch. 9. Take the bus. 10. The eyebrows are messy. Which one can't you stand the most?

chinese_text: 刚看到个活动叫“一句感动过你的文言"，评论有说是《项脊轩志》中的“庭有枇杷树,吾妻死之年所手植也,今已亭亭如盖矣”，有说是《木兰辞》中的“同行十二年，不知木兰是女郎”，我的答案是游褒禅山记中的一句，“有穴窈然，入之甚寒，问其深，则其好游者不能穷也，谓之后洞。入之愈深，其进愈难。”
text: I just saw an event called "A Classical Chinese Sentence That Moved You". Some comments said it was from "The Chronicles of Xiangjixuan": "There is a loquat tree in the courtyard. My wife planted it when she died. Now it is as tall as a canopy." It is said to be "We have been together for twelve years, but I did not know that Mulan was a girl" in "Mulan Ci". My answer is a sentence from "A Journey to the Zen Mountain", "There is a cave that is graceful, but it is very cold when you enter it. If you ask how deep it is, you will know that it is a girl." A good traveler cannot be poor, so it is called the cave behind. The deeper it goes, the more difficult it is to enter."

chinese_text: #美老师麻辣谈#有时你点开QQ的消息记录，发现和XXX的聊天记录竟有几百页那么长。你仔细一看又发现，最后一次聊天结束是一年前，然后你苦涩地笑了。不断地成长，不断遇到新的人，新朋友慢慢变成老朋友，老朋友慢慢变成陌生人。我们的一生中，一直都在一路遇见，一路失散。(via 鞭鞭少将)
text: #美师 Malatalk# Sometimes you click on QQ’s message records and find that the chat records with XXX are hundreds of pages long. You take a closer look and realize that the last chat ended a year ago, and then you smile bitterly. Keep growing, keep meeting new people, new friends slowly become old friends, and old friends slowly become strangers. Throughout our lives, we have been meeting each other and getting separated along the way. (via Major General Whip Whip)

chinese_text: 坐着等待，好运就不会从天而降。就算命中注定，也要自己去把它找出来。在我过去的体验中，越努力，得到的东西就越好。当我得到的时候，会感觉一切都是注定的。可是如果不努力争取，你得到的可能是另一样东西，那个结果也好象是注定的。所以目前这个局面可以说它是命定，也可以说是人改造了它。——李安
text: Sit back and wait, and good luck will not fall from the sky. Even if it is destined, you have to find it yourself. In my past experience, the harder you work, the better things you get. When I get it, it feels like everything is meant to be. But if you don't work hard, you may get something else, and that result seems to be destined. So the current situation can be said to be destiny, or it can be said that people have transformed it. ——Lee Ang

chinese_text: #晚安#你身处什么样的圈子，你就会遇到什么样的人；你结交了那些朋友，你脾性也会慢慢接近这样的人；你处在什么位置，站在什么高度，决定了你是怎么样的视野；内心多大的格局，你就可以看到多大的天空。你没有碰到你期望的人，是因为你还没有准备好你自己。
text: #Goodnight# What kind of circle you are in, what kind of people you will meet; the friends you make, your temperament will gradually approach such people; what position you are in, what height you stand on, decide What kind of vision you have; how big the pattern in your heart is, how big the sky you can see. The reason you haven't met the person you expected is because you haven't prepared yourself yet.

chinese_text: 【男孩遭逼供，被迫认罪入狱20年[震惊]】据福克斯新闻网，1995年，16岁的黑人男孩丹尼尔，在一杀人案中遭刑讯逼供，警察威胁说，若不认罪就强奸他。他被迫认罪，被判终身监禁。如今，36岁的他迎来重审，目前已获保释，等待检方是继续起诉还是放弃指控。母亲说，因贫困，一直没钱上诉，多亏好心人资助。
text: [The boy was forced to plead guilty and jailed for 20 years [Shocking]] According to Fox News, in 1995, a 16-year-old black boy, Daniel, was tortured to extract a confession in a homicide case. The police threatened to rape him if he did not confess. . He was forced to plead guilty and was sentenced to life in prison. Now, the 36-year-old is facing a retrial and is currently on bail, waiting for the prosecutor to continue prosecuting or drop the charges. My mother said that due to poverty, she never had the money to appeal, but thanks to the financial support from kind-hearted people.

chinese_text: 【V5应援】今天等了一晚上 终于把给茜的礼物送出去了 今天有夜戏看起来回来挺累的 然后看到她就说我是V5的 然后她就不往前走了停下来看着我 我们说给你送生日礼物来了 然后宋茜就伸手接了礼物一直说辛苦了 说了好几声谢谢 虽然很累还是一直和我们说辛苦的茜真的很温暖 礼物会在生日的时候公布呦
text: [V5 Support] Today I waited all night and finally gave away the gift to Akane. There was a night scene today. She seemed very tired when she came back. Then when she saw her, she said I am from V5, and then she stopped walking and stopped to look. We said we would give you a birthday gift, and then Victoria Song reached out to take the gift and kept saying thank you for the hard work. She said thank you several times. Although she was very tired, she kept telling us that hard work was done. Victoria is really warm. The gift will be announced on her birthday.

Just as you are about to click on it, you look up and realize that your parents are putting the dishes into your bowl at the same time."

text: [A young child in Xiangyang was brutally cut off by his second mother [angry]] Today, a netizen broke the news: “In Xiangyang, Hubei, because of a small dispute at home, this innocent child had his ears cut off by his second mother, and his chin was also chopped off. …” A @chutiandushibao reporter verified that the case was true. The second mother, Zhang, has been detained.

chinese_text: 【安倍与普京逗狗赞好狗，普京回应:有时咬人】俄罗斯总统普京8日在冬奥会举办地索契带着宠物狗Yume会见日本首相安倍晋三。Yume是安倍2012年7月访俄时送给普京的一只秋田犬，名意为“梦”。俄媒报道，见到Yume后，安倍用俄语说了句“好狗”，普京回答：“但它有时也咬人。”（新华社）
text: [Abe and Putin teased dogs and praised good dogs, Putin responded: sometimes bites] Russian President Putin brought his pet dog Yume to meet with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in Sochi, the venue for the Winter Olympics on the 8th. Yume is an Akita dog given to Putin by Abe during his visit to Russia in July 2012. Its name means "dream". Russian media reported that after meeting Yume, Abe said "a good dog" in Russian, and Putin replied: "But it sometimes bites people." (Xinhua News Agency)

text: [The "Supernatural" spin-off drama has been renamed and its heroine has been confirmed! 】The CW announced that the "Supernatural" spin-off series will be renamed "Supernatural: Bloodlines" (Supernatural: Bloodlines), and Melissa Roxburgh will become the heroine of the spin-off series. The play describes the never-ending war between demon hunters and various supernatural creatures in Chicago. The pilot episode of "Descent" will air as a regular episode of "Supernatural" on April 29.

chinese_text: 【你赞同国人丢弃筷子吗？】我国年产800亿双一次性筷子，每天需要砍伐2千万棵树，中国已成为世界最大的木材进口国。英国每日电讯报称：筷子和刀叉孰优孰劣已经争论了几个世纪，如今该下定论了，中国必须丢弃筷子。您知道一次性筷子的危害吗？为环境为自己你赞同国人丢弃筷子吗？@任志强 @袁裕来律师
text: [Do you agree with Chinese people throwing away chopsticks? 】my country’s annual output of 80 billion pairs of disposable chopsticks requires cutting down 20 million trees every day. China has become the world’s largest wood importer. The British Daily Telegraph said: The merits of chopsticks and knives and forks have been debated for centuries. Now it’s time to draw a conclusion. China must abandon chopsticks. Do you know the dangers of disposable chopsticks? Do you agree with Chinese people throwing away chopsticks for the sake of the environment and themselves? @人志强@元宇来 lawyer

chinese_text: 3月20日，6年级的佐藤隆志将从福岛市市立大波小学毕业。他是学校唯一的一名学生。今年4月学校就将关闭。想到即将离开“一个人”的学校，却让他觉得有些寂寞。文章就讲述了他在学校的“一个人”的生活。 （by 视角_日本)
text: On March 20, sixth grader Takashi Sato will graduate from Fukushima Municipal Ohami Elementary School. He is the only student in the school. The school will be closed in April this year. The thought of leaving the "alone" school made him feel a little lonely. The article tells about his "alone" life in school. (by perspective_Japan)

chinese_text: 【吴晓波：未来不关注这7点，一定会死掉】1.一定要重新思考理财观念；2.2014年是改革周期的开始之年，巨大的变化将在2014年发生；3.真正能活下去的是那些专业性公司；4.如果不懂电商，肯定没有未来；5.想不清和手机的关系，三年内一定会死掉；6.未来，80后主导世界；7.重新思考金融，拒绝财富缩水。
text: [Wu Xiaobo: If you don’t pay attention to these 7 points in the future, you will definitely die] 1. We must rethink the concept of financial management; 2. 2014 is the beginning of the reform cycle, and huge changes will occur in 2014; 3. Those who can truly survive They are those professional companies; 4. If you don’t understand e-commerce, you will definitely have no future; 5. If you can’t figure out the relationship with mobile phones, you will definitely die within three years; 6. In the future, the post-80s generation will dominate the world; 7. Rethink finance and refuse Wealth shrinks.

chinese_text: 睡觉前一定要先去上个厕所，就算几分钟前已经去过厕所了，已经躺在床上玩手机，那一会睡觉还要再去一趟，否则会陷入要不要去厕所的纠结中，然后才开始酝酿尿意，然后时间过去很久，最终还是起身去厕所。。你是不是也有这种强迫症。。。我不是故意在这个时候放这个图。。。
text: You must go to the toilet before going to bed. Even if you have gone to the toilet a few minutes ago and are lying on the bed playing with your mobile phone, you will have to go to the toilet again when you go to bed. Otherwise, you will be entangled in whether to go to the toilet or not. The urge to urinate began to brew, and then a long time passed before I finally got up to go to the toilet. . Do you also have this kind of obsessive-compulsive disorder? . . I didn't mean to post this picture at this time. . .

chinese_text: 网传采访姜文注意事项：1、所提的第一个问题很重要，要是抓住他的注意力了，随后会顺畅很多。2、如姜文开始反问，代表他不想回答这问题，可别回应他的反问，否则是个无底洞，直到他自己愿意停止。3、别拿别人评价他的话来问他，他会反感。4、多谈理想人生和艺术，少谈物质票房和电影看不看得懂的问题。
text: Things to note when interviewing Jiang Wen online: 1. The first question asked is very important. If you catch his attention, the rest of the interview will go much smoother. 2. If Jiang Wen starts to ask a rhetorical question, it means that he does not want to answer the question. Do not respond to his rhetorical question, otherwise it will be a bottomless pit until he is willing to stop. 3. Don’t ask him what others have said about him. He will be disgusted. 4. Talk more about ideal life and art, and less about material issues such as box office and incomprehensible movies.

chinese_text: #马航MH370航班失事#【黑匣子快没电了 搜寻与[钟]赛跑】3月31日，美国提供的黑匣子定位打捞设备随澳大利亚海军“海盾”号支援船，从珀斯附近的海军基地出发，驶往相关海域，预计3～4天抵达距澳大利亚以西大约1850公里的搜寻海域。据了解，MH370的黑匣子将会在4月8日停止发出信号。（@人民网）
text: # Malaysia Airlines MH370 flight crash# [The black box is about to run out of battery and the search and [clock] race] On March 31, the black box positioning and salvage equipment provided by the United States set off from the naval base near Perth with the Australian Navy's "Sea Shield" support ship. , sailing to relevant sea areas, and are expected to arrive in the search sea area about 1,850 kilometers west of Australia in 3 to 4 days. It is understood that MH370’s black box will stop sending signals on April 8. (@People.cn)

chinese_text: “对不起啊！”“呜呜。。。”“求求你别哭了。”“呜呜。。。”“迪，我们不求天长地久，但求曾经拥有，行吗？”“呜呜。。。”“我知道你很伤心，对你不公平，可是。。。”“呜呜。。。”“我永远爱你。。。”“呜呜。。。”“老公，吃饭！”“来了！”文某赶忙关掉手里的电吹风，从洗手间走了出来。
text: "I'm sorry!" "Uuuu..." "Please stop crying." "Uuuu..." "Di, we don't ask for eternity, but we only ask for what we once had, okay?" "Uuuu... ." "I know you are sad and it's unfair to you, but..." "Uuuu..." "I will always love you..." "Uuuu..." "Husband, eat!" "Come here! It's over!" Wen quickly turned off the hair dryer in his hand and walked out of the bathroom.

text: [Blacklist of Carcinogenic Foods (Part 1), Change for Health! 】① Preserved food: The dimethylnitrite produced by salted fish can be converted into the carcinogen dimethylnitriteamine in the body. You should also eat less salted eggs and pickles. ②Barbecue food: roast beef, roast duck, roast goose, roast suckling pig, roast mutton skewers, etc. ③Smoked foods: Such as bacon, smoked eggs, smoked dried tofu, etc. contain benzopyrene carcinogens. Regular consumption can easily lead to esophageal cancer and gastric cancer.

text: [A single visa is valid for many years and can go to multiple countries as soon as you say] Starting today, the validity period of all new multiple-entry visas for independent travelers to South Korea will be extended to five years. Since November last year, the United States extended the validity period of Chinese tourist visas to 10 years. Canada, Japan, South Korea, Australia and other countries have extended the validity period of Chinese tourist visas to ranging from 3 to 10 years. http://t.cn/RAOj4sm

text: #山东High Court confirmed the hearing on Nie Shubin’s case# After four months of waiting, the two lawyers in Nie Shubin’s case were interviewed by the Shandong High Court for the first time. As for when the results of the case review will be announced, both lawyers said: "It's hard to say yet." http://t.cn/RAOjJac

chinese_text: 【中国拟立法规定：明星代言虚假广告三年禁代言】明星为虚假广告代言，一旦遭行政处罚，未满三年不能做代言，20日，第十二届全国人大常委会第十四次会议继续审议广告法修订草案，拟严格规范广告代言。此外，药品广告内容不得与国务院药品监督管理部门批准的说明书不一致，并应显著标明禁忌和不良反应。
text: [China is planning to legislate: Celebrities will be banned from endorsing false advertisements for three years] Once celebrities endorse false advertisements and are subject to administrative penalties, they will not be able to do endorsements for less than three years. On the 20th, the 14th meeting of the Standing Committee of the 12th National People's Congress Continue to review the draft revision of the Advertising Law and plan to strictly regulate advertising endorsements. In addition, drug advertising content must not be inconsistent with the instructions approved by the State Council’s drug regulatory department, and contraindications and adverse reactions should be clearly marked.

chinese_text: #台湾地震#【新北市一变电箱爆炸致1死1伤】据本台记者消息，地震导致新北市一处变电箱爆炸，引发附近住宅发生火灾，致1死1伤。据统计，这次地震是今年台湾发生的第三起六级以上地震。http://t.cn/RAOTl6l
text: #台quake# [A transformer box exploded in New Taipei City, killing 1 and injuring 1] According to our reporter, the earthquake caused a transformer box to explode in New Taipei City, triggering a fire in a nearby residence, killing 1 and injuring 1. According to statistics, this earthquake is the third earthquake of magnitude 6 or above that has occurred in Taiwan this year. http://t.cn/RAOTl6l

text: [A young model in black stockings took a photo and was kicked out by her aunt, saying it was indecent.] Two days ago, several young game models went to an abandoned demolition site to take promotional photos for a certain game. During the filming process, an aunt suddenly came out and claimed to be from the neighborhood committee. She said that it was too immoral for the girls to wear so little and have such tattered clothes. http://t.cn/RAO6u90

chinese_text: 【巴基斯坦老人自愿守护中国英雄陵墓37年】在巴基斯坦吉尔吉特有一座烈士陵园，88位为修筑喀喇昆仑公路牺牲的中国建设者长眠于此。59岁的巴基斯坦老人阿里·艾哈迈德1978年起自愿守护陵墓，他说：“我亲眼看到中国人为巴基斯坦的发展昼夜劳作,为我们牺牲,我会用一生守护这座陵园” http://t.cn/RAOHA3g
text: [A Pakistani elderly man has volunteered to guard the tomb of Chinese heroes for 37 years] There is a martyrs cemetery in Gilgit, Pakistan, where 88 Chinese builders who died building the Karakoram Highway are buried. Ali Ahmed, a 59-year-old Pakistani man, has volunteered to guard the mausoleum since 1978. He said: "I saw with my own eyes that the Chinese worked day and night for the development of Pakistan and sacrificed for us. I will guard this mausoleum with my whole life." http:/ /t.cn/RAOHA3g

chinese_text: 碱性电池的阳极是锌阳极，含有锌粉的凝胶状物质。电池肚子里装着凝胶状物质，意味着它下落时吸收冲击的性能更好，不容易弹起来。随着电池放电，锌反应生成氧化锌，电池的内部结构跟着变化——锌阳极变成了更致密的固体，旧电池就更容易弹起来了。
text: The anode of an alkaline battery is a zinc anode, a gel-like substance containing zinc powder. The battery is filled with a gel-like substance, which means it has better shock-absorbing properties when it falls and is less likely to bounce up. As the battery discharges, the zinc reacts to form zinc oxide, and the battery's internal structure changes - the zinc anode becomes a denser solid, making it easier for older batteries to bounce back.

chinese_text: 【老人祖传纪念币遭工商查扣丢失】19年前，申德林出差时携带银元、古币，想与收藏爱好者交流。工商局以投机倒把为由将银元、古币没收。申德林状告工商局，最终胜诉。然而两枚纪念币不知去向，工商局称愿意赔偿，但这两枚被申德林称为价值不菲的纪念币一直难以估价…http://t.cn/RAO4YJA
text: [Old man’s ancestral commemorative coins were seized and lost by industrial and commercial seizure] 19 years ago, Shen Delin brought silver dollars and ancient coins with him on a business trip and wanted to communicate with collectors. The Industrial and Commercial Bureau confiscated silver coins and ancient coins on the grounds of speculation. Shendelin sued the Industrial and Commercial Bureau and ultimately won the case. However, the two commemorative coins were missing, and the Industrial and Commercial Bureau said they were willing to compensate. However, these two commemorative coins, which Shendelin said were valuable, have been difficult to estimate... http://t.cn/RAO4YJA

chinese_text: 【我国拟禁止果蔬使用剧毒高毒农药】全国人大常委会今天审议食品安全法修订草案三审稿，其中提出：国家鼓励和支持使用高效低毒低残留农药，推动剧毒、高毒农药替代产品的研发和应用；剧毒、高毒农药不得用于蔬菜、瓜果、茶叶和中草药材。详见：http://t.cn/RAOM2X0
text: [my country plans to ban the use of highly toxic and highly toxic pesticides on fruits and vegetables] The Standing Committee of the National People's Congress reviewed the third draft of the revised draft of the Food Safety Law today, which proposed: The state encourages and supports the use of highly efficient, low-toxic and low-residue pesticides, and promotes the substitution of highly toxic and highly toxic pesticides. Product development and application; highly toxic and highly toxic pesticides must not be used on vegetables, fruits, tea and Chinese herbal medicines. For details, see: http://t.cn/RAOM2X0

chinese_text: 【今日，谷雨】①今日17时42分，太阳到达黄经30度的位置，谷雨至；②谷雨是春季最后一个节气，源自“雨生百谷”之说；③“清明断雪，谷雨断霜”，此后气温回升，雨量增多；④此时节柳絮飞落，牡丹吐蕊，过敏体质的人应做好防护。时至暮春，初夏将至。继续努力，一起迎接夏天！
text: [Today, Guyu] ① At 17:42 today, the sun reaches 30 degrees of ecliptic longitude, and Guyu arrives; ② Guyu is the last solar term in spring, derived from the saying "Rain produces hundreds of grains"; ③ "Qingming cuts off the snow, and Guyu "Breaking frost", after which the temperature rises and the rainfall increases; ④ During this season, catkins fly down and peonies sprout, so people with allergies should take precautions. It is late spring and early summer is approaching. Keep up the hard work and welcome summer together!

chinese_text: 【心情不好，剪头发去~[拜拜]】意大利心理学家莱森斯发现，理发是调节心情的好办法。理发时人的头皮受到刺激，增加大脑的血液供应，刺激大脑中枢释放让人心情愉悦的化学物质。此外，坐在理发椅上，会强迫你进入一种安闲的状态，心跳、呼吸都慢下来，情绪自然也就好转了。（生命时报）你同意吗？
text: [If you are in a bad mood, go get a haircut~[Bye]] Italian psychologist Lessens discovered that haircuts are a good way to adjust your mood. During a haircut, the human scalp is stimulated, which increases the blood supply to the brain and stimulates the brain center to release chemicals that make people feel happy. In addition, sitting in the barber chair will force you into a state of ease, your heartbeat and breathing will slow down, and your mood will naturally improve. (Life Times) Do you agree?

chinese_text: 【英媒：中国官方首次承认大量农储粮或已严重受损】暗访画面记录了中国东北中储粮仓库官员以折扣价格购买陈粮或低质粮食，在填写相关文件时却显示是按国家规定的价格购买新粮。报道中曝光的粮食已发芽、变色或发霉。政府组织的粮食和棉花拍卖经常流拍，质量已差到无法商用的地步。http://t.cn/RAOtUaD
text: [British media: For the first time, Chinese officials admitted that a large amount of agricultural grain storage may have been seriously damaged] Undercover footage recorded that officials at the China Grain Storage Warehouse in Northeast China purchased old grain or low-quality grain at a discount, but when filling out relevant documents, it was shown that the price was at the price specified by the state. Buy new grain. The grain exposed in the report has sprouted, changed color or become moldy. Grain and cotton auctions organized by the government often fail, and the quality is so poor that they cannot be commercially used. http://t.cn/RAOtUaD

text: #快讯#[Xi Jinping arrived in Islamabad to begin his visit to Pakistan] President Xi Jinping arrived in Islamabad, the capital of Pakistan, by special plane. The President and Prime Minister of Pakistan greeted him at the airport and held a grand welcome ceremony. (CCTV reporter Wang Yubo)

chinese_text: 【时间概念】刹那、弹指或瞬间到底是多长时间。《僧祇律》记载：1剎那者为1念，20念为1瞬，20瞬为1弹指，20弹指为1罗预，20罗预为1须臾，1日1夜有30须臾。换算结果：须臾＝48分钟，弹指＝7.2秒，瞬间＝0.36秒，剎那＝1念＝0.018秒。须臾>弹指>瞬间>刹那=1念。（转）
text: [Concept of time] How long is a moment, a snap of a finger or an instant. "Sengki Vinaya" records: 1 moment is 1 thought, 20 thoughts are 1 moment, 20 snaps are 1 finger snap, 20 finger snaps are 1 Luo Yu, 20 Luo Su is 1 moment, and there are 30 Xu moments in a day and night. Conversion results: a moment = 48 minutes, a snap of a finger = 7.2 seconds, an instant = 0.36 seconds, an instant = 1 thought = 0.018 seconds. A moment > a snap of a finger > an instant > an instant = 1 thought. (change)

chinese_text: #全民阅读周#【那些年我们背过的经典古文[微风]】“出淤泥而不染，濯清涟而不妖…”、“寄蜉蝣于天地，渺沧海之一粟…”这些耳熟能详的名句，后面是什么内容？《阿房宫赋》、《爱莲说》、《滕王阁序》、《出师表》、《劝学》…那些年烂熟于心的经典，他们的作者是谁？你还能背出几篇？转起重温！
text: #NationalReadingweek# [The classic ancient texts we memorized in those years [Breeze]] "It comes out of the mud but is not stained, and the clear ripples are not demonic...", "A mayfly is sent to the sky and the earth, a drop in the vast sea..." These are familiar words. Famous sentence, what’s behind it? "A Fang Gong Fu", "Ai Lian Shuo", "Tengwang Pavilion Preface", "Teacher's Model", "Encouragement to Learning"...those classics that have been familiar to me for many years, who are their authors? How many more can you recite? Let’s revisit it!

chinese_text: 【南京检方对虐童养母作出不批捕决定】4月5日，因涉嫌殴打养子小虎，其养母李征琴被公安机关依法刑事拘留。4月19日，浦口区检察院对李征琴作出不批准逮捕的决定，检察官综合听证会的各方意见，认为无论是从法律规定还是从有利于孩子身心健康的角度，均不适宜采取逮捕的措施。http://t.cn/RAORwY2
text: [Nanjing prosecutors decide not to arrest child abuse adoptive mother] On April 5, her adoptive mother Li Zhengqin was criminally detained by the public security organs in accordance with the law on suspicion of beating her adopted son Xiaohu. On April 19, the Pukou District Procuratorate made a decision not to approve the arrest of Li Zhengqin. The prosecutor comprehensively reviewed the opinions of all parties at the hearing and believed that arrest measures were not appropriate either from the perspective of legal provisions or from the perspective of benefiting the child's physical and mental health. . http://t.cn/RAORwY2

chinese_text: 【想让男性为你两肋插刀，请穿上高跟鞋】前方一位穿着高跟鞋、摇曳生姿的女性走过，突然，她的包包掉啦！你会怎么办？法国研究人员发现，相比平底鞋和低跟鞋，穿着高跟鞋的女性被试更容易获得男性路人的帮助，但对女性路人则没有影响。http://t.cn/RA0lBOa
text: [If you want a man to stab you, please wear high heels] A swaying woman wearing high heels walked past. Suddenly, her bag fell off! what would you do? French researchers found that compared to flat shoes and low-heeled shoes, female subjects wearing high heels were more likely to receive help from male passers-by, but had no effect on female passers-by. http://t.cn/RA0lBOa

chinese_text: 【结局很温暖：楼管阿姨也懂爱[心]】当天晚上，由于闭楼时间到了，考虑到会影响其他同学休息，宿管阿姨当时并未开门，也不让男生出去。不过当保安劝离了围观人群后，宿管阿姨还是把男孩放了出来，在阿姨祝福的眼神中，俩人最终得以相见，紧紧相拥...[爱你]
text: [The ending is very heart-warming: The dormitory aunt also understands love [heart]] That night, because the building was closed, and considering that it would affect the rest of other students, the dormitory aunt did not open the door at that time and did not let the boys go out. However, after the security guard persuaded the crowd to leave, the dormitory aunt still let the boy out. In the eyes of the aunt's blessing, the two finally met and hugged each other tightly... [Love you]

chinese_text: 【背上的“兄弟”[good]】江苏徐州市大许中学高三学生张弛三年前患上肌肉萎缩，从高一在学校寄宿，同学谢旭就开始志愿照顾他，帮着洗漱穿衣，背着去上课，一天三顿帮打饭，三年就这么慢慢背过来了。两人的成绩一直稳居班级前3名，还有不到两个月就高考了，转发祝福兄弟俩考出好成绩！(央视记者吴睿)
text: ["Brother" [good] on the back] Zhang Chi, a senior student at Daxu Middle School in Xuzhou City, Jiangsu Province, suffered from muscular atrophy three years ago. He has been boarding at the school since his first year of high school. His classmate Xie Xu has volunteered to take care of him, helping him wash and dress. I carried it to class and helped prepare three meals a day. It took me three years to carry it on my back. Their scores have always been among the top three in the class, and they will take the college entrance examination in less than two months. I wish them good luck in the exam! (CCTV reporter Wu Rui)

chinese_text: #下午茶# 高效能人士的七个习惯：主动积极、以终为始、要事第一、双赢思维、知己知彼、统合综效、不断更新。那，还记得低效能人士的7个习惯吗：1、缺席；2、拖拉；3、做无关紧要的事；4、多虑；5、凡事过于消极；6、固执己见，与世隔绝；7、持续信息过剩。
text: #afternoontea# The seven habits of highly effective people: be proactive, start with the end in mind, put first things first, win-win thinking, know yourself and the enemy, integrate synergy, and constantly update. Then, do you still remember the 7 habits of ineffective people: 1. Absence; 2. Procrastination; 3. Doing irrelevant things; 4. Worrying too much; 5. Being too negative in everything; 6. Stubborn and isolated; 7. , persistent information overload.

chinese_text: 【先升后跌！沪市成交额爆表破1万亿】周一早盘，沪指高开低走，盘中一度跌逾1%，随后拉升，再度站上4300点，创出七年年新高；午后沪指一度走高涨近2%；随后大盘跳水。截至收盘，沪指报4217.08点，跌1.64%。成交量方面，沪市成交突破万亿元大关，随后数据不再更新。http://t.cn/RAOnWuk
text: [Rise first and then fall! The Shanghai Stock Exchange’s turnover exceeded 1 trillion] In early trading on Monday, the Shanghai Stock Index opened higher and moved lower. It once fell by more than 1% during the session, and then rose, reaching 4,300 points again, setting a seven-year high; in the afternoon, the Shanghai Stock Index briefly rose. Nearly 2%; then the market dived. As of the close, the Shanghai Composite Index was at 4217.08 points, down 1.64%. In terms of trading volume, the Shanghai Stock Exchange's trading volume exceeded one trillion yuan, and then the data was no longer updated. http://t.cn/RAOnWuk

chinese_text: 【谷雨养生小运动[推荐]】①冷水搓鼻翼 ：谷雨前后飞絮较多，早晚用冷水洗鼻和揉搓鼻翼，有助缓解过敏；②按揉祛湿穴：谷雨时节湿度大，按揉位于小腿内侧、膝下胫骨内侧凹陷中的阴陵泉穴能健脾祛湿；③茶水洗脸：用喝剩下的茶叶水洗脸，能舒缓皮肤，还能让脸部皮肤光泽滑润。
text: [Grain Rain health maintenance exercises [recommended]] ① Rub the nose with cold water: There are more flying catkins before and after Grain Rain. Wash your nose and rub the nose with cold water in the morning and evening to help relieve allergies; ② Massage the dampness dispelling point: The humidity is high during the Grain Rain season, so rub the The Yinlingquan points on the inner side of the calf and in the depression on the inner side of the tibia below the knee can strengthen the spleen and remove dampness; ③ Wash your face with tea: Use the leftover tea water to wash your face, which can soothe the skin and make the facial skin shiny and smooth.

chinese_text: #那年今日#【建筑大师梁思成】1901年的今天，梁思成出生于日本东京。他是我国著名的建筑学家，撰写完成中国人的第一部建筑史，创办了清华大学建筑系；他是梁启超的长子，林徽因的丈夫。一生历经波折的他，始终记得父亲的忠告：“失望沮丧，是我们生命上最可怖之敌，我们须终生不许他侵入。”
text: #that年DAY#[Architectural Master Liang Sicheng] On this day in 1901, Liang Sicheng was born in Tokyo, Japan. He is a famous architect in my country. He wrote the first history of architecture in China and founded the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University. He is the eldest son of Liang Qichao and the husband of Lin Huiyin. Having gone through many twists and turns in his life, he always remembers his father's advice: "Disappointment and frustration are the most terrifying enemies in our lives. We must not allow them to invade for the rest of our lives."

chinese_text: 【[话筒]救救10个月的小叶满[泪]】张叶满，刚刚来到这个世界才10个月，14日妈妈为她洗澡时，她从床上翻落，掉进开水盆，全身多处Ⅱ级烫伤，脱水休克。小叶满的爸妈是90后，无固定工作，未入新农合，无法承受30万治疗费…帮帮孩子！联系人：彝良阳光志愿者协会副会长吴学敏15096575162。（央视）
text: [[Microphone] Save 10-month-old Xiao Yeman [tears]] Zhang Yeman, who was only 10 months old when she came into this world, fell off the bed when her mother was bathing her on the 14th and fell into the basin of boiling water, all over her body. Multiple grade II burns and dehydration shock. Xiao Yeman's parents are born in the 1990s, have no fixed jobs, have not joined the New Rural Cooperative Medical System, and cannot afford the 300,000 yuan treatment fee... Help their children! Contact: Wu Xuemin, Vice President of Yiliang Sunshine Volunteers Association, 15096575162. (CCTV)

chinese_text: 【外媒:中国动物园环境远非人道】系列影像展示动物们身处于囚笼。摄影师曾到过北京、南京、天津、合肥、昆明、重庆、西安、哈尔滨等动物园，很多动物都受困于细小的溷凝土斗室或铁笼之中，环境非常恶劣。居所外观及设备简陋，很容易遭到游人的滋扰，它们身上经常会出现溃烂的伤口。http://t.cn/RAOQM6y
text: [Foreign media: China’s zoo environment is far from humane] A series of images show animals in cages. The photographer has been to zoos in Beijing, Nanjing, Tianjin, Hefei, Kunming, Chongqing, Xi'an, Harbin and other places. Many animals are trapped in small concrete cells or iron cages, and the environment is very harsh. The appearance and equipment of the residence are simple, and they are easily disturbed by tourists. Festering wounds often appear on their bodies. http://t.cn/RAOQM6y

chinese_text: 【他都如此坚强，你还有什么理由不努力？】印度青年阿南德，15岁时因癌症失去双腿，此后只能靠轮椅行动。他会从此意志消沉？你错了！遭遇截肢的他反而用最大的努力投入健身运动事业中…现在，他已三次获封"印度先生"称号，取得的冠军更是不计其数！http://t.cn/RAOB3FU不负青春，不负自己！转！加油！
text: [He is so strong, what reason do you have for not working hard? 】Anand, an Indian young man, lost his legs due to cancer when he was 15 years old. Since then, he can only rely on a wheelchair to move around. Will he become depressed from now on? you are wrong! After suffering an amputation, he devoted his greatest efforts to fitness and sports... Now, he has been awarded the title of "Mr. India" three times and has won countless championships! http://t.cn/RAOB3FU Live up to your youth and yourself! change! come on!

chinese_text: 【昆明原书记被抓细节：仅10多秒钟就被控制住】昆明原书记高劲松被有关部门控制是在4月9日。当天，高劲松接到通知去省委开会，待其赶到后，有关部门当场宣布其因涉嫌严重违纪违法接受组织调查，随即被办案人员控制，全程用时仅十多秒钟。http://t.cn/RAOlieZ
text: [Details of the arrest of the former secretary of Kunming: He was controlled in just over 10 seconds] Gao Jinsong, the former secretary of Kunming, was detained by relevant departments on April 9. On the same day, Gao Jinsong was notified to go to the Provincial Party Committee for a meeting. When he arrived, the relevant departments announced on the spot that he was under organizational investigation for suspected serious violations of disciplines and laws. He was immediately controlled by the investigators. The whole process took only more than ten seconds. http://t.cn/RAOlieZ

chinese_text: 【世界那么大 “低头族”要看看！】2014年中央美术学院年度一等奖视频《低头人生》是大三学生谢承霖的作品，创意源自地铁、街道、学校里常见的手机“低头族”，短片用黑色幽默叙述了“低头族"一步步毁灭世界……世界这么大，该多看看，别做“低头族”，你同意吗？http://t.cn/RAKJVun（央视记者马力）

The idea is derived from the "head-down people" with mobile phones who are common in subways, streets, and schools. The short film uses black humor to narrate the "head-down people" Destroying the world step by step... The world is so big, you should see more and stop being a "bow-head", do you agree? http://t.cn/RAKJVun (CCTV reporter Ma Li)

chinese_text: 【她曾得意“卖给那些傻子”】22岁的周梦晗，卖面膜，发展下线，她深谙营销之道，懂得如何利用资源，抓住买家心理，来寻找获利空间。对周梦晗的关注与信任，无一例外来自于她对外公布的人生经历：“白富美”、独立、自强。受害者程芯记得，周梦晗的美拍粉丝一度达10万人。
text: [She once proudly "sold to those fools"] 22-year-old Zhou Menghan sells facial masks and has developed offline. She is well versed in marketing and knows how to use resources and grasp the psychology of buyers to find profit opportunities. The attention and trust in Zhou Menghan, without exception, comes from her life experience announced to the public: "white, rich and beautiful", independent and self-reliant. The victim Cheng Xin remembered that Zhou Menghan’s Meipai fans once reached 100,000.

chinese_text: 【法院门口 律师被打】今天上午8时许，为一起刑事案件出庭辩护的律师王甫、刘金滨、张磊，在衡阳中院大门口遭到多名身份不明人员袭击。现场图片显示，有律师被撕破衣服以致上身裸露。衡阳中院随后证实，法院门口确实发生了“拉扯行为”。详见：http://t.cn/RAWEHUo
text: [Lawyers were beaten at the gate of the court] At about 8 o'clock this morning, lawyers Wang Fu, Liu Jinbin, and Zhang Lei, who were defending a criminal case in court, were attacked by multiple unidentified persons at the gate of Hengyang Intermediate People's Court. Pictures from the scene showed that a lawyer's clothes were torn so that his upper body was exposed. The Hengyang Intermediate People's Court later confirmed that "pull-and-pull behavior" did indeed occur at the entrance of the court. For details, see: http://t.cn/RAWEHUo

chinese_text: 【80岁老兵：我亲眼目睹了黄继光堵枪眼】面对否定“黄继光堵枪眼”的网络谣言，高青县志愿军老战士李继德说：“我们的人上去一拨牺牲一拨”“我看见黄继光向首长请战‘我去!'”“我看见已经爬到地堡下的黄继光,猛地弓着腰起了一下子,堵上了枪眼子。”说到这里，老人用痛苦的表情连说了七八个“哎呀”。
text: [80-year-old veteran: I witnessed Huang Jiguang plugging the bullet hole] Faced with the Internet rumors denying that "Huang Jiguang blocked the bullet hole", Li Jide, a veteran of the Gaoqing County Volunteer Army, said: "Our people went up and sacrificed one after another." "I saw Huang Jiguang trying to The chief said, 'I'll go!'" "I saw Huang Jiguang, who had crawled under the bunker, suddenly arched his waist and blocked the hole of the gun." At this point, the old man said seven or eight words with a painful expression. An "oops".

chinese_text: #那年今日#【你以为我贫穷，就没有灵魂吗？】1816年今天，《简爱》的作者夏洛蒂·勃朗特在英国出生。5岁时母亲去世，父亲收入微薄，全家生活艰苦又悲凉。她热爱文学，在写作中寻找希望：“你以为我贫穷、低微、不美、渺小，就没有灵魂，没有心吗？你想错了，我和你有一样多的灵魂，一样充实的心。”
text: #that年DAY# [Do you think I have no soul because I am poor? 】On this day in 1816, Charlotte Bronte, the author of "Jane Eyre", was born in England. His mother died when he was 5 years old, and his father's income was meager. The family's life was difficult and miserable. She loves literature and looks for hope in writing: "Do you think that because I am poor, humble, unattractive, and small, I have no soul or heart? You are wrong. I have as much soul and as full heart as you." "

text: [2015 Pulitzer Prize] About 1,200 news works participated in this year’s 99th Pulitzer Prize competition. The Post and Courier in South Carolina, USA, has a daily circulation of 85,000 copies. Won a gold medal in the Public Service Award for a series of reports on the high number of domestic violence deaths in the state. This is the first time in five years that the award has been won by such a small newspaper. Please see the picture below for the complete list of winners↓↓

chinese_text: 【山西同煤姜家湾煤矿透水事故：最新发现4人生还】4月19日，同煤集团地煤公司姜家湾煤矿综采一队8446工作面发生透水，24人被困。20日晚，在井下发现7名遇难者遗体，仍有17人被困。今天，井下发现4人生还，刚刚升井送入医院！目前，救援仍在进行。（央视记者韩逾昊）
text: [Water leakage accident in Jiangjiawan Coal Mine, Tongmei, Shanxi: Latest discovery of 4 survivors] On April 19, water leakage occurred in the 8446 working face of the fully mechanized mining team of Jiangjiawan Coal Mine of Tongmei Group Coal Company, and 24 people were trapped. On the evening of the 20th, the bodies of seven victims were found underground, and 17 people were still trapped. Today, four people were found alive underground, and they were just taken to the hospital! Currently, rescue operations are still ongoing. (CCTV reporter Han Yuhao)

chinese_text: 【鲁冰花原来长这样[挤眼]】“夜夜想起妈妈的话，闪闪的泪光鲁冰花”，很多人会唱这首歌，可你见过鲁冰花吗？这种原产北美的植物首次在江苏鼋头渚景区引种成功，5000多株鲁冰花像一座座彩色小宝塔。鲁冰花学名羽扇豆，它春天开花，花期过后花跟叶全部回归泥土，所以又叫“母亲花”。（央视记者吴睿）
text: [Lu Binghua turned out to look like this [wink]] "Every night I think of my mother's words, and the tears shine like Lu Binghua." Many people will sing this song, but have you seen Lu Binghua? This plant, native to North America, was successfully introduced for the first time in Yuantouzhu Scenic Area, Jiangsu Province. More than 5,000 Lupine flowers resemble small colorful pagodas. The scientific name of lupine flower is lupine. It blooms in spring. After the flowering period, the flowers and leaves all return to the soil, so it is also called the "mother flower". (CCTV reporter Wu Rui)

chinese_text: 【痴情男子车站苦等女友20年 从小伙变流浪汉[伤心]】20年前，台湾一小伙子认识并喜欢上了一个云南女孩，他想当面表白，就跟她约好去台南火车站见面。当天女孩没有来，小伙子就一直在火车站等，一等就是20年。家人来接他回家，他说已习惯火车站的生活，不愿回去，想一直等下去…http://t.cn/RAWjy6C
text: [An infatuated man waited for his girlfriend at the station for 20 years and turned from a young man into a homeless man [sad]] Twenty years ago, a young man in Taiwan met and fell in love with a girl from Yunnan. He wanted to confess his love in person, so he made an appointment to meet her at Tainan Railway Station. The girl didn't come that day, so the young man kept waiting at the train station for 20 years. His family came to take him home. He said he was used to life at the train station and did not want to go back. He wanted to wait forever... http://t.cn/RAWjy6C

chinese_text: 【民政局打争议广告:女人为何非跟男人抢地盘】北京西城区民政局婚姻登记处的一则广告牌引热议。牌上写着：“做一个好主妇、好母亲是女人最大的本事”，“为何非要跟男人争资源抢地盘”。对此，西城区民政局回应，这是电视剧台词，非该局自编，原本想拿来挽救破碎家庭，目前已撤下。http://t.cn/RAW1UUg
text: [Controversial Advertisement from the Civil Affairs Bureau: Why Women Don’t Compete with Men for Territory] A billboard at the Marriage Registration Office of the Xicheng District Civil Affairs Bureau in Beijing has sparked heated debate. The sign reads: "Being a good housewife and mother is a woman's greatest ability" and "Why do we have to compete with men for resources and territory?" In response to this, the Xicheng District Civil Affairs Bureau responded that this was a line from a TV series and was not written by the bureau. It was originally intended to save broken families and has been removed. http://t.cn/RAW1UUg

chinese_text: #商业观察∙工业4.0# 【互联网时代创业者的“三力”】张瑞敏：在互联网时代，过去大企业的结构、模式一定会崩塌，与其被动推倒，不如自己进行自我颠覆，改变自己。结合海尔自身的探索和实践谈三点，我把创业者所需要具备的东西归结为“三个力”：心理承受能力、自驱力和定力。http://t.cn/RAJxV7A
text: #BusinessObservation∙Industry 4.0# [The "Three Forces" of Entrepreneurs in the Internet Era] Zhang Ruimin: In the Internet era, the structures and models of large enterprises in the past will definitely collapse. Instead of passively overthrowing them, it is better to self-subvert and change themselves. Combining Haier's own exploration and practice with three points, I summarize what entrepreneurs need to possess into "three forces": psychological endurance, self-motivation and determination. http://t.cn/RAJxV7A

chinese_text: #微镜头#【巨蟒生吞鳄鱼后 对镜头“顽皮一笑”[生病]】20日，澳大利亚一名女子在昆士兰遇到一条巨大的橄榄蟒，吞噬一只淡水鳄鱼。她冒险用镜头记录下了这一幕，最后蟒蛇对着镜头顽皮一笑，好像什么也没发生……http://t.cn/RAWH43a
text: #microlens# [The giant python gave the camera a "naughty smile" after swallowing a crocodile [sick]] On the 20th, an Australian woman encountered a huge olive python in Queensland and swallowed a freshwater crocodile. She took the risk to record the scene with her camera. In the end, the python smiled mischievously at the camera, as if nothing happened... http://t.cn/RAWH43a

chinese_text: 关于速度与激情7，一些话无端戳中泪点。最感动的一句话是：谨以此片献给保罗。怀念的不是速度与激情，怀念的是出生入死的感情。[心] （转）
text: Regarding Fast and Furious 7, some words made me cry for no reason. The most touching sentence is: I dedicate this film to Paul. What I miss is not the speed and passion, but the emotion of life and death. [Heart] (turn)

chinese_text: #来论#【救的不只是一个日本人】中国海军在也门撤侨行动中帮助一名日本游客乘中国军舰脱离险地。中国军人该不该救那个日本国民？当然应该。漠视一个无辜的、面临死亡威胁的生命，会让我们堕落到幽暗人性的深渊。我们需要告别被害者心态，而应慢慢具备正常大国国民的平和心态。http://t.cn/RAidbJu
text: #来伦# [It saved more than just a Japanese] The Chinese navy helped a Japanese tourist escape from danger on a Chinese warship during the evacuation operation in Yemen. Should the Chinese soldiers save the Japanese citizen? Of course it should. Indifference to an innocent life facing the threat of death will make us fall into the abyss of dark humanity. We need to bid farewell to the victim mentality and gradually adopt the peaceful mentality of normal citizens of a major country. http://t.cn/RAidbJu

chinese_text: 【过去30天 35万中国人赴日赏花】日本樱花开放的3月15日到4月15日之间，赴日旅游的中国人约35万人，比去年翻一番，这些游客在日消费达70亿元人民币。不仅限于春节和赏花季，国人赴日游出现了持续高峰无淡季的全年化趋势。五一小长假，一些人气日本游线路已基本报满。详见：http://t.cn/RAWHxHk
text: [350,000 Chinese people went to Japan to enjoy the cherry blossoms in the past 30 days] Between March 15 and April 15, when Japan’s cherry blossoms were in bloom, about 350,000 Chinese people visited Japan, double the number last year. These tourists were in Japan Consumption reached 7 billion yuan. Not only during the Spring Festival and flower-viewing season, there is a year-round trend of Chinese people traveling to Japan with continuous peaks and no off-seasons. During the May Day holiday, some popular Japan tour routes are almost fully booked. For details, see: http://t.cn/RAWHxHk

chinese_text: 【女子苹果6被摔坏 逼老人下跪】据网友称在厦门镇邦路，下雨天时一老人家不小心摩托车撞倒一女子，女子的iPhone 6 plus掉到地上屏幕碎了，女子让老人家赔，老人家说我知道撞到人赔钱是应该的，但真的没钱。女子扇了几巴掌，还让老人家跪在雨水里…http://t.cn/RAW34wb
text: [Woman’s iPhone 6 was smashed and forced the old man to kneel down] According to netizens, on Zhenbang Road in Xiamen, an old man accidentally hit a woman with a motorcycle on a rainy day. The woman’s iPhone 6 plus fell to the ground and the screen shattered. The woman asked the old man to Compensation, the old man said, I know I should pay if I bump into someone, but I really don’t have the money. The woman slapped her several times and made the old man kneel in the rain... http://t.cn/RAW34wb

chinese_text: 【老人撞坏女子苹果手机 雨天下跪被扇耳光[衰]】据@厦门身边事 ：在厦门一老人不小心撞倒一女子，女子的手机掉到地上屏幕碎了，女子让老人家赔，老人家说我知道赔钱是应该的，但真的没钱。女子扇了几巴掌，还让老人家跪在雨水里…该女子还说，我Plus都买得起，打人放火还怕什么？http://t.cn/RAW2wxx
text: [An old man broke a woman’s iPhone and was slapped while kneeling in the rain [bad]] According to @新浦新京: An old man accidentally knocked down a woman in Xiamen. The woman’s cell phone fell to the ground and the screen broke. The woman asked the old man to pay for it. Said that I know I should lose money, but I really don’t have any money. The woman slapped her several times and made the old man kneel in the rain... The woman also said, I can afford a Plus, so why should I be afraid of beating people and setting them on fire? http://t.cn/RAW2wxx

chinese_text: 【北京：给十万株杨柳“打针” 控制明年飞絮】每年春天，杨柳树雌株产生的飞絮都会给敏感体制人群造成极大困扰。日前，11家北京市属公园联合给杨柳“打针”，以期控制明年飞絮。专家介绍，注射施药对环境无负面影响，成本也比喷雾低。备受“白毛球”困扰的你，想说____？http://t.cn/RAWeJum
text: [Beijing: "Inject" 100,000 willow trees to control next year's catkins] Every spring, the catkins produced by female willow trees cause great trouble to people with sensitive systems. A few days ago, 11 Beijing municipal parks jointly "injected" willow trees in order to control flying catkins next year. According to experts, injection application has no negative impact on the environment and is cheaper than spraying. Are you troubled by "white hair balls"? Do you want to say ____? http://t.cn/RAWeJum

chinese_text: 【女教师讲述最火辞职信始末：早知道把字写得好看点】“世界那么大，我想去看看。”一封只有10个字的辞职信火了。当事人河南省实验中学女教师顾少强称，辞职是经过理性考虑，不希望引起盲目辞职风潮。“我会对未来的人生负责。首先不能饿死，肯定会想办法谋生。”http://t.cn/RAWoVnS
text: [Female teacher tells the story of the most popular resignation letter: I would have known better to write more beautiful words] "The world is so big, I want to see it." A resignation letter with only 10 words went viral. Gu Shaoqiang, a female teacher at Henan Experimental Middle School, said her resignation was based on rational considerations and she did not want to cause a trend of blind resignations. "I will be responsible for my future life. First of all, I will not starve to death, and I will definitely find a way to make a living." http://t.cn/RAWoVnS

chinese_text: 【宅男拯救世界：一份浪漫结婚礼物】还记得4月1日那天，果壳员工全体搬进Minecraft办公的事儿吗？我们生活得很好。上周日恰逢一员工结婚，几位单身宅男花了三天时间，盖起一座极尽浪漫的城堡——少女系彩色玻璃，心形观景台，飘着爱情标语的海洋……http://t.cn/RAWOEjK （PS：内有Minecraft洞房直播
text: [Otaku Saves the World: A Romantic Wedding Gift] Do you still remember that on April 1st, all Guoke employees moved into the Minecraft office? We live well. Last Sunday coincided with the wedding of an employee, and a few single homeboys spent three days building an extremely romantic castle - girly stained glass, a heart-shaped observation deck, and a sea of love slogans... http: //t.cn/RAWOEjK (PS: There is a live broadcast of the Minecraft bridal chamber

chinese_text: #鲁冰花长这样#《鲁冰花》是台湾同名电影的主题曲。台湾山地的茶农在种植茶叶，特别是台湾特有的高山云雾茶时，会在茶山周边、甚至是茶叶植株的附近辅助地种上鲁冰花。据说鲁冰花凋谢后肥沃了土地，可以让茶树开得更加茂盛，并且可以让茶叶芳香甜美。
text: #鲁冰花长such# "Lu Binghua" is the theme song of the Taiwanese movie of the same name. When tea farmers in Taiwan's mountainous areas grow tea, especially Taiwan's unique high-mountain Yunwu tea, they will plant lupine flowers in auxiliary fields around the tea mountains or even near tea plants. It is said that after the lupine withers, it fertilizes the land, allowing the tea trees to bloom more luxuriantly, and making the tea leaves fragrant and sweet.

chinese_text: 【广东自贸区今日挂牌】4月21日，广东自贸区正式挂牌了。自贸区将对海淘、出境游、看病、买车、就业等产生影响，如进口商品能轻易“白菜价”买到；在创业方面，可享受出口税收等优惠政策，在就业方面，有望拿到“国际工资”。http://t.cn/RAWg5nx
text: [Guangdong Free Trade Zone Launched Today] On April 21, the Guangdong Free Trade Zone was officially launched. The free trade zone will have an impact on overseas shopping, outbound travel, medical treatment, car buying, employment, etc. For example, imported goods can be easily purchased at "cabbage prices"; in terms of starting a business, you can enjoy preferential policies such as export taxation. In terms of employment, it is expected that Get an "international salary." http://t.cn/RAWg5nx

chinese_text: 【又有乘客开安全门！】据央视报道，昨天下午从郑州新郑国际机场准备飞往韩国首尔的CZ6009客机上，一名乘客从内部打开了安全门，导致飞机延误2小时。据了解，肇事者为一名20岁男子，只因第一次乘坐飞机比较好奇就拉开了安全门。[衰]该男子被处以15日治安拘留，由于未造成直接经济损失被免于经济处罚。
text: [Another passenger opens the safety door! 】According to CCTV reports, yesterday afternoon on the CZ6009 passenger plane flying from Zhengzhou Xinzheng International Airport to Seoul, South Korea, a passenger opened the safety door from the inside, causing the flight to be delayed for 2 hours. It is understood that the perpetrator was a 20-year-old man who opened the security door just because he was curious about flying for the first time. [Bad] The man was sentenced to 15 days of public security detention and was exempted from financial punishment because he did not cause direct economic losses.

chinese_text: 【明晚，陪你去看流星雨】在美丽的银河西岸，明亮的织女星和周围一些小星星组成了天琴座。每年的4月16日至25日，天琴座的流星雨都将划破天际，闪亮在苍穹间。明天夜间到后天凌晨，天琴座流星雨又将浪漫而至，在4月23日早上8时左右，流星雨有望达到极大，带上TA一起去看流星雨吧！
text: [Tomorrow night, I will accompany you to watch the meteor shower] On the beautiful west bank of the Milky Way, the bright Vega and some surrounding small stars form the constellation Lyra. Every year from April 16th to 25th, the Lyrid meteor shower will pierce the sky and shine in the sky. From tomorrow night to the early morning of the day after tomorrow, the Lyrid meteor shower will arrive romantically again. At around 8 a.m. on April 23, the meteor shower is expected to reach its peak. Take your partner to watch the meteor shower together!

chinese_text: 【深圳警车撞宾利 副局长逃逸后自首】昨晚8时，深圳一警车撞上宾利后，警车司机、深圳公安森林分局副局长钟某马上逃逸。记者致电追问，钟某否认自己开的车。官方今早通报称已确认，交警要求司机自首。上午钟某自首，回应称未逃逸、是去就医疗伤。有围观者说当时钟一身酒味。详见：http://t.cn/RAW3IDJ
text: [The deputy director of Shenzhen police car hit a Bentley and surrendered after escaping] At 8 o'clock last night, after a Shenzhen police car hit a Bentley, the driver of the police car, Zhong Mou, the deputy director of the Shenzhen Public Security Forestry Branch, immediately ran away. The reporter called and asked, and Zhong denied driving the car. Officials reported this morning that it had been confirmed that the traffic police asked the driver to surrender. Zhong surrendered in the morning and responded that he did not escape but went to seek medical treatment for his injuries. Some onlookers said that Zhong smelled of alcohol at the time. For details, see: http://t.cn/RAW3IDJ

chinese_text: 【江苏老汉捐新石器时代文物 父辈耕田捡来的！】江苏宿迁62岁的林兰松老人，家里有块石头，是上一辈耕田时偶尔捡到的。最近，林老汉把石头拿给考古工地的专家瞧，没想到小小顽石竟是距今至少4000年的石锛，属新石器时期文物。林老汉决定将它无偿送给宿迁市博物馆收藏。为林老汉点赞！ （央视记者吴睿）
text: [An old man from Jiangsu donated Neolithic cultural relics that his father’s generation picked up from plowing the fields! ] Lin Lansong, a 62-year-old man from Suqian, Jiangsu Province, has a stone at home that his previous generation accidentally picked up while plowing the fields. Recently, Mr. Lin showed the stone to the experts at the archaeological site. Unexpectedly, the small stubborn stone turned out to be a stone adze that was at least 4,000 years old and was a Neolithic cultural relic. Old man Lin decided to give it to Suqian Museum for collection free of charge. Thumbs up for Mr. Lin! (CCTV reporter Wu Rui)

chinese_text: #爱读书，读好书#【戳↓感受一下 中国人阅读现状[围观]】据第12次全国国民阅读调查：①2014年我国国民人均纸质图书阅读量4.56本，比去年少0.21本 ②人均每天读书时长18.76分钟 ③人均每天互联网接触时长54.87分钟 ③仅2%国民认为自己阅读数量多。你，有多久没看书了？
text: #爱书，Read好书# [Poke ↓ to feel the current situation of Chinese people’s reading [watch]] According to the 12th National Reading Survey: ① In 2014, the per capita reading volume of paper books in my country was 4.56, 0.21 less than last year ② Per capita Reading time per day is 18.76 minutes ③ Average daily Internet contact time per capita is 54.87 minutes ③ Only 2% of citizens believe that they read a lot. How long has it been since you read a book?

chinese_text: 【直击“阳光动力2号”起飞时刻】由于下雨天不能飞行，等待了21天后，今天早上6点5分，“阳光动力2号”终于从重庆江北国际机场飞往南京。借助了两名骑电动助力车的地勤人员，飞机成功起飞继续它的环球之行。戳视频看电动车是怎么推动大飞机的[太开心]http://t.cn/RAWsyLr（央视记者李洪淼 王宏超）
text: [See the takeoff time of "Solar Impulse 2"] After waiting for 21 days because it was unable to fly on rainy days, at 6:05 this morning, "Solar Impulse 2" finally flew from Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport to Nanjing. With the help of two ground crew members on electric mopeds, the plane successfully took off and continued its journey around the world. Click on the video to see how an electric car propels a large plane [so happy] http://t.cn/RAWsyLr (CCTV reporter Li Hongmiao and Wang Hongchao)

chinese_text: #下午茶# 做人最好状态是懂得尊重，不管他人闲事，也不晒自己优越，越成长越懂得内敛自持。活着不是只为讨他人喜欢，没人在乎，更多人只是在看热闹。你变得优秀,你身边的环境自然会发生变化。
text: #afternoontea# The best way to be a human being is to know how to respect others, not to care about other people's business, and not to show off your own superiority. The more you grow up, the more you know how to be restrained and self-sufficient. Living is not just to please others, no one cares, more people are just watching the fun. As you become better, the environment around you will naturally change.

chinese_text: 【马克·吐温说】①别到处说世界亏欠了你，世界什么都不欠你的，你还没出生它就在这儿了；②每个人都像月亮，有着从来不让任何人看见的黑暗面；③皱纹应该只是微笑留下的印记；④让自己高兴起来的最好办法就是设法让别人高兴起来。
text: [Mark Twain said] ① Don’t go around saying that the world owes you, the world owes you nothing, it was here before you were born; ② Everyone is like the moon, with a darkness that is never allowed to be seen by anyone. face; ③ Wrinkles should be just the marks left by a smile; ④ The best way to make yourself happy is to try to make others happy.

chinese_text: #全民阅读周#【记下这些，让你更会读书】2014年我国人均纸质图书阅读量仅4.56本，低于调查显示的韩国11本，法国20本，日本40本。如何读书？①利用零碎时间 ②需兼顾深度和广度 ③不宜拖沓 ④做读书笔记 ⑤读后别忘与人分享和交流，能对书的内容有更深理解。转给爱书的TA！
text: #NationalReadingweek# [Write these down to make you better at reading] In 2014, the per capita reading of paper books in my country was only 4.56, which is lower than the 11 books in South Korea, 20 books in France, and 40 books in Japan according to the survey. How to read? ① Use fragmented time ② Consider both depth and breadth ③ Don’t procrastinate ④ Take reading notes ⑤ Don’t forget to share and communicate with others after reading, so as to have a deeper understanding of the content of the book. Forward to the book lover!

chinese_text: 【[话筒]紧急寻人！13岁智障男孩与家人失联】 刘新玉，13岁，安徽临泉县瓦店镇人，身高约1.4米，于4月13日上午离家出走。走时骑蓝色自行车，穿白领子黄球衣，运动裤。家人四处寻找，只愿他早日回家！如有线索，请拨打0558-110与临泉县警方联系，转发扩散，帮男孩早日平安回家！
text: [[Microphone] Urgent search! 13-year-old mentally retarded boy lost contact with his family] Liu Xinyu, 13 years old, from Wadian Town, Linquan County, Anhui Province, about 1.4 meters tall, ran away from home on the morning of April 13. When walking, he rides a blue bicycle, wears a yellow jersey with a white collar and sports pants. The family is looking everywhere, hoping he will come home soon! If you have any clues, please call the Linquan County Police at 0558-110 and forward it to help the boy return home safely as soon as possible!
