chinese_text: #微镜头#【见过三千多斤五色糯米饭吗[馋嘴]】植物汁液染的黑、红、紫、黄、白色糯米饭组成大圆，色彩鲜艳清香爽口…今天是广西“壮族三月三”，当地有做五色糯米饭招待亲友的习俗，武鸣县蒸了一笼3378斤的五色糯米饭，近万人分享！该笼糯米饭将申请吉尼斯世界纪录。点图，想尝的转！（央视记者李明泽）
text: #Microlens# [Have you ever seen more than 3,000 kilograms of five-color glutinous rice? [Glutton]] The black, red, purple, yellow and white glutinous rice dyed with plant juice forms a large circle. It is brightly colored, fragrant and refreshing... Today is the "March 3rd of the Zhuang Ethnic Group" in Guangxi "There is a local custom of making five-color glutinous rice to entertain relatives and friends. Wuming County steamed a basket of 3,378 kilograms of five-color glutinous rice, which was shared by nearly ten thousand people! The caged sticky rice will apply for Guinness World Records. Click on the picture to share if you want to try it! (CCTV reporter Li Mingze)

chinese_text: 【你以为你消费的只是红木？】中国人对红木家具的痴迷，直接导致了紫檀、黄檀、黑黄檀数量的大幅下降。为了遏制这一现象，华盛顿公约在2013年将五种红木提升到了附录二，意味着国际贸易已严重威胁到这五种植物。但这一条款的公布，可能会间接引发中国红木贸易最后的疯狂：http://t.cn/RvoHC74
text: [Do you think you only consume mahogany? ] The Chinese people's obsession with mahogany furniture has directly led to a significant decline in the number of rosewood, rosewood, and black rosewood. In order to curb this phenomenon, the Washington Convention upgraded five species of rosewood to Appendix II in 2013, which means that international trade has seriously threatened these five plants. However, the announcement of this clause may indirectly trigger the final madness of China’s rosewood trade: http://t.cn/RvoHC74

chinese_text: 【民政局张贴直男癌海报[吃惊]】“女人做一个好主妇，好母亲，不要跟男人抢地盘”一幅张贴在北京西城区民政局婚姻登记处的海报，这两天把中国女人们惹毛了。网友称“无法相信一个官方机构会宣扬这样一种思想”。民政局对此争议回应称，海报文案摘自电视剧台词，目前已将其撤下。http://t.cn/RAWFRrb

The Civil Affairs Bureau responded to the controversy by stating that the copy of the poster was taken from lines in a TV series and has now been removed. http://t.cn/RAWFRrb

Among the mountains and hills of Huangtan Town, Ninghai County, Zhejiang Province, an old man wearing a raincoat walked slowly walking with his cattle. The layers of terraced fields glowed with silver under the light and shadow, like a poetic and dreamy landscape. Pastoral style painting. [Like] Click ↓ to enjoy together!

chinese_text: 【春天，何以满城尽带白毛絮？】春天到，飞絮飘，这其实是一场交媾盛会的结果。飘絮之前，杨柳树长条状外面还有毛的雄性生殖器官迎风飞舞，向未知送出了精子……而那雌花接受了不知源头的爱的礼物，结出了长着棉絮般的绒毛的种子：http://t.cn/zOWL2z2 好像……前两天是419来的？
text: [In spring, why is the city full of white wool? 】Spring has arrived, and the catkins are flying. This is actually the result of a mating party. Before the catkins fluttered, the long strips of the willow tree's male reproductive organs with hair on the outside were flying in the wind, sending sperm to the unknown...and the female flowers accepted the gift of love from an unknown source and produced seeds with cotton-like down. : http://t.cn/zOWL2z2 It seems...it was 419 that came two days ago?

chinese_text: 【个子矮易得心脏病？！】英国莱斯特大学的专家观察6.5万余名心脏病患者的基因数据，发现身高较矮的人存在高胆固醇和高脂肪的基因潜质，且身高每低6.4厘米，患冠心病的风险就会相应增加13%。这意味着，身高152厘米的人比身高168厘米的人患冠心病的平均风险高32%。（生命时报）让我静静…[伤心]
text: [Is short stature prone to heart disease? ! 】Experts from the University of Leicester in the UK observed the genetic data of more than 65,000 heart disease patients and found that shorter people have the genetic potential for high cholesterol and high fat, and for every 6.4 centimeters lower in height, the risk of coronary heart disease increases. A corresponding increase of 13%. This means that a person who is 152cm tall has an average risk of coronary heart disease that is 32% higher than a person who is 168cm tall. (Life Times) Let me be quiet...[Sad]

text: [Details of the implementation of the political reform plan for universal suffrage for Hong Kong’s chief executive announced] Hong Kong today announced a plan for universal suffrage for the chief executive. It is recommended that voters select from the 2 to 3 candidates nominated by the nomination committee in a “first-past-the-post” method, that is, only hold After a round of voting, it was recommended that the size of the Nomination Committee be maintained at 1,200 people. Those who are interested in running for the election must obtain at least 120 people’s personal names and joint recommendations from the nomination committee. http://t.cn/RAlerSC

chinese_text: 【男子向天安门毛泽东像泼墨被判刑】为引人关注，去年3月6日中午12点，42岁的男子孙兵向天安门城楼毛主席像投掷墨水瓶，造成画像污损。该案今天上午一审宣判，孙兵以犯寻衅滋事罪，被判刑一年二个月。法院称，孙兵曾因故意犯罪获刑，系累犯，依法应从重处罚。详见：http://t.cn/RAlF8zo 资料图
text: [Man sentenced for throwing ink at Mao Zedong's portrait in Tiananmen Square] In order to attract attention, at 12 noon on March 6 last year, a 42-year-old man, Sun Bing, threw an ink bottle at the portrait of Chairman Mao on the Tiananmen Gate Tower, causing defacement of the portrait. The first instance of the case was pronounced this morning. Sun Bing was found guilty of picking quarrels and provoking trouble and was sentenced to one year and two months in prison. The court stated that Sun Bing had been sentenced for intentional crimes and was a repeat offender and should be severely punished in accordance with the law. For details, see: http://t.cn/RAlF8zo data map

Refueling normally will cause great losses to the company... http://t.cn/RAlEvIO

chinese_text: 【河北一访民县政府楼前上吊死亡】21日，河北省青龙县一上访村民在县政府门前上吊死亡。其家属称，死者2010年起，因林地权属等问题开始上访，听说，死者这回在和官方接触后上吊身亡。家属要求查看监控录像被拒绝。家属做笔录期间，手机被搜走，拍摄的照片被删除，数小时后才被允许回家。警方称正调查。
text: [A petitioner hanged himself in front of the county government building in Hebei Province] On the 21st, a petitioner from Qinglong County, Hebei Province hanged himself in front of the county government building and died. His family members said that the deceased started petitioning in 2010 due to issues such as forest land ownership. It is said that the deceased hanged himself after contacting the authorities this time. The family's request to see the surveillance video was denied. While the family was taking notes, their mobile phones were confiscated and the photos they took were deleted. They were allowed to go home hours later. Police said they were investigating.

chinese_text: 【医疗肯定会让人痛恨美国】中国夫妇在美遭遇小型交通事故，肇事者却因百万账单无力赔偿。在美国，挂个号要上百美元，阑尾手术要两万多美元，美国医疗价格为何这么贵？一种常见的意见认为：这是美国的医疗服务过于市场化导致的。这并非全部事实。点击链接了解美国医疗制度。http://t.cn/RAlzlON
text: [Medical care will definitely make people hate the United States] A Chinese couple suffered a minor traffic accident in the United States, but the perpetrator was unable to compensate for the multi-million dollar bill. In the United States, a registration costs hundreds of dollars, and an appendix surgery costs more than 20,000 dollars. Why are medical prices so expensive in the United States? A common opinion is that this is caused by the over-marketization of medical services in the United States. This is not the whole truth. Click on the link to learn about the US healthcare system. http://t.cn/RAlzlON

chinese_text: 【它，地球上最后一只雄性北非白犀牛...】42岁的肯尼亚白犀牛苏丹，是世界最后一只雄性北非白犀牛。为了防止偷猎者猎杀，警卫拿着真枪实弹24小时守护它。对于平均寿命在50岁左右的北非白犀牛来说，苏丹已到暮年，繁衍后代迫在眉睫，自然保护区工作人员正在研究人工受孕等方法。http://t.cn/RAjvrfJ
text: [It is the last male North African white rhino on earth...] The 42-year-old Kenyan white rhino Sudan is the last male North African white rhino in the world. In order to prevent poachers from killing it, guards guard it 24 hours a day with live ammunition. For the North African white rhino, which has an average lifespan of about 50 years, Sudan has reached its twilight years and reproduction is imminent. Nature reserve staff are studying artificial insemination and other methods. http://t.cn/RAjvrfJ

chinese_text: 厄尔尼诺是指赤道中东太平洋海温异常增温现象。跟人体感冒发烧一样，大海“发烧”也会造成各种不适，因此需要通过海洋与大气之间的能量交换来改变大气环流和温度分布，“治疗”的过程必然造成气候出现一定的异常。
text: El Niño refers to the abnormal warming of sea temperatures in the equatorial central-eastern Pacific Ocean. Just like colds and fevers in the human body, "fever" in the sea can also cause various discomforts. Therefore, it is necessary to change the atmospheric circulation and temperature distribution through energy exchange between the ocean and the atmosphere. The "treatment" process will inevitably cause certain abnormalities in the climate.

chinese_text: #人生微语# 你改变不了环境，但你可以改变自己；你改变不了事实，但你可以改变态度；你改变不了过去，但你可以改变现在；你不能控制他人，但你可以掌握自己；你不能预知明天，但你可以把握今天；你不可能样样顺利，但你可以事事尽心；你不能延伸生命的长度，但你可以拓展生命的宽度。早安！
text: #生微语# You can’t change the environment, but you can change yourself; you can’t change the facts, but you can change your attitude; you can’t change the past, but you can change the present; you can’t control others, but you can master yourself; you can’t change the past, but you can change the present; you can’t control others, but you can master yourself; you You can't predict tomorrow, but you can grasp today; you can't have everything go well, but you can do your best; you can't extend the length of life, but you can expand the width of life. Good morning!

chinese_text: 我想 其实我没有那么爱你吧 只是习惯起床后第一个翻看手机有没有你发来的简讯 只是想和你有很长很大的未来 只是很想跟你每天腻在一起 只是想你在我不开心的时候可以哄我 只是我想要你给我无数个可以兑现的承诺 我只是习惯依赖你 只是这样而已
text: I think I don’t actually love you that much. I’m just used to checking my phone first after waking up to see if there are any text messages from you. I just want to have a long and big future with you. I just want to be with you every day. I just want you to be here. You can coax me when I'm unhappy. It's just that I want you to give me countless promises that can be fulfilled. I'm just used to relying on you. That's all.

chinese_text: “你拥有青春的时候，就要感受它。不要虚掷你的黄金时代，不要去倾听枯燥乏味的东西，不要设法挽留无望的失败，不要把你的生命献给无知、平庸和低俗。这些都是我们时代病态的目标，虚假的理想。活着！把你宝贵的内在生命活出来。什么都别错过。”（by王尔德）早安，各位。
text: "While you have youth, feel it. Don't waste your golden years, don't listen to boring things, don't try to save hopeless failure, don't devote your life to ignorance, mediocrity and vulgarity. These are all It is the sick goal of our time, the false ideal. Live! Live your precious inner life. Don’t miss anything.” (by Oscar Wilde) Good morning, everyone.

text: #爱说心语# No matter when, profound knowledge, good cultivation, civilized manners, elegant conversation and a heart full of love will definitely make a person live a beautiful life. To live beautifully is to live with a spirit, a taste, and a truly wonderful life. As long as you don't give up on yourself, no one can stop you. People may not be born beautiful, but they must live a beautiful life. Let’s encourage each other~

chinese_text: 【小天使走了 捐器官救了6个人[泪]】昨天，11岁女孩雅婷离世，医生们低头，向她致敬，与她道别。她捐出两枚眼角膜、双肾、肝脏、心脏，6名患者重获新生。50天前，患肌无力一年的雅婷昏厥，没再醒来。爸妈说，如果她有意识，帮助别人也是她的愿望。小天使来过，留下爱！[心] http://t.cn/RUp6k1w
text: [The little angel left and donated organs to save 6 people [tears]] Yesterday, the 11-year-old girl Yating passed away. The doctors bowed their heads, paid tribute to her, and said goodbye to her. She donated two corneas, kidneys, liver, and heart, and six patients regained their lives. 50 days ago, Yating, who had suffered from myasthenia for a year, fainted and never woke up. Her parents said that if she had consciousness, it would also be her desire to help others. The little angel came and left love! [Heart] http://t.cn/RUp6k1w

chinese_text: 【山西一老人吊死在市政府 警方将其儿子逮捕】5月27日，一位60岁的老人吊死在山西省古交市政府的大门上。时隔不久，他的儿子因涉嫌遗弃罪被当地警方逮捕，目前法院已经开庭但尚未作出判决。调查发现，这位父亲曾经为了“低保”被取消一事，多次要求相关部门恢复未果。他的儿子生存状况也同样令人唏嘘。
text: [An old man in Shanxi hanged himself in the city hall and the police arrested his son] On May 27, a 60-year-old man hanged himself on the gate of the Gujiao City Hall in Shanxi Province. Not long after, his son was arrested by the local police on suspicion of abandonment. The court has opened but has not yet made a verdict. The investigation found that the father had repeatedly requested the relevant departments to reinstate the "subsistence allowance" due to the cancellation, but to no avail. The living conditions of his son are equally deplorable.

chinese_text: 【《斜倚的裸女》拍出1.7亿美元高价】法新社消息，9日，经过9分钟竞拍，莫迪里安尼的《斜倚的裸女》在纽约佳士得拍卖行拍出1亿7040万美元的高价。作品画于1917-1918年，此番初次拍卖即创下艺术品拍卖成交价第二高价。而最高纪录是毕加索的《阿尔及尔女人(O版)》(下图)，拍出了1亿7940万美元。新浪
text: ["Reclining Nude" sold for US$170 million] According to Agence France-Presse, on the 9th, after nine minutes of bidding, Modigliani's "Reclining Nude" sold for US$170.4 million at Christie's auction house in New York. High dollar price. The work was painted between 1917 and 1918. This first auction set the second highest price for a work of art at auction. The highest record is Picasso's "Women of Algiers (Version O)" (pictured below), which sold for US$179.4 million. Sina

chinese_text: 刚才看到一段话，不知道是哪个大神说的。但貌似很对。“男人们你们记着：她追求的是钱，你给她足够的钱，她不会因为你去找女人而生气。她追求的是感情，你给她足够的爱，她不会因为你没钱而瞧不起你。如果钱和爱你都给不了，你却要她包容你的花心、懒惰、撒谎、那对不起，你需要的是个傻逼。”
text: I just saw a passage, and I don’t know which master said it. But it seems right. "Men, please remember: What she is after is money. If you give her enough money, she will not be angry because you are looking for a woman. What she is after is love. If you give her enough love, she will not be angry because you don't have it. She looks down on you because of money. If you can't give her money or love, but you want her to tolerate your philandering, laziness, and lying, then I'm sorry, what you need is a fool."

text: [The last name is wrong on first reading, are you pronouncing it correctly? 】Chinese characters are extensive and profound, and when some commonly used characters are used as surnames, their pronunciation is very different: ① Pu, pronounced piáo, not pǔ. ②Qiu, pronounced qiú, not chóu. ③Duan, pronounced shàn, not dān. ④Jie, pronounced xiè, not jiě. ⑤ Ren, read 人, not read 人èn. ⑥Yuchi, pronounced as yù chí, not wèi chí... Click on the picture to test yourself, which ones did you pronounce wrong? @People's Daily Online

chinese_text: 不要那么敏感，也不要那么心软，太敏感和太心软的人，肯定过得不快乐，别人随便的一句话，你都要胡思乱想一整天 。敏感和心软都因为太在乎别人，活不出自我，可世上偏偏没那么多的将心比心，你的好往往会惯出得寸进尺的贱人，太过考虑别人的感受，注定自己不好受。
text: Don't be so sensitive, and don't be so soft-hearted. People who are too sensitive and too soft-hearted will definitely not be happy. Someone's casual words will make you think wildly all day long. Sensitivity and soft-heartedness are caused by caring too much about others and being unable to live your own life. However, there are not so many people in the world who care about others. Your kindness will often lead to a slut who tries too hard. If you think too much about other people's feelings, you are destined to feel uncomfortable.

On this day in 1949, the People's Liberation Army Air Force Command was established in Beijing. After being built in 1966, the Air Force has become a strategic service that combines multiple arms. Today, I wish the Chinese Air Force a happy birthday! Repost to pay tribute to the loyal defenders of the blue sky of the motherland! [Thumbs up]

chinese_text: 读大学的价值也许在，能认识未来几十年最重要的朋友，能分辨哪些人自己一辈子都不会交往，能集中解决很多困惑，从而形成自己的原则，开始学会拒绝。读大学的价值也在于你明白世界上有很多优秀的人，你开始有靠近的动力。读书，不是为了拿文凭或发财，而是成为一个有温度懂情趣会思考的人——刘同
text: Perhaps the value of going to college is that you can get to know your most important friends in the next few decades, be able to distinguish those people you will never interact with in your life, and be able to concentrate on solving many confusions, thereby forming your own principles and starting to learn to say no. The value of going to college is also that you understand that there are many outstanding people in the world, and you start to have the motivation to get closer. Studying is not to get a diploma or to get rich, but to become a person who has warmth, understanding, taste and thinking - Liu Tong

chinese_text: #热点#【俄罗斯官方再辟谣：向中国转交土地是假消息】当地时间10日，俄罗斯外交部表示，俄中两国不存在领土争议，有关“俄方向中国转交4.7平方千米土地”是虚假消息。“俄中确定边界后，边界线走向未发生过变动”。此前，中国珲春政府和俄边防部门已经否认转交土地消息。http://t.cn/RUOLE6X
text: #hotspot# [Russian officials refute rumors again: the transfer of land to China is false news] On the 10th local time, the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that there is no territorial dispute between Russia and China, and that "Russia transferred 4.7 square kilometers of land to China" is false information. "After Russia and China determined the border, the direction of the border line has not changed." Previously, the Chinese Hunchun government and the Russian border defense department had denied the transfer of land. http://t.cn/RUOLE6X

chinese_text: “如果你必须离开一个地方，一个你曾经住过 、爱过、深埋着你所有过往的地方，无论以何种方式离开，都不要慢慢离开，要尽你所能决绝地离开，永远不要回头，也永远不要相信过去的时光才是最好的，因为它们已经消亡。”（by柏瑞尔·马卡姆）早安，各位。
text: "If you have to leave a place, a place where you have lived, loved, and where all your past is buried, no matter how you leave, don't leave slowly, leave as decisively as you can, never Look back and never believe that the past times were the best, because they are dead." (by Beryl Markham) Good morning, everyone.

chinese_text: 做女人最可贵的，是“莫欺少年穷”。如果不嫌弃男人年轻时候的穷苦，愿陪他走过人生最艰苦的岁月，这样的女人千万不能错过。而做男人最可贵的，是“莫嫌老来丑”。到年纪大时，男人已经辉煌，而女人却耗尽青春，这时候嫌人老丑，实在是狼心狗肺。所以说，女人懂相守，男人懂感恩，才是一辈子。
text: The most valuable thing about being a woman is "Don't bully young people into poverty". If you don't despise a man's poverty when he was young and are willing to accompany him through the most difficult years of his life, you must not miss such a woman. The most valuable thing about being a man is "never be too old to look ugly". When they get older, men are already brilliant, but women have exhausted their youth. At this time, it is really shameful to think that people are old and ugly. Therefore, if a woman knows how to stay together and a man knows how to be grateful, it will last a lifetime.

text: [11-year-old left-behind girl writes a "letter to persuade her father": Mom is sick, dad, please don't divorce] "Don't ask for a divorce from mom again... Even if mom is gone, at least you are with me..." An 11-year-old girl from Sichuan Zizhong Xiaoxia cried and wrote to her father. For the past three years, her mother, who suffers from uremia, has been undergoing dialysis in Jiangxi to maintain her life. The whole family has relied on her father to work. Recently, her father, who "cannot survive", wants to divorce. Xiaoxia is very sad. via@West China Metropolis Daily

The drama is expected to start filming around January-February next year.

Lu Xiwen once joined a team in the suburbs of Beijing and has been working in Beijing since graduating from university. He rose to the rank of deputy secretary of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee and was an alternate member of the 18th Central Committee. http://t.cn/RUOJpDh

chinese_text: 一个人对生活的认识，在于能够客观的反思和积极的认识，能够把那些生活的起伏曲折，回归生活的波澜不惊，不必要去挑剔那些生活的风雨交加，生活本来也不是从自我意识出发能够选择的狭隘，当然也不是一成不变的无奈，许多烦恼是来自于对生活认识上的落差和自我狭隘的限制。
text: A person's understanding of life lies in being able to objectively reflect and have a positive understanding, to be able to return the ups and downs of life to the calmness of life, and there is no need to pick on the ups and downs of life. Life does not start from self-awareness. Being able to choose narrowly is certainly not a permanent helplessness. Many worries come from the gap in understanding of life and the narrow limitations of oneself.

On June 8, a man committed an attack with a shotgun, killing two people and injuring three others. The victims included an elderly man in his 70s. During the arrest, Yuan Shuai was shot by more than 60 shotguns and died, and Xue Yongqing was shot in the head and died. Xue Yongqing's wife jumped to her death after hearing the news... They gave up too much to protect us! Condolences and tribute! (CCTV reporter Dou Wei and Xie Binchao)

chinese_text: #智言趣语录# 一只骆驼辛辛苦苦穿过了沙漠，一只苍蝇趴在骆驼背上，一点力气也不花，也过来了。苍蝇讥笑说：“骆驼，谢谢你辛苦把我驼过来。”骆驼看了一眼苍蝇说：“你在我身上的时候我根本就不知道，你走了也没必要跟我打招呼，你本就没有什么重量，别把自己看太重。”很多的时候，我们就是那只苍蝇
text: #wittyspokenquotes# A camel worked hard through the desert, and a fly lay on the camel's back and came over without any effort. The fly sneered and said, "Camel, thank you for your hard work in bringing me here." The camel glanced at the fly and said, "I didn't know you were on my body at all. There is no need to say hello to me when you leave. You don't have any." No matter how heavy it is, don’t take yourself too seriously.” Many times, we are that fly

text: 【Never leave! Girl takes care of her paraplegic fiancé: She can’t let him wait to die [Heart]] The night before receiving her certificate in March this year, the girl Nan Nan received the bad news: her fiancé was in a car accident and became paraplegic at a high level, and will be confined to a wheelchair for the rest of his life. Relatives, friends, and her fiancé all asked her to leave, but Nannan persisted and waited for six months. She lost 40 pounds and sold her wedding ring to pay for treatment. "If I leave, he will have no choice but to wait for death. I will always stay with him and take care of him..." http://t.cn/RUObuZS[心]

chinese_text: #文化十分#【[话筒]明年起，网络音乐需先审核后上线】文化部发通知，从明年元旦起，网络音乐将实行企业自主审核、承担主体责任，文化行政部门进行事中事后监管的制度。网络音乐经营单位要对拟提供的音乐产品内容审核，审核通过后方可上线。自审制度和产品自审信息要向文化行政部门备案。(央视记者俞悦)
text: #culture10# [[Microphone] Starting next year, online music must be reviewed before going online] The Ministry of Culture issued a notice that starting from New Year’s Day next year, online music will implement independent review by enterprises and assume main responsibility, and the cultural administrative department will conduct in-process and post-process supervision. system. Online music business units must review the content of the music products they intend to provide, and can only go online after passing the review. The self-examination system and product self-examination information must be filed with the cultural administrative department. (CCTV reporter Yu Yue)

chinese_text: 【杭州出新规：救人者不用自证清白】日前杭州出台《文明行为促进条例》，明确规定，被救助人主张其人身损害是由救助人造成的，或主张救助人在救助过程中未尽合理限度注意义务加重其人身损害的，应当提供证据予以证明。救助人因被救助人诬告陷害而发生费用的，有权追偿。(人民日报)http://t.cn/RU0Rs5A
text: [Hangzhou issues new regulations: Rescuers do not need to prove their innocence] Recently, Hangzhou issued the "Regulations on the Promotion of Civilized Behavior", which clearly stipulates that the rescued person claims that his or her personal injury was caused by the rescuer, or that the rescuer failed to do so during the rescue process. If the reasonable duty of care is exercised to aggravate the personal injury, evidence shall be provided to prove it. If the rescuer incurs expenses due to false accusations and frame-ups by the rescuer, he shall have the right to recover compensation. (People's Daily) http://t.cn/RU0Rs5A

chinese_text: 【[话筒]独行女孩注意！有劫匪夜间跟踪手机亮光抢劫独行女】女孩陈某走夜路时玩手机，突然一男子将她按倒在地，另一男子抢走她的挎包和手机。经查，嫌疑人是被陈某玩手机的亮光吸引。提醒女孩：独自外出时要细心注意周边情况，尽量不要玩手机或听歌分心。（央视记者吴睿）http://t.cn/RUOd2IM
text: [[Microphone] Attention lone girls! A robber followed her cell phone at night and robbed a lone woman by shining its light on it. A girl, Chen, was playing with her cell phone while walking at night. Suddenly, a man pushed her to the ground and another man snatched her satchel and cell phone. After investigation, the suspect was attracted by the bright light of Chen playing with his mobile phone. Remind girls: Pay careful attention to your surroundings when going out alone, and try not to be distracted by playing with your mobile phone or listening to music. (CCTV reporter Wu Rui) http://t.cn/RUOd2IM

chinese_text: 每个人都是自己生活的创造者，有时候需要信心的坚持，当思考成熟做一件事的时候，争取时间，抓紧去做，也许只能收获围观和怀疑，就算点赞再少，自己不能退缩，当做出一些成绩出来的时候，别人开始关注和研究，也许当别人理解你的时候，故事活泼，谁又能在原地未动。
text: Everyone is the creator of his own life, and sometimes he needs to persevere with confidence. When he is mature enough to do something, buy time and do it quickly. You may only get onlookers and doubts. No matter how few likes you get, you can't. Retreat, when you make some achievements, others begin to pay attention and study, maybe when others understand you, the story becomes lively, and who can remain where you are?

chinese_text: 台湾最近网络最火的图。大家看了纷纷表示：「干，这太扯了！干干干干干，为什么那些老师从来没告诉过我！？」「天哪，我活了28年从来不知道这个！」「什么妖术！」「我要疯了…我试了十题然后每一题都正确！」「我当年在学校的时候为什么没有这个！？？！？！」这是神马妖术？！
text: The most popular picture on the Internet in Taiwan recently. Everyone looked at it and said, "Damn, this is ridiculous! Damn, dry, dry, dry, why did those teachers never tell me!?" "Oh my God, I have never known this in my 28 years of life!" "What kind of magic is this?" !" "I'm going crazy... I tried ten questions and every one of them was correct!" "Why didn't I have this when I was in school!??!?!" Is this a magic trick? !

chinese_text: 【一个人与一座桥】他是中国近代桥梁事业的先驱。他曾主持修建中国人自己设计并建造的第一座现代化大型桥梁——钱塘江大桥。1937年9月26日，钱塘江大桥建成通车，设计寿命定为50年，历经5次军事爆炸，至今在风雨和大潮中屹立78载，“炸药不放对都炸不掉”。1989年的今天，茅以升先生逝世。缅怀，致敬！
text: [A Man and a Bridge] He is a pioneer in China's modern bridge industry. He once presided over the construction of the Qiantang River Bridge, the first modern large-scale bridge designed and built by the Chinese themselves. On September 26, 1937, the Qiantang River Bridge was completed and opened to traffic. Its design life was set at 50 years. It has experienced five military explosions and has stood for 78 years in the wind, rain and tide. "It cannot be blown up even if the explosives are not placed correctly." On this day in 1989, Mr. Mao Yisheng passed away. Remember and pay tribute!

chinese_text: 【三分钟教你变身理财达人】“双十一”疯狂网购，下单后大呼“剁手”，花钱花到心痛得无法呼吸…你也是这样吗？会花钱也会得会理财！零基础理财入门：①每月拿出一部分工资强制储蓄；②列出“不需要物品清单”，节省不必要开支；③按个人能力和风险承受力，进行一定比例的投资。更多戳图↓↓理财走起！
text: [Teach you how to become a financial expert in three minutes] Crazy online shopping during "Double Eleven", shouting "chop your hands" after placing an order, spending money until your heart hurts and you can't breathe... Is this the same for you? If you know how to spend money, you also need to know how to manage money! An introduction to zero-based financial management: ① Set aside part of your salary every month for forced savings; ② Make a “list of unnecessary items” to save unnecessary expenses; ③ Invest a certain proportion according to your personal ability and risk tolerance. Click on more pictures↓↓Get started with financial management!

chinese_text: 晚上少熬夜 ，躺在床上不要来回刷手机了 越刷越孤独 ，胃不好就少吃辣椒冷饮过热食物 ，容易发胖的体质管不住嘴就多运动 ，一个人待着时就看看书 ，好东西都值得花时间 ，所以无论你现在多辛苦也别放弃 ，想想已经坚持了多久才到这里 ，又是一年 ，还没人来牵你的手，请照顾好自己。
text: Stay up late at night, and don’t scroll back and forth on your phone while lying in bed. The more you scroll, the lonelier you will feel. If you have a bad stomach, eat less chili, cold drinks, or hot food. If your body is easy to gain weight and you can’t control your mouth, exercise more. When you are alone, read a book. It’s good. Everything is worth spending time, so no matter how hard you work now, don’t give up. Think about how long you have persisted to get here. It’s been another year and no one has come to hold your hand. Please take care of yourself.

chinese_text: 最能燃起你「学习激情」的一句话。
text: The sentence that can ignite your "passion for learning" the most.

chinese_text: 哭的时候没人哄，学会了坚强；怕的时候没人陪，学会了勇敢；烦的时候没人问，学会了承受；累的时候没人可以依靠，学会了自立！就这样我找到了自己，知道了人是被逼出来的，只有压力才有动力；有超人的聪明者，不见得有超人的抱负。他们常常仗恃自己的智力，放弃平实的奋斗。
text: When you cry, there is no one to comfort you, so you learn to be strong; when you are scared, there is no one to accompany you, so you learn to be brave; when you are annoyed, no one asks, you learn to endure; when you are tired, you have no one to rely on, you learn to be independent! In this way, I found myself and learned that people are forced out, and only pressure can provide motivation; people with superhuman intelligence may not necessarily have superhuman ambitions. They often rely on their own intelligence and give up on plain struggle.

chinese_text: 在很多时候，往往就是因为你要的太少，别人才索性什么都不给你，结果你一无所有。所以，想要什么，都得靠自己努力，永远都是这样。
text: In many cases, it is often because you ask for too little that others simply don’t give you anything, and you end up with nothing. Therefore, whatever you want, you have to work hard on your own, and this will always be the case.

text: [Primary school students wrote to the director of education: Don’t cancel the autumn outing] A primary school student in Nanjing wrote to the local education director, requesting not to cancel the autumn outing. In the letter, he expressed his desire for an autumn outing with words such as "bolt from the blue" and "going crazy". The local government said that a recent elevator accident in Nanjing injured 16 primary school students on autumn outings. The Education Bureau has not canceled the autumn outings. It is currently improving safety measures and will resume students' autumn outings as soon as possible. (China Jiangsu Net) http://t.cn/RUOshtO

chinese_text: 在无数个睡不着的晚上，我相信会有很多人，习惯性的开始闭上眼睛，安静的想念一个人，想念一张脸。会想起以前一起说过的话，一起走过的路，一起的所有一切，一个人会傻笑，然后是无比的心痛。或许，最美的事不是留住时光，而是留住记忆，但愿，时光，只如初见。
text: During countless sleepless nights, I believe there will be many people who habitually begin to close their eyes and quietly miss a person or a face. I will think of the words we said together before, the road we walked together, and everything we did together, and a person will giggle, and then feel extremely heartbroken. Perhaps, the most beautiful thing is not to keep time, but to keep memories. I hope that time is just like the first time we met.

text: [The 45-year-old mother-in-law is afraid that her son will be lonely and wants to have a second child, which scares her pregnant daughter-in-law.] Ms. Wang recalled that two days ago, her mother-in-law talked about letting go of the second child. Ms. Wang thought to herself that she had just become pregnant with her first child, and she had to wait at least until the first child was delivered. But the mother-in-law suddenly said that her son was very lonely, "I should give birth to one as soon as possible while I can still give birth." Ms. Wang was immediately confused. Her husband was over 20 years old. What should she call her mother-in-law's next child... http://t.cn/RUW6IcT Yangtze Evening News

text: One day you will understand that people can't be too kind. Good people are bullied because people only pick on the weak and pinch them. They only try to get ahead of themselves. If you are too generous and tolerant in everything, others will not appreciate you and just slap your nose in the face. Sometimes you should Treat some people with a proper temper. You really can't be too gentle and patient, because being too kind is also a fool.

text: [University sets up love class to learn how to act coquettishly and get credits] Henan Zhengzhou Normal University offers an elective course "Love Psychology". The content of the course includes random matching simulations of "confession", learning "coquettishness", "rejection", etc. The school said it did not encourage students to fall in love, but wanted to teach them about "love". Students who take elective courses can get credits. Some people successfully "leave singles" after taking classes, while others choose to break up. http://t.cn/RUWOJHnDo you want to take this "love class"?

chinese_text: 【父母赴呼格新坟祭奠 母亲悲痛哭倒在地】今天，李三仁尚爱云夫妇赶到距离呼和浩特市30公里外的呼格吉勒图新墓地，主持并参加儿子呼格吉勒图的迁坟祭奠仪式。祭奠过程中，尚爱云多次因过度伤心抱着呼格吉勒图的新墓碑哭倒在地，李三仁则在儿子墓碑前久久低头不语，一次次抹去眼角的泪水。法制晚报
text: [Parents went to pay homage to their mother in the new Hugjilet cemetery and fell to the ground in grief] Today, Li Sanren, Shang Aiyun and his wife rushed to the Hugjiletu New Cemetery, 30 kilometers away from Hohhot City, to preside over and participate in the relocation of their son Hugjiletu. Grave memorial ceremony. During the memorial ceremony, Shang Aiyun cried and fell to the ground holding Hugjiltu's new tombstone many times because of excessive sadness. Li Sanren bowed his head in silence in front of his son's tombstone for a long time, wiping the tears from the corners of his eyes again and again. Legal Evening News

chinese_text: 【不怕撞衫怕撞脸】不想平淡妆，那就在眼部加一条彩色心机线，让妆面与众不同哦~1，沿着睫毛根部轻轻描绘，不要太粗或太明显。2，用眼线液用点的方式填补睫毛根部，加强睫毛的浓度。Point! 因为眼睛大，眼线画太粗反而会显眼小。3，用咖啡色的眼线把上下眼尾做连结。任何颜色都可以画，只要你喜欢！
text: [Don’t be afraid of bumping into your clothes or bumping into your face] If you don’t want to wear plain makeup, then add a colorful line on the eyes to make your makeup look unique~ 1. Gently trace along the roots of the eyelashes, not too thick or obvious. 2. Use liquid eyeliner to fill in the roots of the eyelashes with dots to enhance the concentration of the eyelashes. Point! Because the eyes are big, if the eyeliner is too thick, it will look smaller. 3. Use brown eyeliner to connect the upper and lower ends of the eyes. You can paint in any color, as long as you like!

chinese_text: 一路走来，我不优秀。但我善良不虚伪。我有话直来直去。做事坦坦荡荡。我不聪明。但我肯定不傻。很多事，我都能看明白。只是不想说而已。因为人太聪明了会很累。有时糊涂一些更快乐。我不喜欢勾心斗角，也不喜欢被算计。更不喜欢假惺惺。我喜欢真实的人，不挖苦，不讽刺，不玩心计，真诚的对待。
text: Along the way, I was not good. But I am kind and not hypocritical. I'll tell you what I have to say. Do things openly and openly. I am not smart. But I'm certainly not stupid. I can understand many things. I just don’t want to say it. Because people who are too smart will be very tired. Sometimes it's happier to be confused. I don't like intrigues or being plotted against. I don’t like hypocrisy even more. I like real people, no sarcasm, no sarcasm, no scheming, and treat them sincerely.

The driver said that he found flames in the rear compartment at that time, and a raging fire broke out less than two minutes after parking. Fortunately, the people in the car escaped in time. chinese_text: 生活可以复杂也可以很简单，就看我们拥有怎样的心态，简单就真实，平淡就淡然。去面对复杂，去保持欢喜。相信自己的坚强，但不要拒绝眼泪；相信人和人之间的真诚，但不要指责虚伪；相信努力会成功，但不要逃避失败；相信命运的公平，但不要忘了，当一扇门关上的时候，学会给自己留一扇窗。
text: Life can be complicated or very simple, it depends on what kind of mentality we have. Simple means real, plain means indifferent. To face the complexity and remain joyful. Believe in your own strength, but don’t refuse tears; Believe in the sincerity between people, but don’t accuse hypocrisy; Believe that hard work will succeed, but don’t avoid failure; Believe in the fairness of fate, but don’t forget that when a door closes When the time comes, learn to leave a window for yourself.

chinese_text: 【有一种光影属于莫奈】①他能根据同一场景的不同光影变幻，描绘出十几幅作品；②他开印象派之先河，为画坛带来了一阵唯美的写意之风；③他晚年不幸患上白内障，但仍继续作画，留下两千多幅油画、五百多件素描。1840年的今天，法国印象派画家克劳德·莫奈诞生。佳作共赏↓↓你最喜欢那幅？
text: [There is a kind of light and shadow that belongs to Monet] ① He can depict more than a dozen works based on the different light and shadow changes of the same scene; ② He pioneered Impressionism and brought a burst of beautiful freehand style to the painting world; ③ He unfortunately suffered from illness in his later years Although he suffered from cataracts, he continued to paint, leaving behind more than 2,000 oil paintings and more than 500 sketches. On this day in 1840, French Impressionist painter Claude Monet was born. Enjoy the masterpieces↓↓Which one is your favorite?

chinese_text: #丽水山体滑坡#【浙江丽水发生山体滑坡 7人被救出后4人不治身亡】昨晚，丽水莲都区雅溪镇里东村发生山体滑坡，山体滑坡一直延伸到高速路边，近二十栋房屋被埋。截至目前，已有7名村民被救出，并送往医院救治，其中4人因抢救无效死亡。据初步统计，仍有20多名村民下落不明，正在全力搜救。@央视新闻
text: #利水LANDSLIDE# [Seven people were rescued from a landslide in Lishui, Zhejiang, and 4 died of their injuries] Last night, a landslide occurred in Lidong Village, Yaxi Town, Liandu District, Lishui. The landslide extended to the side of the highway and nearly 20 people died. A house was buried. So far, 7 villagers have been rescued and sent to the hospital for treatment, 4 of whom died due to ineffective rescue. According to preliminary statistics, more than 20 villagers are still missing, and search and rescue efforts are being made. @cctvnews

chinese_text: 人们常用“色狼”来贬低下半身思考的男人。但事实上，狼是一夫一妻制，一只公狼一生只爱一只母狼，且求爱期相当漫长，要经受诸多考验，但公狼都毫不动摇。一年中公狼只发情两次，其余时间专心出门捕猎，猎物全部分享给母狼。怀孕期间他会认真照料妻子，生儿育女后帮抚养，和狼比品德有些人还未必行啊！
text: People often use the word "pervert" to disparage men who think in their lower body. But in fact, wolves are monogamous. A male wolf only loves one female wolf in his life, and the courtship period is very long and has to withstand many tests, but the male wolf remains unwavering. The male wolf only goes into estrus twice a year. The rest of the time he goes out to hunt, sharing all the prey with the female wolf. He will take good care of his wife during the pregnancy and help raise the children after they are born. Some people may not be able to compare their moral character to that of a wolf!

text: [Breaking: French President Hollande said IS was responsible for terrorist attacks] Hollande just delivered a speech to the nation, condemning IS as the mastermind behind the multiple attacks in Paris on the evening of November 13. Hollande said that the terrorist attack was an "act of war" and was planned and implemented by overseas IS organizations with the assistance of French domestic forces. Hollande also said that a special session of Congress will be held on Monday and a three-day day of mourning will be established. Reuters (Sina)

text: A classmate from Tsinghua University was doing homework, and the person he was video chatting with on the computer was his long-distance girlfriend. The two were silent, immersed in their homework, occasionally looking up at each other, and then immersed themselves in studying - this is love . Love is not about two people going shopping together, eating together, talking sweetly, lingering day and night, or even holding hands tightly. It is about becoming a better person for the other person. (change)

A landslide occurred in Lidong Village, Yaxi Town, Liandu District, Lishui, Zhejiang. The latest news states that the disaster has killed 9 people and 28 people are still missing. Every life lost is worthy of sighing. Please give your care and prayers to Lishui.

chinese_text: 这个冬天，最暖心的9句话，你想听哪句？
text: This winter, which of the 9 most heart-warming sentences do you want to hear?

text: The short-legged Corgi is so cute. The smile is so sunny and heart-warming.

chinese_text: 早上看到巴黎恐怖袭击，愣了几秒，感到惊讶，有些烦躁，叹息一声后，失落了片刻，心塞整个白天，晚上平静下来，没有任何情绪…这一生的愤怒大概早已用光，不知从哪天起，已经习惯了愤怒，默认了残酷，接受了麻木，向全世界投降认输。
text: I saw the terrorist attacks in Paris in the morning. I was stunned for a few seconds. I was surprised and a little irritated. After sighing, I felt lost for a moment. My heart was filled with worry all day long. I calmed down at night and had no emotions... The anger in this life has probably been used up long ago. I don’t know where to start. From that day on, I became accustomed to anger, acquiesced to cruelty, accepted numbness, and surrendered to the world.

chinese_text: 一样东西，如果你太想要，就会把它看得很大，甚至大到成了整个世界，占据了你的全部心思 。我的劝告是，最后无论你是否如愿以偿，都要及时从中跳出来，如实地看清它在整个世界中的真实位置，亦即它在无限时空中的微不足道 。这样，你得到了不会忘乎所以，没有得到也不会痛不欲生 。——周国平
text: If you want something too much, you will regard it as very big, even so big that it becomes the whole world and occupies all your thoughts. My advice is, in the end, no matter whether you get what you want, you must jump out of it in time and see its true position in the entire world, that is, its insignificance in infinite time and space. In this way, you won't forget about it if you get it, and you won't be miserable if you don't get it. ——Zhou Guoping

chinese_text: #夜猫子时间#今晚，@东方明珠 亮红白蓝三色灯，向同为WFGT（世界高塔协会）成员的法国巴黎艾菲尔塔表达哀思。同一天里，浙江发生山体滑坡、广西出现罕见暴雨、巴黎遭遇恐怖袭击...天灾人祸前，生命显得如此脆弱！今夜，你愿意与东方明珠一起，为那些逝去的生命，点上一根蜡烛吗？[蜡烛]
text: #夜夜子时# Tonight, @orientalmingzhu lights up the red, white and blue lights to express condolences to the Eiffel Tower in Paris, France, which is also a member of WFGT (World Association of Tall Towers). On the same day, landslides occurred in Zhejiang, rare heavy rains occurred in Guangxi, and terrorist attacks occurred in Paris... Before natural disasters and man-made disasters, life seems so fragile! Tonight, are you willing to join the Oriental Pearl Tower to light a candle for those lost lives? [Candle]

chinese_text: 我不炫耀，因为我不自卑。我不花心，因为我不缺爱。——人性就是这样，自卑才炫耀，缺爱才花心。你的招摇，除了证明内心虚弱，说明不了任何东西！
text: I don’t show off because I don’t feel inferior. I don't bother because I don't lack love. ——Human nature is like this. Only when you have low self-esteem can you show off, and when you lack love can you be carefree. Your swagger proves nothing but your inner weakness!

chinese_text: 最美的事不是留住时光，而是留住记忆。真正的强大不是原谅别人，而是放过自己。
text: The most beautiful thing is not to retain time, but to retain memories. Real strength is not to forgive others, but to let yourself go.

chinese_text: “坏情绪也不要都说给别人听，不管怎么样，夜晚你就睡觉吧，白天你就出去散散心，阴天你就吃好喝好，雨天你就听听雨。”
text: "Don't tell others about your bad moods. No matter what, just sleep at night, go out and relax during the day, eat and drink well on cloudy days, and listen to the rain on rainy days."

chinese_text: 两个人在一起能做最多的事，就是陪伴。我干我的，你干你的，有两三个小时的晚间黄金时间，他们都是独享的。但你知道一个空间里有另一个人坐在那儿，你就感到很踏实。这就是爱情，最常态的爱情。
text: The most two people can do together is to accompany each other. I do mine, you do yours, and they have two or three hours of prime evening time all to themselves. But you feel grounded knowing there's another person sitting there in a space. This is love, the most normal love.

chinese_text: 【巴黎恐怖袭击后，奥巴马与普京进行了长时间的私聊...】据外媒，在G20峰会上，美国总统奥巴马私下与俄罗斯总统普京举行了长达35分钟的非正式会晤。美国总统国家安全事务助理苏珊·赖斯也参加了这次会面。这次会晤主要是关于叙利亚的反恐问题。俄方表示，虽然双方仍然存在分歧，但谈话是“建设性的”。
text: [After the terrorist attacks in Paris, Obama had a long private chat with Putin...] According to foreign media, at the G20 summit, U.S. President Obama privately held a 35-minute informal meeting with Russian President Putin. U.S. National Security Assistant to the President Susan Rice also attended the meeting. This meeting was mainly about counter-terrorism issues in Syria. Russia said that although the two sides still had differences, the conversation was "constructive."

chinese_text: 对于生活的认识，一个人的视野和格局决定着是幸福还是悲伤，生命的视野不能只局限于内心的狭隘，应该是一种融合和光明，放手过往的纠缠，把那些积极乐观纳入生命的视野，去承担那些生活的得得失失繁忙嘈杂，用内心的宽度承载生命所有的意识和内涵。
text: Regarding the understanding of life, a person's vision and pattern determine whether he is happy or sad. The vision of life cannot be limited to the narrowness of the heart. It should be a kind of integration and brightness. Let go of the entanglements of the past and incorporate those positive and optimistic things into the vision of life. , to bear the busy and noisy gains and losses of life, and use the breadth of the heart to carry all the consciousness and connotation of life.

chinese_text: 【军火库被盗】周六晚位于麻省Worcester的军火库被盗，FBI和当地警察介入调查，目前并没有证据表明和恐怖主义有关。有消息称，丢失武器包括六部半自动步枪，十部手枪，还有其他枪支。大家还是多注意安全，不要往人口太集中的地方去[话筒]
text: [Arsenal Stolen] An ammunition depot in Worcester, Massachusetts was stolen on Saturday night. The FBI and local police intervened in the investigation. There is currently no evidence that it is related to terrorism. Sources said the missing weapons included six semi-automatic rifles, 10 handguns, and other firearms. Everyone should pay more attention to safety and don’t go to places where the population is too concentrated [Microphone]

chinese_text: 【转发，谢谢这只搜救犬！[心]】丽水山体滑坡，它参与了救援！海亮是浙江东阳红十字应急救援队的专业搜救犬。它前脚缠着绷带，是搜救时受了伤，可它一声不吭，默默在丽水里东村来回走动。昨天它赖在一幢土木结构老房前不走。救援人员手拿工具，救出3名被困群众。via.钱江晚报 网友：它也是一名战士！
text: [Forward, thank you for this search and rescue dog! [Heart]】Lishui landslide, it participated in the rescue! Hailiang is a professional search and rescue dog of the Red Cross Emergency Rescue Team in Dongyang, Zhejiang. Its front feet were wrapped with bandages, which were injured during the search and rescue, but it walked back and forth silently in the East Village of Lishui without saying a word. Yesterday it stayed in front of an old house with civil structure and refused to move. Rescue workers held tools in hand and rescued three trapped people. via. Qianjiang Evening News netizen: It is also a warrior!

chinese_text: 【广西再现38元一只“天价虾” 菜单画3只上菜仅1只[衰]】14日晚，广西南宁一女士和丈夫外出就餐，点了推荐菜——38元/位的“香辣大明虾”，菜单照片上显示有三只虾，她还笑称，会不会也遭遇青岛的“天价虾”事件，没想到还真是只有一只虾。（广西新闻网） http://t.cn/RUQ9CuN产品以实物为准？
text: [Guangxi reappears with 38 yuan for a "sky-high price shrimp" and only 1 of the 3 on the menu is served [bad]] On the evening of the 14th, a woman from Nanning, Guangxi went out to eat with her husband and ordered the recommended dish - 38 yuan/person "Xiangzi Shrimp" "Spicy prawns", the menu photo showed three shrimps. She also laughed and asked whether she would also encounter the "sky-high price shrimp" incident in Qingdao, but she didn't expect that there was only one shrimp. (Guangxi News Network) http://t.cn/RUQ9CuN Is the product subject to the actual product?

chinese_text: 我是怎样的人，我自己懂就好了；我过怎样的日子，我自己享受或者承担就好了。苦日子苦过，好日子享受，没必要令所有人都懂得和了解。
text: As long as I understand what kind of person I am; as long as I enjoy or bear the responsibility for the kind of life I live. It is not necessary for everyone to understand and understand the hard days and the good days to enjoy.

chinese_text: 分手了，就做回自己：爱情是两个人的事，错过了大家都有责任。一个人总要有个新的开始，别让过去把你栓在悲哀的殿堂。别说你最爱的是谁，人生还很长，谁也 无法预知明天。好聚好散，每个人都有自己的无奈。活着不是为了怀念昨天，而是要等待希望。哭完就把一切都留在昨天，永远不要去触及。
text: After breaking up, just be yourself: love is a matter between two people, and everyone is responsible if they miss it. A person always has a new beginning, don't let the past tie you to the palace of sorrow. Don't say who you love most, life is still very long and no one can predict tomorrow. It's easy to get together and easy to part ways, everyone has their own frustrations. Living is not to miss yesterday, but to wait for hope. After crying, leave everything in yesterday and never touch it.

chinese_text: 我说一个人的时候就不能好好的玩耍吗？
text: Did I say you can't have fun when you're alone?

chinese_text: 【河南南阳15岁学生猝死课堂 父亲发文追思】11月10日早上，15岁男童云博因心脏骤停在课堂突然昏迷,抢救无效死亡。而头天晚上他写作业写到12点多,早上6:20起床。父亲写道：爸爸深深忏悔，每天睡眠那么少，还无形中增加你的学习压力……,爸爸知道你累了,从此再也没有压力了。http://t.cn/RUQOJrR
text: [The father of a 15-year-old student who died suddenly in the classroom in Nanyang, Henan Province issued a memorial message] On the morning of November 10, a 15-year-old boy Yunbo suddenly fell into coma in the classroom due to cardiac arrest. Rescue efforts failed and died. The night before, he did his homework until after 12 o'clock and got up at 6:20 in the morning. My father wrote: Dad deeply regrets that he sleeps so little every day, which invisibly increases your study pressure... Dad knows that you are tired, and there is no more pressure from now on. http://t.cn/RUQOJrR

chinese_text: #天下#【土耳其撤销中国防空导弹合约】外媒称，土耳其已撤消与中国签署的价值34亿美元的“红旗9”远程防空导弹合约。土官员解释说，土耳其要自行研制远程防空系统。2013年9月，土耳其宣布中国公司中标其远程防空和反导弹系统。但因土耳其是北约成员国，此举引发美国和北约的担忧。http://t.cn/RUQMFpg
text: #天下# [Turkey cancels Chinese anti-aircraft missile contract] Foreign media said that Turkey has canceled the US$3.4 billion "Red Flag 9" long-range anti-aircraft missile contract signed with China. Turkish officials explained that Türkiye will develop its own long-range air defense system. However, since Turkey is a member of NATO, this move caused concerns in the United States and NATO. http://t.cn/RUQMFpg

text: God is very interesting. Cats like to eat fish, but they can’t go into the water. Fish like to eat earthworms, but they can’t go ashore. Life is about having and losing at the same time; choosing and giving up at the same time. In life, everything goes as planned, and in life, everything goes as planned. Therefore, don’t be serious with others because it’s not worth it. Don’t be true with yourself because you can’t afford to be hurt. Don’t be true with the past.

chinese_text: 「你打我一拳，我踢你一脚。」 这叫比例原则。如果我踢你 100 脚，就不符比例原则。小回回干西方人，最多一次是 911 ，不过3000 人。从此每次几百人而已。反过来看西方人对付小回回，光在轰炸上就超过 3000 人的 100 倍 、1000 倍、10000 倍，西方媒体从不指斥这是滥杀无辜，比例原则给狗吃了。
text: "You punch me, I kick you." This is called the principle of proportionality. If I kicked you 100 times, it would not be proportional. For Westerners, the most one call was 911, with only 3,000 people. From then on, it was just a few hundred people at a time. On the other hand, when Westerners deal with the Xiaohui, the bombing alone is 100, 1,000, or 10,000 times more than the 3,000 people. The Western media never accuses this of indiscriminate killing of innocent people, and the principle of proportionality is given to dogs.

chinese_text: 当别人认定了你是错的，就算你冷静地解释了也会越描越黑，还会被认为是在狡辩。不解释却只能吃哑巴亏，会被解读为心虚。如果你为此生气发飙了，那 就更加不得了，再有理也会变成错。当别人对你万般地误会，你只能暂且默默忍受。只要做好自己的本分，用实力证明自己，时间会为你说话。
text: When others conclude that you are wrong, even if you explain calmly, you will become more and more negative, and you will be considered to be quibbling. Failure to explain but only suffer the consequences of being dumb will be interpreted as a guilty conscience. If you get angry and get angry over this, it will be even more serious. No matter how reasonable you are, it will become wrong. When others misunderstand you, you can only endure it silently for the time being. As long as you do your part well and prove yourself with your strength, time will speak for you.

chinese_text: 【15岁学生写作业至凌晨猝死课堂 父亲发文追思[伤心]】10日上午，河南某中学9年级学生宣云博在早读课上突然昏迷，抢救无效死亡。而孩子头天晚上写作业到12点多，早上6点20起床。其父写到：愿天下父母别再给孩子加压了！娃啊！每天睡那么少，爸爸知道你累了，从此再也没有压力了…[悲伤]（大河报）
text: [The father of a 15-year-old student who suddenly died in class while doing homework in the early morning posted a memorial [sad]] On the morning of the 10th, Xuan Yunbo, a ninth-grade student in a middle school in Henan Province, suddenly fell into coma during a morning reading class and died after resuscitation failed. The child did his homework until around 12 o'clock the night before and got up at 6:20 in the morning. His father wrote: I hope parents in the world will stop putting pressure on their children! Baby! You sleep so little every day, Dad knows you are tired, and there is no pressure anymore... [Sad] (Dahe News)

chinese_text: 【工作汇报四大原则】一、客户价值原则；二、积极主动原则，主动，而不越权；三、尊重，而不吹捧；四、请示，而不依赖。 【汇报工作六大关键】一、讲结果， 不讲理由；二、讲重点，不讲细节；三、讲数据，不讲大概；四、要简单，不要复杂；五、汇报，不要邀功；六、汇报，不要打小报告。
text: [Four major principles of work reporting] 1. The principle of customer value; 2. The principle of proactiveness, taking the initiative without overstepping authority; 3. Respecting without flattering; 4. Asking for instructions without relying on them. [Six Keys to Reporting] 1. Talk about results, not reasons; 2. Talk about key points, not details; 3. Talk about data, not generalities; 4. Keep it simple, not complicated; 5. Report without asking for credit; 6. , report, don’t make small reports.

chinese_text: 【12000元百元大钞放冰箱上 被老鼠拖走咬成渣[衰]】近日，成都钟女士放在家里准备给员工发工资用的12000元不见了。她找遍了家里，最后在一个角落发现了钱，“原来是被老鼠拖走了，钱咬成了碎片。”所幸在银行工作人员的帮助下，连拼3天，最终挽回损失11000余元。（天府早报）http://t.cn/RUQOXGk
text: [12,000 yuan in hundred-yuan bills left on the refrigerator were dragged away and chewed into pieces by rats [deprecated]] Recently, the 12,000 yuan that Ms. Zhong from Chengdu kept at home to pay employees’ wages disappeared. She searched all over the house and finally found the money in a corner. "It turned out that the mouse had dragged it away and the money was chewed into pieces." Fortunately, with the help of bank staff, she worked for three days and finally recovered the loss of more than 11,000 yuan. . (Tianfu Morning Post) http://t.cn/RUQOXGk

chinese_text: #oh my venus#90年代的大邱维纳斯姜珠恩(申敏儿饰)曾经有着完美的身材,而经过15年后,恩珠成功实现了梦想成为了律师,然而完美的身材和漂亮的脸蛋却失去了.此时的恩珠还是很爱前男友林宇植(郑糠云饰).恩珠在雨中与健身教练金英浩(苏志燮饰)相遇.(<oh my venus>可在米兔应用收看.各大应用商店搜"米兔")
text: #oh my venus# Kang Joo-eun (played by Shin Min-ah), the Daegu Venus of the 90s, once had a perfect figure. After 15 years, Eun-joo successfully realized her dream and became a lawyer, but her perfect figure and beautiful face were lost. At this time, Eun-joo still loves her ex-boyfriend Lin Woo-sik (played by Jung Yeon-woon). Eun-joo meets fitness coach Kim Young-ho (played by So Ji-sub) in the rain. (<oh my venus> You can watch it on the Mi Rabbit app. Search "Mi Rabbit" in major app stores)

chinese_text: #万花筒#【狮子座流星雨18日极大 非常适合我国观测】有着“流星雨之王”称号的狮子座流星雨，一直是11月天象大戏之一。天文专家介绍说，今年该流星雨18日凌晨5时前后的极大非常适合我国观测，流量或将达到每小时20颗。
text: # Kaleidoscope# [The Leonid meteor shower on the 18th is very suitable for observation in our country] The Leonid meteor shower, known as the "King of Meteor Showers", has always been one of the celestial dramas in November. Astronomy experts said that this year's meteor shower will be extremely large around 5 a.m. on the 18th, which is very suitable for observation in my country, and the flow rate may reach 20 meteors per hour.

chinese_text: 这世上，没谁活得比谁容易，只是有人在呼天抢地，有人却在静默坚守。等待是人生最初的苍老，放弃是命运最糟的堕落。若前行，别怕痛，有些伤是绚丽你的勋章；若拥有，莫惧失，聚散不过是浮生中的轮回。不要追求太甚，不必强求太多，不可奢求太众，接受无法接受的，你在成长；承受不该承受的，你已老去。
text: In this world, no one has an easier life than anyone else. It’s just that some people are crying out for help, while others are holding on silently. Waiting is the first step of aging in life, and giving up is the worst depravity of fate. If you move forward, don't be afraid of pain, some injuries are your glorious medals; if you have them, don't be afraid of losing them, gathering and separation are just reincarnations in life. Don't pursue too much, don't force too much, don't ask for too much, accept what is unacceptable, you are growing; accept what you shouldn't accept, you are getting old.

chinese_text: 【[围观]“外星人”拟在中国办30所足球学校：希望中国问鼎世界杯】足球巨星罗纳尔多今天在京表示，计划未来两年在中国开办30所国际足球学校。学校将为贫困儿童打开足球圆梦之门，提供免费学习机会。他表示，希望自己的足球学校能为中国问鼎世界杯做出贡献。跟着巨星学足球，酷酷哒！(央视记者李墨白)
text: [[Onlookers] "Aliens" plan to open 30 football schools in China: Hope China will win the World Cup] Football superstar Ronaldo said in Beijing today that he plans to open 30 international football schools in China in the next two years. The school will open the door for poor children to realize their football dreams and provide free learning opportunities. He expressed the hope that his football school can contribute to China's bid for the World Cup. It’s so cool to learn football from a superstar! (CCTV reporter Li Mobai)

text: You may not know that when I like you, I will like you even if you scold me. Even if you ignore me, I can't help but take the initiative to talk to you. But if one day you accidentally waste all these feelings, you No matter how well you do it, I won’t be tempted again.

chinese_text: “我羡慕所有人，因为我不是他们。由于在一切不可能中，这是最不可能的事情，也成为我日日企盼之事，我为之每时每刻伤心绝望。”（BY费尔南多·佩索阿）晚安，各位。
text: "I envy everyone, because I am not them. Because among all the impossibilities, this is the most impossible thing, and it has become something I look forward to every day. I am sad and desperate for it every moment." (BY Fernando· Pessoa) Good night, everyone.

chinese_text: #拍案#【宁波有69套房产房警获刑2年】去年11月，浙江宁波民警沈某被举报持有两个身份证，拥有69套房产。正常工作、结婚登记等都在真的身份证上，其他房产登记都在另外一个身份证上，逃避产权实名登记。近日，沈某因伪造国家机关印章罪、伪造公司企业事业单位印章罪，被判刑两年。http://t.cn/RUEOhDW
text: #热盈# [Ningbo policeman who owned 69 properties was sentenced to 2 years in prison] In November last year, Shen, a police officer in Ningbo, Zhejiang, was reported to have two ID cards and own 69 properties. Normal work, marriage registration, etc. are all on the real ID card, and other real estate registrations are on another ID card to avoid real-name registration of property rights. Recently, Shen was sentenced to two years in prison for forging seals of state agencies and seals of companies, enterprises and institutions. http://t.cn/RUUEOhDW

chinese_text: 抱最大希望，尽最大努力，做最坏打算，持最好心态。记住该记住的，忘记该忘记的，改变能改变的，接受成事实的。太阳总是新的，每天都是美好的日子。早安！
text: Have your best hopes, do your best, prepare for the worst, and have the best attitude. Remember what should be remembered, forget what should be forgotten, change what can be changed, and accept what is true. The sun is always new and every day is a beautiful day. Good morning!

chinese_text: 【小偷被抓时玩网游让民警等一下 称“不能坑队友”[doge]】今年9月，男子高某某偷走A网吧电脑主机转卖后(已被追回并已返还)又继续到B网吧上网。当民警找到高某某时，他还沉浸在网络游戏中，让民警等一下，说“不能坑队友”…目前高某某已被批准逮捕。（中新网）http://t.cn/RUEUqSM
text: [When the thief was caught playing online games, he asked the police to wait and said, "You can't cheat your teammates" [doge]] In September this year, the man Gao Moumou stole the computer host of Internet cafe A and resold it (it has been recovered and returned) and then continued to B Internet cafe. When the police found Gao, he was still immersed in online games and asked the police to wait, saying "you can't cheat your teammates"... Gao has been approved for arrest. (China News Service) http://t.cn/RUEUqSM

chinese_text: 【[话筒]江苏规定二级以上医院全面停止门诊输液！你还在滥用抗生素吗？】近日，江苏省出台新规，要求到2016年底前，除儿童医院，全省二级以上医院全面停止门诊患者静脉输液。据统计，我国是抗生素第一大国，人均使用抗生素的剂量是美国的十多倍！戳图↓生病时碰到这些抗生素，要合理、谨慎使用！扩散！
text: [[Microphone] Jiangsu stipulates that hospitals above level two will completely stop outpatient infusion! Are you still abusing antibiotics? 】Recently, Jiangsu Province has issued new regulations requiring that by the end of 2016, except for children’s hospitals, all second-level and above hospitals in the province will completely stop intravenous infusion of outpatients. According to statistics, my country is the largest country in antibiotics, and the per capita dose of antibiotics is more than ten times that of the United States! Click on the picture ↓ When you encounter these antibiotics when you are sick, you must use them rationally and cautiously! diffusion!

text: [A truck driver encountered a sky-high towing fee of nearly 130,000 yuan for two hours] On October 23, Mr. Li had a car accident in Beijing while driving a truck. He called a tow truck from a rescue company for rescue. The rescue company's cleaning process took about 2 hours, but they asked for a price of 128,700. Mr. Li was so frightened that he broke into a cold sweat. A person in charge of the rescue company said that the price is determined by the market, and there is no room for negotiation on the towing fee of 128,700 yuan. (Beijing TV) http://t.cn/RUEo0q6

chinese_text: 【教育部新规拟要求高校辅导员必须是中共党员】教育部日前在官网公布了《普通高等学校辅导员队伍建设规定》，与原规相比，新规对高校辅导员队伍建设的要求和措施更加具体，对辅导员队伍的政治要求更严格，要求高校辅导员必须是中共党员，并且“不得有损害党和国家利益以及不利于学生健康成长的言行。”
text: [The Ministry of Education's new regulations require that college counselors must be members of the Communist Party of China] The Ministry of Education recently announced the "Regulations on the Construction of Counselors in General Colleges and Universities" on its official website. Compared with the original regulations, the new regulations have different requirements for the construction of college counselors. The measures are more specific and the political requirements for the counselor team are stricter, requiring college counselors to be members of the Communist Party of China and "not to have words or deeds that harm the interests of the party and the country or are not conducive to the healthy growth of students."

chinese_text: 【15岁少年因染紫发遭围殴致死：满街就他染紫发】河南西平7名少年在街看见将头发染成紫色的郭某。“整个吕店街，还没人染紫发，咱们整整他。”之后7人拳脚并用围殴郭某。郭某回家后难受恶心，去医院时已“尿失禁，神志太清楚”。郭某随后在医院不治身亡。（大河报）http://t.cn/RUnbjzv
text: [A 15-year-old boy was beaten to death for dyeing his hair purple: He was the only one on the street who dyed his hair purple] Seven teenagers in Xiping, Henan Province saw Guo Mou dyeing his hair purple on the street. "No one in Ludian Street has dyed purple hair. Let's punish him." After that, seven people beat Guo with fists and kicks. Guo felt uncomfortable and nauseous after returning home. When he went to the hospital, he had "urinary incontinence and was too conscious." Guo later died in the hospital. (Dahe News) http://t.cn/RUnbjzv

chinese_text: #时局#【习近平：中国将大幅减少外资准入限制】习近平今天在APEC演讲：1、未来5年将使中国现行标准下7000多万农村贫困人口全脱贫，贫困县全脱帽。2、中国将大幅减少外资准入限制。3、加快亚太自贸区建设，推进区域经济一体化。4、预计亚投行年底前正式成立，为一批重大项目融资。http://t.cn/RUn4tAy
text: #current situation# [Xi Jinping: China will significantly reduce restrictions on foreign investment access] Xi Jinping delivered a speech at APEC today: 1. In the next five years, more than 70 million rural poor people in China will be lifted out of poverty under current standards, and all impoverished counties will be lifted out of poverty. 2. China will significantly reduce restrictions on foreign investment access. 3. Accelerate the construction of the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Area and promote regional economic integration. 4. The AIIB is expected to be formally established before the end of the year to finance a number of major projects. http://t.cn/RUn4tAy

chinese_text: 【好消息！2017年春季学期开始：义务教育教科书也免费！】中国政府网消息，今日召开的国务院常务会议透露，从2017年春季学期开始，统一对城乡义务教育学生（含民办学校学生）免除学杂费、免费提供教科书、补助家庭经济困难寄宿生生活费。明后年将新增财政投入150多亿元。扩散周知！
text: 【good news! Spring semester 2017 begins: Compulsory education textbooks are also free! 】 According to the Chinese Government website, the State Council executive meeting held today revealed that starting from the spring semester of 2017, urban and rural compulsory education students (including private school students) will be exempted from tuition and miscellaneous fees, free textbooks will be provided, and boarding students from financially disadvantaged families will be subsidized for their living expenses. New fiscal investment of more than 15 billion yuan will be made next year. Spread the word!

chinese_text: #原来是这样#【鲁民村vs五所村】说到鲁民村，很多人肯定都不知所说何处，但是说到五所村相信大家都知道了吧！鲁民村就是五所村的“前世”哦~[嘻嘻]因为在1931年，从山东省逃荒来的灾民在此定居，村子就以山东的简称“鲁”来命名，称“鲁民村”，直到1950年时才更名为“五所村”！又长知识了吧~[偷笑]
text: # Turns out to be this# [Lu Min Village vs Wu Suo Village] Speaking of Lu Min Village, many people must not know where they are talking about, but when it comes to Wu Suo Village, I believe everyone knows it! Lumin Village is the "previous life" of Wusuo Village~ [Hehe] Because in 1931, victims fleeing from famine in Shandong Province settled here, so the village was named after the abbreviation of "Lu" in Shandong, and was called "Lumin Village" , it was not until 1950 that it was renamed "Gosho Village"! You’ve gained some knowledge again~ [laughing]

chinese_text: 再多的误解，最终也输给笑容。再多的狭隘，总会输给包容。再多的伤害，也最终输给慈悲。再多的荣枯，最终也输给花朵。再多的纠结，最终也输给时光。
text: No matter how many misunderstandings there are, they will eventually be lost to smiles. No matter how narrow-minded you are, you will always lose to tolerance. No matter how much damage is done, it will eventually be lost to mercy. No matter how many prosperity and declines there are, they will eventually be lost to flowers. No matter how much you struggle, you will eventually lose to time.

chinese_text: #贾行家#【经常久坐，敲大腿两侧】[耶]一天到晚坐在办公室，时间一长，容易引发痛经、内分泌失调、尾骨痛、便秘等疾病。建议久坐族没事可多敲大腿两侧，能有效预防久坐带来的健康隐患。具体方法：伸直双腿，用拳头去捶大腿外侧。从大腿外侧根部(站起来屁股有个窝的地方)开始一直敲到膝盖。
text: #佳行家# [Often sitting for long periods of time, knocking on both sides of the thighs] [Yeah] Sitting in the office all day long, over time, can easily lead to dysmenorrhea, endocrine disorders, coccyx pain, constipation and other diseases. It is recommended that people who sit for long periods of time tap the sides of their thighs more frequently, which can effectively prevent the health risks caused by sitting for long periods of time. Specific method: straighten your legs and hit the outside of your thighs with your fists. Start from the outer root of the thigh (where there is a hollow in the butt when you stand up) and continue to the knee.

text: #SafeCivilizedTravel# [The traffic police "preached" and criticized the violation for more than 50 seconds without slapping [like]] The traffic police was eloquent, citing a large number of laws and regulations without slapping, which made the illegally parked driver admit his mistake again and again...A recent traffic police officer in Lanzhou, Gansu, Wang Zhiyu, " "Preaching" video circulated online. When asked why he was so "preachy", Wang Zhiyu said: "Professionalism is quality, and dedication is duty!" (CCTV reporter Ma Lingfeng) http://t.cn/RUnWd66

chinese_text: 这辈子 ，和谁过， 怎样过 ，过多久 ，有人因为爱情 ，有人因为物质 ，有人因为容貌， 有人因为前途 ，有人因为压力。而当这日子真的要和选择的人一起过了 ，你才明白 ，钱够花就好， 容貌不吓人就行。其实真正幸福的标准 ，无需理由很简单， 只要笑容比眼泪多 ，你就找对人了。
text: In this life, who do you live with, how do you live, and how long does it take? Some people do it because of love, some people do it because of material things, some people do it because of appearance, some people do it because of their future, and some people do it because of pressure. And when you really have to spend this life with the person you choose, you will understand that it is enough to spend enough money and the appearance is not scary. In fact, the standard of true happiness is very simple without any reason. As long as there are more smiles than tears, you have found the right person.
