chinese_text: 原来在年轻时，我们都曾知识渊博！！！[拜拜]
text: It turns out that when we were young, we were all knowledgeable! ! ! [Bye-Bye]

chinese_text: #法国枪击案#【它咬住恐怖分子，自己被炸身亡[泪]】当地时间18日早，法国警方在巴黎北部郊区与恐怖袭击嫌犯发生枪战。一只叫Diesel的7岁比利时牧羊犬，在执行特别任务时因公殉职。当时恐怖分子将枪口对向警方，Diesel冲上去，最终和恐怖分子同归于尽。请善待这些人类最忠诚无言的朋友！via.中国日报
text: #frenchshooting# [It bit the terrorist and was killed [tears]] On the morning of the 18th local time, French police had a shootout with a terrorist attack suspect in the northern suburbs of Paris. A 7-year-old Belgian Shepherd named Diesel died in the line of duty while performing a special mission. At that time, the terrorist pointed his gun at the police. Diesel rushed forward and eventually died together with the terrorist. Please be kind to these most loyal and silent friends of mankind! via.China Daily

chinese_text: 【被IS杀害的中国人质是谁？他曾接受白岩松采访】不幸遇难的中国人质名叫樊京辉，来自北京，曾从事广告行业。新浪新闻2001年1月15日登载的报道显示，樊当时接受白岩松采访时说，“自己一定要做自由人”、“从某种意义上说，要刻意追求不安全感带来的快感、走江湖的感觉”。详见：http://t.cn/Ry4DqYJ
text: [Who were the Chinese hostages killed by IS? He was interviewed by Bai Yansong] The Chinese hostage who unfortunately died was named Fan Jinghui. He was from Beijing and worked in the advertising industry. According to a report published by Sina News on January 15, 2001, Fan said in an interview with Bai Yansong at that time, "I must be a free person" and "In a sense, I must deliberately pursue the pleasure brought by insecurity and walk in the world. a feeling of". For details, see: http://t.cn/Ry4DqYJ

chinese_text: ISIS到底是什么组织？五分钟科普动画带你快速了解。http://t.cn/RUEbCCP
text: What exactly is ISIS? Five minutes of popular science animation will help you understand quickly. http://t.cn/RUebCCP

chinese_text: [话筒]求扩散~公安部打拐办主任@陈士渠 表示已部署调查。请大家留意，扩散，帮帮老人！
text: [Microphone] Please spread the word~ @陈Shiqu, director of the Anti-Human Trafficking Office of the Ministry of Public Security, said that an investigation has been deployed. Please pay attention, spread the word, and help the elderly!

chinese_text: 【小伙狂喝可乐致肝肾衰竭死亡】一20岁年轻男子一天喝掉十多瓶可乐，因呕吐送到医院时，血糖值已爆表，抢救无效离世。同时，小伙子还有查出肝脏衰竭、乳酸中毒等。他患的是糖尿病酮酸中毒，糖尿病最危险的并发症之一。医生说，他可能早就有糖尿病，最近又大量喝可乐，引发了悲剧。http://t.cn/RUm7OJH
text: [Man died from liver and kidney failure due to binge drinking of Coke] A 20-year-old young man drank more than ten bottles of Coke a day. When he was sent to the hospital due to vomiting, his blood sugar level was already off the charts, and he died after resuscitation failed. At the same time, the young man was also diagnosed with liver failure and lactic acidosis. He suffered from diabetic ketoacidosis, one of the most dangerous complications of diabetes. The doctor said that he may have had diabetes for a long time, and recently he drank a lot of cola, which caused the tragedy. http://t.cn/RUm7OJH

chinese_text: #今日世界厕所日#【每年超270亿次需求 这是个严肃话题】国内旅游一趟平均每人上8次厕所，所有游客每年在旅游厕所如厕超270亿次！我国年接待游客超37亿人次，厕所问题不是小事。国家旅游局决定用三年时间新建、扩建5.7万座厕所，你认为理想的公厕什么样？（央视记者高伟强）
text: #TodayWorldToiletDay# [The demand exceeds 27 billion times every year, this is a serious topic] On average, each person goes to the toilet 8 times during a domestic tourist trip, and all tourists use the toilet in tourist toilets more than 27 billion times every year! Our country receives more than 3.7 billion tourists every year, and toilet problems are no small matter. The National Tourism Administration has decided to build and expand 57,000 toilets in three years. What do you think of the ideal public toilet? (CCTV reporter Gao Weiqiang)

chinese_text: 【可能是最性感的减肥方式[偷乐]】用一种舞蹈的形式，让你感受甩肉过程！9个动作，反复3-5次，一天大概30分钟，享受并且坚持，说明你已经成功一半了！还等什么[来]
text: [Probably the sexiest way to lose weight [Stealing Fun]] Use a dance form to let you feel the process of losing weight! 9 movements, repeated 3-5 times, about 30 minutes a day. Enjoy and persist, which means you are already halfway successful! What are you waiting for [come]

chinese_text: 【又一起！京港澳高速一快递车着火 800万货物燃烧殆尽[衰]】据@都市报道 今天早上8点左右，在京港澳高速长葛收费站，一辆从深圳开来的货车起火。经过紧张扑救，目前火已经扑灭。车上装的货物是一家物流公司运送的电子设备，车主称价值在800万左右。你的“双11”快递到货了么？
text: 【Together again! A courier truck on the Beijing-Hong Kong-Macao Expressway caught fire and burned all 8 million of its cargo [depreciation]] According to @urbanreport, around 8 a.m. this morning, a truck from Shenzhen caught fire at the Changge Toll Station on the Beijing-Hong Kong-Macao Expressway. After intense efforts to put out the fire, the fire has now been put out. The goods loaded on the car were electronic equipment transported by a logistics company, and the owner said the value was around 8 million. Has your "Double 11" express delivery arrived?

chinese_text: #关注APEC#【聊天玩手机 领导人们开会前都做什么？】上午， APEC第二十三次领导人非正式会议在菲律宾首都马尼拉举行。在会议正式开始前短暂的休息调整时间，领导人们在干什么？有人玩手机，有人嚼口香糖，有人......点击视频，一睹为快！http://t.cn/RUm7jni
text: #focusAPEC# [What do leaders do before the meeting while chatting and playing on mobile phones? 】In the morning, the 23rd APEC Leaders’ Informal Meeting was held in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. What are leaders doing during the short break before the meeting officially starts? Some people are playing with their phones, some are chewing gum, some... click on the video to see it all! http://t.cn/RUm7jni

chinese_text: #热点#【持外国护照间谍在吉林被抓 正刺探解放军兵力】吉林村民在劳作时发现陌生男子拿望远镜四处观望，形迹可疑，急忙给驻地边防连打电话通报。连队对其盘查发现，其随身携带1本外国护照、1部已拍摄军事设施的相机，内衣口袋还有手绘我军边境兵力分布图。经核实，此人是1名间谍。http://t.cn/RUneph0
text: #hotspot# [A spy holding a foreign passport was caught spying on the strength of the People's Liberation Army in Jilin] Villagers in Jilin found a strange man looking around with binoculars while working, acting suspiciously, and hurriedly called the stationed border guard company to report it. The company's interrogation found that he was carrying a foreign passport, a camera that had photographed military facilities, and a hand-drawn map of the distribution of our army's border troops in his underwear pocket. After verification, this person is a spy. http://t.cn/RUneph0

chinese_text: 【教你做土豆泥虾球[色]】一口一个，一口一个，虾和土豆都是真爱啊！！！
text: [Teach you how to make mashed potato and shrimp balls [color]] One bite at a time, shrimp and potatoes are both true love! ! !

chinese_text: 【北京发布大雾黄色预警】受降水天气影响，今天下午到夜间，北京将出现大雾天气，部分地区能见度不足500米。北京市气象台今天中午发布大雾黄色预警信号。提醒：能见度低，开车应减速慢行。（央视记者张景）
text: [Beijing issues yellow fog warning] Affected by precipitation, heavy fog will occur in Beijing from this afternoon to night, with visibility less than 500 meters in some areas. The Beijing Meteorological Observatory issued a yellow fog warning signal at noon today. Reminder: Visibility is low, so drive slowly. (CCTV reporter Zhang Jing)

chinese_text: 【MIT发现了一个1957年的时间胶囊！但是他们挖早了】麻省理工最近在施工修建新的实验室，结果意外地挖出了个时间胶囊——这货是1957年该校的教授和学生制作的，里面包括一些纪念品，还有一封热情洋溢的信。哦对了，人家本是打算在2957年之后再被挖出来的。 http://t.cn/RUmZsQ9
text: [MIT discovers a 1957 time capsule! But they dug too early] MIT was recently building a new laboratory, and unexpectedly unearthed a time capsule - it was made by professors and students of the school in 1957, and it included some souvenirs and a time capsule. A passionate letter. Oh, by the way, it was originally planned to be dug out after 2957. http://t.cn/RUmZsQ9

chinese_text: #微感动#【找回大家的孩子[泪]】带着5岁儿子在广东开店，儿子买牛奶再未归来，他从此踏上寻子路。结识不少丢孩子的父母，他把大家组团，一起开着贴满100多名失踪孩子照片的车全国找，3年跑10万多公里，找回5个孩子！他说要找回儿子，也要找回大家的孩子！扩散帮帮江西父亲肖朝华！http://t.cn/R2jRxI4
text: #微touch# [Retrieve our children [tears]] took his 5-year-old son to open a store in Guangdong, but his son never returned after buying milk, and he embarked on the journey to find his son. After getting to know many parents who had lost their children, he formed a group and drove a car covered with photos of more than 100 missing children across the country. He traveled more than 100,000 kilometers in 3 years and recovered 5 children! He said he wanted to find his son, but also everyone's children! Spread help Jiangxi father Xiao Chaohua! http://t.cn/R2jRxI4

chinese_text: 【中产阶级最新十大标准出炉 看看你符合几个[doge]】日前有报道称，中国中产阶级人数超两亿。到底什么样算中产？①月收入4.5万②有豪车洋房 ③要有百万级的流动资产 ④有较高的社会地位，良好的教育背景 ⑤有良好的穿衣品味……不说了，小编先哭一会。[伤心] 戳图↓↓ 有信心的小伙伴数数你符合几个？
text: [The latest ten criteria for the middle class are released to see how many [doge] you meet] It was recently reported that the number of China's middle class exceeds 200 million. What exactly is considered middle class? ① A monthly income of 45,000 ② A luxury car and a house ③ A million-level liquid assets ④ A high social status and a good educational background ⑤ A good dressing sense... I won’t go into details, the editor will cry for a while . [Sad] Click on the picture ↓↓ Confident friends, count how many do you match?

chinese_text: 【杭州1土豪花120万买3万斤大闸蟹 运到钱塘江放生】近日，传言有神秘萧山男子，到市场购买大闸蟹，每次都买上万斤，当面现金结清，然后装车运走，倒入钱塘江放生。来采购的时间也有讲究，得是适合放生的日子，隔两三天就会采购一次。记者求证确有此事，3万斤大闸蟹用于放生。http://t.cn/RUmw0KO
text: [A local tycoon in Hangzhou spent 1.2 million yuan to buy 30,000 kilograms of hairy crabs and shipped them to the Qiantang River for release] Recently, it was rumored that a mysterious Xiaoshan man went to the market to buy hairy crabs. Each time he bought tens of thousands of kilograms of hairy crabs, paid in cash in person, and then loaded them into a truck and transported them away. Pour it into the Qiantang River and release it. The time for purchasing is also important. It must be a day suitable for releasing wild animals. The purchase will be done every two or three days. The reporter verified that this was indeed the case, and 30,000 kilograms of hairy crabs were used for release. http://t.cn/RUmw0KO

chinese_text: #万象#【沈阳科普公园变儿童足球公园 立国足铜像】辽宁省沈阳市一处科普公园改成儿童足球公园，场地内加入四块人造草球场。同时，2002年打进世界杯的国足阵容铜像也矗立在公园内，包括李铁，吴承瑛，李霄鹏等，部分雕塑破损严重。http://t.cn/RUmwOIy
text: #万搏# [Shenyang Popular Science Park turned into a children’s football park with a bronze statue of the national football team] A popular science park in Shenyang City, Liaoning Province was transformed into a children’s football park, and four artificial turf fields were added to the site. At the same time, bronze statues of the national football team that reached the World Cup in 2002 also stand in the park, including Li Tie, Wu Chengying, Li Xiaopeng, etc. Some of the sculptures were seriously damaged. http://t.cn/RUmwOIy

chinese_text: 【[话筒] #2016年春运购票日历#来啦！】距离2016年春运开始还有两个多月，但按照提前60天售票的规定，也就是说，从11月26日起，大家就可以购买2016年1月24日，即春运第一天的车票了。今年过年回家不？快转给小伙伴们，有用！[xkl转圈](央视记者郑连凯)
text: [[Microphone] #2016 Spring Festival Ticket Purchase Calendar# is here! 】There are still more than two months before the start of the 2016 Spring Festival, but according to the 60-day advance ticket sales rule, that is to say, from November 26, everyone can purchase tickets for January 24, 2016, the first day of the Spring Festival. Got the ticket. Will you go home for the New Year this year? Please forward it to your friends, it’s useful! [xkl circle](CCTV reporter Zheng Liankai)

chinese_text: 【能电鱼，更能电力找鱼：别以为电鳗只有把鱼电晕一招！】电鳗2米长的身体里有许多专门发电的细胞，能产生600伏电击，足以电倒一个人。以为电鳗就这么点本事？最新研究发现：它还能把猎物从藏身之处电出来，甚至能靠放电追踪猎物。http://t.cn/RUnzfKG 但像超凡蜘蛛侠那样电出超能力是不行的[微笑]
text: [It can electrocute fish, and it can also find fish with electricity: Don’t think that electric eels can only stun fish! 】The electric eel's 2-meter-long body has many cells specialized in generating electricity, which can produce a 600-volt electric shock, enough to shock a person. Do you think that’s all electric eels are capable of? The latest research has found that it can also electrocute prey from hiding places and even track prey with electric discharges. http://t.cn/RUnzfKG But it’s not possible to use electricity like The Amazing Spider-Man [smile]

chinese_text: 【治愈都市病，这个城市最有发言权】你是否厌倦了钢筋混凝土的写字楼，得了各种“都市病”，失眠、焦虑、暴躁……周刊君推荐你来北临长江、南近太湖的治愈小城张家港。在这里褪去喧嚣，休憩身心，你会体味到生活应有的质感[微风]http://t.cn/RUmAIey
text: [Cure urban diseases, this city has the most say] Are you tired of reinforced concrete office buildings, and suffer from various "urban diseases", such as insomnia, anxiety, and irritability... The magazine recommends you to come to this city for cure, which is located near the Yangtze River in the north and Taihu Lake in the south. The small town of Zhangjiagang. Get away from the hustle and bustle here, rest your body and mind, and you will appreciate the quality of life [Breeze] http://t.cn/RUmAIey

chinese_text: #那一天#【徐志摩：毕生行径都是诗，随遇自有乐土】有人说他是柳三变和纳兰性德转世，有人说他是近现代诗坛的第一位“男神”。他就是徐志摩，1931年的今天，徐志摩因飞机失事罹难，时年36岁。他轻轻地走了，但他的文字却一直重重敲击着我们的内心。他的诗，你能背诵几首？戳图重温。[微风]
text: #thatday# [Xu Zhimo: All his life is poetry, and he will find his own paradise wherever he goes] Some people say that he is the reincarnation of Liu Sanbian and Nalan Xingde, and some people say that he is the first "male god" in modern poetry. He was Xu Zhimo. On this day in 1931, Xu Zhimo died in a plane crash at the age of 36. He left quietly, but his words continue to hit our hearts hard. How many of his poems can you recite? Click on the picture to review. [breeze]

chinese_text: #下午茶#有一件事情，我想要跟你说，你从遥远的南方带给我的茶花，在一个晴朗的春日里开了。——陈升《航班116》图 | Anna Remarchuk
text: #afternoontea# There is one thing I want to tell you. The camellia you brought me from the far south bloomed on a sunny spring day. ——Picture of "Flight 116" by Chen Sheng | Anna Remarchuk

chinese_text: 【餐饮“奇葩”沙县小吃：一个县的全国生意】沙县小吃的店铺规模是肯德基的五倍。沙县人外出做小吃后，沙县也发生着变化：动车通到了沙县，飞机场也将要建成，县城的物价赶上了省城，房子最高盖到了30层，做小吃的人买下了县城70%的房子。http://t.cn/RUnDp0s
text: [Catering "Weird" Shaxian Snacks: A national business in one county] The store size of Shaxian Snacks is five times that of KFC. After Shaxian people went out to make snacks, Shaxian County also changed: high-speed trains were connected to Shaxian, an airport was about to be built, prices in the county had caught up with the provincial capital, houses were built up to 30 stories, and people who made snacks bought 70% of the county. House of. http://t.cn/RUnDp0s

chinese_text: 【当“公共服务”遇上“互联网+”：李克强“新药方”治“懒政”】18日的国务院常务会议上，李克强再治“懒政”，新增了依托“互联网+”的表述：一是加快推进涉及公共服务事项的信息共享；二是依托“互联网+”，促进办事部门衔接，从源头避免“循环证明”。 http://t.cn/RUm2aTN
text: [When "Public Services" Meets "Internet +": Li Keqiang's "New Prescription" to Treat "Lazy Government"] At the State Council executive meeting on the 18th, Li Keqiang once again treated "lazy government" and added the expression of relying on "Internet +" : The first is to accelerate the sharing of information involving public service matters; the second is to rely on "Internet +" to promote the connection of service departments and avoid "circular certification" from the source. http://t.cn/RUm2aTN

chinese_text: #微感动#【我是警察，有事冲我来！】5月1日加班时接报称有男子持枪伤人，身为派出所副所长的他立刻出警。见嫌疑人枪指老人，他大吼“我是警察！有事冲我来”。搏斗中歹徒开枪，他中弹倒下时仍保持抓捕姿势。14日，36岁的他伤重去世。用生命守护平安，转起送黑龙江警察陈首杰！http://t.cn/R2hrY6Z
text: #微touch# [I am a policeman, come to me if you have any problems! ] On May 1, while working overtime, he received a report that a man armed with a gun had injured someone. As the deputy director of the police station, he immediately dispatched the police. Seeing the suspect pointing a gun at the old man, he yelled, "I'm a policeman! Come to me if you have anything to do." During the struggle, the gangsters opened fire, and he remained in a arresting position when he fell down after being shot. On the 14th, the 36-year-old died of serious injuries. Use your life to protect safety and send it to Heilongjiang policeman Chen Shoujie! http://t.cn/R2hrY6Z

chinese_text: 【最任性村主任！给独子大办婚宴上报未获批后辞职】“哪怕村主任不当，也要把儿子婚礼搞起来。”陕西城固县莲花街办杜家槽村村主任马某，为给独子办婚礼，向纪委报备酒席数量未获通过后辞职。婚礼当天，路两边停满了车,还专设婚礼停车场,其中不乏陆虎、宝马等高档车。婚宴超40桌，抽中华烟。你怎么看？
text: [The most willful village director! Resigned after reporting a grand wedding banquet for his only son but failed to get approval] "Even if the village director is inappropriate, he still has to organize his son's wedding." Ma Mou, director of Dujiacao Village, Lianhua Subdistrict Office, Chenggu County, Shaanxi Province, asked him to organize a wedding for his only son. He resigned after the Discipline Inspection Commission failed to approve the number of banquets reported. On the day of the wedding, cars were parked on both sides of the road. There was also a parking lot specially set up for the wedding, including many high-end cars such as Land Rover and BMW. There were over 40 tables at the wedding banquet, and they smoked Chinese cigarettes. What do you think?

chinese_text: 【北京地铁新线开通！昌平新城到市中心只需40分钟】今年年底，北京地铁14号线中段和昌平线二期等2条轨道新线将投入试运营。①14号线中段开通即实现东段和中段贯通运营，将连接大望路商业圈及北京南站；②昌平线二期开通后，昌平新城居民进入市中心区只需40分钟。出行新路线，扩散周知！(央视记者郭津)
text: [Beijing subway new line opened! It only takes 40 minutes from Changping New Town to the city center] By the end of this year, two new rail lines, including the middle section of Beijing Subway Line 14 and the second phase of the Changping Line, will be put into trial operation. ① The opening of the middle section of Line 14 will realize the operation of the eastern and middle sections, which will connect the Dawang Road business circle and Beijing South Railway Station; ② After the opening of the second phase of the Changping Line, it will only take 40 minutes for residents of Changping New City to enter the city center. Spread the word about new travel routes! (CCTV reporter Guo Jin)

chinese_text: 【不会这些，千万别说你熟练掌握办公软件[酷]】Excel中的常用公式，非常实用和经典，你会用吗？get√
text: [If you don’t know these, don’t say you are proficient in office software [cool]] Commonly used formulas in Excel are very practical and classic. Can you use them? get√

chinese_text: 【[话筒]央视新闻发布微博，称“死者情绪稳定”？谣言！】今天，网上流传@央视新闻 在发布“李克强就我国公民被恐怖组织杀害事件发表讲话”的微博时，出现“死者情绪稳定”的言论。对此，央视新闻发表声明称截图系伪造，并称对该恶意炒作行为“保留追究法律责任的权利。”↓↓转发，传递真相！
text: [[Microphone] CCTV News posted on Weibo, saying that "the deceased was emotionally stable"? rumor! 】Today, it was circulated on the Internet that when @CCTV News posted on Weibo "Li Keqiang gave a speech on the killing of Chinese citizens by terrorist organizations", there was a statement that "the deceased was emotionally stable". In response, CCTV News issued a statement saying that the screenshots were forged, and that it "reserves the right to pursue legal responsibility for the malicious hype." ↓↓Repost to convey the truth!

chinese_text: 【女教师命令学生自己打脸100下 必须高抬重落】近日，山东临沂某小学一年级老师，竟下令要求全班同学打自己嘴巴100下，而且必须高高抬起，重重落下。有家长说老师当时心情不好，也有家长说当时自习课秩序不好。保安证实确有此事，校长称当事老师一时糊涂，现已调离。http://t.cn/RUmw71l
text: [Female teacher orders students to slap themselves in the face 100 times and have to lift them up and drop them down] Recently, a first-grade teacher in a primary school in Linyi, Shandong Province ordered the entire class to slap her in the mouth 100 times, and they have to lift them up and drop them down hard. Some parents said that the teacher was in a bad mood at the time, while others said that the order of the self-study class was not good at that time. The security guard confirmed that this was indeed the case, and the principal said that the teacher involved was temporarily confused and has been transferred. http://t.cn/RUmw71l

chinese_text: #天下#【IS再行动 发视频威胁袭击纽约】极端恐怖组织“伊斯兰国”18日发布视频威胁称，将袭击纽约。纽约时报广场、中央公园等均是其恐吓目标。纽约警察部门表示，该视频中一些镜头并不是新的，但出于谨慎考虑，已经部署了额外的反恐小组成员，将保持高度警惕状态。http://t.cn/RUmLBuW
text: #天下# [IS again releases video threatening to attack New York] The extremist terrorist organization "Islamic State" released a video threatening to attack New York on the 18th. Times Square and Central Park in New York are all targets of intimidation. The New York Police Department said some of the footage in the video was not new, but out of an abundance of caution, additional counterterrorism team members have been deployed and will remain on high alert. http://t.cn/RUmLBuW

chinese_text: 【男子做骨折手术 费用清单竟出现子宫切除等4项[吃惊]】日前，黑龙江59岁男子云少君到省医院做骨折手术。令人吃惊的是，医院提供的费用清单中竟有“子宫切除”、“输卵管切除术”等4项女性手术，费用也比此前医生告知的高出一万多。医生重新打印抹去这4项，另有13项费用也莫名消失。你怎么看？[疑问]
text: [The list of expenses for a man’s fracture surgery included four items including hysterectomy [surprise]] A few days ago, a 59-year-old man from Heilongjiang, Yun Shaojun, went to the provincial hospital for a fracture surgery. Surprisingly, the cost list provided by the hospital actually included four female surgeries including "hysterectomy" and "fallopian tube resection", and the cost was more than 10,000 yuan higher than what the doctor had previously informed. The doctor reprinted and erased these 4 items, and another 13 items also disappeared inexplicably. What do you think? [doubt]

chinese_text: 【猴年马月来了！就在明年[嘻嘻]】根据节气历，猴年12年一个轮回，马月也是12个月一个轮回，“猴年马月”的周期是12年。明年，即2016年6月5日（芒种）至7月3日（小暑前夕），就是传说中的“猴年马月”！网友：感觉很多等了很久的事，就要有结果了……[哈哈]
text: [The Year of the Monkey and the Horse Moon are here! Just next year [heehee]] According to the solar calendar, the Year of the Monkey is reincarnated in 12 years, and the Month of the Horse is also reincarnated in 12 months. The cycle of the "Horse Month in the Year of the Monkey" is 12 years. Next year, that is, from June 5 (Earn Chong) to July 3 (Slight Summer Eve), 2016, it will be the legendary "Monkey Year and Horse Moon"! Netizen: I feel like many things I have been waiting for for a long time will come to fruition... [Haha]

chinese_text: 【不需要雄性 科学家用两颗卵子产健康幼鼠】中国科学院上海生命科学研究院李劲松教授率领团队进行研究，修改了卵生胚胎干细胞的基因，让这些细胞具备精子的功能，之后将这些细胞注入卵子，由此产生的一批小老鼠就有两名基因母亲。李劲松说：“整个过程都无须雄性参与。”http://t.cn/RUmUndZ
text: [It is not necessary for male scientists to use two eggs to produce healthy pups] Professor Li Jinsong from the Shanghai Institutes for Biological Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences, led a team to conduct research and modified the genes of oocyte-laying embryonic stem cells so that these cells have the function of sperm, and then injected these cells into the eggs. , the resulting batch of baby mice had two genetic mothers. Li Jinsong said: "The whole process does not require male participation." http://t.cn/RUmUndZ

chinese_text: #今日世界厕所日#【这些“如厕”行为 困扰过你吗？】在公共厕所①不在便池内大小便；②上完厕所不冲；③顺手拿走洗手液、厕纸；④浪费厕纸，上海市某公厕监测发现，人均耗卷筒纸1.6米……厕所虽小，却反映文明尺度，你还被哪些不文明“如厕”行为困扰过？（央视记者高伟强 王殿甲）
text: #TodayWorldToiletDay# [Have these “toilet” behaviors ever bothered you? 】In public toilets, ① do not defecate in the toilet; ② do not flush the toilet after using the toilet; ③ take away hand sanitizer and toilet paper; ④ waste toilet paper. Monitoring of a public toilet in Shanghai found that the average per capita consumption of roll paper is 1.6 meters... Toilet Although small, it reflects civilized standards. What other uncivilized "toilet" behaviors have you been troubled by? (CCTV reporter Gao Weiqiang and Wang Dianjia)

chinese_text: 【当心！间谍不只出现在电视剧里】10月，一名专门刺探军事情报的间谍于吉林省长白县被抓获，口袋中藏有一张手绘的我军边境一线兵力分布图[吃惊]伪装成游客、在进口的设备中植入木马……间谍情报机关活动其实很猖獗！维护国家安全人人有责，应多像朝阳区群众学习啊[酷]http://t.cn/RUm424B
text: 【Watch out! Spies don’t just appear in TV dramas] In October, a spy who specializes in spying on military intelligence was captured in Changbai County, Jilin Province. He had a hand-drawn map of the distribution of frontline troops on the border of our army hidden in his pocket [Surprise] Disguised as a tourist, he was in the imported Trojans are implanted in the equipment...The activities of spy agencies are actually rampant! Everyone has the responsibility to maintain national security, and we should learn from the people in Chaoyang District [Cool] http://t.cn/RUm424B

chinese_text: 对于生活的思考，从困惑到迷茫，多少纠缠也都是枉然，有的时候不是被生活所伤，而是伤在了自己的拖延和懒惰，岁月匆匆，每个人都在寻找和这个世界相处的方式，领悟这世界对于生命所有的启示，生活从来也没有为某个人特别设计，所以生活也从来不允许谁那么任性的挑三拣四。
text: Thinking about life, from confusion to confusion, no matter how much entanglement is in vain, sometimes it is not hurt by life, but hurt by one's own procrastination and laziness. Time flies by, and everyone is looking for ways to get along with the world. Ways to understand all the revelations this world has on life. Life has never been specially designed for anyone, so life has never allowed anyone to be so willful and picky.

chinese_text: 关于距离，最让人怕的，就是不确定对方是惦记你，还是把你给忘记。
text: Regarding distance, the most terrifying thing is that you are not sure whether the other person is thinking about you or has forgotten you.

chinese_text: #大头条#【最高法：夫妻一方出轨另一方可索赔】昨天，最高人民法院通报了30起涉“家事”典型案例，其中夫妻离婚时一方有出轨行为，另一方申请精神损害赔偿获法院支持。法院认为，对婚姻不忠是难以容忍的不诚信，不仅破坏夫妻关系，拆散家庭，也伤及无辜的子女，且败坏了社会风气，是法律所禁止的行为。
text: #大头头# [Supreme Law: If one spouse cheats, the other can claim compensation] Yesterday, the Supreme People's Court reported 30 typical cases involving "family affairs". Among them, one spouse cheated when they divorced, and the other spouse's application for mental damage compensation was supported by the court. . The court held that marital infidelity is intolerable dishonesty. It not only destroys the relationship between husband and wife, breaks up the family, but also harms innocent children and corrupts social morals. It is an act prohibited by law.

chinese_text: 【真烧钱！上千亿残损人民币被焚烧发电】新版100元纸币已正式发行，你有没有想过，残破的旧人民币都去哪儿了？位于江苏盐城的江苏国信盐城生物质发电有限公司焚烧炉，是目前江苏残破人民币的“终点”，它们在这里变废为宝，焚烧转化为电能。（图/视觉中国）http://t.cn/RUmpBuP你想对它们说__？[钱]
text: 【What a waste of money! Hundreds of billions of damaged RMB were burned to generate electricity] The new version of 100 yuan banknotes has been officially issued. Have you ever thought about where all the old and damaged RMB went? The incinerator of Jiangsu Guoxin Yancheng Biomass Power Generation Co., Ltd. located in Yancheng, Jiangsu Province is currently the "end point" for Jiangsu's broken yuan. They turn waste into treasure here and incinerate it into electricity. (Photo/Visual China) http://t.cn/RUmpBuP Do you want to say __ to them? [money]

chinese_text: 【最新消息：#我国平均26岁结婚# 现在90后已算晚婚！】中国妇联发起的“调查报告”指出，我国平均26岁结婚，90%的女性在30岁前结婚。你被催婚了吗？其实，幸福婚姻并不在何时结婚，调查显示，忠诚、体贴才是幸福的基石，仅剩6周，2015就结束了，新一年，祝大家找到幸福！为爱转发！[心](央视记者谭臻)
text: [Latest news: #国产 Average age is 26 years old# Now, people born in the 1990s are already marrying late! 】The "Survey Report" initiated by the China Women's Federation pointed out that the average age of marriage in our country is 26, and 90% of women get married before the age of 30. Are you being urged to get married? In fact, a happy marriage does not depend on when you get married. Surveys show that loyalty and thoughtfulness are the cornerstones of happiness. With only 6 weeks left, 2015 is over. In the new year, I wish you all find happiness! Repost for love! [Heart](CCTV reporter Tan Zhen)

chinese_text: 【这就是爱[心]八旬老人照顾瘫痪老伴56年】新婚5个月，20岁的妻子患病瘫痪在床，失去生育能力。别人劝他离婚，别耽误自己，他却对妻子说：“你放心，我会一辈子疼你。”如今，山东临沂84岁的杜元法已照顾妻子周玉爱56年，她从没生过褥疮，屋子也没有异味。就这样，他们一直不离不弃，相濡以沫。[赞]
text: [This is love [heart] An 80-year-old man has taken care of his paralyzed wife for 56 years] Five months after the wedding, his 20-year-old wife fell ill and was paralyzed in bed, losing her fertility. Others advised him to divorce and not to delay himself, but he said to his wife: "Don't worry, I will love you all my life." Now, 84-year-old Du Yuanfa from Linyi, Shandong Province has taken care of his wife Zhou Yuai for 56 years. She has never had bedsores. There is no smell in the house either. In this way, they have never left each other and supported each other. [Thumbs up]

chinese_text: #城管的一天#【正播报全国5市城管执法】城管，一个充斥着争议和多色彩的职业。在被质疑同时，很多城管队员也认为自己遭到误解。为让大家真实了解这一职业，新浪直播间联合珠海、温州、南通、武汉、嘉兴城管部门，全程跟踪执法，真实呈现城管的一天，戳链接：http://t.cn/RUmApi6
text: #城官的DAY# [Reporting on urban management law enforcement in 5 cities across the country] Urban management is a profession full of controversy and color. While being questioned, many urban management team members also believed that they had been misunderstood. In order to let everyone truly understand this profession, Sina Live Room has teamed up with the urban management departments of Zhuhai, Wenzhou, Nantong, Wuhan, and Jiaxing to track law enforcement throughout the process and truly present a day in the life of urban management. Click the link: http://t.cn/RUmApi6

chinese_text: 【离婚后该不该退彩礼？最高法给了说法】彩礼为结婚而给付，离婚了就应返还吗？根据最高人民法院《婚姻法》解释（二）中的规定，法院支持返还彩礼有三种情况：①双方未办理结婚登记手续的；②双方办理结婚登记手续但确未共同生活的；③婚前给付并导致给付人生活困难的。http://t.cn/RUm21FF
text: [Should I return the bride price after divorce? The Supreme Court gave an explanation] If the bride price is paid for marriage, should it be returned after divorce? According to the provisions of Interpretation (2) of the Supreme People's Court's "Marriage Law", there are three situations in which the court supports the return of bride price: ① Both parties have not completed the marriage registration procedures; ② Both parties have completed the marriage registration procedures but have not lived together; ③ Pre-marital payments have resulted in The payer's life is difficult. http://t.cn/RUm21FF

chinese_text: 【儿子拔掉呼吸管后母亲死亡 涉故意杀人被调查】10月31日眉山城区，朱素芬发生交通事故，被送到重症监护室抢救。11月2日，其子郑某等家属在探视时拔掉朱素芬的呼吸管，并阻止医护人员抢救。从法律上讲，郑某等人的做法涉嫌故意杀人罪，郑某表示：“确实是没有办法了”你怎么看？http://t.cn/RUmKopm
text: [The mother’s death after her son had his breathing tube removed was investigated as intentional homicide] On October 31, Zhu Sufen was involved in a traffic accident in Meishan City and was sent to the intensive care unit for rescue. On November 2, his son Zheng and other family members removed Zhu Sufen's breathing tube during a visit and prevented medical staff from rescuing her. Legally speaking, what Zheng and others did was suspected of intentional homicide. Zheng said: "There is really no other way." What do you think? http://t.cn/RUmKopm

chinese_text: 【雪要来了！这么小的东西，竟然这么美[雪]】中央气象台今早预报，未来3天，华北大部、内蒙古中部等地将出现持续性降雪天气，并且雪会越下越大，局地积雪可达15厘米！戳图，摄影师拍摄的雪花，据说“世界上没有完全相同的两片雪花”，大自然真是神奇。转发，分享雪花之美！

text: [Revealed that CCTV’s famous sports host Duan Xuan is about to leave his job] Some media reported that CCTV’s well-known sports host Duan Xuan has recently submitted a resignation application to Taiwan. chinese_text: 【离婚后该不该退彩礼？最高法给了说法】彩礼为结婚而给付，离婚了就应返还吗？根据最高人民法院《婚姻法》解释（二）中的规定，法院支持返还彩礼有三种情况：①双方未办理结婚登记手续的；②双方办理结婚登记手续但确未共同生活的；③婚前给付并导致给付人生活困难的。
text: [Should I return the bride price after divorce? The Supreme Court gave an explanation] If the bride price is paid for marriage, should it be returned after divorce? According to the provisions of Interpretation (2) of the Supreme People's Court's "Marriage Law", there are three situations in which the court supports the return of bride price: ① Both parties have not completed the marriage registration procedures; ② Both parties have completed the marriage registration procedures but have not lived together; ③ Pre-marital payments have resulted in The payer's life is difficult.

chinese_text: 【心梗救命神器AED，你不可不知！】心梗已成国民健康头号杀手，不及时救治是其死亡率奇高的主要原因。AED作为心梗救命神器，又称心脏除颤器，在患者心跳停止1分钟内做AED加心肺复苏术，心脏恢复率高达九成。什么情况需使用AED？如何使用？戳图了解↓心梗救治日，普及心脏除颤知识，转发扩散！
text: [AED, a life-saving tool for heart attack, you must know! 】Myocardial infarction has become the number one killer of national health, and lack of timely treatment is the main reason for its extremely high mortality rate. AED is a life-saving tool for myocardial infarction, also known as cardiac defibrillator. AED plus cardiopulmonary resuscitation is performed within 1 minute of the patient's heart stopping, and the heart recovery rate is as high as 90%. When should an AED be used? how to use? Click on the picture to learn about ↓Myocardial Infarction Treatment Day, popularize the knowledge of cardiac defibrillation, and forward it to spread the news!

chinese_text: #快讯#【伦敦警方引爆地铁站附近可疑车辆】据《联合早报》20日报道，伦敦地铁站附近发生爆炸，有民众称在贝克街听到巨大的爆炸声，许多乘客在高峰时间被疏散。警方证实，因为在靠近伦敦贝克街地铁站附近有一辆可疑汽车被遗留在那里，因此警方将它引爆。目前英警方并没有针对被引爆的车辆公开更多详情。
text: #express# [London police detonated suspicious vehicles near subway stations] According to the "Lianhe Zaobao" report on the 20th, an explosion occurred near a London subway station. Some people said they heard a huge explosion on Baker Street, and many passengers were evacuated during rush hour. Police confirmed a suspicious car was detonated after it was left near London's Baker Street Underground station. At present, the British police have not released any further details about the vehicle that was detonated.

chinese_text: 事实告诉我们：钱什么的，说白了都是纸[笑cry]对此你想说______________
text: Facts tell us: Money, to put it bluntly, is just paper [laughing and crying] What do you want to say about this ______________

chinese_text: #拍案#【儿子拔掉重病母亲呼吸管致其死亡】四川眉山女子朱素芬，因车祸重伤，躺在重症监护室里，插呼吸管维系生命。朱素芬孩子前来探视时，却趁机拔掉她身上的呼吸管，甚至阻止医护人员抢救。不久后朱素芬离世，两个子女等多名家属涉嫌故意杀人罪，被采取强制措施。http://t.cn/RUmKllw
text: #热盈# [The son pulled out the breathing tube of his seriously ill mother, causing her death] Zhu Sufen, a woman from Meishan, Sichuan, was seriously injured in a car accident and was lying in the intensive care unit with a breathing tube inserted to maintain her life. When Zhu Sufen's child came to visit, he took the opportunity to remove her breathing tube and even prevented medical staff from rescuing her. Soon after Zhu Sufen passed away, her two children and many other family members were suspected of intentional homicide and compulsory measures were taken. http://t.cn/RUmKllw

chinese_text: #看了就“知道”#【为什么我们难以满意自己的身材？】“以瘦为美”在时尚界的推动下流行起来，减肥成为许多人每天挂在嘴边的“日常任务”。然而，对于大多数女性而言，如果要达到瘦成纸片人的目标，保证正常的饮食几乎是不可能的，许多人还因为节食而患上了厌食症。http://t.cn/RUEFOSX
text: #看就是“know”# [Why are we so difficult to be satisfied with our bodies? 】"Thinness is beauty" has become popular driven by the fashion industry, and losing weight has become a "daily task" that many people talk about every day. However, for most women, it is almost impossible to maintain a normal diet if they want to achieve the goal of losing weight. Many people also suffer from anorexia due to dieting. http://t.cn/RUEFOSX

chinese_text: 【悲剧！探视时，儿子拔掉了重病母亲的呼吸管…】10月31日，眉山市的朱素芬因交通事故受重伤，送入重症监护室抢救。11月2日，朱素芬儿子郑某某去医院探视时，拔掉了母亲的呼吸管，母亲不久后去世。警方因涉嫌故意杀人对郑某某采取强制措施，儿子说自己负债累累，"确实是没有办法了。"[伤心](成都商报)
text: 【tragedy! During the visit, the son pulled out the breathing tube of his seriously ill mother...] On October 31, Zhu Sufen from Meishan City was seriously injured in a traffic accident and was sent to the intensive care unit for rescue. On November 2, when Zhu Sufen's son Zheng Moumou went to the hospital to visit, he pulled out his mother's breathing tube, and her mother died soon after. The police took coercive measures against Zheng Moumou on suspicion of intentional homicide. His son said that he was heavily in debt. "There is really no other way." [Sad] (Chengdu Business News)

chinese_text: #微感动#【夫妇被压车底 40余市民抬车 医生钻车底救人 】昨天在成都，公交车与电瓶车相撞，骑电瓶车夫妻被卷车底。因车身过重，在场群众一起抬车救命。医生冒死钻进车底，徒手扯断伤者勾扯衣物。护士跪在担架上进行心肺复苏，伤者心脏停跳10分钟后终于恢复。目前，伤者仍在治疗。http://t.cn/RUmWEfV
text: #微touch# [The couple was crushed under the car. More than 40 citizens carried the bus and doctors got under the car to save people] Yesterday in Chengdu, a bus collided with a battery-powered scooter, and a couple riding a battery-powered scooter was rolled under the bus. Because the car was too heavy, people present worked together to lift the car to save lives. The doctor risked his life by getting under the car and tearing off the injured man's clothes with his bare hands. The nurse knelt on the stretcher to perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation, and the injured patient finally recovered after his heart stopped beating for 10 minutes. Currently, the injured are still being treated. http://t.cn/RUmWEfV

chinese_text: 爱知县的一家叫做「暖家ダイニング」的居酒屋推出的胶原蛋白火锅，又被称为龙珠火锅，当然要点满七颗龙珠然后许个愿啦！[doge]
text: An izakaya in Aichi Prefecture called "Nuke Nono" offers collagen hot pot, also known as Dragon Ball Hot Pot. Of course, you have to order all seven Dragon Balls and make a wish! [doge]

chinese_text: 【新疆打掉暴恐团伙歼灭28人】新疆警方披露，经过56天连续顽强作战，新疆打掉一境外极端组织直接指挥的暴恐团伙，除1人投降自首外，其余28名暴徒被全部歼灭。详见：http://t.cn/RUmjycm
text: [Xinjiang dismantled violent terrorist gang and annihilated 28 people] Xinjiang police disclosed that after 56 days of continuous tenacious fighting, Xinjiang dismantled a violent terrorist group directly commanded by an overseas extremist organization. Except for one person who surrendered and surrendered, the remaining 28 thugs were all annihilated. . For details, see: http://t.cn/RUmjycm

chinese_text: 【马来西亚各界期待李克强来访】对于李克强总理任内首次到访，马各界表现出高度期待。马来西亚国际贸易及工业部副部长李志亮称，此访必将促进中马两国经贸关系迈上新的台阶。马来西亚汉文化中心主席吴恒灿说，此访将巩固两国全面性战略合作伙伴关系，并把两国人民友谊与合作提至“历史新高”。
text: [All walks of life in Malaysia look forward to Li Keqiang’s visit] All walks of life in Malaysia have expressed high expectations for Prime Minister Li Keqiang’s first visit during his tenure. Li Zhiliang, Deputy Minister of International Trade and Industry of Malaysia, said that this visit will definitely promote the economic and trade relations between China and Malaysia to a new level. Goh Heng Chan, chairman of the Malaysian Chinese Cultural Center, said that this visit will consolidate the comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership between the two countries and raise the friendship and cooperation between the two peoples to "a new historical high."

chinese_text: 【全国最大“地下钱庄”案：数千亿人民币转移境外[汗]】义乌商人赵某在香港注册了数十家空壳公司,跨境转移人民币数千亿元。若将130余万次银行交易记录打印出来,要耗费35000张纸,堆起来有3米高。[吃惊]地下钱庄严重威胁国家安全,这是迄今为止中国警方查获涉案人数最多,涉案金额最大的非法买卖外汇案件。
text: [The largest "underground bank" case in the country: hundreds of billions of RMB transferred overseas [Khan]] Yiwu businessman Zhao registered dozens of shell companies in Hong Kong and transferred hundreds of billions of RMB across the border. If more than 1.3 million bank transaction records were printed out, 35,000 pieces of paper would be consumed, and the pile would be 3 meters high. [Surprise] Underground banks are a serious threat to national security. This is the illegal foreign exchange trading case that the Chinese police have investigated with the largest number of people involved and the largest amount of money so far.

chinese_text: 【四川吸毒男手提双刀挑战特警】近日四川彭山街头出现一男子裸露上身，双手提刀，路人和车辆都不敢靠近，男子半径3米左右空无一人。公安局特巡警快速出击，成功处置，挡获嫌疑人员1名，收缴砍骨刀两把。处置过程中无群众民警受伤。经尿检，该男子尿液呈阳性，涉嫌吸食毒品。http://t.cn/RUmjDVk
text: [Sichuan drug addict man challenges special police with two hand-held knives] Recently, a topless man appeared on the streets of Pengshan, Sichuan, holding knives in both hands. Passers-by and vehicles did not dare to approach, and there was no one within a radius of about 3 meters around the man. The special patrol officers of the Public Security Bureau quickly attacked and successfully dealt with the incident, intercepting one suspect and confiscating two bone chopping knives. No police officers were injured during the handling process. A urine test showed that the man's urine was positive and he was suspected of taking drugs. http://t.cn/RUmjDVk

chinese_text: 电鳗跟鳗鱼完全没关系，它是一种长刀鱼，跟鲤鱼和鲶鱼的亲缘关系比较近。（日本鳗鱼欧洲鳗鱼都让你们吃成濒危极危了，还吃吃吃→_→http://t.cn/RyZ4ZZ0
text: The electric eel has nothing to do with eels. It is a swordfish that is closely related to carp and catfish. (Japanese eels and European eels have been eaten by you until they are extremely endangered, but you still eat them→_→http://t.cn/RyZ4ZZ0

chinese_text: #微镜头#【初冬时节，一起来赏银杏吧[拍照]】银杏叶从树枝上纷纷扬扬飘落下来，如同金灿灿的地毯覆盖了地面…云南腾冲银杏村，每年10月下旬起进入银杏最佳观赏期，被银杏树围绕着的村子，就如童话中金色的城堡，美得令人心醉！点图，找时间，约上小伙伴一起来享受这金色之美吧！（央视记者陈政）
text: #Microlens# [In early winter, let’s enjoy the ginkgo together [take photos]] Ginkgo leaves are falling from the branches, like a golden carpet covering the ground... In Ginkgo Village, Tengchong, Yunnan, the best viewing period for ginkgo begins in late October every year. , the village surrounded by ginkgo trees is like a golden castle in a fairy tale, so beautiful that it’s so enchanting! Click on the picture, find time, and invite your friends to enjoy this golden beauty together! (CCTV reporter Chen Zheng)

chinese_text: 【真烧钱！上千亿残损人民币被焚烧发电】新版100元纸币已正式发行，不少市民在拿到新版“土豪金”时，也有一个疑问：残破的旧人民币都去了哪儿？位于江苏盐城的江苏国信盐城生物质发电有限公司焚烧炉，是目前江苏那些残破人民币的“终点”，它们在这里变废为宝，焚烧转化为电能。http://t.cn/RUmNkUz
text: 【What a waste of money! Hundreds of billions of damaged RMB burned to generate electricity] The new version of 100 yuan banknotes has been officially issued. When many citizens received the new version of "local tycoon gold", they also had a question: Where did the old and damaged RMB go? The incinerator of Jiangsu Guoxin Yancheng Biomass Power Generation Co., Ltd. located in Yancheng, Jiangsu Province is the "end point" for the broken RMB in Jiangsu. Here they turn waste into treasure and incinerate it into electricity. http://t.cn/RUmNkUz

chinese_text: #我国平均26岁结婚#【婚前条件有车有房仅占15.3%】调查报告指出，纵观受访者的各年龄阶层，在结婚前有房有车这一点要求，比例仅占15.3%。而91.6%的受访者表示自己步入婚姻时，更看中的是有责任感的人，同时，善于控制情绪和化解冲突的情商也很重要。结婚，你会要求有车有房吗？
text: #国产 Average 26 years old to get married# [Only 15.3% of people have a car and a house as a pre-marriage requirement] The survey report pointed out that, looking at all age groups of the respondents, only 15.3% of them had a house and a car before marriage. 91.6% of the respondents said that when they enter marriage, they prefer a responsible person. At the same time, emotional intelligence that is good at controlling emotions and resolving conflicts is also very important. When you get married, will you ask for a car and a house?

chinese_text: 【最高法:伴侣出轨可索精神赔偿】京华时报讯 昨天，最高人民法院通报了30起涉“家事”典型案例，其中，夫妻离婚时一方有出轨行为，另一方申请精神损害赔偿获法院支持。http://t.cn/RUmTyNc我发起了一个投票 【伴侣出轨可索精神赔偿，你怎么看？】http://t.cn/RUmlQKi
text: [Supreme Law: A cheating partner can claim mental compensation] Beijing Times reported that yesterday, the Supreme People's Court reported 30 typical cases involving "family affairs". Among them, one party cheated on the couple when they divorced, and the other party's application for mental damage compensation was supported by the court. . http://t.cn/RUmTyNc I launched a poll [A cheating partner can claim mental compensation, what do you think? 】http://t.cn/RUmlQKi

chinese_text: 感情这种东西勉强不来，多情总是会被无情伤。不同的是，有的人选择拿别的人错误惩罚自己，而有的人则吃一堑长一智。所谓成长所谓成熟无非就是经历痛苦的一个过程。不要纠缠，不要贪恋，更没有必要妄自菲薄！其实，每个人，总有段时间痛不欲生，没有更好的选择，只好勇敢面对。
text: Things like feelings can't come through forcefully, and passion will always be hurt by ruthlessness. The difference is that some people choose to punish themselves for other people's mistakes, while others learn from each other's mistakes. The so-called growth and maturity are nothing more than a process of experiencing pain. Don't be entangled, don't be greedy, and there is no need to belittle yourself! In fact, everyone has a period of time when they are in pain and have no better choice but to face it bravely.

chinese_text: 所谓成熟就是，你要习惯任何人的忽冷忽热，也要看淡任何人的渐行渐远。
text: The so-called maturity means that you have to get used to anyone's hotness and coldness, and you have to look down on anyone's drifting away.

chinese_text: 【三月大女婴被弃桥下，爸爸妈妈，你们在哪[泪]】17日，在永盛歇马庙火车桥下发现一名女婴，随身附有纸条：“小女因未婚先孕…望好心人收留她。”落款为“一位不负责任的母亲。”孩子约3-4个月，无残疾，身体状况良好。遗弃小孩涉嫌犯罪，警方已立案。@公安部打四黑除四害 [话筒]扩散寻找孩子父母！
text: [A three-month-old baby girl was abandoned under a bridge, Mom and Dad, where are you [tears]] On the 17th, a baby girl was found under the Yongsheng Xiema Temple train bridge, with a note attached: "My little girl is pregnant out of wedlock." ...I hope kindhearted people will take her in." The signature was "an irresponsible mother." The child is about 3-4 months old, has no disabilities and is in good health. Abandoning a child is suspected of being a crime, and the police have opened a case. @ Ministry of Public Security cracks down on the four evils and eliminates the four evils [microphone] spreads to find the parents of the children!

chinese_text: #新浪独家#【胡耀邦文选出版，领导人出文选有啥门道？】昨天，《胡耀邦文选》出版发行。新闻极客梳理发现，毛泽东、邓小平和江泽民等人的文选是在世出版，毛还亲自编辑过毛选四卷。周恩来、刘少奇等人，则在去世后选集才出版 。领导人出文选的政治含义是什么？详见：http://t.cn/RUmcVnL
text: #SINAEXCLUSIVE# [The anthology of Hu Yaobang’s works has been published. What are the ways for leaders to publish anthologies? 】Yesterday, "Selected Works of Hu Yaobang" was published. News geeks combed through and found that the selected works of Mao Zedong, Deng Xiaoping, Jiang Zemin and others were published during their lifetime, and Mao personally edited four volumes of Mao's Selected Works. Zhou Enlai, Liu Shaoqi and others published anthologies after their deaths. What is the political implication of leaders publishing anthologies? For details, see: http://t.cn/RUmcVnL

chinese_text: 【不明觉厉！“学霸”手绘航天器设计图】无人核电推进模块、通用地外天体登陆器、人工重力生活区…令人费解的词汇在“学霸”笔下竟变成一幅幅航天器设计图。南京航空航天大学大一新生丛天舒，利用课余时间绘制这些航天器设计图，“是兴趣，也是梦想”！“学霸”的世界，你看懂了吗？(央视记者徐大为)
text: [I don’t know how powerful it is! "Hand-drawn spacecraft design drawings" by "students"] Unmanned nuclear propulsion modules, universal extraterrestrial body lander, artificial gravity living area... puzzling words turned into spacecraft design drawings under the pens of "students". Cong Tianshu, a freshman at Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, uses his spare time to draw these spacecraft design drawings, "it is a hobby and a dream"! Do you understand the world of "academic masters"? (CCTV reporter Xu Dawei)

text: #乐 Enjoy Time# Do you think the little girl who talks back to her grandma should be so cute? [Haha] "Why are you so disappointed in your grandma?" "Because she said the bad word to me, because, because she said _________" [Laughing cry][Laughing cry][Laughing cry]http://t.cn/RAiDLUP

chinese_text: #健康时间#【警惕！这八个习惯最毁腰】1.久用电脑。2．低头看手机、阅读。3．座椅柔软、倾斜。4．长期开车。5．软床、低枕、不良睡姿。6．缺乏运动或者运动不当。7．生活中的劳动姿势不当。8．缺乏户外运动。忙碌工作让很多人失去了晒太阳的机会，钙质难以吸收，造成机体组织、骨骼的脆弱。
text: #HealthTime# [Be alert! These eight habits are the most waist-ruining] 1. Use the computer for a long time. 2. Look down at your phone and read. 3. The seats are soft and reclined. 4． Long term driving. 5. Soft bed, low pillow, bad sleeping posture. 6. Lack of exercise or improper exercise. 7． Improper working postures in life. 8. Lack of outdoor exercise. Busy work makes many people lose the opportunity to bask in the sun, making it difficult to absorb calcium, causing the body's tissues and bones to become fragile.

chinese_text: 整理了知乎上『有哪些平平无奇的两样东西结合在一起之后大放异彩的例子？』的一些回答，让你不得不服，你们感受下。
text: I compiled a list on Zhihu: "What are some examples of two ordinary things that became brilliant after being combined?" "Some of the answers will make you convinced. Please feel it.

chinese_text: 【“朋友圈”变“投票圈”，如此绑架式点赞 你烦不烦？】"万能的朋友圈，请给我女儿投一票"...调查显示，有四成多的人认为“绑架式”的拉票让人反感。网友：孩子们，得奖后一定要珍惜啊，这是多少人忍受煎熬换来的啊，以后简历一定要写上：高中三好生 、小学优秀干部，幼儿园最萌宝宝微信投票第一名...
text: [The "moments circle" has become a "voting circle". Are you annoyed by such kidnapping likes? 】"Almighty circle of friends, please vote for my daughter"... The survey shows that more than 40% of people think "kidnapping-style" canvassing is disgusting. Netizen: Children, you must cherish the award after winning it. How many people have endured hardship in exchange for this. In the future, your resume must write: top student in high school, outstanding cadre in primary school, first place in WeChat voting for the cutest baby in kindergarten... .

chinese_text: 【全球男女平等排名 日韩垫底】 共同社报道，瑞士世界经济论坛19日发布的2015年版《全球性别差距报告》显示，日本在成为调查对象的145个国家中排在第101位。冰岛连续7年蝉联榜首，挪威与芬兰分列第2和第3位，北欧各国位居前列。美国排名第28，中国排名第91。韩国排名第115，低于日本。（新浪）
text: [Japan and South Korea rank last in global gender equality rankings] Kyodo News reported that the 2015 edition of the Global Gender Gap Report released by the World Economic Forum in Switzerland on the 19th showed that Japan ranked 101st among the 145 countries surveyed. Iceland has topped the list for seven consecutive years, with Norway and Finland ranking second and third respectively, and the Nordic countries at the forefront. The United States ranks 28th and China ranks 91st. South Korea ranks 115th, lower than Japan. (Sina)

chinese_text: 【心梗急救牢记两个“120”】我国将11月20日设为“心梗救治日”，就是希望公众牢记心梗急救的两个“120”：①及时拨打120急救电话②把握黄金救治120分钟。时间就是生命，急性心梗发作后，留给抢救的时间很短，及时的救治是降低死亡率的关键。牢记两个“120”，在生死竞速中争取时间！
text: [Keep in mind the two "120's" in first aid for myocardial infarction] Our country has set November 20 as "Myocardial Infarction Treatment Day", hoping that the public will remember the two "120"s in first aid for myocardial infarction: ① Call the 120 emergency hotline in time ② Seize the golden treatment 120 minutes. Time is life. After an acute myocardial infarction, the time left for rescue is very short. Timely treatment is the key to reducing mortality. Remember the two "120"s and fight for time in the race of life and death!

text: [What is the relationship between mother-in-law and daughter-in-law? Chinese people have misunderstood for five thousand years] A daughter-in-law treats her mother-in-law as an aunt. She should be respected when she should be respected, and she should be filial when she should be filial, but don't have too high expectations. The mother-in-law treats her daughter-in-law as a niece or a good friend of her son. If she likes her, she can talk to her more, and if she doesn't, she should stay away. If both parties take each other lightly and keep a distance, they will definitely feel much more comfortable. http://t.cn/RUm04pR

chinese_text: 【最新消息：我国平均26岁结婚 现在90后已算晚婚！】中国妇联发起的“调查报告”指出，我国平均26岁结婚，90%的女性在30岁前结婚。你被催婚了吗？其实，幸福婚姻并不在何时结婚，调查显示，忠诚、体贴才是幸福的基石，仅剩6周，2015就结束了，新一年，祝大家找到幸福！为爱转发！[心](央视记者谭臻)
text: [Latest news: The average age of marriage in my country is 26, and now those born in the 1990s are considered late marriages! 】The "Survey Report" initiated by the China Women's Federation pointed out that the average age of marriage in our country is 26, and 90% of women get married before the age of 30. Are you being urged to get married? In fact, a happy marriage does not depend on when you get married. Surveys show that loyalty and thoughtfulness are the cornerstones of happiness. With only 6 weeks left, 2015 is over. In the new year, I wish you all find happiness! Repost for love! [Heart](CCTV reporter Tan Zhen)

Experts said that party members should take the initiative to abide by disciplines and laws, and should not circumvent the system based on personal relationships and face.

chinese_text: #民生#【人社部:延迟退休方案将适时向社会公开征求意见】人社部新闻发言人李忠近日表示，制定延迟退休年龄方案总的考虑是，小步慢走，渐进到位，每年只会延长几个月的退休年龄，同时提前向社会预告，给公众以心理预期。目前，正在抓紧制定这个方案，将适时向社会公开征求意见。http://t.cn/RUmRXIY
text: #民生# [Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security: The delayed retirement plan will be publicly solicited for opinions from the public in due course] Li Zhong, spokesperson of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, recently stated that the overall consideration in formulating the delayed retirement age plan is to take small steps and gradually reach the goal. The retirement age will be extended by a few months, and at the same time, it will be notified to the society in advance to give the public psychological expectations. Currently, we are working hard to formulate this plan and will solicit public opinions in due course. http://t.cn/RUmRXIY

chinese_text: 【平价三文鱼时代到了？转基因三文鱼获FDA批准】经过5年全面严格的审查后，三文鱼成为首个登上餐桌的转基因动物。这种三文鱼18个月就能长成成体，传统三文鱼则需要三年。美农业部生物技术国家顾问委员会成员艾莉森接受了果壳网专访，她的第一反应是：他们居然用了这么久才批？http://t.cn/RUm8n1q
text: [The era of affordable salmon has arrived? Genetically modified salmon approved by FDA] After five years of comprehensive and rigorous review, salmon became the first genetically modified animal to be on the dining table. This kind of salmon can grow into an adult in 18 months, while traditional salmon takes three years. Alison, a member of the US Department of Agriculture’s National Advisory Committee on Biotechnology, accepted an exclusive interview with Guoke.com. Her first reaction was: It took them so long to approve it? http://t.cn/RUm8n1q

text: [[Microphone] Searching for Persons] According to @ traffic police Chen Qingzhou, there is an old couple selling vegetable pancakes at the entrance of Hualian Supermarket in Huajiacun Street, Hutang Town, Wujin District, Changzhou City, Jiangsu Province. They sell pancakes with their six-year-old granddaughter every day from morning to morning. At night, it’s hard work! The old couple lost their granddaughter at about 9pm on the 18th. They have been looking for their granddaughter in the rain since the accident. They look like they are going "crazy with anxiety". How pitiful! [Tears] Spread the word and help find it! If you have any clues, please contact the police!

chinese_text: 【延寿县看守所"9•2"逃脱案 责任民警滥用职权、玩忽职守案宣判】今日，哈尔滨松北区人民法院宣判：张阁群犯滥用职权罪，处有期徒刑六年；范德延、张秀利犯玩忽职守罪，分别判处有期徒刑五年和三年。2014年9月2日凌晨，延寿县看守所3名在押人员杀害1名值班民警后逃走，10天后落网。(央视新闻奚丹霓)
text: [Judgment in the case of abuse of power and dereliction of duty by the police officer responsible for the "9·2" escape case from the Yanshou County Detention Center] Today, the Harbin Songbei District People's Court pronounced that Zhang Gequn was guilty of abuse of power and sentenced to six years in prison; Fan Deyan and Zhang Xiuli were guilty of dereliction of duty. guilty and sentenced to five years and three years in prison respectively. In the early morning of September 2, 2014, three detainees at the Yanshou County Detention Center killed a police officer on duty and then escaped. They were arrested 10 days later. (CCTV News Xi Danni)

chinese_text: 【别让镜框带来尴尬】镜架下面出现花妆卡粉、睫毛打到镜片，这两个应该是戴眼镜美眉最担心的问题了！解决很简单:底妆部分一定要轻薄，并用少量散粉按压在眼周、鼻梁等与镜框接触部位控油；刷睫毛前睫毛要从睫毛根部夹翘，并着重涂睫毛根部，稍部轻轻带过就好喽～戴眼镜也能美美哒～
text: [Don’t let the frames cause embarrassment] Makeup smudged under the frames and eyelashes hitting the lenses are probably the two most worrying problems for beauties wearing glasses! The solution is simple: the base makeup must be light and thin, and use a small amount of loose powder to press around the eyes, bridge of the nose and other parts that are in contact with the frame to control oil; before brushing the eyelashes, curl the eyelashes from the root of the eyelashes, and focus on the root of the eyelashes, gently bringing them over That’s fine~ You can look beautiful even if you wear glasses~

text: [Thousands of people dug for "jade" on the river beach, and some people specially bought it. After identification, it was an ordinary stone [Khan]] A few months ago, someone picked up a kind of stone in Luzhou, Sichuan. It felt smooth and moist, and had a certain degree of permeability. It was thought to be a new jade stone. As soon as the news spread, thousands of people came to dig out the stone, and a dedicated person came to collect it every day, charging 100 yuan per catty. Experts have identified this stone as quartz, which has no collection value. It is common in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River. The stone... (CCTV reporter Bai Lu)

text: "It makes sense to say: 'If I don't have you, I can still live a good life, but I am willing to be with you. This is love.' - The essence of love is willingness. text: [A hotel in the capital of Mali was attacked by gunmen and 170 people were hijacked] Reuters reported that a hotel in the capital of Mali, Bamako, was attacked by gunmen today and the police have cordoned off the scene. According to Agence France-Presse, the hotel stated that two gunmen hijacked a total of 170 hotel guests and employees, including 140 guests and 30 employees. (Sina)

chinese_text: 失去过许多朋友，因为我不善言谈，许久没联系他们，于是他们渐渐有了新朋友，把我遗忘，从此再无交集 。请不要觉得我冷漠孤傲，不要觉得我喜新厌旧 ，我只是怕一开口，就变成了令人心酸的客套，但却依旧相信着，那时的我们，都是彼此生命里的一道光线，如果有一天我们变陌生了，就让我们重新认识一遍。
text: I lost many friends because I was not good at talking and didn’t contact them for a long time. Then they gradually made new friends and forgot about me, and we never met again. Please don’t think that I am cold and aloof, or that I like the new and dislike the old. I am just afraid that once I open my mouth, it will turn into a sad politeness, but I still believe that at that time, we were all a ray of light in each other’s lives. If there is One day we become strangers, let us get to know each other again.

chinese_text: 【马里首都巴马科一酒店内170人遭两名歹徒劫持】据法新社，“圣战”分子在马利首都巴马科市中心丽笙大酒店内开枪滥射，包括客人和员工在内的170人被两名歹徒劫持，其中客人140人，酒店员工30人。俄新社称，至少有5人在袭击中死亡。英国“天空新闻”称，至少有10名枪手被认为参与了此次劫持人质事件。
text: [170 people were hijacked by two gangsters in a hotel in Bamako, Mali's capital] According to Agence France-Presse, "jihadist" elements shot indiscriminately at the Radisson Hotel in the center of Bamako, Mali's capital, including guests and employees. 170 people inside were hijacked by two gangsters, including 140 guests and 30 hotel employees. RIA Novosti said that at least five people died in the attack. British "Sky News" stated that at least 10 gunmen were believed to be involved in the hostage-taking incident.

chinese_text: 【最后一位赴日诉讼慰安妇张先兔抱憾离世[蜡烛]】张先兔老人的追悼会在她的家乡西烟镇西村举行，众多亲属好友送别老人最后一程。老人于11月12日在家中去世，享年89岁。多年来，老人和志愿者一直在坚持向日本政府讨回公道，但老人临终也没等来日本政府的道歉。血泪不容忘记，正义不会缺席！转发送老人！
text: [Zhang Xiantu, the last comfort woman who went to Japan to sue for litigation, passed away with regrets [Candle]] The memorial service for Zhang Xiantu was held in her hometown, Xicun, Xiyan Town. Many relatives and friends bid farewell to the elderly woman on her last journey. The old man died at home on November 12 at the age of 89. For many years, the elderly and volunteers have been insisting on seeking justice from the Japanese government, but the elderly did not wait for an apology from the Japanese government before their death. Blood and tears cannot be forgotten, and justice will not be absent! Forward to the old man!

chinese_text: 【迷茫时看的八句话】①先处理心情，再处理事情；②最困难的时候，就是最接近成功的时候；③不为模糊不清的未来担忧，只为清清楚楚的现在努力；④宽容他人对你的冒犯；⑤不要无缘无故的妒忌；⑥只为成功找方法，不为失败找借口；⑦不要看我失去什么，只看我还拥有什么；⑧用最放松的心态对待一切艰难。
text: [Eight sentences to read when confused] ① Deal with your mood first, then deal with things; ② The most difficult time is the time closest to success; ③ Don’t worry about the vague future, just work hard for the clear present; ④ Tolerate other people’s offenses against you; ⑤ Don’t be jealous for no reason; ⑥ Only look for ways to succeed, not excuses for failure; ⑦ Don’t look at what I have lost, only look at what I still have; ⑧ Treat everything with the most relaxed attitude difficult.

chinese_text: #民生#【国务院:年底前对奇葩证明拿出解决办法】国务院推进职能转变协调小组办公室副主任表示，坚决砍掉各类无谓证明和繁琐手续，无法律法规依据的证明和盖章环节应一律取消，办事部门可通过与其他部门共享获取相关信息的，不得要求提供相关证明，将探索实行“承诺+监管”的办法。http://t.cn/RUu4Xyr
text: #民生# [State Council: Come up with solutions to weird certificates before the end of the year] The deputy director of the Office of the State Council’s Coordination Group for Promotion of Functional Transformation said that all types of unnecessary certificates and cumbersome procedures should be resolutely cut off, and the certificates and seals that have no basis in laws and regulations should be the same. Cancellation, if the service department can obtain relevant information by sharing with other departments, it shall not be required to provide relevant certificates, and the method of "commitment + supervision" will be explored. http://t.cn/RUu4Xyr

chinese_text: 【明天，#你好，小雪#】明天23时25分，迎来小雪节气。①北方气温逐渐降到0℃以下，但“地寒未甚”，虽开始降雪但雪量不大，故称小雪②南方开始进入冬季，“荷尽已无擎雨盖，菊残犹有傲霜枝”，已呈初冬景象③北方供暖后屋内燥热，需当心“暖气病” ④南方气候湿冷，应预防冻疮。雪花来了，你期待吗？
text: [Tomorrow, # Hello, 小雪#] Tomorrow at 23:25, we will have the light snow solar term. ① The temperature in the north gradually drops below 0°C, but “the ground is not very cold”. Although it begins to snow, the amount of snow is not large, so it is called light snow. ② The south begins to enter winter. “There is no rain cover after all the loads, and the chrysanthemums are still proud. "Frost branches" have already appeared in early winter. ③ In the north, the house is hot and dry after heating, so be careful about "heating disease". ④ In the south, the climate is humid and cold, so frostbite should be prevented. Snowflakes are coming, are you looking forward to it?

chinese_text: #历史上的今天#【钱钟书说】①围在城里的人想逃出来，城外的人想冲进去，对婚姻也罢，职业也罢，人生的愿望大都如此②不受教育的人，因为不识字上人的当；受教育的人，因为识 了字上印刷品的当③一个人，到了20岁还不狂，这个人是没出息的；到了30岁还狂，也是没出息的。今天，先生诞辰105周年，怀念！
text: #historytoday# [Qian Zhongshu said] ① People who are surrounded by the city want to escape, and people outside the city want to rush in. Whether it is marriage or career, most of their aspirations in life are like this ② People without education, People are fooled because they are illiterate; educated people are fooled because they are literate and can read printed materials. ③ If a person is not crazy at the age of 20, he has no future; if he is still crazy at the age of 30, he has no future. Today is the 105th anniversary of my birth. I miss you so much!

chinese_text: 【旅顺大屠杀，不能被遗忘的日军罪行！】这是甲午战争中惨绝人寰的一段历史：1894年11月21日，日军攻陷旅顺要塞后，对城内进行惨无人道的抢劫、屠杀和强奸。4天3夜，约两万名无辜平民惨死于日军屠刀下。事后，日本政府采取各种手段掩饰杀人罪行。血淋淋的真相不容遗忘，发条微博，祭奠同胞，吾辈自强！
text: [The Lushun Massacre, a Japanese crime that cannot be forgotten! 】This is a tragic piece of history in the Sino-Japanese War of 1894-1894: On November 21, 1894, after the Japanese army captured the Port Arthur Fortress, they carried out inhumane robbery, massacre and rape in the city. For four days and three nights, about 20,000 innocent civilians died tragically under the knife of the Japanese army. Afterwards, the Japanese government used various means to cover up the murder. The bloody truth cannot be forgotten. We post on Weibo to pay homage to our compatriots so that we can strengthen ourselves!

chinese_text: #移说心语#人生的确很累，看你如何品味:不要一直抱怨自己所不能控制与拥有的一切，当必须放弃时，就果断地放弃吧。放得下，才能走得远！有所放弃，才能有所追求。什么也不愿放弃的人，反而会失去最珍贵的东西！早安！
text: #爱说心语# Life is indeed very tiring, it depends on how you taste it: don’t keep complaining about everything you can’t control and own. When you have to give up, give up decisively. Only by letting go can you go far! Only by giving up can you pursue something. Those who are unwilling to give up anything will lose the most precious things! Good morning!

chinese_text: 【联合国一致通过打击IS决议】法新社报道，联合国安理会当地时间周五一致通过一项决议，授权各成员国“采取一切必要措施”打击IS。这份法国草拟的决议号召成员国加倍预防和打击IS及基地组织等策划的恐怖袭击。但决议不对军事行动提供法律依据，主要是对打击IS提供国际社会上的政治支持。（新浪）
text: [The United Nations unanimously passed a resolution to combat IS] Agence France-Presse reported that the United Nations Security Council unanimously passed a resolution on Friday local time, authorizing member states to "take all necessary measures" to combat IS. The French-drafted resolution calls on member states to redouble their efforts to prevent and combat terrorist attacks planned by IS and al-Qaeda. However, the resolution does not provide a legal basis for military operations, but mainly provides political support from the international community for combating IS. (Sina)

chinese_text: 人生需要沉淀，宁静才能致远；人生需要反思，常回头看看，才能在品味得失和甘苦中升华。向前看是梦想和目标； 向后看是检验和修正。有多少事，如果当初回头看看，就会做得更好；有多少人，如果能回头一看，可以免去多少错误和遗憾。回头，其实身后也写着前方的路。早安~[心]
text: Life needs precipitation, and tranquility can lead to long-term progress; life needs reflection, and often looking back can sublimate in savoring gains and losses, joys and sorrows. Looking forward is dreams and goals; looking backward is testing and correction. How many things, if you could look back, you would have done better; how many people, if you could look back, how many mistakes and regrets could be avoided. Looking back, the road ahead is actually written behind you. Good morning~[heart]

text: [It’s all the name’s fault] A recent Face404k message from a 23-year-old Vietnamese-Australian youth has attracted widespread attention. No one believed him every time he said his name. chinese_text: #那年今日#【钱钟书，嗜书如命】1910年的今天他生于无锡，19岁被清华破格录取，数学仅15分；他立志横扫清华图书馆，一部作品引述4000多位名家的书证；他涉笔成趣，长篇小说《围城》被誉为“现代《儒林外史》”；他与杨绛先生的爱情，让人羡慕动容……他曾说：“越是聪明人，越要懂得下笨功夫。”怀念！
text: #that年DAY# [Qian Zhongshu, who loves books as much as his life] He was born in Wuxi on this day in 1910. He was admitted to Tsinghua University at the age of 19, with only 15 points in mathematics; he determined to sweep the Tsinghua library, and one work was cited by more than 4,000 people The documentary evidence of famous writers; he became interested in writing, and his novel "Fortress Besieged" was praised as "the modern "The Scholars""; his love with Mr. Yang Jiang is enviable and moving... He once said: "The smarter the person, the more intelligent he is." The more you have to know how to work hard." I miss you!

text: [China Railway Construction confirmed that three employees were killed in the hotel attack in Mali] According to @中国 Railway Construction, the Chinese Embassy in Mali confirmed that three employees of China Railway Construction who went to the Malian Ministry of Transport to discuss cooperation projects took hostages in Mali. Unfortunately, he died. They are: Zhou Tianxiang, general manager of China Railway Construction International Group, Wang Xuanshang, deputy general manager of China Railway Construction International Group, and Chang Xuehui, general manager of China Railway Construction International West Africa Company.

chinese_text: 【抹布挡号牌 驾照被吊销[黑线]】近日宁夏银川交警执勤时发现，一辆小轿车的前后号牌都被抹布完全遮挡。车主这么做的原因，竟是为躲避90秒违停抓拍，结果被扣12分。该车主4个多月前刚拿到驾照，根据相关规定，实习期内一次性被扣满12分的，吊销驾照。网友：还是用抹布擦擦车吧[笑cry](央视记者许国飞)
text: [Driver’s license blocked by rags [black line]] Recently, while on duty, traffic police in Yinchuan, Ningxia discovered that the front and rear license plates of a car were completely blocked by rags. The reason why the car owner did this was to avoid being caught for illegal parking for 90 seconds, and he was deducted 12 points. The car owner just got his driver's license more than 4 months ago. According to relevant regulations, if he is deducted 12 points at a time during the internship period, his driver's license will be revoked. Netizen: Just wipe the car with a rag [laughing and crying] (CCTV reporter Xu Guofei)

chinese_text: #那一天#【大师钱钟书】他是学贯中西的大学者，也是才思敏捷的幽默大师，有人来中国一为看长城二为看他，他和妻子的恩爱为世人所羡慕，他被无数当代名家所推崇甚至崇拜……105年前的今天，一代国学大师钱钟书出生在无锡。当你平日引用下边这些经典语录时，你意识到它们都是出自这位大师之手吗？
text: #thatday#[Master Qian Zhongshu] He is a great scholar who has learned both Chinese and Western knowledge, and he is also a master of humor with quick wit. Some people come to China first to see the Great Wall and second to see him. The love between him and his wife is envied by the world, and he is Respected and even worshiped by countless contemporary masters...105 years ago today, Qian Zhongshu, a master of Chinese traditional culture, was born in Wuxi. When you quote the following classic quotes every day, do you realize that they are all written by this master?

chinese_text: 【去年我国30万人赴美留学 占比排名全球第一】美国国际教育协会发布2015全美教育数据统计：①2014-2015年度全球赴美留学生总人数达97.5万人，其中中国留学生达30.4万人，占比排行首位②44%赴美留学生选择科学领域专业，其中工程学和商务与管理专业最热，均占20%。你会选择赴美留学吗？(央视记者田晓佩)
text: [Last year, my country’s 300,000 people went to study in the United States, ranking first in the world] The American Institute of International Education released 2015 national education statistics: ① The total number of international students in the United States in 2014-2015 reached 975,000, of which 304,000 were Chinese students. Ranking first in terms of proportion, 44% of international students studying in the United States choose science majors, among which engineering and business and management are the most popular majors, both accounting for 20%. Will you choose to study in the United States? (CCTV reporter Tian Xiaopei)

chinese_text: 【安徽一干部酒驾后大闹纪委：不要拿副村长不当干部】19日，安徽太和县男子杨某酒后到纪委探视被调查的朋友。当被告知不许时，杨某用脚使劲踹纪委监察室，侮辱、谩骂…并称自己是洪山镇某村副村长，“不要拿副村长不当干部，否则后果很严重”。经查，杨某是太和县洪山镇毛集村委人，警方对其拘留10日。
text: [A cadre in Anhui caused trouble with the Commission for Discipline Inspection after driving drunk: Don’t mistake the deputy village chief for being a cadre] On the 19th, Yang, a man from Taihe County, Anhui, went to the Commission for Discipline Inspection to visit a friend who was under investigation after drinking. When told that he was not allowed, Yang kicked the Discipline Inspection Commission's supervision room with his feet, insulted and abused... and said that he was the deputy village chief of a village in Hongshan Town. "Don't treat the deputy village chief as a cadre, otherwise the consequences will be serious." After investigation, it was found that Yang was a member of the Maoji Village Committee of Hongshan Town, Taihe County, and the police detained him for 10 days.

chinese_text: #正能量#【“希望我的血能帮陌生人延续生命”[赞]】每天早晨，沈菊芳都穿着志愿者的红马甲，骑自行车穿梭于大街小巷，车筐里放着献血资料，不管走到哪儿她都会给大家讲解献血知识。她说：“我身体里淌过陌生人的血，也希望我的血能帮陌生人延续生命”。
text: #正energy# ["Hope my blood can help strangers extend their lives" [Like]] Every morning, Shen Jufang wears a volunteer's red vest and rides a bicycle through the streets and alleys, with blood donation information in the basket. Wherever she goes, she will explain blood donation to everyone. She said: "I have the blood of strangers in my body, and I hope my blood can help strangers extend their lives."

chinese_text: 【国务院：年底前对“奇葩证明”拿出解决办法并实施】国务院推进职能转变协调小组办公室副主任吴知论20日表示，坚决砍掉各类无谓证明和繁琐手续，凡没有法律法规依据的证明和盖章环节应一律取消，办事部门可通过与其他部门信息共享获取相关信息的，不得要求申请人提供相关证明。http://t.cn/RUmFlRD
text: [State Council: Come up with and implement solutions to "weird certificates" before the end of the year] Wu Zhilun, deputy director of the Office of the State Council's Coordination Group for Promotion of Functional Transformation, said on the 20th that all types of unnecessary certificates and cumbersome procedures will be resolutely cut off, and any that have no basis in laws and regulations will be eliminated. The certification and sealing links should be cancelled. If the service department can obtain relevant information through information sharing with other departments, the applicant shall not be required to provide relevant certification. http://t.cn/RUmFlRD

chinese_text: #转基因三文鱼上餐桌#【美国人要率先吃转基因动物[思考]】19日，美国政府批准一种转基因三文鱼供人类食用，这是全球首例获准供人食用的转基因动物。普通大西洋三文鱼三年长大，转基因后一年半就长成，身材也更大。当局称转基因三文鱼营养成分没有不同。转基因三文鱼，你会尝试吗？http://t.cn/RUuJ4Ze
text: #GM Salmon on the Table# [Americans should be the first to eat genetically modified animals [Thinking]] On the 19th, the U.S. government approved a genetically modified salmon for human consumption. This is the first genetically modified animal in the world to be approved for human consumption. Ordinary Atlantic salmon take three years to grow, but after genetic modification, it takes one and a half years to grow and become larger. Authorities say there is no difference in the nutritional content of genetically modified salmon. Will you try genetically modified salmon? http://t.cn/RUuJ4Ze

chinese_text: #热点#【公积金提取条件拟放宽 或可用于缴物业费】国务院法制办昨日公开发布住房公积金管理条例修订稿，职工自住住房租金、自住住房物业费等将来均有望使用公积金支付。修订稿首次规定，无雇工的个体工商户、非全日制从业人员以及其他灵活就业人员也可以缴存住房公积金。http://t.cn/RUuUgF9
text: #hotspot# [The conditions for withdrawing provident funds are planned to be relaxed or can be used to pay property fees] The Legislative Affairs Office of the State Council released a revised draft of the Housing Provident Fund Management Regulations yesterday. It is expected that employee-occupied housing rents, owner-occupied housing property fees, etc. will be paid using provident funds in the future. The revised draft stipulates for the first time that self-employed individuals, part-time employees and other people with flexible employment can also contribute to the housing provident fund. http://t.cn/RUuUgF9

chinese_text: 【当年被她收留的小“乞丐”，要拿百万支票报恩】1993年，17岁的何荣锋等3人到浙江打工，遭遇小偷身无分文，沿路乞讨。戴杏芬得知后为他们做菜，还送30元钱和食物。20年后，已是家具厂老板的何荣锋，拿百万现金支票报恩，遭到戴女士拒绝。近日他又来看望恩人。http://t.cn/RUub5pN感动，感恩！[心]
text: [The little "beggar" she took in back then wanted to repay her kindness with a million-dollar check] In 1993, 17-year-old He Rongfeng and three other people went to Zhejiang to work. They encountered thieves who were penniless and begged along the way. After learning about it, Dai Xingfen cooked for them and gave them 30 yuan and food. Twenty years later, He Rongfeng, now the owner of a furniture factory, offered a cash check worth one million to repay his kindness, but Ms. Dai refused. Recently he came to visit his benefactor again. http://t.cn/RUub5pN Touched and grateful! [Heart]

chinese_text: #那年今日#【钱钟书说】①二十岁不狂是没有志气，三十岁犹狂是没有头脑。②不受教育的人，因为不识字，上人的当；受教育的人，因为识了字，上印刷品的当。③天下就没有偶然，那不过是化了妆的、戴了面具的必然。④围在城里的人想逃出来，城外的人想冲进去。
text: #that年DAY# [Qian Zhongshu said] ① If you are not crazy at the age of twenty, you have no ambition; if you are crazy at the age of thirty, you have no brains. ② Uneducated people are deceived by others because they are illiterate; educated people are deceived by printed matter because they are literate. ③There are no accidents in the world, they are just inevitable with makeup and mask. ④The people surrounding the city want to escape, and the people outside the city want to rush in.

chinese_text: 【住房公积金提取条件拟放宽 自由职业者或可自缴】住房城乡建设部近日起草条例称，“新版”公积金管理条例对提取条件进一步放宽。首先明确购买、建造、大修、装修自住住房、无房职工支付自住住房租金、职工支付自住住房物业费，均可以提取住房公积金。将来，自由职业者也可以缴存住房公积金。
text: [Housing provident fund withdrawal conditions planned to be relaxed for freelancers or self-payers] The Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development recently drafted regulations stating that the "new version" provident fund management regulations further relax the withdrawal conditions. First of all, it is clarified that the housing provident fund can be withdrawn from the purchase, construction, overhaul and decoration of self-occupied housing, the rent paid by employees without housing, and the property fees paid by employees for self-occupied housing. In the future, freelancers will also be able to contribute to housing provident funds.

chinese_text: 每一天都想放弃，但每一天又都坚持下来了。没有伞的孩子，要努力奔跑。
text: I wanted to give up every day, but I persisted every day. Children without umbrellas have to run hard.

chinese_text: 【单身妈妈扛500斤硬币为女买房 卖塑料袋积攒五六年】即将年满50岁的宁女士日前扛着7麻袋500多斤的硬币，到四川眉山一楼盘买房，工作人员经3小时清点出硬币共计43500元。宁女士称经营塑料袋批发，存了5、6年硬币，买房的初衷是女儿大了，想给她一个家。 via：成都商报
text: [Single mother carries 500 kilograms of coins to buy a house and sells plastic bags to save for five or six years] Ms. Ning, who is about to turn 50, recently carried 7 sacks of more than 500 kilograms of coins to buy a house in a real estate development in Meishan, Sichuan. The staff counted them after three hours. A total of 43,500 yuan in coins were produced. Ms. Ning said she runs a plastic bag wholesale business and has been saving coins for 5 or 6 years. The original intention of buying a house was that she wanted to give her a home when her daughter got older. via: Chengdu Business News

chinese_text: 真正的好朋友，互损不会翻脸，疏远不会猜疑，出钱不会计较，地位不分高低，成功无需巴结，失败不会离去。奋斗的时候搭把手，迷茫的时候拉一把，开心的时候干一杯，难过的时候抱一下。一起走吧，趁将来未来，趁热情未冷。转
text: Real good friends will not fall out when they are hurt by each other, they will not be suspicious of each other when they are alienated, they will not care about their money, their status will not matter, they will not be fawning when they succeed, and they will not leave if they fail. Give me a hand when you are struggling, hold your hand when you are confused, have a drink when you are happy, and give you a hug when you are sad. Let's go together, take advantage of the future and take advantage of the enthusiasm before it cools down. change

chinese_text: #看了就“知道”#【女人，你的四十岁会是什么样的？】在欧美许多文学影视作品里，四十岁的女人有自己的事业，自主、独立、注意保养、神采飞扬。但依循传统的东方女人，她们的生活半径常常是家庭-菜市场-小孩的学校三点一线，为家庭倾尽时间与精力。http://t.cn/RUnsMsp
text: #You'll know when you see it# [Woman, what will your forties look like? 】In many European and American literary, film and television works, a forty-year-old woman has her own career, is autonomous, independent, takes care of herself, and is full of energy. However, according to the tradition of Eastern women, their living radius is often the three points and one line between their family, the vegetable market, and their children's school, and they devote their time and energy to their families. http://t.cn/RUnsMsp

chinese_text: 【越野车司机道歉 将被罚200元扣3分】交警在与越野车车主电话联系后，昨天下午，驾驶员王某到交警部门接受处理，他对自己的行为表示十分后悔，并通过媒体向救护车司机、车上病患及其家属表示道歉，交警部门表示，如果情况属实，将予以罚200元，记3分的处罚 。（新京报）http://t.cn/RUu6xKC
text: [Off-road vehicle driver will be fined 200 yuan and deducted 3 points for apologizing] After the traffic police contacted the owner of the off-road vehicle by phone, yesterday afternoon, the driver Wang went to the traffic police department for processing. He expressed great regret for his behavior and reported to the media through the media. The ambulance driver, the patients on the vehicle and their families apologized. The traffic police department stated that if the situation is true, they will be fined 200 yuan and given 3 points. (Beijing News) http://t.cn/RUu6xKC

chinese_text: #转基因三文鱼上餐桌#【从申请到获批，20年！】可食用转基因三文鱼=大西洋三文鱼+太平洋奇努克三文鱼生长激素基因+大洋鳕鱼抗冻蛋白基因。审批之路20年，耗费数千万美元，最大争议是“是否安全”。不过，美药管局表示，担忧是多余的，它食用安全，且不会对环境构成危害。
text: #Genegenic Salmon on the Table# [From application to approval, 20 years! ] Edible genetically modified salmon = Atlantic salmon + Pacific Chinook salmon growth hormone gene + Ocean cod antifreeze protein gene. The approval process took 20 years and cost tens of millions of dollars. The biggest controversy was "whether it is safe." However, the FDA stated that concerns are unnecessary and that it is safe for consumption and does not pose any harm to the environment.

chinese_text: 【已有21人遇难 仍有1人失踪】黑龙江龙煤集团鸡西公司杏花煤矿火灾事故发生时间为昨晚21点50分。据鸡西市政府和黑龙江龙煤集团报告，截至今天10点40分，已发现21名遇难者遗体，正全力搜救剩余一名失踪人员。火区已得到有效控制，无次生灾害发生。（央视记者于文波）
text: [21 people have been killed and one person is still missing] The fire in Xinghua Coal Mine of Jixi Company of Heilongjiang Longmei Group occurred at 21:50 last night. According to reports from the Jixi Municipal Government and Heilongjiang Longmei Group, as of 10:40 today, the remains of 21 victims have been found, and efforts are being made to search and rescue the remaining missing person. The fire area has been effectively controlled and no secondary disasters have occurred. (CCTV reporter Yu Wenbo)

chinese_text: 【印度总理莫迪称李克强《经济学家》署名文章令他印象深刻】李克强总理21日在马来西亚吉隆坡会见印度总理莫迪时，就世界经济前景和中印两国经济发展交换意见。莫迪表示赞同李克强总理的经济理念。他说：“我刚刚看到您在《经济学家》年终特刊发表文章谈2016年中国经济发展，给我留下了很深刻的印象。”
text: [Indian Prime Minister Modi said that Li Keqiang’s signed article in The Economist impressed him deeply] When Premier Li Keqiang met with Indian Prime Minister Modi in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on the 21st, they exchanged views on the world economic prospects and the economic development of China and India. Modi expressed his agreement with Prime Minister Li Keqiang's economic philosophy. He said: "I just saw that you published an article in the year-end special issue of The Economist about China's economic development in 2016, which left a deep impression on me."

chinese_text: 有时候你把什么放下了，不是因为突然就舍得了，而是因为期限到了，任性够了，成熟多了， 也就知道这一页该翻过去了。
text: Sometimes you let go of something, not because you suddenly let it go, but because the deadline has come, you have become more willful and mature, and you know it is time to turn the page.

chinese_text: 【黑龙江鸡西煤矿发生事故 已发现21人遗体】20日21时50分，黑龙江龙煤集团鸡西矿业公司杏花煤矿东一采区大倾角皮带发生火灾事故，事故发生时38人在井下作业，其中16人安全升井。截至21日10时40分，杏花煤矿事故火区已得到有效控制，无次生灾害发生。现已发现21名遇难者遗体。http://t.cn/RUu61Kv
text: [The remains of 21 people have been found in the accident in Jixi Coal Mine, Heilongjiang] At 21:50 on the 20th, a fire accident occurred on a large-angle belt in the east mining area of Xinghua Coal Mine of Heilongjiang Longmei Group Jixi Mining Company. 38 people were working underground when the accident occurred, including 16 people rose to the well safely. As of 10:40 on the 21st, the fire area of the Xinghua Coal Mine accident has been effectively controlled, and no secondary disasters have occurred. The remains of 21 victims have been found. http://t.cn/RUu61Kv

chinese_text: 【李克强感谢莫迪网上生日祝福】今年5月北京会见后，李克强总理21日在马来西亚吉隆坡再次会见印度总理莫迪。莫迪说，我们半年前在北京天坛共同主办瑜伽太极活动，给印度人民留下深刻印象。李克强说，很高兴与你再次见面，我也借此机会感谢你在网上给我的生日祝福，我们的友谊表明了中印关系的发展。
text: [Li Keqiang thanks Modi for his online birthday wishes] After meeting in Beijing in May this year, Premier Li Keqiang met with Indian Prime Minister Modi again in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on the 21st. Modi said that we co-hosted a yoga and Tai Chi event at the Temple of Heaven in Beijing six months ago, which left a deep impression on the Indian people. Li Keqiang said, it is a pleasure to meet you again. I also take this opportunity to thank you for your birthday wishes to me online. Our friendship shows the development of China-India relations.

chinese_text: #轻松一刻# 这种有着西瓜太郎一样发型的鸟学名叫格洛斯特金丝雀(Gloster Canary)，因为长有奇特的羽冠又被成为“披头士鸟，锅盖头金丝雀”。1920年由一位英国的老太太首次培育出来的，简直是鸟界洗剪吹里最完美的bowl cut。via与欧洲有关的一切
text: #久久# This bird with a watermelon taro-like hairstyle is scientifically called the Gloster Canary. Because of its peculiar crest, it is also known as the "Beatle Bird, Jarhead Canary". First bred by an old British lady in 1920, it is simply the most perfect bowl cut in the bird world. via Everything related to Europe
