chinese_text: 不求，朋友成群，但求知己一人；不求，财富无数，但求够花够用；不求，万人怜惜，但求一人的懂得；不求，房子多大，但求一家温暖；不求，车子豪华，但求一生平安；不求，衣着华丽，但求，穿着合体；不求才高八斗，但求思想丰富；不求地位显赫，但求工作顺心；不求，人生辉煌，但求一生无悔。
text: Don’t ask for friends, but ask for a confidant; don’t ask for countless wealth, but ask for enough money to spend; don’t ask for sympathy from thousands of people, but ask for the understanding of one person; don’t ask for how big the house is, but ask for the warmth of a family; don’t ask for the size of the house, but ask for the warmth of a family; I don’t ask for a luxurious car, but I want a safe life; I don’t ask for gorgeous clothes, but I want to be well-dressed; I don’t ask for great talents, but I want rich ideas; I don’t ask for a prominent position, but I want a smooth work; I don’t ask for a brilliant life, but I want a smooth life. But I hope you will have no regrets in your life.

chinese_text: 【今天世界问候日 你想问候谁？】你有多久没有问候身边的人？你又有多久没有收到别人的问候？今天对于每个人来说都是一个温馨的节日，无需昂贵的礼物，无需繁复的礼节，需要做的很简单，只要一个笑容，一声你好，一个拥抱，就能把快乐带给周围的人。世界问候日到了，问候你最爱的人。(央视)
text: [Who do you want to greet today World Greetings Day? 】How long has it been since you greeted the people around you? How long has it been since you received greetings from others? Today is a warm holiday for everyone. There is no need for expensive gifts or complicated etiquette. All you need to do is very simple. Just a smile, a hello, and a hug can bring happiness to the people around you. World Greetings Day is here, greet the people you love the most. (CCTV)

chinese_text: 【天津爆炸百日祭 黄晓明看望烈士家属】11月19日是“天津8.12爆炸事故”百日祭，@黄晓明@苏芒 等人20日现身天津滨海新区保税区消防支队，参加殉职消防员家属捐款仪式，黄晓明表示：“就是想告诉大家我们会代替你们的孩子照顾你们。”随后，他们到医院探望仍未出院的官兵。详情：http://t.cn/RUuUYus
text: [Huang Xiaoming visits the families of the martyrs during the 100-day commemoration of the Tianjin Explosion] November 19th is the 100-day commemoration of the "Tianjin 8.12 Explosion Incident". @黄晓明@suMang and others appeared at the Tianjin Binhai New Area Free Trade Zone Fire Brigade on the 20th to participate in donations to the families of the firefighters who died in the line of duty. During the ceremony, Huang Xiaoming said: "I just want to tell everyone that we will take care of you on behalf of your children." Afterwards, they went to the hospital to visit the officers and soldiers who had not yet been discharged. Details: http://t.cn/RUuUYus

chinese_text: 【金正恩用iPhone引朝鲜人跟风】朝鲜的手机用户已增至约300万人。据悉朝鲜手机用户在2013年5月超过200万人，近两年半增加了五成。之前韩国媒体就曾报道，朝鲜最高领导人金正恩使用最新iPhone手机的传闻出现后，iPhone 6作为“国家元首手机”广为人知，人气颇高。http://t.cn/RUuUfUw
text: [Kim Jong-un uses iPhone to lure North Koreans to follow suit] The number of mobile phone users in North Korea has increased to about 3 million. It is reported that the number of mobile phone users in North Korea exceeded 2 million in May 2013, an increase of 50% in the past two and a half years. South Korean media previously reported that after rumors emerged that North Korean leader Kim Jong-un was using the latest iPhone, the iPhone 6 became widely known as the "head of state mobile phone" and became very popular. http://t.cn/RUuUfUw

chinese_text: #中南海#【习近平就3名中国公民在马里遇害作批示】对这一残暴行径予以强烈谴责，向遇难者家属表示深切慰问，要求有关部门加大投入和保障，加强境外安全保护工作，确保我国公民和机构安全。中国将加强同国际社会的合作，坚决打击残害无辜生命的暴力恐怖活动，维护世界和平与安宁。http://t.cn/RUuoppH
text: #中南海# [Xi Jinping gave instructions on the murder of three Chinese citizens in Mali] Strongly condemned this brutal act, expressed deep condolences to the families of the victims, and requested relevant departments to increase investment and guarantees, strengthen overseas security protection, and ensure that our country Citizen and Institutional Security. China will strengthen cooperation with the international community, resolutely crack down on violent terrorist activities that harm innocent lives, and safeguard world peace and tranquility. http://t.cn/RUuoppH

text: [Xi Jinping issued important instructions on the murder of three Chinese citizens in the #MaliHostage Incident#] Xi Jinping issued the instructions, strongly condemning the brutal acts of terrorists, expressing deep condolences to the families of the victims, and requiring relevant departments to increase investment in guarantees and strengthen overseas security. protection efforts to ensure the safety of our citizens and institutions. China will strengthen cooperation with the international community, resolutely crack down on violent terrorist activities that harm innocent lives, and safeguard world peace and tranquility.

chinese_text: 【为了女儿 单亲妈妈扛500斤硬币买房[心]】近日,四川的宁女士扛着7麻袋共500多斤的硬币，到眉山一售楼处买房。工作人员在联系5家银行后,终于有银行接收了硬币，经3个小时的清点，硬币共计43500元。据悉，宁女士是单亲妈妈，硬币是自己卖塑料袋攒下来的，为给女儿买房就拿出来。网友：满满的母爱！[赞]
text: [Single mother carries 500 kilograms of coins to buy a house for her daughter [heart]] Recently, Ms. Ning from Sichuan carried 7 sacks of coins totaling more than 500 kilograms to buy a house at a sales office in Meishan. After the staff contacted five banks, one bank finally accepted the coins. After three hours of counting, the coins totaled 43,500 yuan. It is reported that Ms. Ning is a single mother. She saved the coins by selling plastic bags and used them to buy a house for her daughter. Netizen: Full of maternal love! [Thumbs up]

chinese_text: 【李克强就3名我国公民在#马里人质劫持事件#中遇害作出重要批示】李克强作出重要批示，向我遇难人员家属表示深切慰问，要求有关部门妥善做好相关后续工作，切实加强我驻外机构和企业安全防范措施，保护好我在外人员的安全。
text: [Li Keqiang issued important instructions on the murder of three Chinese citizens in the #MaliHosageTake Incident#] Li Keqiang issued important instructions, expressing deep condolences to the families of the victims, requiring relevant departments to properly carry out relevant follow-up work, and effectively strengthen our overseas institutions and corporate security precautions to protect the safety of my personnel outside the country.

chinese_text: 【抑郁症10种表现，你中招了吗？[失望]】抑郁症，听起来就是一个“很难过”的病。世卫组织预计，2020年抑郁症将跃至全球第二大疾病，自杀是其最可怕的症状。失眠？发火？食不知味？暴饮暴食？精疲力尽？最近2周内，如果你每天都要面临图中4个或4个以上症状，请及时就医。权威自测，扩散！↓↓@丁香医生
text: [10 manifestations of depression, have you fallen victim to them? [Disappointment]] Depression sounds like a “sad” disease. The WHO predicts that depression will become the second most common disease in the world in 2020, with suicide being its most terrifying symptom. Insomnia? Angry? Don’t know how to taste food? Overeating? Exhausted? In the past 2 weeks, if you have experienced 4 or more of the symptoms in the picture every day, please seek medical treatment in time. Authoritative self-test, spread! ↓↓@Dr. Lilac

chinese_text: #转基因三文鱼上餐桌#【转基因三文鱼致癌？ 美药管局：安全】《华盛顿邮报》调查显示，58%的人表示不会食用转基因三文鱼，欧盟的反对者则占77%。有人担心，转基因三文鱼体内有大量生长素，可能诱发癌变。美国药管局：审批详尽而严格，证明其是安全的，不会强制要求标注转基因。
text: #Genegenic salmon on the table# [Genetically modified salmon causes cancer? FDA: Safety] A "Washington Post" survey showed that 58% of people said they would not eat genetically modified salmon, and 77% were opposed to the EU. Some people worry that genetically modified salmon contains a large amount of growth hormone, which may induce cancer. The U.S. Food and Drug Administration: The approval is detailed and strict, proving that it is safe, and will not mandate labeling of genetically modified products.

chinese_text: 【“10+1”会场：李克强全面回应“以一当十”】第十八次中国—东盟领导人会议21日下午在吉隆坡举行。李克强总理开场白后，东盟十国领导人 一一发言， 就深化中国—东盟友好合作，开创地区和平稳定、发展繁荣的美好未来等提出各自意见和诉求。之后李克强发表讲话，对他们的发言作了全面深入的回应。
text: ["10+1" Venue: Li Keqiang comprehensively responded to "one as ten"] The 18th China-ASEAN Leaders' Meeting was held in Kuala Lumpur on the afternoon of the 21st. After Premier Li Keqiang's opening remarks, the leaders of the ten ASEAN countries spoke one by one, putting forward their respective opinions and demands on deepening friendly cooperation between China and ASEAN and creating a bright future for regional peace, stability, development and prosperity. Li Keqiang then delivered a speech and gave a comprehensive and in-depth response to their speeches.

chinese_text: #你好，小雪#【描写雪的诗词，你知道哪些？】①梅须逊雪三分白，雪却输梅一段香。—卢梅坡《雪梅》；②孤舟蓑笠翁，独钓寒江雪。—柳宗元《江雪》；③残灯耿耿愁孤影，小雪霏霏送旧年。—陆游《除夜》；④忽如一夜春风来，千树万树梨花开。—岑参《白雪歌送武判官归京》
text: #好，小雪# [What poems about snow do you know? 】①The plum blossoms are three points whiter than the snow, but the snow loses the fragrance of the plum blossoms. ——Lu Meipo's "Snow Plum"; ② A man with a coir raincoat hat is alone in a boat, fishing alone in the snow in the cold river. ——Liu Zongyuan's "Snow on the River"; ③The broken lamp is full of sorrow and lonely shadow, and the light snow is falling to send off the old year. ——Lu You's "New Year's Eve"; ④Suddenly like a spring breeze coming overnight, thousands of pear trees bloom. —Cen Shen's "Bai Xuege Sends Judge Wu Back to the Capital"

chinese_text: 【很多孩子都会戴这个 真的安全吗？】能通话、能定位、能求救，儿童智能手表看似让孩子更安全。一漏洞检测中心称“淘宝前32位智能手表有13款存安全漏洞”，黑客能获取儿童行走路线、窃听对话、提取手机号。目前智能穿戴没有统一规范，“安全”手表可能让孩子更危险！扩散！（央视)
text: [Many children wear this. Is it really safe? 】Able to talk, locate, and call for help, children’s smart watches seem to make children safer. A vulnerability detection center said that "13 of the top 32 smartwatches on Taobao have security vulnerabilities." Hackers can obtain children's walking routes, eavesdrop on conversations, and extract mobile phone numbers. There is currently no unified standard for smart wear, and “safety” watches may put children at greater risk! diffusion! (CCTV)

chinese_text: 【江苏6岁女童遇害被埋 曾跟“叔叔”离开玩游戏】18日，武进一对卖煎饼的老夫妻的孙女失踪了。20日，警方发现孩子尸体被埋在失踪地附近的绿化带里，嫌疑人是常来买煎饼，并带孩子玩耍的熟人。孩子爷爷伤心的称，孩子平日除了在幼儿园，就是跟他们在饼摊上帮忙或玩耍…(现代快报)http://t.cn/RUu0vj1
text: [A 6-year-old girl in Jiangsu was murdered and buried. She left to play games with her "uncle"] On the 18th, the granddaughter of an old couple selling pancakes in Wujin disappeared. On the 20th, the police found the child's body buried in a green belt near the place of disappearance. The suspect was an acquaintance who often came to buy pancakes and play with the child. The child's grandfather said sadly that besides being in the kindergarten, the child would help or play with them at the cake stall... (Modern Express) http://t.cn/RUu0vj1

chinese_text: 【央视曝光：投资85亿！贵阳30000套保障房竟闲置！】国家审计署近日公布了一个惊人的数据：贵州贵阳市，3万套保障房竟一直闲置！记者发现，一些小区房子虽已建好，但是水、电等还不能入户。这些保障房项目共涉及投85.43亿元，可因为不完善配套设施，老百姓有房却迟迟住不进... http://t.cn/RUuaO20
text: [CCTV exposure: 8.5 billion investment! 30,000 affordable housing units in Guiyang are idle! 】The National Audit Office recently released a shocking data: 30,000 affordable housing units in Guiyang City, Guizhou Province have been idle! However, due to incomplete supporting facilities, people who have houses have been unable to move in... http://t.cn/RUuaO20

chinese_text: 【两男子驾车撞倒9岁男孩后将其抱走】18日早上6点左右，9岁的云南曲靖师宗男孩刘望在上学路上被一辆面包车撞出数米，面包车的挡风玻璃被撞碎。随后，车上下来2名男子，把刘望抱上车驾车逃走。截至20日下午，孩子下落仍然不明，警方正在全力侦查中。（人民网）http://t.cn/RUmkgyB
text: [Two men hit a 9-year-old boy with a car and took him away] Around 6 a.m. on the 18th, 9-year-old Liu Wang, a boy from Shizong, Qujing, Yunnan, was hit several meters by a van on his way to school. chinese_text: 有些事想多了头疼，想通了心疼。所以，想不开就别想，得不到就别要，干嘛要委屈自己。在多说无益的时候，也许沉默就是最好的解释。命里有时终须 有，命里无时莫强求。生命毕竟是一个漫长的过程，每一寸时光都要自己亲历，每一杯雨露都要自己亲尝。 决定你是否快乐的关键是你的心境，而不是你的遭遇。
text: There are some things that give you a headache if you think about them too much, and you feel bad if you think them through. So, if you can't think about it, don't think about it. If you can't get it, don't ask for it. Why should you wrong yourself. When talking more is of no use, perhaps silence is the best explanation. Something will occur if it belongs to your life, if not, do not push it. After all, life is a long process. Every inch of time must be experienced by oneself, and every cup of rain and dew must be tasted by oneself. The key to determining whether you are happy or not is your state of mind, not your experiences.

chinese_text: #天下#【韩国前总统金泳三逝世】法制晚报援引韩联社消息称，韩国前总统金泳三于当地时间22日零时21分逝世。金泳三，1927年出生，1992年12月当选为韩国第十四届总统，1997年卸任。http://t.cn/RUu3Tj0另据中新网2011年报道，金泳三曾表示，他去世后将会捐出全部财产回馈社会，不会留给子孙。
text: #天下# [Former South Korean President Kim Young-sam passed away] Legal Evening News quoted Yonhap News Agency as saying that former South Korean President Kim Young-sam passed away at 0:21 local time on the 22nd. Kim Young-sam, born in 1927, was elected as the 14th President of South Korea in December 1992 and resigned in 1997. http://t.cn/RUu3Tj0 According to a 2011 report from China News Service, Kim Young-sam once said that after his death, he would donate all his property to give back to society and would not leave it to his descendants.

text: #民生# [No more missed appointments, Beijing will see heavy snow today with some blizzards] Yesterday morning, many Beijing residents opened their curtains but were disappointed: Where is the promised blizzard? However, today Snowflake will no longer miss her appointment. According to the forecast, Beijing will be cloudy with heavy snow during the day today, and there will be heavy to heavy snowfall in the west and north, with the snow depth reaching 10 to 15 centimeters. http://t.cn/RUuBkw0 Has it started snowing there?

chinese_text: 你明知道蜷缩在床上感觉更温暖，但还是一早就起床；你明知道什么都不做比较轻松，但依旧选择追逐梦想。这就是生活，你必须坚持下去——分享给周末仍然早起的你！图丨Andrew Evans
text: You know that curling up in bed feels warmer, but you still get up early in the morning; you know that doing nothing is easier, but you still choose to chase your dreams. This is life, you have to persevere - share this with you who still get up early on weekends! Picture丨Andrew Evans

chinese_text: #历史上的今天#【朱自清诞辰117周年】他曾任清华大学中国文学系主任；他的作品《匆匆》《春》《背影》陪伴一代代学子成长。在他淡淡的笔墨中，流露着深情，没有半点矫饰，却蕴藏着动人心弦的力量。如今，朱自清去世已66周年，而他笔下那位在南京浦口火车站捧着橘子的父亲，却久久留在人们的脑海里……
text: #thisdayinhistory# [117th anniversary of Zhu Ziqing’s birth] He was the director of the Department of Chinese Literature at Tsinghua University; his works "Hurry", "Spring" and "Back" have accompanied the growth of generations of students. In his light writing, there is deep feeling, without any pretense, but it contains the power of touching people's hearts. Today, it has been the 66th anniversary of Zhu Ziqing's death, but the father he wrote holding oranges at Nanjing Pukou Railway Station has remained in people's minds for a long time...

chinese_text: 【你好，小雪[雪]】①22日23时25分，将迎来冬季第二个节气——小雪。②进入小雪节气后，强冷空气活动更频繁，气温逐步降到0℃以下，注意别感冒；③外面寒冷，屋内燥热，人们穿得严实，体内的热气散发不出去，要当心别上火；④宜吃牛羊肉等温补食品，多吃苦味食物，多饮水。小雪到了，你那里温度多少？
text: [Hello, Xiaoxue [Snow]] ① At 23:25 on the 22nd, the second solar term of winter - Xiaoxue will be ushered in. ② After entering the light snow solar term, strong cold air moves more frequently, and the temperature gradually drops below 0℃, so be careful not to catch a cold; ③ It is cold outside and hot inside the house. People wear tight clothes and the heat in the body cannot escape, so be careful not to get angry; ④ It is advisable to eat warm tonic foods such as beef and mutton, eat more bitter foods, and drink more water. Light snow has arrived. What's the temperature there?

chinese_text: 狗不能喂的太饱，人不能对他太好！ 忍一时得寸进尺， 退一步变本加厉。玩笑别太过，要不都是祸。情不够，钱来凑，有钱身后一群狗，没钱社会路难走。 看清对你好的，记住被谁咬的。该吃吃该喝喝，破事儿别往心里搁。是人是狗，是敌是友，时间长了自己瞅。是鬼别装人，是人别装神。
text: Don't feed a dog too much, and don't treat him too well! Forbearance can push you even harder for a while, but you can take a step back to make things worse. Don't joke too much, otherwise it will be a disaster. If you don't have enough love, you need money. If you have money, you will have a bunch of dogs behind you. Without money, it will be difficult to find a way out of society. See what is good for you and remember who bit you. Eat and drink when you should, and don't take things to heart. Whether it is a human or a dog, whether it is an enemy or a friend, you will see for yourself over time. If you are a ghost, don’t pretend to be a human being; if you are a human being, don’t pretend to be a god.

chinese_text: 【[推荐]推荐！30部经典小说】毛姆说，阅读就像随身携带的小型避难所。生活过于琐碎杂乱，书本那么简单安静，如果看到有趣的内容再引起你的思考，真的是要被文字带着飞起来了。碎片化阅读的今天，你有多久没好好读本书了？30部中外经典长篇小说↓这个周末，离开网络，在书香中沉静吧！（人民日报）
text: [[Recommended] Recommended! 30 Classic Novels] Maugham said that reading is like a small refuge that you carry with you. Life is too trivial and messy, and books are so simple and quiet. If you see interesting content that arouses your thinking, you will really be carried away by the words. In today’s world of fragmented reading, how long has it been since you read a book properly? 30 Chinese and foreign classic novels↓This weekend, leave the Internet and relax in the fragrance of books! (People's Daily)

text: [5 kinds of fruits and vegetables that help to build a good figure] 1. Celery slims the face: crude fiber helps intestinal peristalsis, detoxifies and nourishes the skin; 2. Strawberries slim the waist: aspartic acid dissolves fat accumulated in the waist; 3. White radish slims the thighs: promotes Fat metabolism; 4. Grapefruit slims the back: affects the body's absorption of sugar; 5. Tomato slims the lower abdomen: prevents fat from being absorbed by the intestines. Eat more vegetable.

chinese_text: 【李克强：妥处分歧才能让10+1合作走得远】李克强总理21日在中国-东盟领导人会议上说，国家间交往有分歧不奇怪，关键是要看到我们的共同利益远大于分歧，对于分歧应加以妥善管控和处理。10+1合作要走得远、行得稳，要善于运用“和而不同”、“以和促解”的智慧，包容互鉴、合作共赢。
text: [Li Keqiang: Only by properly handling differences can 10+1 cooperation go far] Premier Li Keqiang said at the China-ASEAN Leaders’ Meeting on the 21st that it is not surprising that there are differences in exchanges between countries. The key is to see that our common interests far outweigh our differences. , differences should be properly managed and handled. For 10+1 cooperation to go far and be stable, we must be good at using the wisdom of "harmony in diversity" and "promoting solutions through peace" to be inclusive, mutually learning, and win-win.

chinese_text: 生活不会按你想要的方式进行，它会给你一段时间，让你孤独、迷茫又沉默忧郁，但如果靠这段时间跟自己独处，多看一本书，去做可以做的事，放下过去的人，等你度过低潮，那些独处的时光必定能照亮你的路，也是这些不堪陪你成熟。所以，现在没那么糟，看似生活对你的亏欠，其实都是祝愿。
text: Life will not go the way you want. It will give you a period of time that will make you lonely, confused, silent and melancholy. But if you rely on this time to be alone with yourself, read one more book, and do what you can, Let go of the people in the past, and when you get through the slump, those times alone will surely light up your path, and it is these things that cannot help but accompany you to maturity. So, it’s not that bad now. It seems like life owes you, but it’s actually all blessings.

chinese_text: 没有谁是因为一时冲动而离开你的，那些难过无助又一次次忍耐的眼泪你都看不见。就像堤坝下逐渐因侵蚀而拓宽的裂缝，你看见的，只是它崩溃的那个瞬间。"请关 注我，这里总有一句是你想说的话“
text: No one leaves you because of impulse, and you can't see those tears of sadness and helplessness that you endure again and again. Like a crack under a dam that gradually widens due to erosion, all you see is the moment it collapses. "Please follow me, there is always something you want to say here"

chinese_text: 【李克强：妥处分歧才能让10+1合作走得远】李克强总理21日在中国-东盟领导人会议上说，国家间交往有分歧不奇怪，关键是要看到我们的共同利益远大于分歧，对于分歧应加以妥善管控和处理。10+1合作要走得远、行得稳，要善于运用“和而不同”、“以和促解”的智慧，包容互鉴、合作共赢。
text: [Li Keqiang: Only by properly handling differences can 10+1 cooperation go far] Premier Li Keqiang said at the China-ASEAN Leaders’ Meeting on the 21st that it is not surprising that there are differences in exchanges between countries. The key is to see that our common interests far outweigh our differences. , differences should be properly managed and handled. For 10+1 cooperation to go far and be stable, we must be good at using the wisdom of "harmony in diversity" and "promoting solutions through peace" to be inclusive, mutually learning, and win-win.

chinese_text: 【快递业将建"黑名单" 专治快递业各种乱象！[噢耶]】近日，国家邮政局表示快递业将建立违法失信体系。该体系以建立"黑名单"和联合惩戒制度为重点，力争将快递业逐渐规范化。此前消费者遇到延误、丢失、违规收费等问题，仅能通过国家邮政局网站进行申诉。"黑名单"来啦，你要往"小本本"上记谁一笔？[来]
text: [The express delivery industry will establish a "blacklist" to deal with all kinds of chaos in the express delivery industry! [Oh yeah]] Recently, the State Post Bureau stated that the express delivery industry will establish an illegal and dishonest system. This system focuses on establishing a "blacklist" and a joint disciplinary system, and strives to gradually standardize the express delivery industry. Previously, when consumers encountered problems such as delays, losses, and illegal charges, they could only lodge complaints through the State Post Bureau website. The "blacklist" is here, who are you going to write down in the "little book"? [Come]

chinese_text: 【华北强降雪 中东部强降温 快把自己捂好】中央气象台继续发布暴雪蓝色预警。预计今天白天到夜间，内蒙古中部偏南地区、北京、天津北部等地部分地区有大雪或暴雪。强降温天气将从明天起至26日自北向南覆盖我国中东部地区。华北北部将下降至-24～-18℃。提醒北方公众外出注意防寒保暖。(央视记者任梅梅)
text: [Heavy snowfall in North China and strong cooling in the central and eastern parts of China, please cover yourself] The Central Meteorological Observatory continues to issue blue warnings for heavy snowfall. It is expected that there will be heavy snow or blizzard in some areas in the south-central part of Inner Mongolia, Beijing, northern Tianjin and other places during the day and night today. Strong cooling weather will cover central and eastern my country from north to south from tomorrow to the 26th. The temperature in northern North China will drop to -24~-18℃. The public in the north is reminded to pay attention to keeping warm and cold when going out. (CCTV reporter Ren Meimei)

chinese_text: 【千万注意！哪些饮料最伤牙齿 看完你还敢多喝吗】记者将五颗牙齿，浸泡在白开水、有色碳酸、无色碳酸、凉茶类以及运动饮料中。三天后，浸泡在有色碳酸饮料和凉茶中的牙齿色素沉着更加明显，而七天后，有色碳酸饮料浸泡的牙齿，牙釉质遭到破坏...医生提醒：喝完这类饮料以后应漱口、刷牙。（央视财经）
text: 【Be careful! After reading which drinks are most harmful to your teeth, do you still dare to drink more?] The reporter soaked five teeth in boiled water, colored carbonic acid, colorless carbonic acid, herbal tea and sports drinks. After three days, the pigmentation of teeth soaked in colored carbonated drinks and herbal tea was more obvious, and after seven days, the enamel of teeth soaked in colored carbonated drinks was damaged... Doctors remind: After drinking such drinks, you should rinse your mouth, brush teeth. (CCTV Finance)

chinese_text: 【急扩！9岁男孩被面包车撞倒并带走 目前下落不明】18日早6点，云南师宗县9岁男孩刘望上学途中被撞，车上男子将其抱走逃跑，至今下落不明。刘望，身高1米3，身穿绿色羽绒服、蓝色牛仔裤及黑色旅游鞋。肇事车辆为浅色面包车，前挡风玻璃有蛛网状裂痕。如有线索请报警，扩散帮孩子回家！(央视记者李常明)
text: 【Emergency expansion! 9-year-old boy was hit by a van and taken away. His current whereabouts are unknown] At 6 a.m. on the 18th, a 9-year-old boy Liu Wang from Shizong County, Yunnan, was hit on his way to school. The man in the car took him away and ran away. His whereabouts are still unknown. Liu Wang, 1.3 meters tall, was wearing a green down jacket, blue jeans and black sneakers. The vehicle involved in the accident was a light-colored van with spiderweb-like cracks on the front windshield. If you have any clues, please call the police and spread the word to help the children get home! (CCTV reporter Li Changming)

text: 【alert! If you encounter someone carrying such a bag, please call the police immediately! 】If you find that you are carrying a large backpack with many cooling holes in the bag, call 110 immediately. This is a fake base station: a device that sends fake customer service text messages such as 10086, 95588, 95533, etc. to let you redeem points for rewards. In addition, if you receive such a text message, do not open the link to avoid being deceived. Forward reminder! (People's Daily) http://t.cn/RUuZVgS

chinese_text: 【心酸！患病爷爷自杀 省钱救治6岁白血病孙子[悲伤]】6月底，小凡圣被确诊为急性白血病。爷爷在本身患糖尿病的情况下，又得了抑郁症。为了省钱，爷爷不肯再为自己治疗，说自己的钱都要留给孙子。"爷爷走在你前头了啊，你好好治病"。这是爷爷生前最后一次来医院看孙子所说的话。8月23日，爷爷上吊自杀。
text: 【Sad! The sick grandfather committed suicide to save money to treat his 6-year-old leukemia grandson [Sad]] At the end of June, Xiao Fansheng was diagnosed with acute leukemia. My grandfather also suffered from depression while suffering from diabetes. In order to save money, my grandfather refused to treat himself anymore and said that he would leave all his money to his grandson. "Grandpa is ahead of you. You should take good care of your illness." These were the words my grandfather said when he came to the hospital to see his grandson for the last time before his death. On August 23, my grandfather hanged himself.

chinese_text: 【心理亚健康的十大典型症状】①常感到不开心②常情绪烦躁、紧张，不能集中注意力③很难与其他人建立朋友关系④有意回避社交场合⑤敏感，经常与人发生不快⑥多疑，总感觉别人在谈论自己⑦常为小事与人发生争执⑧睡眠不好，经常入睡困难、早醒⑨工作效率下降，学习成绩不如从前⑩觉得生活没有意思。
text: [Ten typical symptoms of sub-mental health] ① Often feel unhappy ② Often irritable, nervous, unable to concentrate ③ It is difficult to establish friendship with other people ④ Intentionally avoiding social situations ⑤ Sensitive, often unhappy with others ⑥ Suspicious , I always feel like others are talking about me ⑦ I often get into arguments with others over trivial matters ⑧ I don’t sleep well, often have difficulty falling asleep and wake up early ⑨ Work efficiency decreases and my academic performance is not as good as before ⑩ I feel that life is boring.

chinese_text: 当我们紧握双手，里面什么也没有；当我们打开双手，世界就在我们手中。我们老想把什么东西都死死抱住，殊不知，有些东西原本就不属于你。小舍小 得，大舍大得，不舍不得，越舍越得。与其苦苦强求，不如潇洒挥手，勇敢地选择放弃。放弃，能让我们更宽容、更睿智、更从容。放弃，也是另一种获得！
text: When we clench our hands, there is nothing inside; when we open our hands, the world is in our hands. We always want to hold on to everything, but as everyone knows, some things don't belong to you in the first place. A small sacrifice will give you a small gain, a big sacrifice will bring you a big gain. If you don’t give up, the more you give up, the more you gain. Instead of insisting, it is better to wave your hand and bravely choose to give up. Giving up can make us more tolerant, wiser and calmer. Giving up is also another kind of gain!

chinese_text: 【国家防总：南方发生罕见冬汛】受连续强降雨影响，近日，广西、广东、湖南、江西等地出现罕见冬汛，30余条河流发生超警洪水。广西、湖南、江西三省区55.5万人受灾，直接经济损失约9.9亿元。国家防总紧急部署防御工作，最大程度减轻人员伤亡和财产损失。请当地群众注意自身安全。（央视记者王凯博）
text: [National Defense Directorate: Rare winter floods occur in the south] Affected by continuous heavy rainfall, rare winter floods have occurred in Guangxi, Guangdong, Hunan, Jiangxi and other places in recent days, and more than 30 rivers have experienced floods exceeding warning levels. 555,000 people were affected in the three provinces of Guangxi, Hunan, and Jiangxi, resulting in direct economic losses of approximately 990 million yuan. The National Defense Headquarters urgently deployed defense work to minimize casualties and property losses. Local people are asked to pay attention to their own safety. (CCTV reporter Wang Kaibo)

chinese_text: 累的时候，换个角度看世界；压抑的时侯，换个环境深呼吸；困惑的时候，换个位置去思考；犹豫的时候，换个思路去选择；郁闷的时候，换个环境找快乐；烦恼的时候，换个思维去排解；抱怨的时候，换个方法看问题；自卑的时候，换个想法去对待。生活中学会换位思考，你的世界才会简单，人心简单就幸福。
text: When you are tired, look at the world from a different angle; when you are depressed, change your environment and take a deep breath; when you are confused, change your position and think; when you hesitate, change your thoughts and choices; when you are depressed, change your environment to find happiness; when you are troubled, change your mind. Use your own thinking to solve the problem; when you complain, look at the problem in a different way; when you feel inferior, treat it in a different way. If you learn to think from other people's perspective in life, your world will be simple, and people who are simple will be happy.

chinese_text: 【东盟峰会宣布东盟共同体在年底正式建立】今天，在本次东盟峰会及系列峰会举行期间，东盟各国领导人共同签署了《2015吉隆坡宣言》，宣告东盟共同体在今年年底正式建立。峰会期间还签署了《东盟2025年吉隆坡宣言：携手共进》，这份政治性文件规划了东盟未来10年的行动规划。（央视记者窦筠韵 朱雪松）
text: [The ASEAN Summit announced that the ASEAN Community will be officially established at the end of the year] Today, during the ASEAN Summit and a series of summits, leaders of ASEAN countries jointly signed the "2015 Kuala Lumpur Declaration", announcing that the ASEAN Community will be officially established at the end of this year. During the summit, the "ASEAN 2025 Kuala Lumpur Declaration: Working Together" was also signed. This political document plans ASEAN's action plan for the next 10 years. (CCTV reporter Dou Junyun and Zhu Xuesong)

chinese_text: #知政#【李克强就南海问题阐述中方原则立场】李克强在东亚峰会上就南海问题表示，中国致力于南海争议由直接有关的主权国家谈判协商解决、南海和平稳定由中国和东盟国家共同维护的“双轨思路”；坚决维护南海航行和飞越自由；中方在本国岛礁上开展建设合理合法，谈不上“军事化”。http://t.cn/RU3U3hD
text: #知正# [Li Keqiang elaborated on China’s principled position on the South China Sea issue] Li Keqiang stated on the South China Sea issue at the East Asia Summit that China is committed to the South China Sea disputes being resolved through negotiation and consultation by the sovereign states directly concerned, and the peace and stability of the South China Sea being jointly maintained by China and ASEAN countries. "Dual-track approach"; resolutely safeguard freedom of navigation and overflight in the South China Sea; China's construction on its own islands and reefs is reasonable and legal, and cannot be said to be "militarized." http://t.cn/RU3U3hD

text: Take a bath, look at a flower, or eat a meal. If you feel happy, it's not all because the bath is clean, the flowers bloom well, or the food is to your taste. It's mainly because you have no worries. ——Qian Zhongshu

chinese_text: 温和对人对事。不要随意发脾气，谁都不欠你的。 现在很痛苦，等过阵子回头看看，会发现其实那都不算事。学会宽容伤害自己的人，因为他们很可怜，各人都有自己的难处，大家都不容易。仰望天空时，什么都比你高，你会自卑；俯视大地时，什么都比你低，你会自负。
text: Be gentle with people and things. Don't lose your temper randomly, no one owes you anything. It's painful now, but when I look back later, I'll realize that it didn't really matter. Learn to tolerate those who hurt you, because they are very pitiful, everyone has their own difficulties, and it is not easy for everyone. When you look up at the sky, everything is higher than you, and you will feel inferior; when you look down at the earth, everything is lower than you, and you will feel conceited.

chinese_text: 【27年后，她找到舍身救她的消防员[心]】1988年冬，上海一起火灾，母亲抱着3个月大的女儿被困4楼窗台。一名消防员抱着女婴往下爬，电线打来他触电摔下，坠地瞬间将女婴搂在胸膛。她平安，他却粉碎性骨折……如今女孩学成回国，几经周折找到救命恩人陆玉明，只为亲口说声“谢谢”！http://t.cn/RU3qLW1
text: [27 years later, she found the firefighter who sacrificed his life to save her [heart]] In the winter of 1988, there was a fire in Shanghai, and the mother was trapped on the fourth floor window while holding her 3-month-old daughter. A firefighter was climbing down with a baby girl in his arms. When a power line hit him, he was electrocuted and fell. The moment he hit the ground, he held the baby girl in his chest. She is safe, but he suffered a comminuted fracture... Now the girl has returned to China after studying, and after many setbacks, she found her savior Lu Yuming, just to say "thank you" in person! http://t.cn/RU3qLW1

chinese_text: 【林则徐说】①若鸦片一日未绝，本大臣一日不回②苟利国家生死以，岂因祸福避趋之③海到无边天作岸，山登绝顶我为峰④海纳百川，有容乃大；壁立千仞，无欲则刚⑤子孙若如我，留钱做什么？贤而多财，则损其志；子孙不如我，留钱做什么？愚而多财，则增其过。今天，民族英雄林则徐逝世165年。缅怀！
text: [Lin Zexu said] ① If opium is not exhausted for a day, this minister will not come back for a day ② To benefit the life and death of the country, how can we avoid it due to misfortune and fortune ③ The sea is boundless and the sky is the shore, the mountain is the top and I am the peak ④ The sea embraces all rivers, there are Capacity is great; thousands of people stand on the wall, and if you have no desire, you will be strong. 5. If my descendants are like me, what will they do with the money? If a virtuous person has a lot of wealth, it will harm his ambition; if my descendants are not as good as me, what will I do with the money? Being foolish and having too much wealth will increase your faults. Today marks the 165th anniversary of the death of national hero Lin Zexu. In memory!

chinese_text: 有时候突然就不想工作了，有时候会突然想要喝几杯，有时候会想要独自旅行，有时候就想结婚了……我们的脑子里有那么多的念头，可是仅仅只是想想而已。或许我们真的需要一些勇气，为一些突然蹦出的念头而尝试一下。也许，它会带给你惊喜。
text: Sometimes I suddenly don’t want to work, sometimes I suddenly want to have a few drinks, sometimes I want to travel alone, sometimes I just want to get married... There are so many thoughts in our minds, but we are just thinking about it. . Maybe we really need some courage to give some ideas a try. Maybe, it will surprise you.

chinese_text: 【男婴出生3天被遗弃 父母留字条:想要个女儿[伤心]】昨日下午，四川两环卫工人在顺庆区欧香小镇小区路边，发现一名遗婴。婴儿被送往川北医学院后，被发现脚踝上有张纸条："生于2015年11月21日早9点，因第一个是男孩，第二个还是男孩，第三个想要女孩，又是男孩。"经警方努力，目前孩子已被家长抱回。
text: [A baby boy who was abandoned 3 days ago left a note from his parents: I want a daughter [sad]] Yesterday afternoon, two sanitation workers in Sichuan discovered an abandoned baby on the roadside of Ouxiang Town Community in Shunqing District. After the baby was sent to North Sichuan Medical College, a note was found on his ankle: "Born at 9 a.m. on November 21, 2015, because the first one is a boy, the second one is still a boy, and the third one wants a girl." , it’s a boy again.” Thanks to the efforts of the police, the child has been taken back by his parents.

chinese_text: 你有没有这种症状：因为某件小事心情变得很糟，不想说话不想搭理人，觉得担子好重快要垮掉，感觉所有的烦恼一下子都堆起来。剪不断理不清，泪腺极 度膨胀，心里闷得要死，以为马上就是世界末日了。这种时候真的很难受。不要问我怎么办，我不知道。还是顺其自然吧，雨过了，天晴了就好。
text: Do you have this symptom: you feel very bad because of some small thing, you don’t want to talk or deal with others, you feel that the burden is so heavy that you are about to collapse, and you feel that all your worries are piled up at once. The scissors kept getting messed up, my tear ducts were extremely swollen, and I felt so depressed that I thought the world was about to end. It's really hard at this time. Don't ask me what to do, I don't know. Just let nature take its course, as long as the rain has passed and the weather has cleared up.

chinese_text: 他是英国最特别的一个10岁小学生..... 每天早上，他总是第一个到学校，每天早上，他总是最后一个才离开。老师永远只点他回答问题。每次大考小考课堂测验他都是班里的第一名。好吧。。。。。他住在英国最偏远的一个小岛上。他去的是一所只有一个学生的小学。学校里唯一的一个学生，就是他自己。。。。
text: He is the most special 10-year-old primary school student in Britain... Every morning, he is always the first to arrive at school, and every morning, he is always the last to leave. The teacher always only clicks on him to answer questions. He ranked first in the class in every major and small exam and classroom test. All right. . . . . He lives on one of the most remote islands in the UK. He went to an elementary school with only one student. The only student in the school is himself. . . .

text: [Guangdong will fully liberalize the "college entrance examination in other places" next year: one parent is required to pay social security in Guangdong for three consecutive years] Recently, the Guangdong education department issued a notice that from next year, the children of migrant workers studying in ordinary high schools can take the college entrance examination in Guangdong. Requirements: ① At least one parent has paid social security in Guangdong for three consecutive years ② One parent provides a residence permit in Guangdong ③ Proof of legal residence ④ The child has taken the high school entrance examination in Guangdong and has a complete three-year academic status. (CCTV reporter Wei Xing)

chinese_text: 【爷爷背百斤山货下山 想救白血病孙女[泪]】两岁的孙女得白血病已到重庆住院。60岁爷爷背上自家产的百斤山货，走2个半小时山路、坐6小时车，到重庆摆摊，给孩子凑救命钱。两天才卖出4把党参，80元，老人急得抹眼泪。“山货爷爷”感动许多重庆网友：今天就去看，能帮就帮！（@中国新闻网 ）
text: [Grandpa carries hundreds of kilograms of mountain goods down the mountain to save his granddaughter who has leukemia [tears]] My two-year-old granddaughter has leukemia and has been hospitalized in Chongqing. The 60-year-old grandfather carried a hundred kilograms of his own mountain products on his back, walked two and a half hours on the mountain road, and took a six-hour bus ride to Chongqing to set up a stall to collect life-saving money for his children. Only 4 handfuls of Codonopsis pilosula were sold in two days for 80 yuan. The old man was so anxious that he wiped away tears. "Grandpa Shanhuo" moved many Chongqing netizens: Go see it today and help if you can! (@China News Network)

chinese_text: 西安终南山下的古观音禅寺内有一棵千年古银杏树，树龄已有1400年，是当年唐太宗李世民亲手栽种的，从这个月11号，银杏叶子开始凋落，前几天叶子越落越多，金黄的银杏叶子像是在银杏树下铺成了黄金的毯子，场面十分壮观！
text: There is a thousand-year-old ginkgo tree in the ancient Guanyin Temple at the foot of Zhongnan Mountain in Xi'an. It is 1,400 years old. It was planted by Emperor Taizong Li Shimin of the Tang Dynasty. From the 11th of this month, the leaves of the ginkgo began to fall. In the past few days, the leaves have fallen more and more. There are many, golden ginkgo leaves like a golden blanket spread under the ginkgo tree. The scene is very spectacular!

chinese_text: 明明讨厌卻还是要笑着说还好 明明很难过卻还是要装作若无其事 明明很介意卻还是会心一笑说沒关系 明明捨不得卻还是要装作毫不在乎 明明很爱他卻還是要勉强自己欺骗自己 做了那么多违背心愿的事真的好累 像是背了一個沉重的包袱 想放下卻放不下
text: You know you hate him, but you still have to smile and say it's okay. You know he's sad, but you still have to pretend to be indifferent. You know he cares a lot, but you still have to smile knowingly and say it's okay. You know you can't let him go, but you still have to pretend not to care. You know you love him very much, but you still have to force yourself to deceive yourself. I feel so tired after doing so many things that go against my wishes. It’s like I’m carrying a heavy burden. I want to put it down but can’t.

chinese_text: 你说要懂我 那么你来仔细看看 把我揉碎了看 骨头是贪婪 毛孔是笨拙 血液是卑微 肉身是盲目 还有五脏六腑的不甘心和占有欲 每一寸每一分 都是不好的 但你把它们合起来 合成一个我 你再看 是爱你的
text: You said you want to understand me, so take a closer look and crush me into pieces. The bones are greedy, the pores are clumsy, the blood is humble, the body is blind, and the internal organs are unwilling and possessive. Every inch and every bit is bad. But You put them together into one and I love you again.

chinese_text: 许久不联系的人，不用再联系。各自辛苦，各自生活，也再无交集，该停留在过去的，就让它停留在过去。如果有缘，会再见。若无缘，不如不见。就是这样。
text: If you haven’t contacted someone for a long time, there is no need to contact them again. They work hard and live their own lives, and there is no intersection. What should stay in the past, let it stay in the past. If we are destined, we will meet again. If there is no chance, it is better not to meet. That's it.

chinese_text: 好好吃饭，好好睡觉，好好挣钱，好好花钱。不为不值得的人生气，不为不值得的事失眠。既然活着就好好活着，每分钟都为自己活着。
text: Eat well, sleep well, earn well, spend well. Don't be angry with people who don't deserve it, don't lose sleep over things that don't deserve it. Since you are alive, live well and live for yourself every minute.

chinese_text: 记住，不是眼泪就可以挽回失去的，所以不要轻易流下你的泪；记住，不是伤心就一定要哭泣，所以不要那么吝啬你的微笑；记住，不是你认为可以给予就给予，所以不要那么轻易许下承诺；记住，不是你做的不够好，所以不要悲悯的以为自己一事无成；记住，不是只有你一个人在努力，所以不要轻易的就放弃。
text: Remember, not tears can restore what is lost, so don’t shed your tears easily; remember, you must cry if you are not sad, so don’t be so stingy with your smile; remember, you don’t give just because you think you can give, so don’t It’s so easy to make a promise; remember, it’s not that you’re not good enough, so don’t pity yourself for accomplishing nothing; remember, you’re not the only one working hard, so don’t give up easily.

The Forbidden City received nearly 30,000 tourists in the morning, which is comparable to the number of visitors in a day in the past. Netizens liked the photo after seeing it: "The red wall is lined with white snow, and the flowers are falling in pieces. It's so peaceful and beautiful." What story do you think of in this situation?

chinese_text: 这辈子，和谁过，怎样过，过多久，有人因为爱情，有人因为物质，有人因为容貌，有人因为前途，有人因为压力。而当这日子真的要和选择的人一起过了，你才明白，钱够花就好，容貌不吓人就行。其实真正幸福的标准，无需理由很简单，只要笑容比眼泪多，你就找对人了。[心]
text: In this life, who do you live with, how do you live, and how long does it take? Some people do it because of love, some people do it because of material things, some people do it because of their appearance, some people do it because of their future, and some people do it because of pressure. And when you really have to spend this life with the person you choose, you will understand that it is enough to have enough money and not to be scary in appearance. In fact, the standard of true happiness is very simple without any reason. As long as there are more smiles than tears, you have found the right person. [Heart]

chinese_text: 【27年后，她找到火海救她的消防员[心]】27年前，上海一民居起火，母亲抱着3个月大女婴被困家中。一消防员冲进火场，抱起女婴往下爬，烧断的电线打来，他触电坠地的瞬间，翻身护住女婴，自己右臂却粉碎骨折…27年后，女孩费尽周折找到了救命恩人陆玉明，亲口对他说了“谢谢”。http://t.cn/RU3qLW1
text: [27 years later, she found the firefighter who saved her from the sea of flames [heart]] 27 years ago, a house in Shanghai caught fire, and the mother was trapped in the house holding a 3-month-old baby girl. A firefighter rushed into the fire scene, picked up the baby girl and climbed down. When he was hit by the burnt wire, he was electrocuted and fell to the ground. He turned over to protect the baby girl, but his right arm was shattered and fractured... 27 years later, the girl was found after all the troubles. I met my savior Lu Yuming and said "thank you" to him personally. http://t.cn/RU3qLW1

It also cites research that says parents giving their newborn babies more companionship will help them grow. The company allows every U.S. employee to take four months of paid maternity or paternity leave, which employees can take in several installments or all at once. http://t.cn/RU3ecc5

chinese_text: 【北大教授：农民养女儿在老年所得回报优于养儿子】北京大学国家发展研究院教授曾毅介绍，为期七年的全国大样本老年健康长寿影响因素跟踪调查研究成果令人信服地说明，我国农村与城镇老人养育女儿在老年（尤其是进入高龄之后）所得长期回报明显优于养育儿子，这种现象在农村更为显著。
text: [Professor from Peking University: Farmers’ returns from raising daughters in old age are better than raising sons] Zeng Yi, a professor at the National School of Development at Peking University, introduced that the results of a seven-year nationwide large-sample follow-up survey on factors affecting health and longevity in the elderly convincingly illustrate that China’s The long-term returns of raising daughters in rural and urban areas are significantly better than raising sons in old age (especially after reaching advanced age), and this phenomenon is even more significant in rural areas.

chinese_text: 【广东一逃犯吃槟榔吃成樱桃小嘴 逃亡13年方被抓】2002年，顺德男子谢某杀人后潜逃，逃亡间，因担惊受怕，他终日靠吃槟榔消愁，不久竟意外发现自己嘴变小了，遂凭此躲过警方侦查。据悉，口腔黏膜会和槟榔中所含的生物碱发生反应致变硬，吃得越多张口度便会越来越小。公共频道http://t.cn/RU30tVp
text: [A fugitive from Guangdong ate betel nut and turned it into a cherry with a small mouth before he was caught on the run for 13 years] In 2002, a man from Shunde, Xie, absconded after committing a murder. During his escape, he was frightened and relied on eating betel nut to relieve his worries. Soon after, he unexpectedly discovered that his mouth had changed. Since he was young, he used this to avoid police investigation. It is reported that the oral mucosa will react with the alkaloids contained in betel nut and harden. The more you eat, the smaller your mouth opening will become. Public channel http://t.cn/RU30tVp

chinese_text: 【越南美味：烤田鼠】烤田鼠肉是一道广受越南人喜爱的食物，价格比猪肉、鸡肉还贵，一公斤烤鼠肉能卖到8万盾，约合3.8美元。在柬埔寨，每年水稻收获季都饱受田鼠肆虐之患，当地农民在田间设笼套，捕田鼠，出口越南。柬埔寨农民每人每天能捕捉20-30公斤田鼠，每公斤售价约合0.75美元。（央视记者周洋）
text: [Vietnamese delicacy: Grilled field mouse] Grilled field mouse meat is a food that is widely loved by Vietnamese. It is more expensive than pork and chicken. One kilogram of grilled field mouse meat can be sold for 80,000 dong, which is about 3.8 US dollars. In Cambodia, every year during the rice harvest season, voles are infested. Local farmers set up cages in the fields to catch voles and export them to Vietnam. Cambodian farmers can catch 20-30 kilograms of voles per person per day, and each kilogram is sold for about US$0.75. (CCTV reporter Zhou Yang)

chinese_text: 【新疆90后武警被大刀擦着头皮掠过仍干掉6名暴恐分子】1994年出生的武警新疆总队四支队特勤中队吴蛟，在一次搜索任务中感到耳边一丝风声划过，一把大刀擦着头皮掠过！他冷静地调整好姿势，开枪射击，弹无虚发。这次战斗中他凭借机智勇敢，一人击毙了6名暴徒。（新华网）http://t.cn/RU3dBBe
text: [Xinjiang’s post-90s armed police officers were wiped across their scalps with a big knife but still killed 6 violent terrorists] Wu Jiao, a member of the special service squadron of the Fourth Detachment of the Armed Police Xinjiang Corps, who was born in 1994, felt a sound of wind in his ears during a search mission, and a big knife Scratching the scalp! He calmly adjusted his posture and fired without missing a beat. In this battle, he relied on his wit and bravery to kill 6 thugs alone. (Xinhuanet) http://t.cn/RU3dBBe

chinese_text: 【北大七年研究显示：养女防老！】为期七年的全国大样本老年健康长寿影响因素跟踪调查研究成果令人信服地说明，我国农村与城镇老人养育女儿在老年所得长期回报明显优于养育儿子。农村与城镇只有女儿的老人观测期内死亡风险分别比只有儿子的低25%与10％。该现象农村更为显著。http://t.cn/RU3gZKQ
text: [Seven-year study at Peking University shows: Raising a daughter will prevent old age! 】The results of a seven-year nationwide large-sample national follow-up survey on factors affecting health and longevity in the elderly convincingly demonstrate that the long-term returns in old age for elderly people in rural and urban areas in my country are significantly better than raising sons. The risk of death during the observation period for elderly people with only daughters in rural and urban areas was 25% and 10% lower than those with only sons, respectively. This phenomenon is more significant in rural areas. http://t.cn/RU3gZKQ

chinese_text: 【女孩拒绝公司加班被解约 主管称因难管理】西安王女士上周五下午6点被突然通知要加班，她以有事为由拒绝，没想到公司主管说不加班就离职。她一气就没去，结果第二天真被解约。公司称未签订正式合同，辞退是情理之中。律师称单纯因劳动者不来加班就解雇，在解雇程序上存在瑕疵。http://t.cn/RU3xiTy
text: [Girl refused to work overtime but was terminated by the company because her supervisor said it was difficult to manage] Ms. Wang from Xi'an was suddenly notified at 6 pm last Friday that she had to work overtime. She refused because she had something to do. Unexpectedly, the company supervisor said she would resign if she did not work overtime. She was so angry that she didn't go, and the contract was terminated the next day. The company said that no formal contract had been signed and the dismissal was justified. The lawyer said that there were flaws in the dismissal procedure if the employee was fired simply because he did not show up to work overtime. http://t.cn/RU3xiTy

chinese_text: 有些压力总是 得自己扛过去，说出来就成了充满 负能量的抱怨。寻求安慰 也无济于事，还徒增了 别人的烦恼。而当你 独自走过艰难险阻，一定会感激 当初一声不吭咬牙坚持着的自己。
text: Some pressures always have to be shouldered by oneself, and speaking out becomes a complaint full of negative energy. Seeking comfort is of no use and only adds to other people's worries. And when you go through difficulties and obstacles alone, you will definitely be grateful to yourself for holding on without saying a word.

chinese_text: 【江苏：男子专业偷鸡20年9次入狱 自称懂鸡的语言】这名52岁偷鸡“老贼”昨日被抓获，他今年8月刚出狱，仅过一个月就重操旧业，两个月时间盗窃20多起。他吹嘘：自己专业偷鸡20年，靠的就是读懂鸡的语言，鸡到他面前都很老实，所以每次偷鸡都不会引起别人注意…（扬子晚报）http://t.cn/RU30UeQ
text: [Jiangsu: A man who professionally stole chickens and was imprisoned nine times in 20 years claimed to understand the language of chickens] This 52-year-old "old thief" who stole chickens was caught yesterday. He was just released from prison in August this year and returned to his old business just one month later. There were more than 20 thefts in two months. He boasted: He has been professionally stealing chickens for 20 years, relying on understanding the language of chickens. Chickens are very honest in front of him, so every time he steals chickens, no one will notice... (Yangzi Evening News) http://t.cn /RU30UeQ

chinese_text: 【赔偿10万！“南京第一高楼”因侵犯日照权败诉】因认为自家房子被南京第一高楼“紫峰大厦”挡住阳光，陈先生提起诉讼讨要日照权及损失。今天，南京市鼓楼区法院一审宣判：被告南京国资绿地金融中心一次性补偿原告陈先生10万元。法院认为，原告房屋在“紫峰大厦”建成后，日照时间有明显减少。(中新网)
text: [Compensation of 100,000! "Nanjing's tallest building" loses lawsuit for infringement of sunshine rights] Because he believed that his house was blocked by the "Zifeng Building", the tallest building in Nanjing, he filed a lawsuit to claim his sunshine rights and losses. Today, the Nanjing Gulou District Court pronounced the first instance verdict: the defendant Nanjing State-owned Greenland Financial Center compensated the plaintiff Mr. Chen for a one-time sum of 100,000 yuan. The court held that the sunshine hours of the plaintiff's house were significantly reduced after the completion of the "Zifeng Building". (China News Service)

chinese_text: 有没有想过，我们逛博物馆的时候为什么执着的要拿着相机手机对着那些名作拍照？ 最近荷兰一个博物馆做了一个活动.... 号召大家不要拿出相机手机，你若喜欢，给你纸和笔，不如自己去画吧.... 也许，这能让你更好的理解艺术呢.....
text: Have you ever thought about why we insist on taking pictures of masterpieces with our cameras and mobile phones when we visit museums? Recently, a museum in the Netherlands held an event... It called on everyone not to take out their cameras and mobile phones. If you like it, I will give you paper and pen, why not draw it yourself... Maybe this can help you better understand art. Woolen cloth.....

chinese_text: 【村主任辞职为子办婚宴 辞职报告已通过】近日，陕西城固县莲花街道杜家漕村主任马卫东给儿子办喜宴时，因申请报告没通过，向街道提出辞职。事发后街道办党委免去其村党支部委员职务。昨天该村召开村民代表大会，最终决定通过马卫东的辞职报告，村主任补选工作将择日进行。（央视记者闫星光 王志杰）
text: [The resignation report of the village director resigning to host a wedding banquet for his son has been approved] Recently, Ma Weidong, the director of Dujiacao Village, Lianhua Street, Chenggu County, Shaanxi Province, was hosting a wedding banquet for his son. Because his application report was not approved, he submitted his resignation to the street. After the incident, the sub-district party committee removed him from his position as a member of the village party branch. Yesterday, the village held a villagers' representative meeting, which finally decided to approve Ma Weidong's resignation report. The by-election of the village director will be held at a selected date. (CCTV reporter Yan Xingguang and Wang Zhijie)

chinese_text: 【扩散：极端天气来袭 “航班取消”短信骗局也来了！】骗子短信告知航班取消→乘客联系“400”假客服→骗子索要网银卡号密码→乘客卡上的钱被转移…提醒：航空公司不会直接给旅客发“航班取消”短信。收到此类短信，应联系购票处核实，或直接致电官方客服获取准确航班信息！警惕！@央视新闻评论
text: [Diffusion: When extreme weather strikes, the "flight cancellation" SMS scam is also here! 】Scammers send text messages informing passengers that flights are canceled → Passengers contact fake customer service number “400” → Scammers ask for online banking card numbers and passwords → Money on passengers’ cards is transferred… Reminder: Airlines will not directly send “flight cancellation” text messages to passengers. If you receive such a text message, you should contact the ticket office for verification, or call official customer service directly to obtain accurate flight information! alert! @CCTV News Comment

chinese_text: 【[熊猫]还记得熊猫盼盼吗？今天它“100岁”了！盼盼生快！】1990年北京亚运会吉祥物熊猫盼盼，本名巴斯，7岁访美，11岁上春晚，3次重病…多少孩子因为它，也叫盼盼，多少人以为不管啥熊猫，都叫盼盼。今天，熊猫盼盼就35岁了，相当于人类100多岁！关于盼盼，你还保留着多少记忆？转发祝福！[心]
text: [[Panda] Do you still remember Panda Panpan? Today it is "100 years old"! Happy birthday to Panpan! 】Panda Panpan, the mascot of the 1990 Beijing Asian Games, whose real name is Bass, visited the United States at the age of 7, attended the Spring Festival Gala at the age of 11, and became seriously ill three times... How many children are also called Panpan because of it, and how many people think that no matter what panda, they are called Panpan. Hope. Today, panda Panpan turns 35, which is equivalent to more than 100 years for humans! How much memory do you still retain about Panpan? Forward blessings! [Heart]

chinese_text: 【天冷衣服厚，小心！小偷可能就在你身边！[吃惊]】天冷了，大家穿的衣服也越来越多，对于兜里的东西就没那么敏感了。等车、上车、下车、过安检……你都有可能被小偷盯上！提醒大家，外出一定看好自己的东西！[话筒]扩散！多个转发，可能少个人被偷！
text: [It’s cold, wear thick clothes, be careful! The thief may be around you! [Surprised]] The weather is getting colder, and everyone is wearing more and more clothes, and they are not so sensitive to the things in their pockets. Waiting for the bus, getting on the bus, getting off the bus, going through the security check...you may be targeted by thieves! Remind everyone to take care of your own things when you go out! [Microphone] Diffusion! If you forward it more, fewer people may be stolen!

chinese_text: 【看着就悬！宿舍楼一截被拆，一截住人[衰]】广西南康中学学生小吴近日反映，学校拆除了“一截”男生宿舍楼，而剩余楼体仍供学生居住。有学生表示“住在楼里每天都在想它会不会塌”。校方称，教学楼改造需留施工通道，只好拆宿舍楼。而记者发现，此举未经报备。学生的安全咋保证？http://t.cn/RUdHfxx
text: 【It makes me nervous just looking at it! A section of the dormitory building was demolished, and another section was occupied [deprecated]] Xiao Wu, a student at Nankang Middle School in Guangxi, recently reported that the school demolished "a section" of the boys' dormitory building, but the remaining building is still used for students to live in. Some students said that "living in the building, I wonder if it will collapse every day." The school said that the renovation of the teaching building required construction access, so the dormitory building had to be demolished. The reporter discovered that this move was not reported. How to ensure the safety of students? http://t.cn/RUdHfxx

text: #HealthTime# [Smart massage, get rid of nasolabial folds] As people age, many people will gradually develop nasolabial folds from the nose to the corners of the mouth. Experts point out that simple facial massage can stimulate the circulation of blood and lymph fluid in the dermal tissue, improve metabolic function, and prevent or reduce nasolabial folds. The methods are all laid out for you here↓, why don’t you give it a try? [smirking]

chinese_text: #博客十周年# 【博客十年纪录片：记忆留在未来】十年，有人结婚生子，有人行遍天涯，有人功成名就，有人初心不改。你改变了多少？又还在坚持什么？对于这个答案，相信每个人都有自己的答案。我们走访了10位博主，听他们谈谈写作，也谈谈变化与成长。http://t.cn/RUd66jx
text: #blog十anniversary# [Blog Ten Years Documentary: Memories Remain in the Future] In the past ten years, some people have gotten married and had children, some have traveled all over the world, some have become famous, and some have never changed their original intentions. How much have you changed? What are you still insisting on? For this answer, I believe everyone has their own answer. We visited 10 bloggers and listened to them talk about writing, as well as changes and growth. http://t.cn/RUd66jx
