text: #熊猫Panpan's "100th birthday"#【Cute! Panda Panpan’s Collector’s Edition “Photo Album” [Cute]] Celebrate birthdays and eat cake. I hope Panpan will be healthy and happy every day! In the eyes of many people, Panda Panpan is a star that attracts much attention. But outside of the spotlight, Panda Panpan also has a rough and rough experience that is unknown to everyone. Click on the animated picture to open Panpan’s electronic photo album and forward it together to wish it a happy birthday! http://t.cn/RUdEQuJ

chinese_text: #拍案#【煤老板用麻袋送钱，让受贿千万的贪官也怕了】国家能源局核电司原司长郝卫平被指控总额超千万。知情人士透露，郝卫平在落马后主动交代了公安机关没有掌握的700多万受贿金额，并牵出能源局副局长许永盛。郝卫平说，“我也害怕过，山西煤老板真吓人，用麻袋装钱来送。”http://t.cn/RUdKHkD
text: #热盈# [The coal boss used sacks to send money, which frightened corrupt officials who took tens of millions in bribes] Hao Weiping, the former director of the Nuclear Power Department of the National Energy Administration, was accused of a total amount exceeding tens of millions. According to people familiar with the matter, after his dismissal, Hao Weiping took the initiative to confess the bribe amount of more than 7 million yuan that the public security organs did not know, and led out Xu Yongsheng, deputy director of the Energy Bureau. Hao Weiping said, "I was also scared. The Shanxi coal boss was so scary. He packed money in sacks and gave it away." http://t.cn/RUdKHkD

chinese_text: 【盼盼曾三次大难不死】①4岁，忍饥挨饿，掉入冰河，奄奄一息，所幸被村民所救②21岁，高血压致血管破裂，饲养员给盼盼服用人类降压药，成功降压③30岁，突发急性肠炎并发胰腺炎，生命垂危，盼盼意志坚强，又得科研人员救治，捡回一命。今天是盼盼“百岁”生日，祝福盼盼！
text: [Panpan survived three catastrophes] ① At the age of 4, he fell into a glacier due to hunger and was dying. Fortunately, he was rescued by villagers. ② At the age of 21, his blood vessels ruptured due to high blood pressure. The keepers gave Panpan human antihypertensive drugs and successfully lowered his blood pressure. ③At the age of 30, he suffered a sudden acute enteritis complicated by pancreatitis, and his life was in danger. Panpan was strong-willed and was treated by scientific researchers, and he saved his life. Today is Panpan's "100th" birthday, best wishes to Panpan!

chinese_text: #熊猫盼盼“百岁”生日#【一分钟揭秘：熊猫盼盼舌尖上的蛋糕】今天是熊猫盼盼35岁生日，相当于人类百岁以上。这么重要的时刻，怎能缺少生日蛋糕？玉米、黄豆、麦皮、枸杞、红枣、竹叶、米糊…戳视频，一起看“熊猫牌”蛋糕如何制作！http://t.cn/RUd5ut7 （央视记者张梦）
text: #PandaPanpan’s “100th birthday”# [One-minute secret: the cake on the tip of Panda Panpan’s tongue] Today is Panda Panpan’s 35th birthday, which is equivalent to a human being over 100 years old. How can such an important moment be without a birthday cake? Corn, soybeans, wheat husk, wolfberry, red dates, bamboo leaves, rice cereal... Click on the video to see how to make the "Panda Brand" cake! http://t.cn/RUd5ut7 (CCTV reporter Zhang Meng)

chinese_text: 【雪中，他的身影很暖心】近日，一张雪中警察背老人的照片被网友点赞。图中警察是徐州民警高鹏飞，老人是一诈骗案的受害人。日前老人带着工钱回老家，路上却被骗走了钱。高鹏飞通过监控锁定嫌疑人，蹲守8天8夜将其抓获。在领取被骗财物路上，老人扭伤了脚，小高将老人背上警车再送回。为好民警点[赞]！
text: [His figure is heart-warming in the snow] Recently, a photo of a policeman carrying an old man in the snow was liked by netizens. The policeman in the picture is Xuzhou policeman Gao Pengfei, and the old man is the victim of a fraud case. A few days ago, the old man returned to his hometown with his wages, but was defrauded of his money on the way. Gao Pengfei identified the suspect through surveillance and stayed there for 8 days and nights to capture him. On the way to collect the defrauded property, the old man sprained his foot. Xiao Gao put the old man on his back in a police car and sent him back. Click [Like] for the good police!

chinese_text: 【熊猫盼盼“百岁”生日！你愿为她转发祝福吗？】1990年北京亚运会吉祥物熊猫盼盼，本名巴斯，1980年生。它7岁访美，11岁上春晚，手持金牌奔跑形象印在几代人心中。多少孩子因为它，也叫盼盼。如今80后们风华正茂，而盼盼已老。今天，熊猫盼盼35岁生日，相当于人类100多岁！祝它生日快乐！ （央视）
text: [Panda Panpan’s “100th” birthday! Would you like to forward your blessings to her? 】Panda Panpan, the mascot of the 1990 Beijing Asian Games, whose real name is Basi, was born in 1980. He visited the United States when he was 7 years old, attended the Spring Festival Gala when he was 11 years old, and his image of running with a gold medal in his hands has been etched in the hearts of generations. Many children are also called Panpan because of it. Nowadays, those born in the 1980s are in their prime, but Panpan is old. Today, panda Panpan turns 35, which is equivalent to more than 100 years for a human! Happy birthday to it! (CCTV)

chinese_text: 【校车秀质量：高速撞墙 砖土横飞 车子良好】27日，郑州举办校车安全质量监测：一辆校车在高速行驶状态下猛力撞上一面墙，顿时砖块横飞，一地狼藉。校车除前脸有部分受损外，整体状况良好，驾驶空间也未有异物侵入，驾驶人员可安全撤离校车。http://t.cn/RUdY4tb 戳图↓你想说_____？
text: [School bus show quality: high-speed collision with wall, bricks and soil flying across the car is good] On the 27th, Zhengzhou held a school bus safety quality monitoring: A school bus slammed into a wall while driving at high speed, and bricks flew everywhere, leaving a mess on the ground. Except for some damage to the front face of the school bus, the overall condition of the school bus is good. There are no foreign objects intruding into the driving space. The driver can safely evacuate the school bus. http://t.cn/RUdY4tb Click on the picture ↓ Do you want to say _____?

chinese_text: #新浪独家# 【王的少林：释永信如何化解两次迁单危机】释永信执掌少林寺的第17个年头，举报信带来的第三次危机即将被化解。17岁进少林，曾因威仪不够被拒；拜师释行正，从师父上访的“拐棍”到被迁单，他是如何登上少林寺权力顶峰的？（新浪新闻出品）http://t.cn/RUdY1xm
text: #SinaExclusive# [Wang’s Shaolin: How Shi Yongxin resolved two relocation crises] In Shi Yongxin’s 17th year in charge of the Shaolin Temple, the third crisis caused by the whistleblower letter is about to be resolved. He entered Shaolin at the age of 17, but was rejected because of his lack of dignity. He became a disciple of Shi Xingzheng. From being a "walking stick" for his master to appeal to being evicted, how did he reach the pinnacle of power in the Shaolin Temple? (Produced by Sina News) http://t.cn/RUdY1xm

chinese_text: #那一天#【千山鸟飞绝，万径人踪灭[心]】他是文坛“唐宋八大家”之一，一生留诗文600余篇；他任柳州刺史时，一心为民造福，淡泊名利；虽时隔千年，他的一句“贵尔六尺躯，勿为名所驱”仍掷地有声。公元819年的今天，柳宗元去世。他的诗句，你还记得哪些？（via.人民网）
text: #thatday# [Thousands of birds fly away from the mountains, and all traces of people disappear [heart]] He is one of the "Eight Great Masters of the Tang and Song Dynasties" in the literary world. He wrote more than 600 poems in his life; when he was the governor of Liuzhou, he devoted himself to benefiting the people. , was indifferent to fame and fortune; even though thousands of years have passed, his words, "You are six feet tall, don't be driven by fame" are still resonant. On this day in AD 819, Liu Zongyuan passed away. Which of his poems do you remember? (via.People's Daily Online)

chinese_text: 【11月28日新闻联播抢先看】①看头条：习近平在中央扶贫开发工作会议上强调，脱贫攻坚战冲锋号已经吹响。未来5年攻坚期，精准扶贫如何创新？②看亮点：《内地与澳门CEPA服务贸易协议》正式签署，新增哪些开放措施？③气候变化巴黎大会召开在即，中国为应对全球气候变化做出哪些贡献？今晚7点，一定看！
text: [News Network Preview on November 28] ①Look at the headlines: Xi Jinping emphasized at the Central Poverty Alleviation and Development Work Conference that the trumpet for the battle against poverty has been sounded. In the next five years, how to innovate in targeted poverty alleviation? ②Look at the highlights: The "Mainland and Macao CEPA Services Trade Agreement" was officially signed. What new opening-up measures are added? ③The Paris Climate Change Conference is about to be held. What contribution has China made to addressing global climate change? Must watch tonight at 7pm!

chinese_text: #万象#【男子被蒙28年方知儿子非亲生 女友被判赔19万】1984年，阿斌与阿红未婚同居，两年后阿红生下儿子彬彬。后来阿红离开阿斌与儿子，彬彬一直由“奶奶”抚养长大。2014年，阿斌偶然发现儿子非亲生，遂起诉阿红索赔43万。近日，法院判决阿红赔偿抚养费18万及精神抚慰金1万。http://t.cn/RUdeaGX
text: #万搏# [A man was kept in the dark for 28 years before he found out his son was not his biological girlfriend and was ordered to pay 190,000 yuan in compensation] In 1984, A Bin and A Hong lived together as unmarried. Two years later, A Hong gave birth to his son Binbin. Later, A Hong left A Bin and his son, and Bin Bin was raised by his "grandma". In 2014, A Bin accidentally discovered that his son was not his biological child, so he sued A Hong for 430,000 yuan. Recently, the court ruled that Ahong should pay 180,000 yuan in alimony and 10,000 yuan in emotional comfort. http://t.cn/RUdeaGX

chinese_text: #夜猫子时间#怎样构建强大的自己，共勉。
text: #夜夜子时#How to build a strong self, encourage each other.

chinese_text: #突发#【佛山黄岐大火照亮半个天空 广州清晰可见】昨晚10时许，广佛交界的黄岐永盛农副产品综合市场仓库发生大火，火光笼罩半空。消防到场后暂无发现人员被困，目前大火仍在扑救中。附近居民楼数百户住户被紧急疏散。据悉，该仓库存放有五金，木门，夹板等多种货物。http://t.cn/RUg4a8m 祝平安！
text: #break# [Foshan Huangqi fire illuminates half of the sky and is clearly visible in Guangzhou] At about 10 o'clock last night, a fire broke out in the warehouse of Huangqi Yongsheng Agricultural and Sideline Products Comprehensive Market at the junction of Guangzhou and Foshan, and the flames enveloped the mid-air. After the fire fighters arrived at the scene, no one was found trapped, and the fire is still being put out. Hundreds of households in nearby residential buildings were evacuated. It is reported that the warehouse stores a variety of goods such as hardware, wooden doors, and plywood. http://t.cn/RUg4a8m Wish you peace!

chinese_text: #天下#【普京签署总统令对土耳其实行制裁】旅游公司不得办理前往土耳其旅游手续；禁止包机往来俄土航线，严格监督土耳其运输公司在俄境内活动，禁土耳其船只在俄海港水域逗留航行；2016年1月1日起，除外交人员和家属以及具有临时居住证的人以外，土耳其公民暂不得入境俄罗斯。http://t.cn/RUg4WOr
text: #天下# [Putin signed a presidential decree to impose sanctions on Turkey] Tourism companies are not allowed to handle travel procedures to Turkey; charter flights to and from Russia and Turkey are prohibited, Turkish transportation companies’ activities in Russia are strictly supervised, and Turkish ships are prohibited from staying and sailing in Russian seaport waters; 2016 Starting from January 1, 2020, except for diplomats and family members and those with temporary residence permits, Turkish citizens are temporarily not allowed to enter Russia. http://t.cn/RUg4WOr

chinese_text: #早安中国#怎样度过人生的低潮期？安静的等待；好好睡觉；锻炼身体，无论何时好的体魄都用得着；和知心的朋友谈天，基本上不发牢骚，主要是回忆快乐的时光；多读书，看一些传记，增长知识，顺带还可瞧瞧别人倒霉的时候是怎么挺过去的；趁机做家务，把平时忙碌顾不上的活儿都干完。
text: #GoodMorningChina# How to get through the low period of life? Wait quietly; sleep well; exercise, good health is needed at all times; chat with close friends, basically not complaining, mainly recalling happy times; read more, read some biographies, increase knowledge, By the way, you can also see how others survive when they are unlucky; take the opportunity to do housework and finish all the tasks that are usually too busy to take care of.

chinese_text: #微感动#【“顺其自然”，如期而至[心]】近日，浙江宁波市慈善总会收到85万元汇款，这样的汇款自1999年起每年如期而至，数额几万到几十万不等。汇款都来自一个化名“顺其自然”的好人，至今17次匿名捐款已达768万！该慈善总会将用这85万帮明年的困难大学新生。为不图回报的好人点[赞]（央视记者刘浪）
text: #微touch# ["Let nature take its course", it will arrive as scheduled [心]] Recently, Zhejiang Ningbo Charity Federation received a remittance of 850,000 yuan. Such remittances have arrived as scheduled every year since 1999, with amounts ranging from tens of thousands to several tens of thousands. Ranging from one hundred thousand. The remittances all come from a good person with the pseudonym "Let It Be". So far, 17 anonymous donations have reached 7.68 million! The charity will use the 850,000 to help next year's needy college freshmen. Click [Like] for good people who don’t want anything in return (CCTV reporter Liu Lang)

chinese_text: #热点#【释永信被举报与另一寺院修建问题有关？】据知情者称，当地致力于发展当地其他旅游景点，以分流少林寺游客，降低对少林寺的依赖。天中寺投建之后，因修建区域不符合规范而遭叫停。很多人认为是遭释永信举报，所以相关人士合谋实施报复，“想把挡他们财路的大和尚拉下马”。http://t.cn/RUgykrv
text: #hotspot# [Shi Yongxin was reported to be related to the construction issue of another temple? 】According to insiders, the local area is committed to developing other local tourist attractions to divert tourists from Shaolin Temple and reduce dependence on Shaolin Temple. After Tianzhong Temple was built, it was stopped because the construction area did not meet the regulations. Many people believe that Shi Yongxin reported him, so the relevant people conspired to retaliate, "wanting to bring down the great monk who blocked their way to make money." http://t.cn/RUgykrv

chinese_text: #历史上的今天#【彭德怀说】①一个人如果只想到自己，那是最可耻的；一个人如果只为自己活着，那就不如死掉。②说大话，说假话，一害自己，二害国家。③我死后，把我的骨灰送家乡…把它埋了，上头种一棵苹果树，让我最后报答家乡土地、父老乡亲。1974年的今天，彭德怀含冤逝世。沉痛缅怀！
text: #historytoday# [Peng Dehuai said] ① If a person only thinks about himself, that is the most shameful; if a person only lives for himself, it is better to die. ② Talking big words and telling lies will harm yourself and the country. ③After I die, send my ashes to my hometown... bury it and plant an apple tree on it, so that I can finally repay my hometown land and my father and fellow villagers. On this day in 1974, Peng Dehuai died unjustly. Deeply remembered!

chinese_text: #安全文明出行#【何炅：行车礼让有三先】作为一名老司机，何炅对安全文明出行有自己的经验和诀窍：行车礼让有三先，先让、先慢、先停！这三先，你都能做到吗？拒绝危险驾驶，做懂得礼让的行车人，转发扩散！http://t.cn/RUdFWeo
text: #SafeCivilizedTravel# [He Jiong: There are three precedences in courtesy when driving] As an experienced driver, He Jiong has his own experience and know-how on safe and civilized travel: There are three precedences in courtesy when driving, first to yield, first to slow down, and first to stop! Can you do all three of these? Refuse dangerous driving, be a courteous driver, and forward it to spread the word! http://t.cn/RUdFWeo

chinese_text: #国考加油#【转发，为他们加油！[心]】今天，国家公务员考试如期而至。一场考试，不足以决定命运，但一次机遇，却值得全力以赴。调整心态奋力一搏吧！转发艾特@ 你身边的考生，为他们祝福、加油！[奥特曼]
text: #国 Examination Come on# [Forward, cheer for them! [Heart]】Today, the National Civil Service Examination came as scheduled. An exam is not enough to decide your destiny, but an opportunity is worth your full effort. Adjust your mentality and give it a try! Forward Aite@ to the candidates around you to bless them and cheer them on! [Ultraman]

chinese_text: 你要化过很多浓妆，才会欣赏素颜的清新。你要喝过很多碳酸饮料，才会回归白水的平淡健康。你要穿很久的高跟，才回想念帆布所代表的青春。你要见惯城市的喧嚣，才会依赖田园的安静。你要错过很多人，才会在某一刻一把抓住对的那一个人。不都是这样吗？见得多了，就知道怎么选了。早安！[阳光]
text: You have to wear a lot of heavy makeup to appreciate the freshness of bare makeup. You have to drink a lot of carbonated drinks before you can return to the bland health of plain water. You have to wear high heels for a long time before you miss the youth represented by canvas. You have to get used to the hustle and bustle of the city before you can rely on the quietness of the countryside. You have to miss a lot of people before you catch the right one at a certain moment. Isn’t that the case all the time? The more you see, the more you know how to choose. Good morning! [Sunlight]

chinese_text: #那年今日#【孔繁森，不该被遗忘】他将一腔热血洒向高原，一生是清贫的，也是富有的；他领养了3名藏族孤儿，3次以“洛珠”的名义献血900毫升；他几次爬到海拔近5000米的山顶采集水样，解决饮水问题；他担任阿里地委书记后，跑遍了98个乡，行程达8万多公里。1994年的今天，孔繁森殉职，时年50岁。致敬！
text: #that年DAY# [Kong Fansen, should not be forgotten] He spread his passion to the plateau. He was poor and rich all his life; he adopted 3 Tibetan orphans and donated 900 blood in the name of "Luozhu" three times. milliliter; he climbed to the top of a mountain nearly 5,000 meters above sea level several times to collect water samples to solve the drinking water problem; after he became secretary of the Ali Prefectural Committee, he traveled to 98 townships and traveled more than 80,000 kilometers. On this day in 1994, Kong Fansen died in the line of duty at the age of 50. pay tribute!

chinese_text: #时局#【史上最严国考今日开考 组织作弊最高获刑7年】今天，国家公务员考试如期而至。这次国考，2.7万个招录名额共吸引近140万人报名，招考人数创历史新高，但是，平均竞争比却是5年来最低。本次国考也被称为史上最严，因《刑法修正案(九)》实施，出现组织作弊行为将最高获刑7年。http://t.cn/RUgyRcD
text: #时时# [The most stringent national examination in history starts today. Those who cheat will be punished with up to 7 years in prison] Today, the national civil service examination begins as scheduled. In this national examination, the 27,000 recruitment quotas attracted nearly 1.4 million people to apply. The number of candidates reached a record high. However, the average competition ratio was the lowest in five years. This national examination is also known as the most stringent in history. Due to the implementation of the "Criminal Law Amendment (9)", organized cheating will be punished by up to 7 years in prison. http://t.cn/RUgyRcD

chinese_text: 【32天后就是2016了！此刻，为自己的梦想转发！】有时，满心期待，换来是失望或不体谅。努力了，好像还看不见希望，渐渐，开始不自信、不勇敢、不愿向前…此时，请对自己说，再来一次！再一次，为成长积蓄力量！再一次，只为梦想更近些！#中国梦#http://t.cn/RLPl8kQ为梦想，敢再试一次的人，转！[心]
text: 【2016 will be in 32 days! At this moment, forward your dreams! 】Sometimes, full of expectations are met with disappointment or inconsideration. Even though I try hard, I still can't seem to see hope. Gradually, I start to lose confidence, courage, and unwillingness to move forward... At this time, please say to yourself, do it again! Once again, gather strength for growth! Once again, just to get closer to the dream! #中国梦# http://t.cn/RLPl8kQ For dreams, those who dare to try again, turn! [Heart]

chinese_text: 冬天本宝宝不想起床[doge]via.网络
text: My baby doesn’t want to get up in winter [doge] via.Internet

chinese_text: 【“顺其自然”，如期而至[心]】近日，浙江宁波市慈善总会收到85万元汇款，这样的汇款自1999年起每年如期而至，数额几万到几十万不等。汇款都来自一个化名“顺其自然”的好人，至今17次匿名捐款已达768万！该慈善总会将用这85万帮明年的困难大学新生。为不图回报的好人点[赞]via.央视新闻
text: ["Let nature take its course", it will arrive as scheduled [Heart]] Recently, Zhejiang Ningbo Charity Federation received a remittance of 850,000 yuan. Such remittances have arrived as scheduled every year since 1999, with amounts ranging from tens to hundreds of thousands. . The remittances all come from a good person with the pseudonym "Let It Be". So far, 17 anonymous donations have reached 7.68 million! The charity will use the 850,000 to help next year's needy college freshmen. Click [Like] for the good people who don’t want anything in return via.CCTV News

chinese_text: 【小孩大白天从父亲怀里被偷 警方迅速破案[good]】近日，广州的廖先生抱着1岁多的孩子在自家店铺午休，睡醒后竟发现怀抱中的宝宝不见了。查看监控发现，一年轻男子趁廖先生打盹时将熟睡的孩子偷走，逃离现场。经追踪，警方最终在湖北咸宁发现孩子。目前嫌疑人已被刑拘。http://t.cn/RUgVUg7
text: [The child was stolen from his father’s arms in broad daylight and the police quickly solved the case [good]] Recently, Mr. Liao from Guangzhou was taking a lunch break in his shop with his 1-year-old child in his arms. When he woke up, he found that the baby in his arms was missing. After checking the surveillance, it was found that a young man stole the sleeping child while Mr. Liao was napping and fled the scene. After tracking, the police finally found the child in Xianning, Hubei. The suspect has been detained. http://t.cn/RUgVUg7

chinese_text: 【40个建议，成就全新的你[hold住]】年初许下的那些愿望，你还记得吗？转眼间，2015年就只剩一个月了。发条微博，跟过去每一天好好道别，铭记那些让你脚踏实地的坚持，感恩那些让你有笑有泪的成长，提醒自己还有尚未实现的梦想、还有不曾抵达的远方。2015，余下的每天都“憋”虚度！via.人民日报
text: [40 Suggestions to Achieve a New You [Hold]] Do you still remember those wishes you made at the beginning of the year? In the blink of an eye, there is only one month left in 2015. Post on Weibo, say goodbye to the past every day, remember the persistence that kept you grounded, be grateful for the growth that made you laugh and cry, and remind yourself that there are still dreams that have not yet been realized, and there are still far places that have not been reached. In 2015, the rest of every day will be wasted by "holding it in"! via.People's Daily

chinese_text: #土耳其击落俄军机#【普京签署制裁土耳其总统令】根据总统令，旅游公司不得办理前往土耳其的旅游手续；禁止包机往来俄土航线，严格监督土耳其运输公司在俄境内的活动；2016年1月1日起，除外交人员和家属及具有临时居住证的人以外，土公民暂时不得入境俄罗斯。（新华社）http://t.cn/RUgbzIE
text: #Turkey shot down Russian military plane# [Putin signed a presidential decree sanctioning Turkey] According to the presidential decree, travel companies are not allowed to handle travel procedures to Turkey; charter flights to and from Russia and Turkey are prohibited, and the activities of Turkish transportation companies in Russia are strictly supervised; January 2016 Starting from the 1st, except for diplomats and family members and people with temporary residence permits, Turkish citizens are temporarily not allowed to enter Russia. (Xinhua News Agency) http://t.cn/RUgbzIE

chinese_text: 【长沙95岁抗战老兵跳楼身亡】新湘报湖南长沙讯（首席记者 丑西）他是一名抗战老兵，曾参加过远征军。他会三门外语，毕业于黄埔军校。11月14日下午，湖南省长沙市文艺新村19栋发生一起悲剧，95岁的抗战老兵林协顺从三楼跳下身亡。http://t.cn/RUgVg0H
text: [A 95-year-old Anti-Japanese War veteran in Changsha jumped from a building and died] Xinxiang News News from Changsha, Hunan (Chief Correspondent Chou Xi) He was a Anti-Japanese War veteran who had participated in the expeditionary force. He speaks three foreign languages and graduated from Whampoa Military Academy. On the afternoon of November 14, a tragedy occurred in Building 19 of Wenyi New Village, Changsha City, Hunan Province. Lin Xieshun, a 95-year-old anti-war veteran, jumped from the third floor to his death. http://t.cn/RUgVg0H

chinese_text: #中国人故事#【宁波神秘好人连续17年捐款760余万 署名顺其自然】据介绍，从1999年至今，其已累计捐款17次，数额从几万到几十万不等，每年数量都有增加，今年达85万。其捐款有相同点：每年都是差不多的时间段；署名总是在“顺其自然”几个字里颠来倒去。为不图回报的好人点[good]。http://t.cn/RUgUuqs
text: #中国人故事#[Ningbo’s mysterious and good man has donated more than 7.6 million yuan for 17 consecutive years and signed his name and let nature take its course] According to reports, from 1999 to the present, he has made a total of 17 donations, ranging from tens of thousands to hundreds of thousands, and the amount every year is There has been an increase, reaching 850,000 this year. Their donations have the same thing: they are in the same time period every year; the signatures always alternate between the words "let nature take its course". Point [good] for good people who don’t want anything in return. http://t.cn/RUgUuqs

chinese_text: #就业有位来#【[话筒]在校生必看：2016届高校毕业生就业月历】 “考研大军”、”国考大军“、”就业大军"，童鞋们，你们是哪个阵营的？无论选择哪条路都没关系，转发收藏此图，最后几个月就按这个节奏前行！所有在校生都值得参考的日历↓↓↓祝福，转！加油！
text: #employmentarrived# [[Microphone] A must-read for current students: Employment Calendar for 2016 College Graduates] "Postgraduate Entrance Exam Army", "National Examination Army", "Employment Army", children, which camp are you in? No matter which path you choose, it doesn’t matter. Repost and save this picture, and move forward at this pace in the last few months! A calendar worthy of reference for all current students ↓↓↓Blessings, transfer! come on!

chinese_text: 【读者调查：你遭遇过流量偷跑吗？】新华网报道，手机流量不清零政策推出不足2个月，流量莫名其妙“偷跑”事件频出。消费者一年为此多付出近400亿。你遭遇流量偷跑会怎么办？http://t.cn/RUgfJYj
text: [Reader survey: Have you ever encountered traffic theft? 】 Xinhuanet reported that less than two months after the policy of not clearing mobile phone data was launched, inexplicable traffic "stolen" incidents occurred frequently. Consumers pay nearly 40 billion more a year for this. What would you do if you encountered traffic theft? http://t.cn/RUgfJYj

chinese_text: 【“史上最严”国考：组织作弊最高获刑7年】这次国考，2.7万个招录名额共吸引近140万人报名，招考人数创历史新高，但是，平均竞争比却是5年来最低。本次国考也被称为史上最严，因《刑法修正案(九)》实施，出现组织作弊行为将最高获刑7年。
text: [The “Toughest” National Examination in History: Organizations that cheat can be punished with up to 7 years in prison] In this national examination, a total of 27,000 admission quotas attracted nearly 1.4 million people to sign up, and the number of candidates reached a record high. However, the average competition ratio was 5 lowest in years. This national examination is also known as the most stringent in history. Due to the implementation of the "Criminal Law Amendment (9)", organized cheating will be punished by up to 7 years in prison.

chinese_text: 【涨姿势：那么多摄像头，到底哪个是拍违章的呢？】开车在路上，经常会看到很多摄像头。这些摄像头有的在十字路口，有的在某路段，有的在路边，它们造型各异，有球形的，有长方形的，还有其他古怪造型的。安全文明始于足下，戳图了解各种摄像头功用，#安全文明出行#记心上！@平安中原
text: [Update: There are so many cameras, which one is filming violations? 】When driving on the road, you often see many cameras. Some of these cameras are at intersections, some on certain road sections, and some on the roadside. They have different shapes, including spherical ones, rectangular ones, and other weird shapes. Safety and civilization start with a single step. Click on the picture to learn about various camera functions, and remember #safe and civilized travel! @平安中元

chinese_text: 【英国女高材生为了被包养休学】据台湾媒体东森新闻云报道，英国一名19岁正妹天资聪颖，超会念书却决定从医学系休学，加入被富人包养的行列。经过一番交涉，这名女大生已经被11名年大龄男性包养，成功赚到珠宝、名牌服饰和昂贵的包包，让她很快乐。http://t.cn/RUgInI9
text: [British female top student dropped out of school to be kept by a wealthy man] According to a report by Taiwanese media Dongsen News Cloud, a 19-year-old British girl is very talented and very good at studying, but she decided to drop out of the medical department and join the ranks of being kept by a rich man. After some negotiation, this female college student has been kept by 11 older men. She has successfully earned jewelry, designer clothes and expensive bags, which makes her very happy. http://t.cn/RUgInI9

chinese_text: #拍案#【白雪山在座谈会休会10分钟期间被带走】11月6日，宁夏调研党风廉政建设工作座谈会召开，与常规会议不同，散会时，主持人宣布，副省级以上干部留下有重要通知。知情人称，“临近18时，曾休会10分钟，在此期间白雪山被带走。”当晚22时20分，中纪委网站发布白雪山被查信息。http://t.cn/RUgL20z
text: #白雪山#[Bai Xueshan was taken away during the 10-minute recess of the symposium] On November 6, a symposium to investigate the construction of party style and clean government in Ningxia was held. Different from the regular meeting, when the meeting ended, the host announced that cadres at the deputy provincial level and above There is an important notice left. An insider said, "Around 18:00, the meeting was adjourned for 10 minutes, during which Bai Xueshan was taken away." At 22:20 that night, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection released information on Bai Xueshan's investigation. http://t.cn/RUgL20z

chinese_text: #法国枪击案#【为法国人民点赞！[法国队加油]】法国27日举办了向巴黎恐袭遇难者致意的国家纪念仪式，奥朗德呼吁法国同胞悬挂三色国旗，向巴黎恐怖袭击案中的130名遇难者致哀。但国旗似乎不够用，于是27日这一天，法国人民想尽各种办法，用各种"姿势"在自家窗台挂上“国旗”。法会玩，为积极心态点赞！
text: #frenchshooting#【Like the French people! [Cheer for the French team]] France held a national memorial ceremony to pay tribute to the victims of the Paris terrorist attacks on the 27th. Hollande called on French compatriots to fly the tricolor flag to pay tribute to the 130 victims of the Paris terrorist attacks. But the national flag seemed not enough, so on the 27th, the French people tried every means and used various "postures" to hang the "national flag" on their windowsills. Puja is played and thumbs up for a positive attitude!

chinese_text: 【国产首架ARJ21支线客机今天交付】今天10:30，我国自主研制的新支线客机ARJ21首架机从上海飞成都，正式交付成都航空公司，这是中国民用客机研制的重要里程碑，标志着在国内航线上，将首次拥有我国自己研制的喷气式支线客机。中国，加入了世界商用飞机的家族！为中国点赞[赞](央视记者陈常伟)
text: [The first domestically produced ARJ21 regional passenger aircraft was delivered today] At 10:30 today, the first ARJ21, a new regional passenger aircraft independently developed by my country, flew from Shanghai to Chengdu and was officially delivered to Chengdu Airlines. This is an important milestone in the development of China’s civil passenger aircraft and marks the On domestic routes, for the first time, there will be a regional jet airliner developed by my country. China has joined the world’s commercial aircraft family! Like [like] for China (CCTV reporter Chen Changwei)

chinese_text: 【重大突破！国产首架ARJ21支线客机今交付！[鼓掌]】今天，我国ARJ21新支线飞机从上海飞往成都，正式交付给成都航空公司。这是继11月2日C919大型客机总装下线后，我国航空工业又一重大突破。标志着国内航线将首次拥有自己的喷气式支线客机！[加油啊]中国，加入了世界商用飞机的家族！为中国点赞[赞]
text: 【Major breakthrough! The first domestically produced ARJ21 regional passenger jet was delivered today! [Applause]] Today, my country’s new ARJ21 regional aircraft flew from Shanghai to Chengdu and was officially delivered to Chengdu Airlines. This is another major breakthrough for my country's aviation industry after the final assembly of the C919 large passenger aircraft rolled off the assembly line on November 2. This marks the first time that domestic routes will have their own regional jets! [Come on] China has joined the world’s commercial aircraft family! Like for China [Like]

chinese_text: 【63岁老人自学单片机 用8年做出机器人】李祖臣，63岁，8年前，为实现梦想，他自学单片机、电脑知识，在书店一泡就是一天。朋友曾说他是"三分钟热血"的想法，可是，8年后，几百次尝试，老李终于造出模特机器人，能跳舞，能摆POSE！#中国梦#梦想永远属于敢于有梦、勤于圆梦的人。你会为老人点赞吗？[赞]
text: [63-year-old man taught himself microcontroller and built a robot in 8 years] Li Zuchen, 63, eight years ago, in order to realize his dream, he taught himself microcontroller and computer knowledge, spending a day in a bookstore. A friend once said that he came up with the idea of "three minutes of passion", but after 8 years and hundreds of attempts, Lao Li finally built a model robot that can dance and pose! #中国梦# Dreams always belong to those who dare to dream and are diligent in realizing them. Will you give thumbs up to the elderly? [Thumbs up]

chinese_text: 【长沙95岁抗战老兵跳楼自杀[蜡烛]】林协顺毕业于黄埔军校22期，曾参加过远征军，打过日本侵略者，懂俄语、德语、英语，有7个子女。由于医保在新疆，身在湖南的他无法享受到医保补助，一身的疾病也只能靠自己硬扛，最终95岁的抗战老兵从三楼跳下身亡[伤心]。via.新湘报
text: [A 95-year-old anti-war veteran in Changsha committed suicide by jumping off a building [candle]] Lin Xieshun graduated from the 22nd class of Huangpu Military Academy. He once participated in the expeditionary force and fought against Japanese invaders. He understands Russian, German, and English and has seven children. Since medical insurance is in Xinjiang, he was unable to enjoy medical insurance subsidies in Hunan, and he had to rely on himself to deal with all the diseases. In the end, the 95-year-old anti-war veteran jumped from the third floor to his death [sad]. via.Xinxiang News

chinese_text: #民生#【国产首架ARJ21支线客机今交付】今天，我国ARJ21新支线飞机从上海飞往成都，正式交付给成都航空公司。这是继11月2日C919大型客机总装下线后，我国航空工业又一重大突破。标志着国内航线将首次拥有自己的喷气式支线客机！中国，加入了世界商用飞机的家族！为中国点赞！http://t.cn/RUgIZyV

This is another major breakthrough for my country's aviation industry after the final assembly of the C919 large passenger aircraft rolled off the assembly line on November 2. This marks the first time that domestic routes will have their own regional jets! China has joined the world’s commercial aircraft family! Thumbs up for China! http://t.cn/RUgIZyV

text: #乐 Enjoy Time# The uncle must have collapsed inside, forgive me for laughing unkindly [haha][haha][haha] http://t.cn/RUrpEfn

chinese_text: #健康时间#【头发老出油咋办？[泪流满面]】你是否每天洗头，可到了晚上也一样油光可鉴？试试下面几招吧：①更换洗发水，最好使用含有吡啶硫酮锌或水杨酸成分的洗发水；②涂完洗发水后，轻轻用指腹按摩头皮至少30秒；③逆着梳头方向吹干；④快速梳发根；⑤经常理发，建议每月修剪一次头发。via.生命时报
text: #healthtime# [What should I do if my hair keeps getting oily? [In tears]] Do you wash your hair every day, but it’s still shiny at night? Try the following tips: ① Change your shampoo, preferably one containing zinc pyrithione or salicylic acid; ② After applying the shampoo, gently massage your scalp with your fingertips for at least 30 seconds; ③ Inverse directions Blow-dry in the direction of combing your hair; ④ comb the hair roots quickly; ⑤ get haircut frequently, it is recommended to trim your hair once a month. via.Life Times

chinese_text: 【习近平离京出席气候变化巴黎大会】习近平29日离开北京，应法兰西共和国总统奥朗德和气候变化巴黎大会主席法比尤斯邀请，赴法国出席气候变化巴黎大会开幕活动；应津巴布韦共和国总统穆加贝邀请，对津巴布韦国事访问；应南非共和国总统祖马邀请，对南非国事访问，并赴约翰内斯堡主持中非合作论坛峰会。
text: [Xi Jinping left Beijing to attend the Paris Climate Change Conference] Xi Jinping left Beijing on the 29th and went to France to attend the opening ceremony of the Paris Climate Change Conference at the invitation of President François Hollande of the French Republic and Fabius, President of the Paris Climate Change Conference; at the invitation of President Mourinho of the Republic of Zimbabwe At the invitation of President Gabe, he paid a state visit to Zimbabwe; at the invitation of President Zuma of the Republic of South Africa, he paid a state visit to South Africa and went to Johannesburg to host the Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation.

chinese_text: #热点#【北京知名艺校16名涉毒学生获释】近日，北京迷笛音乐学校被警方突袭尿检，将16名尿检呈阳性学生拘留。至昨日，16名学生在被拘留3天后已陆续获释。迷笛音乐学校校长表示，担心媒体采访会对涉事学生造成压力，为保护他们的隐私，已让他们暂时返家，待明年春季开学再返校。http://t.cn/RUgUme3
text: #hotspot# [16 drug-related students from a well-known Beijing art school were released] Recently, the Beijing Midi Music School was raided by the police for urine tests and 16 students who tested positive were detained. As of yesterday, 16 students had been released one after another after being detained for three days. The principal of Midi Music School said that he was worried that media interviews would put pressure on the students involved. In order to protect their privacy, he had asked them to return home temporarily and wait until school starts next spring. http://t.cn/RUgUme3

chinese_text: 【六部委联合实施开发农业农村资源支持农民工等人员返乡创业行动计划】近日，农业部、国家发展改革委等六部委联合印发通知，启动实施开发农业农村资源支持农民工等人员返乡创业行动计划，从2015年11月至2020年12月分动员部署、全面实施、深入推进三个阶段实施。http://t.cn/RUgiubB
text: [Six ministries and commissions jointly implement an action plan to develop agricultural and rural resources to support migrant workers and other personnel returning to their hometowns to start businesses] Recently, six ministries and commissions, including the Ministry of Agriculture and the National Development and Reform Commission, jointly issued a notice to launch the implementation of developing agricultural and rural resources to support migrant workers and other personnel returning to their hometowns to start businesses. The action plan will be implemented in three stages from November 2015 to December 2020: mobilization and deployment, comprehensive implementation, and in-depth advancement. http://t.cn/RUgiubB

chinese_text: #看了就“知道”#【异地管辖，让民不怕与官斗】在一些官员那里：摆平就是水平，搞定就是稳定，无事就是本事。在一些民众那里：大闹大解决，小闹小解决，不闹不解决。异地管辖，有望使官民以法院来解决争议的方式成为常态，久而久之，也势必会彻底压制维稳逻辑。http://t.cn/RUBcoVG
text: #看就是“知”# [Remote jurisdiction, so that people are not afraid of fighting with officials] According to some officials: being level means being level, getting things done means being stable, and having nothing to do means being capable. For some people: big troubles will lead to solutions, small troubles will lead to small solutions, and no troubles will lead to solutions. The remote jurisdiction is expected to make it normal for the government and the people to resolve disputes through courts. Over time, it is bound to completely suppress the logic of maintaining stability. http://t.cn/RUBcoVG

chinese_text: 【千万跑车撞护栏 数人阻拦拍照】今天凌晨0点30分左右，重庆渝北区红黄路黄泥塝往红旗河沟方向发生一起车祸。一辆价值2000多万元的科尼塞克“幽灵跑车”撞上人行道护栏，左后轮被撞飞。最后，整辆车横在了马路上，造成红黄路往红旗河沟方向交通拥堵两个多小时。http://t.cn/RUg6EkZ
text: [Ten thousand sports cars crashed into the guardrail and several people stopped them from taking photos] Around 0:30 this morning, a car accident occurred in the direction of Huangnilong, Honghuang Road, Yubei District, Chongqing, towards Hongqihegou. A Koenigsegg "Ghost Sports Car" worth more than 20 million yuan hit the sidewalk guardrail, and the left rear wheel was knocked off. In the end, the entire car fell across the road, causing traffic jams on Honghuang Road toward Hongqihegou for more than two hours. http://t.cn/RUg6EkZ

chinese_text: 【[推荐]扩散！警方教你如何快速去除快递单上的隐私！】收到快递，快递单是不是随手就扔？这样可不行！[NO]上面可有你的隐私信息，万一被有心之人拿去……快戳图↓↓，@浙江公安 介绍如何处理快递单上的隐私信息，get√新技能学起来！转！
text: [[Recommended] Spread! The police teach you how to quickly remove privacy on express delivery orders! 】When you receive express delivery, do you just throw away the express delivery note? This is not okay! [NO] There may be your private information on it, in case it is taken away by someone with intentions... Click on the picture ↓↓, @泽江公安 will introduce how to handle the private information on the express delivery order, get√ learn new skills! change!

chinese_text: #万象#【惊天一撞！重庆2600万跑车撞人行护栏】29日凌晨，重庆一辆价值超2千万元科尼塞克“幽灵跑车”撞上10多米长人行道护栏，左后轮被撞飞。据了解，全球只有6辆科尼塞克，价值2600多万。此次维修费有可能就要几百万。知情者称，事发前听到跑车轰鸣， 或涉酒驾。http://t.cn/RUg6Cbv
text: #万搏#【A shocking collision! Chongqing 26 million sports car hits pedestrian guardrail] In the early morning of the 29th, a Koenigsegg "ghost sports car" worth more than 20 million yuan in Chongqing hit a more than 10-meter-long sidewalk guardrail, and the left rear wheel was knocked off. It is understood that there are only 6 Koenigseggs in the world, worth more than 26 million. The repair cost may be several million. People familiar with the matter said they heard the roar of a sports car before the incident and may have been involved in drunk driving. http://t.cn/RUg6Cbv

chinese_text: 【听听大学校长的建议】①北航校长：不要在忙碌的工作中把梦想遗忘在记忆的角落，不要在平淡的生活中让梦想磨灭在岁月的沧桑里 ②武大校长：除了你自己，没人真正了解你的极限 ③华中科大校长：无论在哪里，请做一个清醒的、保有慎独之心的人，用自己的执着时刻保持着清醒和明亮。
text: [Listen to the advice of the university president] ① President of Beihang University: Don’t forget your dreams in the corner of your memory in the busy work, and don’t let your dreams be lost in the vicissitudes of time in your ordinary life ② President of Wuhan University: No one except you Really understand your limits ③ President of Huazhong University of Science and Technology: No matter where you are, please be a sober and independent person, and use your persistence to stay awake and bright at all times.

chinese_text: #涨姿势#【12大经典词牌名是怎么来的？】苏轼一首《念奴娇》流传千古，可你知道“念奴”是谁吗？柳永一曲《雨霖铃》凄婉动人，可你知道“雨霖铃”最初是唐玄宗在雨夜哀叹自己无法保护杨贵妃吗？“踏莎行”的莎还在读shā？…看完这些，是否觉得多年语文白学了？戳图↓这个周末学点知识！via.人民日报
text: #上 POSITION# [Where did the names of the 12 classic word brands come from? 】Su Shi's song "Niannujiao" has been passed down through the ages, but do you know who "Niannujiao" is? Liu Yong's song "Yulin Ling" is sad and moving, but did you know that "Yulin Ling" was originally written by Emperor Xuanzong of the Tang Dynasty lamenting that he could not protect Yang Guifei on a rainy night? "Treading Sha Xing" Sha is still studying Sha? ...After reading this, do you feel that you have learned Chinese for so many years in vain? Click on the picture↓Learn something this weekend! via.People's Daily

chinese_text: 【[话筒]华北黄淮雾霾持续 东北迎大雪】中央气象台：未来三天，华北、黄淮、陕西等地霾持续，局地重度霾。夜间到早晨，华北、黄淮等地大雾，能见度不足200米。一直到12月2日，上述地区雾、霾逐渐消散。东北未来三天多降雪，部分地区暴雪。提醒注意防范！（央视记者任梅梅 蔡一飞）http://t.cn/RUgaeWX
text: [[Microphone] Haze continues in North China, Huanghuai and Northeast China welcomes heavy snow] Central Meteorological Observatory: In the next three days, haze will continue in North China, Huanghuai, Shaanxi and other places, with severe local haze. From night to morning, there was heavy fog in North China, Huanghuai and other places, with visibility less than 200 meters. Until December 2, the fog and haze gradually dissipated in the above-mentioned areas. There will be more snowfall in the Northeast in the next three days, with heavy snowfall in some areas. Reminder to take precautions! (CCTV reporter Ren Meimei and Cai Yifei) http://t.cn/RUgaeWX

chinese_text: 【你认为公共场合是否适合无遮盖哺乳？[思考]】近日，北京地铁上一妈妈在哺乳时被拍下，@北京往事网站 发博称公共场所注意举止，不要裸露性器官... 但很多网友留言力挺哺乳妈妈，“婴儿按需喂养，饿了就喂，妈妈很赞”。今天凌晨原发帖微博道歉称对当事人所造成的伤害致以真诚的歉意。对此，你怎么看?
text: [Do you think it is appropriate to breastfeed without covering in public places? [Thinking]] Recently, a mother was photographed breastfeeding while on the Beijing subway. @BeijingPast.com posted a blog saying that you should behave well in public places and do not expose your sexual organs... However, many netizens left messages in support of breastfeeding mothers, "Baby feeding on demand" , feed me when I’m hungry, mom is great.” The original Weibo apology posted early this morning said that she sincerely apologized for the harm caused to the person involved. What do you think of it?

chinese_text: 【[话筒]急转！老人晕倒路边，急寻家人！】27日下午，一位老人在杭州菜市桥公交站晕倒，经诊断老人脑出血，进入重症监护室，无法说话。老人70至80岁，穿灰运动装，灰毛衣，深蓝裤子，身边有一袋土豆和猪肉，很可能是独居老人，刚买完菜。戳图，如果您有线索，请速联系警方！扩散！http://t.cn/RUg5JgF
text: [[Microphone] Turn sharply! The old man fainted on the roadside and was looking for his family! ] On the afternoon of the 27th, an old man fainted at the Caishiqiao Bus Station in Hangzhou. He was diagnosed with cerebral hemorrhage and was admitted to the intensive care unit, unable to speak. The old man is 70 to 80 years old. He is wearing gray sportswear, a gray sweater, and dark blue pants. There is a bag of potatoes and pork next to him. He is probably an old man living alone and has just finished shopping for groceries. Click on the picture and if you have any clues, please contact the police immediately! diffusion! http://t.cn/RUg5JgF

chinese_text: #天下#【土耳其总统首次对俄罗斯战机被击落表示遗憾】土耳其总统28日对俄军机被土方击落表示遗憾，同时呼吁与普京会面，这是其首次在公开场合对此事件表示遗憾。土耳其曾拒就击落俄战机表示道歉，俄方对土采取了一系列制裁性措施，包括计划冻结两国免签证安排、暂停军事交往等。http://t.cn/RUgLM2v
text: #天下# [The President of Turkey expressed regret for the downing of a Russian fighter jet for the first time] On the 28th, the President of Turkey expressed regret for the downing of a Russian military jet by Turkey and called for a meeting with Putin. This was the first time that he expressed regret for this incident in public. Turkey has refused to apologize for shooting down a Russian fighter jet. Russia has taken a series of sanctioning measures against Turkey, including plans to freeze the visa-free arrangement between the two countries and suspend military exchanges. http://t.cn/RUgLM2v

[Sad] In 2014, the famous storytelling performing artist Tian Lianyuan and his son were involved in a car accident. The son died unfortunately. It was found that the driver was drunk. Teacher Tian said, "I live well and tell more people about the dangers of drunk driving, which is the best comfort for my son." [Microphone] Refuse drunk driving, stop the harm, and forward the promise! http://t.cn/RUdSYjl

text: #Turkey shot down Russian military plane# [The President of Turkey expressed regret for the downing of a Russian fighter jet for the first time] The President of Turkey expressed regret for the downing of a Russian military plane by Turkey on the 28th and called for a meeting with Putin. This was the first time that he expressed regret for this incident in public. (Xinhua News Agency) http://t.cn/RUgqZm6

chinese_text: 【雇主抛弃瘫痪儿子 保姆靠捡破烂抚养37年】37年前，福建农妇庄茉莉给人当保姆，雇主丢下瘫痪男婴，再无消息。她把男婴带回家照顾，生活拮据，她靠捡废品抚养孩子长大。现在，她81岁，不愿到亲生儿子家住，蜗居简陋房屋照顾捡来的儿子……她说，“遇到了，就不能放弃。”[泪] http://t.cn/RUrrd4M
text: [The employer abandoned his paralyzed son and the nanny spent 37 years raising him by picking up rags to raise him] Thirty-seven years ago, a Fujian peasant woman named Zhuang Moli worked as a nanny. Her employer abandoned the paralyzed baby boy and never heard from her again. She took her baby boy home to take care of her, and her life was difficult. She raised the child by picking up scraps. Now, she is 81 years old and does not want to live with her biological son. She lives in a simple house to take care of her adopted son... She said, "If you encounter it, you can't give up." [Tears] http://t.cn/RUrrd4M

chinese_text: #突发#【山西大运高速47车连环相撞 已致3死7伤】29日早晨，山西大运高速公路运城到侯马段，距侯马9.3公里处发生特大交通事故，共有47辆车连环相撞，目前造成3死7伤。事故发生后，当地政府迅速启动应急预案，受事故影响运城至太原高速公路封闭，初步调查原因为团雾影响。http://t.cn/RUgK7ye @央广网
text: #break# [47 vehicles collided on Shanxi Dayun Expressway, resulting in 3 deaths and 7 injuries] On the morning of the 29th, a major traffic accident occurred on the Yuncheng to Houma section of Shanxi Dayun Expressway, 9.3 kilometers away from Houma. A total of 47 vehicles A series of car collisions has resulted in 3 deaths and 7 injuries. After the accident, the local government quickly launched an emergency plan. Affected by the accident, the Yuncheng-Taiyuan Expressway was closed. Preliminary investigation revealed that the cause was the impact of mass fog. http://t.cn/RUgK7ye @central broadcast network

chinese_text: 【山西大运高速47辆车连环相撞 已造成3死7】今天早晨7点左右，山西大运高速公路运城到侯马段，距侯马9.3公里处发生一起特大交通事故，共有47辆车连环相撞，目前造成3死7伤。事故发生后，当地政府迅速启动应急预案，组织多部门进行救援，受事故影响运城至太原高速公路封闭，初步调查原因为团雾影响。
text: [47 vehicles collided on Shanxi Dayun Expressway, resulting in 3 deaths and 7 deaths] Around 7 o'clock this morning, a major traffic accident occurred in the Yuncheng to Houma section of Shanxi Dayun Expressway, 9.3 kilometers away from Houma, involving a total of 47 vehicles. The series of collisions resulted in 3 deaths and 7 injuries. After the accident, the local government quickly launched an emergency plan and organized multiple departments to conduct rescue operations. The highway from Yuncheng to Taiyuan was closed due to the accident. The preliminary investigation revealed that the cause was the impact of mass fog.

chinese_text: #正能量#【宁波市慈善总会：放弃寻找“顺其自然”】这85万元善款分别从两家银行汇出，署名都是“然顺”。然而不管署名“然顺”、“然其”等变来变去，宁波人都知道这是1999年开始向宁波市慈善总会捐款的“顺其自然”。该慈善总会表示：尊重当事人意愿，放弃寻找“顺其自然”真人。
text: #正energy# [Ningbo Charity Federation: Give up the search and "let nature take its course"] The 850,000 yuan in donations were remitted from two banks, and the signatures were all "Ranshun". However, regardless of the changes in the signatures such as "Ranshun" and "Ranqi", Ningbo people all know that this is "Let It Be" which started donating to the Ningbo Charity Federation in 1999. The Charity Federation stated that it respects the wishes of the parties concerned and gives up looking for real people to "let nature take its course".

chinese_text: 【西安遭遇大雾影响似海市蜃楼】2015年11月29日清晨，住在高层的市民推窗看到的是迷雾一片，高楼的底部被雾掩埋，像是海市蜃楼一般，景色十分独特。这是记者航拍的西安南郊大雾。华商记者王警 文/图 http://t.cn/RUgKgJ4
text: [Xi'an was affected by heavy fog like a mirage] In the early morning of November 29, 2015, citizens living in high-rise buildings pushed their windows and saw a fog. The bottom of the high-rise buildings was buried in the fog, like a mirage. The scenery was very unique. This is a reporter’s aerial photo of heavy fog in the southern suburbs of Xi’an. Chinese Business Reporter Wang Jingwen/Photo http://t.cn/RUgKgJ4

chinese_text: #热点#【英媒：中国儿童读物太严肃 书中主人公都很听话】报道称，中国出版商极为保守，描述不听话或异想天开的孩子或者青少年比长辈技胜一筹的书都会避开，可爱的动物远多于海盗这种叛逆角色。没几本书刻划兄弟姐妹或七大姑八大姨——因为独生子女政策，儿童不明白这些关系。http://t.cn/RUgy4Rj
text: #hotspot# [British media: Chinese children’s books are too serious and the protagonists in the books are all obedient] Reports say that Chinese publishers are extremely conservative and will avoid books that describe disobedient or whimsical children or teenagers who are superior to their elders. Cute There are far more animals than rebellious characters like pirates. Few books feature siblings or aunts and sisters—relationships that children do not understand because of the one-child policy. http://t.cn/RUgy4Rj

chinese_text: #安全文明出行#【冯巩：儿行千里母担忧 母行千里儿守候】冯巩说安全文明出行事关千万家庭的幸福，“十次事故九次快，开车不是拉力赛，十次事故九次抢，超车不能拿大奖”，他的这段交通安全顺口溜，你记住了吗？http://t.cn/RUdC2tG
text: #SafeCivilizedTravel# [Feng Gong: When a child travels a thousand miles, a mother is worried about her mother, who is waiting for her son when traveling a thousand miles] Feng Gong said that safe and civilized travel is related to the happiness of millions of families. “Nine out of ten accidents are fast. Driving is not a rally. Nine times out of ten accidents, there is a car accident. "You can't win a big prize by overtaking." Do you remember his traffic safety jingle? http://t.cn/RUdC2tG

chinese_text: 【《火星救援》：那应当是我们的世界线】“火星载人探索计划不是下一代的任务，是我们的任务。”罗伯特•祖布林在《赶往火星》中这样写到。电影发生在2035年，一个送人上火星都不新鲜的年代，但这会是我们的未来吗？http://t.cn/RUB6bCm #如何不死在火星# http://t.cn/RUgM3Gk
text: ["The Martian": That should be our world line] "The Mars manned exploration program is not the mission of the next generation, it is our mission." Robert Zubrin wrote in "Rush to Mars". The movie takes place in 2035, an era where sending people to Mars is nothing new, but will this be our future? http://t.cn/RUB6bCm #How not to die on Mars# http://t.cn/RUgM3Gk

chinese_text: 【“最严国考” 防作弊利器：金属探测仪、身份证识别仪、摄像头…】《中华人民共和国刑法修正案（九）》规定国考作弊最高可判7年有期徒刑。今天，2016年度国家公务员考试正式开考。金属探测仪、身份证识别仪、作弊克、摄像头…“最严国考”，防作弊利器让作弊无处藏身！http://t.cn/RUg9mYp
text: [The "Toughest National Examination" anti-cheating tools: metal detectors, ID card readers, cameras...] The "Amendment to the Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China (Ninth)" stipulates that cheating in the national examination can be punished by up to 7 years in prison. Today, the 2016 National Civil Service Examination officially begins. Metal detectors, ID card readers, cheaters, cameras... the "most stringent national examination", anti-cheating tools give cheaters nowhere to hide! http://t.cn/RUg9mYp

chinese_text: 【父母抛弃瘫痪儿 保姆留守“危房”照顾37年】37年前，福建晋江，庄茉莉受雇到一户从香港回来的夫妇家中当保姆，照顾“大头”。之后这对夫妇便狠心地丢下刚满月孩子，返回香港再无消息。当时庄茉莉家中已有四个孩子，日子也不好过，一咬牙，便带“大头”回家照顾，一晃便是37年[赞]。via.新闻晨报
text: [Parents abandoned the paralyzed child and the nanny stayed in a "dangerous house" to take care of him for 37 years] 37 years ago, in Jinjiang, Fujian, Zhuang Moli was hired as a nanny in the home of a couple who returned from Hong Kong to take care of "Big Tou". Afterwards, the couple cruelly abandoned their one-month-old child and returned to Hong Kong without news. At that time, Zhuang Moli had four children at home, and life was not easy. She gritted her teeth and took "Big Tou" home to take care of her. In a flash, 37 years have passed [like]. via.News Morning News

text: 【29 cars collided! 4 killed and 5 injured in car accident on Houping Expressway in Shanxi] At around 7 o'clock this morning, due to heavy fog, a traffic accident occurred on the S75 section of Houping Expressway in Shanxi. According to the expressway traffic police in the jurisdiction, a total of 29 vehicles collided, and 4 people have been injured so far. One person died and five others were injured. Rescue and cleanup work at the accident site is in progress. (CCTV reporters Hu Xiaodong and Cui Xiaoran)

chinese_text: #万象#【95岁抗战老兵跳楼自杀 毕业于黄埔军校】长沙95岁的抗战老兵林协顺14日从三楼跳下身亡。据悉，老人患有严重的前列腺疾病，晚上几乎无法睡觉。此外，老人的右耳也基本失聪。媒体报道称，林协顺由于医保在新疆，身在湖南的他无法享受到医保补助，一身的疾病只能靠自己硬扛。http://t.cn/RUgVXjv
text: #万搏# [A 95-year-old anti-war veteran committed suicide by jumping off a building and graduated from the Huangpu Military Academy] Lin Xieshun, a 95-year-old anti-war veteran in Changsha, jumped from the third floor to his death on the 14th. It is reported that the old man suffered from severe prostate disease and could hardly sleep at night. In addition, the old man is basically deaf in his right ear. Media reports stated that because Lin Xieshun’s medical insurance was in Xinjiang, he was unable to enjoy medical insurance subsidies in Hunan, so he had to deal with all his illnesses on his own. http://t.cn/RUgVXjv

chinese_text: 【医生跪在担架车上抢救 5分钟救回心脏骤停老人】河北，70岁老人在医院心脏骤停，医生赶来，立即跪地抢救。往急救科转运，医生全程跪在担架车上，一刻未停按压心脏。施救、转运、上呼吸机、除颤…5分钟后，终将病人从死亡边缘拉了回来！向白衣天使致敬！[赞]（央视记者谢宾超）http://t.cn/RUgNARf
text: [The doctor knelt on a stretcher for 5 minutes to rescue an elderly man who had suffered a cardiac arrest] In Hebei, a 70-year-old man suffered a cardiac arrest in the hospital. The doctor rushed over and immediately knelt down to rescue him. During the transfer to the emergency department, the doctor knelt on the stretcher and continued to compress the heart. Rescue, transfer, ventilator installation, defibrillation...5 minutes later, the patient was finally brought back from the brink of death! Salute to the angel in white! [Like] (CCTV reporter Xie Binchao) http://t.cn/RUgNARf

chinese_text: 【扩散！帮这位老人寻找家人！】27日下午2点多，一老人在杭州菜市桥公交站晕倒，被路人送到医院。老人70至80岁，1.62米，头发全白，穿灰色运动装，灰毛衣，深蓝色裤子，无显示个人信息物品。现会睁眼，但不能说话。老人年纪大了，病情随时有变，可至今没联系上家人。via.公安部打四黑除四害 转发扩散！
text: 【diffusion! Help this old man find his family! 】At around 2 pm on the 27th, an old man fainted at Caishiqiao Bus Station in Hangzhou and was taken to the hospital by passers-by. The old man is 70 to 80 years old, 1.62 meters tall, with white hair. He is wearing gray sportswear, a gray sweater, and dark blue pants. No personal information is displayed. Now he can open his eyes, but cannot speak. The old man is getting older and his condition may change at any time, but he has not been able to contact his family so far. via. The Ministry of Public Security cracks down on the four evils and eliminates the four evils. Repost and spread!

text: [Public welfare organization satirizes subway breastfeeding, logs off Weibo, suspends website and apologizes] Recently, when a public welfare organization’s official Weibo forwarded a photo of a mother breastfeeding in the Beijing subway, it criticized her as “exposing her sexual organs”, which sparked heated discussions. Yesterday, Weibo apologized for the incident. The founder of the website, Teng Fei, said that after realizing that the Weibo content was inappropriate, he deleted the post and apologized. He also announced that he would cancel the @Beijing Past website ID and suspend its use. http://t.cn/RUeJpjH

text: [Office of the State Council: Resolutely cut off all kinds of weird certificates] On November 30, the General Office of the State Council issued the "Notice on Simplifying and Optimizing Public Service Processes to Facilitate Grassroots People's Services and Entrepreneurship." The notice requires that all localities should strengthen information sharing and business coordination between departments to avoid various types of "weird certificates" and "cyclic certificates" from the source. These four major problems, including too many certificates, difficulty in getting things done, and prevarication, are expected to be solved. http://t.cn/RUeLnFI

text: #Internet+Earthquake# [Robot earthquake reporting can be [good]] Pan Huaiwen, director of the China Earthquake Networks Center, revealed on the "Internet + Earthquake" forum that the earthquake rapid reporting robot will soon be on duty. Compared with the current automatic rapid reporting content, The content automatically compiled by the earthquake reporting robot will be richer. Basic earthquake reporting parameters, epicenter maps, information about villages and towns near the epicenter, historical earthquake conditions in the area, etc. can be released immediately.

chinese_text: 【IT男连续加班耳朵“重女轻男” 只听见女[泪流满面]】IT白领徐先生连续加班了半个多月，发现耳朵只能听到女声，男声全变成了嗡嗡声。检查发现竟然是“左耳突发性低频耳聋”，整个低频声音丢失了大半…专家提醒，过度疲劳容易诱发突发性耳聋，一旦发现耳鸣、耳朵闷胀等情况，一定尽早治疗。(武汉晚报)
text: [IT man worked overtime continuously for more than half a month and found that he could only hear female voices and all male voices turned into a buzzing sound. The examination revealed that it turned out to be "sudden low-frequency deafness in the left ear", and most of the entire low-frequency sound was lost... Experts reminded that excessive fatigue can easily induce sudden deafness. Once tinnitus, ear fullness, etc. are discovered, treatment must be carried out as soon as possible. (Wuhan Evening News)

chinese_text: 【韩国国会批准《中韩自贸协定》】韩国国会今天下午经讨论，批准《中韩自贸协定》。《中韩自贸协定》今年6月1号在韩国首尔正式签署，是中国迄今为止涉及国别贸易额最大、领域范围最为全面的自贸协定。自贸协定签署后，须经过两国国内批准程序，还有两国交换公文等程序才能最终生效。
text: [The South Korean Congress approves the China-South Korea Free Trade Agreement] The South Korean Congress approved the China-South Korea Free Trade Agreement after discussion this afternoon. The "China-South Korea Free Trade Agreement" was officially signed in Seoul, South Korea on June 1 this year. It is China's free trade agreement with the largest country-to-country trade volume and the most comprehensive scope to date. After the free trade agreement is signed, it must go through the domestic approval procedures of the two countries and the exchange of official documents between the two countries before it can finally take effect.

chinese_text: 【马云改行当门卫了？[偷笑]】近日，成都某小区门卫柯全寿成了当地的红人，他走红的原因是，长了一张酷似马云的“明星脸”。不断有市民慕名过来要合影拍照，柯全寿说：“有小区居民爱开玩笑，经过门卫室喊我‘马哥’。”但他自认为和马云不怎么像：“我明明比马云帅。”[doge]（成都商报）你觉得像吗？

Ke Quanshou said: "There are residents in the community who like to joke and call me 'Brother Ma' when passing by the guard room." But he thinks he doesn't look much like Jack Ma: "I'm obviously more handsome than Jack Ma." [doge ] (Chengdu Business Daily) Do you think it looks like it?

chinese_text: #热点#【烟台到大连海底隧道方案公布，你怎么看？】近日，国务院审议明年重点工程，烟台到大连海底隧道施工方案出炉。方案将采纳全海底隧道，以火车载运汽车通行，火车运行速度能达220公里/小时，从烟台到大连最多只需40分钟。工程总造价约2000亿~2600亿元之间，堪比三峡工程。http://t.cn/RUetDLo
text: #热热# [The Yantai to Dalian undersea tunnel plan has been announced, what do you think? 】Recently, the State Council reviewed key projects for next year, and the construction plan for the Yantai to Dalian undersea tunnel was released. The plan will adopt a fully undersea tunnel and use trains to carry cars. The train can run at a speed of 220 kilometers per hour. It only takes 40 minutes at most from Yantai to Dalian. The total project cost is about 200 billion to 260 billion yuan, which is comparable to the Three Gorges Project. http://t.cn/RUetDLo

chinese_text: #有意思#【喜欢上一个不可能在一起的人是什么感觉？】在你心里，有没有那么一个人，渴望相见，又害怕相见[生病]。不甘做朋友，不敢做恋人[害羞]。你离他很近，但却爱而不得[委屈]。他从未入戏，你却赔上了自己[悲伤]……喜欢上一个不可能在一起的人之27种感觉。心中有人者请忽略，否则后果自负[围观]。
text: # interesting# [What does it feel like to fall in love with someone who is impossible to be with? 】In your heart, is there such a person that you long to see but are afraid to meet [sick]? Not willing to be friends, not dare to be lovers [shy]. You are very close to him, but you love him but you can't feel wronged. He never entered the scene, but you lost yourself [sadness]... 27 feelings of falling in love with someone you can't be with. If you have someone in mind, please ignore it, otherwise you will be responsible for the consequences [watch].

chinese_text: #习主席出席巴黎大会#【习近平会见奥巴马 强调中美要牢牢把握构建新型大国关系正确方向】30日习近平在巴黎会见奥巴马时强调，中美两国应坚持不冲突不对抗、相互尊重、合作共赢原则，从双边、地区、全球各个层面推进两国务实交流合作。双方要共同努力，确保两国关系继续健康稳定发展。(央视记者王宇波)
text: #President Xi Attends Paris Conference# [Xi Jinping met with Obama and emphasized that China and the United States must firmly grasp the correct direction of building a new type of major power relations] When Xi Jinping met with Obama in Paris on the 30th, he emphasized that China and the United States should adhere to non-conflict, non-confrontation, mutual respect, and cooperation. The principle of win-win is to promote practical exchanges and cooperation between the two countries at bilateral, regional and global levels. Both sides should work together to ensure the continued healthy and stable development of bilateral relations. (CCTV reporter Wang Yubo)

chinese_text: 【最简单粗暴的防霾知识手册[奥特曼]】雾霾再次来袭，有网友晒出同一地点的雾霾前后对比图称：“这些建筑都发射了…”雾霾不同分级都有啥依据？最轻的橙色预警应该怎么防护？口罩、空气净化器的选购有啥讲究？嗓子干痒，头痛难忍该怎么处理？戳图↓↓最简单粗暴的防霾知识手册，转发学习，祝别被发射！
text: [The simplest and most crude anti-smog knowledge manual [Ultraman]] Smog is coming again. Some netizens posted a before and after comparison of the smog in the same place and said: "These buildings are emitting..." What are the different levels of smog? in accordance with? How to protect against the lightest orange alert? What are the considerations when purchasing masks and air purifiers? What should I do if I have a dry, itchy throat and an unbearable headache? chinese_text: #正能量#【除了知识 我还要教会他们坚强[good]】广西贺州教师覃雪梅，因患重度癫痫，她无法正常行走和写板书。确诊十年来，她坚持上课、改作业、经常去学生家家访。因病加重，她曾在课堂晕倒，学校考虑为她调岗她却婉言拒绝。她说梦想就是把孩子们带出山外，用知识改变命运。为她点赞！(央视记者廖汨)
text: #正energy# [In addition to knowledge, I also want to teach them to be strong [good]] Qin Xuemei, a teacher in Hezhou, Guangxi, suffers from severe epilepsy. She is unable to walk normally and write on the blackboard. In the ten years since she was diagnosed, she has continued to attend classes, correct homework, and often visit students' homes. As her illness worsened, she once fainted in class. The school considered reassigning her to another position, but she declined politely. She said her dream is to take children out of the mountains and use knowledge to change their destiny. Thumbs up for her! (CCTV reporter Liao Mi)

Next door to the Embassy is the Dutch Consulate. Braving the "rain of eggs", the Dutch Consul General, who was on the verge of tears, tweeted: "The always unhappy Turkish demonstrators mistook us for our neighbor, the Russian Consulate. "

chinese_text: 【闯红灯不服管 她竟当街掌掴辅警[吃惊]】日前在江苏睢宁，一女子骑电动车闯红灯，被执勤交警制止。女子情绪激动，并不断强调着急接孩子。随后她将车停到路边，不久后带着孩子再次闯灯。辅警上前劝说，不料女子竟以巴掌相还，并破口大骂。最终，女子被处行政拘留。(央视记者吴睿)http://t.cn/RUeabVQ
text: [She refused to obey when she ran a red light and slapped an auxiliary police officer in the street [surprise]] A few days ago in Suining, Jiangsu, a woman rode an electric bike and ran a red light and was stopped by the traffic police on duty. The woman was very emotional and kept stressing that she was anxious to pick up the child. She then parked the car on the side of the road, and soon ran through the light again with her child. The auxiliary police officer stepped forward to persuade her, but the woman slapped him back and cursed. In the end, the woman was placed under administrative detention. (CCTV reporter Wu Rui) http://t.cn/RUeabVQ

chinese_text: 【新浪博客十周年庆典之回顾篇】博客作为Web 2.0时代的代表，在2005年成立后，汇聚大批明星博主，名人效应驱使下，写博客风靡一时。新浪网副总裁、新闻总编辑周晓鹏在庆典致辞中特别表示，向所有新浪博客的支持者说声谢谢。随后“十年十人”宣传片介绍了博客如何影响十位博主。http://t.cn/RU1QAt2
text: [Review of the 10th Anniversary Celebration of Sina Blog] As a representative of the Web 2.0 era, blogs gathered a large number of celebrity bloggers after their establishment in 2005. Driven by the celebrity effect, blogging became all the rage. In his speech at the celebration, Zhou Xiaopeng, Vice President and News Editor-in-Chief of Sina.com, specially expressed his gratitude to all Sina Blog supporters. Then the "Ten People of Ten Years" promotional video introduced how blogging affects ten bloggers. http://t.cn/RU1QAt2

chinese_text: 【新浪发布全媒体影响力排行榜】排行榜综合微博、博客以及公众号数据，打造了一个横跨全网多屏的综合影响力榜单，统计周期分为周榜和月榜。除总榜外，还包括九个按照垂直领域进行分类的子榜单。今后，这一排行榜将是新浪“Z计划”中评估自媒体影响力的重要依据之一。http://t.cn/RUe6VAF
text: [Sina releases all-media influence ranking list] The ranking list combines data from Weibo, blogs and public accounts to create a comprehensive influence list spanning multiple screens across the entire network. The statistical period is divided into weekly list and monthly list. In addition to the overall list, it also includes nine sub-lists classified according to vertical fields. In the future, this ranking will be one of the important basis for evaluating the influence of self-media in Sina’s “Z Plan”. http://t.cn/RUe6VAF

chinese_text: 【“有人得了角膜 父母就不孤单了”[泪]】11月24日，19岁的李海萍因肝硬化离开了。她生前与病魔抗争10年，病情恶化后她想逝后捐角膜，父母舍不得。她劝道：“有人得到女儿角膜后看着你们，你们就不孤单了。”最终父母实现了她的愿望：捐献角膜，将骨灰撒入大海…善良永生。转发，送别辽宁女孩李海萍！
text: ["If someone has cornea, parents will not be alone" [tears]] On November 24, 19-year-old Li Haiping passed away due to liver cirrhosis. She struggled with the disease for 10 years during her lifetime. After her condition worsened, she wanted to donate her corneas after her death, but her parents were reluctant. She advised: "If someone gets your daughter's cornea and looks at you, you will not be alone." In the end, her parents realized her wish: donate the cornea and scatter the ashes into the sea... Kindness will live forever. Forward to say goodbye to Liaoning girl Li Haiping!

text: [3-year-old daughter broke a cup and her parents drove away: If the cup was broken, the child would pay [surprise]] When Yangyang, a 3-year-old girl, went to play with her parents in the suburbs of Chengdu, she broke a cup in a store and was compensated for 25 yuan. Her father immediately gave it to her. A slap in the face and said to the store: I don’t want to buy the cup, I will leave the child with you. I turned around and went back to Chengdu... The police station contacted them and they refused to pick up the child and said they wanted to teach her a lesson. That night, the police rushed to Chengdu to return the girl... You want to say ____

text: [The 2016 Lunar New Year silver coins will be issued: face value 3 yuan, containing 8 grams of pure silver [oh yeah]] The People's Bank of China will issue the 2016 Lunar New Year silver commemorative coins on December 15. The commemorative coin contains 8 grams of pure silver and has a face value of 3 yuan. On the front is my country's national emblem, country name and year number. On the back is the word "Fu", with moon gate, peony and other patterns, and the word "3 yuan". The maximum circulation of this commemorative coin is 1.9 million. Click on the picture to see the "true appearance" of the commemorative coin↓↓ (CCTV reporter Wang Lei)

text: #2016CCTV真人#[Bai Yansong: When choosing a job, it depends on whether there is a distant place that you recognize] Two words for those who want to do journalism: ①News allows you to meet people you have never met before, and allows you to reach the place you want to go. ②You have to accept many problems and setbacks, instead of just talking about ideals every day when things are going well. I hope that we can become colleagues, and I welcome you no matter which position you hold in the future. Together, we can make this country and ourselves better.

chinese_text: #2016央视校招#【白岩松：要对未来充满好奇】送给毕业生两句话：①学会接受平淡，要对未来充满好奇。生活不会只有斧子等你，还会有花，还会有温馨的东西。②不要把别人认可的眼光当成你认可的东西。每个人有适合自己的东西，如果不是真的热爱，进来了再跑还挺费劲的。
text: #2016CCTV真人#[Bai Yansong: Be curious about the future] Two words for graduates: ①Learn to accept the ordinary and be curious about the future. Life will not only have axes waiting for you, but also flowers and warm things. ②Don’t take other people’s approval as something you approve of. Everyone has something that suits them. If you don’t really love it, it will be quite difficult to get in and run.
