chinese_text: 【枪下留人！最高法紧急下令暂缓运毒7.5公斤农民死刑执行】“伙同”他人运毒7.5公斤，王广建两审均被法院判处死刑。就在行刑前最后时刻，根据新发现的证据，录音中毒贩亲口说王广建不知道驾驶的货车上面有毒品。最高人民法院罕见地启动了暂缓执行死刑的程序，俗称“枪下留人”。此案将重新裁定。
text: 【Keep someone under the gun! The Supreme People's Court issued an emergency order to suspend the death penalty for a farmer who transported 7.5 kilograms of poison] Wang Guangjian was sentenced to death by the court in both trials for "collaborating" with others to transport 7.5 kilograms of poison. At the last moment before the execution, according to newly discovered evidence, the drug trafficker was recorded saying that Wang Guangjian did not know that there were drugs on the truck he was driving. In a rare move, the Supreme People's Court initiated a moratorium on the death penalty, commonly known as "shooting to keep people alive." The case will be re-adjudicated.

chinese_text: #安全文明出行#【分心驾驶的后果】①贵州雷山，司机边开车边哄孩子，车辆失控，致2岁儿童死亡、两人受伤；②江苏客车司机途中7分钟看39次手机，撞死骑车老人；③广西来宾，司机因开车走神，将电动车撞翻致驾驶员重伤。交管部门：开车避免打电话、玩手机、瞌睡、走神、吃东西等行为，莫把心分给"死神"！
text: #SafeCivilizedTravel# [Consequences of distracted driving] ① In Leishan, Guizhou, the driver was coaxing his children while driving, and the vehicle lost control, killing a 2-year-old child and injuring two others; ② A Jiangsu bus driver checked his mobile phone 39 times in 7 minutes during the journey and was killed An old man riding a bicycle; ③ A guest from Guangxi, the driver was distracted while driving and knocked over the electric car, causing serious injuries to the driver. Traffic control department: When driving, avoid talking on the phone, playing with mobile phones, falling asleep, distracted, eating, etc. Don't give your heart to the "god of death"!

chinese_text: #举报雾霾群众运动#近日，全国各地爆发大规模集体吸毒事件，各大城市身陷囹圄，大裤衩被偷，奥特曼降临，广场舞深陷寂静岭，朝阳人民、西城大妈、海淀群众揭竿而起，纷纷举报，要求捉拿毒枭，如有线索，请发送图片证据现场照片在此微博下。小编将随机给部分受难群众发放防毒神器。http://t.cn/RUDv1fn
text: #reporthazemassmovement# Recently, large-scale collective drug abuse incidents have broken out across the country. Major cities are behind bars, big pants have been stolen, Ultraman has arrived, square dances are deep in Silent Hill, Chaoyang people, Xicheng aunts, and Haidian people People have risen up and reported one after another, demanding the arrest of drug lords. If you have any clues, please send picture evidence and photos of the scene to this Weibo. The editor will randomly distribute anti-virus artifacts to some victims. http://t.cn/RUDv1fn

chinese_text: 【教育部党组通报3所高校违纪问题典型案件】教育部党组今天通报：①中央音乐学院院长王次炤为其女违规操办婚宴，被免职；②北京邮电大学虚列支出套取资金设“小金库”，副校长杨放春被免职；③因违规兼职取酬，对外经济贸易大学副校长刘亚被免职，国际商学院原院长汤谷良被降级。http://t.cn/RUDv2jl
text: [The Party Group of the Ministry of Education reported typical cases of disciplinary violations in three universities] The Party Group of the Ministry of Education reported today: ① Wang Cizheng, the dean of the Central Conservatory of Music, organized a wedding banquet for his daughter in violation of regulations and was dismissed; ② Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications set up a "set up to obtain funds by falsely reporting expenditures" "Small Treasury", Vice President Yang Fangchun was dismissed; ③For illegal part-time job remuneration, Vice President Liu Ya of the University of International Business and Economics was dismissed, and former Dean of the International Business School Tang Guliang was demoted. http://t.cn/RUDv2jl

chinese_text: #健康时间# 【为了咱的小命[生病] 一起学习防雾霾12招！】近期，京津冀数城市空气质量指数“爆表”，14个城市空气质量为“严重污染”，北京灰霾锁城已持续4天，局地PM2.5浓度值逼近1000……网友@战乱夕阳baby 自制防霾12招，戳图↓↓学习，拯救同在雾霾里的小伙伴们！
text: #HealthTime# [For the sake of our lives [sickness], let’s learn 12 tips to prevent smog! 】Recently, the air quality index of several cities in Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei has "exploded", and the air quality of 14 cities is "severely polluted". Beijing has been locked in haze for 4 days, and the local PM2.5 concentration value is close to 1000... Netizen @ The war-torn sunset baby makes 12 self-made anti-smog tricks. Click on the picture ↓↓ to learn and save your friends who are also in the smog!

chinese_text: #轻松一刻#科比生涯绝杀集锦！一个绝杀集锦可以做到十五分钟的男人，就算不喜欢，也不能否认他的伟大与传奇！[心]http://t.cn/RyKJSn3
text: #easymoment# Kobe Bryant’s career-defining highlights! Even if you don't like a man who can highlight his kills for fifteen minutes, you can't deny his greatness and legend! [Heart]http://t.cn/RyKJSn3

chinese_text: 【年纪大了，要加快脚步看世界！】“去欧洲，你会感受到西方的文明；去看尼亚加拉瀑布，你会感受到大自然的鬼斧神工；去梵蒂冈，你会感受到历史人文的厚重……”王启思带着老伴玩了12年，还要继续“加快脚步”。他鼓励不管是年轻人还是老年人，都应该要多去外面的世界看一看。
text: [As you get older, you should speed up and see the world! ] "Go to Europe and you will feel Western civilization; go to Niagara Falls and you will feel the miraculous craftsmanship of nature; go to the Vatican and you will feel the richness of history and humanity..." Wang Qisi has been playing with his wife for 12 years. We must continue to “speed up the pace”. He encouraged both young and old people to see more of the outside world.

chinese_text: #微镜头#【家祭，城殇】今天，南京大屠杀死难者遗属家庭祭告活动在南京举行。91岁的老人杨翠英带着女儿，前来祭告在南京大屠杀中遇难的亲人。1937年的今天，日军下达进攻南京的命令，6周时间30多万中国军民惨遭杀戮。杨翠英的堂爷爷、父亲、舅舅、弟弟不幸遇难。祭奠同胞，铭记历史！(央视记者徐大为)
text: #microlens# [Family Memorial, City Memorial] Today, a family memorial service for the survivors of the Nanjing Massacre was held in Nanjing. 91-year-old Yang Cuiying brought her daughter to pay homage to her relatives who died in the Nanjing Massacre. On this day in 1937, the Japanese army issued an order to attack Nanjing. In six weeks, more than 300,000 Chinese soldiers and civilians were slaughtered. Yang Cuiying's cousin, father, uncle, and brother unfortunately died. Pay homage to our compatriots and remember history! (CCTV reporter Xu Dawei)

chinese_text: #涨姿势#【闭窗停车开空调 可能会致命！】 进入冬季，人们在停车等人或者休息时喜欢打开空调，然后关紧车窗睡觉。戳图↓↓用实验告诉大家，这样睡觉的话，有可能让你再也醒不来。转发提醒身边的朋友！
text: #上 POSITION# [Parking with the windows closed and the air conditioner turned on may be fatal! 】 In winter, people like to turn on the air conditioner when parking, waiting for someone or taking a rest, and then close the car windows to sleep. Click on the picture ↓↓ Let me tell you through experiments that if you sleep like this, you may never wake up again. Forward it to remind your friends!

chinese_text: 【转发送别！3台手术后突发心梗，42岁医生倒在手术台】昨天，山东泰山医学院附属医院骨科副主任蔡国栋有4台手术，做完第3台感到胸口不适，心电监护提示左室主干阻塞，大面积心肌梗死、室颤。抢救两个小时后，他还是走了，仅42岁，走的时候铅衣都没来得及脱……转发，送送蔡医生！@齐鲁晚报-今日泰山
text: 【Forward farewell! A 42-year-old doctor collapsed on the operating table after suffering a myocardial infarction after 3 surgeries] Yesterday, Cai Guodong, deputy director of the Department of Orthopedics at the Affiliated Hospital of Shandong Taishan Medical College, had 4 surgeries. After the third surgery, he felt chest discomfort, and the ECG monitoring indicated left ventricular trunk disease. Blockage, large area myocardial infarction, ventricular fibrillation. After two hours of resuscitation, he still passed away. He was only 42 years old, and he didn't even have time to take off his lead clothes when he left... Forward, send Dr. Cai! @Qilu Evening News-Today’s Taishan

chinese_text: 【世界艾滋病日 要爱不要“艾”[红丝带]】①我国现有艾滋病感染者和病人共计57.5万；②青年学生艾滋病疫情明显上升；③男男同性性行为成为重点传播途径；④拥抱、共用碗筷不会感染艾滋病病毒；⑤令患者煎熬的不是病痛折磨，而是被歧视。今天，第28个#世界艾滋病日#！转发关"艾"，消除歧视，珍爱生命！
text: [World AIDS Day, love and not AIDS [Red Ribbon]] ① There are currently 575,000 HIV infected and patients in my country; ② The AIDS epidemic among young students has increased significantly; ③ Gay sex has become a key transmission route; ④ Hugging, You will not be infected with HIV by sharing tableware; ⑤ What makes patients suffer is not the pain but the discrimination. Today is the 28th #WorldAIDSDay! Repost "AI" to eliminate discrimination and cherish life!

chinese_text: #微镜头#【考研之路实属不易 楼道也是根据地[奥特曼]】2016年考研已进入冲刺期，在最后时间里，“学霸”们也是拼了。天气冷、没座位，在楼道里披着毛毯、对着暖气片也要苦读……无论环境如何，天道酬勤，考研的同学们请为自己加油！http://t.cn/RUeDsMW
text: #Microlens# [The road to the postgraduate entrance examination is really not easy. The corridor is also the base [Ultraman]] The 2016 postgraduate entrance examination has entered the sprint period. In the last time, the "student masters" also worked hard. The weather is cold and there are no seats. You have to study hard in the corridor with a blanket and facing the radiator... No matter what the environment is, God rewards hard work. Students who are taking the postgraduate entrance examination, please cheer for yourself! http://t.cn/RUeDsMW

chinese_text: 【铭记那段惨痛与悲壮！】南京保卫战，8万守军残兵与30万日军激战10天，40%战死，受伤无数。日军占领南京后，想利用屠杀威慑中国民众，用恐怖高压来瓦解中国军民的战斗意志，但正是这一暴行，激起中国人更坚强的抗战决心！悼念惨遭杀害的30多万中国同胞，勿忘历史，我辈自强！
text: [Remember that painful and tragic period! 】During the Battle of Nanjing, 80,000 remnants of the defenders fought fiercely with 300,000 Japanese troops for 10 days. 40% were killed and countless others were injured. After the Japanese army occupied Nanjing, they wanted to use massacre to intimidate the Chinese people and use terror and high pressure to break the will of the Chinese military and civilians to fight. However, it was this atrocity that inspired the Chinese people to become even stronger in their determination to fight! In memory of the more than 300,000 Chinese compatriots who were brutally murdered, we must not forget history and strive for self-improvement!

chinese_text: 【明天起未双向验证乘客不可网络购票】近日打开手机12306客户端，页面跳出提示要求进行手机双向验证，用户需向12306发送短信“999”来进行验证。据铁路部门要求，12月2日前没有完成验证，今后可能就不能网络购票了。错过验证的乘客今后如何网上购票，铁路部门表示目前还在研究中。http://t.cn/RUDAWHr
text: [Passengers without two-way verification will not be able to purchase tickets online from tomorrow] Recently, when I opened the 12306 mobile client, a prompt appeared on the page asking for two-way verification on the mobile phone. Users need to send the text message "999" to 12306 for verification. According to the requirements of the railway department, if verification is not completed before December 2, you may not be able to purchase tickets online in the future. How passengers who missed the verification can purchase tickets online in the future is still under study, the railway department said. http://t.cn/RUDAWHr

chinese_text: 【北上广不相信眼泪，京津冀不相信好肺[拜拜]】大早上，睡醒不觉晓，处处不见鸟。敢出门的都是一副3M罩护体的模样，眼前只见十米路，高楼大厦全不见……[衰]把雾霾玩成段子，也是悲催无奈的事。[doge]今天北京空气质量爆表。戳图↓↓多处标志性建筑均已“发射”，大家一起来填图吧！[偷笑]
text: [Beijing, Shanghai and Guangzhou don’t believe in tears, Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei don’t believe in good lungs [Bye bye]] Early in the morning, I woke up before dawn, and there were no birds everywhere. Those who dare to go out all look like they are wearing 3M protective masks. Only ten meters of road can be seen in front of them, and no high-rise buildings can be seen... [Ba] It is also sad and helpless to make a joke out of the smog. [doge]The air quality in Beijing is off the charts today. Click on the picture ↓↓Many landmark buildings have been "launched", let's fill in the map together! [laughing]

chinese_text: #安全文明出行#【段奕宏：路上坚决不做“低头族”】英国调查发现，开车发短信的司机反应时间比正常情况慢35%，而酒驾反应时间慢21%，毒驾反应慢21%，开车用手机比酒驾毒驾还危险！演员段奕宏号召：从现在做起，在路上坚决不做“低头族”，拒绝危险驾驶！支持的转！http://t.cn/RUgpEcr
text: #SafeCivilizedTravel# [Duan Yihong: Resolutely don’t be a “bowhead” on the road] A British survey found that the reaction time of drivers who text while driving is 35% slower than normal, while the reaction time of drunk driving is 21% slower, and the reaction time of drug driving is 21% slower. Using a mobile phone while driving is more dangerous than driving under the influence of alcohol and drugs! Actor Duan Yihong called on: From now on, we must not be a "bow-head" on the road and refuse dangerous driving! Support transfer! http://t.cn/RUgpEcr

chinese_text: 【评书表演艺术家刘立福去世 转起送送老人】昨天21：20，评书名家刘立福先生因病医治无效在天津去世，终年92岁。刘老先生自幼学书，以陈派《聊斋》见长，在评书界颇有声望。四年前还坚持在书馆演出，神气俱佳。你听过他的评书吗？网友：刘老辞世是曲艺界的损失！老艺术家走好[泪]http://t.cn/RUem3V6
text: [Storytelling performing artist Liu Lifu passed away and sent to the elderly] Yesterday at 21:20, Mr. Liu Lifu, a famous storytelling artist, passed away in Tianjin at the age of 92 due to ineffective treatment. Mr. Liu has been studying calligraphy since he was a child. He is famous for his "Liao Zhai" of Chen School and is quite famous in the world of calligraphy. Four years ago, he still insisted on performing in the library, and he was very impressive. Have you heard of his storytelling? Netizen: Mr. Liu’s death is a loss to the folk art world! Good luck to the old artist [tears] http://t.cn/RUem3V6

chinese_text: 中国网友：我爷爷的有个杯子，1965年的，现在还在用，质量杠杠的，我妈的三峡电风扇已经23年了，现在还在用，我妈结婚时候的温水瓶用了23年了，还没坏，一个洗脚的大红盆，18年了，补过一次是因为上面的东西砸下来，现在还在用，就这么任性！[哈哈]你家有啥特环保的“老物件”吗？
text: Chinese netizen: My grandpa’s cup was from 1965 and is still in use. It is of excellent quality. My mother’s Three Gorges electric fan is 23 years old and is still in use. My mother’s thermos bottle when she got married has been in use for 23 years. It's not broken yet. It's a big red basin for washing feet. It's 18 years old. It was repaired once because something on it fell off. It's still in use now. It's so willful! [Haha] Do you have any environmentally friendly “old objects” in your home?

chinese_text: 【大学生掏16只鸟被判10年半】大学生小闫去年在家乡辉县市的小山村过暑假。7月14日，小闫和朋友发现自家大门外有一个鸟窝，二人掏了一窝小鸟共12只。饲养过程中逃跑一只，死亡一只，后卖掉赚取一千余元。没想到他们掏是国家二级保护动物燕隼。小闫被判刑10年半并处一万元罚款。http://t.cn/RUDyAl7
text: [A college student who bought 16 birds was sentenced to 10 and a half years] Xiao Yan, a college student, spent his summer vacation in a small mountain village in his hometown of Huixian City last year. On July 14, Xiao Yan and his friends found a bird's nest outside their front door, and they dug out a nest of 12 birds. During the breeding process, one escaped and one died. They were later sold to earn more than 1,000 yuan. Unexpectedly, they found a falcon, a national second-level protected animal. Xiao Yan was sentenced to 10 and a half years in prison and fined 10,000 yuan. http://t.cn/RUDyAl7

chinese_text: 【[话筒]12306用户注意！12月3日前需完成手机双向验证】为防止身份信息被抢注，12306要求进行手机双向验证服务：用户要使用注册时预留的手机号，向12306发送短信“999”，根据提示完成信息核验。核验后，可开通手机号码直接登录新服务，解除遗忘用户名的烦恼。没有核验的乘客，仍可正常买票。扩散！
text: [[Microphone]12306 user attention! Two-way mobile phone verification must be completed before December 3] In order to prevent identity information from being registered, 12306 requires a two-way mobile phone verification service: users must use the mobile phone number reserved during registration, send the text message "999" to 12306, and complete the information verification according to the prompts . After verification, you can open a mobile phone number and log in to the new service directly, eliminating the trouble of forgetting your username. Passengers who have not been verified can still buy tickets normally. diffusion!

chinese_text: 【见钱“胃”开：小伙为6000元赌注吞下铁钉】27岁的小龚从西北老家到宁波谋生，生意一直不好。日前，为得到6000块赌注，他竟吞下12厘米长的铁钉跟锯条[lm惊恐]！不料过了十多天，铁条把胃戳破了，命差点都没了。为此，小龚还要花掉一两万的治疗费。天上不会掉馅饼，生财需有道！http://t.cn/RUegR4v
text: [Seeing the money makes me feel sick: A young man swallowed a nail for a 6,000 yuan bet] 27-year-old Xiao Gong came to Ningbo from his hometown in the northwest to make a living, but his business has not been good. Recently, in order to get a 6,000 yuan bet, he actually swallowed a 12 cm long iron nail and saw blade [lm horror]! Unexpectedly, more than ten days later, the iron bar pierced his stomach and he almost died. For this reason, Xiao Gong also spent 10,000 to 20,000 yuan in treatment fees. There will be no pie in the sky, you need to be wise to make money! http://t.cn/RUegR4v

chinese_text: 【住建部：北京雾霾主因是汽车尾气，不是供暖】住建部负责人称，表面看是供暖导致雾霾,但根子还是供暖结构和消费模式不合理。北方绝大部分地区城镇和农村建筑采暖靠燃煤,且存在大量低质煤。城市大院、农村民宅使用的独立小锅炉较多,污染物的排放就比较大。而北京雾霾的主要原因是汽车尾气,不是供暖。
text: [Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development: The main cause of smog in Beijing is car exhaust, not heating] The person in charge of the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development said that on the surface it seems that heating is causing the smog, but the root cause is that the heating structure and consumption patterns are unreasonable. Most urban and rural buildings in the north rely on coal for heating, and there is a large amount of low-quality coal. There are many independent small boilers used in urban compounds and rural houses, and the emission of pollutants is relatively large. The main cause of Beijing's smog is car exhaust, not heating.

chinese_text: 【北京气象局:冷空气已到内蒙古 雾霾今夜将散去】当前北京正遭遇今年以来最严重的污染过程。据北京市气象局官方微博通报，今天下午北京雾霾持续，冷空气已到内蒙中部，今夜北风渐起，北京雾霾将逐渐散去。明后两天(2—3日)，将会刮起5、6级偏北风，天气转晴，北京将再现蓝天。http://t.cn/RUDU53l
text: [Beijing Meteorological Bureau: Cold air has arrived in Inner Mongolia and the smog will disperse tonight] Beijing is currently experiencing the most serious pollution process this year. According to the official Weibo report of the Beijing Meteorological Bureau, the haze in Beijing continues this afternoon, and the cold air has reached central Inner Mongolia. The northerly wind will gradually pick up tonight, and the haze in Beijing will gradually dissipate. Tomorrow and the next two days (2nd-3rd), northerly winds of level 5 and 6 will blow, the weather will clear up, and blue skies will reappear in Beijing. http://t.cn/RUDU53l

chinese_text: →_→//@山城改: 今早上雾霾中摸索出门，朦胧中看到路旁一老者，独坐桌旁，肩披白褂，看似半仙，桌上摆一小圆筒，里面都是签，我拿起圆筒晃半天，抽出一支说：这位道长，人生如雾，何处是路？给解一卦吧！老头说：要吃油条你就坐，不吃你就滚犊子，没事瞎晃我筷子筒干啥！
text: →_→//@山城凯: This morning when I was groping out in the haze, I saw an old man on the side of the road, sitting alone at a table with a white coat draped over his shoulders. He looked like a semi-immortal. There was a small cylinder on the table. They were all signs. I picked up the cylinder and shook it for a long time, took out one and said: This Taoist priest, life is like a fog, where is the road? Let me explain it! The old man said: If you want to eat fried dough sticks, you sit down. If you don't want to eat, you go away. Why are you waving my chopsticks around when you have nothing to do?

chinese_text: 【长兄如父 11岁哥哥背6岁脑瘫妹妹上学[心]】拿过书包挎好，蹲下身将妹妹轻轻背起，奔波上路…河南商丘11岁的男孩李渊，背着患脑瘫的妹妹上下学，已坚持两个月。爸妈打工，爷奶年迈，他稚嫩的肩膀担负着妹妹的渴望。网友：他也只是个孩子，太难得了！你会为“商丘好哥哥”点赞吗？http://t.cn/RUemdIY
text: [The eldest brother is like his father. The 11-year-old brother carries his 6-year-old sister with cerebral palsy to school [Heart]] He took his schoolbag and put it on his shoulder. He squatted down and gently picked up his sister, and rushed on the road... Li Yuan, an 11-year-old boy in Shangqiu, Henan, carried his sister with cerebral palsy on his back. I have been going to and from school for two months. His parents are working, his grandparents are old, and his young shoulders bear the longings of his younger sister. Netizen: He is just a child, so rare! Will you like "Shangqiu Good Brother"? http://t.cn/RUemdIY

chinese_text: 【[推荐]这首英文诗，用汉语翻译了5个版本，好多人叹服！】在这个人人学外语的时代，很多人似乎都没机会感受我们的汉语有多美多强大！这里有一段英文的诗歌，有人用中文翻译了一下，结果很多人都惊呆了！普通版、文艺版、诗经版、离骚版......戳图欣赏↓你喜欢吗？转起分享！via.人民日报
text: [[Recommended] This English poem has been translated into 5 Chinese versions, and many people are amazed! 】In this era when everyone is learning foreign languages, many people seem to have no chance to feel how beautiful and powerful our Chinese language is! Here is an English poem that someone translated into Chinese. Many people were shocked! Regular edition, literary edition, Book of Songs edition, Li Sao edition... Click on the picture to enjoy ↓ Do you like it? Turn to share! via.People's Daily

chinese_text: 【大家挺住！风已经在路上了！[bm缤纷]】天气预报显示，冷空气前锋上午已经抵达内蒙古中部，风速为30至40公里每小时，预计晚10点能到张家口，明天凌晨2点赶到延庆，凌晨4点就能帮城区“透气儿”了。辛苦风了！转发，等风来！[微风][风][龙卷风][台风]
text: 【Everyone, hold on! The wind is already on its way! [bm colorful]】The weather forecast shows that the cold air front has arrived in central Inner Mongolia in the morning, with wind speeds of 30 to 40 kilometers per hour. It is expected to reach Zhangjiakou at 10 pm, Yanqing at 2 am tomorrow, and urban areas at 4 am "Breathable". Thank you for your hard work! Forward it and wait for the wind to come! [Breeze][Wind][Tornado][Typhoon]

chinese_text: 【芭比娃娃很可爱？当心她正在"偷听"[吃惊]】芭比娃娃诞生以来广受青睐，且不断出新。今年，制造商推出一款可互动式芭比娃娃，内置麦克风，可连网络，录制的语音通过服务器可做出回话。儿童保护组织：在不知情下，若家中一个玩具可随时记录孩子与家庭隐私，谁能保证内容不被曝光？http://t.cn/RUDbumG
text: [Barbie doll is cute? Beware she's "eavesdropping" [Surprise]] Barbie has been widely popular since its birth, and new ones are constantly being released. This year, the manufacturer launched an interactive Barbie doll with a built-in microphone that can be connected to the Internet. The recorded voice can be answered through a server. Child Protection Organization: If a toy in the home can record the privacy of children and families at any time without their knowledge, who can guarantee that the content will not be exposed? http://t.cn/RUDbumG

chinese_text: 【送别好医生！3台手术后突发心梗，42岁的他倒在手术台[蜡烛]】昨天，山东泰山医学院附属医院医生蔡国栋有4台手术，做完第3台感到胸口不适，心电监护提示左室主干阻塞，大面积心肌梗死、室颤。抢救两个小时后，他还是走了，仅42岁，走的时候铅衣都没来得及脱……转发，送送蔡医生！@齐鲁晚报-今日泰山
text: 【Farewell to the good doctor! A 42-year-old man collapsed on the operating table after suffering a myocardial infarction after three surgeries [Candle] Yesterday, Cai Guodong, a doctor from the Affiliated Hospital of Shandong Taishan Medical College, had four surgeries. After the third surgery, he felt chest discomfort, and the ECG monitoring prompt left Ventricular trunk obstruction, large area myocardial infarction, ventricular fibrillation. After two hours of resuscitation, he still passed away. He was only 42 years old, and he didn't even have time to take off his lead clothes when he left... Forward, send Dr. Cai! @Qilu Evening News-Today’s Taishan

chinese_text: 【国内油价迎来年内12降 加满一箱油省6元】发改委宣布2日0时起将下调国内汽柴油价，汽油每吨下调145元，柴油每吨下调140元。全国平均折合90号汽油每升下调0.11元，0号柴油每升下调0.12元，92号每升降0.11元，95号汽油每升降0.12元。国内油价迎来"三连跌"，也是年内第12次下调。http://t.cn/RUDGQB9
text: [Domestic oil prices will drop for the 12th time this year. Filling up a tank of oil will save you 6 yuan] The National Development and Reform Commission announced that it will lower domestic gasoline and diesel prices from 0:00 on the 2nd. Gasoline will be reduced by 145 yuan per ton, and diesel will be reduced by 140 yuan per ton. The national average price of No. 90 gasoline is reduced by 0.11 yuan per liter, No. 0 diesel is reduced by 0.12 yuan per liter, No. 92 gasoline is reduced by 0.11 yuan per liter, and No. 95 gasoline is reduced by 0.12 yuan per liter. Domestic oil prices have experienced a "three consecutive declines", marking the 12th drop this year. http://t.cn/RUDGQB9

chinese_text: 【雾霾天行车九大原则，你必须知道的！[话筒]】在雾霾天行车，会给我们的驾车出行带来非常大的安全威胁。因此，掌握好雾天安全驾驶的原则是非常有必要的。①雾天开车切勿使用远光灯！②不要猛踩刹车！③不要盲目超车注意路面行人......雾霾天行车应牢记九大安全原则↓↓转给你的家人和朋友！[心]
text: [Nine principles for driving in hazy weather, you must know! [Microphone]】Driving in haze will bring a very big safety threat to our driving. Therefore, it is very necessary to master the principles of safe driving in foggy days. ①Do not use high beam when driving in foggy weather! ②Don’t slam on the brakes! ③Don’t blindly overtake and pay attention to pedestrians on the road... You should keep the nine safety principles in mind when driving in haze days↓↓Forward to your family and friends! [Heart]

chinese_text: 【[话筒]还有两天，购火车票先去12306双向核验！】据12306公告，用户需在12月3日前核验手机号，否则可能影响购票。①登陆12306网站或APP②点击"我的12306"中"手机核验"③通过短信发送999至12306④在12306输入收到的验证码。转发扩散！快核验，别耽误春节回家！附#2016年春运购票日历#↓(央视记者马力)
text: [[Microphone] There are two days left. When purchasing train tickets, go to 12306 for two-way verification first! 】According to the 12306 announcement, users need to verify their mobile phone number before December 3, otherwise it may affect ticket purchase. ① Log in to the 12306 website or APP ② Click "Mobile Verification" in "My 12306" ③ Send 999 to 12306 via text message ④ Enter the verification code received in 12306. Repost and spread! Check it quickly and don’t delay your return home during the Spring Festival! Attached is #2016 Spring Festival Ticket Purchase Calendar#↓(CCTV reporter Ma Li)

chinese_text: 【出门谨记“短平快” 进屋洗脸、漱口、清鼻腔！】无需多言，在雾霾天气减少户外活动的时间是非常必要的。所谓“短平快”即：短暂停留、平和呼吸、小步快走；在室外逗留后，皮肤接触有害颗粒物最多的地方就是脸手和鼻腔了，所以进屋以后，洗脸、漱口、清理鼻腔是必须做的！
text: [Remember to be quick when going out. When you go home, wash your face, rinse your mouth, and clear your nasal cavity! 】Needless to say, it is very necessary to reduce the time for outdoor activities in haze weather. The so-called "short-term and fast" means: staying briefly, breathing calmly, and walking quickly; after staying outdoors, the places where the skin is most exposed to harmful particles are the face, hands and nasal cavity, so after entering the house, washing the face, gargling, and cleaning the nasal cavity are must of!

chinese_text: 【同性恋少年染艾滋病 烧红剪刀在家自行手术】少年15岁时就与多名男子发生了性关系，16岁身体出现状况，17岁被确诊为艾滋病。19岁时，他感到肛肠发炎，又无钱治病，于是买了一瓶碘酒，然后将剪刀烧红，把有炎症的组织剪下来，随后拿棉球止血，为自己做了个手术。http://t.cn/RUD5O7Q
text: [A gay teenager infected with AIDS performed surgery at home using red-hot scissors] The teenager had sex with multiple men when he was 15 years old. He developed physical problems when he was 16 years old and was diagnosed with AIDS at 17 years old. When he was 19 years old, he felt inflammation of the anorectum and had no money for treatment, so he bought a bottle of iodine, heated the scissors red, and cut out the inflamed tissue. He then used cotton balls to stop the bleeding and performed an operation on himself. http://t.cn/RUD5O7Q

chinese_text: 【12月上演四大天象 一起看华丽流星雨[流星]】12月的夜空并没有因寒冬而显得冷清，凤凰座流星雨、双子座流星雨、小熊座流星雨和水星东大距等四大天象将陆续上演。其中北半球三大流星雨之一的双子座流星雨将在15日迎来极大：流星速度较慢、亮流星多，适合观测。想和谁看，@ TA！[心] via.央视新闻
text: [Four major celestial phenomena will be staged in December to watch the gorgeous meteor shower [shooting stars]] The night sky in December will not appear deserted due to the cold winter. Four major celestial phenomena, including the Phoenicid meteor shower, the Geminid meteor shower, the Ursid meteor shower and the eastern elongation of Mercury, will be staged one after another. Among them, the Geminid meteor shower, one of the three major meteor showers in the northern hemisphere, will have its peak on the 15th: the meteor speed is slow and there are many bright meteors, making it suitable for observation. Who do you want to watch it with, @TA! [Heart] via.CCTV News

chinese_text: 【2016年贺岁银币将发行:面额3元 被炒到500元】中国人民银行定于2015年12月15日发行2016年贺岁银质纪念币1枚。该枚银质纪念币为法定货币，正面图案为中华人民共和国国徽，背面为“福”字造型。总体呈圆形，含纯银8克，直径25毫米，面额3元，成色99.9%，最大发行量190万枚。http://t.cn/RUDtc3Q
text: [The 2016 Lunar New Year Silver Coin will be issued: the face value of 3 yuan has been raised to 500 yuan] The People's Bank of China is scheduled to issue one 2016 Lunar New Year silver commemorative coin on December 15, 2015. This silver commemorative coin is legal tender, with the national emblem of the People's Republic of China on the front and the character "福" on the back. It is generally round in shape, contains 8 grams of pure silver, has a diameter of 25 mm, a denomination of 3 yuan, a fineness of 99.9%, and a maximum circulation of 1.9 million pieces. http://t.cn/RUDtc3Q

chinese_text: 【狗贩用"美狗计"害狗近千条 卖给饭馆[怒]】日前在河南，两狗贩用母狗作诱饵，诱群狗上钩，随后用剧毒和高压电将其致死后卖到饭馆。一次作案时被民警发现，逃跑中两人弃车脱身。民警调查发现两人踪迹，随后抓捕归案。经审讯，两人流窜作案多起，偷狗达900多条。目前此案仍在审理。http://t.cn/RUDtCRn
text: [Dog dealers used a "beautiful dog trick" to kill nearly a thousand dogs and sell them to restaurants [angry]] Recently in Henan, two dog dealers used female dogs as bait to lure a group of dogs to the bait, and then used highly toxic and high-voltage electricity to kill them. Sold to restaurants. Once when they were committing a crime, they were discovered by the police. During the escape, the two people abandoned the car and escaped. The police investigation found traces of the two men and subsequently arrested them. After interrogation, it was found that the two men committed many crimes and stole more than 900 dogs. The case is still pending. http://t.cn/RUDtCRn

chinese_text: 【原来是这样！12月3日不是截止日期，第一次购票三天内完成核验即可】今天12306提示：请在12月3日前核验。铁路部门回应，12月3日并不是截止日期，而自第一次购票当天起3天内，旅客在方便时间核验手机即可。同时在这3天中未核验仍可购票。3天后购票须通过手机核验。扩散！
text: 【So that's it! December 3rd is not the deadline, just complete the verification within three days of your first ticket purchase] Today’s 12306 reminder: Please verify before December 3rd. The railway department responded that December 3 is not the deadline, but within 3 days from the day of first ticket purchase, passengers can check their mobile phones at a convenient time. At the same time, tickets can still be purchased without verification during these three days. Ticket purchases after 3 days must be verified via mobile phone. diffusion!

chinese_text: 【男子嗜酒如命 求母亲将其锁住】30岁的张瑞嗜酒如命，平时温柔的他一旦喝酒之后，变得异常暴躁、辱骂打人。如今的张瑞赶跑了媳妇、吓走了孩子，原本完整的家庭支离破碎。每次酒醒以后他懊悔不已，求母亲用用4米长、重达20多斤的铁链锁住自己，以防酒瘾上来挣脱。http://t.cn/RUDc4XX
text: [Man addicted to alcohol asks his mother to lock him up] 30-year-old Zhang Rui is addicted to alcohol. Once he drinks, he becomes extremely irritable, insults and hits others. Now Zhang Rui has driven away his wife and scared away his children, and the originally complete family is in pieces. Every time he sobered up, he regretted it so much that he begged his mother to lock him with a 4-meter-long iron chain weighing more than 20 kilograms to prevent him from breaking free due to alcohol addiction. http://t.cn/RUDc4XX

chinese_text: #映像#【“被发射了”的北京著名建筑[笑cry]】浓浓雾霾，北京这些地标都消失了…via.头条新闻 小编想起一句歌词，他们都老了吧，他们在哪里呀……[doge]看了这些图，你想唱起哪首歌？
text: #image# [The famous buildings in Beijing that were "launched" [laughing cry]] In the thick smog, these landmarks in Beijing have disappeared... via. The editor of the headline news remembered a lyric, they are all old, where are they? …[doge]After seeing these pictures, which song do you want to sing?

chinese_text: 【12月1日新闻联播抢先看】①看头条：习近平出席气候变化巴黎大会开幕式,他用5分钟向世界表达了什么？②看防疫：李克强作出重要批示,要求抓紧制定遏制与防治艾滋病"十三五"行动计划,将我国艾滋病疫情持续控制在低流行水平；③看亮点：#人民币入SDR#,意味着什么？将改变什么？今晚联播要延长,一定要看!
text: [News Network Preview on December 1st] ①Look at the headlines: Xi Jinping attended the opening ceremony of the Paris Climate Change Conference. What did he express to the world in 5 minutes? ②Look at epidemic prevention: Li Keqiang made important instructions, calling for the urgent formulation of the "Thirteenth Five-Year Plan" action plan to contain and prevent AIDS, so as to continue to control the AIDS epidemic in my country at a low epidemic level; ③Look at the highlights: What does #RMB into SDR# mean? What will change? Tonight’s simulcast will be extended, be sure to watch it!

chinese_text: 【西安同志少年染艾滋 烧红剪刀给自己手术[吃惊]】19岁少年林波(化名)15岁与男子发生性关系，17岁被确诊为艾滋病。半个月前他肛肠发炎，因为没钱治病，没有医疗常识的他就着碘酒，将剪刀烧红，把有炎症组织剪了下来…“顿时血就乱喷。”当地防艾志愿者得知后，联系到了林波，并将他送往医院接受治疗。
text: [A gay boy in Xi'an contracted AIDS and used red-hot scissors to operate on himself [surprise]] Lin Bo (pseudonym), a 19-year-old boy, had sex with a man at the age of 15 and was diagnosed with AIDS at the age of 17. He had an anorectal inflammation half a month ago. Since he had no money for treatment and no medical knowledge, he used iodine, heated the scissors red, and cut out the inflamed tissue... "Blood immediately spurted out." Local AIDS prevention volunteer After learning about it, Lin Bo was contacted and sent to the hospital for treatment.

chinese_text: 【关于12306的手机双向验证，权威解释来了！】12306今天提示，请在12月3日前完成双向验证。@中国铁路 官方就此发权威解释：12月3日并不是截止日期，自第一次购票当天起3天内，旅客在方便时间内随时可核验手机。同时在这3天中未核验仍可购票，3天后购票须通过手机核验。
text: [About 12306’s two-way mobile phone verification, the authoritative explanation is here! 】12306 prompts today, please complete two-way verification before December 3. @中国 Railways issued an authoritative explanation on this: December 3 is not the deadline. Within 3 days from the day of first ticket purchase, passengers can verify their mobile phones at any time at their convenience. At the same time, tickets can still be purchased without verification during these 3 days. Tickets purchased after 3 days must be verified through mobile phones.
[decline][decline][decline]

chinese_text: 【超赞！2015年度电影混剪！[心]】又是一年要结束了，各路剪辑大神也将陆续推出自己的年度电影混剪。今年最先到来的这款超级棒的混剪，来自Ben Auk，6分多钟混剪了164部影片，汇集了今年那些难忘、鲜活的电影瞬间！一起来回顾下（迷影心声）http://t.cn/RUehUIo
text: 【Awesome! 2015 film mix editing! [Heart]] Another year is coming to an end, and editing masters from all walks of life will also launch their own annual film mix-edits. The first to arrive this year is this super awesome mix-editer from Ben Auk. It mixes 164 films in just over 6 minutes, bringing together some of this year’s unforgettable and vivid movie moments! Let’s review it together (voice of fans) http://t.cn/RUehUIo

chinese_text: 【小伙伴们坚持住！冷空气就要来了[风]】气象监测，今天中午11时冷空气已率先抵达内蒙古及山西一带，能见度已明显好转。预计23时后影响北京，雾霾将逐渐消散。中央气象台已发布暴雪黄色预警，预计东北局地将有大到暴雪。此外冷空气还将给中东部地区带来降温。(央视记者任梅梅)
text: [Hold on, friends! Cold air is coming [wind]] Meteorological monitoring showed that at 11 noon today, the cold air has arrived in Inner Mongolia and Shanxi first, and the visibility has improved significantly. It is expected to affect Beijing after 23:00, and the haze will gradually dissipate. The Central Meteorological Observatory has issued a yellow warning for heavy snowfall, and heavy snowfall is expected in the Northeast. In addition, the cold air will also bring cooling to the central and eastern regions. (CCTV reporter Ren Meimei)

chinese_text: 【[话筒]签三方协议，你要注意的那些事儿】海投、笔试、面试之后，一个绕不开的环节是签“三方协议”，它往往意味着毕业生第一份工作的基本确定，因此要慎之又慎。三方协议与劳动合同有什么不同？签三方前你应该注意哪些细节？可能存在哪些陷阱？戳图了解↓↓事关前途，可不能马虎大意！via.人民日报
text: [[Microphone] Things you should pay attention to when signing a tripartite agreement] After the overseas investment, written examination, and interview, an unavoidable link is signing the "tripartite agreement", which often means that the first job of graduates is basically confirmed. , so be careful. What is the difference between a tripartite agreement and an employment contract? What details should you pay attention to before signing a third-party contract? What are the possible pitfalls? Click on the picture to learn more↓↓It’s about your future, so don’t be careless! via.People's Daily

chinese_text: #习主席出访津巴布韦#【津巴布韦总统和夫人到机场迎接】当地时间1日上午10时15分许，习近平抵达非洲“花树之都”哈拉雷，开始对津巴布韦进行国事访问。穆加贝总统和夫人、两位副总统到机场迎接习主席夫妇。当地少年儿童献上花环花束，热情民众载歌载舞，欢迎远方贵客。(央视记者王宇波)
text: #President Xi Visits Zimbabwe# [The President of Zimbabwe and his wife greeted him at the airport] At about 10:15 a.m. local time on the 1st, Xi Jinping arrived in Harare, the "City of Flowers and Trees" in Africa, and began his state visit to Zimbabwe. President Mugabe, his wife, and the two vice presidents went to the airport to greet President Xi and his wife. Local children presented garlands and bouquets, and enthusiastic people sang and danced to welcome guests from afar. (CCTV reporter Wang Yubo)

chinese_text: 等风来~
text: Wait for the wind to come~

chinese_text: 【内地游客在港买2支眼药水被刷5万港元[衰]】内地旅客张女士11月29日，在旺角龙兴中西药坊购买2支双飞人药水。当时店员称，每瓶30元港币共60。但张女士离开后发现信用卡收据银码为5万港元，返回该店理论无果后报警。海关已带走1名药房店铺负责人和2名职员。有香港媒体称，该店铺经营手法多次遭人投诉。
text: [Mainland tourists were charged HK$50,000 for buying two eye drops in Hong Kong [bad]] On November 29, Ms. Zhang, a mainland tourist, bought two Shuangfeiren eye drops at Lung Hing Chinese and Western Pharmacy in Mong Kok. At that time, the clerk said that each bottle cost 30 Hong Kong dollars, a total of 60. However, after Ms. Zhang left, she found that the credit card receipt code was HK$50,000. She returned to the store to argue with no results and called the police. Customs has taken away one pharmacy store manager and two employees. Some Hong Kong media said that the store's business practices have been complained about many times.

However, these black technologies have actually been around for a long time. It’s not science fiction anymore→_→ http://t.cn/RUB6bCm #How not to die on Mars# http://t.cn/RUDMkIi

chinese_text: 【英媒发布北京雾霾晴天对比照:反差巨大】英国《卫报》12月8日发布了一组北京被雾霾笼罩时和天色晴朗时的对比照片，反差巨大。（国际在线）
text: [British media released comparison photos of Beijing on a sunny day with smog: the contrast is huge] On December 8, the British "Guardian" released a set of photos comparing Beijing when it was shrouded in smog and when the sky was clear. The contrast was huge. (International Online)

chinese_text: 【成都人贩当街抢娃被群众围殴】12月6日晚9点30，在成都高新中和街道楠香山小区门口，一名中年男子将一玩耍的女童抱走。正抱上同伙的车时，被群众发现，当场逮住一人贩，后将其揍得面目全非。目前，该嫌犯已被警方控制。http://t.cn/R4hh83K
text: [Chengdu human traffickers snatched babies on the street and were beaten by the crowd] At 9:30 pm on December 6, at the gate of Nanxiangshan Community in Zhonghe Street, Chengdu, a middle-aged man took away a girl who was playing. When he was getting into his accomplice's car, he was discovered by the crowd. He caught a trafficker on the spot and beat him beyond recognition. The suspect is currently under police control. http://t.cn/R4hh83K

chinese_text: 【父亲故意灌醉女儿，她隔天看到信却忍不住哭了…】“下次再一起去玩吧。昨晚你记得喝了多少酒而醉倒吗？一共是两杯啤酒跟五杯角HIGH，这就是你的极限，世界上有很多坏人，我没办法永远在身边保护你，所以才让你知道你的极限，学会自己保护自己，我相信你一定能做到。”这样的老爸太酷了[酷]
text: [The father deliberately got his daughter drunk, but she couldn't help but cry when she saw the letter the next day...] "Let's go play together next time. Do you remember how much you drank last night and got drunk? It was two glasses of beer and five glasses of wine in total. Cup Corner HIGH, this is your limit. There are many bad people in the world. I can't always be around to protect you, so I let you know your limits and learn to protect yourself. I believe you can do it." Dad is so cool [cool]

chinese_text: 【乌克兰美女帮农民工上网抢火车票[爱你]】一位成都的乌克兰美女偶然得知小区周围工地上干活的农民工因不会用网络，每年都买不到回家的火车票，就向中国朋友请教学会了用抢票软件在网上买火车票，并热心帮农民工抢春节回家的火车票，被大家称为 " 成都最美老外 "。网友：好想去美女小区的工地上搬砖。
text: [Ukrainian beauty helps migrant workers get train tickets online [Love You]] A Ukrainian beauty in Chengdu accidentally learned that migrant workers working on construction sites around the community could not buy train tickets home every year because they did not know how to use the Internet. I asked my Chinese friends for advice and learned how to use ticket grabbing software to buy train tickets online, and enthusiastically helped migrant workers get train tickets to go home during the Spring Festival. I was called "the most beautiful foreigner in Chengdu" by everyone. Netizen: I really want to move bricks on the construction site of the beauty community.

chinese_text: #时局#【体育总局：中央领导经常对足球有指示要求】国家体育总局副局长今天说，在中国大量繁重改革任务的情况下，专门为足球改革出台了文件，可见从领导层到老百姓对足球的重视程度。现在教育部正做一个庞大计划，在学校开展足球运动，还请来外边的教练培训体育教师。详见：http://t.cn/R4PdmCg
text: #时时# [General Administration of Sports: Central leaders often have instructions and requirements for football] The deputy director of the State Sports General Administration said today that under the circumstances of a large number of arduous reform tasks in China, a document was issued specifically for football reform, which shows that from the leadership to the common people, the The importance of football. Now the Ministry of Education is making a huge plan to launch football sports in schools, and also invites external coaches to train physical education teachers. For details, see: http://t.cn/R4PdmCg

chinese_text: #突发#【韩军向中国渔船射击称其侵犯领海】据韩联社消息，韩国海军今日下午2时46分许，向越过半岛西部海域北方界线(NLL)的中国渔船进行了示警射击。报道称遭射击的中国渔船是渔政船。http://t.cn/R4h2FCs
text: #break# [South Korean military fired at a Chinese fishing boat claiming it violated territorial waters] According to Yonhap News Agency, the South Korean Navy fired warning shots at a Chinese fishing boat that crossed the Northern Limit Line (NLL) in the western waters of the peninsula at around 2:46 pm today. Reports stated that the Chinese fishing boat that was shot at was a fishery administration vessel. http://t.cn/R4h2FCs

chinese_text: #看了就“知道”#【为什么身边得癌症的人越来越多？】在20世纪前，几乎没有一本专门谈论癌症的书，也没有任何一个民族的神灵，与癌症有关。而在2012年，全球共有820万人因癌症死亡，平均每8个死亡病例中就有1人死于癌症。专家建议，应在40岁开始针对肿瘤的健康体检。http://t.cn/R4PB54x
text: #看就是“know”# [Why are there more and more people around us suffering from cancer? 】Before the 20th century, there was almost no book specifically talking about cancer, and there were no national gods related to cancer. In 2012, a total of 8.2 million people died of cancer worldwide, and on average, 1 in every 8 deaths was caused by cancer. Experts recommend that cancer-specific physical examinations should be started at the age of 40. http://t.cn/R4PB54x

chinese_text: #来论#【小王子的领悟】在《小王子》中，小王子终于明白人世间真正值得珍惜的，并不在于所爱对象在客观上是否独一无二，而在于自己能否全心全意投入一段彼此驯服的关系。活着的价值，不赖于外在偶然的世界，而在于作为能爱的主体，能否用心浇灌爱护属于自己生命中的那朵玫瑰。http://t.cn/RUsVEbd
text: #来伦# [The Little Prince’s Enlightenment] In "The Little Prince", the little prince finally understands that what is truly worth cherishing in the world does not lie in whether the object of love is objectively unique, but in whether he can devote himself wholeheartedly to a relationship that tames each other. Relationship. The value of life does not depend on the external accidental world, but on whether as a loving subject, you can water and care for the rose that belongs to your life with your heart. http://t.cn/RUsVEbd

chinese_text: 【高校班长发起床红包】每天早上6点20，武昌工学院某群便炸开了锅，原来是班长在发红包叫同学起床。学校规定，新生每早6点40必须出操。天气变冷后，总有一部分学生赖床，于是班长王帅和王云鹏用在班级群发红包的方式叫学生起床。http://t.cn/R4hGHcG
text: [College monitor initiates bed red envelope] Every morning at 6:20, a certain group at Wuchang Institute of Technology explodes. It turns out that the monitor is handing out red envelopes to wake up classmates. The school stipulates that new students must go to exercise at 6:40 every morning. When the weather gets cold, some students always stay in bed, so class monitors Wang Shuai and Wang Yunpeng wake them up by sending red envelopes to the class. http://t.cn/R4hGHcG
[Sweat]

chinese_text: 【山西高速33辆车相撞 6人死亡】今天上午，二广高速山西襄垣县段因大雾发生多起多车相撞事故，共涉及33辆车，造成6人死亡，4人受伤。目前，伤者已经送入医院，伤情稳定，事故路段清理工作已经完成。大雾天气，请司机小心驾驶。（央视记者韩逾昊 康晓宇）
text: [33 vehicles collided on Shanxi Expressway, 6 killed] This morning, multiple multi-vehicle collisions occurred due to heavy fog in the Xiangyuan County section of Shanxi's Erguang Expressway, involving a total of 33 vehicles, resulting in 6 deaths and 4 injuries. At present, the injured have been sent to the hospital and are in stable condition. The cleanup of the accident section has been completed. Drivers are advised to drive carefully in foggy weather. (CCTV reporter Han Yuhao and Kang Xiaoyu)

chinese_text: #万象#【北京雾霾长这样】新一轮空气重污染来袭，国外媒体发布了北京雾霾和晴天的对比图。详见：http://t.cn/R4hhZPg
text: #万搏# [Beijing’s smog looks like this] A new round of heavy air pollution is coming, and foreign media released a comparison chart of Beijing’s smog and sunny days. For details, see: http://t.cn/R4hhZPg

chinese_text: 【国家网信办主任鲁炜回应某些网站被屏蔽】"我没有办法改变你，但我有权利选择朋友，我们确实不欢迎那些挣中国钱、占中国市场，还污蔑中国的人，就像每个家庭都不欢迎不友好的人到家里做客一样。我们对全世界互联网企业开放，只要你不伤害中国的国家利益、消费者利益，我们欢迎到中国发展。"
text: [Lu Wei, Director of the Cyberspace Administration of China, responded to the blocking of certain websites] "I can't change you, but I have the right to choose friends. We do not welcome those who make Chinese money, occupy the Chinese market, and slander China, just like No family welcomes unfriendly people as guests. We are open to Internet companies from all over the world. As long as you do not harm China's national interests and consumer interests, we welcome you to develop in China."

chinese_text: 【买口罩的亲注意！海关查获12万只假3M口罩】上海海关8日称，近期连续查获两批出口境外的假冒“3M”品牌N95型口罩，近12万只。经3M公司鉴定，两批假口罩不仅工艺粗糙且采用劣质滤材，过滤性能均未达标，佩戴后不仅不能起到保护作用，还会对健康产生危害。[话筒]要从正规渠道购买口罩！戳图学辨真假！
text: [Attention those who buy masks! Customs seized 120,000 fake 3M masks] Shanghai Customs said on the 8th that it had recently seized two batches of counterfeit "3M" brand N95 masks exported overseas, totaling nearly 120,000 pieces. After identification by 3M Company, the two batches of fake masks not only have rough workmanship and use inferior filter materials, but the filtration performance does not meet the standard. Not only do they not provide protection after wearing, they will also cause harm to health. [Microphone] Buy masks from regular channels! Click on the picture to learn whether it is true or false!

chinese_text: 【[话筒]紧急寻人！浙江3岁女孩疑似被拐】郁紫瑶，3岁，1.05米左右，于12月8日晚19-20时许，在浙江乐清市翁垟街道翁盐村警务室附近被一女子带走。孩子失踪时穿红色黑点羽绒服，黑色抓绒裤子，黑鞋。家人四寻无果，有线索请联系翁垟派出所0577-62811754。多次转发，多点希望！@宝贝回家-中原
text: [[Microphone] Urgent search! Zhejiang 3-year-old girl suspected of being abducted] Yu Ziyao, 3 years old, about 1.05 meters tall, was taken away by a woman near the police station of Wengyan Village, Wengchang Street, Yueqing City, Zhejiang Province at about 19-20 pm on December 8. The child was wearing a red down jacket with black spots, black fleece pants and black shoes when he disappeared. Family members have searched to no avail. If you have any clues, please contact Wengyang Police Station at 0577-62811754. Reposted many times, more hope! @ Baby Come Home-Zhongyuan

chinese_text: #来论#【高铁新城莫蹈鬼城覆辙】许多人认为，高铁能拉动当地的经济发展：高铁通到哪里，工厂就开到哪里。但事实并非如此。一项研究发现：在1997-2006年间，其他条件不变的情况下，被纳入高速公路网的边缘城市，相比于其他边缘城市，其经济增长率平均要低18个百分点。http://t.cn/RUsFqKh
text: #来伦# [High-speed rail new cities should not make the mistakes of ghost towns] Many people believe that high-speed rail can stimulate local economic development: wherever the high-speed rail goes, factories will open there. but it is not the truth. A study found that between 1997 and 2006, with other conditions remaining unchanged, the economic growth rate of edge cities included in the highway network was 18 percentage points lower on average than other edge cities. http://t.cn/RUsFqKh

chinese_text: 【10岁的他走了，捐献器官救5人[泪]】11月28日，安徽临泉10岁男孩陈硕外出遇车祸被确诊脑死亡，其父母决定捐献孩子器官捐献，让更多的人获得新生，让孩子生命延续！目前，孩子的肝脏、肾脏已移植给3人，眼角膜使2人重见光明。但肇事司机逃逸，至今仍未露面…http://t.cn/R4hnnl0 转发送送小天使！
text: [He passed away at the age of 10 and donated his organs to save 5 people [tears]] On November 28, 10-year-old Chen Shuo, a 10-year-old boy from Linquan, Anhui, was diagnosed with brain death in a car accident. His parents decided to donate their children’s organs to help more people Get a new life and let your child's life continue! Currently, the child's liver and kidneys have been transplanted to three people, and his corneas have restored sight to two people. But the driver who caused the accident escaped and has not yet appeared... http://t.cn/R4hnnl0 Forward and send the little angel!

chinese_text: #正能量#【资助孩子的900元一分没少过】李佳霖说，大学二年级是他经济最紧张的时候，当时参加辩论队，“为比赛买了西装，直接就没啥钱了。”那个月他每顿基本就吃6毛钱豆芽加6毛钱米饭，实在吃腻了就点1元钱青菜，一个月只花了250元，但资助孩子的900元一分没少[赞]
text: #正energy# [The 900 yuan spent to support children has never been less] Li Jialin said that his second year of college was when he was most financially stressed. At that time, he joined the debate team and "bought a suit for the competition, and he immediately ran out of money." That month, he basically ate 6 cents of bean sprouts and 6 cents of rice for every meal. When he got tired of eating, he would order vegetables for 1 yuan. He only spent 250 yuan a month, but he still spent a cent of the 900 yuan to support his children [Like]

chinese_text: 【广东一酒楼采购员收购40条野生大壁虎获刑10年】广东高要某酒楼被举报购买并准备出售国家二级保护陆生野生动物——大壁虎，俗名蛤蚧。以每条28元、共1120元的价钱购买了40条蛤蚧，并计划以每条38元出售给客人食用。该酒楼采购员邓某、伍某被判处有期徒刑10年3个月至5年3个月不等，并各处罚金5000元。
text: [A Guangdong restaurant buyer who purchased 40 wild giant geckos was sentenced to 10 years in prison] A restaurant in Gaoyao, Guangdong was reported to have purchased and prepared to sell the national second-level protected terrestrial wild animal - giant geckos, commonly known as geckos. He purchased 40 geckos at a price of 28 yuan each, for a total of 1,120 yuan, and planned to sell them to guests for 38 yuan each. The restaurant buyers Deng and Wu were sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment ranging from 10 years and 3 months to 5 years and 3 months, and were each fined 5,000 yuan.

chinese_text: #知政#【中韩、中澳自贸协定本月20日生效并首次降税】今天，中韩、中澳自贸协定确认12月20日生效，并第一次降税，明年1月1日第二次降税。中韩自贸协定签署后，超9成产品有望进入零关税时代。中澳自贸协定给予85%的澳出口中国商品零关税，澳也将零关税进口中国电子产品和白色家电。http://t.cn/R4hFmMN
text: #知正# [The China-South Korea and China-Australia Free Trade Agreements will take effect on the 20th of this month and reduce taxes for the first time] Today, the China-South Korea and China-Australia Free Trade Agreements are confirmed to take effect on December 20 and reduce taxes for the first time in January next year. Taxes were reduced for the second time on the 1st. After the signing of the China-South Korea Free Trade Agreement, more than 90% of products are expected to enter the zero-tariff era. The China-Australia Free Trade Agreement gives 85% of Australia's exports to China zero tariffs, and Australia will also import Chinese electronic products and white goods with zero tariffs. http://t.cn/R4hFmMN

chinese_text: 【[话筒]中韩、中澳自贸协定12月20日正式生效】今天，中韩、中澳共同确认自由贸易协定，将于2015年12月20日正式生效并第一次降税，2016年1月1日第二次降税。中韩自贸协定于2012年5月启动谈判，2015年6月1日正式签署。中澳自贸协定于2005年4月启动谈判，2015年6月17日正式签署。(央视记者徐宁宁)
text: [[Microphone] The China-South Korea and China-Australia Free Trade Agreement officially comes into effect on December 20] Today, China, South Korea and China and Australia jointly confirmed that the free trade agreement will officially take effect on December 20, 2015 and reduce taxes for the first time in 2016. The second tax reduction will be implemented on January 1, 2020. Negotiations on the China-South Korea Free Trade Agreement were launched in May 2012 and officially signed on June 1, 2015. Negotiations on the China-Australia Free Trade Agreement were launched in April 2005 and officially signed on June 17, 2015. (CCTV reporter Xu Ningning)

chinese_text: #拍案#【复旦投毒案进展：最高法已核准林森浩死刑】复旦投毒案犯林森浩的家人今日透露，最高法已下发核准林森浩死刑的裁定书。林父昨天中午接到上海法院方面通知，称死刑复核结果已经下发，并告诉他在11日之前必须赶到上海见林森浩，否则“后果自负”。详细：http://t.cn/R4hsvOu
text: #热盈# [Progress in the Fudan poisoning case: The Supreme Court has approved Lin Senhao’s death sentence] The family of Lin Senhao, the Fudan poisoning case convict, revealed today that the Supreme People’s Court has issued a ruling approving Lin Senhao’s death sentence. Lin's father received a notice from the Shanghai court at noon yesterday, saying that the death penalty review results had been issued, and told him that he must arrive in Shanghai to see Lin Senhao before the 11th, otherwise he would "bear the consequences." Details: http://t.cn/R4hsvOu

chinese_text: 【男子铁锤砸ATM机屏幕 狂秀“内心戏”】温州某派出所接到银行工作人员报警，称所辖ATM机遭到破坏。经调取监控录像，一个身穿黄色连帽夹克的男子进入警方视线，他手持铁锤思考、准备、进攻、再进攻的过程被清晰地拍了下来。警方对于其行为动机目前尚不确定。http://t.cn/R4hsgQE
text: [Man shows off his inner drama by smashing the screen of an ATM machine with a hammer] A police station in Wenzhou received a call from a bank staff saying that the ATM machine under its jurisdiction had been damaged. After retrieving the surveillance video, a man wearing a yellow hooded jacket entered the police's sight. The process of him thinking, preparing, attacking, and attacking again while holding a hammer was clearly captured. The police are still unsure of the motive for his actions. http://t.cn/R4hsgQE

chinese_text: 【[话筒]马国，你在哪儿？父母在等你回家！】马国，16岁，宁夏同心县豫海中学学生。11月29日因与父亲拌嘴，一气之下从学校出走。在新疆打工的父亲得知后，立即赶回家寻找，可苦寻10天仍了无音讯。如果您见过照片中的孩子，请联系办案民警0953-8022348。转发扩散！(央视记者许国飞)
text: [[Microphone] Ma Guo, where are you? Your parents are waiting for you to come home! ] Ma Guo, 16 years old, a student at Yuhai Middle School in Tongxin County, Ningxia. On November 29, he ran away from school in anger because of a quarrel with his father. After my father, who was working in Xinjiang, learned about it, he immediately rushed home to look for her, but after 10 days of searching, there was still no news. If you have seen the child in the photo, please contact the police handling the case at 0953-8022348. Repost and spread! (CCTV reporter Xu Guofei)

chinese_text: 【“复旦投毒案”最新进展：最高法已核准林森浩死刑】9日，记者从林森浩家人获悉，林森浩的死刑复核已出结果，最高法已下发核准林森浩死刑的裁定书。林父说，8日他接到上海法院的通知，并告诉他在11日之前须赶到上海见林森浩，否则“后果自负”。林父还称，这个案子还有很多疑点没有说清。@华西都市报
text: [Latest developments in the "Fudan Poisoning Case": The Supreme Court has approved Lin Senhao's death sentence] On the 9th, reporters learned from Lin Senhao's family that the review of Lin Senhao's death penalty has come out and the Supreme People's Court has issued a ruling approving Lin Senhao's death penalty. Lin's father said that he received a notice from the Shanghai court on the 8th and told him that he must arrive in Shanghai to see Lin Senhao before the 11th, otherwise he would "bear the consequences." Lin's father also said that there are still many doubts about this case that have not been clarified. @华西都市报

chinese_text: 华西都市报记者9日从林森浩家人处获悉，林森浩的死刑复核已出结果，最高法已下发核准林森浩死刑的裁定书。
text: A reporter from West China Metropolis Daily learned from Lin Senhao’s family on the 9th that the results of Lin Senhao’s death penalty review have been released, and the Supreme People’s Court has issued a ruling approving Lin Senhao’s death penalty.

chinese_text: 【女司机油门当刹车 倒车冲进地下通道[吃惊]】今日，一辆丰田霸道以匪夷所思的姿势倒进了地下通道！司机是30多岁的杨女士，因倒车时刮到一辆小车，过分紧张，把油门当成刹车，撞倒护栏，冲进地下通道。杨女士被卡在半空下不来，消防车迅速赶到将她救出。幸亏当时已过上下学高峰期，没有人受伤。[黑线]
text: [Female driver reversed into the underground passage when the accelerator was used as the brake [surprise]] Today, a Toyota Overlord backed into the underground passage in an incredible posture! The driver, Ms. Yang, who is in her 30s, was overly nervous because she hit a small car while reversing. She used the accelerator as a brake, knocked down the guardrail, and rushed into the underground passage. Ms. Yang was stuck in the air and couldn't get down. The fire truck quickly arrived to rescue her. Fortunately, it was past the rush hour and no one was injured. [black line]

chinese_text: #土耳其击落俄战机#【俄罗斯被击落战机黑匣子已找到】8日，被土耳其击落的俄罗斯苏-24战机黑匣子找到。普京表示，必须在有国际专家的参与下对记录仪所有数据进行详尽分析，这将能够确定俄罗斯战机从起飞到坠毁的全部路线，以及它被击中时所处的具体位置。http://t.cn/R47P1EB
text: #Turkey shot down Russian fighter jet# [The black box of the downed Russian fighter jet has been found] On the 8th, the black box of the Russian Su-24 fighter jet shot down by Turkey was found. Putin said that all data from the recorders must be analyzed in detail with the participation of international experts, which will be able to determine the entire route of the Russian fighter jet from takeoff to crash, as well as the specific location when it was hit. http://t.cn/R47P1EB

chinese_text: 当懒癌晚期患者遇到冬天[doge]，还真是不好过呢~~下面15款过冬神器赶快收好，拯救又懒又怕冷的你[得意地笑]~~#大人的玩具#
text: When patients with late-stage lazy cancer encounter winter [doge], it is really difficult~~Hurry up and put away the following 15 winter artifacts to save you who are lazy and afraid of the cold [smiling proudly]~~ # Adult’s Toys #

chinese_text: #来论#【放开二胎后，“重男轻女”会加重吗？】一胎化并没有削弱重男轻女的思想：自1980年代中国出生人口性别比持续攀升。如今男性与女性的收入差距越来越小，激励家庭对女性增加教育投资。女权主义者说“女性因为受教育程度提高，所以收入提高”，真实的经济逻辑刚好反过来。http://t.cn/RUFxiBY
text: #来论# [After the second child is allowed, will the preference for sons over daughters become worse? 】The one-child policy has not weakened the idea of preferring sons over daughters: the sex ratio at birth in China has continued to rise since the 1980s. Nowadays, the income gap between men and women is getting smaller and smaller, which encourages families to invest more in women’s education. Feminists say that "women's incomes increase because their education level increases." The real economic logic is just the opposite. http://t.cn/RUFxiBY

chinese_text: 【叙民兵组织枪毙IS战俘时收手】一叙利亚民兵组织发布一则“伪斩首”视频。视频中，民兵对IS士兵表示要“行刑”，但最后却放下枪。随后，身穿伊斯兰教袍的伊玛目来到战俘面前教诲：“这不是我们的政策，真正的穆斯林不是魔鬼”。http://t.cn/R47hl6e
text: [Syrian militia stopped when they shot IS prisoners] A Syrian militia released a "fake beheading" video. In the video, the militiamen expressed their intention to "execute" IS soldiers, but in the end they put down their guns. Later, an imam wearing an Islamic robe came to the prisoners of war and taught: "This is not our policy. Real Muslims are not devils." http://t.cn/R47hl6e

chinese_text: 【[话筒]帮找肇事逃逸司机，扩散！】事故发生在临泉县姜尚大道工业园区路段，肇事司机开车逃离现场，路人看到倒地的孩子后报警。警方已成立专案组，"对孩子捐献器官，我们充满敬意。我们会争取早日抓到肇事者。"警方表示，希望肇事者能被孩子感动，主动投案自首。肇事者，请自首！
text: [[Microphone] Help find the hit-and-run driver, spread the word! 】The accident occurred in the Jiangshang Avenue Industrial Park section of Linquan County. The driver fled the scene. Passers-by saw the child lying on the ground and called the police. The police have set up a task force. "We have full respect for children donating organs. We will try to catch the perpetrator as soon as possible." The police said they hope the perpetrator can be moved by the child and take the initiative to surrender. The perpetrators, please surrender!

chinese_text: #时局#【中方回应韩海军射击中国渔政船:已要求澄清】针对韩媒报道称韩海军向中国渔政船射击，外交部发言人华春莹今日表示，中方对有关情况表示关切，经向有关部门了解，迄未收到中方船只或人员受到影响的报告，驻韩使馆已及时与韩方有关部门进行沟通核实，要求韩方澄清。http://t.cn/R477hOB
text: #current situation# [China responded to the South Korean navy's shooting of a Chinese fishery administration vessel: clarification has been requested] In response to Korean media reports that the South Korean navy shot a Chinese fishery administration vessel, Foreign Ministry spokesperson Hua Chunying said today that China is concerned about the situation. After consulting the relevant departments, we have not received any reports of Chinese ships or personnel being affected. The Embassy in South Korea has communicated and verified with the relevant South Korean departments in a timely manner and requested clarification from the South Korean side. http://t.cn/R477hOB

chinese_text: 【爸爸换了新手机后 孩子：爸爸，我的心凉了[泪]】“您是我最亲的亲人，为什么对我那么冷漠…自从您换了新手机后，就再也不和我说话了，不关心我…”这是一个十岁的三年级小学生写给“手机控”爸爸的信，爸爸不经意间看到后愧疚不已，彻夜难眠。家人和手机，你陪谁更多？多陪陪自己身边的人吧！[心]
text: [Child after Dad bought a new mobile phone: Dad, my heart is cold [tears]] "You are my dearest relative, why are you so indifferent to me...Since you bought a new mobile phone, you have never talked to me again. Don’t care about me..." This is a letter written by a ten-year-old third-grade primary school student to his father who is a "cell phone addict". After his father accidentally read it, he felt guilty and couldn't sleep all night. Family or mobile phone, who do you spend more time with? Spend more time with the people around you! [Heart]

chinese_text: 【1.8亿年前恐龙化石长啥样？[拍照]】近日，云南禄丰发现两具距今约1.8亿年的恐龙化石。经鉴定，它们分别为"巨型禄丰龙"和"许氏禄丰龙"，是侏罗纪早期最早出现的恐龙之一。"巨型禄丰龙"化石保存较完整部分5.3米，据推测完整长度近9米，保存部分为背椎、荐椎等多部分。戳图围观↓↓(央视记者赵鹏)
text: [What did the dinosaur fossils look like 180 million years ago? [Photo]] Recently, two dinosaur fossils dating back about 180 million years were discovered in Lufeng, Yunnan. After identification, they were identified as "Giant Lufengosaurus" and "Xu's Lufengosaurus". They were one of the earliest dinosaurs to appear in the early Jurassic period. The relatively complete preserved part of the "Giant Lufengosaurus" fossil is 5.3 meters long, and it is estimated that the complete length is nearly 9 meters. The preserved parts include dorsal vertebrae, sacral vertebrae and other parts. Click on the picture to watch↓↓(CCTV reporter Zhao Peng)

chinese_text: 【黄洋父亲：还了儿子一个公道】复旦投毒案犯林森浩的家人今日透露，最高法已下发核准林森浩死刑的裁定书。对此，投毒案被害人黄洋父亲黄国强表示感到很欣慰，称这个裁定也还了儿子一个公道，将组织儿子的外公等一大家人下午准备去给黄洋上坟。http://t.cn/R477SGl
text: [Huang Yang’s father: Give his son justice] The family of Fudan poisoning suspect Lin Senhao revealed today that the Supreme Court has issued a ruling approving Lin Senhao’s death sentence. In this regard, Huang Guoqiang, the father of Huang Yang, the victim of the poisoning case, expressed that he was very pleased, saying that this ruling also gave his son justice, and he would organize his son's grandfather and other family members to visit Huang Yang's grave in the afternoon. http://t.cn/R477SGl

chinese_text: 【复旦投毒案进展：最高法已核准林森浩死刑】复旦投毒案犯林森浩的家人今日透露，最高法已下发核准林森浩死刑的裁定书。林父昨天中午接到上海法院方面通知，称死刑复核结果已经下发，并告诉他在11日之前必须赶到上海见林森浩，否则“后果自负”。（华西都市报）http://t.cn/R47POUy
text: [Progress in the Fudan poisoning case: The Supreme Court has approved Lin Senhao’s death sentence] The family of Lin Senhao, the Fudan poisoning case convict, revealed today that the Supreme Court has issued a ruling approving Lin Senhao’s death sentence. Lin's father received a notice from the Shanghai court at noon yesterday, saying that the death penalty review results had been issued, and told him that he must arrive in Shanghai to see Lin Senhao before the 11th, otherwise he would "bear the consequences." (West China Metropolis Daily) http://t.cn/R47POUy

chinese_text: 【[话筒]抢！票！啦！明天可网购除夕火车票啦！】按铁路客票预售期提前60天算，明天即可通过互联网购买除夕当天（2016年2月7日）的火车票。春节前两天是各地车票“秒抢”最高峰，届时热门方向车票将全面开启秒杀状态。你，准备好了吗？戳图↓↓附上#2016年春运购票日历#和抢票攻略，祝好运！扩散周知！
text: [[Microphone] Grab it! ticket! La! New Year’s Eve train tickets can be purchased online tomorrow! 】According to the railway ticket pre-sale period 60 days in advance, train tickets for New Year's Eve (February 7, 2016) can be purchased through the Internet tomorrow. The two days before the Spring Festival are the peak sales of tickets in various places. At that time, tickets for popular directions will be fully sold. are you ready? Click on the picture ↓↓ Attached is #2016春节买球Calendar# and a guide to grabbing tickets. Wish you good luck! Spread the word!

chinese_text: 【12306图片验证码一次性输入正确率仅8%】数据显示，用户一次性成功输入验证码的比例仅为8%，65%的用户需要三次甚至四次以上才能输对。如此复杂的验证码难住票贩子了吗？一名黄牛“家X”透露，其采用台式电脑和购买的软件抢票，图片验证码只用机器自动验证即可“秒过”。http://t.cn/R4hdFBA
text: [The correct rate of one-time input of the 12306 picture verification code is only 8%] Data shows that the proportion of users who successfully enter the verification code in one time is only 8%, and 65% of users need three or more times to enter the correct answer. Is such a complicated verification code difficult for ticket sellers? A scalper named "Jia X" revealed that he uses a desktop computer and purchased software to grab tickets, and the picture verification code can be "passed in seconds" just by automatically verifying it with a machine. http://t.cn/R4hdFBA

chinese_text: #市场风云#【证监会副主席姚刚被免职】据人力资源和社会保障部网站消息，国务院任免国家工作人员，免去姚刚的中国证券监督管理委员会副主席职务。上月13日，中央纪委监察部网站发布消息，姚刚涉嫌严重违纪，接受组织调查。http://t.cn/R47ZxT5
text: #MarketFengyun#[Vice Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission Yao Gang was dismissed] According to the website of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, the State Council appointed and removed national staff and removed Yao Gang from his position as Vice Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission. On the 13th of last month, the website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the Ministry of Supervision announced that Yao Gang was suspected of serious disciplinary violations and was under investigation by the organization. http://t.cn/R47ZxT5

chinese_text: 【朝鲜两大文艺团来华演出】今天，朝鲜国家功勋合唱团、牡丹峰乐团抵达辽宁丹东，将于12-14日在国家大剧院演出。国家功勋合唱团曾隶属朝鲜人民军协奏团，1992年被授予"功勋"称号，代表曲目有《金正日将军之歌》等。牡丹峰乐团是金正恩于2012年组建，代表曲目有《学习吧》等，这是该乐团首次来华演出。
text: [Two major North Korean art troupes come to China to perform] Today, the North Korean National Merit Chorus and the Moranfeng Ensemble arrived in Dandong, Liaoning, and will perform at the National Center for the Performing Arts from the 12th to the 14th. The National Meritorious Chorus was once affiliated to the Korean People's Army Concert Orchestra and was awarded the title of "Meritorious Meritorious Service" in 1992. Its representative repertoire includes "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and so on. The Moranbong Band was formed by Kim Jong-un in 2012. Its representative songs include "Study" and so on. This is the band's first performance in China.

chinese_text: 【男童被撞死亡捐器官 肇事者逃】11月28日晚8时许，陈硕从家里出去买饼干，遭遇车祸脑死亡。妈妈禇炳利和丈夫伤心欲绝，但同时他们做了重要决定：把孩子器官捐献出来，让更多人获得新生。图为妈妈伏下身，边流泪边亲吻着他的手。http://t.cn/R47wm3x
text: [Boy was hit and died, organ donation, perpetrator escaped] At about 8 pm on November 28, Chen Shuo went out to buy cookies from his home and was brain-dead in a car accident. Mother Chu Bingli and her husband were heartbroken, but at the same time they made an important decision: to donate their child's organs so that more people can have a new life. The picture shows his mother leaning down and kissing his hand while crying. http://t.cn/R47wm3x

chinese_text: 【[话筒]紧急扩散：抗战老兵突发血障，急需"熊猫血"】田世明，87岁，曾参加抗日战争和解放战争，今年9月获"中国人民抗日战争胜利70周年"纪念章。最近，老人突发障碍性贫血，急需Rh阴性血A型。因血型稀有，厦门库存告急，情况紧急！厦门中心血站献血热线0592-2219260，转发帮帮老兵！(央视记者陈子淳)
text: [[Microphone] Emergency Diffusion: Anti-Japanese War veteran suddenly suffered from blood clots and urgently needed "Panda Blood"] Tian Shiming, 87 years old, participated in the Anti-Japanese War and the Liberation War. In September this year, he received the "70th Anniversary of the Victory of the Chinese People's Anti-Japanese War" commemorative medal. Recently, an old man suddenly suffered from obstructive anemia and was in urgent need of Rh-negative blood type A. Due to the rare blood type, Xiamen's inventory is running low and the situation is urgent! Xiamen Central Blood Station blood donation hotline 0592-2219260, forward to help veterans! (CCTV reporter Chen Zichun)

chinese_text: 【天津65层高楼刚建好就被拆 系江苏原高官之子所建[吃惊]】天津水岸银座3座塔楼最高205米，该楼开发商为江苏省委原秘书长赵少麟之子赵晋。因存在擅自更改规划、严重的“偷面积”等问题，虽已售出七成房源，但仍将被拆。专家称，目前全国都没有200米以上超高层的拆除经验，拆除难度非常大。via.新闻117
text: [The 65-story high-rise building in Tianjin was demolished just after it was built. It was built by the son of a former high-ranking official in Jiangsu [surprise]] The three towers in Tianjin Shui'an Ginza have a maximum height of 205 meters. The developer of the building is Zhao Jin, the son of Zhao Shaolin, the former secretary-general of the Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee. Due to problems such as unauthorized changes in planning and serious "stealing of area", although 70% of the houses have been sold, they will still be demolished. Experts say that currently there is no experience in demolishing super high-rise buildings over 200 meters across the country, making demolition very difficult. via.News117

chinese_text: #时局#【于幼军：要让大家自觉拒绝文革】曾经的“政治明星”于幼军，今天在中山大学以一堂“反思文化大革命”开始任教生涯。于幼军称，讲课目的是“不让文革在新时代穿上马甲就粉墨登场”；文革土壤还在，特别是人们还未理性认识情况下，有可能会在一定历史条件下部分重演。详见：http://t.cn/R47AYQ8
text: #current situation# [Yu Youjun: Let everyone consciously reject the Cultural Revolution] Yu Youjun, a former "political star", started his teaching career at Sun Yat-sen University today with a "Reflection on the Cultural Revolution" class. Yu Youjun said that the purpose of the lecture was to "prevent the Cultural Revolution from putting on a vest and appearing in public in the new era." The soil of the Cultural Revolution is still there, especially if people have not yet understood it rationally, and it may be partially repeated under certain historical conditions. For details, see: http://t.cn/R47AYQ8

chinese_text: 【中国大妈欲用陪睡换女儿通关 被美国安局拘捕】中国55岁妇人杨红与在美留学的女儿乘搭法航从法国巴黎飞抵纽约肯尼迪国际机场时，涉嫌向关员提出性贿赂，好让携带共值16万美元（约合103万元人民币）未申报物品的女儿成功过关。杨红目前被美国国家安全局特工以海关欺诈罪拘捕。http://t.cn/R472zLl
text: [Chinese aunt wanted to sleep with her daughter in exchange for customs clearance and was arrested by the U.S. Security Bureau] When Yang Hong, a 55-year-old Chinese woman, and her daughter studying in the United States flew from Paris, France to New York's John F. Kennedy International Airport on Air France, she was suspected of offering a sexual bribe to a customs officer. So that my daughter, who was carrying undeclared items worth a total of US$160,000 (approximately 1.03 million yuan), could successfully pass the customs. Yang Hong is currently being arrested by US National Security Agency agents on charges of customs fraud. http://t.cn/R472zLl

chinese_text: 【10岁的他走了，捐献器官救5人[泪]】11月28日，安徽临泉10岁男孩陈硕外出买饼干遇车祸被确诊脑死亡，其父母决定捐献孩子器官捐献，让更多的人获得新生，让孩子的生命延续！目前，孩子的肝脏、肾脏已移植给3人，眼角膜使2人重见光明。但肇事司机逃逸，至今仍未露面……转发送送小天使！via.安徽网
text: [He passed away at the age of 10 and donated his organs to save 5 people [tears]] On November 28, Chen Shuo, a 10-year-old boy from Linquan, Anhui, was diagnosed with brain death in a car accident when he went out to buy biscuits. His parents decided to donate their children’s organs to help more people people get a new life and let the children’s lives continue! Currently, the child's liver and kidneys have been transplanted to three people, and his corneas have restored sight to two people. But the driver who caused the accident escaped and has not yet appeared... Forward and send the little angel! via.Anhui.com

chinese_text: #时局#【安理会拟就朝鲜人权问题开会 中国反对】问：联合国安理会拟就朝鲜人权问题召开会议，中方表示反对。中方为何持反对意见？外交部发言人：中方一贯认为应通过建设性对话与合作来处理人权问题，一贯反对安理会介入一国人权问题，希望各方以朝鲜半岛和平稳定大局为重。http://t.cn/R472DI8
text: #current situation# [The Security Council is planning to hold a meeting on the human rights issue in North Korea and China is opposed to it] Q: The United Nations Security Council is planning to hold a meeting on the human rights issue in North Korea, but China is opposed to it. Why does China hold objections? Foreign Ministry Spokesperson: China has always believed that human rights issues should be handled through constructive dialogue and cooperation, and has always opposed the intervention of the Security Council in a country's human rights issues. We hope that all parties will focus on the overall peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula. http://t.cn/R472DI8

chinese_text: 【一张钞票的最后旅程[围观]】随着新版百元钞发行，旧版将慢慢退出流通，它们去哪儿了？在一处钞票处理中心，每天数吨从商业银行回笼的残损钞票被运到这里销毁。它们或被运往纸厂化浆，或被送去燃烧发电，或用作烘烤燃料……工作人员：在钱堆里工作，最基本的是要心如止水。[酷]http://t.cn/R4hQUSI
text: [The last journey of a banknote [Onlooker]] As the new version of the hundred-yuan banknote is released, the old version will slowly withdraw from circulation. Where have they gone? At a banknote processing center, tons of damaged banknotes returned from commercial banks are transported here for destruction every day. They are either transported to paper mills to be pulped, or sent to be burned to generate electricity, or used as baking fuel... Staff: When working in a pile of money, the most basic thing is to keep your mind calm. [Cool] http://t.cn/R4hQUSI

chinese_text: 【帮帮果农！数万吨蜜桔滞销 有的已烂在地里[可怜]】入冬以来，冬雨不停，导致广西桂林蜜桔滞销。桂林全州县才湾镇田心村和岩泉村是当地主要蜜桔种植基地，在年产量近千万斤的果园里，仍有3/4果子挂在树上，“去年最高卖两块多一斤，现在六角八角也卖”。转发寻销路，帮帮果农！（人民日报）
text: 【Help the fruit farmers! Tens of thousands of tons of tangerines are unsaleable, and some are rotting in the ground [poor]] Since the beginning of winter, the winter rain has not stopped, resulting in tangerines in Guilin, Guangxi, being unsaleable. Tianxin Village and Yanquan Village, Caiwan Town, Quanzhou County, Guilin are the main local tangerine planting bases. In the orchards with an annual output of nearly 10 million kilograms, 3/4 of the fruits are still hanging on the trees. "Last year, the highest price was more than 2 yuan." One pound, six and eight anise are now sold.” Repost to find sales and help fruit farmers! (People's Daily)

chinese_text: 【国务院：两年内实行股票公开发行注册制[话筒]】9日，国务院总理李克强主持召开国务院常务会议，会议通过《关于授权国务院在实施股票发行注册制改革中调整适用〈证券法〉有关规定的决定(草案)》。草案明确，在决定施行之日起两年内，授权对拟在上证所、深交所上市交易的股票公开发行实行注册制度。
text: [State Council: Implement a public stock issuance registration system within two years [microphone]] On the 9th, Premier Li Keqiang chaired an executive meeting of the State Council, which passed the "Regulations on Authorizing the State Council to Adjust the Application of the Securities Law in the Implementation of the Stock Issuance Registration System Reform" Decision (Draft)". The draft clarifies that within two years from the date of implementation of the decision, the registration system will be authorized for the public issuance of stocks to be listed and traded on the Shanghai Stock Exchange and Shenzhen Stock Exchange.

At around 10 a.m., I have faxed a request letter to the Supreme People’s Procuratorate’s Death Penalty Review Office, requesting urgent intervention in the approval of Lin Senhao’s death penalty.” Lin Senhao's attorney told "News Geek" and said that Lin's father was "sobbing" at the result. http://t.cn/R47LB41 (produced by Sina News)

chinese_text: 【奇葩！男子买香菇泡面后报警：面里没香菇[笑cry]】近日，南京某超市内，康先生买了包香菇泡面，泡好后发现没香菇，遂找超市要说法，发生争执后报警。警察赶到一问原因，直接在店里买包泡面，泡后见小香菇片浮出，证明“这批泡面有香菇”。康先生：“可能太小我没看到…”[衰](华西都市报)你想说___？
text: 【Weird! A man called the police after buying mushroom instant noodles: there were no mushrooms in the noodles [laughing and crying]] Recently, in a supermarket in Nanjing, Mr. Kang bought a pack of mushroom instant noodles. After soaking, he found that there were no mushrooms. He went to the supermarket to demand an explanation. After a dispute, the police were called. . The police arrived and asked why. They bought a pack of instant noodles directly from the store. After soaking, small shiitake mushroom slices emerged, proving that "this batch of instant noodles contained shiitake mushrooms." Mr. Kang: "Maybe I was too young and didn't see it..." [Bad] (West China Metropolis Daily) Do you want to say ___?

chinese_text: 【夫妻俩街头争吵 出生50天女婴被丢马路边[伤心]】12月7日晚，杭州一对年轻父母在路边吵架，妈妈竟把仅50天的女儿放在马路上，随后与另一女子乘车离去，但孩子的爸爸也没有将孩子抱起来，而是转身离开。幸亏路人报警，女婴被民警带回了派出所，过了一个多小时，女婴妈妈才急忙赶来。（浙江在线）
text: [The couple quarreled in the street and their 50-day-old baby girl was thrown on the roadside [Sad]] On the evening of December 7, a pair of young parents in Hangzhou had a quarrel on the roadside. The mother actually put their 50-day-old daughter on the road, and then went with the other party. A woman left in a car, but the child's father did not pick up the child, but turned and left. Fortunately, a passerby called the police and the baby girl was taken back to the police station. After more than an hour, the baby girl's mother hurriedly arrived. (Zhejiang Online)

chinese_text: 【“爱我，请别伤害我” 你愿意为它们转发呼吁吗？[悲伤]】游隼被剪去飞羽，苍鹭被弹弓射断翅膀……近日云南野生动物园动物救助猕猴、骨顶鸡和苍鹭等5只二级野生动物，它们不同程度受伤，均人为所致。经看护治疗，目前已陆续康复。保护生灵，从我做起，不乱捕滥食野生动物！转发承诺！(央视记者陈政)
text: ["Love me, please don't hurt me" Are you willing to forward the appeal for them? [Sad]] The peregrine falcon had its flight feathers clipped, and the heron's wings were shot off by a slingshot... Recently, Yunnan Wildlife Park rescued five second-level wild animals including macaques, coots, and herons. They were injured to varying degrees, all of which were artificial. Caused by. After receiving care and treatment, he has gradually recovered. To protect living creatures, it starts with me, and I will not hunt or eat wild animals indiscriminately! Forward the pledge! (CCTV reporter Chen Zheng)

chinese_text: 【这些致癌谣言骗了你那么久 别再信了！[给力]】植物油做菜致癌、蓝色洁厕块致癌、口香糖致癌、吃猪肝致癌、地热供暖辐射环境致癌……这些关于致癌的说法你都听说过吗？其实它们都不科学！有关致癌最热门的10个谣言与真相，总有一个曾经刷爆过你的好友圈↓收藏学习，别再被这些谣言迷惑！（人民日报）
text: [Don’t believe these cancer-causing rumors after they have lied to you for so long! [Awesome] Vegetable oil cooking causes cancer, blue toilet blocks cause cancer, chewing gum causes cancer, eating pig liver causes cancer, geothermal heating radiation environment causes cancer... Have you heard of these cancer-causing claims? In fact, they are not scientific! The 10 most popular rumors and truths about cancer, there is always one that has hit your circle of friends↓Collect and learn, don’t be confused by these rumors anymore! (People's Daily)

chinese_text: 【一个老外心理学家，为中国的空气污染操碎了心】我是托马斯·托尔汉姆，会一点中文，所以这篇文章是我自己用中文写的。因为担心中国的空气污染问题，我做了一系相关测试，虽然不是特别严谨，但也能和一些公开发布的数据相印证，还有一些出人意料的发现。 http://t.cn/R47Ghq6
text: [A foreign psychologist is worried about China’s air pollution] I am Thomas Tolham and I know a little Chinese, so I wrote this article in Chinese myself. Because I was worried about China's air pollution problem, I conducted a series of related tests. Although it was not particularly rigorous, it was corroborated with some publicly released data, and there were some unexpected findings. http://t.cn/R47Ghq6

chinese_text: 这位女士到美国一家沃尔玛买东西，遇到一名女子因不满排队结账等待时间过长，对年少的收银员破口大骂，她出面调节，才发现收银员背后的苦衷。。。“我们要感恩惜福，不要随意侮辱别人，因为你并不知道他经历了什么。”http://t.cn/R4hPlJR
text: This lady went to a Wal-Mart in the United States to buy groceries. She met a woman who was dissatisfied with the long wait in line and cursed at the young cashier. She stepped in to mediate the situation and found out what the cashier was doing. . . "We should be grateful and cherish our blessings, and don't insult others at will, because you don't know what they have gone through." http://t.cn/R4hPlJR

chinese_text: 【[话筒]帮找肇事逃逸司机，扩散！】事故发生在临泉县姜尚大道工业园区路段，肇事司机开车逃离现场，路人看到倒地的孩子后报警。警方已成立专案组，"对孩子捐献器官，我们充满敬意。我们会争取早日抓到肇事者。"警方表示，希望肇事者能被孩子感动，主动投案自首。肇事者，请自首！
text: [[Microphone] Help find the hit-and-run driver, spread the word! 】The accident occurred in the Jiangshang Avenue Industrial Park section of Linquan County. The driver fled the scene. Passers-by saw the child lying on the ground and called the police. The police have set up a task force. "We are full of respect for children donating organs. We will try to catch the perpetrator as soon as possible." The police said they hope the perpetrator can be moved by the child and take the initiative to surrender. The perpetrators, please surrender!
