chinese_text: 【养殖户拒卖死山鸡 善举引各方援助[good]】今年10月杨占利夫妇在阳泉养的3000只山鸡，遭流浪狗袭击被咬死，损失20多万元。有商贩欲低价收购，但场主担心死山鸡携带病菌，将其拒绝。随后有义工发起预购山鸡回报活动，目前已筹得善款5万多元用来预购鸡苗。场主夫妻表示仍会好好干下去！(央视记者胡晓冬)
text: [Good deeds of farmers refusing to sell dead pheasants attracted assistance from all parties [good]] In October this year, 3,000 pheasants raised by Yang Zhanli and his wife in Yangquan were attacked and bitten to death by stray dogs, resulting in a loss of more than 200,000 yuan. Some traders wanted to buy the dead pheasants at a low price, but the owner was worried that the dead pheasants would carry germs and refused. Later, volunteers launched a pre-purchase pheasant reward activity, and so far more than 50,000 yuan has been raised to pre-purchase chicks. The owner and his wife said they will continue to work hard! (CCTV reporter Hu Xiaodong)

chinese_text: 【公务员晒请假条：我也想结婚 请假去寻爱！】“朋友都结婚了，我也想结婚，特申请休假5天去寻爱！”这是常德某政府机关公务员孟力的请假条。令人意外的是，这样“不合常规”的请假条，领导已经签批。“领导平时就像长辈一样，签的时候还说了句‘是该找女朋友了啊’。”网友：单身汪请假可参考。[偷笑]
text: [Civil servant posts leave request note: I also want to get married and take leave to find love! ] "All my friends are getting married, and I want to get married too. I am applying for five days of leave to find love!" This is the leave request form from Meng Li, a civil servant in a government agency in Changde. Surprisingly, the leader has already signed and approved such an "unconventional" leave request. "The leader is usually like an elder. When signing the contract, he even said, 'It's time to find a girlfriend.'" Netizen: If you are single, please refer to this for leave. [laughing]

chinese_text: 【重污染天气应急不力 环保部约谈德州市主要负责人】京津冀及周边近日发生严重污染天气，环保部华东督察中心日前对山东开展重污染天气应急督查工作中，发现德州市在应急工作中存严重问题，今天约谈德州市人民政府主要负责同志。这是全国首个因重污染天气应急不到位被约谈的城市。http://t.cn/R473lWX
text: [The Ministry of Environmental Protection interviews the main person in charge of Dezhou City for failure to respond to heavy pollution weather] Severely polluted weather has recently occurred in Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei and surrounding areas. The East China Inspection Center of the Ministry of Environmental Protection recently carried out emergency inspections for heavy pollution weather in Shandong and found that Dezhou City was in emergency response There are serious problems at work. Today we are interviewing the main responsible comrades of the Dezhou Municipal People's Government. This is the first city in the country to be interviewed for failing to respond to heavy pollution weather emergencies. http://t.cn/R473lWX

chinese_text: #万象#【全国首个五星级旅游厕所建成 耗资200万】12月5日，全国首个五星级旅游厕所——江苏省盐城大纵湖景区旅游厕所建成。该系列厕所计划共建造四个，每个投资200多万元。厕所分四个功能区：解忧如厕区，公共休闲区，无障碍区，母婴休息区。详见：http://t.cn/R473BR1
text: #万搏# [The country’s first five-star tourist toilet was built at a cost of 2 million] On December 5, the country’s first five-star tourist toilet, the tourist toilet in the Dazong Lake Scenic Area in Yancheng, Jiangsu Province, was completed. A total of four toilets in this series are planned to be built, with an investment of more than 2 million yuan each. The toilet is divided into four functional areas: the relief toilet area, the public leisure area, the barrier-free area, and the mother and baby rest area. For details, see: http://t.cn/R473BR1

chinese_text: 【专访刘强东：未来计划在广东投入300亿】“未来5年将会在广东投入300亿人民币！”京东集团CEO刘强东在10日举行的第三届广东（国际）电商大会上接受采访时表示。“广东在不少电商领域拥有先天优势，京东的海外采购总部将会建在广州“，刘强东称，广东已经成为京东集团除了北京以外最重要的阵地。
text: [Exclusive interview with Liu Qiangdong: Plans to invest 30 billion yuan in Guangdong in the future] "30 billion yuan will be invested in Guangdong in the next five years!" Liu Qiangdong, CEO of JD.com, was interviewed at the 3rd Guangdong (International) E-commerce Conference held on the 10th time indicates. "Guangdong has inherent advantages in many e-commerce fields, and JD.com's overseas procurement headquarters will be built in Guangzhou." Liu Qiangdong said that Guangdong has become JD.com's most important position besides Beijing.

chinese_text: 【一次次倒逼，电改三十年坎坷路】电改三十年，中国曾经历过烈火烹油的大干快上，体制羁绊下的举步维艰和令人惋惜的十年静默。如同当年“二滩弃水”成为改革的导火索一样，频繁爆发的雾霾等环境问题，成为倒逼新一轮电改起航的重要推手。 http://t.cn/R470EBT
text: [Forced again and again, the electric reform has been a bumpy road for thirty years] In the thirty years since the electric reform, China has experienced rapid progress, difficulties under the fetters of the system, and a regrettable ten years of silence. Just as the "Second Beach Abandonment" became the trigger for reform, frequent outbreaks of smog and other environmental problems have become an important driving force for the start of a new round of electric reform. http://t.cn/R470EBT

chinese_text: 【应急不力，问题有三】①预警预测能力薄弱，预测结果偏差巨大：11月28日，德州空气质量指数达252，当日预测未来48小时将降至200以下，然而29日实际空气质量指数达352，30日更达500②重污染天气应对中教条化倾向明显，一味依赖预测结果③新修订的应急预案在应急减排措施力度上大幅退步。
text: [Ineffective emergency response, there are three problems] ① The early warning and prediction capabilities are weak, and the prediction results have huge deviations: On November 28, the Texas air quality index reached 252. It was predicted that it would drop below 200 in the next 48 hours. However, the actual air quality index reached 352 on the 29th. , reaching 500 on the 30th ② There is an obvious tendency to be dogmatic in the response to heavy pollution weather, blindly relying on forecast results ③ The newly revised emergency plan has significantly regressed in the intensity of emergency emission reduction measures.

chinese_text: 别惹我，我会分身[哈哈][哈哈][哈哈]http://t.cn/R47WBkN
text: Don't mess with me, I will clone you [haha][haha][haha] http://t.cn/R47WBkN

chinese_text: 【小偷盗包后留道歉信：署名“向天再借500元”[笑cry]】近日，重庆的王先生在车上睡着，醒来后包不见了，小偷只留下一张纸条，告诉他包在超市储物柜。王先生找回包后，发现还有封道歉信：“就算你包里有千万元，我只取500元……特奉书道歉，敬请谅解“，落款“向天再借500元的罪人“，王先生哭笑不得…
text: [The thief left an apology letter after stealing the bag: signed "Borrow me another 500 yuan from heaven" [laughing cry]] Recently, Mr. Wang from Chongqing fell asleep in the car. When he woke up, his bag was gone, and the thief only left a note. , telling him the bag was in the supermarket locker. After Mr. Wang got his bag back, he found another letter of apology: "Even if there are tens of millions of yuan in your bag, I will only withdraw 500 yuan... I am writing this letter to apologize. Please forgive me." He signed "Xiangtian to borrow another 500 yuan." "Sinner", Mr. Wang couldn't laugh or cry...

chinese_text: 【[话筒]远离悲剧，使用儿童安全座椅！】日前陕西一轿车发生车祸，1岁女童被妈妈抱坐在副驾驶位，孩子当场死亡…曾有专业人员测试：车速25公里/小时下，10人扣紧安全带、怀抱仿真娃娃，碰撞时7个娃娃被甩了出去。http://t.cn/R4hDhrz 12岁以下儿童乘车一定记得用安全座椅！多个转发，可能多救个孩子！
text: [[Microphone] Avoid tragedy and use child safety seats! 】A car accident occurred in Shaanxi a few days ago. A 1-year-old girl was held by her mother and sat in the passenger seat. The child died on the spot... Professionals once tested: at a speed of 25 kilometers/hour, 10 people fastened their seat belts and held simulation dolls. During the collision, 7 dolls were thrown out. http://t.cn/R4hDhrz Children under 12 years old must remember to use safety seats when riding in a car! If you repost more, you may save more children!

chinese_text: #万象#【39名临时工铁总门前下跪：盛总为我们做主】昨早，39名铁路一线员工手举“盛总为我们做主”的标语，围聚在中国铁路总公司门口维权，要求同工同酬。这些维权职工在西安铁路局工作已经20多年，一直是临时工，工资停滞在十多年前水平，而且正进行劳动合同重签，担心被辞退。http://t.cn/R47B07f
text: #万搏# [39 temporary workers knelt in front of the China Railway Corporation: Mr. Sheng makes the decision for us] Yesterday morning, 39 front-line railway employees held slogans "Mr. Sheng makes the decision for us" and gathered at the gate of the China Railway Corporation to defend their rights. Demand equal pay for equal work. These rights-defending employees have been working at the Xi'an Railway Bureau for more than 20 years and have been working as temporary workers. Their wages have stagnated at the level of more than ten years ago. Their labor contracts are being re-signed and they are worried about being fired. http://t.cn/R47B07f

chinese_text: #驾考改革#【[话筒]驾考新规！以后学车可不去驾校】《关于推进机动车驾驶人培训考试制度改革的意见》今天发布，这些变化你该知道：试点自学直考，某些驾照可不去驾校学；约考不再依赖驾校，可自主选择考试时间和考场；驾校不再一次性预收全部培训费…更多↓转给考驾照的TA!@公安部交通安全微发布
text: #DRIVING EXAMINATION REFORM# [[Microphone] New rules for the driving test! You don’t need to go to a driving school to learn to drive in the future] "Opinions on Promoting the Reform of the Motor Vehicle Driver Training and Examination System" was released today. You should know these changes: the pilot self-study direct examination, some driver’s licenses do not need to go to a driving school; the appointment test no longer relies on the driving school, you can You can choose the test time and venue independently; the driving school no longer charges all the training fees in advance at one time... More ↓ Forward to those who are taking the driver's license test! @ Ministry of Public Security Traffic Safety Micro Release

chinese_text: 【转发帮助！2000万公斤辣椒 急盼买家！[可怜]】有“中国辣椒第一镇”之称的云南会泽县乐业镇正值辣椒收获季，当地辣椒种植面积达10万亩，产量2000万公斤，但椒农们却叹气：“今年辣椒太多了，卖不动。”有需要或能帮忙的网友们，您可以按照最后一张图联系方式帮助他们！@云南共青团 转发扩散！[给力]
text: [Forward help! 20 million kilograms of chili peppers are eagerly awaiting buyers! [Poor]] Leye Town, Huize County, Yunnan Province, known as the "No. 1 Chili Pepper Town in China", is in the pepper harvest season. The local pepper planting area reaches 100,000 acres and the output is 20 million kilograms. However, the pepper farmers sighed: " There are too many peppers this year and we can’t sell them.” Netizens who are in need or can help, you can help them according to the contact information in the last picture! @Yunnan Communist Youth League retweeted and spread! [awesome]

chinese_text: #快讯# 【总装备部通用装备保障部原部长李明泉被查】中国军网消息，日前，军事检察机关对总装备部通用装备保障部原部长李明泉涉嫌违法犯罪问题进行立案侦查。
text: #快讯# [Li Mingquan, the former director of the General Equipment Support Department of the General Armament Department, is under investigation] According to China Military Network, the military procuratorate recently launched an investigation into Li Mingquan, the former director of the General Equipment Support Department of the General Armament Department, for suspected illegal crimes.

chinese_text: 【放开那只海鸥！游客强抓住海鸥自拍留影[怒]】近日网友爆料称，有游客在昆明海埂大坝观看海鸥时，抓住海鸥自拍留影，期间全然不顾被抓海鸥的挣扎和其它海鸥呼救。导致海鸥受到惊吓、伤害。据悉，虐鸥人因觉得好玩抓海鸥自拍留影。网友：希望以此警示他人，文明旅游，善待自然。http://t.cn/R47bqPR
text: 【Let go of that seagull! Tourists forcefully grabbed seagulls and took selfies [angry]] Recently, netizens revealed that a tourist caught a seagull and took a selfie while watching seagulls at the Haigeng Dam in Kunming, completely ignoring the struggle of the caught seagull and other seagulls calling for help. Seagulls are frightened and injured. It is reported that the seagull abuser thought it was fun to catch the seagulls and take selfies. Netizen: I hope this will serve as a warning to others to travel in a civilized manner and be kind to nature. http://t.cn/R47bqPR

chinese_text: #写真#【荒漠里的家园】中国是世界上沙漠面积较大、分布较广、荒漠化危害严重的国家之一。据国家林业局资料显示，全国荒漠化土地面积262.37万平方公里，沙化土地面积173.11万平方公里，分别占国土总面积的27.33%和18.03%。http://t.cn/R47V0O2
text: #photograph# [Home in the Desert] China is one of the countries in the world with a large desert area, a wide distribution, and serious desertification hazards. According to data from the State Forestry Administration, the country's desertified land area is 2.6237 million square kilometers and sandified land area is 1.7311 million square kilometers, accounting for 27.33% and 18.03% of the total land area respectively. http://t.cn/R47V0O2

chinese_text: 【男子出售家养金刚鹦鹉被判拘役两月】因妻子即将分娩，家养的鹦鹉吵闹，上海80后青年陈某欲将鹦鹉卖掉，没想到因此被判刑。法院以非法出售珍贵、濒危野生动物罪判处陈某拘役二个月，缓刑二个月，罚款五千。法官表示，饲养保护动物不违法，但一般买卖需有特殊资格证。http://t.cn/R47fseb
text: [Man sentenced to two months in prison for selling domesticated macaws] Because his wife was about to give birth and the domesticated parrots were noisy, Chen, a young man born in the 1980s in Shanghai, wanted to sell the parrots, but he did not expect to be sentenced. The court sentenced Chen to two months' detention, suspended for two months, and a fine of RMB 5,000 for illegally selling rare and endangered wild animals. The judge said that it is not illegal to keep protected animals, but general sales require special qualification certificates. http://t.cn/R47fseb

chinese_text: 【泪奔！网友拍环卫工借汽车尾气取暖[泪流满面]】昆明的冬天虽不像北方那么冰天雪地，但依然能寒风刺骨。今日下午，有网友发微博称：环卫工人用公交尾气取暖，有关部门能配备点冬装吗？此前，也有网友拍到昆明一名环卫工人在寒冷冬夜席地而坐靠路边站台睡着。转发，承诺不乱丢垃圾！(直播云南)
text: 【Tears ran! A netizen filmed a sanitation worker borrowing car exhaust to stay warm [with tears streaming down his face]] Although the winter in Kunming is not as icy and snowy as in the north, the wind can still be biting. This afternoon, a netizen posted on Weibo: Sanitation workers use bus exhaust to keep warm. Can the relevant departments provide some winter clothes? Previously, some netizens also photographed a Kunming sanitation worker sitting on the ground and falling asleep on a roadside platform on a cold winter night. Forward it and promise not to litter! (Live broadcast in Yunnan)

chinese_text: #知政#【想有北京户口？积分落户政策来了】北京积分落户征求意见稿发布，申请人要持有北京市居住证、年龄不超过45周岁、在京连续缴纳社会保险7年及以上、符合本市计划生育政策、无违法犯罪记录。详见：http://t.cn/R47dh4K
text: #知正#【Want to have a Beijing household registration? The Points Settlement Policy is Here] The Beijing Points Settlement Draft is released for comments. Applicants must hold a Beijing residence permit, be no more than 45 years old, have paid social insurance in Beijing for 7 consecutive years or more, comply with the city’s family planning policy, and have no illegal crimes. Record. For details, see: http://t.cn/R47dh4K

chinese_text: 【每年公布落户分数线】北京市政府根据年度人口调控情况，每年向社会公布落户分数线。有关部门根据申请人积分情况和落户分数线，初步确定年度积分落户人员，并对积分情况向社会公示。通过公示后，申请人可按相关规定办理常住户口。
text: [Announcement of the settlement score line every year] The Beijing Municipal Government announces the settlement score line to the public every year based on the annual population control situation. Relevant departments will preliminarily determine the annual points-settled applicants based on the applicant's points and settlement scores, and announce the points status to the public. After passing the public notice, the applicant can apply for permanent residence in accordance with relevant regulations.

chinese_text: #热门跟贴#博大精深的汉字——来！
text: #火狐综合# Broad and profound Chinese characters - come!

chinese_text: 【北京积分落户征求意见：这些可加分】①取得国民教育系列及教育部认可的国内外学历(学位)获相应积分②中级及以上职称③在经认定的科技企业孵化器及众创空间中的创业企业就业且符合一定条件④近3年连续纳税且满足以下条件之一：平均每年工资、薪金及劳务报酬的个人所得税纳税额在10万元及以上。
text: [Soliciting opinions on the settlement of points in Beijing: these can add points] ① Obtain corresponding points for obtaining national education series and domestic and foreign academic qualifications (degrees) recognized by the Ministry of Education ② Intermediate and above professional titles ③ In recognized technology business incubators and maker spaces Employment in a start-up enterprise and meeting certain conditions ④ Paying taxes continuously for the past three years and meeting one of the following conditions: The average annual personal income tax payment on wages, salaries and labor remuneration is 100,000 yuan or more.

chinese_text: 【患癌的哥跑车给妻子筹手术费 每小时需上一次厕所[泪]】西安的哥廖师傅患有膀胱癌,才做完手术,妻子又被查出脑部囊肿,手术需要十多万元,家有一对4岁多的龙凤胎,因为经济原因,至今未上幼儿园。为了生活，廖师傅只好出来跑车，但需要一小时上一次厕所，随身装着4家医院就诊卡，方便随时去医院检查。
text: [A brother with cancer drove a car to raise money for his wife’s surgery and had to go to the toilet once an hour [tears]] Master Ge Liao from Xi’an suffered from bladder cancer and had just completed the operation. His wife was also diagnosed with a brain cyst. The operation cost more than 100,000 yuan. Yuan's family has a pair of twins, a boy and a girl, who are over 4 years old. Due to financial reasons, they have not yet gone to kindergarten. In order to survive, Master Liao had no choice but to go out to the sports car, but he needed to go to the toilet once an hour. He carried four hospital medical cards with him so that he could go to the hospital for check-ups at any time.

chinese_text: 【全球最爱偷窥主人的一只[兔子]的日常】日本超人气萌兔，因为主人经常在twitter上更新它的动态而爆火。这只兔兔的好奇心太大，时常在门缝里，墙根处衣柜里探出头偷偷观察麻麻在忙什么……看到最后却不知不觉哭了[泪]#有意思#
text: [The daily life of the world’s favorite voyeuristic rabbit] Japan’s super popular cute rabbit became popular because its owner often updates its status on Twitter. This rabbit is so curious that it often pokes its head out of the cracks in the door or the closet at the base of the wall to secretly observe what Mommy is busy with... but she cried unknowingly when she saw the end [tears] # interesting #

chinese_text: 2015年要过去了
text: 2015 is coming to an end

chinese_text: 【铁总：将剔除辩识度较低的验证码】中国铁路总公司运输局营运部副主任黄欣今天表示，截至目前已发售春运火车票1.3亿张，其中网上订票率达60%，平均购票时间为1.8秒。针对网友吐槽验证码混乱不清晰的问题，12306有关负责人将在下一次抢票高峰到来前调整，剔除辩识度较低的验证码。（央视记者郑连凯）
text: [Railway Corporation: Verification codes with low visibility will be eliminated] Huang Xin, deputy director of the Operations Department of the Transportation Bureau of China Railway Corporation, said today that so far 130 million Spring Festival train tickets have been sold, of which the online booking rate has reached 60%. The average ticket purchase time is 1.8 seconds. In response to netizens complaining about the confusion and unclear verification codes, the relevant person in charge of 12306 will make adjustments before the next ticket rush peak and eliminate verification codes with low recognition. (CCTV reporter Zheng Liankai)

chinese_text: 【12月10日新闻联播抢先看】①看头条：习近平同阿塞拜疆总统会谈，谈了什么？②看改革：驾考制度改革意见今天发布，哪些环节有变化？③看治霾：因重污染天气应急不到位，环保部约谈山东德州市长，说了啥？今晚7点，一定看！
text: [Preview of News Network on December 10] ①Look at the headlines: Xi Jinping held talks with the President of Azerbaijan. What did they discuss? ②Look at the reform: Opinions on the reform of the driving test system were released today. Which aspects have changed? ③Look at haze control: Due to insufficient emergency response for heavy pollution weather, the Ministry of Environmental Protection interviewed the mayor of Dezhou, Shandong. What did he say? Must watch tonight at 7pm!

chinese_text: 科比·布莱恩特要退役了。作为一种致敬，赞颂他单场81分的人和调侃他打铁最多的人，都不约而同地将他与乔丹对比。当两个传奇来到统计学的主场，联盟里最特别的那些统计公式，会怎样描绘他们的强大？ http://t.cn/R47DegC
text: Kobe Bryant is retiring. As a tribute, those who praised his 81 points in a single game and those who ridiculed him for scoring the most irons all invariably compared him with Jordan. text: [Baidu’s self-driving car reaches a top speed of 100 kilometers per hour] Baidu announced today that its self-driving car has achieved fully autonomous driving in mixed road conditions of cities, ring roads, and highways for the first time in China. In the Baidu Tower-G7 Beijing-Xinjiang Expressway-Fifth Ring Road-Olympic Forest Park section, Baidu's self-driving cars can achieve autonomous driving throughout the entire journey, as well as complex actions such as slowing down, changing lanes, overtaking, going up and down ramps, and making U-turns. http://t.cn/R47O05Z

[Insidious] How many times have you filled in successfully?

chinese_text: 【9个增加自信的小技巧】1、挑前面的位子坐； 2、练习正视别人； 3、把你走路的速度加快25%； 4、练习当众发言； 5、咧嘴大笑；6、怯场时，不妨道出真情，即能平静下来； 7、用对自己用肯定的语气，消除自卑感；8、发现自己薄弱环节并逐步提高；9、培养兴趣，做自己能做、喜欢的事。（转）
text: [9 Tips to Increase Confidence] 1. Sit in the front seat; 2. Practice looking at others; 3. Speed up your walking speed by 25%; 4. Practice speaking in public; 5. Grinning; 6. When you have stage fright. , you might as well tell the truth and you can calm down; 7. Use a positive tone towards yourself to eliminate your inferiority complex; 8. Discover your weak links and gradually improve them; 9. Cultivate interest and do things you can and like. (change)

chinese_text: 【又现英勇“抱火哥” 冒死抱出喷火液化气罐】9日中午，张家口怀来县某店面内液化气罐起火，燃烧的火焰达到近1米高。一名消防战士不顾生命危险，在战友水枪掩护下，果断拎起起火罐冲出室外，最后成功将火扑灭。转发↓↓↓为“抱火哥”点[赞]（央视记者：李文超 介海申）
text: [Another heroic "Fire Holder" risked his life to hold out a fire-breathing liquefied gas tank] At noon on the 9th, a liquefied gas tank caught fire in a store in Huailai County, Zhangjiakou, and the burning flames reached a height of nearly 1 meter. Regardless of the danger to his life, a fire fighter decisively picked up a fire can and rushed out of the room under the cover of his comrades' water cannons, and finally successfully put out the fire. The editor specially provides a sprint guide: download the admission ticket from the 14th to the 28th; the two key points for efficient review are to pay attention to basic knowledge and weak links; you must do the real questions more than three times; the mock exam is best arranged one week before the exam, and the time It must be consistent with the exam time... Click on the picture ↓ for all the useful information! Forward it to your fellow candidates and send your best wishes!

Qingming, Dragon Boat Festival and Mid-Autumn Festival can all spell out 9 days of vacation! Strategy: http://t.cn/R4z4iwc

chinese_text: #大头条#【28地区上调最低工资标准[赞]】进入12月，吉林、宁夏、重庆相继上调最低工资标准。今年全国至少已有28个地区上调最低工资标准，仅剩辽宁、河北、青海、江苏未调，其中，辽宁已两年多未调整。调整之后，深圳、上海两地月最低工资标准分别为2030元、2020元，破2000元大关。你那里涨了么？[话筒]
text: #大头头# [28 regions raised minimum wage standards [Like]] Entering December, Jilin, Ningxia, and Chongqing have successively raised their minimum wage standards. This year, at least 28 regions across the country have raised their minimum wage standards. Only Liaoning, Hebei, Qinghai, and Jiangsu have not raised their minimum wage standards. Among them, Liaoning has not raised their minimum wage standards for more than two years. After the adjustment, the monthly minimum wages in Shenzhen and Shanghai are 2,030 yuan and 2,020 yuan respectively, exceeding the 2,000 yuan mark. Has it gone up at your place? [microphone]

chinese_text: 【广州小学生30秒跳绳220下，每秒7.3下，裁判看8次慢放才数清[吃惊]】近日，在迪拜举行的“世界学生跳绳锦标赛”上，广州七星小学一名小学五年级学生，岑小林，30秒跳了220下，即1秒跳7.3下。8个国际裁判要看慢回放，数了8遍……戳视频：http://t.cn/R47TWas 从头到尾没看到绳子的举手！转！
text: [Guangzhou primary school students skipped 220 times in 30 seconds, 7.3 times per second. The referee watched 8 times of slow play to count [surprise]] Recently, at the "World Student Rope Skipping Championship" held in Dubai, a fifth-grade student from Qixing Primary School in Guangzhou , Cen Xiaolin, jumped 220 times in 30 seconds, which is 7.3 times in 1 second. The 8 international referees wanted to watch the slow replay and counted it 8 times... Click on the video: http://t.cn/R47TWas No one raised their hands who saw the rope from beginning to end! change!

chinese_text: #新浪看见#【网购一双鞋，你知道它的起源吗？】双十一的包裹刚到不久，双十二接踵而至。明天，新一轮网购狂欢又将上演，无数商品又将踏上变身包裹的旅程。但它们究竟从哪里来？又是如何被制造？跟随这双新鞋回头去看看：http://t.cn/R4zLOZ6
text: #新娜看# [Shopping for a pair of shoes online, do you know its origin? 】Not long after the Double Eleven package arrived, Double Twelve arrived one after another. Tomorrow, a new round of online shopping spree will take place, and countless products will embark on a journey to transform into packages. But where do they come from? How is it made? Check back with this new pair of shoes: http://t.cn/R4zLOZ6

chinese_text: 【今天，向这位中国科学家转发祝贺！#屠呦呦获颁诺贝尔奖#[鼓掌]】10日，瑞典斯德哥尔摩音乐厅，中国科学家屠呦呦从瑞典国王卡尔十六世•古斯塔夫手中领取诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。这是中国科学家在中国本土进行的科学研究首获诺贝尔科学奖，是中国医学界迄今为止获得的最高奖项。http://t.cn/R4zqm3x
text: [Today, I forward my congratulations to this Chinese scientist! #TuYouyouReceived the Nobel Prize# [Applause]] On the 10th, Chinese scientist Tu Youyou received the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine from King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden at the Stockholm Concert Hall in Sweden. This is the first time that a Chinese scientist has won the Nobel Prize in Science for scientific research conducted in China, and it is the highest award so far received by the Chinese medical community. http://t.cn/R4zqm3x

chinese_text: 【上海市区路边现剧毒眼镜蛇 疑为行善者放生】昨日出门上班的李阿姨被路边的蛇吓坏了，“看样子像眼镜蛇，一直在动，好多条团在了一起。”获悉这一情况后，闵行消防支队七宝支队再次出发，最终在这一区域捕捉到眼镜蛇25条。闵行野生动物保护管理站工作人员判断，疑为行善者放生。http://t.cn/R4zV4ay
text: [A highly venomous cobra found on the roadside in Shanghai is suspected to have been released by a doer of good deeds] Aunt Li, who went to work yesterday, was frightened by the snake on the roadside. "It looked like a cobra, it kept moving, and many of them were grouped together," it was learned. After this situation, the Qibao Detachment of the Minhang Fire Department set out again and finally captured 25 cobras in this area. Staff at the Minhang Wildlife Conservation and Management Station judged that the animal was released as a doer of good deeds. http://t.cn/R4zV4ay

chinese_text: 【诺贝尔奖评委：屠呦呦的发现对人类的贡献不可估量】诺贝尔生理学或医学奖评委弗斯伯格说，“每年约50万人死于疟疾，其中大多数为儿童…屠呦呦对青蒿素的发现引起对抗疟新药品的研制和发展，该药品已挽救上百万人性命，将过去15年疟疾的致死率降低了一半。”(人民日报)点赞致敬！
text: [Nobel Prize judges: Tu Youyou’s discovery has made immeasurable contributions to mankind] Forsberg, a judge of the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, said, “About 500,000 people die from malaria every year, most of them children... Tu Youyou’s comments on youth The discovery of artemisinin led to the research and development of new anti-malarial drugs, which have saved millions of lives and reduced the mortality rate of malaria by half in the past 15 years.” (People’s Daily) Like and salute!

chinese_text: 2015新浪娱乐#最美表演#终极预告！@李睿珺film #杨庆# @李霄峰 @韩延1116 四位青年导演，@冯小刚 @陈坤 @胡歌 @王千源 @大鹏董成鹏 #陈瑾# @姚晨 @杨幂 @杨子姗 @马思纯 十位优秀演员，十段精彩表演，12.14正片上线！
text: 2015 Sina Entertainment #most beautiful performance # ultimate preview! @李瑞纺film #杨青# @李霄峰@Hanyan1116 Four young directors, @风小gang @陈kun @胡歌 @王千元 @大平东成令#陈瑾# @姚陈@杨幂@杨子槗@马思春Ten outstanding actors, ten A wonderful performance, the feature film will be online on 12.14!

chinese_text: 【云海之上的冰雪奇缘[xkl转圈]】弱冷空气吹散雾霾，降温后天气放晴。近日，位于山西南部的太行山脉出现云海景观，山间云雾升腾，山巅被雾凇尽染，俨然来到梦幻中的冰雪王国。截图，美景要点赞！↓↓↓（央视记者肖冉 图自张青龙）
text: [Frozen above the sea of clouds [xkl circle]] The weak cold air blew away the haze, and the weather cleared up after cooling down. Recently, a sea of clouds landscape appeared in the Taihang Mountains in the southwestern part of Shanxi Province. The clouds and mist rose in the mountains, and the mountain tops were dyed with rime. It was like entering a dreamy kingdom of ice and snow. Take a screenshot and like the beautiful scenery! ↓↓↓ (Photo by CCTV reporter Xiao Ran from Zhang Qinglong)

chinese_text: #那一天#【两弹一星元勋钱学森】①他少学有成，远赴重洋参物理之奥，而立之年便成为一流火箭专家；②新中国百业待兴之时，他归心似箭，然而美国人说他抵得上5个师，宁可枪毙也不让回国；③他被软禁5年，历尽艰险，万里归国，开创祖国航天事业，终成"两弹一星"元勋。今天钱老诞辰，致敬！[蜡烛]
text: #thatday# [Qian Xuesen, the father of two bombs and one star] ① He was successful in his studies and went to the ocean to study physics, and became a first-class rocket expert in his thirties; ② When all industries in New China were waiting for prosperity, he returned home like an arrow. However, the Americans said that he was worth five divisions and would rather be shot than allowed to return to the country; ③ He was under house arrest for five years, went through many hardships and dangers, returned to the country thousands of miles away, started the motherland's aerospace industry, and eventually became the founder of the "two bombs and one satellite". Today is Mr. Qian’s birthday, salute! [Candle]

chinese_text: #屠呦呦颁奖典礼#【一起为这位中国女科学家转发，致敬！】北京时间昨夜，青蒿素第一发明人、中国科学家屠呦呦在瑞典首都斯德哥尔摩音乐厅，从瑞典国王卡尔十六世•古斯塔夫手中接过2015年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖证书、奖章。这是中国科学家在中国本土进行的科学研究首次获诺贝尔科学奖。致敬！[赞]
text: #Tuyoyoawardceremony# [Let’s repost and pay tribute to this Chinese female scientist! 】Last night Beijing time, Chinese scientist Tu Youyou, the first inventor of artemisinin, received the certificate and medal of the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine from King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden at the Stockholm Concert Hall in the Swedish capital. . This is the first time that a Chinese scientist has won the Nobel Prize in Science for scientific research conducted in China. pay tribute! [Thumbs up]

chinese_text: #知政#【安监总局局长杨焕宁：杨栋梁等执法犯法】12月10日，安监总局局长杨焕宁开会时指出，要认识到安监干部队伍中仍存在一些问题，特别是安监总局原局长杨栋梁和黑龙江煤监局原局长张成祥、江西煤监局原局长贺爱民等反面典型，私欲膨胀、滥用职权、执法犯法，严重损害安监形象。http://t.cn/R4zfiKV
text: #知正#[Yang Huanning, Director of the State Administration of Work: Yang Dongliang and others committed crimes in law enforcement] On December 10, Yang Huanning, Director of the State Administration of Work, pointed out during a meeting that there are still some problems in the team of work safety cadres, especially the original work of the State Administration of Work. Director Yang Dongliang, former director of Heilongjiang Coal Supervision Bureau Zhang Chengxiang, and former director of Jiangxi Coal Supervision Bureau He Aimin are negative examples. Their selfish desires, abuse of power, and law enforcement violations have seriously damaged the image of safety supervision. http://t.cn/R4zfiKV

chinese_text: 【浙江一官员错发“跑官”短信 官方：已被停职】10日下午，温州一微信公众号发布信息称一官员错发“跑官”短信至另一手机用户。经浙江省温州市瓯海区纪委调查，核实该短信系区旅游局党组成员、纪检组长冯某发送，现冯某已被停职检查。(人民网)http://t.cn/R4z5vaW
text: [An official in Zhejiang mistakenly sent the text message "running for official position", official: has been suspended] On the afternoon of the 10th, a WeChat public account in Wenzhou released information saying that an official mistakenly sent the text message "running for official position" to another mobile phone user. After investigation by the Discipline Inspection Commission of Ouhai District, Wenzhou City, Zhejiang Province, it was verified that the text message was sent by Feng, a member of the Party Committee and Discipline Inspection Team Leader of the District Tourism Bureau. Feng has now been suspended for inspection. (People's Daily Online) http://t.cn/R4z5vaW

chinese_text: 【血的记忆：重庆首次公开南京大屠杀部分史料】近日，重庆北碚区档案馆首次公开了南京大屠杀部分史料：那年的南京，处处是破败的断壁残垣、高悬的日军太阳旗.......短短40天，中国被枪杀和活埋的军民达30余万！每一张照片、每一段文字，都是对日军当年暴行的控诉与谴责！转发铭记！历史，不容遗忘！
text: [Memory of Blood: Chongqing disclosed some historical materials of the Nanjing Massacre for the first time] Recently, the Beibei District Archives of Chongqing disclosed some historical materials of the Nanjing Massacre for the first time: Nanjing that year was full of dilapidated ruins and high-hanging Japanese sun flags. .......In just 40 days, more than 300,000 soldiers and civilians in China were shot and buried alive! Every photo and every paragraph of text is an accusation and condemnation of the atrocities committed by the Japanese army! Forward to remember! History cannot be forgotten!

chinese_text: 【男子电梯内多次按键遭殴打】在晋务工的重庆籍男子孙某住在4楼，与住7楼的熊某一起乘坐电梯时故意将之间的按钮按了个遍，并故意停留了一会儿挑衅熊某，结果被推倒在地揍了几拳。孙某觉得委屈打电话报警，最终熊某主动赔偿100元言和。http://t.cn/R47koZk
text: [Man was beaten for pressing buttons multiple times in the elevator] Sun, a Chongqing man working in Shanxi, lived on the 4th floor. When he and Xiong, who lived on the 7th floor, took the elevator together, they deliberately pressed all the buttons between them and paused on purpose. After provoking Xiong for a while, he was pushed to the ground and punched several times. Sun felt aggrieved and called the police. Finally, Xiong took the initiative to pay 100 yuan to make peace. http://t.cn/R47koZk

chinese_text: 【两万余斤生姜滞销 “姜君”求帮忙！】生姜丰产了，可江西省赣州市兴国县鼎龙乡茶岭村的20余户村民却愁眉不展，因为生姜无人收购而大量滞销。去年生姜3元一斤，今年才0.5元左右。[悲伤]眼看辛苦种植的收成卖不出去，村民们都急坏了。转发，帮他们寻找销路！（央视记者郭一淳 谢乃川）
text: [More than 20,000 kilograms of unsalable ginger, "Jiang Jun", please help! ] There is a good harvest of ginger, but more than 20 households in Chaling Village, Dinglong Township, Xingguo County, Ganzhou City, Jiangxi Province, are worried because there is no one to buy the ginger and a large amount of it is unsaleable. Last year, ginger cost 3 yuan per pound, but this year it is only about 0.5 yuan. [Sad] Seeing that the harvest they had worked so hard to grow could not be sold, the villagers were anxious. Forward it and help them find sales! (CCTV reporter Guo Yichun and Xie Naichuan)

chinese_text: 【你离北京户口有多远？ 这原来是道数学题】当“北漂”7年多了，有车有房(租的)有女友，就缺个北京户口。10日晚《北京市积分落户管理办法(征求意见稿)》公布，每连续缴纳社保满1年积3分，大学本科15分……小新一共得了47.5分！小伙伴们，你们得了多少分？ http://t.cn/R4zMvoI
text: [How far are you from your registered residence in Beijing? This turned out to be a math question] I have been a "Beijing drifter" for more than 7 years. I have a car, a house (rented) and a girlfriend, but I lack a Beijing household registration. On the evening of the 10th, the "Beijing Points Settlement Management Measures (Draft for Comments)" was announced. Each consecutive year of social security payment will earn 3 points, and a bachelor's degree will earn 15 points... Xiaoxin scored a total of 47.5 points! Guys, how many points did you get? http://t.cn/R4zMvoI

chinese_text: 【碰瓷大妈离车七八米缓慢躺下】马路上堵成了一锅粥，一辆私家车停着，车窗紧闭，车内女子不停打着电话。众人从车底拉起了一位大妈，大妈却突然挣脱，像泥鳅样往车底死劲钻，边钻边骂。网友：请练练演技，提高碰瓷素养。http://t.cn/R4zMNeI http://t.cn/R47pAEo
text: [Aunt Pengci lay down slowly about seven or eight meters away from the car] The road was jammed with traffic. A private car was parked with the windows closed, and the woman in the car kept talking on the phone. Everyone pulled up an aunt from under the car, but the aunt suddenly broke away and burrowed under the car like a loach, cursing as she burrowed. Netizen: Please practice your acting skills and improve your porcelain literacy. http://t.cn/R4zMNeI http://t.cn/R47pAEo

chinese_text: 【28地区上调最低工资标准】进入12月以来，吉林、宁夏、重庆等地相继上调最低工资标准。据统计，今年全国至少已有28个地区上调最低工资标准，仅剩辽宁、河北、青海、江苏4地未调整。调整后，深圳、上海两地月最低工资标准分别为2030元、2020元，超2000元大关，北京1720元排第6。http://t.cn/R4zLjhk
text: [28 regions raised minimum wage standards] Since December, Jilin, Ningxia, Chongqing and other places have successively raised their minimum wage standards. According to statistics, at least 28 regions across the country have raised their minimum wage standards this year, and only four regions, Liaoning, Hebei, Qinghai, and Jiangsu, have not made adjustments. After adjustment, the monthly minimum wages in Shenzhen and Shanghai are 2,030 yuan and 2,020 yuan respectively, exceeding the 2,000 yuan mark, with Beijing ranking sixth at 1,720 yuan. http://t.cn/R4zLjhk

chinese_text: 【中青报：戴口罩不再觉得丢脸是进步】7年前，在北京戴口罩还是一件“可耻”的事情。2008年北京奥运会，美国几名运动员在下飞机时戴上了口罩。网民愤怒地指责他们这是以“下三滥的馊招”侮辱中国。而今天，就连天安门广场上的武警戴上口罩执勤，也没有谁会觉得这是在给国家丢脸。http://t.cn/R4zGLhw
text: [China Youth Daily: Wearing a mask no longer feels embarrassing, which is progress] Seven years ago, wearing a mask was still a "shameful" thing in Beijing. At the 2008 Beijing Olympics, several American athletes wore masks when they got off the plane. Netizens angrily accused them of insulting China with a "bad move". Today, even if the armed police in Tiananmen Square wear masks on duty, no one would think that they are embarrassing the country. http://t.cn/R4zGLhw

chinese_text: 【亚洲最贵城市上海第1北京第2[拜拜]】英媒称，某人力资源咨询机构的生活成本调查显示，亚太地区外派人员生活成本最高的20个城市中，中国占11个。因人民币升值，上海跃居亚洲最贵城市头名，北京从第4名升至第2，广州从第13名升至第6。全球外派人员生活成本最高的30个城市中，中国城市占比也是最高的。
text: [Asia’s most expensive cities, Shanghai first, Beijing No. 2 [Bye bye]] According to British media, a cost of living survey by a human resources consulting agency showed that among the 20 cities with the highest cost of living for expatriates in the Asia-Pacific region, 11 are in China. Due to the appreciation of the RMB, Shanghai ranks first among the most expensive cities in Asia, Beijing rises from 4th to 2nd, and Guangzhou rises from 13th to 6th. Among the 30 cities with the highest living costs for expatriates in the world, Chinese cities also account for the highest proportion.

chinese_text: 【西藏第一家肯德基明年开业】据路透社12月9日报道，美国快餐行业巨头肯德基决定于下月在西藏自治区开设首家连锁店，餐厅大约540平方米。早在2004年肯德基就计划进驻西藏。当时达赖喇嘛写信给肯德基，要求他们放弃开设计划，理由是杀鸡是对动物的残害，西藏人很少人吃鸡和鱼。http://t.cn/R4zxEsR
text: [The first KFC in Tibet will open next year] According to a Reuters report on December 9, the US fast food industry giant KFC has decided to open its first chain store in the Tibet Autonomous Region next month, with a restaurant of approximately 540 square meters. As early as 2004, KFC planned to enter Tibet. At that time, the Dalai Lama wrote to KFC, asking them to abandon the opening plan on the grounds that killing chickens is cruelty to animals, and few Tibetans eat chicken and fish. http://t.cn/R4zxEsR

chinese_text: 【诺奖评委：不论学术还是生活，屠呦呦都是很了不起的人[good]】诺奖评委会秘书长沃尔本-林达勒：全球97个国家与地区的33亿人口仍在遭受疟疾威胁，70%的非洲疟疾患者应用青蒿素复方药物治疗。“屠呦呦不论是从学术上还是生活上都是一个很了不起的人。作为获奖人，她的经历是独一无二的。”祝贺，致敬！
text: [Nobel Prize Jury: Tu Youyou is a great person in both academic and life terms [good]] Nobel Prize Jury Secretary-General Walburn Lindale: 3.3 billion people in 97 countries and regions around the world are still suffering from malaria Threat, 70% of malaria patients in Africa are treated with artemisinin compound drugs. "Tu Youyou is an amazing person both academically and in life. As a winner, her experience is unique." Congratulations and tribute!

chinese_text: 【空姐跪地喂老人吃饭 老人感动落泪[心]】12月8日，在郑州飞往海南的航班上，一位河南新乡老人因患有脑梗无法握勺进食，空姐樊雪松跪在老人身边喂他吃饭，老人因感动而泣不成声。网友：若不是心中有大爱，定不会有此景此情。真正的服务不是靠培训和要求，是发自内心的感情。http://t.cn/R4zG0Rx
text: [The stewardess knelt down to feed the elderly man and the old man was moved to tears [Heart]] On December 8, on the flight from Zhengzhou to Hainan, an elderly man in Xinxiang, Henan Province was unable to hold a spoon to eat because he had a cerebral infarction. Stewardess Fan Xuesong knelt down and fed the elderly man. The old man was so moved that he burst into tears as the people around him fed him. Netizen: If it weren’t for the great love in my heart, I wouldn’t be in this situation. Real service does not rely on training and requirements, but comes from inner feelings. http://t.cn/R4zG0Rx

chinese_text: 【二战犹太难民：那个年代，中国人被压迫，还在帮我们】上世纪30年代末，由于纳粹德国迫害，近3万犹太难民来到上海，受到中国人民的同情和帮助。犹太难民伊芙琳对此充满感激，“中国人对我们非常友好。我知道中国人在战争中比犹太人受压迫得更厉害，但你们依然尽全力帮助我们。” http://t.cn/R4zJI69
text: [Jewish Refugees from World War II: At that time, the Chinese were oppressed, but they still helped us] In the late 1930s, due to the persecution of Nazi Germany, nearly 30,000 Jewish refugees came to Shanghai and received sympathy and help from the Chinese people. Jewish refugee Evelin was very grateful for this, "The Chinese are very friendly to us. I know that the Chinese were more oppressed than the Jews during the war, but you still did your best to help us." http://t.cn/ R4zJI69

chinese_text: 【谷神星上的神秘亮斑，不是冰，而是盐】科学家们一直对谷神星上的神秘亮斑耿耿于怀：这些斑像痘痘一样长在小汤圆脸上，它们到底是什么？前不久曙光号发回的最新数据表明，这些明亮物质可能是某种硫酸盐，而不是之前猜测的水冰：http://t.cn/R47FhA2 图一为最新伪彩色照片，图二为一月中旬的照片。
text: [The mysterious bright spots on Ceres are not ice, but salt] Scientists have always been worried about the mysterious bright spots on Ceres: These spots grow like acne on the face of little glutinous rice balls. What are they? The latest data sent back by Dawn not long ago shows that these bright substances may be some kind of sulfate, rather than water ice as previously suspected: http://t.cn/R47FhA2 Figure 1 is the latest pseudo-color photo, and Figure 2 is one Photo taken mid-month.

chinese_text: 【大二学生贷款旅游买苹果手机 竟欠款70万！[吃惊]】湖北一大二学生为买苹果6手机、外出旅游，申请网上贷款。随后他拆东墙补西墙，不断贷款还债，最后竟欠下70多万元。催债人员常到学校讨债，他便回老家躲债，不敢回学校。如今其父已帮还了约10万元，其余还待解决。(荆楚网)消费还要量力而行啊！
text: [The sophomore student took out a loan to buy an Apple mobile phone while traveling, but he still owes 700,000 yuan! [Surprised]] Hubei first- and second-year students applied for online loans to buy iPhone 6 mobile phones and travel. Later, he demolished the east wall to pay for the west wall, and continued to take out loans to repay debts. In the end, he owed more than 700,000 yuan. Debt collectors often came to the school to collect debts, so he went back to his hometown to avoid debts and did not dare to return to school. Now his father has repaid about 100,000 yuan, and the rest has yet to be resolved. (Jingchu.com) You still have to consume according to your ability!

chinese_text: 【亚洲最贵城市中国上榜11个 上海居首北京第二[围观]】人力资源咨询机构ECA国际的一项生活成本调查显示，亚太地区外派人员生活成本最高的20个城市中，中国城市超过半数。另，全球外派人员生活成本最高的30个城市中，中国六个城市入围，数量超过瑞士和日本，占比也是最高。http://t.cn/R4z5C1d
text: [China's 11 most expensive cities in Asia are on the list, with Shanghai ranking first and Beijing second [Onlooker]] A cost of living survey by human resources consulting agency ECA International shows that among the 20 cities with the highest cost of living for expatriates in the Asia-Pacific region, Chinese cities More than half. In addition, among the 30 cities with the highest living costs for expatriates in the world, six cities in China are shortlisted, surpassing Switzerland and Japan in number and accounting for the highest proportion. http://t.cn/R4z5C1d

chinese_text: #屠呦呦颁奖典礼#【屠呦呦：获奖是中国科学家的骄傲】屠呦呦在接受专访时表示，青蒿素的获奖是中国科学家集体的荣誉，标志着中医研究科学得到国际科学界的高度关注，是种认可，“我觉得很高兴，这是中国的骄傲也是中国科学家的骄傲。”
text: #TuYouyou Award Ceremony# [Tu Youyou: Winning the award is the pride of Chinese scientists] Tu Youyou said in an exclusive interview that winning the award for artemisinin is a collective honor for Chinese scientists and marks that the science of traditional Chinese medicine research has received great attention from the international scientific community. It is a kind of recognition, "I feel very happy. This is the pride of China and the pride of Chinese scientists."

chinese_text: #健康时间#【晨起第一杯水，你真的会喝吗？】①白开水是最佳选择；②最不推荐淡盐水，特别是高血压、心脑血管疾病患者更不能喝。早晨是人体血压升高的第一个高峰，喝盐水会使血压更高；③蜂蜜水适合便秘人群，不能空腹喝；④空腹喝柠檬水可能会增加胃酸过多人群的胃部不适。第一杯水的讲究↓↓
text: #HealthTime# [Do you really drink the first glass of water in the morning? 】① Plain water is the best choice; ② Light salt water is least recommended, especially for patients with high blood pressure and cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases. Morning is the first peak of blood pressure rise in the human body, and drinking salt water will make blood pressure higher; ③ Honey water is suitable for people with constipation and cannot be drunk on an empty stomach; ④ Drinking lemon water on an empty stomach may increase gastric discomfort in people with excessive gastric acidity. The importance of the first glass of water↓↓

chinese_text: 【[话筒]公安部刑侦局提醒：儿童失踪后立刻报警，无需等24小时】昨日，公安部刑侦局微博提醒，全国公安机关从2011年6月1日起实行儿童失踪快速查找机制，接儿童失踪警情将立即启动查找。目前正研究用信息化手段发动群众提供线索寻找失踪儿童。家长发现儿童失踪请立刻报警，请转给更多人！愿天下无拐！

A search for the missing child will be launched immediately. We are currently studying the use of information technology to mobilize the masses to provide clues to find missing children. If parents discover that a child is missing, please call the police immediately and pass it on to more people! May the world be free of crutches!

chinese_text: 【多地立法明确老年人有权拒绝“啃老” 遇操作难题】目前，江苏、山东等多地立法，明确了老年人有权拒绝年轻人“啃老”的相关规定。但业内人士指出，拒绝“啃老”操作上有难题。一方面老人疼爱子女不舍拒绝；另一方面年轻人收入有限，很大程度上仍需父母的帮助。你认为“啃老族”如何才能有效减少？
text: [Legislation in many places clarifies that the elderly have the right to refuse "gnawing on the elderly" and encounters operational difficulties] Currently, legislation in Jiangsu, Shandong and other places has clarified relevant provisions that the elderly have the right to refuse "gnawing on the elderly" by young people. However, industry insiders pointed out that there are difficulties in refusing to "gnaw at the old". On the one hand, the elderly love their children and refuse them; on the other hand, the young people have limited income and still need the help of their parents to a large extent. What do you think can be done to effectively reduce the number of “eating old people”?

chinese_text: 【今年的带薪年假你休了吗？】带薪休假，是指劳动者依照法律规定，在工作满一定期限后每年享有保留原职和工资的休假。然而据统计，我国的带薪休假真正能够落实的很少。多年来，带薪休假在许多单位和企业，多是停留于纸上的福利。带薪年假，你有休过吗？
text: [Have you taken your paid annual leave this year? 】Paid leave refers to the leave that workers are entitled to each year to retain their original position and salary after working for a certain period in accordance with legal provisions. However, according to statistics, very few paid vacations are actually implemented in our country. For many years, paid leave in many units and enterprises has mostly been a benefit on paper. Have you ever taken paid annual leave?

chinese_text: 【小学生一秒钟跳绳7.3下破两世界纪录 裁判8次慢放才数清[震惊]】近日，在“世界学生跳绳锦标赛”上，广州五年级小学生岑小林，以30秒跳绳220下的成绩，打破两项“单脚单摇”世界纪录。因速度太快，8个国际裁判看慢回放，数了8遍才确认其成绩…… http://t.cn/R47TWas 从头到尾没看到绳子的举手！
text: [A primary school student broke two world records with 7.3 jumps of rope in one second. The referee had to slow down 8 times to count [shock]] Recently, at the "World Student Rope Skipping Championship", Cen Xiaolin, a fifth-grade primary school student in Guangzhou, jumped 220 times in 30 seconds. , breaking two "one-leg, one-swing" world records. Because the speed was too fast, 8 international judges watched the slow replay and counted it 8 times before confirming the score... http://t.cn/R47TWas I didn't see the rope raised from beginning to end!

chinese_text: 【罕见病新药，转基因母鸡造】12月8日，美国食药监局批准了一种用于治疗罕见病的新药。这没有什么，但和药物一同获批的，还有一种经过基因编辑的鸡，药物分子就藏在它们的蛋里。啥，难道以是要把鸡蛋当药吃吗——并不，药物生产者只是会从这种特殊的鸡蛋中提取他们所需的分子。http://t.cn/R47EC0X
text: [New drug for rare diseases, made from genetically modified hens] On December 8, the U.S. Food and Drug Administration approved a new drug for the treatment of rare diseases. It’s nothing, but a type of chicken that has been genetically edited has been approved along with the drug, with the drug molecules hidden in their eggs. What, are eggs supposed to be taken as medicine? No, drug manufacturers will just extract the molecules they need from this special egg. http://t.cn/R47EC0X

chinese_text: 【重庆现百斤野生娃娃鱼 年龄或超200岁[震惊]】近日，重庆市一溶洞内发现一条巨形野生娃娃鱼，体长1.4米，重量约104斤，专家初测年龄可能超过两百岁。娃娃鱼是国家二级保护动物，目前，这条巨型娃娃鱼已被转移到专门地点实施保护，并将针对它开展科研工作。（央视记者牟亮 王宏超）
text: [A hundred-jin wild salamander found in Chongqing may be over 200 years old [Shocking]] Recently, a giant wild salamander was found in a cave in Chongqing, with a body length of 1.4 meters and a weight of about 104 kilograms. Experts initially estimated that the age may be over 200 years old. The giant salamander is a national second-level protected animal. Currently, this giant salamander has been moved to a special location for protection, and scientific research will be carried out on it. (CCTV reporter Mou Liang and Wang Hongchao)

chinese_text: #武汉碰瓷大妈# 近日，武汉惊现一位演技浮夸的碰瓷大妈，离车七八米就开始倒地，见车不过来竟走到车前再次趴下，幸亏360行车记录仪拍下了这一切，车主李女士直接拨打了110：“喂，我要报警！有人躺我车前面了！小编提醒大家，出门在外，小心碰瓷，装个电子眼能省去许多麻烦 。http://t.cn/R4zIGBp
text: #武汉平甲婆# Recently, an aunt with exaggerated acting skills appeared in Wuhan. She started to fall to the ground seven or eight meters away from the car. When she saw that the car was not coming, she walked to the car and fell down again. Fortunately, it was captured on the 360 driving recorder. Noticing all this, the car owner Ms. Li directly dialed 110: "Hey, I want to call the police! Someone is lying in front of my car! The editor reminds everyone, be careful when going out. Installing an electronic eye can save a lot of trouble. http:/ /t.cn/R4zIGBp

chinese_text: 【中国反对安理会审议朝鲜人权】中国常驻联合国副代表王民10日在安理会公开会上阐明了中国反对安理会审议朝鲜人权局势的立场。王民表示，中方一贯反对安理会介入国别人权问题。《联合国宪章》明确规定了联合国各主要机构的职能和分工，安理会不是处理人权问题的场所。http://t.cn/R4zCGBv
text: [China opposes the Security Council’s review of North Korea’s human rights situation] China’s deputy permanent representative to the United Nations, Wang Min, stated China’s position against the Security Council’s review of North Korea’s human rights situation at a public meeting of the Security Council on the 10th. Wang Min said that China has always opposed the involvement of the Security Council in human rights issues of other countries. The Charter of the United Nations clearly stipulates the functions and division of labor of the major organs of the United Nations. The Security Council is not the place to deal with human rights issues. http://t.cn/R4zCGBv

chinese_text: #影响中国年度人物#坐标北京，零雾霾的午后，由中国新闻周刊、中新凯悦传媒集团主办的“影响中国2015年度人物”颁奖典礼如约而至[推荐]直播即将开始，和周刊君一起，坐等@严歌苓 @谭维维 @贾樟柯 施一公 俞可平 霍建华@华杰工作室 等大咖现身吧[爱你]
text: #InfluenceChinaPerson of the Year# Located in Beijing, on a smog-free afternoon, the "Influence China 2015 Person of the Year" award ceremony hosted by China News Weekly and Sino-Singapore Hyatt Media Group has arrived as scheduled [Recommended] The live broadcast is about to begin, and Hezhou Jun Let’s sit back and wait for big names such as @彦哥哓@丹伟伟@佳hangKEShiYigong, Yu Keping, Huo Jianhua@华杰 Studio and others to show up [Love you]

chinese_text: #热点#【见父面不到10分钟 林森浩：现在说什么都没用了】今天中午12点半，复旦投毒案犯林森浩与他的父亲、叔叔等三位家人见面。林父走出法院后说，见面不到10分钟就被中止。林父问儿子换律师、是否投毒等问题，林森浩只重复说：现在说也没用了。详情：http://t.cn/R4zKX2g
text: #hotspot# [It took less than 10 minutes to meet his father, Lin Senhao: It’s useless to say anything now] At 12:30 noon today, Lin Senhao, the Fudan poisoning case convict, met with his father, uncle and three other family members. After Lin's father walked out of the court, he said that the meeting was interrupted within 10 minutes. Lin's father asked his son about changing lawyers, whether he would take drugs, etc. Lin Senhao only repeated: There is no use talking about it now. Details: http://t.cn/R4zKX2g

chinese_text: 造孽啊。//@果壳自然控: 流下了泪水。
text: What a sin. // @ Guoke Natural Control: shed tears.

chinese_text: #正能量#【父亲：儿子问妹妹怎样，我说不出口】许宝宝还有个10岁的哥哥。许先生说，儿子很关心妹妹，天天询问妹妹的病情，“每天都打电话来问‘‘妹妹怎么样了？’我都说不出口。”于是许先生就想做点什么延续女儿的生命，最终决定捐献女儿器官。
text: #正energy# [Father: My son asked me how my sister was doing, but I couldn’t tell her] Xu Baobao also has a 10-year-old brother. Mr. Xu said that his son cared about his sister very much and asked about his sister's condition every day. "I called him every day to ask, 'How is my sister?' I couldn't even say a word." So Mr. Xu wanted to do something to extend his daughter's life. Finally decided to donate her daughter’s organs.

chinese_text: 据《法制晚报》，铁路总局已经表示，12306网站将调整图形验证码中图片的清晰度和分辨率，可能会将错误率较高的图片验证码撤下[doge]本文由十五言科学写作训练专栏“科学人的秘密发动机”孵化而成，欢迎加入。
text: According to the "Legal Evening News", the General Administration of Railways has stated that the 12306 website will adjust the clarity and resolution of the images in the graphic verification code, and may remove the image verification code with a high error rate [doge] This article is written by Shiwuyan Science The training column "The Secret Engine of Scientific People" is hatched. Welcome to join.

chinese_text: 主持人康辉：2015年网络热词——“然并卵”，形象表现出我们面对事时的无力感。幸好，生活中有这么一些人，认清了生活的真相后，依旧热爱生活，他们是推动社会发展的振奋力量，在嘈杂的世界中坚持发出令人鼓舞的理性声音。“影响中国”年度人物颁奖典礼，就是要表彰这样的人[good]#影响中国年度人物#
text: Host Kang Hui: The hot word on the Internet in 2015-"ran and egg", the image shows our powerlessness when facing things. Fortunately, there are some people in life who still love life after recognizing the truth of life. They are the inspiring force that promotes social development and insist on making encouraging voices of reason in a noisy world. The "Influence China" Annual Figure Award Ceremony is to commend such people [good] #Influence China Annual Figure #

chinese_text: #中国人故事#【老人飞机上无法进食 空姐跪地喂饭[心]】8日，郑州飞海南航班，一位老人因患有脑梗无法握勺进食，空姐就跪在老人身边喂他吃饭，说，“您别着急，我来喂您吃吧。”老人被突如其来的关怀触动，因说不清话，他数度哽咽，泣不成声，这一幕被乘客拍下，传上网。http://t.cn/R4zyiGo 感动！
text: #中国人故事# [The old man was unable to eat on the plane and the stewardess knelt down to feed him [heart]] On the 8th, on the flight from Zhengzhou to Hainan, an old man was unable to hold a spoon to eat because of cerebral infarction. The stewardess knelt beside the old man and fed him. , said, "Don't worry, I'll feed you." The old man was touched by the sudden care. Because he couldn't speak clearly, he choked up and burst into tears several times. This scene was photographed by a passenger and posted online. http://t.cn/R4zyiGo Touched!

chinese_text: 【学生跳绳世锦赛一共28枚金牌，中国学生获得27枚】“世界学生跳绳锦标赛”上，一所中国乡村小学，广州花都区七星小学，斩获所有28枚金牌中的27枚！岑小林一人打破两项世界纪录，创下30秒单摇跳单脚110次（原纪录106次），3分钟单摇跳单脚548次（原纪录530次）的新纪录。
text: [A total of 28 gold medals were awarded in the World Student Rope Skipping Championships, and Chinese students won 27] At the "World Student Rope Skipping Championships", a Chinese rural primary school, Qixing Primary School in Huadu District, Guangzhou, won 27 of the 28 gold medals! Cen Xiaolin broke two world records by himself, setting a new record of 110 jumps on one foot in 30 seconds (original record 106 times) and 548 jumps on one foot in 3 minutes (original record 530 times).

chinese_text: 【因思念走失女儿 七旬老人捡垃圾成瘾[伤心]】成都一出租房里堆满了垃圾，78岁的颜大娘住在10平米的小屋内。“这行为已持续了七八年”。大娘曾五度搬家，每住一处都要被垃圾填满。老人说：“我就寻思着捡点垃圾，不然老是琢磨那丢失的女儿…”（成都商报）实际上，老人家的女儿10多年前就走失了。[泪]
text: [A 70-year-old man is addicted to picking up garbage because he misses his lost daughter [Sad]] A rental house in Chengdu is filled with garbage. The 78-year-old Aunt Yan lives in a 10-square-meter hut. "This behavior has been going on for seven or eight years." My aunt moved five times, and every place she lived was filled with garbage. The old man said: "I just want to pick up some rubbish, otherwise I would always think about my lost daughter..." (Chengdu Business News) In fact, the old man's daughter was lost more than 10 years ago. [tears]

chinese_text: #下午茶#好久不见，皮卡丘，你还好吗？[心]
text: #afternoontea#Long time no see, Pikachu, how are you? [Heart]

chinese_text: 【老人飞机上无法进食 空姐喂饭】在郑州飞往海南的航班上，一位河南老人因患有脑梗无法握勺进食，空姐樊雪松跪在老人身边喂他吃饭。老人被这突如其来的关怀触动，由于说不清话，老人泣不成声，这一幕被飞机乘客拍下传上网络。http://t.cn/R4z0bN4
text: [The elderly cannot eat on the plane and the stewardess feeds them] On the flight from Zhengzhou to Hainan, an elderly man from Henan was unable to hold a spoon to eat because of a cerebral infarction. Flight attendant Fan Xuesong knelt beside the old man and fed him. The old man was touched by this sudden concern. Because he could not speak clearly, he burst into tears. This scene was photographed by a passenger on the plane and uploaded to the Internet. http://t.cn/R4z0bN4

chinese_text: #时局#【中国反对联合国讨论朝鲜人权】安理会公开会上，中国常驻联合国副代表王民阐明了中方立场，反对安理会审议朝鲜人权局势，称朝鲜人权局势不构成对国际和平与安全的威胁。详见：http://t.cn/R4zSJf9 最终9票赞成、4票反对、2票弃权，常任理事国无否决权，安理会决定将朝鲜局势列入临时议程
text: #时时# [China opposes the United Nations’ discussion of North Korea’s human rights] At a public meeting of the Security Council, China’s Deputy Permanent Representative to the United Nations Wang Min clarified China’s position and opposed the Security Council’s review of the human rights situation in North Korea, saying that the human rights situation in North Korea did not constitute a threat to international peace and security. . For details, see: http://t.cn/R4zSJf9 In the end, 9 votes were in favor, 4 were against, and 2 abstained. The permanent members did not have veto power. The Security Council decided to include the situation in North Korea on the provisional agenda.

chinese_text: 【林森浩被问是否投毒：现在说没用了 父子见面不到十分钟】林森浩11日与父亲见面，但不到10分钟就被中止。对于是否投毒等问题，林只重复说：现在说也没用了。林父称对死刑判决的抗诉程序，必需有死刑复核裁定书才能启动，但裁定书至今尚未送达。详情戳→ http://t.cn/R4z0qMp
text: [Lin Senhao was asked if he was a poisoner: now he says it’s useless. It took less than ten minutes for the father and son to meet.] Lin Senhao met with his father on the 11th, but it was suspended within 10 minutes. Regarding questions such as whether to poison or not, Lin only repeated: It is useless to say now. Lin's father said that the protest process against the death sentence requires a death penalty review ruling, but the ruling has not yet been delivered. Click for details → http://t.cn/R4z0qMp

chinese_text: #安全文明出行#【[话筒]转发倡议：远光灯，别！乱！用！】近日，四川一辆出租车一头撞上一名带孩子的妇女，原因竟是对向车道车辆乱用远光灯！你知道吗？远光灯会让对面司机"瞬间致盲"，因远光灯造成的事故时有发生，曾有司机乱用远光灯致行人被撞死……你被远光灯晃过吗？合理使用远光灯，支持请转！
text: #SafeCivilizedTravel# [[Microphone] Forward suggestion: High beam, no! chaos! use! 】Recently, a taxi in Sichuan hit a woman with her child. The reason was that the vehicle in the opposite lane was using high beams indiscriminately! do you know? High-beam lights can "instantly blind" drivers on the opposite side. Accidents caused by high-beam lights occur from time to time. A driver has used high-beam lights indiscriminately, causing a pedestrian to be hit and killed... Have you been flashed by high-beam lights? Use high beams rationally, please support!

chinese_text: #快讯#【“复旦大学医学院学生投毒案”罪犯林森浩被执行死刑】行刑之前，上海市第二中级人民法院依法安排林森浩与其父亲林尊耀等亲属进行了会见。11日下午，上海市第二中级人民法院遵照最高人民法院院长签发的执行死刑命令，将罪犯林森浩执行死刑。
text: # express# [Lin Senhao, the criminal in the "Fudan University Medical School Student Poisoning Case" was executed] Before the execution, the Shanghai Second Intermediate People's Court arranged for Lin Senhao, his father Lin Zunyao and other relatives to meet with him in accordance with the law. On the afternoon of the 11th, the Shanghai No. 2 Intermediate People's Court followed the execution order issued by the President of the Supreme People's Court and executed the criminal Lin Senhao.

chinese_text: 【林森浩被执行死刑】新华社消息，“复旦大学医学院学生投毒案”罪犯林森浩被执行死刑。据悉，行刑之前，依法安排林森浩与其父亲林尊耀等亲属进行了会见。今天下午，上海市二中院遵照最高人民法院院长签发的执行死刑命令，将罪犯林森浩执行死刑。
text: [Lin Senhao was executed] Xinhua News Agency reported that Lin Senhao, the criminal in the "Fudan University Medical School Student Poisoning Case", was executed. It is reported that before the execution, meetings between Lin Senhao, his father Lin Zunyao and other relatives were arranged in accordance with the law. This afternoon, the Shanghai No. 2 Intermediate People's Court executed the criminal Lin Senhao in compliance with the execution order issued by the President of the Supreme People's Court.

chinese_text: #复旦投毒#【故意杀人犯林森浩被执行死刑】据最高人民法院消息，今日，"复旦大学医学院学生投毒案"罪犯林森浩，被依法执行死刑。行刑前，法院依法安排林森浩与其亲属进行了会见。2013年4月，复旦大学医学院发生投毒案，在校研究生黄洋死亡，经侦查确认投毒者系黄洋同寝室同学林森浩。(央视记者李文杰)
text: #fudanpoison# [Intentional murderer Lin Senhao was executed] According to the Supreme People's Court, today, Lin Senhao, the criminal in the "Fudan University Medical School Student Poisoning Case", was executed in accordance with the law. Before the execution, the court arranged for a meeting with Lin Senhao and his relatives in accordance with the law. In April 2013, a poisoning case occurred at Fudan University School of Medicine. Graduate student Huang Yang died. Investigation confirmed that the poisoner was Lin Senhao, Huang Yang's dormitory classmate. (CCTV reporter Li Wenjie)

chinese_text: 【林森浩已被执行死刑】复旦投毒案凶手林森浩被执行死刑。2013年4月，复旦大学研究生林森浩在饮水机内投毒，致室友黄洋中毒身亡。（新华社）http://t.cn/R4zOtH5
text: [Lin Senhao has been executed] Lin Senhao, the murderer of the Fudan poisoning case, has been executed. In April 2013, Lin Senhao, a graduate student at Fudan University, poisoned a drinking fountain, causing his roommate Huang Yang to die. (Xinhua News Agency) http://t.cn/R4zOtH5

chinese_text: 【墨西哥头号大毒枭宣战IS：将给你们真正的恐怖】墨西哥在逃越狱大毒枭古斯曼向“ISIS”恐怖组织宣战， 缘由是“ISIS”摧毁其船运毒品。宣言写道：“如果你们选择继续影响我的生意，我将给你们带来真正的恐怖……如果继续干涉锡那罗亚集团的事务，我们将奉陪到底！”http://t.cn/R4zOWEd
text: [Mexico’s top drug lord declares war on IS: He will give you real terror] Mexico’s escaped drug lord Guzman declared war on the “ISIS” terrorist organization because “ISIS” destroyed its drug shipments. The declaration read: "If you choose to continue to influence my business, I will bring real terror to you... If you continue to interfere in the affairs of the Sinaloa Group, we will stay with you until the end!" http://t.cn/ R4zOWEd

chinese_text: 【林森浩临刑前专访】央视正播放“林森浩被执行死刑前专访”，视频直播间：http://t.cn/R4zO1uE
text: [Exclusive interview with Lin Senhao before execution] CCTV is broadcasting "Exclusive interview with Lin Senhao before execution", live video room: http://t.cn/R4zO1uE

chinese_text: 有些火腿、肉丸确实能做到几乎没啥肉，人家有专属名词，叫“仿生食品”。若有人拿没肉的肉丸当有肉的卖给你，那是诚信问题。但说“没肉的丸子都有害”？那可不对了：http://t.cn/zRToAZn 没肉怎么啦，营养均衡味道也好，你们少吃啦？
text: Some hams and meatballs can indeed be made with almost no meat. They have their own term called "bionic food". If someone sells you meatless meatballs as meatballs, that's a matter of integrity. But saying "meatless meatballs are harmful"? That's not right: http://t.cn/zRToAZn What's the matter without meat? It's nutritionally balanced and tastes good. Are you eating less?

chinese_text: 【汉口火车站大面积晚点 列车上老人小孩出现缺氧症状】网友爆料：因线路故障，有列车停留在武汉站数小时。车上部分老人小孩出现缺氧，小孩一直在哭，老人无法正常说话脸色惨白。期间列车员未打开车门，并禁止所有乘客下车。@武铁汉口火车站 称，途经汉口站的多趟列车因故晚点，正对故障进行紧急抢修。
text: [Old people and children on the delayed trains at Hankou Railway Station suffered from hypoxia symptoms] Netizens broke the news: Due to a line failure, some trains were stuck at Wuhan Station for several hours. Some elderly and children in the car suffered from hypoxia. The children kept crying, and the elderly could not speak normally and looked pale. During this period, the conductor did not open the door and prohibited all passengers from getting off the train. @WRTHankou Railway Station stated that many trains passing through Hankou Station were delayed for some reason, and emergency repairs were being carried out to repair the faults.

chinese_text: 【和TA坐在“飞机机顶”看风景，你想试试吗？】飞机顶部装着透明观景罩，罩内设两个座椅，乘客可操纵坐椅转动，毫无遮拦看空中美景…近日，美国一家公司计划设计360度观景罩，可装在商业航班上。设计师表示，观景罩涂有防紫外线材料，能承受飞鸟撞击。
text: [Sitting on the "top of the plane" with him and watching the scenery. Do you want to try it? 】A transparent viewing cover is installed on the top of the aircraft. There are two seats inside the cover. Passengers can rotate the seats and enjoy the beautiful scenery in the sky without any obstruction... Recently, a US company plans to design a 360-degree viewing cover that can be installed on commercial flights. . Designers say the viewing cover is coated with anti-UV material and can withstand impacts from flying birds.

text: 【How to use high beam correctly? 】① Slowing down the vehicle speed at night is more beneficial to safety than turning on the high beam headlights ② If the lighting conditions are good, do not use the high beam headlights ③ When encountering poorly lit roads, use high and low beam lights alternately ④ Check the light status frequently to avoid accidental Turn on the high beam in the middle ⑤ Disable the high beam in foggy weather ⑥ The SUV body is tall, so the headlight angle should be lowered. Spread the word!

The charging standards may be determined based on actual traffic flow and pollution conditions, and dynamically adjusted based on the congestion index and pollution index. http://t.cn/R4Zhu8R

chinese_text: 生活中，偶尔遇到艰难，要时刻告诫自己：①失败的人，是热度只有五分钟的人；成功的人，往往是坚持到最后的人；②粗者与人斗力，愚者与人斗气，慧者与人斗智；③与其用力气做事，不如用智慧做事。努力向前，生活必将会变得更加美好！又到新的一天，周六早安！[浮云]
text: In life, when you encounter difficulties occasionally, you should always remind yourself: ① Those who fail are those who only have five minutes of enthusiasm; successful people are often those who persist to the end; ② The rough will fight with others, and the fool will fight with others. , wise people compete with others for their wits; ③ Instead of using strength to do things, it is better to use wisdom to do things. Work hard and life will become better! It’s a new day, good Saturday morning! [Floating clouds]

chinese_text: 【动态图告诉你：为什么冬天加油时要防静电？！】现在很多加油站推出了自助加油服务，但因为冬天易产生静电，如果操作不当，可能会引发火灾！你知道正确的操作步骤吗？提醒：加油前，切记用手触摸金属将静电释放，加油过程中，手不要离开加油枪，以免再次产生静电…为生命安全，转！
text: [Dynamic picture tells you: Why do you need to prevent static electricity when refueling in winter? ! 】Many gas stations have now launched self-service refueling services, but because static electricity is easily generated in winter, if not operated properly, it may cause a fire! Do you know the correct steps? Reminder: Before refueling, remember to touch metal with your hands to release static electricity. During the refueling process, do not leave your hands off the refueling gun to avoid generating static electricity again... For life safety, turn!

chinese_text: 【请为暴雪中的他们点赞[求关注]】据测算，新疆乌鲁木齐昨日降雪量达到1951年有气象记录以来冬季单日降雪极值。今天凌晨四点半，气温零下5摄氏度，降雪还在持续，环卫工人们趁夜里车少，抓紧时间清雪，为天亮后大家出行提供方便。你愿意为辛苦的环卫工们点赞吗？（央视记者信任）
text: [Please like them in the blizzard [please pay attention]] According to estimates, yesterday’s snowfall in Urumqi, Xinjiang reached the highest single-day winter snowfall since meteorological records began in 1951. At 4:30 this morning, the temperature was minus 5 degrees Celsius, and the snow continued to fall. Sanitation workers took advantage of the lack of traffic at night to clear the snow to facilitate everyone's travel after dawn. Would you like to praise the hard-working sanitation workers? (Trusted by CCTV reporters)

chinese_text: 【水电站员工发现遗体挟尸要价打捞费】少女失踪，家属四处寻找并报警。遗体被水电站员工发现，并没有第一时间报警，而是找到家属索要打捞费。家属看到尸体仅一条腿被一根麻绳拴起来，身体其余部分浸泡在渠水中。“耽误了警方的最佳破案时间。”张师傅说，邓某的行为就是挟尸要价。http://t.cn/R4Z2X9P
text: [Hydropower station employees found the body and demanded salvage fees.] The girl went missing, and her family searched for her and called the police. The body was discovered by a hydropower station employee. Instead of calling the police immediately, he approached his family and asked for salvage fees. The family members saw that only one leg of the body was tied up with a hemp rope, and the rest of the body was soaked in the canal water. "It delayed the best time for the police to solve the case." Master Zhang said that Deng's behavior was to hold the body and demand a price. http://t.cn/R4Z2X9P

text: #来伦# [There is a new species called internet celebrity] Commercial power dominates the internet celebrity industry chain. Everything about them, including their bodies and lives, can be presented in front of the camera as long as it has commercial value. The most fundamental reason why Internet celebrities have become an iconic new species is the commercial operation pipeline behind them-they can be copied. The body can be copied, and so can the body's working patterns. http://t.cn/R4z2TK8

chinese_text: 【林海雪原 玉树琼花】 连日的大雾天气过后，内蒙古托克托县出现了大片雾凇奇观。一向以枯黄为底色的冬天仿佛披上了一件晶莹剔透的外套。阳光洒过，又像给这片树林化上淡妆。戳图，带你走进雾凇深处！（央视记者阮超超 薄书宁）

Click on the picture to take you deep into the rime! (CCTV reporter Ruan Chaoshuo Shuning)

chinese_text: 【[话筒]大红枣四毛钱一斤没人要……帮转找销路！】被誉为中国红枣之乡的山西吕梁临县，今年红枣产量超过4亿斤，但是枣农们却怎么也高兴不起来。由于市场不景气，这些枣遭遇大面积滞销，低至四、五毛也没人收。再找不到买家，农民们只能眼看着辛苦种出的枣子烂在地里……扩散！都不容易，帮帮他们！
text: [[Microphone] No one wants big red dates for 40 cents a pound...Help find a market! 】Lin County, Luliang, Shanxi Province, known as the hometown of red dates in China, has produced more than 400 million kilograms of red dates this year, but the date farmers are never happy. Due to the sluggish market, these dates were largely unsalable, with no one taking them for as low as 40 to 50 cents. No longer able to find buyers, farmers can only watch as the dates they worked so hard to grow rot in the fields... and spread! It’s not easy, help them!

chinese_text: #知政#【《居住证暂行条例》发布 明年起实施】近日，国务院总理李克强签署第663号国务院令，公布《居住证暂行条例》，《条例》将于2016年1月1日起施行。根据《条例》，居住证持有人可享受义务教育、基本公共就业服务等九项基本公共服务和办理出入境证件、机动车登记等七项便利。http://t.cn/R4ZUSlm
text: #知正# [The "Interim Regulations on Residence Permits" are promulgated and will come into effect next year] Recently, Premier Li Keqiang signed State Council Order No. 663, announcing the "Interim Regulations on Residence Permits", which will come into effect on January 1, 2016. According to the Regulations, residence permit holders can enjoy nine basic public services, including compulsory education and basic public employment services, and seven conveniences, including handling entry and exit documents and motor vehicle registration. http://t.cn/R4ZUSlm

chinese_text: 【[话筒]转发！一起为这18名孩子寻亲！】公安部公布，在今年的打拐专项行动中，通过DNA比对，全国找回440多名被拐卖儿童，目前他们大多回到了亲人身边。但图中这18名孩子至今仍未寻到父母！有的已被解救近9年！他们的父母也许还在焦急地寻找[泪]又快过年了，此刻，一起传递，帮这些被拐孩子回家吧！
text: [[Microphone] Forward! Let’s find relatives for these 18 children together! 】The Ministry of Public Security announced that in this year’s special anti-trafficking operation, more than 440 trafficked children were recovered across the country through DNA comparison. Most of them have now returned to their relatives. But the 18 children in the picture have still not found their parents! Some have been rescued for nearly 9 years! Their parents may still be anxiously looking for [tears] The Chinese New Year is coming soon. At this moment, let’s pass it along and help these abducted children go home!

Previously, Lin Senhao had wanted to donate his body, but Lin's father said he would not do so and would take his son's ashes back to his hometown for burial.

chinese_text: #居住证暂行条例#【如何申领居住证？】符合申领条件的申请人向居住地公安派出所或受公安机关委托的社区服务机构提交本人居民身份证、本人相片以及居住地住址、就业、就读等证明材料。未满16周岁的未成年人和行动不便的老年人、残疾人等，可以由其监护人、近亲属代为申领居住证。
text: # Residence Permit Interim Regulations# [How to apply for a residence permit? 】Applicants who meet the application conditions must submit their resident ID cards, photos, and supporting documents such as residential address, employment, and schooling to the public security police station in their place of residence or the community service agency entrusted by the public security organ. Minors under the age of 16, elderly people with limited mobility, disabled people, etc. can have their guardians or close relatives apply for a residence permit on their behalf.

text: [A major traffic accident on the Baomao Expressway in Sichuan has killed 9 people [Candle]] At around 9:20 a.m., a truck carrying cattle hit the central isolation belt in the Dazhou-Chongqing section of the G65 Baomao Expressway, heading from Dazhou to Chongqing. A passenger car was unable to avoid the incident and rushed out of the guardrail. At present, the traffic law enforcement brigade, highway traffic police, and medical staff have rushed to the scene. The accident resulted in 9 deaths and others were seriously injured.

text: [Today, let’s re-read this hero’s #久久家书#] In 1938, Yuan Guoping went to southern Anhui to command the New Fourth Army to conduct guerrilla operations deep behind enemy lines with Ye Ting and Xiang Ying. During this period, he wrote a letter home: "I am willing to contribute to the country and the nation with my last drop of blood." In the "Southern Anhui Incident" in 1941, Yuan Guoping committed suicide by drinking bullets and died heroically in order not to injure his comrades to break through. Re-read the family letters of the Anti-Japanese War and pay tribute to the heroes: http://t.cn/R4ZMTRI (CCTV reporter Ma Li)

chinese_text: 【四六级写作5C法 为作文加分！】①Clear：字大小适中，段首缩进，易辨认②Complete：根据汉字提示按序分段，不遗漏要点，也方便阅卷③Correct：保证语言正确，再求闪光④Coherent：先总后分，用上连词⑤Concise：论据得当，不啰嗦。学起！
text: [The 5C method of writing for Level 4 and Level 6 will add extra points to your composition! 】①Clear: Moderate word size, indentation at the beginning of paragraphs, easy to identify ②Complete: Divide into paragraphs in order according to Chinese character prompts, not missing key points, and convenient for marking ③Correct: Make sure the language is correct, and then focus on flash ④Coherent: Summarize first and then divide, use conjunctions ⑤Concise: The arguments are sound and not wordy. Start learning!

For the safety of yourself and others, please use the high beam correctly. http://t.cn/R4Zioez

text: [A woman was diagnosed with cancer after drinking self-grinded soy milk for 3 years and her estrogen levels were several times higher [surprise]] A 45-year-old woman from Ningbo, who is very particular about health care and grinds her own soy milk every morning for three years, was diagnosed with breast cancer. The examination showed that this woman’s estrogen was several times higher than normal. Doctors remind: It is indeed good to drink soy milk in moderation, but for women with high estrogen levels, it is not advisable to drink too much.

chinese_text: #二手时间# 苏联解体已逾二十年，崭新的俄罗斯出现了，但却早已不是任何人曾梦想过的俄罗斯了。2015诺贝尔文学奖得主S.A.阿列克谢耶维奇在最新力作《二手时间》中通过口述采访的形式，讲述了在二十年痛苦的社会转型中，俄罗斯普通人的生活，为梦想破碎付出的代价，以及如何重新寻找生活的意义。
text: #secondhandtime# It has been more than twenty years since the collapse of the Soviet Union. A new Russia has emerged, but it is no longer the Russia that anyone had dreamed of. In his latest masterpiece "Second-hand Time", 2015 Nobel Prize winner SA Alexievich uses oral interviews to tell the story of the lives of ordinary people in Russia during the two decades of painful social transformation and the sacrifices they made for their shattered dreams. The cost, and how to rediscover the meaning of life.

chinese_text: 【学校放学晚10分钟 家长翻墙入校打伤校长[衰]】近日，湖北罗田黄岗庙中学400余学生下午整队放学时，花了十多分钟，铁门外两名家长认为等待时间过长，便猛烈摇晃学校大门。校长上前制止，两人竟从旁边的矮墙翻入，对校长实行殴打。目前涉事家长已被刑拘。网友：这家长当的，也不教孩子好啊......[挖鼻]
text: [The school ended 10 minutes late. Parents climbed over the wall and entered the school and injured the principal [bad]] Recently, it took more than 10 minutes for more than 400 students from Huanggangmiao Middle School in Luotian, Hubei to finish school in the afternoon. Two parents outside the iron gate thought the waiting time was too long. , and violently shook the school door. The principal stepped forward to stop him, but the two men climbed in from the nearby low wall and beat the principal. The parents involved have been detained. Netizen: This parent is rich and doesn’t teach his children well...[picking nose]

chinese_text: 【公安副局长在朋友圈批评一国两制被指妄议中央】吴某，某市公安局副局长，中共党员。浏览朋友圈时，他分享了关于一国两制文章，并罔顾一国两制政策出台背景与实际，发表评论大肆抨击、公然否定。吴某社会关系广，其观点被广泛转发影响恶劣http://t.cn/R4LrbRz党员能在朋友圈妄议中央大政方针吗？
text: [The deputy director of public security criticized the one country, two systems in a circle of friends and was accused of making irresponsible remarks about the central government] Wu, deputy director of a certain city’s public security bureau, is a member of the Communist Party of China. While browsing Moments, he shared an article about one country, two systems, and ignored the background and reality of the one country, two systems policy, making comments to criticize and blatantly deny it. Wu has wide social connections, and his views have been widely forwarded and had a bad impact http://t.cn/R4LrbRzCan party members make irresponsible remarks on the central government's policies in their circle of friends?

chinese_text: 【转发送送这位善良的老人[泪]】韦老助学的善款，从90年代一次三四百，到现在的三四千。仅他家人简单整理的凭证，大大小小就有数十张。老人甚至还签了志愿表，愿捐赠遗体和所有可用器官。老人的家人说：“他过着苦行僧一样的生活，我们很多年轻人都很惭愧。”转发送送韦老……
text: [Forward this kind old man [tears]] Mr. Wei’s donations for student aid have increased from three to four hundred at a time in the 1990s to three to four thousand now. There are dozens of vouchers that his family simply compiled, large and small. The old man even signed a volunteer form and was willing to donate his body and all available organs. The old man's family said: "He lives like an ascetic, and many of us young people are ashamed." Forward to Mr. Wei...

chinese_text: 【蔡振华：用10到20年将国足水平提升到一流水准】足协主席蔡振华今日表示，准备用10到20年实现足球发展的长期目标，将中国男足的水平提升到亚洲一流水准。“我相信，通过努力，在不远的将来，我们能进入世界杯16强；国家队在国际足联排名逐步提升到世界前30名。”(央视记者赵继哲)
text: [Cai Zhenhua: It will take 10 to 20 years to raise the level of the national football team to the first-class level] Football Association Chairman Cai Zhenhua said today that he is prepared to use 10 to 20 years to achieve the long-term goal of football development and raise the level of the Chinese men's football team to the first-class level in Asia. "I believe that through hard work, we can enter the top 16 of the World Cup in the near future; the national team will gradually improve its FIFA ranking to the top 30 in the world." (CCTV reporter Zhao Jizhe)

chinese_text: #微镜头#【看！云雾在漂流[雾]】昨天清晨，重庆龙水湖迎来难得一见的云雾漂流景观。云雾随风漂流，波起峰涌，若隐若现。龙水湖是50年代末修建的中型水库，形态殊异的108个小岛点缀湖中，在漂流的云雾映衬下形成山朦胧、水朦胧的独特景观。戳图↓感受迷人画卷。(央视记者王宏超) http://t.cn/R4yClen
text: #Microlens# [Look! Clouds and mist are drifting [fog]] Yesterday morning, Longshui Lake in Chongqing ushered in a rare sight of cloud and mist drifting. The clouds and mist drifted with the wind, rising in waves and looming. Longshui Lake is a medium-sized reservoir built in the late 1950s. 108 small islands of different shapes dot the lake, forming a unique landscape of hazy mountains and hazy water against the backdrop of drifting clouds and mists. Click on the picture ↓ to experience the charming picture. (CCTV reporter Wang Hongchao) http://t.cn/R4yClen

chinese_text: #热点#【最高法罕见谈聂树斌案：要舆论监督 勿舆论审判】14日，山东高院第三次延长聂树斌案复查期限。最高法称，一些“拿正义说事”的评论，预设了聂案是冤案的前提，要求早日宣判聂树斌无罪，这是典型的舆论审判。舆论监督可以追问真相，但不应该对案件结果作出先入为主的判断。http://t.cn/R4y9m60
text: #hotspot# [The Supreme Court rarely talks about the Nie Shubin case: Public opinion supervision is required, not trial by public opinion] On the 14th, the Shandong High Court extended the review period for the Nie Shubin case for the third time. The Supreme Court stated that some comments that "speak of justice" presuppose that Nie's case is an unjust case and demand that Nie Shubin be acquitted as soon as possible. This is a typical trial of public opinion. Public opinion supervision can seek the truth, but it should not make preconceived judgments about the outcome of the case. http://t.cn/R4y9m60

text: #万搏# [A deputy public security director in Fujian was accused of smashing a nightclub] Recently, some netizens broke the news that Lin Qingbiao, director of the Pingtan Forest Public Security Bureau, the director of the Dongao Health Center and others gathered in the nightclub box to cause trouble, smashed and destroyed the TV in the box, etc. equipment, pulled his coat over his head and left. The local Commission for Discipline Inspection said it had received the report and was investigating. An appointment and removal notice in July this year showed that Lin Qingbiao was the deputy director of the Forestry Public Security Bureau. http://t.cn/R4yym27

chinese_text: #那年今日#【杨绛忆钱钟书】“见面时，他第一句话就是‘我没有订婚’，我则紧张地回答‘我也没男朋友’。于是开始鸿雁往来，越写越勤，一天一封。他放假回家，我难受了多时。冷静下来觉得不好，这是fall in love了……”1998年的今天，钱钟书离世。杨绛叹：“我们失散了。”怀念钱老，为世界留下智言。
text: #that年DAY# [Yang Jiang Yi Qian Zhongshu] "When we met, the first thing he said was 'I'm not engaged', and I nervously replied 'I don't have a boyfriend either'. So we started to correspond, and the more we wrote, the more Qian Zhongshu passed away on this day in 1998. Qian Zhongshu passed away. Yang Jiang sighed: "We are separated." Missing Mr. Qian and leaving his wise words to the world.

chinese_text: #微感动#【爸爸在哪家就在哪[心]】母亲病逝，父亲脑梗瘫痪，年幼的她扛下照顾重担。带着父亲上学，给父亲喂水喂饭、搓背按摩，再赶去上课，晚上安顿父亲后继续学习…生活辛苦她无怨。她说：“爸爸在哪家就在哪！”在她照顾下父亲已能倚靠拐杖迈步！广西18岁女孩陈春林孝心是天[赞]http://t.cn/R426hYR
text: #微touch# [Wherever my father is, he will be there [heart]] Her mother died of illness and her father was paralyzed due to cerebral infarction. She shouldered the burden of care at a young age. She takes her father to school, gives him water and food, rubs his back and massages, and then rushes to class. After settling her father down in the evening, she continues to study... She has no complaints about the hard life. She said: "Daddy is at home wherever he is!" Under her care, my father can already walk with the help of crutches! Chen Chunlin, an 18-year-old girl from Guangxi, has a filial piety [like] http://t.cn/R426hYR

chinese_text: #早安中国#在人的一生，有些细微之事，本身毫无意义可言，却具有极大的重要性。事过境迁之后，回顾其因果关系，却发现其影响之大，殊可惊人。——林语堂《京华烟云》
text: #GoodMorningChina# In a person's life, some small things are meaningless in themselves, but they are of great importance. After things have changed, looking back on the cause and effect relationship, we find that the impact is astonishing. ——Lin Yutang's "Smoke and Clouds of Beijing"

chinese_text: 【做实验，这些安全事项你要知道！】18日上午，清华大学一实验室发生火灾爆炸事故，造成一名博士后实验人员死亡，事故原因还在调查中。化学实验过程往往伴随危险，如何防毒、防爆、防灼伤、防火、防电……化学实验的注意事项得知道。为安全，转发！
text: [When doing experiments, you need to know these safety matters! ] On the morning of the 18th, a fire and explosion occurred in a laboratory at Tsinghua University, killing a postdoctoral researcher. The cause of the accident is still under investigation. The process of chemical experiments is often accompanied by dangers. How to prevent poisons, explosions, burns, fires, and electricity... you need to know the precautions for chemical experiments. Repost for safety!

chinese_text: #历史上的今天#【钱钟书说】围在城里的人想逃出来，城外的人想冲进去，对婚姻也罢，职业也罢，人生的愿望大都如此不受教育的人，因为不识字上人的当；受教育的人，因为识了字上印刷品的当一个人，到了20岁还不狂，这个人是没出息的；到了30岁还狂，也是没出息的。今天，先生逝世17周年，怀念！
text: #historytoday# [Qian Zhongshu said] People who are surrounded by the city want to escape, and people outside the city want to rush in. Whether it is marriage or career, most of the aspirations in life are like this for uneducated people, because they do not People who are literate are deceived; educated people, because they are literate and print, are not promising if they are not crazy at the age of 20; they are hopeless if they are crazy at the age of 30. Today is the 17th anniversary of my husband’s death. I miss you so much!
