chinese_text: 如果你有才华，就去追求大梦想；如果你觉得自己的能力有限，才华也不够支撑起你的野心，那就安静下来，扎进小的失败和挫折中，汲取营养。请记得： 如果需要反省，一定不是在梦想上下功夫，徘徊不定，而是要在才华上卧薪尝胆，反思它为什么不能日渐丰满。早安！[心]
text: If you have talent, pursue big dreams; if you feel that your abilities are limited and your talent is not enough to support your ambitions, then calm down and dive into small failures and setbacks to gain nourishment. Please remember: If you need to reflect, it must not be to work hard on your dream and hesitate, but to work hard on your talent and reflect on why it cannot become more and more full. Good morning! [Heart]

chinese_text: 【[话筒]注意，霾又来了！】中央气象台今天6时发布霾黄色预警：今天8时到明天8时，北京中南部、天津西部、河北中南部、河南北部、山西中南部、山东西部、东北地区中部等地有中度霾，局地重度霾。23日起霾将自北向南逐渐减弱或消散。相关区域朋友注意防范，尽量减少室外活动。扩散！（央视记者任梅梅）
text: [[Microphone] Attention, the haze is coming again! 】The Central Meteorological Observatory issued a yellow haze warning at 6 o'clock today: From 8 o'clock today to 8 o'clock tomorrow, there will be moderate haze in central and southern Beijing, western Tianjin, central and southern Hebei, northern Henan, central and southern Shanxi, western Shandong, and central Northeast China. Severe local haze. From the 23rd, the haze will gradually weaken or dissipate from north to south. Friends in relevant areas should take precautions and minimize outdoor activities. diffusion! (CCTV reporter Ren Meimei)

chinese_text: 【黄奇帆：P2P金融“像开赌场”】重庆市长黄奇帆素有“金融市长”之称，被认为是熟谙财经的专家型官员。他并不看好快速兴起的P2P，去年底，重庆就暂停了P2P网贷公司的审批。他称，P2P平台就像开赌场，只是提供牌和桌子。对于监管问题，他发问，“谁在监管？谁能监管？怎么监管？”http://t.cn/R4yXJi0
text: [Huang Qifan: P2P finance is “like a casino”] Chongqing Mayor Huang Qifan is known as the “Financial Mayor” and is considered an expert official who is familiar with finance. He is not optimistic about the rapid rise of P2P. At the end of last year, Chongqing suspended the approval of P2P online lending companies. He said that P2P platforms are like opening casinos, only providing cards and tables. Regarding the issue of supervision, he asked, "Who is supervising? Who can supervise? How to supervise?" http://t.cn/R4yXJi0

chinese_text: 【[话筒]注意，霾又来了！】中央气象台今天6时发布霾黄色预警：今天8时到明天8时，北京中南部、天津西部、河北中南部、河南北部、山西中南部、山东西部、东北中部等地有中度霾，局地重度霾。23日起霾将自北向南逐渐减弱或消散。相关区域朋友注意防范，尽量减少室外活动。（央视）http://t.cn/R4yRmQs
text: [[Microphone] Attention, the haze is coming again! 】The Central Meteorological Observatory issued a yellow haze warning at 6 o'clock today: From 8 o'clock today to 8 o'clock tomorrow, there will be moderate haze in central and southern Beijing, western Tianjin, central and southern Hebei, northern Henan, central and southern Shanxi, western Shandong, and central Northeast China. The ground is heavily hazy. From the 23rd, the haze will gradually weaken or dissipate from north to south. Friends in relevant areas should take precautions and minimize outdoor activities. (CCTV) http://t.cn/R4yRmQs

chinese_text: 【雨雪天行车入弯 车速多少才安全】雨雪道路上多数人会减速慢行，可车速多少才算安全？近日韩国交通部门实验发现，以80km/h入弯车辆偏离车道不受控制；40km/h入弯后轮还是打滑，但能较好控制车辆。因此，在拐弯路面湿滑的情况下，记得把时速控制在40公里以下，扩散提醒！http://t.cn/R4yE5J6
text: [What is the safe speed when driving in rainy and snowy weather?] Most people will slow down on rainy and snowy roads, but what is the safest speed? A recent experiment by the Korean transportation department found that a vehicle entering a corner at 80km/h could deviate from the lane without control; the rear wheel would still slip when entering a corner at 40km/h, but the vehicle could be better controlled. Therefore, when turning on slippery roads, remember to control the speed below 40 kilometers per hour, spread the word! http://t.cn/R4yE5J6

chinese_text: 【清华博士后火灾遇难 母亲乡音哭喊】昨日，清华大学何添楼231室（化学系实验室）发生火灾，致博士后孟祥见身亡。其弟弟称他们是农户家庭，母亲卖鸡蛋供儿子读书。孟曾到新加坡南洋大学攻读博士，在那里工作供弟弟读博。事发前一晚孟致电家中称下周将赴南京某大学签约任教。http://t.cn/R4yEWJR
text: [The mother of a Tsinghua postdoctoral fellow who died in a fire is crying in the local accent] Yesterday, a fire broke out in Room 231 of the Hetian Building (Department of Chemistry Laboratory) at Tsinghua University, resulting in the death of postdoctoral fellow Meng Xiang. His younger brother said they were a farming family and the mother sold eggs for her son to study. Meng once went to Nanyang University in Singapore to study for a PhD, and worked there to support his younger brother's PhD studies. The night before the incident, Meng called her home and said she would go to a university in Nanjing to sign a contract to teach next week. http://t.cn/R4yEWJR

chinese_text: 【23年前杀人放火疑案 23年后开庭再审】1992年，海南海口发生一起杀人焚尸案。29岁的陈满被锁定为凶手，获判死缓，随后陈满坚称蒙冤上诉。今年初，最高检复查认为"事实不清，证据不足"提出抗诉。本月底这起案件将开庭再审。时隔23年，案件为何要重审？陈满在审讯中又经历了什么？http://t.cn/R4yqLt1
text: [A murder and arson case 23 years ago was retried 23 years later] In 1992, a murder and corpse-burning case occurred in Haikou, Hainan. 29-year-old Chen Man was identified as the murderer and received a suspended death sentence. Chen Man later appealed, insisting that he had been wronged. At the beginning of this year, the Supreme People's Procuratorate reviewed the case and argued that the facts were unclear and the evidence was insufficient. The case will be retried at the end of this month. After 23 years, why does the case need to be retried? What did Chen Man experience during the interrogation? http://t.cn/R4yqLt1

chinese_text: 【32岁博士后身亡 母亲卖蛋供其上学】据悉，死者系清华大学理学院化学系博士后孟祥见。孟是安徽萧县人，家中长子，有一弟一妹，弟弟也是博士，父母均为农民。孟的朋友说，孟一路苦读，刚进清华做博士后1年，下周就要到南京签约任教。目前事故原因正在调查中。http://t.cn/R4ylOUW
text: [A 32-year-old postdoctoral fellow died and his mother sold eggs to support his education] It is reported that the deceased was Meng Xiangjian, a postdoctoral fellow in the Department of Chemistry, School of Science, Tsinghua University. Meng is a native of Xiao County, Anhui Province. He is the eldest son in the family and has one younger brother and one younger sister. The younger brother is also a Ph.D., and his parents are both farmers. Meng's friends said that Meng had studied hard all the way and had just entered Tsinghua University as a postdoctoral fellow for one year. Next week, he would sign a contract to teach in Nanjing. Currently, the cause of the accident is under investigation. http://t.cn/R4ylOUW

chinese_text: 【30本名著的最后一句话，你看过吗】看过那么多本名著，你是否都做到“有始有终”了呢？这些名著的最后一句话写了什么，你知道吗？真正的好作品，单单一句话就值得反复咀嚼，让人回味无穷。重温这些好书好句，也许能带给你新的体悟！转发收藏，周末，给自己的心灵做个沐浴吧！（人民日报）
text: [Have you read the last sentences of 30 famous books?] Have you read so many famous books, have you achieved "beginning and end"? Do you know what the last sentences of these masterpieces say? A truly good work, just one sentence is worth chewing over and over again, making people have endless aftertaste. Reviewing these good books and sentences may bring you new insights! Forward and collect, give your soul a bath on the weekend! (People's Daily)

chinese_text: 【27岁的她，已穷游90个国家[赞]】熟练掌握西班牙语、德语、英语、日语，还会其他10种语言的基础对话……27岁四川女孩邓深，18岁起独自穷游，足迹遍布欧洲、非洲、拉美……靠打工挣钱，她已去过90多个国家地区！"有人用旅行逃避现实，我却找到自我！"你会为勇敢出发的她点[赞]吗？http://t.cn/R4yvRH6
text: [At the age of 27, she has traveled to 90 countries [like]] She is proficient in Spanish, German, English, Japanese, and can also have basic conversations in 10 other languages... 27-year-old Sichuan girl Deng Shen has been traveling alone on a budget since she was 18 years old. She has traveled all over Europe, Africa, and Latin America... She has traveled to more than 90 countries and regions by working part-time to earn money! "Some people use travel to escape reality, but I find myself!" Will you give her a [like] for her brave departure? http://t.cn/R4yvRH6

chinese_text: 【清华实验室爆炸32岁博士后遇难 母亲卖鸡蛋供其上学[悲伤]】遇难的博士后孟某某32岁，是家中长子，弟弟也是博士。据了解，孟母为供儿子读书，每日早五六点出门卖鸡蛋，夜里近10点回家。而在事发前一晚，孟还致电家中，“说被南京某大学录取，下周一去签约任教，却出了这种事。”
text: [A 32-year-old postdoctoral fellow was killed in the Tsinghua laboratory explosion and his mother sold eggs to support his education [sad]] The postdoctoral fellow who died was 32-year-old Meng Moumou. He was the eldest son in the family, and his younger brother was also a doctor. It is understood that in order to support her son's education, Meng's mother went out to sell eggs at five or six in the morning every day, and returned home at nearly 10 o'clock at night. The night before the incident, Meng also called home, "telling him that he had been admitted to a university in Nanjing and was going to sign a contract to teach next Monday, but something like this happened."

chinese_text: 【应对霾来袭，北京采取单双号限行】北京今天7时至12月22日24时启动红色预警措施，全市范围内机动车单双号限行（单日限双号，双日限单号），公务用车在此基础上停驶30%，公交计划增加运营车次，优先调配清洁能源公交车。建议中小学幼儿园停课、企事业单位可实行弹性工作制。
text: [In response to the smog attack, Beijing adopts restrictions on odd and even numbers] Beijing will launch red warning measures from 7:00 today to 24:00 on December 22. Motor vehicles with odd and even numbers will be restricted citywide (even numbers on single days, odd numbers on even days) ), on this basis, 30% of official vehicles will be suspended. Public transportation plans to increase the number of operations and prioritize the deployment of clean energy buses. It is recommended that primary and secondary schools and kindergartens be suspended and that enterprises and institutions implement flexible working systems.

chinese_text: 【老人少交2元"管理费"被捅3刀】18日，一名老人在武汉某农贸市场门口摆摊卖菜，两名年轻男子来收管理费，对方要5元，他给3元，男子不同意，其中一人将老人推到在地，随后从小腿处拔出一把短刀，朝他捅了三刀，老人胳膊上和后背血流不止，附近商户报警并拨打120，老人被送至医院。http://t.cn/R4y3cAy
text: [An old man was stabbed three times for not paying 2 yuan in "management fees"] On the 18th, an old man set up a stall selling vegetables at the entrance of a farmer's market in Wuhan. Two young men came to collect the management fee. The other party asked for 5 yuan, and he gave 3 yuan. , the man did not agree, one of them pushed the old man to the ground, then pulled out a short knife from his calf and stabbed him three times. The old man was bleeding on his arms and back. A nearby merchant called the police and dialed 120. The old man was stabbed three times. Sent to hospital. http://t.cn/R4y3cAy

chinese_text: 【六旬清扫工为省车费步行3小时讨要万元工资[伤心]】近日，成都62岁的清扫工文康明，为省车钱，徒步近3个小时前去原单位讨要被拖欠的16000多元工资。老人说，“马上要过年了，别人家都挂起香肠腊肉了，我就想要回这一年多的工钱。”经协调，原单位将每月支付1000元直至付清。血汗钱，经不起拖欠！
text: [A sixty-year-old sweeper walked for three hours to ask for a salary of 10,000 yuan to save on fares [sad]] Recently, Wen Kangming, a 62-year-old sweeper in Chengdu, walked for nearly three hours to go to his workplace to beg for wages he was owed in order to save on fares. A salary of more than 16,000 yuan. The old man said, "The Chinese New Year is coming soon, and other people's houses are hanging sausages and bacon. I just want to get back more than a year's salary." After coordination, the original employer will pay 1,000 yuan every month until it is paid off. Hard-earned money cannot afford to be in arrears!

Click on the picture, would you like [like] for the brave warriors? http://t.cn/R4y3uvb

chinese_text: #天下#【NASA拍螺旋星系：超大质量黑洞藏身宇宙尘埃】美国宇航局利用核光谱望远镜拍摄到位于鲸鱼座的1068螺旋星系，距离地球4700万光年。照片展示出了可见光与X射线，其中X射线来自星系中央一个活跃的超大质量黑洞。该黑洞较为模糊，被厚厚的云层的气体和尘埃所覆盖。http://t.cn/R4y15Qb
text: #天下# [NASA photographed spiral galaxies: supermassive black holes hiding in cosmic dust] NASA used the Nuclear Spectroscopic Telescope to photograph the 1068 spiral galaxy located in the constellation Cetus, 47 million light-years away from the earth. The image shows visible light and X-rays coming from an active supermassive black hole at the center of the galaxy. The black hole is obscured by thick clouds of gas and dust. http://t.cn/R4y15Qb

chinese_text: #那一天#【怀念大师钱钟书】他是学贯中西的大学者，也是才思敏捷的幽默大师，有人来中国一为看长城二为看他，他和妻子的恩爱为世人所羡慕，他被无数当代名家所推崇甚至崇拜……当你平日引用下边这些经典语录时，你意识到它们都是出自这位大师之口之手吗？今天，先生逝世17周年，怀念！[蜡烛]
text: #thatday#【Memory of Master Qian Zhongshu】He was a great scholar who had learned both Chinese and Western knowledge, and he was also a master of humor with quick wit. Some people came to China to see the Great Wall and to see him. The love between him and his wife was envied by the world. He Respected and even worshiped by countless contemporary celebrities... When you quote the following classic quotations on a daily basis, do you realize that they are all written by this master? Today is the 17th anniversary of my husband’s death. I miss you so much! [Candle]

chinese_text: 【考古学家发现全新人种：距今1.4万年的#马鹿洞人#[最右]】近日著名学术期刊《科学公共图书馆－综合》发表最新研究成果，肯定云南马鹿洞遗址存在全新古老型人类种群。该种群生活时期距今约1.4万年，因发现大量大型鹿类动物与其共生得名#马鹿洞人# 。#马鹿洞人# 啥样？戳复原图↓(央视记者李常明 陈政)
text: [Archaeologists have discovered a new human race: #马LUdong人# 14,000 years ago [far right]] Recently, the famous academic journal "Public Library of Science - General" published the latest research results, confirming the existence of the Maludong ruins in Yunnan A new ancient human species. This group of people lived about 14,000 years ago. They were named #马鹿东人# because they found a large number of large deer animals living in symbiosis with them. #马鹿堂人# What’s it like? Click on the restored picture ↓ (CCTV reporter Li Changming and Chen Zheng)

chinese_text: 【Oh，NO！新版百元人民币上有错字？[好囧]】《咬文嚼字》主编郝铭鉴指出，新版一百元人民币上有错字，“壹佰圆”的“圆”字系错用。“《银行法》规定，人民币单位是元，辅币是角、分。规范用字是元。过去用圆是历史原因，现在用圆字有根据吗？”http://t.cn/R42RJXN对此你想说______（华西都市报）
text: 【Oh, NO! Is there a typo on the new version of 100 yuan? [Embarrassing]] Hao Mingjian, editor-in-chief of "Yi Wen Che Zi", pointed out that there is a typo on the new version of the 100 yuan, and the word "yuan" in "one hundred yuan" is wrongly used. "The "Bank Law" stipulates that the unit of RMB is yuan, and the auxiliary currency is jiao and cent. The standard word is yuan. In the past, the word circle was used for historical reasons. Is there any basis for using the word round now?" http://t.cn/R42RJXN What do you want to say______(West China Metropolis Daily)

chinese_text: 【巴厘岛飞北京航班出故障 机上氧气面罩全弹出 紧急备降马来西亚 】昨日，东航巴厘岛飞北京的MU782航班因技术性问题，客机高度下降到一万英尺，机上氧气面罩全弹出，后紧急备降马来西亚哥打基纳巴卢机场。央视记者了解到，东航派同型号客机前去接回乘客，今晨客机已抵京。（央视记者朱雪松 图自网络）
text: [The flight from Bali to Beijing failed and all the oxygen masks on board popped up and made an emergency landing in Malaysia] Yesterday, China Eastern Airlines flight MU782 from Bali to Beijing dropped to 10,000 feet due to technical problems. All the oxygen masks on board popped up and made an emergency landing. Kota Kinabalu Airport, Malaysia. CCTV reporters learned that China Eastern Airlines sent a passenger plane of the same model to pick up the passengers, and the plane arrived in Beijing this morning. (Photo by CCTV reporter Zhu Xuesong from the Internet)

chinese_text: #时局#【国防部回应美军机闯南海：守礁部队对其警告驱离】国防部公布美军机闯南海细节，10日凌晨美军2架B-52轰炸机擅自进入南沙群岛有关岛礁临近空域。中国军队对美军机保持严密监视。守礁部队高度戒备，对美军机予以警告驱离。国防部称，美方所作所为是一种严重的军事挑衅行为。http://t.cn/R4y11qx
text: #current situation# [The Ministry of National Defense responded to the intrusion of US military aircraft into the South China Sea: the reef guarding troops warned them to drive away] The Ministry of National Defense announced the details of the intrusion of US military aircraft into the South China Sea. In the early morning of the 10th, two US B-52 bombers entered the airspace adjacent to the relevant islands and reefs in the Nansha Islands without authorization. . The Chinese military maintains close surveillance of U.S. military aircraft. The troops guarding the reef were on high alert and warned the US military aircraft to fly away. The Ministry of National Defense stated that what the United States did was a serious military provocation. http://t.cn/R4y11qx

chinese_text: 【美轰炸机闯中国南海 国防部：是严重的军事挑衅行为】据@国防部发布 ，12月10日凌晨，美军两架B－52战略轰炸机擅自进入中国南沙群岛有关岛礁邻近空域，中国守礁部队对美军机予以警告驱离。美方的所作所为是一种严重的军事挑衅行为。另据外媒，美方辩解称，“并没有飞到南海岛礁12海里内的想法”。
text: [U.S. bombers intruded into China’s South China Sea Ministry of Defense: It was a serious military provocation] According to the @ Ministry of Defense, in the early morning of December 10, two U.S. B-52 strategic bombers entered the airspace adjacent to the relevant islands and reefs in China’s Nansha Islands without authorization. China defended the reefs. The troops gave warnings to the US military aircraft and drove them away. What the United States did was a serious military provocation. According to foreign media, the U.S. side argued that it “had no intention of flying within 12 nautical miles of the South China Sea islands and reefs.”

chinese_text: 【国防部回应美军B-52轰炸机进入南沙群岛：对美军机予以警告驱离】12月10日凌晨，美军两架B－52战略轰炸机擅自进入中国南沙群岛有关岛礁邻近空域。中国军队保持了严密监视，守礁部队高度戒备，对美军机予以警告驱离。对此，国防部表示，坚决维护国家主权和安全，坚定维护地区的和平稳定。@国防部发布
text: [The Ministry of National Defense responded to the entry of US B-52 bombers into the Nansha Islands: Warning and expulsion of US aircraft] In the early morning of December 10, two US B-52 strategic bombers entered the airspace adjacent to the relevant islands and reefs of China's Nansha Islands without authorization. The Chinese military maintained close surveillance, and the troops guarding the reef were on high alert and warned the US military aircraft to fly away. In this regard, the Ministry of National Defense stated that it will resolutely safeguard national sovereignty and security, and resolutely maintain regional peace and stability. @ Ministry of Defense released

text: #乐 Enjoy Time# [The baby panda went out for a walk on his own, but was dragged home by his mother on the spot [poor]] Mom, in full view of everyone, he was split by others, so how can this national treasure behave in the future...[ Laughing and crying]http://t.cn/R4Afn09

chinese_text: #健康时间#【床上竟有200万只螨虫[吃惊]，送你5个实用除螨攻略】下班回家，能冲个热水澡，然后往床上一趟，便是一天中最幸福的时刻。但就在这“温柔乡”里，却隐藏着数以百万计的螨虫，它们时刻准备着引爆你的皮肤危机。想要快速摆脱螨虫的困扰？这5个实用除螨攻略，趁着周末快学习一下吧~@生命时报
text: #HealthTime# [There are actually 2 million mites in the bed [surprise], here are 5 practical tips for getting rid of mites] When you get home from work, you can take a hot shower and then go to bed, which is the happiest moment of the day. . But in this "gentle land", there are millions of mites hidden, and they are always ready to detonate your skin crisis. Want to get rid of mites quickly? Take advantage of the weekend to learn these 5 practical strategies for getting rid of mites~@生活Times

chinese_text: 【故宫养心殿百年首次大修 2020年将重焕光彩】昨日，养心殿保护项目启动，距上次局部维修已35年。养心殿位于紫禁城后部乾清宫西侧，是清朝最高权力中心所在地，清朝共十位皇帝曾在此居住执政。预计，故宫北院区将于2020年开放，集文物展厅、文物库房、文物修复等功能。你期待吗？http://t.cn/R4ygwE2
text: [The Forbidden City’s Yangxin Hall’s first major overhaul in a century will regain its splendor in 2020] Yesterday, the Yangxin Hall protection project was launched, 35 years after the last partial repair. Yangxin Hall is located at the rear of the Forbidden City and west of the Qianqing Palace. It is the seat of the highest power center of the Qing Dynasty. A total of ten emperors of the Qing Dynasty lived and ruled here. It is expected that the North Campus of the Forbidden City will be opened in 2020 and will integrate cultural relics exhibition halls, cultural relics warehouses, cultural relics restoration and other functions. Are you looking forward to it? http://t.cn/R4ygwE2

chinese_text: 【日本嫖娼万名女性前校长认罪】日媒报道，横滨市立初中前校长高岛雄平，2013年12月曾在菲律宾对一名12、13岁的少女实施嫖娼，并拍下少女图像保存在存储卡中。高岛在首次公开庭审中认罪，称自己经不住诱惑，感到羞耻。据悉，高岛在过去的27年间，嫖娼女性人数超过1.2万。[吃惊]http://t.cn/R4ygbuP
text: [Japan’s former principal pleads guilty to soliciting 10,000 female prostitutes] Japanese media reported that Takashima Yuhei, the former principal of Yokohama Municipal Junior High School, had prostituted a 12- or 13-year-old girl in the Philippines in December 2013, and took pictures of the girl and saved them in storage card. Takashima pleaded guilty in his first public trial, saying he couldn't resist temptation and felt ashamed. It is reported that in the past 27 years, the number of women seeking prostitution in Takashima exceeded 12,000. [Surprised] http://t.cn/R4ygbuP

chinese_text: #那年今日#【没有郑振铎，不如不读《飞鸟集》】①世界对着它的爱人，把它浩瀚的面具揭下了，他变小了，小如一首歌，小如一回永恒的接吻；②我们把世界看错了，反说它欺骗我们；③你微微地笑着，不同我说什么话。而我觉得，为了这个，我已等待得久了。1898年的今天，作家、翻译家郑振铎出生。怀念！
text: #that年DAY# [Without Zheng Zhenduo, it is better not to read "The Birds"] ① The world took off its vast mask to its lover, and he became smaller, as small as a song, as small as an eternal kiss ; ② We see the world wrong and say it deceives us; ③ You smile slightly and don’t say anything to me. And I feel that I have been waiting for this for a long time. On this day in 1898, writer and translator Zheng Zhenduo was born. Miss you!

text: #万搏#[Tsinghua laboratory explosion killed 32-year-old postdoctoral fellow whose mother sold eggs to support his education] An explosion occurred in the Tsinghua University laboratory yesterday morning, and postdoctoral fellow Meng Xiang was killed. Yesterday afternoon, the families of the victims rushed to the scene. Meng's brother said that they were from a farming family. In order to support his education, his mother would go out to sell eggs at five or six in the morning and only come home at night. Meng's mother cried out Meng Xiangjian's name, saying that they had talked on the phone the night before. http://t.cn/R4yljIU

What are you interested in? http://t.cn/R4yDhL1

chinese_text: 【调查初步确认：使用氢气做化学实验时发生爆炸】北京市安监局通报称，经过海淀区安监局现场勘查、询问当事人，初步确认该事故是相关人员在实验室内使用氢气做化学实验时发生爆炸。事故原因正在进一步调查中。http://t.cn/R4yDpX8
text: [Preliminary investigation confirms: An explosion occurred while using hydrogen for chemical experiments] The Beijing Municipal Work Safety Supervision Bureau reported that after on-site inspection and questioning of the parties by the Haidian District Work Safety Bureau, it was initially confirmed that the accident was caused by relevant personnel using hydrogen for chemical experiments in the laboratory. An explosion occurred. Cause of the accident is under further investigation. http://t.cn/R4yDpX8

chinese_text: 【公务“吃住行”新标准：住酒店最高1100元标准[围观]】据财政部网站，从明年1月1日开始，中央和国家机关差旅住宿费将执行新的标准：①省部级官员在京沪两地最高可入住1100元标准酒店，其他省份是800或900元；②省部级可坐飞机头等舱，其他干部只能坐经济舱；③伙食费大多为100元/天…详情来戳图↓↓
text: [New standard for “food, accommodation and transportation” for official business: up to 1,100 yuan for hotel accommodation [Onlooker]] According to the Ministry of Finance’s website, starting from January 1 next year, new standards will be implemented for travel and accommodation expenses for central and state agencies: ① Provincial and Ministry Officials at the provincial and ministerial level can stay in standard hotels in Beijing and Shanghai for up to 1,100 yuan, while in other provinces it is 800 or 900 yuan; ② Provincial and ministerial officials can fly first class, while other cadres can only fly economy class; ③ Food expenses are mostly 100 yuan/day ...Please click on the picture for details↓↓

chinese_text: 【被贪婪毁掉的中国近海】过度捕捞，超标排放，围海养殖，填海造田，石油开采……各大近海渔场的资源濒临枯竭，琼州海峡和北部湾也许成为世界上第二个死海，中国的近海已经不堪重负，富饶的海洋已经渐渐远去。由于近海资源枯竭，一些渔民不得不铤而走险，前往他国海域捕鱼。http://t.cn/R4yDHMy
text: [China's offshore waters destroyed by greed] Overfishing, excessive emissions, sea farming, land reclamation, oil extraction... The resources of major offshore fisheries are on the verge of exhaustion, and the Qiongzhou Strait and Beibu Gulf may become the second Dead Sea in the world. China's offshore waters have been overwhelmed, and the rich ocean has gradually receded. Due to the depletion of offshore resources, some fishermen have to take desperate risks and go fishing in other countries' waters. http://t.cn/R4yDHMy

chinese_text: 【梦想，有时就在触手可及的地方】9年间，她见识到了各色各样的人，领略千姿百态的风土人情，吃羊驼、豚鼠、鲨鱼甚至青蛙汁……看过那么多异域的云和月，走过那么多路，那些年的青春就流浪在路上。但她喜欢这种流浪，虽然也曾迷惘、彷徨，却从未失去方向。为有梦想的女孩点赞↓
text: [Dreams are sometimes within reach] In the past 9 years, she has met all kinds of people, experienced all kinds of local customs, eaten alpacas, guinea pigs, sharks and even frog juice... and seen so many exotic clouds and Yue has traveled so many roads, and the youth of those years was wandering on the road. But she liked this kind of wandering. Although she was confused and hesitant, she never lost her direction. Like the girl with dreams↓

chinese_text: 【[话筒]急转！年关将至，这些很可能是骗局！加强警惕！】新年将至之时是诈骗事件的高发期。如今，网络、电信诈骗层出不穷，骗子的花招也让人防不胜防。一旦掉入陷阱，则可能造成惨重的损失！快戳图了解网警罗列的43类诈骗，如果遇到这种情况，千万要谨慎！
text: [[Microphone] Turn sharply! The new year is approaching and these are probably scams! Be vigilant! 】The New Year is approaching, which is a period of high incidence of fraud incidents. Nowadays, there are endless Internet and telecommunications frauds, and the tricks of scammers are also difficult to guard against. Once you fall into the trap, it may cause heavy losses! Click on the picture to learn about the 43 types of fraud listed by the Internet Police. If you encounter this situation, be cautious!

chinese_text: 【[话筒]警惕！公交上有人“掏兜”，但掏的不是自己的！】近日，云南文山一公交车上，一男子在衣服遮掩下，左手持刀片划破邻座大妈衣兜行窃，大妈浑然不觉。男子行窃成功准备逃离时被反扒民警抓住。http://t.cn/R4yDsyj提醒：冬天衣厚，勿将重要物品放外衣口袋，谨防扒手！（央视记者李劲松 申泷洋）
text: [[Microphone] Be alert! Someone "picked" their pockets on the bus, but it wasn't their own! 】Recently, on a bus in Wenshan, Yunnan, a man, covered by his clothes, held a blade in his left hand and slashed the pocket of the aunt sitting next to him to steal. The aunt was completely unaware. The man successfully committed the robbery and was caught by the anti-pocket-pocket police when he was about to flee. http://t.cn/R4yDsyj Reminder: In winter, your clothes are thick, so don’t put important items in your coat pockets, beware of pickpockets! (CCTV reporter Li Jinsong and Shen Longyang)

chinese_text: 【牛！我国成功研制电动车“超强电池” 充电7秒续航35公里[给力]】中科院上海硅酸盐所研制出一种高性能超级电容器电极材料——氮掺杂有序介孔石墨烯。该材料具有极佳的电化学储能特性，可用作电动车“超强电池”：充电7秒续航35公里。该新型石墨烯超级电容器体积轻巧，可实现规模生产。
text: 【ox! my country has successfully developed a "super-powerful battery" for electric vehicles that can travel 35 kilometers in 7 seconds [Awesome]] The Shanghai Institute of Ceramics, Chinese Academy of Sciences has developed a high-performance supercapacitor electrode material - nitrogen-doped ordered mesoporous graphene. The material has excellent electrochemical energy storage properties and can be used as a "super battery" for electric vehicles: it can charge for 7 seconds and have a range of 35 kilometers. The new graphene supercapacitor is lightweight and can be produced on a large scale.

chinese_text: 【男子审讯中死亡 警察带走尸体】16日，四川内江男子张成军涉嫌盗窃在审讯中身体突发异常，送医抢救无效死亡。家属称，死者手部、背部均有伤痕，事后曾要求警方提供审讯监控视频，警方以监控系统正在升级、没有监控为由，拒绝了请求；张成军死亡后，警方出动大量警察将尸体带走。http://t.cn/R4yF1QP
text: [Man died during interrogation and police took away the body] On the 16th, Zhang Chengjun, a man from Neijiang, Sichuan, was suspected of theft. During the interrogation, he suffered a physical abnormality and was sent to the hospital to save his life and died. The family members said that the deceased had injuries on his hands and back, and they asked the police to provide surveillance video of the interrogation afterwards. The police refused the request on the grounds that the surveillance system was being upgraded and there was no surveillance. After Zhang Chengjun's death, the police dispatched a large number of police officers to take away the body. http://t.cn/R4yF1QP

chinese_text: #正能量#【陈春林：只愿爸爸重新站起来】为让父亲尽快康复，陈春林按照护工的指导给父亲按摩、拍打全身，搀扶父亲做四肢屈伸动作，有时一做就是几个小时，一天下来手常常酸得抬不起来。然而她从不喊累，“只要爸爸能重新站起来，无论做什么我都愿意！”
text: #正energy# [Chen Chunlin: I just want my father to stand up again] In order to help his father recover as soon as possible, Chen Chunlin followed the instructions of the nurse to massage and pat his father's whole body, and helped his father to do flexion and extension of his limbs. Sometimes he would do it for several hours at a time, and he would do it at the end of the day. I'm often so sore that I can't even lift it. However, she never complained that she was tired, "As long as dad can stand up again, I am willing to do anything!"

chinese_text: #新浪独家#【锐见：冷血和道德解释不了万科宝能攻防战】万科与宝能系之争愈演愈烈，宝能系在“不要搬起石头砸自己的脚”的表态中也给予了回应。在这样的争论背后，提出了两个话题，第一，如何定义商业价值，第二，如何来定义资本的力量——其到底是建设性还是破坏性？http://t.cn/R4yFH1k
text: #SinaExclusive# [Ruijian: Cold-bloodedness and morality cannot explain Vanke’s offensive and defensive battles with Baoneng] The dispute between Vanke and Baoneng has become increasingly fierce, and Baoneng also responded in its statement of “Don’t shoot yourself in the foot.” Behind such debates, two topics have been raised. First, how to define business value, and second, how to define the power of capital - is it constructive or destructive? http://t.cn/R4yFH1k

chinese_text: 【谁都有可能是下一个卢旺达】从1994年4月7日起，卢旺达胡图族人在3个月时间疯狂屠杀了80万图西族人。但一些大屠杀的“罪魁祸首”仍逍遥法外。今天，幸存者和刽子手们比邻而居，受害者自愿或不自愿地与魔鬼握手。和解之旅，痛苦且漫长。http://t.cn/R4yqT6Z
text: [Anyone may be the next Rwanda] Starting from April 7, 1994, the Rwandan Hutus massacred 800,000 Tutsis in a three-month period. But some of the "culprits" of the massacre remain at large. Today, survivors and executioners live side by side, and victims shake hands with the devil, willingly or unwillingly. The journey to reconciliation is painful and long. http://t.cn/R4yqT6Z

chinese_text: 【消防员穿越火线救出19人 把头盔让给婴儿】17日4时，江西龙虎山镇一早餐店发生火灾，在二楼及以上有19名住户被困。楼梯通道内火势猛烈，4名消防员多次穿越火层，队员李华彪还把自己的头盔给怀中婴儿戴上。经过搜救，无一人伤亡。真正逆火而行的英雄，值得你点[good]！http://t.cn/R4ys1Rq
text: [Firefighters crossed the fire line and rescued 19 people and gave their helmets to babies] At 4:00 on the 17th, a fire broke out in a breakfast restaurant in Longhushan Town, Jiangxi Province. 19 residents were trapped on the second floor and above. The fire was fierce in the stair passage. Four firefighters passed through the fire several times. Team member Li Huabiao also put his helmet on the baby in his arms. After the search and rescue, no one was injured or injured. A hero who truly goes against the fire deserves your [good] point! http://t.cn/R4ys1Rq

chinese_text: 【男生跑步跑“断”腿 6年碳酸饮料喝成“骨脆脆”】湖北高中生小陈体育课跑步时，突然感觉左腿剧痛，栽倒在操场上。经查，小陈意外骨折！原来，小陈6年多以来每天喝两三瓶碳酸饮料，影响钙盐在骨质中沉积。医生介绍，过量饮用碳酸饮料，骨折发生的危险性可增加5倍。转给关心的TA！http://t.cn/R4LdK3B
text: [A boy broke his leg while running after 6 years of drinking carbonated drinks and his bones became brittle] When Xiao Chen, a high school student in Hubei Province, was running in physical education class, he suddenly felt severe pain in his left leg and fell to the playground. After investigation, it was found that Xiao Chen suffered an accidental fracture! It turned out that Xiao Chen had been drinking two or three bottles of carbonated drinks every day for more than six years, which affected the deposition of calcium salts in the bones. Doctors say that excessive consumption of carbonated drinks can increase the risk of fractures by five times. Forward to someone who cares! http://t.cn/R4LdK3B

chinese_text: #热点#【调查称我国9成短命建筑系不合理拆除 每年浪费数千亿】赵晋在天津开发的水岸银座及名门广场项目将拆除，其中一栋高度已超200米。此前，西安一座1999年封顶的118米高楼被爆破，郑州建成仅5年的天桥因与地铁工程存在矛盾，被整体拆卸。“拆了建、建了拆”的闹剧一再上演。http://t.cn/R4yWYVC
text: #hotspot# [Survey says that 90% of short-lived buildings in my country are irrationally demolished and waste hundreds of billions every year] The Waterfront Ginza and Mingmen Plaza projects developed by Zhao Jin in Tianjin will be demolished. One of the buildings is over 200 meters tall. Previously, a 118-meter-tall building in Xi'an that was topped out in 1999 was blasted, and a flyover in Zhengzhou that was built only five years ago was completely dismantled due to conflicts with the subway project. The farce of "dismantling and building, then demolishing after building" has been staged again and again. http://t.cn/R4yWYVC

chinese_text: 【“助人为乐是义不容辞的责任！”[赞]】22岁的广西小伙陆候灿是名造血干细胞捐献志愿者。今年5月，他与一名涉外患者配型成功。近日陆候灿的造血干细胞被成功采集，远渡重洋注入马来西亚一名患者体内。陆候灿说，助人为乐是义不容辞的责任，自己做了有意义的事！你会为小伙点[赞]吗？（央视记者廖汨）
text: ["Helping others is an unshirkable responsibility!" [Like]] Lu Houcan, a 22-year-old boy from Guangxi, is a hematopoietic stem cell donation volunteer. In May this year, he was successfully matched with a foreign-related patient. Recently, Lu Houcan's hematopoietic stem cells were successfully collected and injected into a patient in Malaysia across the ocean. Lu Houcan said that it is an unshirkable responsibility to help others, and he has done something meaningful! Will you click [like] for this guy? (CCTV reporter Liao Mi)

chinese_text: 【16名不文明游客被“拉黑” 专家：处罚尚缺法律依据】国家旅游局16日公布第四批游客“黑名单”，至此被“拉黑”游客已有16人（大闹机舱7人，“爬雕塑照相”2人，国外机场闹事4人，殴打导游、当地工作人员，强行打开飞机应急舱门各1人）。但专家称，“黑名单”制度的处罚措施还缺少法律依据。
text: [16 uncivilized tourists were “blacklisted”. Experts: There is still no legal basis for punishment.] The National Tourism Administration announced the fourth batch of tourist “blacklists” on the 16th. So far, 16 tourists have been “blacklisted” (Making trouble in the cabin 7 2 people "climbed the sculpture to take photos", 4 people caused trouble at foreign airports, beat the tour guide and local staff, and 1 person each forced open the plane emergency hatch). However, experts say that the punishment measures of the "blacklist" system still lack legal basis.

chinese_text: 这次四级考题究竟难不难？快亮出你的观点吧
text: Are the CET-4 exam questions difficult? Come and show your point of view

chinese_text: 【险！雪后路面结冰 三轮车“溜冰”撞轿车[震惊]】经几日降雪，四川康定进入冰冻模式，化雪后路面结冰。一辆三轮车爬坡爬到一半时，车轮开始打滑，随后整体失控顺坡下滑，车体旋转了几圈后重重撞上下方轿车！点视频看事发过程：http://t.cn/R4U7vv2雪天路滑，大家出行注意安全！（央视记者蒋林 鑑开）
text: 【risk! A tricycle "skating" hit a car after the snow froze on the road [Shocking]] After several days of snowfall, Kangding, Sichuan entered freezing mode, and the road became icy after the snow melted. Halfway up the hill, a tricycle's wheels began to slip, and then the whole vehicle lost control and slid down the slope. After spinning a few times, the vehicle's body hit the car below! Click on the video to watch the incident: http://t.cn/R4U7vv2 The roads are slippery in the snow, please pay attention to safety when traveling! (CCTV reporter Jiang Linjiankai)

chinese_text: 【男生摆蜡烛求爱 被大妈用灭火器扑灭[笑cry]】昨晚，西安海棠职业学院门口上演浪漫一幕：一男生用蜡烛摆成心形，向心爱的女生示爱。但不幸的是，女主角没等到，却“等”来了看门的大妈……只见大妈抄起手中的灭火器，三下五除二把求爱蜡烛全浇灭了……(西部网)网友：大妈，你不懂爱[泪流满面]
text: [A boy placed a candle to make love, but the aunt put it out with a fire extinguisher [laughing and cried]] Last night, a romantic scene was staged at the entrance of Xi'an Haitang Vocational College: a boy placed candles in a heart shape to express his love for the girl he loved. But unfortunately, the heroine did not wait, but the aunt who looked after the door came... I saw the aunt picked up the fire extinguisher in her hand, and extinguished all the courtship candles... (Western Net) Netizen :Aunt, you don’t understand love [tears down]

chinese_text: 【[lt赞]两名华人科学家入选《自然》十大科学人物】17日，《自然》杂志评选出2015年十大科学人物，两位华人科学家入选。黄军就，发表全球第一篇CRISPR技术修改人类胚胎基因的报告。鲍哲南，斯坦福大学华裔女科学家，开发有感知压力并可与大脑沟通的柔性人造皮肤。觉得自豪就点赞！http://t.cn/R4ygi2C
text: [[ltLike] Two Chinese scientists were selected as the top ten scientific figures of "Nature"] On the 17th, "Nature" magazine selected the top ten scientific figures of 2015, and two Chinese scientists were selected. Huang Junjiu published the world's first report on CRISPR technology modifying genes in human embryos. Zhenan Bao, a Chinese female scientist at Stanford University, has developed flexible artificial skin that can sense pressure and communicate with the brain. Like if you feel proud! http://t.cn/R4ygi2C

chinese_text: #万象#【男生校门口摆蜡烛表白 被看门阿姨用灭火器浇灭[衰]】昨晚，@西安海棠职业学院 门口上演浪漫一幕：一男生为了向心爱的女生表白，准备了蜡烛并摆成心形。然而不幸的是，女主还没等到，蜡烛就已被看门的阿姨用灭火器给浇灭了。http://t.cn/R4UhLwi 这真是一个悲伤的故事……[笑cry]
text: #万搏# [Boys placed candles at the gate of the school to express their love, but the janitor aunt put them out with a fire extinguisher [bad]] Last night, a romantic scene was staged at the gate of @西安海棠vocational college: A boy prepared candles and arranged them in order to express his love to the girl he loved. Heart-shaped. Unfortunately, before the hostess could wait, the candle was put out by the auntie at the door with a fire extinguisher. http://t.cn/R4UhLwi This is really a sad story...[laughing and crying]

chinese_text: 【27部反派胜利的电影】谁说坏蛋必须死？推荐27部正不压邪的佳片，负能量满满地！但是好喜欢[嘻嘻]
text: [27 Movies in which the Villain Triumphant] Who says the bad guy has to die? Recommended 27 good films that are full of negative energy! But I like it so much [heehee]

chinese_text: #那年今日#【钱钟书说】①二十岁不狂是没有志气，三十岁犹狂是没有头脑。②不受教育的人，因为不识字，上人的当；受教育的人，因为识了字，上印刷品的当。③天下就没有偶然，那不过是化了妆的、戴了面具的必然。④越是聪明人，越要懂得下笨功夫。
text: #that年DAY# [Qian Zhongshu said] ① If you are not crazy at the age of twenty, you have no ambition; if you are crazy at the age of thirty, you have no brains. ② Uneducated people are deceived by others because they are illiterate; educated people are deceived by printed matter because they are literate. ③There are no accidents in the world, they are just inevitable with makeup and mask. ④The smarter a person is, the more he must know how to work stupidly.

chinese_text: #知政#【李克强与泰国总理互致贺信 祝贺中泰铁路启动】今天，中泰铁路项目启动仪式在泰国大城府举行，李克强与泰国总理巴育互致贺信，祝贺中泰铁路正式启动。李克强表示，希望双方再接再厉，确保铁路合作项目顺利实施，为连接中国、老挝、泰国的“大动脉”早日贯通打下坚实基础。http://t.cn/R4Uz8YE
text: #知正# [Li Keqiang and the Prime Minister of Thailand exchanged congratulatory letters to congratulate the launch of the China-Thailand Railway] Today, the launching ceremony of the China-Thailand Railway project was held in Ayutthaya, Thailand. Li Keqiang and Thai Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha exchanged congratulatory letters to congratulate the official launch of the China-Thailand Railway. Li Keqiang expressed the hope that both parties will continue their efforts to ensure the smooth implementation of the railway cooperation project and lay a solid foundation for the early connection of the "artery" connecting China, Laos and Thailand. http://t.cn/R4Uz8YE

chinese_text: 【钱钟书说】①二十岁不狂是没有志气，三十岁犹狂是没有头脑。②不受教育的人，因为不识字，上人的当；受教育的人，因为识了字，上印刷品的当。③天下就没有偶然，那不过是化了妆的、戴了面具的必然。④围在城里的人想逃出来，城外的人想冲进去。
text: [Qian Zhongshu said] ① If you are not crazy at the age of twenty, you have no ambition; if you are crazy at the age of thirty, you have no brains. ② Uneducated people are deceived by others because they are illiterate; educated people are deceived by printed matter because they are literate. ③There are no accidents in the world, they are just inevitable with makeup and mask. ④The people surrounding the city want to escape, and the people outside the city want to rush in.

chinese_text: 【车厢里的“花式”折磨：摸得着、闻得到、听得见[汗]】①摸得着： 睡觉时姿势奇葩，把鞋搭在高处；②闻得到：不顾他人感受把鞋子脱掉，释放“毒气弹”；③听得见： 看连续剧、玩游戏声音开得很大，打扰别人休息。这些事情，你遇见过吗？文明出行要自律，不影响他人，能做到的转！http://t.cn/R4UZrIx
text: ["Fancy" torture in the carriage: touchable, smellable, and audible [sweat]] ① Touchable: Sleeping in weird postures, putting shoes on high places; ② Smellable: Putting shoes on without caring about other people's feelings Take it off and release the "gas bomb"; ③Audible: Watch TV series or play games at a loud volume, disturbing others' rest. Have you ever encountered these things? You need to be self-disciplined when traveling in a civilized manner, do not affect others, and do what you can! http://t.cn/R4UZrIx

chinese_text: 结局太温馨，爸爸的心都萌化（sui）了[笑cry][笑cry][笑cry]http://t.cn/RUs3kyG
text: The ending is so heartwarming, my dad’s heart melted (sui) [laughing cry][laughing cry][laughing cry] http://t.cn/RUs3kyG

chinese_text: 【中央气象台升级发布霾橙色预警】中央气象台预计，今晚8点到明晚8点，北京中南部、天津西部、河北中南部、河南北部、山东西部、山西南部等地有中度霾，其中，北京南部、河北中部、河南北部、山东西部局地有重度霾。21日上述地区的霾仍将持续发展。请做好防护！(央视记者任梅梅)
text: [The Central Meteorological Observatory upgraded and issued an orange haze warning] The Central Meteorological Observatory predicts that from 8 o'clock tonight to 8 o'clock tomorrow night, there will be moderate haze in central and southern Beijing, western Tianjin, central and southern Hebei, northern Henan, western Shandong, and southern Shanxi, among which , there is severe haze in southern Beijing, central Hebei, northern Henan, and western Shandong. The haze in the above-mentioned areas will continue to develop on the 21st. Please protect yourself! (CCTV reporter Ren Meimei)

chinese_text: 【公务员注意！明年1月1日起差旅费执行新标准，超标后果很严重】根据新调整的住宿标准，省部级官员在北京、上海两地最高可以入住1100元标准酒店，其他省份是800或900元，司局级和处级及以下干部的住宿标准也有不同幅度的提升。如超标，违规资金不但会被追回，还可能被通报处分http://t.cn/R4ymhlB
text: [Attention civil servants! New standards for travel expenses will be implemented from January 1 next year, and the consequences of exceeding the standards will be serious] According to the newly adjusted accommodation standards, provincial and ministerial-level officials can stay in standard hotels with a maximum cost of 1,100 yuan in Beijing and Shanghai, and 800 or 900 yuan in other provinces. Accommodation standards for cadres at the bureau and division levels and below have also been improved to varying degrees. If the limit is exceeded, the illegal funds will not only be recovered, but may also be notified and punished http://t.cn/R4ymhlB

chinese_text: 【星战角色乱入白宫 护卫发言人】当地时间12月18日，美国华盛顿，白宫发言人欧内斯特举行新闻发布会，遭《星球大战》人物R2D2和帝国突击队士兵“闹场”。当天，白宫为军人家庭的子女播放《星球大战：原力觉醒》。http://t.cn/R4UAq0z
text: [Star Wars characters intruded into the White House to protect the spokesman] On December 18, local time, White House spokesman Earnest held a press conference in Washington, the United States, and was "brought into trouble" by "Star Wars" character R2D2 and Imperial Stormtroopers. That day, the White House screened "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" for children of military families. http://t.cn/R4UAq0z

chinese_text: #万象#【清华师生送花悼念遇难博士后：科学永远记得你】清华大学化学系实验室昨天起火爆炸，正在做实验的博士后孟祥见不幸身亡。今天中午，楼外的警戒线已经撤除，但仍不允许入内做实验。在发生爆炸的实验室外，摆放着几束鲜花，并留有字条：“祥见走好！科学永远记得你。”http://t.cn/R4U7Dz1
text: #万搏# [Tsinghua teachers and students send flowers to mourn the deceased postdoctoral fellow: Science will always remember you] A fire exploded in the laboratory of the Chemistry Department of Tsinghua University yesterday. Meng Xiangjian, a postdoctoral fellow who was doing experiments, died unfortunately. At noon today, the cordon outside the building has been removed, but entry is still not allowed for experiments. Outside the laboratory where the explosion occurred, several bouquets of flowers were placed with a note: "Goodbye! Science will always remember you." http://t.cn/R4U7Dz1

chinese_text: #今晚联播看什么#【12月19日新闻联播抢先看】①看头条：习近平指出，综合国力竞争说到底是创新竞争。创新驱动力如何告别"成长的烦恼"？②看发展：中泰铁路今天举行开工仪式，两国合作的铁路将连通哪些交流？③看家书：1937年，25岁的飞行员张锡祜在参战途中殉职。他在家书中写了什么？今晚7点，一定看!
text: #夜夜场what to watch# [News Network sneak peek on December 19th] ①Look at the headlines: Xi Jinping pointed out that competition in comprehensive national strength is ultimately competition in innovation. How does innovation drive say goodbye to "growing pains"? ②Look at development: The China-Thailand Railway held a groundbreaking ceremony today. What exchanges will the cooperative railway between the two countries connect? ③A note from home: In 1937, 25-year-old pilot Zhang Xihu died in the line of duty while participating in the war. What did he write in his home letter? Must watch tonight at 7pm!

chinese_text: 【父母49天内先后离世 少年勤工6年为父还债[赞]】叶石云在11岁时，父母就相继在49天内因病去世。面对父亲留下的3万元治病外债，他捡废品、打零工，毅然担起还债之责。许多债主不忍收钱，他就一次次送去，因为“他们都是帮过爸妈的好人”。就这样，叶石云用6年还清了外债。(钱江晚报)为小伙的担当点赞！
text: [Both parents died within 49 days of each other. A young man worked hard for 6 years to pay off his father’s debt [Like]] When Ye Shiyun was 11 years old, his parents died of illness within 49 days of each other. Faced with a foreign debt of 30,000 yuan left by his father for medical treatment, he picked up scraps and worked odd jobs, resolutely taking on the responsibility of repaying the debt. Many creditors couldn't bear to collect money, so he sent them over and over again, because "they are all good people who have helped their parents." In this way, Ye Shiyun paid off the foreign debt in 6 years. (Qianjiang Evening News) Thumbs up for the young man’s responsibility!

chinese_text: 【邓深：如果地球上再找不到想去的地方，我会搬到火星去】9年的环球旅行花了30万人民币，全部是邓深自己挣的钱。选择搭便车和做沙发客来节省费用，没钱了就继续打工存钱，她做餐厅服务员、导游、翻译、卖玛咖、写游记供稿……如今，邓深再次准备启程完成自己亚非拉30国游的梦想。
text: [Deng Shen: If I can no longer find the place I want to go to on earth, I will move to Mars] Nine years of traveling around the world cost 300,000 yuan, all of which was earned by Deng Shen himself. She chose hitchhiking and couch surfing to save money. When she ran out of money, she continued to work to save money. She worked as a restaurant waiter, tour guide, translator, sold maca, and wrote travel notes... Now, Deng Shen is once again preparing to set off to complete her journey to Asia, Africa and Latin America. The dream of traveling to 30 countries.

chinese_text: 转发微博
text: Forward Weibo

chinese_text: 家长应陪孩子观看的100集BBC经典纪录片。
text: 100 episodes of classic BBC documentaries that parents should watch with their children.

chinese_text: #早安中国#我生命里最大的突破之一，就是我不再为别人对我的看法而担忧。此后，我真的能自由地去做我认为对自己最好的事。只有在我们不需要外来的赞许时，才会变得自由。
text: #GoodMorningChina# One of the biggest breakthroughs in my life is that I no longer worry about what others think of me. After that, I was really free to do what I thought was best for myself. We become free only when we do not need external approval.

chinese_text: #微感动#【让儿子再帮帮别人[泪]】16岁儿子小罗不幸遇车祸，经抢救仍脑干衰竭，她悲痛万分。犹豫再三她做出艰难决定：捐献儿子器官！她说，儿子和自己曾受好人帮助，愿儿子器官能帮别人！近日捐献手术完成，小罗捐出肝脏、肾脏和眼角膜…善良为天！致敬江苏母亲罗秀容[赞]愿小罗走好！（央视记者吴睿）
text: #微touch# [Let her son help others again [tears]] Her 16-year-old son Ronaldinho was unfortunately involved in a car accident and his brain stem failed after being rescued. She was extremely sad. After much hesitation, she made a difficult decision: donate her son’s organs! She said that her son and she had been helped by good people, and she hoped that her son’s organs could help others! Recently, the donation operation was completed. Ronaldinho donated his liver, kidneys and corneas... Kindness is the order of the day! Tribute to Jiangsu mother Luo Xiurong [Like] Wish Ronaldinho good luck! (CCTV reporter Wu Rui)

chinese_text: #民生#【中韩中澳自贸协定今起生效 哪些商品可以马上免税】20日当天来自澳大利亚和韩国商品中，澳大利亚的龙虾制品、罐装鲍鱼等将立即取消关税；而韩国西洋参、天麻等关税也降为零。至于澳大利亚奶粉、牛排；韩国化妆品，则没有马上免税。其中澳大利亚配方奶粉要4年后才完全免税。http://t.cn/R4UiT7g
text: #民生# [Which products can be immediately exempted from tax when the China-Korea-China-Australia Free Trade Agreement takes effect today] Among the products from Australia and South Korea on the 20th, Australian lobster products, canned abalone, etc. will have their tariffs immediately removed; while Korean American ginseng, Gastrodia elata, etc. Tariffs were also reduced to zero. As for Australian milk powder, steak, and Korean cosmetics, they are not immediately tax-free. Among them, Australian formula milk powder will not be fully tax-free until four years later. http://t.cn/R4UiT7g

chinese_text: #历史上的今天#【澳门回归16周年】澳门北邻珠海，西与珠海市的湾仔和横琴对望，东与香港相距60公里。自由港，世界第一大赌城，世界人口密度最高地区之一。闻一多曾写下《七子之歌 澳门》，后被改编成歌曲：“你可知macao，不是我真姓，我离开你太久了，母亲”。1999年12月20日零时，澳门回归。
text: #thisdayinhistory# [16th Anniversary of Macao's Return] Macao borders Zhuhai to the north, faces Wan Chai and Hengqin in Zhuhai City to the west, and is 60 kilometers away from Hong Kong to the east. Freeport is the world's largest gambling city and one of the most densely populated areas in the world. Wen Yiduo once wrote "Song of the Seven Sons of Macau", which was later adapted into a song: "Do you know that Macao is not my real surname. I have been away from you for too long, mother." At 0:00 on December 20, 1999, Macau returned to China.

chinese_text: #热点#【中国旅客大闹泰国航班 要求在机坪吸烟】据网友曝料，一架曼谷飞普吉岛航班上，1名中国旅客大闹客舱，怒骂空乘。网友称，由于天气原因，曼谷飞往普吉岛的航班改降素叻坦尼国际机场等候。在飞机加油期间1名中国乘客叫空乘人员打开舱门下飞机吸烟，遭到拒绝后还怒骂空乘！http://t.cn/R4UJuja
text: #hotspot# [Chinese passengers made a fuss on a Thai flight and asked to smoke on the airport ramp] According to netizens, on a flight from Bangkok to Phuket, a Chinese passenger made a fuss in the cabin and cursed the flight attendant. Netizens said that due to weather reasons, the flight from Bangkok to Phuket was diverted to Surat Thani International Airport to wait. During the refueling period of the plane, a Chinese passenger asked the flight attendant to open the door and get off the plane to smoke. After being refused, he cursed the flight attendant angrily! http://t.cn/R4UJuja

chinese_text: 【27岁的她，已穷游90个国家[赞]】熟练掌握西班牙语、德语、英语、日语，还会其他10种语言的基础对话…27岁四川女孩邓深，18岁起独自穷游，足迹遍布欧洲、非洲、拉美…靠打工挣钱，已去过90多个国家地区！"有人用旅行逃避现实，我却找到自我！"为她点[赞]http://t.cn/R4yvRH6你有多久没去旅行了？
text: [At the age of 27, she has traveled to 90 countries on a budget [like]] She is proficient in Spanish, German, English, Japanese, and can speak basic conversations in 10 other languages... 27-year-old Sichuan girl Deng Shen has traveled alone on a budget since she was 18 years old. All over Europe, Africa, Latin America... I make money by working and have been to more than 90 countries and regions! "Some people use travel to escape reality, but I find myself!" [Like] for her http://t.cn/R4yvRH6 How long has it been since you traveled?

chinese_text: 【太恶心！竟有家长用餐馆饭碗给孩子接尿】近日，江苏一女子带孩子在餐厅吃饭，竟出惊人之举：监控中，她在收银处拿了个碗，回来让孩子尿在碗里，再把碗放到桌下。餐厅负责人说，女子既没求助服务员，也没问厕所在哪，“店开了七八年也没碰到过这种事！”如此家长，怎么教育孩子？http://t.cn/R4LRxP9
text: 【digusting! A parent actually used a restaurant rice bowl to catch his child's urine] Recently, a woman in Jiangsu took her child to eat in a restaurant, and she did something shocking: During surveillance, she took a bowl from the cashier, came back, let her child urinate in the bowl, and then put it in the bowl. Put the bowl under the table. The person in charge of the restaurant said that the woman neither asked the waiter for help nor asked where the toilet was. "The restaurant has been open for seven or eight years and has never encountered this kind of thing!" How can such parents educate their children? http://t.cn/R4LRxP9

chinese_text: #拍案#【湖北官员KTV叫小姐想赖账 曾雇佣“学生军”强拆】3个月前湖北汉川雇佣“学生军”强拆并致伤，仙女山街道办事处党工委副书记程少文被指带头参与并出钱。《新闻极客》获悉，11月底程少文在KTV宴请领导叫小姐想赖账，怕被打又自行报警，此时他的升职公示还没有半个月。http://t.cn/R4UKUkR
text: #白典#[Hubei official KTV hired "student army" to demolish the girl because she wanted to default on the bill] Three months ago, Hubei Hanchuan hired "student army" to demolish and injure people. Cheng Shaowen, deputy secretary of the Party Working Committee of Fairy Mountain Subdistrict Office, was accused of taking the lead. Get involved and chip in. "News Geek" learned that at the end of November, Cheng Shaowen hosted a banquet at a KTV for his boss, Ms. Ming, and wanted to default on the bill. He was afraid of being beaten and called the police on his own. At this time, his promotion was not announced for half a month. http://t.cn/R4UKUkR

chinese_text: #就业有位来#【[推荐]PPT演讲9大实用技巧】①10-20-30原则：PPT不超10张，演讲不超20分钟，字体大于30号 ②有趣些 ③放慢速度 ④眼神交流 ⑤15个词总结想法 ⑥20-20原则：20张幻灯片，每张讲20秒 ⑦不要读幻灯片 ⑧可加入小故事 ⑨从听众角度出发。答辩、考试、工作总结、升职都用得上！转！
text: #job有点来# [[Recommended] 9 practical skills for PPT presentations] ① 10-20-30 principle: PPT should not exceed 10 pictures, speech should not exceed 20 minutes, font size should be larger than 30 points ② Be interesting ③ Slow down ④ Make eye contact ⑤ Summarize the idea in 15 words ⑥ 20-20 principle: 20 slides, talk for 20 seconds each ⑦ Don’t read the slides ⑧ Add short stories ⑨ Start from the audience’s perspective. Used for defenses, exams, work summaries, and promotions! change!

chinese_text: #热点#【北京重污染红警首日逾2万辆车违反限行】19日，北京重污染红色预警首日，逾2万辆车违反单双号限行。另据环保部消息，至昨日，京津冀及周边地区70个地级以上城市中，25城现重度及以上污染。专家称，由于预测准确，提前发出预警，及时采取措施，污染物的积累速度大为减缓。http://t.cn/R4UxwMM
text: #hotspot# [More than 20,000 vehicles violated traffic restrictions on the first day of Beijing’s heavy pollution red alert] On the 19th, on the first day of Beijing’s heavy pollution red alert, more than 20,000 vehicles violated odd and even number restrictions. According to the Ministry of Environmental Protection, as of yesterday, 25 of the 70 prefecture-level and above cities in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei and surrounding areas were severely polluted or above. Experts say that due to accurate predictions, early warnings and timely measures, the accumulation of pollutants has been greatly slowed down. http://t.cn/R4UxwMM

chinese_text: 【中韩中澳自贸协定今起生效 哪些商品马上免税】澳大利亚的龙虾制品、罐装鲍鱼等将立即取消关税；韩国西洋参、天麻等关税也降为零；但澳大利亚奶粉、牛排，韩国化妆品，则没有马上免税，澳大利亚配方奶粉4年后才完全免税…有专家指出，降税范围虽广，但过程较长，降税的优惠不会立刻体现在终端价格上。
text: [What products will be immediately tax-free under the China-Korea-China-Australia Free Trade Agreement?] Australian lobster products, canned abalone, etc. will have their tariffs removed immediately; Korean American ginseng, Gastrodia elata, etc. tariffs will also be reduced to zero; but Australian milk powder, steak, Korean cosmetics, etc. There is no immediate tax exemption, and Australian formula milk powder will be completely tax-free four years later... Some experts pointed out that although the scope of tax reduction is wide, the process is long, and the tax reduction benefits will not be immediately reflected in the terminal price.

chinese_text: 【“朝阳群众”今年提供线索共21万条 涉毒851条】因举报网络大V、明星艺人嫖娼、吸毒，神秘的“朝阳群众”被网友称为“世界第五大王牌情报组织”。今年北京“朝阳群众”共提供线索21万条，其中涉毒851条，从中破案483起。警力有限，民力无限，必须给点赞[good]http://t.cn/R4yjujc（图：平安北京）
text: [This year, the "Chaoyang Crowds" provided a total of 210,000 clues and 851 drug-related clues.] The mysterious "Chaoyang Crowds" has been called "the world's fifth-largest ace intelligence organization" by netizens for reporting on Internet celebrities and celebrity artists for prostitution and drug abuse. This year, Beijing's "Chaoyang Masses" provided a total of 210,000 clues, including 851 drug-related clues, from which 483 cases were solved. The police force is limited, but the people’s force is unlimited. We must like [good] http://t.cn/R4yjujc (Photo: Safe Beijing)

chinese_text: 【[话筒]急转寻人！2岁男童失踪3天 可能被拐！】尤子奥，身高0.85米，17日13时在安徽灵璧县尤集镇尤圩村二失踪，当时身穿蓝色白点外衣、灰裤子、灰棉鞋。有村民说，当天有不明身份、戴口罩得女性一直在附近转悠。公安部打拐办主任@陈士渠 表示已部署调查。如有线索请尽快联系警方！扩散！帮宝贝回家！
text: [[Microphone] Turn quickly to find someone! 2-year-old boy missing for 3 days may have been abducted! 】You Ziao, 0.85 meters tall, disappeared in Youwei Village 2, Youji Town, Lingbi County, Anhui Province at 13:00 on the 17th. He was wearing a blue coat with white spots, gray pants, and gray cotton shoes. Some villagers said that an unidentified woman wearing a mask had been wandering around the area that day. Director of the Anti-Human Trafficking Office of the Ministry of Public Security @陈士qu said that an investigation has been deployed. If you have any clues, please contact the police as soon as possible! diffusion! Help the baby get home!

chinese_text: 【自行车比赛，终点前，前面对手爆胎了，你会怎么办？】近日，西班牙一场自行车赛，一位选手距终点300米时遭遇爆胎，观众都为他惋惜时，没想到，后面的选手却放慢速度，放弃超越！两人通过终点时，观众热烈鼓掌，赛后，爆胎选手想将奖牌交给放弃超车那位的选手，但被拒绝。[赞]http://t.cn/R4ybtFD
text: [In a bicycle race, before the finish line, your opponent in front has a puncture. What will you do? 】Recently, in a bicycle race in Spain, a cyclist suffered a puncture 300 meters from the finish line. When the audience felt sorry for him, unexpectedly, the cyclists behind him slowed down and gave up on overtaking! When the two passed the finish line, the audience applauded enthusiastically. After the race, the runner with a flat tire wanted to give the medal to the runner who gave up overtaking, but was refused. [Like] http://t.cn/R4ybtFD

chinese_text: 【村民上海卖煎饼年收入几十万】齐鲁网12月19日讯临沂平邑县郑城镇油篓村共有36栋两层别墅、四栋居民楼，而每当过年过节，村里的宝马、奔驰、玛莎拉蒂等豪车根本停不开。年收入20多万的家庭算一般一下情况。深山农民可以“收入超越上海”，都因为一张煎饼。http://t.cn/R4UN1bC
text: [Villagers earn hundreds of thousands a year selling pancakes in Shanghai] Qilu.com reported on December 19 that there are 36 two-story villas and four residential buildings in Youlu Village, Zhengcheng Town, Pingyi County, Linyi. During the New Year and holidays, BMWs and Mercedes-Benzes in the village , Maserati and other luxury cars cannot be parked at all. A family with an annual income of more than 200,000 yuan is considered an average situation. Farmers in the mountains can "earn more than those in Shanghai" all because of a pancake. http://t.cn/R4UN1bC

text: #break# [An industrial park in Shenzhen was exposed to be buried by a landslide] According to netizens, a landslide occurred in Liuxi Industrial Park, Hong'ao Village, Guangming New District, Shenzhen, swallowing up the entire industrial park, which is about 100,000 square meters. Now, The number of people is still being counted, and it is not certain whether there are any casualties. All vehicles are now prohibited from entering the landslide area. http://t.cn/R4UlbgX

chinese_text: 【央视快讯：山体滑坡致#深圳十余栋楼房倒塌#！有人被困】今日11:40，深圳光明长圳洪浪村煤气站旁山体滑坡，接警后，光明、公明、特勤二中队7辆消防车、30名消防员到场处置。目前，山体滑坡已造成多栋楼坍塌，坍塌范围较大，据了解，现场有人被困，消防正在搜救被。（央视记者魏星）
text: [CCTV News: Landslide caused the collapse of more than ten buildings in #Shenzhen#! Someone is trapped] At 11:40 today, a landslide occurred next to the Honglang Village Gas Station in Guangming Changzhen, Shenzhen. After receiving the alarm, 7 fire trucks and 30 firefighters from the Guangming, Gongming, and Special Service Second Squadrons arrived at the scene to handle the situation. At present, landslides have caused the collapse of many buildings in a large area. It is understood that people are trapped at the scene, and fire fighters are searching and rescuing them. (CCTV reporter Wei Xing)

chinese_text: #正能量#【与儿子分别时，她泪水打湿捐献登记表…】罗秀容提出捐献儿子小罗的器官后，专家组来给小罗做最后诊断。罗秀容不能进病房，只能站门口摸着儿子照片流泪，泪水沾湿登记表。她用这辈子最大的力气在登记表上按下手印，此后小罗被送进手术室，成为江苏无锡捐献器官的第19人…
text: #正energy# [When she was separated from her son, she wet the donation registration form with tears...] After Luo Xiurong proposed to donate her son Ronaldinho's organs, a team of experts came to make a final diagnosis for Ronaldinho. Luo Xiurong could not enter the ward, so she could only stand at the door and touch her son's photo and cry, her tears moistening the registration form. She used the greatest strength in her life to press her fingerprint on the registration form. After that, Ronaldinho was sent to the operating room and became the 19th person to donate organs in Wuxi, Jiangsu...

chinese_text: #深圳山体滑坡#【救援续报: 已解救出4名被困人员】 目前，深圳已调18中队、185名消防员、37辆消防车和搜救犬分队赶赴现场。13时13分，现场报称已解救出4名被困人员（1人轻伤，其他3人无受伤），另外发现还有1名群众被困，正在营救。新浪新闻正直播事故进展：http://t.cn/R4UjFN9
text: #ShenzhenLandslide# [Rescue update: 4 trapped people have been rescued] Currently, Shenzhen has dispatched 18 squadrons, 185 firefighters, 37 fire trucks and search and rescue dog teams to the scene. At 13:13, the scene reported that four trapped people had been rescued (one was slightly injured, the other three were not injured), and another person was found to be trapped and was being rescued. Sina News is live broadcasting the progress of the accident: http://t.cn/R4UjFN9

chinese_text: #快讯#【泰国一载中国游客巴士因车祸翻下山 人员伤亡不明】据泰国头条新闻报道，12月20日一辆载有中国游客的旅游巴士，在清迈山区的公路上，与一辆轿车相撞后翻下山去。目前相关人员正在进行抢救，伤亡不明。（环球网）

After the collision, he rolled down the mountain. Relevant personnel are currently conducting rescue operations, and the casualties are unknown. (World Wide Web)

text: [CCTV News: #ThailandBusCarryingChineseBusOverturned# More than 10 people have been killed] According to Thai media reports, around 11:30 noon on the 20th local time, a bus carrying Chinese tourists overturned. More than 10 people have been killed and many others injured. The local rescue team is carrying out rescue operations. Staff of the Chinese Consulate in Chiang Mai are rushing to the scene to understand the situation. CCTV reporters are continuing to follow up on the specific situation. (CCTV reporter Luo Wei)

chinese_text: #突发#【泰国载中国游客巴士翻车 已至10余人遇难】据泰媒报道，当地时间20号中午11：30左右，一辆满载中国游客的巴士由于刹车失灵发生翻车事故。据初步了解已经造成10-11人遇难，另外还有多人受伤，当地的救援队伍正在实施救援。中国驻清迈领馆工作人员正在赶赴现场了解情况。http://t.cn/R4UQtsd
text: #break# [Bus carrying Chinese tourists in Thailand overturned, killing more than 10 people] According to Thai media reports, around 11:30 noon on the 20th local time, a bus full of Chinese tourists overturned due to brake failure. According to preliminary information, 10-11 people have been killed and many others were injured. The local rescue team is carrying out rescue operations. Staff of the Chinese Consulate in Chiang Mai are rushing to the scene to understand the situation. http://t.cn/R4UQtsd

chinese_text: 【犯罪学证据，好吓人！】猫在主人死后不久就开始吃他们的尸体，导致取证困难，而狗，则会等上一两天，到了实在饥饿难当的时候才会这样做。 还记得你的猫蹲在对面电视机上看你的眼神么？那是在观察你是不是停止了呼吸。——康妮·弗莱彻
text: [The criminological evidence is so scary! ] Cats begin to eat their owners' bodies soon after their death, making it difficult to obtain evidence, while dogs will wait a day or two before doing so when they are really hungry. Do you still remember the way your cat squatted on the TV opposite and looked at you? That's to see if you stop breathing. ——Connie Fletcher

chinese_text: [怒] 若是有人在路上拦你，向你推销福建安溪铁观音又建议你闻一下试一下味，千万别上当，那不是铁观音是关音土-迷魂药，当你闻到就会昏倒，然后他们会拿走你所有财物或带你去某处挖器官。据说广东河北天津武汉南昌黑龙江等地开始出现了，请大家小心并发给关心的人。来自一个关心我的姐姐短信
text: [Anger] If someone stops you on the road and sells Fujian Anxi Tieguanyin to you and suggests you smell it to try it out, don’t be fooled. It’s not Tieguanyin but Guanyintu - Ecstasy. When you smell it, you will Pass out and they'll take away all your belongings or take you somewhere to dig up your organs. It is said that it has begun to appear in Guangdong, Hebei, Tianjin, Wuhan, Nanchang, Heilongjiang and other places. Please be careful and send this to those who care. A text message from a sister who cares about me

chinese_text: 今天约好去海底捞，我去了白家庄店，朋友去了红庙店，居然都点了菜上了锅悠闲的等对方，最后才知道岔了，我没带钱包，和服务员说让那边一起结帐，服务员说系统不支持，然后说，您下次来的时候再结，我吃完饭没结帐就走了，长这么大第一次遇到有饭馆能做到这样，一个企业在服务终端能做成这样太厉害了
text: Today we made an appointment to go to Haidilao. I went to the Baijiazhuang store, and my friend went to the Hongmiao store. They both ordered food, put it on the pot, and waited leisurely for each other. Finally, I realized that there was a mistake. I didn’t bring my wallet, so I told the waiter to give up. We checked out together over there, but the waiter said that the system does not support it, and then said, you can pay when you come next time. I finished my meal and left without paying. It was the first time in my life that I encountered a restaurant that could do this. It's amazing that a company can do this at the service terminal.

chinese_text: 【请注意：男人啤酒喝多了会女性化】啤酒中含有植物雌激素已非新观点，最新研究指出，植物雌激素会抑制男性睾丸分泌睾丸酮。简单来讲，植物雌激素可能使男性肌肉力量减弱、体毛减少、胡须脱落、乳房和臀部发育等，这些变化将会使男人看上去越来越像女人。
text: [Please note: Men who drink too much beer will become feminized] Beer contains phytoestrogens. The latest research points out that phytoestrogens can inhibit the secretion of testosterone in male testicles. Simply put, phytoestrogens may cause men to weaken muscle strength, reduce body hair, lose beards, develop breasts and buttocks, etc. These changes will make men look more and more like women.

chinese_text: 爱尔兰结婚不许离婚，但是可以选择年限1到100年，过期不续期就相当于自动离了，但是时间越短费用越高，1年的登记费折合人民币2万多，100年的只要6元钱。结婚一年，说明你不懂婚姻，于是有一本很厚的婚姻书要看，而选择100年只有一张纸，上面写着一句：祝你们白头到老。
text: Divorce is not allowed in Ireland, but you can choose a period of 1 to 100 years. Failure to renew after expiration is equivalent to automatic divorce, but the shorter the period, the higher the fee. The registration fee for one year is equivalent to more than 20,000 yuan, and the registration fee for 100 years is only 6 yuan. money. Being married for one year means that you don't understand marriage, so you have a thick marriage book to read, but choosing 100 years only has a piece of paper with one sentence written on it: I wish you a long life.

text: People are more likely to get angry at people they are close to than people they hate. The so-called people close to us are the people we spend most of our time with. text: The results of the different education methods in China and the United States are: A survey by the International Assessment of Educational Progress shows that among the 21 countries surveyed, Chinese children ranked first in numeracy, last in imagination, and fifth in creativity. text: [Cool trick: Hold your urine before the exam] Mirjam from the University of Twente in the Netherlands found that when doing multiple-choice questions, the more your bladder is filled, the more accurate your answers will be. In the experiment, he recruited volunteers and asked them to answer some questions after drinking water. The result was that the group that drank more water gave more accurate answers. When a person holds back his urine to a certain level, his brain will work at high speed to quickly solve the problem in front of him so that he can pee quickly. So, do you want to try it?

chinese_text: 新的骗局又来了。如果你收到任何一个电话（包括10086或10010）说是在检查你的手机线路，并要求你按#或其它任何按键，请不要按那些键，并马上结束通话。那是一家欺诈公司，他们的机器能在你按下这些键后，连接到你的SIM卡，并用你的钱来打电话。把这消息转发给尽可能多的朋友，阻止这项欺诈。
text: A new scam is here again. If you receive any call (including 10086 or 10010) saying that it is checking your mobile phone line and asking you to press # or any other keys, please do not press those keys and end the call immediately. It's a fraudulent company, and their machine can connect to your SIM card after you press these keys and use your money to make phone calls. Stop this scam by forwarding this message to as many friends as possible.

chinese_text: 【为了孩子，请拒吃转基因食品！】印度某地的羊吃了棉花收获后的草杆后，四分之一的羊死了，约5到7天内，该地区10000只羊死掉了。菲律宾和德国牲畜食用某些种类的转基因玉米后死亡了。美国农民因为喂养了某些BT玉米引起他们的猪牛绝育了。转基因食品削弱生殖能力、人体微生物平衡，吃了就是慢性自杀！
text: [For the sake of your children, please refuse to eat genetically modified foods! 】A quarter of the sheep in one area of India died after eating straw from the cotton harvest. Within about 5 to 7 days, 10,000 sheep in the area died. Livestock in the Philippines and Germany have died after eating certain types of genetically modified corn. Eating them will lead to chronic suicide!

chinese_text: 你猜这粉红东东是神马??冰淇淋??奶油??NO！这是通过机器分离后的鸡！它是出现在各种快餐中鸡块的原型。理论上这包括了一整只鸡（鸡肉，鸡骨头，脑袋等）。为防止生细菌，它平时会浸泡在氨水中；为让它更美味，会加各种人工添加剂；为让它的颜色正常些，会添加人工色素。你以后还敢吃吗???
text: Do you think this pink thing is Shenma??Ice cream??Cream??NO! This is the chicken after being separated by the machine! It is the prototype for the chicken nuggets that appear in various fast food dishes. Theoretically this includes a whole chicken (chicken, bones, head, etc.). To prevent bacteria from growing, it is usually soaked in ammonia water; to make it more delicious, various artificial additives are added; to make its color normal, artificial pigments are added. Do you dare to eat it again???

text: <Single Men and Women> Louis Koo represents the thoughts of most boys, while Daniel Wu reflects the hopes of most girls. Love is simple, not because cloth banners lose to skyscraper lights, but because a person can say it and a person can do it. Women need a sense of security and stability more! Let me tell all men the truth, don’t think that you are already very attentive. The reason she didn’t choose you is because there is a man who is more attentive than you.

chinese_text: 曾成杰不是第一个被占财灭口的富豪。百亿身家北京建昊集团董事长袁宝璟留在世间的最后一句话“我不服，我要检举”，然后判死时他出堂就成这模样！知道那白围巾底下有什么秘密吗？你联想到了张志新？袁脖子底下至少勒着细钢丝，免得他当众说出啥秘密来。随后袁氏三兄弟一起被执行死刑，形同灭门。转
text: Zeng Chengjie is not the first rich man to have his wealth silenced. Yuan Baojing, chairman of Beijing Jianhao Group with a net worth of tens of billions, said his last words in the world: "I don't accept it, I want to report it." This was what he looked like when he was sentenced to death! Do you know what's the secret under that white scarf? Do you think of Zhang Zhixin? At least a thin wire was tied under Yuan's neck to prevent him from telling any secrets in public. Subsequently, the three Yuan brothers were executed together, effectively annihilating their family. change

chinese_text: 佛罗里达州的Marco岛发生了一件感人的事件：一只狗掉进运河，一群海豚便担起了救狗的责任，附近的居民听见海豚的声音，超级大声，出来一看，原来海豚们正驼着狗狗往安全地带游，他们赶紧报警，花了将近15个小时狗狗被消防人员拉出并与主人团聚。感谢附近的居民拍下这一张感人的照片。（转载/新闻）
text: A touching incident occurred on Marco Island in Florida: a dog fell into a canal, and a group of dolphins took on the responsibility of rescuing the dog. Nearby residents heard the sound of the dolphins, which was super loud. When they came out to see it, it turned out that the dolphins were in the process of saving the dog. They hurriedly called the police after taking the dog to safety, and it took nearly 15 hours for the dog to be pulled out by firefighters and reunited with its owner. Thanks to the nearby residents for taking this touching photo. (Reprint/News)

chinese_text: 前耶鲁大学校长施密德特，近日在耶鲁大学学报上公开撰文全面炮轰中国大学，声言中国大学是人类文明史最大的笑话。他说“经验告诉我们，如果政权是腐败的，那么政府部门、社会机构同样会骇人听闻的腐败”。　他还说“中国这一代教育者不值得尊重，尤其是一些知名的教授。”　   http://t.cn/zQ49ncw
text: Schmidt, the former president of Yale University, recently wrote an article in the Yale University Journal to fully attack Chinese universities, claiming that Chinese universities are the biggest joke in the history of human civilization. He said, "Experience tells us that if the regime is corrupt, then government departments and social institutions will also be appallingly corrupt." He also said, "China's current generation of educators do not deserve respect, especially some well-known professors." http://t.cn/zQ49ncw

chinese_text: 【向人民道歉】因国民党籍台北市议员赖素如涉弊案（金额相当于20万人民币），国民党主席马英九随即发布声明，向全体台湾民众道歉。“清廉是我的生命，身为党主席，我责无旁贷，必须承担外界的所有批评与责难，也要积极负起监督与改革的责任。”什么时候，我们这边也能看到一次类似的道歉鞠躬？转
text: [Apologize to the People] Due to the corruption case involving KMT Taipei City Councilor Lai Su-ru (the amount is equivalent to 200,000 yuan), KMT Chairman Ma Ying-jeou immediately issued a statement apologizing to all Taiwanese people. "Integrity is my life. As the party chairman, I have the unshirkable responsibility. I must bear all criticism and censure from the outside world, and I must also actively assume the responsibility of supervision and reform." When will we see a similar apology here? bow? change

chinese_text: 【宪政是个啥玩意？[酷]】韩国首尔只有五辆公务车；台湾国民党总部没有一辆专车；里根儿子排队领救济金；香港贪污200元拘役8个月；美国200年内只有41个法官犯错；冰岛100年内仅有10个官员下马； 西方国家政府和政党不办媒体、所有官员财产公布、人权平等。——据说，所有这一切都是实行宪政的结果。
text: [What is constitutional government? [Cool]] There are only five official cars in Seoul, South Korea; there is not a special car at the Kuomintang headquarters in Taiwan; Reagan's son queued up to receive relief funds; Hong Kong was detained for 8 months for embezzlement of 200 yuan; only 41 judges in the United States made mistakes in 200 years; Iceland only made 100 mistakes in 100 years 10 officials were dismissed; Western governments and political parties do not run media outlets, all officials’ assets are disclosed, and human rights are equal. ——It is said that all this is the result of the implementation of constitutional government.

chinese_text: 【看病要付钱只有二十几个国家】中国工程院院士戴勀戎：“看病就得付钱。在我们这里好像天经地义。但是你们知道不知道：全世界有两百多个国家。看病要付钱只有二十几个国家。”GDP全球第二，我们做到了；每年三公消费19000亿，我们做到了；免费医疗为什么就做不到？@于建嵘@薛蛮子@任志强@作家崔成浩
text: [There are only about 20 countries where you have to pay to see a doctor] Dai Furong, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering: "You have to pay to see a doctor. It seems to be a natural thing here. But do you know: There are more than 200 countries in the world. There are only 20 countries where you have to pay to see a doctor. More than 20 countries." The GDP ranks second in the world, and we have done it; the annual consumption of three public services is 1.9 trillion, and we have done it; why can't we do free medical care? @谗京婘@雪人子@仁志强@writer Cui Chenghao

chinese_text: 【没见过吧！开眼了吧！长见识了吧！】临武县委副书记、县长贺遵庆个人资料简历：其中有两句“在职研究生学历，维稳学硕士学位”。评：平生闻所未闻，但这位县委副书记、县长贺遵庆的确是学有专长学有所为，不愧为维稳学硕士学位第一人，牛刀小试便锋芒无限，一举惊天下。
text: 【Have you never seen it before? Open your eyes! You’ve learned a lot! 】Personal information and resume of He Zunqing, deputy secretary of the Linwu County Party Committee and county magistrate: There are two sentences in it: "On-the-job postgraduate degree, master's degree in stability maintenance." Comment: I have never heard of it in my life, but He Zunqing, deputy secretary of the county party committee and county magistrate, is indeed knowledgeable and accomplished. He is worthy of being the first person to obtain a master's degree in stability maintenance.

chinese_text: 【分享图片】临武县委副书记、县长贺遵庆个人资料简历：其中有两句“在职研究生学历，维稳学硕士学位”。——不看不知道，竟然还有一门学科叫“维稳学”，还有硕士学位！真长见识了！随着社会的发展，估计还会有城管博士，截访学教授，拆迁学院士.....
