What a great experience! With the development of society, it is estimated that there will also be doctors of urban management, professors of interception, academicians of demolition...

chinese_text: 【 #福州城事# 全国通缉逃逸司机、寻求目击者】7月15日 、发生在福州六一路和东大路交叉口的惨烈车祸，事故造成一女子当场死亡。脑浆都出来了！惨不忍睹！肇事者逃跑下落不明！（不要问为什么不打马赛克，目击者说疑是部队大车，有遮牌。哪怕你只有一个粉丝、你需要做的就是转发。） 大家帮扩散！
text: [ #福州城事# Nationwide wanted escape driver, seeking witnesses] On July 15, a tragic car accident occurred at the intersection of Liuyi Road and Dongda Road in Fuzhou. The accident resulted in the death of a woman on the spot. The brain matter is coming out! Horrible! The perpetrator escaped and his whereabouts are unknown! (Don’t ask why there is no mosaic. Eyewitnesses said it was a military vehicle with a cover plate. Even if you only have one fan, all you need to do is repost it.) Everyone, help spread the word!

chinese_text: 刚才，百度急忙把“抢尸县长”贺遵庆个人资料简历修改了，“把维稳学硕士学位”改成了“硕士学位”，把“维稳学”仨字去掉了。这就是百度哟！呵呵！还记得海淀银枪小霸王的资料吗？1991年出生修改为1995年出生。
text: Just now, Baidu hurriedly modified the personal information and resume of He Zunqing, the "corpse snatching county magistrate", changing "Master's degree in stability maintenance" to "Master's degree", and removed the three words "stability maintenance". This is Baidu! hehe! Do you still remember the information about Haidian Silver Gun Kid? Born in 1991 was changed to born in 1995.

chinese_text: 【维稳学】网友查明湖南临武县长为“维稳学”硕士，“维稳学”，一个令国人跌破眼镜、满地找牙的“学科”诞生了。一个能产生“维稳学”的国度，实际上就不可能有别的人文社科学科了。所有官吏每天攻读“维稳学”，实践“维稳学”，共同开创这一伟大学科的新纪元！维稳学，实为殡仪馆美容学！
text: [Stability Maintenance Studies] Netizens found out that the mayor of Linwu County in Hunan has a master's degree in "Stability Maintenance Studies". "Stability Maintenance Studies", a "discipline" that has shocked the Chinese people and left them scratching their heads, was born. In a country that can produce "stability maintenance studies", it is actually impossible to have other humanities and social science disciplines. All officials study "stability maintenance studies" and practice "stability maintenance studies" every day, and jointly create a new era of this great subject! The science of maintaining stability is actually the science of cosmetology in funeral parlors!

chinese_text: 【临武县县长是维稳学硕士学位】临武县委副书记、县长 贺遵庆的百度个人资料简历：其中有两句“在职研究生学历，维稳学硕士学位”。[晕][晕][吃惊][吃惊]打死瓜农、抢走尸体、围殴记者⋯⋯原来人家是维稳高材生！
text: [The head of Linwu County has a master's degree in stability maintenance] Baidu profile resume of He Zunqing, deputy secretary of the Linwu County Party Committee and county magistrate: There are two sentences in it: "On-the-job graduate degree, master's degree in stability maintenance." [Dizzy] [Dizzy] [Surprised] [Surprised] Beating the melon farmers to death, snatching away the bodies, and beating up the reporters... It turned out that he was a top student in maintaining stability!

chinese_text: 【惊爆：抢尸县长竟然是----维稳学硕士！】惊闻临武县长贺遵庆是维稳学硕士，怪不得指挥凌晨抢尸，处变不惊，临危不乱！（下图为贺遵庆亲临现场，指挥武警抢尸）不知哪所学校或机构有维稳学硕士学位授予权？另外，县委书记范儒平之子，23岁，违规提拔县团委书记，正科级。果然虎父无犬子，世袭天下！
text: [Shocking news: The corpse-robbing county magistrate turned out to be----Master of Stability Maintenance! 】I was shocked to hear that Linwu County Magistrate He Zunqing has a master's degree in stability maintenance. No wonder he commanded the body snatching in the early morning and remained calm in the face of danger. (The picture below shows He Zunqing personally attending the scene and instructing the armed police to snatch the body.) I wonder which school or institution has the right to award a master's degree in stability maintenance? In addition, the 23-year-old son of County Party Committee Secretary Fan Ruping was illegally promoted to County Youth League Committee Secretary to the rank of full subject. Sure enough, the tiger father has no dog sons, and he is hereditary throughout the world!

chinese_text: 紧急通知，汕头市出事了！揭阳市出事了！潮州、汕尾、深圳、广州都相继出事了！大家一定要互相转告，有几个人拿着香皂，到人家里去推销，说你闻这香皂，特香，等你一闻，一两分钟的时间，就晕过去了，他就把值钱的东西都拿走了，大家一定要转发。
text: Urgent notice, something happened in Shantou City! Something happened in Jieyang City! Chaozhou, Shanwei, Shenzhen, and Guangzhou all had accidents one after another! Everyone must tell each other that there are some people who go to people's homes with soaps to sell them, saying that when you smell this soap, it is very fragrant. When you smell it, you will faint in a minute or two, and then he will give away the valuable things. All taken away, everyone must forward it.

chinese_text: 惨啊 小小年纪就离开人事，离开自己的爸妈，去了一个遥远的地方，永远的离开自己的爸妈， 而撞到小孩的司机也逃之夭夭，小孩的爸妈也很穷，想给小孩买给棺材都没有钱，，腾讯公司说，这说说被转多少次就给那家孩子多少钱，，有良心的朋友就帮帮忙吧，出一份爱心帮帮小孩。 http://t.cn/zQ70Exk
text: It's tragic that he left his job and his parents at a young age and went to a distant place, leaving his parents forever. The driver who hit the child also ran away. The child's parents were also very poor and wanted to give the child something. There is no money to buy the coffin. Tencent said that it will give the child how much money it will give to the child no matter how many times it is forwarded. Friends with conscience should help and show their love to help the children. http://t.cn/zQ70Exk

chinese_text: 【此时想起：关东大侠】 2001年，沈阳市民关家东双手执刀，将20多名暴 力执法者7人扎倒、四死三伤。而后驾摩托车到母亲坟前跪拜，几小时后被抓获。关家东被枪决当天，妻子收到沿途沈阳群众捐款40多万元，群众称之“关东大侠”。此后沈阳城市执法人员态度大为改观！@钢子
text: [Thinking of: Guandong Heroes] In 2001, Guan Jiadong, a Shenyang citizen, held a knife in both hands and knocked down seven of more than 20 violent law enforcement officers, killing four and injuring three. Then he drove a motorcycle to kneel down in front of his mother's grave and was arrested a few hours later. On the day Guan Jiadong was executed, his wife received more than 400,000 yuan in donations from people in Shenyang along the way, and the people called her the "Guandong Hero." Since then, the attitude of Shenyang city law enforcement officers has greatly changed! @gangzi

chinese_text: 【三峡早已私有化?】新浪博主金砖家发博称，三峡工程实现发电收入每年200多亿元，但并不属于百姓，也不属于国务院。三峡工程所有的水轮发电机已私有化，属于长江水利股份有限公司。那些三峡主上派，相关部委、各级官员及主要工程技术人员，持有这个股份公司原始股。解决问题靠全民，实现收入归个人。
text: [Has the Three Gorges been privatized long ago?] Sina blogger BRIC said in a blog post that the Three Gorges Project generates power generation revenue of more than 20 billion yuan per year, but it does not belong to the people or the State Council. All the turbine generators of the Three Gorges Project have been privatized and belong to the Yangtze River Water Conservancy Co., Ltd. Those responsible for the Three Gorges Project, relevant ministries and commissions, officials at all levels and key engineering and technical personnel hold the original shares of this joint-stock company. Solving problems depends on the whole people, and achieving income belongs to individuals.

chinese_text: 【国贼！】中国投资美国两房债券3760亿美元全部泡汤,这是全球大新闻,在中国是禁闻。中国持有美国国债总额9002亿美元,是美最大债权国,而两房债卷占45%。随着美国两房退市,中国约40000亿美元债券血本无归,成为一废纸。辛丑条约赔款4.5亿两,平均一国人赔一两,而现在每人要赔300多美元。转
text: 【National thief! 】China’s investment of US$376 billion in U.S. Fannie Mae and Freddie Bond bonds was completely wiped out. This is a big news in the world and is taboo in China. China holds a total of US$900.2 billion in US Treasury bonds, making it the largest creditor of the US, with Fannie and Freddie accounting for 45%. With the delisting of Fannie and Freddie in the United States, China's approximately US$4 trillion in bonds have lost all their money and become useless paper. The Xinchou Treaty paid 450 million taels in compensation, with an average of one tael per person in the country, but now each person has to pay more than 300 US dollars. change

chinese_text: 【县招办失职，谁为李盟盟主持公道？】李盟盟，21岁，河南开封县陈留四中学生，今年高考565分。因县招办失职把她的志愿申请锁在柜子忘了提交，造成任何大学都上不成。河南省高招办回应，此事不予处理！李盟盟是农村孩子，为供其上学妹妹辍学打工，父亲打工摔断了腿。你的一次转发也许就能帮她改变命运
text: [The county recruitment office failed in its duties, who will seek justice for Li Mengmeng? 】Li Mengmeng, 21 years old, a student of Chenliu No. 4 Middle School in Kaifeng County, Henan Province, scored 565 in this year's college entrance examination. Because the county admissions office was negligent and locked her application in a cabinet and forgot to submit it, she was unable to get into any college. The High Recruitment Office of Henan Province responded that the matter will not be handled! Li Mengmeng is a child from a rural area. He dropped out of school and worked to support his younger sister in school. His father broke his leg while working. Your forwarding may be able to help her change her destiny

chinese_text: 这是著名的云南怒江傈僳族女孩飞索渡江求学！每年都有十几个孩子掉进滚滚怒江，修一座桥40万，当地县政府说没钱，因为是国家贫困县，记者高天俊质问：为何书记的奥迪车70多万？ 大家转起！来为孩子能有一座上学的桥而转！[话筒][话筒][话筒]——姚健说
text: This is the famous Lisu girl from the Nujiang River in Yunnan flying across the river to study! Every year, more than a dozen children fall into the rolling Nu River. It costs RMB 400,000 to build a bridge. The local county government says it has no money because it is a poor county in the country. Reporter Gao Tianjun asked: Why does the secretary’s Audi car cost more than RMB 700,000? Everyone, turn around! Come and help your children have a bridge to go to school! [Microphone][Microphone][Microphone]——Yao Jian said

chinese_text: 30多年过去了，美军一直在寻找在柬埔寨，越南，老挝，失踪美军士兵遗骸“挖地三尺”也要找到在亚洲阵亡士兵的遗骸！就为了“带每个人回家”这个承诺，这项工作从来没有停止过！任何人只要找到阵亡的美军遗骸，可以得到25万美元，帮助申请移民美国！终于明白了人民的祖国，任何时候都不会抛弃他的人民。
text: More than 30 years have passed, and the U.S. military has been searching for the remains of missing U.S. soldiers in Cambodia, Vietnam, and Laos. They are "digging three feet" to find the remains of soldiers killed in Asia! Just for the promise of "bringing everyone home", this work never stops! Anyone who finds the remains of a fallen American soldier can get $250,000 to help apply for immigration to the United States! Finally understood that the people's motherland will never abandon its people at any time.

chinese_text: 重大喜讯；霸州市城区某村正在开发拆迁，一户沈姓居民与登门动员拆迁的人员发生争执进而动武，由于户主夫妻与儿子都学过武术，竟陆续打倒7名拆迁人员，造成一人轻伤，目前该案正由当地警方侦办。2013年7月17日下午，记者最新报道，女主人飞脚踢断了拆迁队长的下身。
text: Great news: A village in the urban area of Bazhou City is undergoing development and demolition. A resident named Shen had a dispute with the demolition personnel who came to the door and resorted to violence. Since the head of the household, his wife and son had all learned martial arts, they knocked down seven demolition personnel one after another, causing one person to be seriously injured. Injured, the case is currently being investigated by the local police. On the afternoon of July 17, 2013, reporters reported that the hostess broke the demolition captain’s lower body with a flying kick.

chinese_text: 【大罢工：学生工疲劳死 其父又被打死】网曝：7月20日，湖北广水市强海制鞋厂工人罢工第2日，为被厂方打死的杜氏讨公道，造成交通堵塞。特警奉命暴力驱赶，多名工人、学生被殴打。据悉，12日，刚上班3天的武汉理工大学学生杜春晓因工作时间过长(12小时)中暑身亡，其父在找厂方维权时被当着警察面打死。
text: [General strike: Student worker died of fatigue and his father was beaten to death] Internet exposure: On July 20, workers at the Qianghai Shoe Factory in Guangshui City, Hubei Province went on strike for the second day to seek justice for Du, who was beaten to death by the factory. Traffic jam. Special police were ordered to drive them away violently, and many workers and students were beaten. It is reported that on the 12th, Du Chunxiao, a student at Wuhan University of Technology who had just been working for three days, died of heatstroke due to excessive working hours (12 hours). His father was beaten to death in front of the police when he went to the factory to defend his rights.

chinese_text: 【是真还是假？】2012年杜春晓以六百多分的成绩考入武汉理工，今年暑假在广水强海制鞋厂做暑期工，7月12号晚九点左右死亡，厂方称其突发性心肌梗塞，其父母去评理数日，据说目前父亲已经被活活打死，母亲疯癫，奶奶住院。 一个四口之家就这样散了....谁来辟谣？
text: 【Is it true or false? ] In 2012, Du Chunxiao was admitted to Wuhan University of Technology with a score of over 600 points. This summer, he worked as a summer job at the Guangshui Qianghai Shoe Factory. He died around 9pm on July 12. The factory said he had a sudden myocardial infarction. , his parents went to the hospital for several days for evaluation. It is said that his father has been beaten to death, his mother is crazy, and his grandmother is hospitalized. A family of four broke up like this...Who is going to refute the rumors?

chinese_text: 【学生工疲劳死 其父又被打死】网曝：7月20日，湖北广水市强海制鞋厂工人罢工第2日，为被厂方打死的杜氏讨公道，造成交通堵塞。特警奉命暴力驱赶，多名工人、学生被殴打。据悉，12日，刚上班3天的武汉理工大学学生杜春晓因工作时间过长，中暑身亡，其父在找厂方维权时被当着警察面打死。
text: [Student worker died from fatigue and his father was beaten to death] Internet exposure: On July 20, workers at the Qianghai Shoe Factory in Guangshui City, Hubei went on strike for the second day to seek justice for Du, who was beaten to death by the factory, causing traffic jams. Special police were ordered to drive them away violently, and many workers and students were beaten. It is reported that on the 12th, Du Chunxiao, a student at Wuhan University of Technology who had just been on the job for three days, died of heat stroke due to long working hours. His father was beaten to death in front of the police when he went to the factory to defend his rights.

chinese_text: 【转自搜狐微博】對付女小贩，我城管採取脫褲維穩法；7月2日，惠州惠城區河南岸上馬庄启明苑门前一幕。
text: [Reposted from Sohu Weibo] To deal with female vendors, our urban management adopted the method of taking off their pants to maintain stability; July 2, a scene in front of the Qiming Garden in Shangmazhuang on the bank of the river in Huicheng District, Huizhou.

chinese_text: 7月20日湖北广水市强海制鞋厂出大事了 武汉理工大学学生杜春晓因超长度工作(12小时)中暑身亡 其父在找厂方维权时被当着警察面打死。[闪电]评:天理在哪里？公道在哪里？转！@习美黄德荣
text: On July 20, a serious incident occurred at the Qianghai Shoe Factory in Guangshui City, Hubei Province. Du Chunxiao, a student at Wuhan University of Technology, died of heatstroke due to excessive work (12 hours). His father was beaten to death in front of the police when he went to the factory to defend his rights. [Lightning] Comment: Where is the law of heaven? Where is the justice? change! @西美黄 Derong

chinese_text: 今天终于亲眼见到了城管暴力执法，真是往死里打啊！一群年轻力壮的城管围殴一个板车小贩，而且下死手，根本不管是不是要害。图中人已经被按在车上了，后脑、脊柱等致命部位暴露无遗。如果不是围观群众上来解围恐怕非死即残。山东那哥们必然也是这么被打残废的。操，谁他妈给你们权力这么对待老百姓的！
text: Today I finally saw with my own eyes the violent law enforcement by the urban management. I was really beaten to death! A group of young and strong urban management officers surrounded a cart vendor and beat him to death, regardless of whether he was injured or not. The person in the picture has been pinned to the car, with the back of his head, spine and other fatal parts exposed. If it hadn't been for the onlookers coming to the rescue, he would have died or been maimed. That guy from Shandong must have been crippled like this. Damn it, who the hell gave you the right to treat people like this!

chinese_text: 【网曝：北京城管暴力执法】@赖小特特：今天终于亲眼见到了城管暴力执法，真是往死里打啊！一群年轻力壮的城管围殴一个板车小贩，而且下死手，根本不管是不是要害。图中人已经被按在车上了，后脑、脊柱等致命部位暴露无遗。如果不是围观群众上来解围恐怕非死即残。山东那哥们必然也是这么被打残废的。
text: [Internet Exposure: Violent Law Enforcement by Beijing Urban Management Bureau] @laixiaotete: Today I finally saw the violent law enforcement by urban management officials with my own eyes. I was really beaten to death! A group of young and strong urban management officers surrounded a cart vendor and beat him to death, regardless of whether he was injured or not. The person in the picture has been pinned to the car, with the back of his head, spine and other fatal parts exposed. chinese_text: 水利部官员首次承认三峡工程设计失误！这个由邓、李等主导的工程，历时17年，投资954.6亿，年发电量却仅占全国总量的1.76%！还有三门峡，才建成2年，泥沙一直淤积到西安，富饶的渭水平原沦为盐碱地，大量移民背井离乡，也许我们会见证一场更巨大的灾难：长江断航、重庆被淹、四川洪水…
text: Officials from the Ministry of Water Resources admitted for the first time that the design of the Three Gorges Project was wrong! This project led by Deng, Li and others lasted 17 years and invested 95.46 billion, but the annual power generation only accounted for 1.76% of the country's total! There is also Sanmenxia, which was only built two years ago. Silt has been deposited all the way to Xi'an. The fertile Wei River Plain has turned into saline-alkali land. A large number of immigrants have left their homes. Perhaps we will witness an even greater disaster: the Yangtze River is cut off, Chongqing is flooded, Sichuan floods...

chinese_text: 《有消息四川万源卖蘑菇被打伤学生已经死亡》 孩子高考600多分，考入重本。家境贫寒，将爷爷采的蘑菇来城里卖，以拼凑学费，被城管殴打致死。老百姓围了市政府！中国特色的城管狂妄无忌，视百姓的生命财产如草芥，将暴政展现的淋漓尽致。请网友转起来，为这个无助的家庭讨还公道！
text: "There is news that the student who was injured while selling mushrooms in Wanyuan, Sichuan has died" The child scored more than 600 points in the college entrance examination and passed the exam. He came from a poor family and brought the mushrooms picked by his grandfather to the city to sell them to pay for school fees. He was beaten to death by the urban management. People surrounded the city hall! The urban management with Chinese characteristics are arrogant and treat people's lives and property as nothing, which vividly demonstrates tyranny. Netizens please spread the word and seek justice for this helpless family!

chinese_text: 一名利用假期卖菌的四川万源学生,遭到数名城管殴打,原因不明。学生被迅速送往医院,目前仍在昏迷。马上要转往成都。万源不是一个小县城，安居乐业挺好的，。这些城管谁他们给你们这么打的权利可以掌控人的生死。临武的悲剧才过去多长时间啊?伤疤还没好,就忘了疼? 《 ... http://t.cn/zQx280R
text: A student from Wanyuan, Sichuan, who used his vacation to sell mushrooms, was beaten by several urban management officers for unknown reasons. The student was rushed to the hospital and is still in a coma. I will transfer to Chengdu soon. Wanyuan is not a small county, and it is quite good to live and work in peace and contentment. Who are these urban management officials? They give you the power to control people's life and death. How long has it been since the tragedy of Linwu? The scar has not healed yet, and the pain has been forgotten? "... http://t.cn/zQx280R

chinese_text: 湖南临武城管打死瓜农，青海西宁城管围殴警察，四川成都城管围殴中年夫妇，北京城管痛击带9岁女儿练摊的父亲，四川达州城管打死卖蘑菇的17岁穷学生，福建漳州城管打死村民……血色的七月，英勇的城管打赢了一场又一场与中国人的战争，用中国人的鲜血为鲜艳的五星红旗祭旗。
text: Urban management officials in Linwu, Hunan, beat melon farmers to death; urban management officials in Xining, Qinghai Province beat up police officers; urban management officials in Chengdu, Sichuan Province beat up a middle-aged couple; urban management officials in Beijing beat the father who brought his 9-year-old daughter to practice at a stall; urban management officials in Dazhou, Sichuan beat to death a 17-year-old poor student selling mushrooms, Fujian Zhangzhou urban management beat villagers to death... In the bloody July, the heroic urban management won one war after another with the Chinese, using the blood of the Chinese to honor the bright five-star red flag.

chinese_text: 中国红十字会是世界上唯一没有加入世界红十字会的组织，因为加入就必须在人员安排、管理、行动上符合国际红十字会的规程，并且账目必须向国际红十字会公开，中国政府以干涉内政为由拒绝加入，用这个无耻的借口逃避公众的监督，为其官员贪腐大开方便之门。说到底中国红十字会是伪红十字会！@K歌快乐
text: The Red Cross Society of China is the only organization in the world that has not joined the World Red Cross Society. To join, it must comply with the International Red Cross Society’s procedures in terms of personnel arrangements, management, and actions, and its accounts must be disclosed to the International Red Cross Society. The Chinese government has They refused to join on the grounds of interfering in internal affairs. They used this shameless excuse to evade public supervision and opened the door for corruption among their officials. After all, the Red Cross of China is a pseudo-Red Cross! @karaokehappy

chinese_text: 【县长领兵来征地，逐被村妇猛泼粪】7月25日，贵州榕江县长、公安局长带领武警、特警等400余人，到车江乡某村非法征地，不料千名村民操起镰刀、锄头、粪桶对抗，县长被妇女们泼满大粪，不少武警也变得臭不可闻。现场杀声震天，犹如未日星球大战！
text: [The county magistrate led troops to expropriate land, but was violently pelted with feces by a village woman] On July 25, the magistrate of Rongjiang County and the director of public security in Guizhou led more than 400 people including armed police and special police to illegally expropriate land in a village in Chejiang Township. Unexpectedly, thousands of people were killed The villagers fought with sickles, hoes, and excrement buckets. The county magistrate was splashed with excrement by the women, and many armed police officers also became stinky. The killing sound at the scene was as loud as the final Star Wars!

chinese_text: 内涵图：我是个货车司机，昨天被交警拦了，证件齐全没有违规！ 然后他说我没有带灭火器，我说我带了拿给他看，他又说灭火器坏的。 我说好的不信你看，于是熟练的打开保险对着他按下了我人生中最愚蠢的一下！ 现在在交警队学习，他要告我袭警！
text: Connotation picture: I am a truck driver. I was stopped by the traffic police yesterday. I have all the documents and no violations! Then he said I didn't bring a fire extinguisher. I said I did and showed it to him, but he said the fire extinguisher was broken. If you don’t believe me, I said yes, so I skillfully opened the safety button and pressed the most stupid button in my life! Now I'm studying in the traffic police force. He wants to sue me for assaulting a police officer!

chinese_text: #越南乳瓜#神奇的越南乳瓜，神似女性的乳房，颜色略呈粉色。乳瓜成熟果实含葡萄糖、果糖、蔗糖、胡萝卜素、维生素C、酒石酸、枸椽酸、苹果酸等。未成熟果实的汁液中含多量的乳瓜蛋白酶、脂肪酶。营养价值也很高。可是这样的瓜你敢吃吗[思考]
text: #Vietnamese Milk Melon#The magical Vietnamese milk melon looks like a woman’s breast and is slightly pink in color. Ripe melon fruits contain glucose, fructose, sucrose, carotene, vitamin C, tartaric acid, citric acid, malic acid, etc. The juice of immature fruits contains large amounts of papaya protease and lipase. The nutritional value is also very high. But do you dare to eat such a melon? [Thinking]

chinese_text: 【太卑鄙了！福建考生高考成绩被调包？！】福建惠安一中今年考生，农村女孩杨婷婷在成绩公布时查询为586分，一本录取后再查询发现成绩已神奇变成364分，前后相差200多分！她表示平时成绩、估分都在500分以上，现在却连本科都读不上，怀疑成绩被调包。。[怒骂]by高考直通车@杨锦麟@米瑞蓉@任志强@于建嵘
text: 【Too despicable! Are the college entrance examination scores of Fujian students being adjusted? ! ] Yang Tingting, a rural girl who was a candidate for this year's Hui'an No. 1 Middle School in Fujian Province, checked her score when the results were announced, and her score was 586. After she was admitted, she checked again and found that her score had magically changed to 364, a difference of more than 200 points! She said that her grades and estimated scores were usually above 500 points, but now she couldn't even get into a bachelor's degree, and she suspected that her grades had been adjusted. . [Angry] by the college entrance examination through train @杨金麟 @米瑞隆 @仁志强 @宇剑徘

chinese_text: 【288条人命只判四年重新入职】况丽.女.中共党员.现在任职：云南中石化云南分公司总经理.原系新疆石油管理局教育培训中心党委副书记.是1994年克拉玛依大火（一二八事件）因为她一句同学们不要动让领导先走使得288名学童葬身火海.1995年判处有期徒刑四年.出狱后居然重新入党恢复职务.此文见一次转一次！
text: [288 lives and only four years of re-entry] Kuang Li. Female. Member of the Communist Party of China. Current position: General Manager of Yunnan Sinopec Yunnan Branch. Formerly deputy secretary of the Party Committee of the Education and Training Center of Xinjiang Petroleum Administration. She was the victim of the Karamay Fire in 1994 (1 February 8th Incident) Because she told classmates not to move and let the leaders go first, 288 schoolchildren were killed in the flames. In 1995, she was sentenced to four years in prison. After being released from prison, she actually rejoined the party and resumed her duties. See this article and repost it once!

chinese_text: 【泰国免签】中泰外长上周会面，探讨互免签证问题。新闻：http://t.cn/zQpvDvu 中新网：泰国与中国磋商将于今年9月起两国游客互免旅游签证http://t.cn/zQNnRXP 希望每年可吸引500万中国游客，之前中国影片“泰囧”带动了中国人游泰国热。泰国国家新闻局发文证实了两国即将放松签证要求的新闻（如图2）
text: [Visa exemption for Thailand] The foreign ministers of China and Thailand met last week to discuss the issue of mutual visa exemption. News: http://t.cn/zQpvDvu China News Network: Thailand and China are negotiating to exempt tourists from each other from tourist visas starting from September this year http://t.cn/zQNnRXP It is hoped to attract 5 million Chinese tourists every year. Previously, the Chinese film "囧囧" drove Chinese people to travel to Thailand. The National Information Bureau of Thailand issued a document confirming the news that the two countries are about to relax visa requirements (Figure 2)

text: [The fierce woman bombed the county government’s demolition office! 3 dead and 4 injured! 】At 9:30 this morning, an explosion occurred at Qiao's home in Zhaotong, Yunnan. Witnesses at the scene said that a female demolition household was notified that she brought explosives when she went to the county government's demolition office to sign an agreement. The explosives were detonated during the negotiation, causing the woman's death. and two staff members died on the spot, and four staff members were injured. The scene has been cordoned off. @方正宁

chinese_text: 吃榴莲后，喝可口可乐，毒过眼镜蛇！ 又一游客，客死泰国异乡！ 一位中国游客在泰国旅游的时候，吃了很多榴莲之后又喝了可乐，致咖啡因中毒血压飙升，结果引发心脏病猝死，年仅28岁，泰国有明确规定，食用大量榴莲后，8小时之内不能喝可口可乐！ 圈里爱榴莲的朋友很多，转发下! 让所有人都知道！（转）
text: After eating durian, drinking Coca-Cola has poisoned a cobra! Another tourist died in a foreign land in Thailand! While traveling in Thailand, a Chinese tourist ate a lot of durian and then drank cola, which caused caffeine poisoning and blood pressure soared. As a result, he died suddenly of a heart attack. He was only 28 years old. Thailand has clear regulations that after eating a large amount of durian, 8 hours Don’t drink Coca-Cola! There are many friends who love durian in the circle, please forward it! Let everyone know! (change)

chinese_text: 8月3日晚，湖南省湘乡市花坪镇，一私家车撞伤一名15岁小孩，车主勾结交警，将受伤小孩装入麻袋欲毁灭现场，被附近村民及伤者家属发现后拦下，因交警将装有伤者的麻袋直接从车上扔下，引起围观村民愤怒围殴交警，所驾警车被村民扣下，受伤小孩因延误救治已经死亡。 [怒]
text: On the evening of August 3, a private car hit and injured a 15-year-old child in Huaping Town, Xiangxiang City, Hunan Province. The car owner colluded with the traffic police and put the injured child into a sack in an attempt to destroy the scene. However, he was discovered by nearby villagers and the injured's family members and stopped him. At the same time, the traffic police threw the sack containing the injured directly from the car, which caused the onlookers to get angry and beat the traffic police. The police car they were driving was detained by the villagers. The injured child died due to delayed treatment. [angry]

chinese_text: 【历史的悲哀！】文革中他受冤入狱，出来时小便失禁，双腿肿胀难以站立，整个身子弓成九十度。他弓着背穿着破棉鞋，踯躅街头，乞讨为生。碰到熟知的学生便说：‘你有钱给我几个吧，所求不过三五元而已！”有谁知道，这个可怜巴巴的老头子是哈佛大学博士、两朝院士，清华物理系创始人———叶企孙教授
text: 【The sorrow of history! ] During the Cultural Revolution, he was unjustly imprisoned. When he came out, he had incontinence of urine, his legs were swollen and it was difficult to stand, and his whole body was bent at ninety degrees. He was hunched over and wearing torn cotton shoes, wandering the streets begging for a living. When he met a student he knew well, he said: "If you have money, give me some money. I only want three to five yuan!" "Does anyone know that this poor old man is Professor Ye Qisun, a Ph.D. from Harvard University, academician of two dynasties, and founder of the Department of Physics at Tsinghua University?

chinese_text: 这是一个记者在中国某贫困山区采访时拍摄的照片：记者对孩子的母亲说“尽量让孩子少吃这些油炸的速食垃圾食品。”孩子的母亲说“ 没关系，不经常吃。但是每年都会给孩子煮一次，因为今天是孩子的生日，其实我们根本舍不得吃。”生日吃的仅仅是方便面啊，一年才吃到一次！让更多人关注这些贫困的孩子。
text: This is a photo taken by a reporter during an interview in a poor mountainous area in China: The reporter said to the child’s mother, “Try to prevent the child from eating these fried fast-food junk foods.” The child’s mother said, “It’s okay, I don’t eat it often. But every year We cook them once for our children because today is their birthday and we actually don’t want to eat them at all.” What we eat for birthdays is just instant noodles, which we only eat once a year! Let more people pay attention to these poor children.

chinese_text: 【骗局新出 吓得你发冷汗】还记得那些在地铁站拦女孩，装什么闹分手，夫妻吵架的可怕男青年们吗？现在这个案例出现新骗法了，一波三折红脸黑脸都有。在惊恐状态下人可能脑子会木，小心此时出现在你身边的每个人。转给你身边的女性朋友吧！

Forward it to your female friends!

text: Those who use swords and guns die with swords and guns! Yan Shaoxiong 4: Chongqing is famous again this time [Zhou Kehua’s life and death unknown] Recently, an investigator from an organization received the unquestionable and clearest answer directly from Duan Zhipeng’s classmates, colleagues, relatives and friends, rather than indirectly: “Duan Zhipeng is dead. It's gone!" But Zhou Kehua's life and death are unknown. The deceased at the scene was Duan Zhipeng, a policeman from Yuhua Police Station, Yuhua Public Security Bureau, Changsha City, Hunan Province. The picture shows Duan’s parents crying for injustice. Duan’s father is a senior police officer.

chinese_text: 【震怒！兰州再现派出所长嫖宿数十名幼女！】今晚，兰州一位知名律师爆料，兰州城关分局某派出所副所长，通过一女皮条客以5000元不等的价格，奸宿数十名幼女，年龄最小的只有12~13岁，一幼女母亲发觉报警被抓。上周，城关分局内部下了封口令以防丑闻曝光。 行大恶者必受惩戒！求证？ 请转发！扩散！转
text: 【Angry! Lanzhou Police Station Chief Prostituted Dozens of Young Girls! 】Tonight, a well-known lawyer in Lanzhou broke the news that the deputy director of a police station in Lanzhou Chengguan Branch used a female pimp to rape dozens of young girls, the youngest of which was only 12 to 13 years old, for a price ranging from 5,000 yuan. The mother of the young girl found out and called the police and was arrested. Last week, a hush-hush order was issued within the Chengguan Branch to prevent the scandal from being exposed. Those who do great evil must be punished! Seeking confirmation? Please forward! diffusion! change

chinese_text: 朋友的老公前天在王府井地下车库取车的时候发现车的两侧倒视镜上各有一只小黄鸭，他没敢开车，找了一个保安过来，让保安把两只小黄鸭拿走，结果保安拿了小黄鸭子以后，没走几步就晕倒了。后来经过保安盘查，发现地库里其他很多车也被别了鸭子，他们当时就报警了。下图为当时拍的照片。
text: When my friend's husband picked up his car from the Wangfujing underground garage the day before yesterday, he found a little yellow duck on each side of the rearview mirror. He didn't dare to drive, so he asked a security guard to come over and ask the security guard to take away the two little yellow ducks. , but after the security guard took the little yellow duck, he fainted after walking a few steps. Later, after a security check, they found that many other cars in the basement had also been pinned to ducks. They called the police at that time. The picture below is a photo taken at that time.

chinese_text: @刘永志V 【五味草】 联合国公布全球国民素质道德水平，中国排名倒数第二。前十名国家是： 1、日本；2、 美国；3、法国；4、荷兰；5、瑞士；6、加拿大；7、澳大利亚​​；8、德国；9、俄罗斯；10、新西兰。。。。。网友点评：只用了几十年，就把一个有着数千年文明历史的国家整成这样，不容易啊！

chinese_text: 谁知道这个可能晕倒吗？〜朋友的老公前天在王府井地下车库取车的时候发现车的两侧倒视镜上各有一只小黄鸭，他没敢开车，找了保安过来，让保安把小黄鸭拿走，结果保安拿了小黄鸭子以后，没走几步就晕倒了。后来经其他保安盘查，发现地库里很多车也被别了鸭子，他们当时就报警了。下图为当时拍的照片。
text: Anyone know if this could cause fainting? ~ When my friend’s husband picked up his car from the Wangfujing underground garage the day before yesterday, he found a little yellow duck on both sides of the rearview mirror. He didn’t dare to drive, so he called the security guard and asked him to take the little yellow duck away. After the security guard took the little yellow duck, he fainted after walking a few steps. Later, other security guards checked and found that many cars in the basement were also pinned to ducks. They called the police at that time. The picture below is a photo taken at that time.

chinese_text: 周孝正V】主权在民，才有人权：98年，有三名福建工人在以色列被炸死！以政府找到中国使馆商议赔偿及处理后事，中使馆以三名工人是偷渡客为由不予理睬！以政府对此硬是一查到底，后来不远万里来到福建，把受害者骨灰交到家属手中、向三名受害者各赔了70万美元。这钱后来还被我们政府收了每人18万的税！
text: Zhou Xiaozheng V】Sovereignty lies with the people, only then can human rights exist: In 1998, three Fujian workers were bombed to death in Israel! The government approached the Chinese Embassy to discuss compensation and funeral arrangements, but the Chinese Embassy ignored the three workers on the grounds that they were stowaways! The Israeli government insisted on investigating this, and later traveled thousands of miles to Fujian to deliver the victims' ashes to their families and compensate each of the three victims US$700,000. This money was later collected by our government at a tax of 180,000 per person!

chinese_text: 【复旦经济学院副院长韦森：财政不民主,人民没活路！】今年税收超10万亿,政府是怎么花的？美国政府看上去负债累累，问题很大，但美国政府3万多亿的财政支出里,1.9万亿用在医保和社保上，占财政支出的60％—70％。我们征这么多税,用在医保上的钱却只有区区2000多亿！烧那么多的钱,却不用在老百姓身上！
text: [Vice Dean of Fudan School of Economics Weisen: Without financial democracy, the people have no way to survive! ] This year’s tax revenue exceeded 10 trillion. How did the government spend it? The U.S. government seems to be heavily in debt and has huge problems, but of the more than 3 trillion fiscal expenditures of the U.S. government, 1.9 trillion is spent on medical insurance and social security, accounting for 60% to 70% of fiscal expenditures. We levy so many taxes, but only spend more than 200 billion on medical insurance! Burn so much money, but don’t spend it on the people!

chinese_text: ✈  经常坐飞机的朋友们：今天才知道，原来20元航空意外保险能赔延误。买机票时购买的20元保险，很多是包含延误险的，飞机延误4小时以上可获得赔偿2000；延误8小时可获赔偿3000元。但是大多数乘客都不知道自己有这些权益，白白的把保费送给了保险公司，个必须转。 很是实用。
text: ✈ Friends who fly frequently: I just found out today that aviation accident insurance worth 20 yuan can cover delays. Many of the 20-yuan insurance purchased when buying a ticket includes delay insurance. If the flight is delayed for more than 4 hours, you can get compensation of 2,000 yuan; if the flight is delayed for 8 hours, you can get 3,000 yuan in compensation. But most passengers don't know that they have these rights, and they give their premiums to the insurance company in vain, which must be transferred. Very practical.

chinese_text: 蔡英文:我为什么不批评美国？有网友责问我，你怎么总是在批评我国政府和社会，却从来不批评美国，难道美国真的那么完美?答：美国是否完美，我不知道，我是中国公民，只有批评中国政府和社会的责任，这种批评基于对祖国的深刻的爱。我不是央视和环球日报，我对美国没有这样的爱，也没有批评美国的责任。
text: Tsai Ing-wen: Why don’t I criticize the United States? Some netizens asked me, why do you always criticize our country’s government and society, but never criticize the United States? Is the United States really that perfect? Answer: I don’t know whether the United States is perfect. I am a Chinese citizen, and I can only criticize the Chinese government and society. Responsibility, this criticism is based on a deep love for the motherland. I am not CCTV or Global Daily. I have no such love for the United States, and I have no responsibility to criticize the United States.

chinese_text: 美国华裔女作家张纯如因南京大屠杀研究，困惑越来越深，最后竟以自杀结束生命。 自杀前，她与亲友说：“探究南京暴行，不仅是日本人的残暴，还有中国人的奴性。中国人有一种极其恶歹的心理，在世界民族中也罕见！我看见，从来没有一种人因为不同的主子而可以作践自己的同类，到这样歹毒无耻的地步。”
text: Chinese-American female writer Chang Chun-ru became more and more confused due to her research on the Nanjing Massacre, and finally ended her life by suicide. Before committing suicide, she said to her relatives and friends: "Exploring the atrocities in Nanjing reveals not only the brutality of the Japanese, but also the slavishness of the Chinese. The Chinese have an extremely vicious mentality, which is rare among nations in the world! I have seen that there has never been a People of this kind can abuse their own kind because of different masters, to the point of being so vicious and shameless."

chinese_text: 【我们不知道的俄罗斯】1.住房不收费：人均18㎡以下无偿转给个人，18 ㎡以上部分也只收很少钱。2.用水没水表：自来水、热水从不收费。3.看病不花钱：手术、住院、治疗免费，只收药费。4.教育倒贴：上学免费，还免费供应一顿早餐或午餐。5.失业要批准：企业须提前3个月向国家申请批准后方可解雇员工。
text: [Russia we don’t know] 1. There is no charge for housing: everything below 18 square meters per capita is transferred to individuals free of charge, and only a small fee is charged for the part above 18 square meters. 2. There is no water meter when using water: There is no charge for tap water or hot water. 3. There is no cost to see a doctor: surgery, hospitalization and treatment are free, only medicine fees are charged. 4. Education rebate: schooling is free, and a free breakfast or lunch is also provided. 5. Unemployment requires approval: Enterprises must apply to the state for approval three months in advance before laying off employees.

chinese_text: 微信在传，越南通讯社报道，发现失踪的MH370，漂浮海上，大部分机身没入水中，乘客集中于尾部舱位，部分乘客依靠救生设备散落在周围一公里范围水面等待救援。如果是这样，飞机迫降海面，伤亡率将大大降低。盼望奇迹！！！
text: On WeChat, the Vietnam News Agency reported that the missing MH370 was found floating on the sea, with most of the fuselage submerged in the water. Passengers were concentrated in the tail compartment, and some passengers relied on life-saving equipment and were scattered on the water within a kilometer of the surrounding area, waiting for rescue. If so, if the plane makes an emergency landing on the sea, the casualty rate will be greatly reduced. Hope for a miracle! ! !

chinese_text: 奇迹果然出现：南通讯社3月8日19时32分快讯马来西亚航空公司飞往北京的MH370航班在失联17个小时后，在北纬065515东经1033443海域被正在执行搜救任务的菲律宾海事船发现。 　　飞机被发现时机身破损较严重，但未解体。机舱大部位于水面以下，仅机尾部露出水面，但少部分乘客和机组人员聚集在机尾部机舱
text: A miracle indeed happened: Nanjing News Agency reported at 19:32 on March 8 that Malaysian Airlines flight MH370 bound for Beijing was discovered by a Philippine maritime ship on a search and rescue mission in the sea area of 065515 north latitude and 1033443 east longitude 17 hours after losing contact. The aircraft's fuselage was severely damaged when it was discovered, but it did not disintegrate. Most of the cabin is below the water, with only the rear part of the aircraft above the water, but a small number of passengers and crew members gathered in the rear cabin.

chinese_text: 凌晨2点43分美军驻扎在泰国乌塔堡军事基地曾监听到一段马来西亚航空公司MH370航班紧急呼叫的SOS信号，客机驾驶员呼叫称机舱面临解体，他们要迫降。目前驻泰美军已向马来西亚方面提供这段信号。
text: At 2:43 a.m., the U.S. military stationed at the U-Tapao military base in Thailand monitored an SOS signal for the emergency call of Malaysia Airlines flight MH370. The pilot of the passenger plane called that the cabin was facing disintegration and they wanted to make an emergency landing. Currently, the US military stationed in Thailand has provided this signal to Malaysia.

chinese_text: 牙膏底部的短线，绿色是天然的，蓝色是天然加药物，红色是药物加化学，黑色是纯化学。
text: The short line at the bottom of the toothpaste, green is natural, blue is natural plus medicine, red is medicine plus chemistry, and black is pure chemistry.

chinese_text: 飞机失联，美国得知消息四个小时之后就出动了军事力量，今天美国国防部又宣布派出平克尼号驱逐舰和一架P-3C猎户座侦察机帮助搜救马航失联客机。可中国呢，至今没有空军海军参与救援的消息。而且连新闻报道都少得可怜。要知道飞机上坐着154名活生生的中国人啊，而美国人只有三个。悲哀，真TMD悲哀。

But as for China, there is no news so far that the air force and navy are involved in the rescue. And even news coverage was sparse. You must know that there are 154 living Chinese people on the plane, and there are only three Americans. Sad, so damn sad.

chinese_text: 通过这个，可以推测MH370是被越南空军击落的，残骸目前应该在越南领海。理一下脉络：MH370中途发现电子故障，准备返航，结果误入越南领空，越南空军喊话，但对方电子故障无法应答，于是向三亚空管核实，对方回复没有这个航班，结果越南空军将其击落，后发现酿成大错，频繁发布假消息扰乱视听。
text: Through this, it can be inferred that MH370 was shot down by the Vietnamese Air Force, and the wreckage should currently be in Vietnamese territorial waters. Let’s sort out the context: MH370 discovered an electronic fault midway and was about to return. As a result, it accidentally entered Vietnamese airspace. The Vietnamese Air Force called out, but the other party’s electronic fault could not respond. So it checked with Sanya air traffic control, and the other party replied that there was no such flight. As a result, the Vietnamese Air Force shot it down. Later, it was discovered that it had led to a big mistake, and he frequently released false news to disrupt the public.

chinese_text: 摸奶节是中国云南双柏县鄂家镇彝族传统文化的庆典就是农历的7月14日、15日与16日这三天，包括外来的游人,如果在街上遇见喜欢的女子，都可以摸一摸女子的胸部。姑娘们表面躲躲闪闪，但决无责怪之意因为这是他们这个地区的百姓延续了1000多年的风俗。小伙子以摸到奶为吉祥，姑娘们以被摸而高兴。
text: The Breast Touching Festival is a traditional cultural celebration of the Yi people in Ejia Town, Shuangbai County, Yunnan Province, China. It falls on the 14th, 15th and 16th of July in the lunar calendar. Including foreign tourists, if you meet a woman you like on the street, you can Touch the woman's breasts. The girls were evasive on the surface, but they never meant to blame because this was a custom that the people in their area had continued for more than 1,000 years. Young men consider it auspicious to touch breasts, and girls feel happy to be touched.

chinese_text: 「中青政治学院教授：杨支柱」惠州城管在执法时把女贩的裤子当众扒下的照片在网上流传，网民非常愤怒。计生扒下的女人裤子可比城管多几亿条，却很少有人关注。据说城管也有不少研究课题，怎么不能像计生系统一样研究出一种理论，证明城管当众扒下女人的裤子是很有必要的呢？跟计生相比，城管太无能了。
text: "Professor of Zhongqing Political College: Yang Zhuzhu" Photos of Huizhou urban management officials stripping off a female vendor's pants in public while enforcing the law were circulated on the Internet, and netizens were very angry. The family planning system removes hundreds of millions of pairs of women's pants than the urban management system, but few people pay attention to it. It is said that urban management also has many research topics. Why can't we develop a theory like the family planning system to prove that it is necessary for urban management to take off women's pants in public? Compared with family planning, urban management is too incompetent.

chinese_text: 刚到石家庄，下飞机，看到一个消息， 即使这个是谣言,我也宁愿相信他是真的。为370祈祷！！ 附好消息: 转侯耀华老师发朋友圈消息:"朋友的女儿在英国刚刚看完新闻,说飞机上的人都活着,都活着,说副机长是恐怖分子,飞机在印度的一个岛上,他把机上的导航和信号全毁了,咱国内的新闻还没播。真的？
text: I just arrived in Shijiazhuang, got off the plane, and saw a piece of news. Even if it was a rumor, I would rather believe it to be true. Pray for 370! ! Attached is good news: Teacher Hou Yaohua sent a message to Moments: "My friend's daughter in the UK has just watched the news, saying that everyone on the plane is alive and well, and that the co-pilot is a terrorist, and that the plane is on an island in India. He destroyed all the navigation and signals on the plane, and our domestic news has not been broadcast yet. Really?

chinese_text: 忍者QS：江苏省东海县女镇党委书记徐艳，因不愿陪县委书记关永健上床，竟然被警察毒打致子宫破裂。徐艳一怒揭开6亿贪污大案---东海县石梁河水库水淹地补偿款案，县委书记关永健一个人竟贪污6亿多元。关永健每年搞全县科级干部大调整，仅此每年受贿2000万以上。--转自人网 http://t.cn/zjKyD4R

chinese_text: 快讯：（李登辉今天凌晨心脏病复发身亡）台北消息：中华民国前总统（1988—2000年在任），国民党、台联党、有台独教父之称的李登辉、今天凌晨在其家中心脏病复发抢救无效死亡.
text: News: (Lee Teng-hui died of a heart attack early this morning) Taipei news: Lee Teng-hui, the former president of the Republic of China (in office from 1988 to 2000), the Kuomintang, the Taiwan United Party, and known as the godfather of Taiwan independence, suffered a recurrence of a heart attack at his home early this morning, and rescue efforts failed. die.

chinese_text: 白岩松 ：当世上所有人都把欲望当理想，把世故当成熟，把麻木当深沉，把怯懦当稳健，把油滑当智慧，那只能说这个社会的底线已被击穿，所以你们没有资格说我的勇敢是莽撞，执着是偏激，求真是无知，激情是幼稚。当那些兜售社会经验的流氓朝我的梦想投来轻蔑一笑的时候，我会毫不犹豫的还你一句，傻逼！
text: Bai Yansong: When everyone in the world regards desire as ideal, sophistication as maturity, numbness as profundity, cowardice as stability, and slickness as wisdom, then it can only be said that the bottom line of this society has been penetrated, so you are not qualified to say My bravery is reckless, my persistence is extreme, my pursuit of truth is ignorant, and my passion is childish. When those hooligans who sell social experience smile contemptuously at my dreams, I will say back to you without hesitation, idiot!

chinese_text: 兰州拉面不能吃了！南京电视台做了一个关于它的节目。所有兰州拉面馆都在使用拉面剂，拉面剂主要成份是蓬灰，这种化学物质含有大量致癌物质--砷。现在所有的兰州拉面都用这种制剂来使得面粉更有弹性。如果将蓬灰放入纸杯会出现氧化，而把拉面剂溶液倒在光滑地板上会出现更恐怖的腐蚀现象。
text: You can’t eat Lanzhou Ramen! Nanjing TV did a program about it. All Lanzhou ramen restaurants use ramen noodles. The main ingredient of ramen noodles is fluffy ash. This chemical substance contains a large amount of carcinogen-arsenic. All Lanzhou ramen now use this preparation to make the flour more elastic. If you put the ash into a paper cup, oxidation will occur, and if you pour the ramen noodle solution on a smooth floor, a more terrifying corrosion phenomenon will occur.

chinese_text: 【最凄凉的抗战女兵】程银宝，92岁，民国天门县长千金：19岁入国军投身抗日战争，冒枪林弹雨与日军厮杀，后腹部中弹致终身不育。49后因抗日经历屡遭批斗迫害几乎丧命，晚年住在几平米窝棚，无水无电无低保。老人说：我快要死了，只想有件新衣裳，可领导叫我去跟国民党拿！闻者催然泪下。
text: [The most desolate female soldier of the Anti-Japanese War] Cheng Yinbao, 92 years old, the daughter of Tianmen County Magistrate in the Republic of China: At the age of 19, she joined the National Army and joined the Anti-Japanese War. She fought with the Japanese army under a hail of bullets and was shot in the back of the abdomen, resulting in lifelong infertility. Those born in 1949 were repeatedly criticized and persecuted due to their anti-Japanese experience and almost died. In their later years, they lived in a shack of a few square meters with no water, electricity, or subsistence allowance. The old man said: I am going to die and I just want new clothes, but the leader asked me to go and get them from the Kuomintang! Those who heard it were moved to tears.

text: [Guandong Heroes] In 2001, Guan Jiadong, a citizen of Shenyang, held a knife with both hands and stabbed down seven of more than 20 violent law enforcement officers, killing four and injuring three. Then he drove a motorcycle to kneel down in front of his mother's grave and was arrested a few hours later. On the day Guan Jiadong was executed, his wife received more than 400,000 yuan in donations from people in Shenyang along the way, and the people called her the "Guandong Hero." Since then, the attitude of Shenyang city law enforcement officials has changed significantly. If you like it, please follow @Mysterious Wild History

text: The boss of Amway passed away! He was only 56 years old, and he had been eating Nutrilite for 27 years. How ironic! On October 16, 2013, Chen Guantian, the founder of Amway Crown 3S System, died of liver cancer at the age of 56. He had been working for Amway for 27 years and had been eating Nutrilite for 27 years. Nutrilite has made money for Americans for 27 years. Wang Ciguan, the extraordinary founder of Amway Master and the author of "Stay Away from Poverty" and "Intact Plants Are the Best Medicine", passed away in Fuzhou at 6:00 on July 29, 2006. He was 61 years old.

chinese_text: 【阿司匹林】在睡眠时心脏病突发, 剧烈胸疼足以把人从沉睡中痛醒, 立刻口含两颗阿司匹林嚼碎了咽下去，接着立刻联络急救中心，然后坐在椅子或沙发上静候援助，千万别躺下！心脏科医师强调，如果每个看到这条微博的人， 能够转发10份给其他人，肯定至少有一条命将会被救回。 请扩散！
text: [Aspirin] If you have a heart attack while sleeping, the severe chest pain is enough to wake you up from a deep sleep. You should immediately take two aspirin in your mouth, chew them up and swallow them. Then contact the emergency center immediately, and then sit on a chair or sofa and wait. Help, don't lie down! The cardiologist emphasized that if everyone who sees this Weibo forwards 10 copies to others, at least one life will definitely be saved. Please spread the word!

text: In 1998, three Fujian workers were killed in a bombing in Israel. After the government found out the identity of the deceased, he traveled to Fujian and solemnly handed over the ashes of the deceased to his family members and paid a reward of US$700,000 to each person. The most dramatic thing is that after learning about it, the Chinese government came to collect taxes of 180,000 yuan per person. Motherland! motherland! ! ! I X!

chinese_text: 联合国公布全球国民素质道德水平调查及排名，中国排名倒数第二，仅位列印度之前。这是中国连续几十年排名世界160位以后。而日本国民素质连续30多年排名世界第一。不管这个调查是否准确，中国的国民素质确实让人堪忧。也不管你喜不喜欢日本这个国家，在国民素质方面，它确有许多值得我们学习的地方。
text: The United Nations released a survey and ranking of global national quality and moral standards. China ranked second from last, only ahead of India. This is after China has ranked 160th in the world for decades. The quality of Japanese citizens has ranked first in the world for more than 30 consecutive years. Regardless of whether this survey is accurate or not, the quality of China's citizens is indeed worrying. Regardless of whether you like Japan as a country or not, it does have a lot to learn from in terms of the quality of its citizens.

Guo asked them to show their police certificates, and they went to die in front of hundreds of people. beat! text: [Big Lie] The annual per capita income in Hong Kong is about 200,000 yuan, and the annual per capita income in Shenzhen is about 70,000 yuan. However, comparing the electricity prices between the two places, Hong Kong is lower than the mainland, but CLP still made a profit of HK$13.188 billion in 2011; moreover, Hong Kong’s electricity is sent from the mainland! I would like to ask the officials of mainland power plants and power grids, you complain about losses every year, where does the money go? Should a "most immoral" file be created for those who lie and prey on the common people?

She was discovered by the urban management and ran away. After the CD was handed over, she jumped into the cold water to escape. The urban management refused to let her go and asked her to She also handed over the illegal gains and begged the city management in every possible way. This was the money to save her child. The city management was unmoved and refused to go ashore unless she paid the money. As a result, the woman froze in the water for two hours and finally passed out. change

chinese_text: 【民主与人权的40分钟】40分钟的生命是350万美元，美国一死囚执行死刑前，照例大吃一顿。这家伙吃了大餐还喝了红酒，没想突发脑溢血当场挂了。比执行死刑早死了40分钟。其亲属因此状告监狱救护不力，明知高血压还让喝酒，让死囚丧失了本应享受40分钟的美好生命，官司赢了。40分钟的价值是350万美元。
text: [40 Minutes of Democracy and Human Rights] 40 minutes of life costs 3.5 million US dollars. Before his execution, a death row inmate in the United States had a big meal as usual. This guy had a big meal and drank red wine, but unexpectedly he suffered a cerebral hemorrhage and died on the spot. He died 40 minutes before his execution. His relatives therefore sued the prison for failing to provide adequate medical care and allowing the death row inmate to drink alcohol even though he knew he had high blood pressure, depriving the death row inmate of the 40 minutes of good life he should have enjoyed. The lawsuit was won. The value of 40 minutes is $3.5 million.

chinese_text: 【让电脑提速的小方法】开始菜单里点击"运行"，输入gpedit.msc指令后确定，会出现一个小屏幕，然后单击计算机配置--管理模板--网络--QoS数据计划程序，选“限制可保留带宽”，“设置”选“已启用”，将“带宽限制”中的20改为0，“应用”，就可以使用100%的网速,因为平时Windows XP自动保留20%的网速。
text: [A small way to speed up your computer] Click "Run" in the start menu, enter the gpedit.msc command and confirm. A small screen will appear, then click Computer Configuration--Administrative Templates--Network--QoS Data Scheduler, select "Limit reserved bandwidth", select "Enabled" in "Settings", change 20 in "Bandwidth Limit" to 0, "Apply", you can use 100% of the network speed, because usually Windows XP automatically reserves 20% Internet speed.

chinese_text: 【别怪网速太慢，只怪自己不会调网速！】XP/WIN7系统都会默认限制20％的网速，我们可以很轻松地解除这个限制，使你的上网速度达到100%，真正地体验冲浪的感觉~！本教程仅供技术交流，喜欢赶紧转走吧！[酷]学电脑，请关注@黑客是这样练成的

chinese_text: 据报道黑龙江一动物园因饲养员管理不慎导致一老虎逃出动物园，此虎逃至动物园门口被一晨练大爷徒手制服！老大爷仅仅擦破一点皮，现该老虎已被园方抓回饲养处严加看管！--不用穿军大衣 也能制服老虎
text: According to reports, a tiger escaped from a zoo in Heilongjiang due to careless management by the keeper. The tiger escaped to the entrance of the zoo and was subdued with bare hands by a morning exercise man! The old man only scratched the skin a little, and now the tiger has been captured by the zoo and taken back to the breeding area for strict supervision! --You can subdue a tiger without wearing a military coat

chinese_text: 「李娜若不接受人大代表的职务，将辜负全体湖北人的期望！」湖北政府拟授予李娜人大代表一职，已通知她老公姜山，但李娜本人未置可否。湖北媒体说，刘翔、姚明、成龙、周星驰、冯小刚都接受了人大代表职务，分别代表上海、香港、广东、北京的骄傲。李娜应该将湖北的骄傲带到北京，展现在人民大会堂。
text: "If Li Na does not accept the position of deputy to the National People's Congress, she will let down the expectations of all Hubei people!" The Hubei government plans to award Li Na the position of deputy to the National People's Congress and has notified her husband Jiang Shan, but Li Na herself has not commented. Hubei media said that Liu Xiang, Yao Ming, Jackie Chan, Stephen Chow and Feng Xiaogang have all accepted the position of deputies to the National People's Congress, representing the pride of Shanghai, Hong Kong, Guangdong and Beijing respectively. Li Na should bring the pride of Hubei to Beijing and show it in the Great Hall of the People.

This shows that I love China more. http://t.cn/8F9xQ1m

text: @ Eight Pairs of Shoes; The tragic death of Liu Ailing in Yongshou, Shaanxi, shocked the entire Yongshou. The reason was that her home was forcibly demolished by the local government, and her father was beaten and sent to a black jail for petitioning! In the end, she had no choice but to go to Xi'an to appeal. On the way to appeal, she was arrested by government workers and taken back to Yongshou County. Finally, she was raped by Yang Zhibin, the judicial director of Yongshou County, and his men in turns. In pain and despair, she jumped off a building and committed suicide, leaving behind a horrific death scene. . (This post has been forwarded more than 20,000 times

chinese_text: 新华社报道：2013年3月5日：曾为雷锋拍摄200多张照片的沈阳军区原工程兵政治部宣传助理员张峻，3月5日下午在沈阳军区学雷锋座谈会上发言将结束时说：我向毛主席保证，今天讲的一切都是真实的。要有半句假话，立刻就死。结果结果结果！张峻当场心脏病发，经抢救无效，不幸去世。
text: Xinhua News Agency reported: March 5, 2013: Zhang Jun, a former publicity assistant of the Political Department of the Engineering Corps of the Shenyang Military Region who had taken more than 200 photos of Lei Feng, said at the end of his speech at the Shenyang Military Region’s symposium on learning from Lei Feng on the afternoon of March 5 : I assure Chairman Mao that everything I said today is true. If you tell a lie, you will die immediately. Results results results! Zhang Jun suffered a heart attack on the spot and passed away after resuscitation failed.

chinese_text: 【唉，你让我说什么好】雷锋生前战友、曾为雷锋拍摄200多张照片的沈阳军区原工程兵政治部宣传助理员张峻 3月5日下午在沈阳军区学雷锋座谈会上发言将结束时说：”向老毛保证，今天讲的一切都是真实的。要有半句假话，立刻就死。”结果张峻一语成谶，当场心脏病发去世。
text: [Oh, what do you want me to say?] Zhang Jun, a former comrade of Lei Feng and former propaganda assistant of the political department of the Engineering Corps of the Shenyang Military Region who took more than 200 photos of Lei Feng, will end his speech at the symposium on learning from Lei Feng in the Shenyang Military Region on the afternoon of March 5. Shi said: "I promise Mao that everything I said today is true. If there is even half a lie, I will die immediately." As a result, Zhang Jun's words came true and he died of a heart attack on the spot.

text: My child, Mom will sell some mangosteens on the street, and after earning money, I will buy you some meat to eat. Mom knows that you haven’t eaten meat for a week. A woman in Chongqing said to her child. The child happily replied: "Okay, I will wash the vegetables and wash the rice at home at noon, and wait for you to come home to cook." Unexpectedly, on the way, the urban management and law enforcement officers pushed her down the steps and said goodbye forever! The vendor next to her said that this woman was selling Fruit worked hard to support 3 children.

chinese_text: 【铭记罪恶：红色高棉的恐怖】红色高棉最深恶痛绝的就是知识分子。图中是一位女校长，她与幼子被同时处死。在她死前实施了令人发指的“活体取脑”——从头顶和脑后钻孔，在她未死前取出脑浆，供医药使用。在钻取她的脑浆时，这位女性神情平静，但脸颊上流下的的泪珠清晰可见。让我们铭记这一段罪恶！
text: [Remembering the Sin: The Terror of the Khmer Rouge] What the Khmer Rouge hated most were intellectuals. The picture shows a female principal who was executed at the same time as her young son. Before her death, a heinous "brain harvesting" was carried out - drilling holes on the top and back of her head, and removing her brain for medical use before she died. While drilling into her brain, the woman looked calm, but the tears running down her cheeks were clearly visible. Let us remember this sin!

chinese_text: 紧急通知：副驾驶不系安全带相同处罚，开车打手机罚50，闯黄闪100，越线100，今晚六点半至夜二点全国交警集中查处酒架，为期60天重罚！每月10*20*30日省厅带队，3*7*13*17*23日和每周五，六市局检查，时间12-14点和19-21点。
text: Urgent notice: The co-pilot will be punished for not wearing a seat belt. The fine will be 50 for talking on the phone while driving, 100 for running a yellow flash, and 100 for crossing the line. From 6:30 to 2pm tonight, traffic police across the country will focus on investigating and punishing alcohol racks, and heavy fines will be imposed for 60 days! The provincial department will lead the team on 10*20*30 of every month, and the six municipal bureaus will inspect on 3*7*13*17*23 and every Friday, at 12-14 o'clock and 19-21 o'clock.

chinese_text: 日本媒体《读卖新闻》，《朝日新闻》，《产经新闻》等报纸的苍井空简短声明： 本人从即日起正式宣布退出中文微博！而且不会再去中国进行任何的活动。我要以实际行动来表明态度支持我的国家。苍井空 2012.09.03
text: Sora Aoi from the Japanese media "Yomiuri Shimbun", "Asahi Shimbun", "Sankei Shimbun" and other newspapers made a brief statement: I officially announce my withdrawal from Chinese Weibo from now on! And I will never go to China for any activities again. I want to show my support for my country through practical actions. Sora Aoi2012.09.03

chinese_text: 【洋毒食】国家质检总局进口不合格食品黑榜：挪威的大西洋鲑鱼，检出副溶血性弧菌，被销毁。韩国进口的乐天牌巧克力粒，德国进口的欧尚85%黑巧克力，均发现铜超标，被退货或销毁。丹麦奇新蓝罐有限公司生产的曲奇(饼干)，大肠菌群超标，被销毁。PS：吃货们又悲剧了！！！(关注@成都好吃团)
text: [Poisonous foreign food] AQSIQ’s black list of imported unqualified foods: Norwegian Atlantic salmon was destroyed due to the presence of Vibrio parahaemolyticus. Lotte brand chocolate chips imported from South Korea and Auchan 85% dark chocolate imported from Germany were found to have excessive copper and were returned or destroyed. The cookies (biscuits) produced by Danish Chixin Blue Can Co., Ltd. were destroyed due to excessive coliform bacteria. PS: Foodies are in tragedy again! ! ! (Follow @成都好吃团)

chinese_text: 【石原太慎，儿子不慎，天断其后，太君伤心】伟大的日本民族主义头子、国有购买钓鱼岛发起者、南方系精神偶像，石原慎太郎－－不是他－－是他儿子石原延启，今上午不慎爬山坠崖摔死，军国主义这回可能真绝后了，大家抬头致哀低头偷着乐吧。另，请关注南方系会用什么方式悼念吧。ttp://t.cn/zWdeAa0
text: [Ishihara Taishin, his son was careless, God broke his fate, Taijun was sad] The great Japanese nationalist leader, the initiator of the state-owned purchase of the Diaoyu Islands, and the spiritual idol of the Southern Department, Ishihara Shintaro - not him - is his son Ishihara Enki , I accidentally climbed a mountain and fell off a cliff this morning and fell to my death. Militarism may be truly unstoppable this time. Let’s raise our heads to mourn and lower our heads to have fun. Also, please pay attention to how the Southern Department will mourn. ttp://t.cn/zWdeAa0

chinese_text: 【悲催的司机】我是个货车司机，昨天被交警拦了，证件齐全没有违规！ 然后他说我没有带灭火器，我说我带了拿给他看，他又说灭火器坏的。 我说好的不信你看，于是熟练的打开保险对着他按下了我人生中最愚蠢的一下！ 现在在交警队学习，他要告我袭警！@左老板吹牛@左小祖咒@陈雄围脖
text: [Sad driver] I am a truck driver. I was stopped by the traffic police yesterday. I have all the documents and no violations! Then he said I didn't bring a fire extinguisher. I said I did and showed it to him, but he said the fire extinguisher was broken. If you don’t believe me, I said yes, so I skillfully opened the safety button and pressed the most stupid button in my life! Now I'm studying in the traffic police force. He wants to sue me for assaulting a police officer! @leftbossbrag@left小zucura@陈雄坂

chinese_text: 交警暴力执法,强行拖走女车主。事件背景为长沙最近在整治电动车问题，一位女车主不是很合作，被两位男交警在地上拖行。拍客在进行拍摄取证时，被一位未穿交警制服的男子冲过来夺走拍客的手机扔到了树丛里面。
text: The traffic police enforced the law violently and forcibly dragged away the female car owner. The background of the incident was that Changsha was recently rectifying the problem of electric vehicles. A female car owner was not very cooperative and was dragged on the ground by two male traffic policemen. While the photographer was taking pictures and collecting evidence, a man who was not wearing a traffic police uniform rushed over and took away the photographer's mobile phone and threw it into the bushes.

chinese_text: 【李娜反击孙晋芳：TMD，脏话都形容不了你们的卑鄙】什么叫崩溃？如今大桥垮塌叫侧滑，收入下降叫负增长，我的失败叫崩溃？ 孙晋芳阿姨，如果我的失败叫崩溃，刘翔的那一幕叫什么？国家体育总局提前知道吗？您可以不说，但你说了实话，你的官位会不会崩溃？！李永波的团队至今不为让球事件道歉…
text: [Li Na fights back against Sun Jinfang: TMD, even dirty words can’t describe your despicability] What is collapse? Nowadays, the collapse of the bridge is called sideslip, the decline in income is called negative growth, and my failure is called collapse? Aunt Sun Jinfang, if my failure is called collapse, what is the name of Liu Xiang's scene? Did the State Sports General Administration know in advance? You don’t have to tell, but if you tell the truth, will your official position collapse? ! Li Yongbo’s team has not apologized for the conceding incident...

chinese_text: 三峡工程实现发电收入每年200多亿元，但并不属于中国百姓，也不属于国务院。三峡工程所有的水轮发电机已经私有化，属于长江水利股份有限公司。 那些三峡主上派，相关部委、各级官员以及主要工程技术人员，持有这个股份公司的原始股。也就是说，解决问题靠全民，实现收入归个人。
text: The Three Gorges Project generates more than 20 billion yuan in power generation revenue every year, but it does not belong to the Chinese people or the State Council. All the turbine generators of the Three Gorges Project have been privatized and belong to the Yangtze River Water Conservancy Co., Ltd. Those Three Gorges leaders, relevant ministries, officials at all levels, and key engineering and technical personnel hold the original shares of this joint-stock company. In other words, solving problems depends on the whole people, and achieving income belongs to individuals.

chinese_text: 【那些伤感的事】小平访英，看到涡轮发动机，英国人很爽快答应引入中国生产，小平向英国科学家致敬，但英国人站起来反而向邓致敬。原来中国科学家吴仲华50年代研究出涡轮发动机原理，并写出涡轮机械三元流动方程式的论文，英国人据此造出涡轮发动机。当时吴仲华还在湖北五七干校养猪。时代的悲剧！
text: [Those sad things] Xiaoping visited Britain and saw turbine engines. The British readily agreed to introduce Chinese production. Xiaoping paid tribute to British scientists, but the British stood up and saluted Deng instead. It turns out that Chinese scientist Wu Zhonghua studied the principle of turbine engines in the 1950s and wrote a paper on the three-dimensional flow equation of turbomachines. The British built turbine engines based on this. At that time, Wu Zhonghua was still raising pigs at the Hubei May 7th Cadre School. The tragedy of the times!

chinese_text: 转起来！
text: Spin!

chinese_text: @揭露社会黑暗面：他死了为保护一群陌生人。而这群被保护者事后一拥而散，无人愿做目击证人。22日，天津50路公交出现小偷，司机提醒乘客小心。结果，在全车人围观中，被小偷连捅数刀。受伤后，他被独自留在工作多年的公交上，流干了血，去世。图片记下这最后一刻，那时他在想什么？谁知道他的名字？
text: @Expose the dark side of society: He died to protect a group of strangers. The group of protected persons dispersed in droves afterwards, and no one wanted to be a witness. On the 22nd, a thief appeared on Tianjin’s No. 50 bus, and the driver reminded passengers to be careful. As a result, with everyone in the car watching, he was stabbed several times by the thief. After being injured, he was left alone on the bus where he had worked for many years, bled dry, and died. The picture records this last moment. What was he thinking at that time? Who knows his name?

chinese_text: 【动感地带网聊卡免费从100M升级300M！】即日起至12月31日，广东动感地带网聊卡用户一次性充值30元及以上且在当天发送“300”至10086登记，可每月19元享受300M流量优惠（即由原100M升级为300M，不加收费用）。享受优惠期为优惠生效月月结日起至2013年12月！转比需要的朋友吧！
text: [M-Zone online chat card is upgraded from 100M to 300M for free! ] From now until December 31, Guangdong M-Zone online chat card users who recharge 30 yuan or more at one time and send "300" to 10086 to register on the same day can enjoy a 300M traffic discount of 19 yuan per month (that is, upgraded from the original 100M to 300M , no additional charge). The discount period is from the monthly settlement date of the discount to December 2013! Turn it into a friend in need!

chinese_text: 祝愿小日本的「贞子3D」票房为0！
text: I wish Little Japan’s “Sadako 3D” a box office of 0!

chinese_text: 宁波海关通报：“从日本千叶起运的1000多吨废五金，辐射源超过国家环控标准200倍，自福岛核泄露，共八千多吨受核污染的日本垃圾运抵中国。”在谴责日本将核污染垃圾进口中国的同时，更要惩罚那些从中牟取暴利祸害国民的中国不法商人，我告诉你，不是日本亡中国之心不死，往往是中国人伤害中国人自己。
text: Ningbo Customs announced: "More than 1,000 tons of scrap hardware shipped from Chiba, Japan, the radiation source exceeded the national environmental control standard 200 times. Since the Fukushima nuclear leak, a total of more than 8,000 tons of nuclear-contaminated Japanese garbage arrived in China." In While condemning Japan for importing nuclear contaminated waste into China, we must also punish the unscrupulous Chinese businessmen who make huge profits from it and harm the people. Let me tell you, it is not that Japan is determined to subjugate China, but it is often the Chinese who harm the Chinese themselves.

chinese_text: 今天，小日本通过钓鱼岛国有化，无视中国主权，当初中国人拍的《金陵十三钗》小鬼子票房为零。小日本拍的《贞子》3D将于9月12日在中国大陆上映。而9月12日既是南京大屠杀纪念日，又是国难日。勿忘国耻！！作为中国人，敢不敢让 贞子3D 9月12日票房为零。 朋友们 ，复制然后粘贴一下 转起转起！
text: Today, little Japan ignores China's sovereignty by nationalizing the Diaoyu Islands. The "Thirteen Hairpins of Jinling" produced by the Chinese had zero box office. The 3D film "Sadako" produced by Little Japan will be released in mainland China on September 12. September 12th is both the Nanjing Massacre Memorial Day and the National Disaster Day. Don’t forget the national humiliation! ! As a Chinese, do you dare to let Sadako 3D have zero box office on September 12th? Friends, copy and paste and it will spin!

chinese_text: 闽南三少:[话筒][赞啊][转发]【调查地沟油的记者李翔，死了】 身中10余刀，惨死。他为全国不能吃特供的十多亿草民的食品安全努力过。他付出了年轻的生命。请动一下鼠标，转发，表达一下谢意。不过分吧？恭请转发！！！
text: The Third Young Master of Southern Fujian: [Microphone] [Like] [Repost] [Li Xiang, the reporter who investigated gutter oil, died] He was stabbed more than 10 times and died tragically. He has worked hard for the food safety of more than one billion people across the country who cannot eat special food. He gave his young life. Please move your mouse, forward it, and express your gratitude. Not too much? Please forward it! ! !

chinese_text: 据报导；9月10日，日本将通过钓鱼岛国有化议案，完全无视中国的主权。去年中国人拍的《金陵十三钗》在日公映，票房为零。9月12日，日本人拍的《贞子》3D版将在中国上映。作为中国人，我们敢不敢让 《贞子》票房为零？ 朋友们 ，请转发！
text: According to reports, Japan will pass a bill to nationalize the Diaoyu Islands on September 10, completely ignoring China’s sovereignty. Last year, "The Thirteen Hairpins" produced by the Chinese was released in Japan and the box office was zero. On September 12, the 3D version of "Sadako" filmed by the Japanese will be released in China. As Chinese people, do we dare to let "Sadako" have zero box office? Friends, please forward it!

chinese_text: 1939年民国教育部决定以教育家孔子诞辰9月28日为教师节。现联合国教科文组织的世界教师节、美国加州教师节、马来西亚教师节及中国台湾和香港教师节，都定在孔子诞辰日9月28日。1985年第六届全国人大常委会第九次会议定每年9月10日为中国教师节。为什么政策制定者总要逆势而行？ http://t.cn/zWFozwc
text: In 1939, the Ministry of Education of the Republic of China decided to celebrate September 28, the birthday of the educator Confucius, as Teachers’ Day. Now UNESCO’s World Teachers’ Day, California Teachers’ Day, Malaysian Teachers’ Day, China Taiwan and Hong Kong Teachers’ Day are all set on September 28, the birthday of Confucius. In 1985, the ninth meeting of the Standing Committee of the Sixth National People's Congress decided that September 10th each year would be Chinese Teachers' Day. Why do policymakers always have to buck the trend? http://t.cn/zWFozwc

chinese_text: 王道德Orz：新疆戈壁里发现一具驴友的干尸，看看谁认识？寻找家属！ 真的很可怜，[泪]， 大家扩散起来让亡灵回家吧！[蜡烛]  扩散！！  [话筒][话筒]
text: Wang Daodou Orz: A mummy of a traveling traveler was found in the Xinjiang Gobi. Who knows him? Looking for family members! It's really pitiful, [tears], please spread the word and let the undead go home! [Candles] Diffusion! ! [microphone][microphone]

chinese_text: 今天下午发生在妇儿医院的惨剧: 一妇女因小孩病重，又负担不起昂贵的医疗费，带着仅四个月的宝宝从12楼跳楼身亡。一方面感叹医疗费用猛于虎，另一方面又惜其脆弱无知，现今媒体力量大，可以求助广大群众募捐，就算医不好也不能走极端，没有过不去的坎，可怜了小小生命！@NBTV看看看 @嘟嘴灰灰
text: A tragedy occurred at the Women's and Children's Hospital this afternoon: A woman jumped to her death from the 12th floor with her four-month-old baby because her child was seriously ill and she could not afford the expensive medical expenses. On the one hand, we lament that the cost of medical care is astronomical, but on the other hand, we regret that it is fragile and ignorant. Nowadays, the media is powerful and can turn to the masses to raise funds. Even if the medical treatment is not good, we cannot go to extremes. There is no obstacle that cannot be overcome. It is a pity for the little life! @NBTV take a look @Duzuihuihui

chinese_text: 洋毒食——国家质检总局进口不合格食品黑榜：挪威的大西洋鲑鱼，检出副溶血性弧菌，被销毁。韩国进口的乐天牌巧克力粒，德国进口的欧尚85%黑巧克力，均发现铜超标，被退货或销毁。丹麦奇新蓝罐有限公司生产的曲奇(饼干)，大肠菌群超标，被销毁。（北京晚报）
text: Poisonous foreign food - AQSIQ's blacklist of imported unqualified foods: Norwegian Atlantic salmon was destroyed due to the presence of Vibrio parahaemolyticus. Lotte brand chocolate chips imported from South Korea and Auchan 85% dark chocolate imported from Germany were found to have excessive copper and were returned or destroyed. The cookies (biscuits) produced by Danish Chixin Blue Can Co., Ltd. were destroyed due to excessive coliform bacteria. (Beijing Evening News)

chinese_text: [悲伤]2012-09-10 宁波妇儿医院今天下午1点48分，一妇女及一婴儿在住院楼跳楼，后抢救无效死亡。具体情况公安部门正在调查。妇女因小孩病重，加上负担不起昂贵的医疗费，带着仅四个月的宝宝从12楼跳楼身亡。[悲伤]感叹医疗费用猛于虎的同时，又惜其何等脆弱？！
text: [Sadness] 2012-09-10 At 1:48 this afternoon in Ningbo Women and Children's Hospital, a woman and a baby jumped from the inpatient building and died after rescue efforts failed. The specific situation is under investigation by the public security department. Because the child was seriously ill and she could not afford the expensive medical expenses, the woman jumped from the 12th floor with her baby, who was only four months old. [Sadness] While sighing that the medical expenses are astronomical, at the same time, we regret how fragile they are? !

chinese_text: 中央4台《今日关注》，胡总已下令，如果日本有闯入钓鱼岛及其附属岛屿12海里以内，中国海军部队可以立即向其进行军事打击。昨日政府发声明宣布中华人民共和国钓鱼岛及其附属岛屿的领海基线，此举意味着不再承认钓鱼岛存在主权争议。总理讲话：中国政府和人民绝不会退让半步！大快人心转起来~
text: According to CCTV 4’s “Today’s Attention”, President Hu has ordered that if Japan intrudes within 12 nautical miles of the Diaoyu Islands and its affiliated islands, Chinese naval forces can immediately carry out military strikes against them. Yesterday, the government issued a statement declaring the territorial sea baselines of the Diaoyu Islands and its affiliated islands of the People's Republic of China. This move means that it no longer recognizes the existence of sovereignty disputes over the Diaoyu Islands. Prime Minister's Speech: The Chinese government and people will never give in! It makes people’s hearts turn~

chinese_text: 我的日产越野车今天停沙坪坝被爱国青年下螺丝，比砸车还吓人。这些疯狂又愚蠢的傻货！！！要是车主是个毫无经验的新手未能及时发现咋办？这可真的能要人命啊！！@重庆风行天下车友社区
text: My Nissan off-road vehicle was screwed by patriotic youths when it was parked in Shapingba today. It was scarier than smashing the car. These crazy, stupid fools! ! ! What if the car owner is an inexperienced novice and fails to detect it in time? This can really kill people! ! @Chongqing popular world riders community

chinese_text: 【太活跃的鱼千万别买】去菜场买鱼,结果看到惊人一幕,摊贩往大水盆内加入一种白色粉未,迅速用手搅拌,一会功夫白色粉未就溶解了,将半死不活的鱼虾倒入其中,没想到,鱼虾一会儿就活蹦乱跳开,仿佛这些鱼都是才从河中捕回来的.这是一种能够致癌的催化剂，俗称鱼浮灵，也对智力有影响！(关注@成都美食排行榜)
text: [Don’t buy fish that are too active] When I went to the market to buy fish, I saw a shocking scene. The vendor added a white powder into a large water basin and quickly stirred it with his hands. After a while, the white powder dissolved. Half-dead fish and shrimp were poured into it. Unexpectedly, the fish and shrimp jumped away alive in a moment, as if these fish were just caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also has an impact on intelligence! (Follow @Chengdu Food Ranking)

chinese_text: 刚接到部队朋友电话，今天两颗鱼雷炸沉了一艘日本船。
text: I just received a call from a friend in the army. Two torpedoes sank a Japanese ship today.

chinese_text: 【非洲有句老话： 还没有达到对岸的，别嘲笑已被淹死的】2011年10月20号, 非洲儿子卡扎菲被残忍地杀害。美国大使克里斯托弗·史蒂文斯，在其尸体旁边，竖起大拇指, 嘲笑、表示快乐。321天后，他自己的尸体，被反拖在班加西的街头。
text: [There is an old saying in Africa: Don’t laugh at those who have drowned before they reach the other side.] On October 20, 2011, Africa’s son Gaddafi was brutally murdered. U.S. Ambassador Christopher Stevens, standing next to his body, gave a thumbs up in mockery and joy. 321 days later, his own body was dragged through the streets of Benghazi.

chinese_text: 【清晨，为母女点灯】昨下午1时48分，宁波妇儿医院，一位母亲抱着她四个月的女儿从住院部12楼跳下，抢救无效[泪]告别太阳。母亲因女儿病重，负担不起？在感叹医费猛于虎的今天，生命却如此脆弱！在这个秋初的清晨，年轻的母女离开了我们，我们为她们呐喊！我们为她们点灯[蜡烛]… @自由人重生 @符梅梅
text: [Early morning, light lamps for mother and daughter] Yesterday at 1:48 pm, at Ningbo Women and Children's Hospital, a mother jumped from the 12th floor of the inpatient department with her four-month-old daughter in her arms. Rescue efforts were ineffective [tears] bid farewell to the sun. The mother cannot afford it because her daughter is seriously ill? Today, when we lament that medical expenses are astronomical, life is so fragile! On this early autumn morning, the young mother and daughter left us, and we shouted for them! We light lamps [candles] for them... @Free man reborn @FUMeimei

text: [Don’t buy fish that are too active] When I went to buy fish, I saw a shocking scene. The vendor added a white powder into the water basin and quickly stirred it with his hands. After a while, the white powder did not dissolve, and the half-dead fish and shrimp were dissolved. Pour it into it, and it will jump away in a while, as if it was just caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also affects intelligence. Tell each other and let more people know! ! !

This move means that it no longer recognizes the existence of sovereignty disputes over the Diaoyu Islands. Prime Minister's Speech: The Chinese government and people will never give in! text: [Five Fishes at the Wet Market] I went to buy fish and saw a shocking scene. The vendor added a white powder into the water basin and quickly stirred it with his hands. After a while, the white powder did not dissolve, and then poured the half-dead fish and shrimp into it. , and after a while he jumped away alive, as if he had just been caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also affects intelligence. Tell each other!

chinese_text: 我们被骗了两次，一次是历史课本小括号里标记海参崴的地方，其实官方媒体和国家元首不敢叫海参崴，只敢叫符拉迪沃斯托克（俄语：征服东方）；一次是苏联解体最大的受害者不是苏联，而是中国，苏联在1945年承诺50年后归还海参崴，可它在1991年就他妈完蛋了！
text: We were deceived twice. Once was the place marked Vladivostok in parentheses in the history textbook. In fact, the official media and the head of state did not dare to call Vladivostok, only Vladivostok (Russian: Conquer the East); once it was the Soviet Union The biggest victim of the disintegration was not the Soviet Union, but China. The Soviet Union promised in 1945 to return Vladivostok after 50 years, but it was fucking finished in 1991!

chinese_text: 【世界卫生组织证实刚果伊波拉病毒已失控扩散】世界卫生组织昨天证实，刚果东北部的伊波拉（Ebola）病毒疫情已经失控，正在迅速蔓延扩散，过去1周至少有31人因感染而病发身亡。1976年，在刚果第1次爆发这种疾病，因而取名伊波拉病毒。感染的人类会出现病毒性出血热症状，当时的死亡率高达88%。
text: [The World Health Organization confirms that the Ebola virus has spread out of control in Congo] The World Health Organization yesterday confirmed that the Ebola virus epidemic in northeastern Congo is out of control and is spreading rapidly. At least 31 people have become ill due to infection in the past week. Death. In 1976, the disease first broke out in Congo, hence the name Ebola virus. Infected humans developed symptoms of viral hemorrhagic fever, with a mortality rate of 88%.

Seeing that the traffic police still wanted to enforce the law, the man sitting in the back seat of the military vehicle got out of the car, pointed at the traffic police and threatened: "Believe it or not, I will beat you to death!"

chinese_text: @芙蓉姐姐 19日在微博中称：“永别了，这个世界！”引网友关注。有网友爆料：芙蓉姐姐于下午13点左右在家中自杀身亡。家人发现后报案,目前警方已介入调查。而@芙蓉姐姐助理 今日发微博称：这个世界给了她太多的不理解，哪怕她再怎么努力，或许离开也是一种解脱。祝福我们一直敬爱的“姐姐”。（转）
text: @ Furongjie said on Weibo on the 19th: "Farewell, this world!" which attracted the attention of netizens. Some netizens broke the news: Sister Furong committed suicide at home around 13:00 in the afternoon. The family reported the incident after discovering it, and the police are now involved in the investigation. text: Li Xiang, a journalist who worked on waste oil, is dead. He was stabbed more than 10 times and died tragically. He spent his young life to tell a traditional Chinese medicine doctor that the simplest way to detect whether there is gutter oil is to put a peeled garlic head when cooking. Garlic is most sensitive to carcinogenic aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means you have used gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. If the cooking oil is good, the garlic will be white

chinese_text: 【太活跃的鱼千万别买】去买鱼，结果看到摊贩往水盆内加入一种白色粉未，迅速用手搅拌，一会功夫白色粉未溶解，将半死不活的鱼虾倒入其中，一会儿就活蹦乱跳开，仿佛刚从河中捕回来的。这是一种能够致癌的催化剂，俗称鱼浮灵，也对智力有影响。相互转告一下，有必要让更多的人知道！@揭露社会黑与白
text: [Don’t buy fish that are too active] When I went to buy fish, I saw the vendor add a white powder into the water basin, stir it quickly with his hands, after a while the white powder did not dissolve, and poured the half-dead fish and shrimp into it. , and after a while he jumped away alive, as if he had just been caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also affects intelligence. Tell each other, it is necessary to let more people know! @Expose the black and white of society

chinese_text: 公安网监 9:50紧急通告，请大家要速传！如果你收到《2012年度工资调整方案》,在任何环境下请不要打开它，且立即删除它。如果你打开了它，你会失去个人电脑上的一切东西。是一个新的病毒，已经确认了它的危险性， 而杀毒 软件不能清除它。他的目标是摧毁个人电脑。 请马上转发，这病毒猛烈仅次于灰鸽。
text: The Public Security Network Supervisor issued an emergency announcement at 9:50, please spread it quickly! If you receive the "2012 Salary Adjustment Plan", please do not open it under any circumstances and delete it immediately. If you turn it on, you will lose everything on your PC. It is a new virus, its danger has been confirmed, and anti-virus software cannot remove it. His goal is to destroy PCs. Please forward it immediately, this virus is second only to gray pigeons.

When the Tiantian Xiangxiang live broadcast talked about Japan's war of aggression against China, Koji did not speak, but knelt down. To apologize to the audience, it is said that even after Koji was beaten and hospitalized, Japanese right-wingers still refused to let Koji go and threatened to ravage his girlfriend, but Koji shouted loudly: No one can stop me from loving China! Repost it for him.

chinese_text: 【孔子诞辰】今天是9月28日，孔子2563年诞辰。1939年国民政府将孔子诞辰日为教师节。现联合国教科文组织及中国台湾和香港教师节，都定在孔子诞辰日9月28日。在此呼吁，将教师节改为每年的9月28日，这不仅仅是为了纪念一位伟大的老师，更希望以此唤醒国人对一个伟大和悠久的文化传统的尊重和信奉。
text: [Birthday of Confucius] Today is September 28, the 2563rd birthday of Confucius. In 1939, the Nationalist Government designated Confucius’ birthday as Teachers’ Day. Teachers’ Day is now celebrated by UNESCO, Taiwan, China and Hong Kong on September 28, the birthday of Confucius. We hereby call for Teachers' Day to be changed to September 28 every year. This is not only to commemorate a great teacher, but also to awaken the Chinese people's respect and belief in a great and long cultural tradition.

chinese_text: 【敢吃大闸蟹的人，是世界上最“勇敢”的人】《壹周刊》记者把12只大闸蟹送去化验，结果发现11个样本有土霉素，6个样本有氯霉素。土霉素属“过时”抗菌素；而氯霉素属香港违禁物质，因会压抑骨髓功能，导致贫血、抵抗力下降和凝血困难问题。孕妇吃了含有土霉素的毒蟹，胎儿的骨质会变灰、变脆。
text: [Those who dare to eat hairy crabs are the most “brave” people in the world] A reporter from Next Weekly sent 12 hairy crabs for testing and found that 11 samples contained oxytetracycline and 6 samples contained chloramphenicol. Oxytetracycline is an "outdated" antibiotic; while chloramphenicol is a banned substance in Hong Kong. It can suppress bone marrow function, leading to anemia, reduced resistance and coagulation difficulties. If pregnant women eat poisonous crabs containing oxytetracycline, the bones of the fetus will become gray and brittle.

chinese_text: 【全程大堵车，长沙上映动作大片。】上班路上，千里车流，万里人潮。望大街内外，车行如龟，司机烦躁，一步不动，总是红灯憋出尿。交通如此多焦，引无数大款上公交。惜奥迪A6，慢如蜗牛。奔驰宝马，无处发飙。一代天骄，兰博基尼，泪看电摩把车超。俱往矣，还数自行车，边蹬边笑。@长沙时尚生活圈

The traffic is so busy that many wealthy people are attracted to take the bus. What a pity the Audi A6 is as slow as a snail. Mercedes-Benz and BMW, nowhere to go crazy. The genius of the generation, Lamborghini, shed tears watching an electric motorcycle pass a car. They all went there, counting the bicycles and laughing as they pedaled. @changsha fashion life circle

chinese_text: 【中美护照对比】美国护照中写着：“不管你身处何方，美国政府都是你强大的后盾”。在中国护照中写着：“请严格遵守当地的法律，并尊重那里的风俗习惯”。微评：美国说，出去了有人欺负你，招呼一声，咱修理他！中国说，出去了老实点，听人家的话，好好干，少惹麻烦。[草泥马]
text: [Comparison of Chinese and American Passports] The American passport says: "No matter where you are, the U.S. government is your strong backing." In the Chinese passport it says: "Please strictly abide by local laws and respect local customs." Micro-comment: The United States says, if someone bullies you when you go out, say hello and we will fix him! China says, be honest when you go out, listen to others, work hard, and avoid getting into trouble. [Grass Mud Horse]

chinese_text: #静安，再见。。。# 国务院将于近日正式批复上海市《关于撤消静安区建制将原静安区行政区域拆分划入长宁区和黄浦区的请示》，同意自2013年1月起撤消上海市静安区，以富民路--常德路为界线，其西面整体并入上海市长宁区；其东面整体并入上海市黄浦区；涉及拆分的街道做相应的调整。
text: #京安,Goodbye. . . # The State Council will formally approve Shanghai's "Request for Instructions on Cancellation of the Organization of Jing'an District and Split the Original Jing'an District Administrative Area into Changning District and Huangpu District" in the near future, agreeing to abolish Shanghai's Jing'an District from January 2013 and use Fumin Road --Changde Road is the boundary line, and its entire west side will be merged into Shanghai Changning District; its entire east side will be merged into Shanghai Huangpu District; the streets involved in the split will be adjusted accordingly.

Address: Gongma Township Primary School, Changsha, West District, Shiqu County, Garze Tibetan, Sichuan Province, Postal Code: 627350 Principal: Dawa 15884044467.
