chinese_text: 【静安区将被撤销！拆分划入长宁、黄浦二区】国务院将于近日批复上海市《关于撤消静安区建制将原静安区行政区域拆分划入长宁区和黄浦区的请示》，同意自2013年1月起撤消上海市静安区，以富民路--常德路为界线，其西面整体并入上海市长宁区；其东面整体并入上海市黄浦区；涉及拆分的街道做相应的调整。
text: 【Jing’an District will be revoked! Split into Changning and Huangpu Districts] The State Council will recently approve Shanghai’s “Request for Instructions on Cancellation of the Organization of Jing’an District and Split the Original Jing’an District Administrative Area into Changning District and Huangpu District”, agreeing to withdraw it from January 2013 Jing'an District, Shanghai, is bounded by Fumin Road-Changde Road. Its entire west side is merged into Shanghai Changning District; its entire east side is merged into Shanghai Huangpu District; the streets involved in the split will be adjusted accordingly.

chinese_text: 除了双膝跪倒，普通中国人还能怎么办？——为了保住学校，学生家长已经坚持了四天——浙江省缙云县大洋镇中心学校，被纳入“撤并”对象，五六百初中生适龄学童，需走六七十里路求学 。记者采访车刚开到现场,村民就跪倒一片——大洋村村民已经坚持四天了。多转发一次就多份希望！@头条新闻 @刘春
text: Besides falling on their knees, what else can ordinary Chinese people do? ——In order to keep the school, parents have been insisting for four days——The Central School of Dayang Town, Jinyun County, Zhejiang Province, has been included in the "dissolution and annexation" target, and 500 to 600 junior high school-age students have to travel 60 to 70 miles to study. As soon as the reporter's interview vehicle arrived at the scene, the villagers fell to their knees - the villagers of Dayang Village had been holding on for four days. The more you repost, the more hope you get! @headlines@liuchun

chinese_text: 问天LF: 李盟盟，21岁，河南开封县陈留四中学生，今年高考565分。因县招办失职把她的志愿申请锁在柜子忘了提交，造成任何大学都上不成。河南省高招办回应，此事不予处理！李盟盟是农村孩子，为供其上学妹妹辍学打工，父亲打工摔断了腿。你的一次转发也许就能帮她改变命运！试试能否创造奇迹！
text: Wentian LF: Li Mengmeng, 21 years old, a student of Chenliu No. 4 Middle School in Kaifeng County, Henan Province, scored 565 in this year's college entrance examination. Because the county admissions office was negligent and locked her application in a cabinet and forgot to submit it, she was unable to get into any college. The High Recruitment Office of Henan Province responded that the matter will not be handled! Li Mengmeng is a child from a rural area. He dropped out of school and worked to support his younger sister in school. His father broke his leg while working. Your forwarding may be able to help her change her destiny! See if you can create a miracle!

chinese_text: FBI今日机密情报④【男生失踪9天后遗体被发现只剩骨架】据报道黄埔石化中学初一2班周小龙离奇失踪9天后终于被找到。遗体在他回家路边的小山包上被发现，全身皮肤肌肉器官荡然无存，仅剩骨架及一点残留的头发，校服却完好穿在身上，手段残忍离奇让村民感到恐慌。目前黄埔警方正在抓紧侦破此案（转载）
text: FBI Confidential Information Today ④ [The boy’s body was found only as a skeleton after he disappeared for 9 days] It is reported that Zhou Xiaolong, a class 2 in the first grade of Huangpu Petrochemical Middle School, was finally found after 9 days of mysterious disappearance. His body was found on a hill on the roadside when he returned home. All skin, muscles and organs were gone, leaving only the skeleton and a little bit of hair. The school uniform was still intact. The cruel and bizarre methods made the villagers panic. Huangpu police are currently investigating the case (reprinted)

chinese_text: 摸奶节是中国云南双柏县鄂家镇彝族传统文化的庆典就是农历的7月14日、15日与16日这三天，包括外来的游人,如果在街上遇见喜欢的女子，都可以摸一摸女子的胸部。姑娘们表面躲躲闪闪，但决无责怪之意因为这是他们这个地区的百姓延续了1000多年的风俗。小伙子以摸到奶为吉祥，姑娘们以被摸奶为幸运和祝福!
text: The Breast Touching Festival is a traditional cultural celebration of the Yi people in Ejia Town, Shuangbai County, Yunnan Province, China. It falls on the 14th, 15th and 16th of July in the lunar calendar. Including foreign tourists, if you meet a woman you like on the street, you can Touch the woman's breasts. The girls were evasive on the surface, but they never meant to blame because this was a custom that the people in their area had continued for more than 1,000 years. Young men regard touching breasts as good luck, and girls regard having breasts touched as luck and blessing!

chinese_text: 【红色高棉暴行】特制的钻机。从人后脑钻开0.8×2公分的孔洞，再从头顶钻眼，即可取出完整的人脑。当时许多酷刑如割喉、钻脑、活摔婴儿等，传自中国援柬的“专家与技术人员”，连专门拍摄临刑囚犯的照片以供存档与欣赏的摄影师，也是由中国培训的。
text: [Khmer Rouge Atrocities] Specially-made drilling rig. A 0.8×2 cm hole is drilled from the back of the person's head, and then a hole is drilled from the top of the head to remove the complete human brain. At that time, many torture methods, such as cutting throats, drilling brains, beating babies alive, etc., were transmitted from the "experts and technicians" China aided Cambodia. Even the photographers who specialized in taking photos of prisoners before execution for archiving and appreciation were also trained by China.

chinese_text: 【特大好消息】继北京出台95岁老人看病不要钱后，山东泰安宣布100岁可免费登泰山，初步预估：接下来应该有城市跟进宣布110岁放宽生3胎政策，120岁老人可分配住房，130岁可取消一夫一妻限制！希望大家注意保重身体，好日子在后头呢。大家努力活过100岁！（南都）
text: [Great news] After Beijing introduced free medical treatment for 95-year-olds, Shandong Tai'an announced that 100-year-olds can climb Mount Tai for free. Preliminary estimates: There should be cities following up and announcing that 110-year-olds will relax the policy of having three children, and 120-year-olds can Allocate housing, and the monogamy restriction can be lifted after the age of 130! I hope everyone will take care of themselves and good days are ahead. Everyone strives to live to be 100 years old! (Nandu)

chinese_text: 秋天到了，冬天还会远吗？未来的“文化部部长”兼“二人转转长”山本大叔昨晚已被控制，清算倒计时。拔出萝卜带出泥，洗都洗不干净啊。。。。。。
text: Autumn is here, can winter be far behind? Uncle Yamamoto, the future "Minister of Culture" and "Errenzhuanzhuanchan", was controlled last night, and the countdown to liquidation is on. If you pull out the radish and bring out the mud, you can't even wash it clean. . . . . .

chinese_text: 【喝易拉罐一定要吸管】一妇女喝了罐饮料，被送进医院，离开了世界。验尸死于於细螺旋体病，追踪她喝的饮料，是直接用罐对嘴饮用。实验证明罐头受到鼠尿感染细螺旋体病毒。鼠尿含有毒性和致命物质。因罐头运输过程没有清洗的。研究显示罐上面的毒菌很多，请转给你关心的朋友。
text: [You must have a straw when drinking from a can] A woman drank a can of soft drink, was sent to the hospital, and passed away. The autopsy revealed that she died of leptospirosis, and the drink she drank was traced to drinking directly from the can to her mouth. Experiments have shown that canned food is infected with Leptospira virus in rat urine. Rat urine contains toxic and lethal substances. Because the cans were not cleaned during transportation. Studies have shown that there are many toadstools on the can. Please pass this on to your concerned friends.

chinese_text: 【求证! 华山捅人是党委书记妻子】周孝德，陕西西安理工大学党委书记，本月3日，一家三口，在天竺山国家森林公园遊玩時，因排队问题与他人发生争执，其妻用水果刀捅伤一女生背部、大量出血。伤情已基本稳定，伤人者家属周孝德前往医院看望了伤者，並送去1万元的医疗费，案件正待调查。@超粤 期待真相!
text: [Confirmation! The person who stabbed in Huashan was the wife of the party secretary] Zhou Xiaode, secretary of the party committee of Xi'an University of Technology in Shaanxi Province. On the 3rd of this month, a family of three had a dispute with others over queuing in the Tianzhu Mountain National Forest Park. His wife used a fruit knife He stabbed a girl in the back and bled profusely. The injury has basically stabilized. Zhou Xiaode, a family member of the injured person, went to the hospital to visit the injured person and sent him 10,000 yuan in medical expenses. The case is pending investigation. @超粤Looking forward to the truth!

chinese_text: 【人大代表建议将法定结婚年龄降至18周岁】亲们，咨询得知，新的婚姻法中规定男女双方只要年满18周岁就可以结婚了啊，并不是之前的男方22、女方20噢。而且结婚证是国家级证书，加3个学分现在大学期间结婚，学费减半；跨民族结婚，生一个孩子奖励一万 源：新浪新闻http://t.cn/zO5aW13
text: [Deputies to the National People's Congress suggest lowering the legal age of marriage to 18 years old] Dear friends, after consultation, we learned that the new marriage law stipulates that both men and women can get married as long as they are 18 years old or above. It is not the previous 22 for the man and 20 for the woman. Moreover, the marriage certificate is a national certificate, plus 3 credits. If you get married during college, the tuition will be halved; if you marry across ethnic groups, you will be rewarded 10,000 yuan for having a child. Source: Sina News http://t.cn/zO5aW13

chinese_text: 十万火急-----谁的群多？请帮忙转一下：一个重庆打工者，22岁，叫吴云飞，不知道在什么地方，请他速回重庆，直接到重庆鱼嘴人民医院。家中失火，父母双亡，妹妹伤势很严重，想见他最后一面。舅舅：15523263869——爱心接力。【新中飞】
text: There is an urgent need -----whose crowd is there? Please help me forward this: A Chongqing migrant worker, 22 years old, named Wu Yunfei, I don’t know where he is. Please return to Chongqing as soon as possible and go directly to Chongqing Yuzui People’s Hospital. There was a fire at home, both parents died, and my sister was seriously injured. She wanted to see him one last time. Uncle: 15523263869——Love relay. 【New China Flying】

chinese_text: 爆炸性新闻：有人拿着@工商银行 销售的一公斤黄金，附带证明和发票，拿到金银加工厂出售，经过核实，的确是工商银行出售的，加工厂老板就收了，检验黄金的精确纯度，必须去南京，结果一周后报告来了，该金条参杂了“铱'"。另说中国市场40%金条用铱或钨掺假http://t.cn/zWE2eNC
text: Breaking news: Someone took a kilogram of gold sold by @ICBC, along with the certificate and invoice, to a gold and silver processing factory for sale. After verification, it was indeed sold by ICBC, and the owner of the processing factory took it and checked the precise purity of the gold. , I had to go to Nanjing, but the report came a week later that the gold bar was mixed with "iridium". It is also said that 40% of the gold bars in the Chinese market are adulterated with iridium or tungsten http://t.cn/zWE2eNC

chinese_text: 【家里有买实物金条投资的赶快去做鉴定，出大事了！】中国市场40%金条用铱或钨掺假。有人拿着工商银行销售的一公斤黄金，附带证明和发票，拿到金银加工厂出售，经过核实，的确是工商银行出售的，加工厂老板就收了，检验黄金的精确纯度，必须去南京，结果一周后报告来了，该金条参杂了“铱'"。
text: [If you have purchased physical gold bars for investment at home, hurry up and get them appraised, something big has happened! 】40% of the gold bars in the Chinese market are adulterated with iridium or tungsten. Someone took a kilogram of gold sold by ICBC, along with a certificate and invoice, to a gold and silver processing factory for sale. After verification, it was indeed sold by ICBC, and the owner of the processing factory accepted it. To test the precise purity of the gold, you must go to Nanjing. , and the report came a week later that the gold bar was mixed with "iridium".

chinese_text: 湖南省交通厅原副厅长李晓希在今年两会上说；目前，我国《刑法》对贪污受贿量刑太轻了。如果贪污受贿50万元就被枪毙，就不会有人敢腐败了。话刚说完，他因涉嫌贪污受贿2亿元，被省纪委立案调查！贪腐50万就枪毙，不知李副厅长2亿元该枪毙多少次！
text: Li Xiaoxi, former deputy director of the Hunan Provincial Department of Transportation, said at this year’s Two Sessions that at present, my country’s Criminal Law imposes too light sentences for corruption and bribery. If someone who took a bribe of 500,000 yuan was shot, no one would dare to be corrupt. As soon as he finished speaking, he was investigated by the Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection on suspicion of corruption and bribery worth 200 million yuan! He will be shot for corruption worth 500,000 yuan. I wonder how many times Deputy Director Li should be shot for 200 million yuan!

chinese_text: 电视台请一抗日老英雄做节目，主持人问：当年您为什么要打鬼子？ 老人说：当年小鬼子在我家乡烧杀抢掠。主持人又问：那您老现在最大的心愿是什么？老人答：我想有一把枪，把我们书记乡长毙了，他们比小鬼子还祸害人......http://t.cn/zWgCOCg（转）老爷子[威武][威武][赞][赞]
text: The TV station invited an old anti-Japanese hero to do a program. The host asked: Why did you fight against the Japanese? The old man said: Back then, the little devils burned, killed and looted my hometown. The host asked again: What is your biggest wish now? The old man replied: I want to have a gun to kill our secretary and mayor. They are more harmful to people than the little devils... http://t.cn/zWgCOCg (reposted) Old man [powerful] [powerful] [ Like Like]

Among the people here today, there are some of my former customers who are now judging me! chinese_text: 【敢吃大闸蟹的人，是世界上最“勇敢”的人】《壹周刊》记者把12只大闸蟹送去化验，结果发现11个样本有土霉素，6个样本有氯霉素。土霉素属“过时”抗菌素；而氯霉素属香港违禁物质，因会压抑骨髓功能，导致贫血、抵抗力下降和凝血困难问题。孕妇吃了含有土霉素的毒蟹，胎儿的骨质会变灰、变脆。
text: [Those who dare to eat hairy crabs are the most “brave” people in the world] A reporter from Next Weekly sent 12 hairy crabs for testing and found that 11 samples contained oxytetracycline and 6 samples contained chloramphenicol. Oxytetracycline is an "outdated" antibiotic; while chloramphenicol is a banned substance in Hong Kong. It can suppress bone marrow function, leading to anemia, reduced resistance and coagulation difficulties. If pregnant women eat poisonous crabs containing oxytetracycline, the bones of the fetus will become gray and brittle.

chinese_text: 【网传“女警官”丢名表开数辆豪车堵度假村】“公安局的丢了20余万元手表，开宝马奔驰堵路？”10月7日，一条关于“女警官”泡温泉丢名表后，因协商无果开车堵住度假村进出口的微博引起网友关注。据网友爆料，堵车行为造成20余人滞留酒店，泰顺警方已介入，因失主官大没办法处理。http://t.cn/zlpiViL
text: [It is reported on the Internet that a "female police officer" lost her famous watch and drove several luxury cars to block the resort] "The police officer lost a watch worth more than 200,000 yuan, and drove a BMW and Mercedes-Benz to block the road?" On October 7, an article was posted about a "female police officer" who lost her famous watch while soaking in a hot spring. , a Weibo post about driving and blocking the entrance and exit of the resort due to failed negotiations attracted the attention of netizens. According to netizens, the traffic jam caused more than 20 people to be stranded in the hotel. Taishun police have intervened because the owner of the property has no way to deal with it. http://t.cn/zlpiViL

chinese_text: 国务院将于近日正式批复上海市《关于撤消静安区建制将原静安区行政区域拆分划入长宁区和黄浦区的请示》，同意自2013年1月起撤消上海市静安区，以富民路--常德路为界线，其西面整体并入上海市长宁区；其东面整体并入上海市黄浦区；涉及拆分的街道做相应的调整@上海长宁 @上海育音堂@上海发布@上海壹周
text: The State Council will formally approve Shanghai's "Request for Instructions on the Abolition of the Organization of Jing'an District and the Splitting of the Original Jing'an District Administrative Area into Changning District and Huangpu District" in the near future, agreeing to abolish Shanghai's Jing'an District from January 2013 and use Fumin Road- -Changde Road is the boundary line, and its entire west side will be merged into Changning District of Shanghai; its entire east side will be merged into Huangpu District, Shanghai; the streets involved in the split will be adjusted accordingly@上海长宁@上海宇音堂@上海release@上海one week

chinese_text: 中国云南双柏县鄂家镇彝族传统文化的庆典节日，时间为每年阴历的7月14-16三天，“摸奶节”期间男人以摸到奶为吉祥，女子们以被摸奶为吉利。节日起源于隋朝年间。在这三天内是男人就高兴地摸，是女人就要愉快地接受被摸。是真是假？！转发！评论！！求考证！！进入高清大图>>>http://t.cn/zlpDKHb
text: It is a celebration of the traditional culture of the Yi people in Ejia Town, Shuangbai County, Yunnan Province, China. It takes place on the three days of July 14-16 of the lunar calendar every year. During the "Breast Touching Festival", men regard touching breasts as auspicious, and women regard having breasts touched as auspicious. . The festival originated during the Sui Dynasty. During these three days, men should be happy to be touched, and women should be happy to be touched. Is it true or false? ! Forward! Comment! ! Ask for a test! ! Enter the high-definition picture >>>http://t.cn/zlpDKHb

chinese_text: 【警官丢表，宝马奔驰堵路，胆大包天！】@熊妈妈的微博：今天早上，奔驰和宝马车车主，据传闻是公安局的人，称其价值20余万元的手表在泰顺玉龙山度假村遗失，就用私家车把酒店过道堵死。报警2个小时，还不见交警拖车。造成20余人滞留。据酒店方面了解，泰顺警方已介入，可惜失主官大，没办法处理！
text: [The police officer lost his watch and the BMW blocked the road. How audacious! 】@熊 Mama’s Weibo: This morning, the owner of a Mercedes-Benz and a BMW, who was rumored to be from the Public Security Bureau, claimed that his watch worth more than 200,000 yuan was lost at Yulong Mountain Resort in Taishun, so he used his private car to block the hotel corridor. Two hours after calling the police, the traffic police still didn’t see a tow truck. More than 20 people were stranded. According to the hotel, Taishun police have intervened, but unfortunately the owner is a big official and there is no way to deal with it!

chinese_text: 【震惊 北大学生强奸母猪？】#壳粉爆料# “江苏籍北大学生小马爆料：前段时间跟同学张某回老家安徽游玩，结果张某居然让他用手机拍自己强奸母猪，张某一边对圈里的母猪实施奸淫，一边让他帮忙拍下照片作纪念。待张某发泄完毕，还要拉他也来试试。”微评：国内最高学府竟有如此学生，佩服！[good][good]
text: [Shocked that Peking University students raped sows? 】 # Shell Fen Breaking News # "Xiao Ma, a student from Peking University in Jiangsu Province, broke the news: Some time ago, he went back to his hometown of Anhui with his classmate Zhang, but Zhang actually asked him to use his mobile phone to film himself raping a sow, while Zhang raped the sow in the pen. , while asking him to help take photos as a souvenir. After Zhang finished venting, he even asked him to come and try." Micro-comment: There are such students from the highest university in the country, I admire it! [good][good]

chinese_text: 【特供黄果树瀑布，领导一来就开闸放水】中国最大的瀑布——黄果树瀑布，早就没有多少水了，但只要大领导一来，瀑布还是气势磅礴。原来上面有水库，可以开闸放水。这年头，竟然连风景都有特供。by@凯迪猫眼看人
text: [Specially provided to Huangguoshu Waterfall, the water will be released as soon as the leader comes] The largest waterfall in China, Huangguoshu Waterfall, has long run out of water, but as soon as the leader comes, the waterfall is still majestic. It turns out that there is a reservoir above, and the gate can be opened to release water. These days, even the scenery has special offers. by@凯迪猫眼看人

chinese_text: 【[泪]恭喜大家可以戒掉拉面了!拉面剂含大量致癌物质】报道显示:所有兰州拉面馆都在使用拉面剂，拉面剂主要成份是蓬灰，这种化学物质含有大量致癌物质--砷。几乎所有的兰州拉面都用这种制剂来使得面粉更有弹性。新闻:http://t.cn/zOXVKqf 不信的同学,你去吃的时候问问师傅有没有加拉面剂,他肯定回答有
text: [[Tears] Congratulations to everyone for quitting ramen! Ramen agents contain a lot of carcinogens] Reports show that all Lanzhou ramen restaurants are using ramen agents. The main ingredient of ramen agents is fennel ash. This chemical substance contains a lot of carcinogens-- arsenic. Almost all Lanzhou ramen use this preparation to make the flour more elastic. News: http://t.cn/zOXVKqf For those who don’t believe it, when you go to eat, ask the chef if he has any noodles, he will definitely answer that he does.

chinese_text: 今天下午六点开始，全市高清探头全部启用，副驾驶不系安全带相同处罚，开车时打电话罚款50元，闯黄闪罚款200，越线停车罚款100，今天起晚六点至深夜2点，为期60天的全国交警集中查处酒驾，一经查获，一律拘役六个月，五年内不得考证。请相互转告至有车的本人、朋友及亲属，避免罚款。
text: Starting from 6 o'clock this afternoon, all high-definition cameras in the city will be activated. The co-driver will be punished for not wearing a seat belt. The fine will be 50 yuan for talking on the phone while driving, a fine of 200 yuan for running a yellow flash, and a fine of 100 yuan for parking outside the line. From 6 p.m. to 2 p.m. today , a 60-day national traffic police intensive investigation and prosecution of drunk driving. Once caught, all drivers will be detained for six months and will not be allowed to test for five years. Please tell each other to yourself, friends and relatives who own cars to avoid fines.

chinese_text: 【太活跃的鱼千万别买】去买鱼，结果看到摊贩往水盆内加入一种白色粉未，迅速用手搅拌，一会功夫白色粉未溶解，将半死不活的鱼虾倒入其中，一会儿就活蹦乱跳开，仿佛刚从河中捕回来的。这是一种能够致癌的催化剂，俗称鱼浮灵，也对智力有影响。相互转告一下，有必要让更多的人知道！
text: [Don’t buy fish that are too active] When I went to buy fish, I saw the vendor add a white powder into the water basin, stir it quickly with his hands, after a while the white powder did not dissolve, and poured the half-dead fish and shrimp into it. , and after a while he jumped away alive, as if he had just been caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also affects intelligence. Tell each other, it is necessary to let more people know!

chinese_text: 把家里的油放到冰箱2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫，那就是地沟油.或者用最简单方法:在炒菜时放一颗剥皮的大蒜，蒜对黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜变红色，就是地沟油。油良好的话，蒜是白色的。 为了自己，朋友，亲人，以防万一，转一下吧！！！有人为报道此事，已付出生命！！！
text: Put the oil at home in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Or use the simplest method: put a peeled garlic when cooking. Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it is gutter oil. If the oil is good, the garlic will be white. For yourself, your friends, and your loved ones, just in case, please turn it around! ! ! Some people have paid their lives to report this! ! !

chinese_text: 我TM以前以为医保账户断交三个月，就TM冻结无法支取，现在我TM才知道，医保账户是，无论你TM交了五年还是十年，余额有十万还是十五万，全TM是三月断交就清零！TMD清零！谁TM能25年不失业，谁TM能25年换工作不给自己放个假！TM你用医保卡兑换现金时，政府说是透支救命钱，现在政府TM这是谋财害命啊！
text: I used to think that if the medical insurance account was cut off for three months, it would be frozen and unable to be withdrawn. Now I know that the medical insurance account is, whether you have paid it for five years or ten years, and the balance is 100,000 or 150,000, the total amount is 100,000 or 150,000. It will be cleared if diplomatic relations are severed in March! TMD cleared! Who can stay unemployed for 25 years, and who can change jobs for 25 years without giving themselves a holiday! TM When you exchanged your medical insurance card for cash, the government said it was an overdraft of life-saving money. Now the government TM is seeking wealth and murder!

chinese_text: 北京开车族注意：今天下午六点开始，全市高清探头全部启用，副驾驶不系安全带相同处罚，开车时打电话罚款50元，闯黄闪罚款200，越线停车罚款100， 晚六点至深夜2点，为期60天的全国交警集中查处酒驾，一经查获，一律拘役六个月，五年内不得考证。请相互转告。
text: Attention Beijing motorists: Starting from 6 p.m. today, all high-definition cameras in the city will be activated. Co-pilots who do not wear seat belts will be punished the same way. A fine of 50 yuan for talking on the phone while driving, a fine of 200 yuan for running a yellow flashing light, and a fine of 100 yuan for parking outside the line. Until 6 p.m. At 2 o'clock in the night, the national traffic police conducted a 60-day intensive investigation and prosecution of drunk driving. Once caught, they will be detained for six months and will not be allowed to test for five years. Please tell each other.

chinese_text: 【阿司匹林】在睡眠时心脏病突发, 剧烈胸疼足以把人从沉睡中痛醒, 立刻口含两颗阿司匹林嚼碎了咽下去，接着立刻联络急救中心，然后坐在椅子或沙发上静候援助，千万别躺下！心脏科医师强调，如果每个看到这条微博的人， 能够转发10份给其他人，肯定至少有一条命将会被救回。 请扩散！（转）[心]

The cardiologist emphasized that if everyone who sees this Weibo forwards 10 copies to others, at least one life will definitely be saved. Please spread the word! (turn) [heart]

Attention men... cherish your life and stay away from Wi-Fi

text: Breast Touching Festival is a traditional culture of the Yi people in Ejia Town, Shuangbai County, Yunnan Province. It falls on July 14th, 15th and 16th in the lunar calendar. Including foreign tourists, if you meet a woman you like on the street, you can touch her. chest. The girls were evasive on the surface, but they never meant to blame because this was a custom that had been carried out by the people in their area for more than 1,000 years. Guys consider touching breasts as good luck, and girls consider having breasts touched as luck and blessing!

chinese_text: 【我们必须知道】：在中国，普通公民缴纳养老金的费用占工资的28%，而公务员是3%。但退休后，公务员退休金却是普通职工3倍，实际上他们的高退休金是由普通职工等纳税人埋单。清华白重恩教授说，中国社保缴费乃全球最高，这对于工资低于公务员的普通人来说，就是“劫贫济富”.转起来，让更多人知道……
text: [We must know]: In China, pension contributions for ordinary citizens account for 28% of their salary, while for civil servants it is 3%. However, after retirement, the pension of civil servants is three times that of ordinary employees. In fact, their high pensions are paid for by ordinary employees and other taxpayers. Professor Bai Chongen of Tsinghua University said that China’s social security contributions are the highest in the world. For ordinary people whose wages are lower than those of civil servants, this is “robbing the poor to give to the rich.” Spread the word and let more people know...

chinese_text: 小崔说，在德国，汽车、公司都无需年检。我问德国人：汽车不年检，坏了怎么办？答：自己修车。问：企业不年检，公司倒闭如潮怎么办？德国人答：你看德国是这样的吗？我问：德国政-府为何不强制年检？德国人反问：谁给了政府这个权力？如果政府对年检感兴趣，说明这种事对它有好处。
text: Xiao Cui said that in Germany, cars and companies do not need annual inspections. I asked the Germans: If the car is not inspected annually, what should I do if it breaks down? Answer: Repair the car yourself. Question: What should I do if companies fail to conduct annual inspections and companies close down like a wave? German replied: Do you think Germany is like this? I asked: Why doesn’t the German government mandate annual inspections? The Germans asked: Who gave the government this power? If the government is interested in annual inspections, it means that this kind of thing is good for it.

text: [New version of civet cat for prince] Xiao Ying, a senior science student at No. 4 Middle School in Hengyang, Hunan Province, sent a text message to check after her college entrance examination results came out this year, and her score was 695. That night, her class teacher called and told her that the score was also 695. The next day, I checked online and found only 229 points. When applying for a score check, the Education Bureau asked the school to provide a certificate, but the school principal excused himself for a business trip. Xiao is a son of a peasant family, and his grades are suspected to have been replaced http://t.cn/zWUu0Uf

text: Li Xiang, the reporter who investigated waste oil, died tragically with more than 10 stab wounds to his body. He has worked hard for the food safety of more than one billion people across the country who cannot eat special food. He gave his young life. He sacrificed his young life for our health. What we can do for him is: please move the mouse, forward it, and express your gratitude. -Zi Yan

text: [Descendants of the Qing royal family propose to restore the royal family] Jin Fuxin, the tenth grandson of Kangxi and a member of the Guangzhou CPPCC, said that he is ready to travel across China to collect 1 million signatures to petition the National People's Congress to restore the monarchy in China. Restore the Qing royal family and seek support from more than 20 countries that retain their monarchy. In order to highlight the identity of the dragon descendants, all their daily necessities and clothing are in golden yellow, and they look forward to living in the Forbidden City day and night http://t.cn/zW5573c

chinese_text: 【政协委员提议恢复大清王朝】 康熙十世孙、广州政协委员金复新表示，他准备走遍中国收集100万人签名，向全国人大请愿，在中国恢复君主制。恢复清皇室，并打算给20多个仍保留君主制的国家写信寻求支持。为彰显龙裔身份，其日常用品、服装更是非黄色不选，并日夜盼望能住进故宫。
text: [Members of the Chinese People’s Political Consultative Conference propose to restore the Qing Dynasty] Jin Fuxin, the tenth grandson of Kangxi and a member of the Guangzhou Chinese People’s Political Consultative Conference, said he is ready to travel across China to collect 1 million signatures to petition the National People’s Congress to restore the monarchy in China. Restore the Qing royal family and plan to write to more than 20 countries that still retain their monarchy to seek support. In order to show his identity as a Dragonborn, his daily necessities and clothing are all yellow, and he hopes to live in the Forbidden City day and night.

chinese_text: 刚才得到消息，中国已免除越南到期全部债务。先是借，到了期就免。这样的政府，天下无2！500亿美元啊...
text: I just received news that China has forgiven Vietnam’s entire debt due. Borrow it first, then waive it when it’s due. There is no government like this in the world worth 2! 50 billion US dollars...

chinese_text: 【喝易拉罐一定要吸管】一妇女喝了罐饮料，被送进医院，离开了世界。验尸死于於细螺旋体病，追踪她喝的饮料，是直接用罐对嘴饮用。实验证明罐头受到鼠尿感染细螺旋体病毒。鼠尿含有毒性和致命物质。因罐头运输过程没有清洗的。研究显示罐上面的毒菌很多，请转给你关心的朋友。
text: [You must have a straw when drinking from a can] A woman drank a can of soft drink, was sent to the hospital, and passed away. The autopsy revealed that she died of leptospirosis, and the drink she drank was traced to drinking directly from the can to her mouth. Experiments have shown that canned food is infected with Leptospira virus in rat urine. Rat urine contains toxic and lethal substances. Because the cans were not cleaned during transportation. Studies have shown that there are many toadstools on the can. Please pass this on to your concerned friends.

chinese_text: 鑫转】--中华救国军： 【你转一次 他捐一元】重庆籍三岁男孩申梁宇，不慎跌入开水锅，全身39%重度烫伤，打工父母无力承担10万多元医疗费，荆州市国武房产经理雷国武先生承诺，为了让更多人关心这个孩子，你转一次 他就捐一元。举手之劳，凝聚爱心。
text: Xinzhuan] - Chinese National Salvation Army: [If you transfer once, he will donate one yuan] Shen Liangyu, a three-year-old boy from Chongqing, accidentally fell into a pot of boiling water and suffered severe burns to 39% of his body. His working parents were unable to afford the medical expenses of more than 100,000 yuan, Jingzhou City Mr. Lei Guowu, the manager of Guowu Real Estate, promised that in order to get more people to care about this child, he would donate one yuan for each transfer. A little effort brings together love.

chinese_text: 李盟盟，21岁，河南开封县陈留四中学生，今年高考565分。因县招办失职把她的志愿申请锁在柜子忘了提交，造成任何大学都上不成。河南省高招办回应，此事不予处理！李盟盟是农村孩子，为供其上学妹妹辍学打工，父亲打工摔断了腿。你的一次转发也许就能帮她改变命运！试试能否创造奇迹！@高晓松@路一鸣
text: Li Mengmeng, 21 years old, is a student of Chenliu No. 4 Middle School in Kaifeng County, Henan Province. He scored 565 in this year’s college entrance examination. Because the county admissions office was negligent and locked her application in a cabinet and forgot to submit it, she was unable to get into any college. The High Recruitment Office of Henan Province responded that the matter will not be handled! Li Mengmeng is a child from a rural area. He dropped out of school and worked to support his younger sister in school. His father broke his leg while working. Your forwarding may be able to help her change her destiny! See if you can create a miracle! @高小松@路一明

chinese_text: 中国云南双柏县鄂家镇彝族传统文化的庆典节日，时间为每年阴历的7月14、15、16三天，“摸奶节”期间男人以摸到奶为吉祥，女子们以被摸奶为吉利。节日起源于隋朝年间。在“摸奶节”的三天以内，只要是参加节日的人都可以摸！
text: It is a traditional cultural celebration festival of the Yi people in Ejia Town, Shuangbai County, Yunnan Province, China. It falls on the 14th, 15th and 16th of July in the lunar calendar every year. During the "Breast Touching Festival", men regard touching breasts as auspiciousness, and women regard having breasts touched as auspiciousness. For good luck. The festival originated during the Sui Dynasty. Within three days of the "Breast Touching Festival", anyone who participates in the festival can touch it!

chinese_text: 一个伦敦，岂能跟北京PK？我们开毕幕式花8.31亿，你们才花2.7亿；我们一下盖了102个新场馆，你们才新建14个，且8个是临时馆；我们安保花了4亿，你们才250万；我们当时矿泉水卖3块，你们却卖18块多，我们按古代兵阵和百官升堂的班底穿插布阵，一站就叫团体操，你们屌儿郎铛水裆尿裤，还不如俺们课间操。
text: How can London compete with Beijing? We spent 831 million for the opening ceremony, and you only spent 270 million; we built 102 new venues, and you only built 14, and 8 of them were temporary; we spent 400 million on security, and you only spent 2.5 million; we At that time, mineral water sold for 3 yuan, but you sold it for more than 18 yuan. We set up the formation according to the ancient military formations and the teams of hundreds of officials. One station was called group exercise. You idiots with wet crotches and wet crotch diapers are not as good as ours. Time exercise.

chinese_text: 【爱心发布】我粉丝少，请各位名人与热心博爱之人帮转一下。这个可爱的小姑娘叫刘丽洁，7岁。7月4日16点到18点之间在丰台区看丹桥家附近走失，家里非常着急。请尽量把照片转下去，发现线索请马上联系，电15538864632。你每转发一次，都有可能带给她一次希望；相信好人有好报！举手之劳！。王偉建@中铸
text: [Posted with love] I have few fans, please help celebrities and people who are enthusiastic about philanthropy to spread the word. This cute little girl is called Liu Lijie, 7 years old. On July 4th, between 16:00 and 18:00, Kan Danqiao went missing near his home in Fengtai District. His family was very worried. Please try your best to forward the photos. If you find any clues, please contact us immediately at 15538864632. Every time you forward it, you may bring her hope; I believe good people will be rewarded! Just a little effort! . Wang Weijian@中庄

chinese_text: 【官员腐败率99.99%？】全国人大代表韩德云，连续7年提交官员财产申报公开提案，否决率达99%。他已当选两届全国人大代表，今年他又一次提交要求官员财产公开提案，据说该提案一提出，全场立时鸦雀无声，代表们在无声中按下否决钮，否决率达竟99.99%！——若依此反推：官员腐败率应是99.99%？
text: [Official corruption rate is 99.99%? Han Deyun, a representative of the National People's Congress, has submitted proposals for the disclosure of official property declarations for seven consecutive years, with a rejection rate of 99%. He has been elected as a deputy to the National People's Congress for two terms. This year he once again submitted a proposal to require officials to disclose their assets. It is said that as soon as the proposal was proposed, the entire audience fell into silence. Delegates silently pressed the veto button, with a veto rate of 99.99%! ——If we extrapolate from this: the official corruption rate should be 99.99%?

chinese_text: 【宁波全城寻找 北仑可爱老外】7月30日下午，一个老外在北仑打的，看错了出租车计价器：把86块看成8600块，老外慌忙丢下4600块落荒而逃，司机越追，老外跑的越远，目前全城搜索这位可爱的老外[偷笑]！如果这位老外也玩微薄，赶紧联系媒体哦[围观]
text: [Looking for cute foreigners in Beilun all over Ningbo] On the afternoon of July 30, a foreigner took a taxi in Beilun and misread the taxi meter: he mistook 86 yuan for 8,600 yuan. The foreigner hurriedly dropped 4,600 yuan and ran away. Chasing, the foreigner runs farther and farther, the whole city is currently searching for this cute foreigner [laughing]! If this foreigner also plays for a small fortune, please contact the media immediately [Onlookers]

chinese_text: 美国人Richard Sears,网名汉字叔叔,花费全部积蓄和20年时间,从事一分钱也赚不到的汉字系统性研究,创办字源网站http://t.cn/hGKWlM 他为汉字付出一切,目前贫困潦倒,加上签证到期,面临被迫离开中国的困境.他在天津,希望能找个英语教师或翻译的工作,从而能继续在中国生活和研究汉字.请大家帮忙推荐和转发!
text: American Richard Sears, known online as Uncle Hanzi, spent all his savings and 20 years on systematic research on Chinese characters for which he could not earn a penny, and founded the etymology website http://t.cn/hGKWlM. He devoted everything to Chinese characters. Currently in poverty and with his visa expired, he is facing the dilemma of being forced to leave China. He is in Tianjin and hopes to find a job as an English teacher or translator so that he can continue to live and study Chinese characters in China. Please help recommend and forward it!

chinese_text: 【大妈！您太有才啦！】近日，山东一位老大妈受够了汽车在她家门前斑马线呼啸而过，且当地相关部门又帮不上什么忙，让她十分恼怒。她灵机一动，把一个穿着性感薄纱內衣的充气娃娃绑在附近的一棵树上，果然引得司机们纷纷把车速慢下来看个究竟！门前飙车状况大幅改观！[哈哈]（都市快报）
text: 【Aunt! You are so talented! 】Recently, an old lady in Shandong was fed up with cars whizzing past the zebra crossing in front of her house, and the relevant local departments were unable to help, which made her very angry. She had an idea and tied an inflatable doll wearing sexy gauze lingerie to a nearby tree. As expected, the drivers slowed down to take a look! The situation of drag racing in front of the door has been greatly improved! [Haha] (City Express)

chinese_text: 【泰国毒纹蛊，惊现人间】近日泰国早已失传的毒纹蛊，惊现人间，常时间盯着她的眼睛看会觉得自己的灵魂，在渐渐吸进她的眼睛中或出现灵异现象、幻听、音障等，日本和泰国已有七人，尝试后自称可以看到怨魂，而且有二人已经自杀.切勿随意尝试！
text: [Thailand Poison Pattern Gu, shocking appearance in the world] Recently, the long-lost Poison Pattern Gu in Thailand has made a shocking appearance in the world. If you stare into her eyes for a long time, you will feel that your soul is gradually being sucked into her eyes, or supernatural phenomena will occur. There are seven people in Japan and Thailand who suffer from auditory hallucinations, sound impairment, etc., and claim to be able to see resentful spirits after trying it, and two of them have committed suicide. Do not try it casually!

chinese_text: 白岩松：《我所经历的北京，我所看到的伦敦》。不得不说，白岩松是敢于直面真相和勇于说出事实的媒体人。在奥运这样一个风口浪尖上，他的解说，他的点评，可谓句句戳中要害，发人深省。最后一句话震撼人心：的确，北京奥运让我们看到了一个快速崛起的中国，伦敦奥运，我们能否看到中国民众的崛起呢？
text: Bai Yansong: "The Beijing I experienced, the London I saw". It must be said that Bai Yansong is a media person who dares to face the truth and speak the truth. On the cusp of the Olympics, his explanations and comments hit the mark and were thought-provoking. The last sentence is shocking: Indeed, the Beijing Olympics allowed us to see a rapidly rising China. At the London Olympics, can we see the rise of the Chinese people?

chinese_text: 【复旦新生勤工俭学被城管毒打致死】7月27日晚淮安市一名学生（今年刚考取复旦大学）为了筹学费,暑假帮父母在黄河桥卖水果,不幸被城管毒打身亡.城管打了孩子几次.警察到现场的时候,他还活着.警察问谁打他了,他指认其中一个城管.结果那城管当着警察的面猛打那个孩子. 有良心别删！http://t.cn/zWKQZu3
text: [Fudan work-study student was beaten to death by urban management] On the evening of July 27, a student from Huai'an City (who had just been admitted to Fudan University this year) helped his parents sell fruit on the Yellow River Bridge during the summer vacation in order to raise tuition. Unfortunately, he was beaten to death by urban management. The urban management beat the child several times. Times. When the police arrived at the scene, he was still alive. The police asked who had beaten him, and he identified one of the urban management officers. As a result, the urban management officer beat the child fiercely in front of the police. Don’t delete it if you have a conscience! http://t.cn/zWKQZu3

text: The 16-year-old Chinese swimmer Ye Shiwen won two gold medals and broke a world record. But he was asked if he had taken doping? She said nervously and aggrievedly: "I really didn't take any stimulants, I just took a lot of Nutrilite nutritional supplements, and my coach forced me to take them"! Afterwards, when the American coach saw Yao Zhengjie, the head coach of the Chinese swimming team, at the sponsorship ceremony between Nutrilite and China, he fainted on the spot: "It was the Chinese who defeated the Americans by eating American products"!

chinese_text: 【艾冬梅练长跑的脚，基本残废】昔日马拉松金牌运动员艾冬梅下场凄凉，钱被教练王德显弄走，打官司未果，无奈卖金牌。现在更惨，跟丈夫一起练摊，100元苦撑20天。主持人问：你有过多少块世界冠军的金牌？艾冬梅说：4，5块。支持人问：你卖这个舍得吗？她含着眼泪哽咽着说：很舍不得。
text: [Ai Dongmei practiced long-distance running, and her feet were basically disabled] Former marathon gold medalist Ai Dongmei met a miserable end. Her money was taken away by her coach Wang Dexian, and the lawsuit failed, so she had no choice but to sell her gold medal. It's even worse now. I practice stall sales with my husband and have to work hard for 20 days with only 100 yuan. The host asked: How many world championship gold medals have you had? Ai Dongmei said: 4 or 5 yuan. The supporter asked: Are you willing to sell this? She choked with tears and said: I am very reluctant to let go.

chinese_text: 【太活跃的鱼千万别买】去买鱼,结果看到摊贩往水盆内加入一种白色粉未,迅速用手搅拌,一会功夫白色粉未溶解,将半死不活的鱼虾倒入其中,一会儿就活蹦乱跳开,仿佛刚从河中捕回来的.这是一种能够致癌的催化剂，俗称鱼浮灵，也对智力有影响。相互转告一下，有必要让更多的人知道！(关注@成都吃货大队长 )
text: [Don’t buy fish that are too active] When I went to buy fish, I saw a vendor adding a white powder into the water basin, stirring it quickly with his hands. After a while, the white powder did not dissolve, and then poured the half-dead fish and shrimp into it. , and jumped away in a short while, as if it had just been caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also affects intelligence. Tell each other, it is necessary to let more people know! (Follow @成都吃肉大长)

chinese_text: 呵呵。今年110米栏，每个栏高了4.3㎝，原因是轮蹲奥组萎考虑到了比赛时下雨刮风的可能性，在栏底增加了吸水的材料，却忘了降低栏的高度。而且跨栏用的栏，是志愿者在奥运会开幕两天后加班加点拼装起来的，质量参差不一。……——来自贴吧《李毅吧》
text: hehe. This year's 110-meter hurdles, each hurdle is 4.3cm higher. The reason is that the Olympic team took into account the possibility of rain and wind during the competition and added water-absorbent material to the bottom of the hurdles, but forgot to lower the height of the hurdles. Moreover, the hurdles used for the hurdles were put together by volunteers who worked overtime two days after the opening of the Olympic Games, and the quality varies. ...——From Tieba "Li Yi Bar"

chinese_text: 刘翔的7步上篮法是针对起跑点到第一个高栏的距离13.72米，然而狗屎一样的英国人把第一个高栏改到了13.85米的距离所以刘翔第一脚就踩栏了，这也是导致最后小组有4个人踩栏摔倒，然而那个英国猪练的就是13.85米所以他没摔栏 英国人这么干就是为了自己国家的人拿金牌 CNM的英国猪！
text: Liu Xiang's 7-step layup method is based on the distance from the starting point to the first high hurdle of 13.72 meters. However, the British pig was training at 13.85 meters, so he did not fall down. The British pig did this just to win the gold medal for his country's CNM British pig!

chinese_text: #刘翔摔倒案#刘翔的7步上篮法是针对起跑点到第一个高栏的距离13.72米，英国人把第一个高栏改到了13.85米的距离所以刘翔第一脚就踩栏了，这也导致最后小组有4个人踩栏摔倒。今年110米栏，每个栏高了4.3㎝，原因是奥组委考虑到比赛时刮风下雨的可能性，在栏底增加了吸水的材料，这解释合理么？
text: # Liuxiang Falls Case# Liu Xiang’s 7-step layup method is based on the distance from the starting point to the first high hurdle of 13.72 meters. The British changed the first high hurdle to 13.85 meters, so Liu Xiang stepped on the hurdle with his first foot. , which also caused 4 people in the final group to step on the railing and fall. This year's 110-meter hurdles, each hurdle is 4.3cm higher. The reason is that the Olympic Organizing Committee considered the possibility of wind and rain during the competition and added water-absorbent material at the bottom of the hurdles. Is this reasonable explanation?

chinese_text: 【孙杨90后嫩模女友曝光】昨日有一八卦周刊的记者微博爆出孙杨的90后嫩模女友莫西。不少网友对此表示祝福，但是也有不少网友反对两人在一起，认定“孙杨和叶诗文”才是最佳一对。http://t.cn/zWWx9i4 PS:看起来好成熟，孙杨那么萌，老牛啃嫩草？！
text: [Sun Yang’s post-90s young model girlfriend exposed] Yesterday, a reporter from a gossip weekly revealed on Weibo that Sun Yang’s post-90s young model girlfriend Moxi. Many netizens expressed their blessing for this, but many netizens objected to the two being together and believed that "Sun Yang and Ye Shiwen" were the best couple. http://t.cn/zWWx9i4 PS: He looks so mature, Sun Yang is so cute, an old cow gnawing on young grass? !

chinese_text: 这样的西瓜不能再吃了！有很多黑心商贩把针头对准了尚未成熟的西瓜，注射禁用食品添加剂甜蜜素和胭脂红！“打针西瓜”瓜瓤呈红色，汁液也很“丰富”，但没有一点西瓜味。所用添加剂破坏肝脏、肾脏的功能、影响儿童智力发育等毒性！夏天来了，请将此帖多多转发，让更多网友和市民的健康，不再遭受侵害！
text: You can't eat this kind of watermelon anymore! There are many unscrupulous vendors who aim their needles at immature watermelons and inject banned food additives cyclamate and carmine! The flesh of the "injected watermelon" is red and the juice is "rich", but there is no watermelon flavor at all. The additives used destroy the functions of the liver and kidneys, affect the intellectual development of children and other toxic effects! Summer is coming, please forward this post more so that the health of more netizens and citizens will no longer be infringed!

chinese_text: 美国杜克大学因为抄袭开除多名中国留学生，听到处分结果这些舞弊学生竟然示威静坐，散发传单说自己是花钱教育的而不是来被惩罚的，他们此举引起了校园社区的巨大反感。除了律师为赚取佣金答应帮忙以外，舆论导向对中国颇为不利。学校数年来第一次调用了数名警察在学生活动中心进行巡逻以防不测。
text: Duke University in the United States expelled many Chinese students for plagiarism. After hearing the punishment, these cheating students went on a sit-in and distributed leaflets saying that they were paid to educate rather than punished. Their actions aroused great resentment in the campus community. In addition to the lawyers agreeing to help in order to earn commissions, the direction of public opinion is quite unfavorable to China. For the first time in several years, the school deployed several police officers to patrol the student activity center to prevent emergencies.

chinese_text: 大家努力活着、好好活着，据说195岁以上老人看病医药费全报销了……
text: Everyone works hard and lives well. It is said that the medical expenses of people over 195 years old are fully reimbursed...

chinese_text: 常凯淇爸爸(410494910) 2012-8-3 16:06:08 急！！大家帮忙转一下；陈晨，两岁，被刚出锅的油给烫伤，已被送到医院，医生说现在情况很危险，需要花费五十万，急需好心人捐款帮助，现互动每位网友转发，每转发一次孩子可得到3分钱支助。多一人转发就多一份希望。帮帮这个可怜的小男孩吧【好人终有好报】
text: Chang Kaiqi's father (410494910) 2012-8-3 16:06:08 Urgent! ! Please help share this. Chen Chen, two years old, was scalded by the oil that just came out of the pan. He has been sent to the hospital. The doctor said that the situation is very dangerous and it will cost 500,000. He is in urgent need of donations from kind-hearted people. Now interact with each netizen and forward it. , children can receive 3 cents of support for each repost. The more people forward it, the more hope you have. Please help this poor little boy [Good people will eventually be rewarded]

chinese_text: 父亲去上海解放军455医院（上海市长宁区淮海西路338号）看病，张建华医生治疗态度恶劣，声称不配他的高价中药（甲亢灵10盒卖1千多），就不给配药治疗，被我们拒绝之后恼羞成怒将桌上所有东西砸向我，如此丧尽医德的医生，不替他宣传一下对不起人民。“另附照片一张”via@SEAN-MB
text: My father went to the 455th Hospital of the People's Liberation Army in Shanghai (No. 338 Huaihai West Road, Changning District, Shanghai) to see a doctor. Dr. Zhang Jianhua had a bad treatment attitude. He claimed that his high-priced traditional Chinese medicine was not worthy of him (10 boxes of hyperthyroidism sold for more than 1,000), and would not dispense the medicine for treatment. We were After refusing, he got angry and threw everything on the table at me. For a doctor who has lost all medical ethics, I feel sorry for the people if he doesn't publicize it for him. "Attach a photo" via@SEAN-MB

chinese_text: 新骗局又来了:如果你接到任何电话(包括10086或10010)说检查线路，并让你按#键或任意键，请别按并马上挂机。那是家诈骗公司，他们能在你按下任意键后连到你的SIM卡并用你的话费 ，还可窃听你的通话短信也就是复制卡！转发阻止这项诈骗。中央电视台《焦点访谈》已播出。 谢谢@Grace焕雅Ngau 分享给我！
text: A new scam is here: If you receive any call (including 10086 or 10010) saying to check the line and asking you to press the # key or any key, please do not press it and hang up immediately. That is a scam company. They can connect to your SIM card after you press any key and use your phone bill. They can also eavesdrop on your phone calls and text messages, that is, copy the card! Retweet to stop this scam. CCTV's "Focus Interview" has been broadcast. Thank you @Grace Huanya Ngau for sharing it with me!

chinese_text: 神秘】他们有钱，有权，有势，有名，唯一没有的就是安全感。一本美国护照好比传说中的软猬甲，金钟罩铁布衫，给他们一种贴身的安全感，使他们游走于正邪善恶间时刀枪不入，辗转腾挪时毫发无伤。美国护照真是一部通往武林至尊宝座必修的神功秘籍呀。杨澜终于承认自己是美国国籍的人大代表了。
text: Mysterious] They are rich, powerful, powerful, and famous, but the only thing they don’t have is a sense of security. An American passport is like the legendary soft hedgehog armor with a golden bell over an iron shirt, giving them a sense of personal security, making them invulnerable when they wander between good and evil, and unscathed when they move about. The American Passport is really a magical secret book that must be learned to lead to the supreme throne of martial arts. Yang Lan finally admitted that she is an American National People's Congress representative.

chinese_text: 【广东河源4.8级地震已发生30次余震】今晨2时34分，广东河源市东源县发生4.8级地震。根据震源区的台站测定，至16日04时00分，发生余震30次，最大余震2.6级。广东省地震工作组已抵达河源，参加在应急指挥中心召开的市防抗救工作领导小组会议。 http://t.cn/zO2xKEA 30次余震，好恐怖啊！
text: [The 4.8-magnitude earthquake in Heyuan, Guangdong has caused 30 aftershocks] At 2:34 this morning, a 4.8-magnitude earthquake occurred in Dongyuan County, Heyuan City, Guangdong. According to measurements from stations in the earthquake source area, as of 04:00 on the 16th, 30 aftershocks had occurred, with the largest aftershock measuring 2.6. The Guangdong Provincial Earthquake Working Group has arrived in Heyuan and participated in the municipal prevention and rescue work leading group meeting held at the emergency command center. http://t.cn/zO2xKEA 30 aftershocks, so scary!

chinese_text: 网传台湾前领导人 前国民党员 李登辉因心脏病去世！记得以前特别痛恨他，后来才发现原来真正阻碍两岸统一另有其人（我什么也没说）！他从支持统一到支持独立，这只不过是在维护台湾的利益罢了！虽然不同意他某些做法置！但仅其出发点而言，他已经比他对岸那些同行们优秀太多了
text: It is reported on the Internet that former Taiwan leader and former KMT member Lee Teng-hui died of heart disease! I remember hating him very much before, but later I found out that there was someone else who really hindered cross-strait reunification (I didn’t say anything)! His shift from supporting reunification to supporting independence is nothing more than safeguarding Taiwan's interests! Although I don’t agree with some of his practices! But just from his starting point, he is already much better than his colleagues on the other side.

chinese_text: 杨澜原话：虽然我入了美国籍，但我出身于中国，所以从原产地角度而言，我不出席美国两会而出席中国的两会是“天经地义”。杨澜的荒唐逻辑，实在不敢恭维。恐怕连她的总统奥巴马听后，也会觉得匪夷所思。笑死人了，杨澜的所言所语，与她的教养背景、职业诚信大相径庭。金玉其外，败絮其中！这就是杨澜。
text: Yang Lan’s original words: Although I am a naturalized American, I was born in China, so from the perspective of my place of origin, it is “natural” that I will not attend the Two Sessions in the United States but attend the Two Sessions in China. I really can't praise Yang Lan's absurd logic. I'm afraid even her president, Obama, would find it incredible after hearing this. It’s ridiculous. What Yang Lan said is completely different from her upbringing and professional integrity. There is gold and jade on the outside, but lint on the inside! This is Yang Lan.

chinese_text: 【比三鹿奶粉毒性厉害100倍的大闸蟹 ，你还敢吃吗，太勇敢了吧！】大闸蟹一般至少两年才能长到二两以上，但江苏养殖场的大闸蟹，使用激素之后，都是一年蟹，当年下苗，当年养成上市。《壹周刊》记者从江苏买回来螃蟹送到香港“标准及检定中心”化验，蟹肉里不仅有激素，还有多种对人体有害的抗菌素。
text: [Do you still dare to eat hairy crabs that are 100 times more toxic than Sanlu milk powder? You are so brave! 】Hairy crabs usually take at least two years to grow to more than two taels, but after using hormones, the hairy crabs in Jiangsu farms are one-year-old crabs. A "Next Weekly" reporter bought crabs from Jiangsu and sent them to Hong Kong's "Standards and Verification Center" for testing. The crab meat not only contains hormones, but also a variety of antibiotics that are harmful to the human body.

chinese_text: 【比三鹿奶粉毒性厉害100倍的大闸蟹 ，你还敢吃吗[吃惊][吃惊]】大闸蟹一般至少两年才能长到二两以上，但江苏养殖场的大闸蟹，使用激素之后，都是一年蟹，当年下苗，当年养成上市。《壹周刊》记者从江苏买回来螃蟹送到香港“标准及检定中心”化验，蟹肉里不仅有激素，还有多种对人体有害的抗菌素。
text: [Do you still dare to eat hairy crabs that are 100 times more toxic than Sanlu milk powder? [Surprised][Surprised]] It usually takes at least two years for hairy crabs to grow to more than 2 taels, but the hairy crabs in Jiangsu farms are all one-year-old after using hormones. Crabs of the same year are grown and put on the market that year. A "Next Weekly" reporter bought crabs from Jiangsu and sent them to Hong Kong's "Standards and Verification Center" for testing. The crab meat not only contains hormones, but also a variety of antibiotics that are harmful to the human body.

chinese_text: 【比三鹿奶粉毒性厉害100倍的大闸蟹 ，你还敢吃吗?】大闸蟹一般至少两年才能长到二两以上，但江苏养殖场的大闸蟹，使用激素后，都是一年蟹，当年下苗，当年养成上市。《壹周刊》记者从江苏买回来螃蟹送香港“标准及检定中心”化验，蟹肉里不仅有激素，还有多种对人体有害的抗菌素 via @中国酒F
text: [Do you still dare to eat hairy crabs that are 100 times more toxic than Sanlu milk powder?] Hairy crabs usually take at least two years to grow to more than two taels, but the hairy crabs in Jiangsu farms are one-year-old crabs after using hormones. The seedlings were grown and put on the market that year. A reporter from "Next Weekly" bought crabs from Jiangsu and sent them to Hong Kong's "Standards and Verification Center" for testing. The crab meat not only contains hormones, but also a variety of antibiotics that are harmful to the human body via @中文字幕F

chinese_text: 李宁，家乡：山东，一个花季女大学生，一个为母亲讨公道的上访妹，最后公开报道‘自杀’于当地信F局。被网传疑似就是那个‘23岁唯一保留人皮的人体标本’，脸部非常相似，并有网友呼吁希尽快还原真相，还此女公道。不知道此事是否是小说？我相信我们国家不会有这种万恶的事情的。http://t.cn/zWTcoG4
text: Li Ning, hometown: Shandong, a young female college student, a petitioner seeking justice for her mother, finally publicly reported her suicide at the local information bureau. It is rumored on the Internet that she is the "23-year-old only human specimen with preserved human skin", and her face is very similar. Some netizens called on Xi to restore the truth as soon as possible and give this woman justice. I wonder if this is a novel? I believe there will be no such evil things in our country. http://t.cn/zWTcoG4

chinese_text: 地沟油的记者李翔,死了, 身中10余刀,为了我们的健康,他付出了年轻的生命。把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时,如果出现白色的泡沫一样,那就是地沟油. 在炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头，如果蒜子变红色,就是用地沟油,含有大量黄曲霉素食 油良好的话,蒜子是白色为了朋友,为了亲人，以防万一。
text: Li Xiang, the gutter oil reporter, died with more than 10 stab wounds in his body. He sacrificed his young life for our health. Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. When cooking, put a peeled garlic head. If the garlic turns red, it is gutter oil, which contains a lot of yellow yeast. If the toxin cooking oil is good, the garlic will be white for friends and relatives, just in case.

chinese_text: 【大消息：北京已开征房产税！】北京市地方税务局今日证实，北京市已经开始对商务办公楼、商业地产等非住宅类房产开征房产税，每年缴纳房产税税额为：以房产原值一次性减除30%为计征余值，税率为1.2%。北京成为首个向非经营性房产征收物业税的地区。@钱江频道都市房产@任志强@潘石屹@侯宁@陈宝存@但斌
text: [Big news: Beijing has launched a property tax! 】The Beijing Local Taxation Bureau confirmed today that Beijing has begun to levy property tax on non-residential properties such as commercial office buildings and commercial real estate. The annual property tax amount is: a one-time deduction of 30% of the original value of the property. value, the tax rate is 1.2%. Beijing became the first region to levy property tax on non-operational properties. @千江Channel Urban Real Estate @仁志强 @ Pan Shiyi @ Hou Ning @陈宝盈 @ Dan Bin

chinese_text: 上海一位48年参加过奥运的老人吴成章很想去伦敦奥运。中国奥委说，多少大官要去都没轮到，你算老几？我一位师伯闻之，写了封航空信给国际奥委主席罗格。寄出的12天后，@英国驻华使馆 给吴老送去了直飞伦敦的公务舱机票，还安排了英国当年和他比赛的对手与老人聚会。
text: Wu Chengzhang, an old man in Shanghai who has participated in the Olympic Games for 48 years, really wants to go to the London Olympics. The Chinese Olympic Committee said that many high-ranking officials have not yet had their turn. Who do you think is the oldest? One of my uncles heard about it and wrote an airmail letter to International Olympic Committee Chairman Rogge. Twelve days after it was sent, the British Embassy in China sent Mr. Wu a direct business-class ticket to London, and also arranged a gathering for his British rivals and the old man.

text: British "Daily Mail": Secretary of State Hillary Clinton is dissatisfied with her husband Clinton's extensive private life. Her assistant recently disclosed her current corrupt life - from a wild sex life to asking male partners to take aphrodisiacs and use sexual enhancement. drug. The 29-year-old assistant, who has served Hillary for seven years, revealed in an interview with the British media: "She has sex with 4 to 5 men every day, and this has become a major hobby of hers."

text: [Sternly Protesting Rumors by the United Nations] Recently, the United Nations released the "Global Happiness Index Report" for the first time. Among the 156 countries surveyed, the Nordic countries Denmark, Finland, and Norway ranked in the top three and are considered the happiest countries in the world. 62% of our great road to rejuvenation has been completed. China ranks 112th. Let’s take a look at our ranked neighbors. Suddenly, I felt like a hairy monkey looking for food in the primeval forest; @叶塡正

chinese_text: 【新骗局请注意】如果你接到任何一个电话（包括10086或10010），说是在检查你的线路，并要求你按#键或其它任何按键，请不要按那些键并马上结束通话。那是一家诈骗公司，他们的机器能在你按下任意键后，连接到你的SIM卡并用你的话费打电话。(还可以窃听你的一切通话和短信，也就是复制卡)
text: [New scam, please note] If you receive any call (including 10086 or 10010) saying that it is checking your line and asking you to press the # key or any other key, please do not press those keys and end the call immediately. It's a scam company, their machine can connect to your SIM card and use your phone bill to make calls after you press any key. (You can also eavesdrop on all your calls and text messages, that is, copy the card)

chinese_text: 【看看人家的富二代】世界亿万富翁比尔盖茨的女儿，全身没有一个明显的名牌，没有开豪华跑车，没有拿奢侈品包包，没有艳丽的浓妆，只有明媚如清晨的朝阳，真正的淑女，从不炫耀自己拥有的一切！！！！！
text: [Look at the rich second generation] The daughter of the world's billionaire Bill Gates does not have an obvious brand name, does not drive a luxury sports car, does not carry luxury bags, does not wear gorgeous makeup, and is only as bright as the morning sun. , A real lady never shows off everything she has! ! ! ! !

chinese_text: #预警提示#【警惕新型“100860”短信诈骗】骗子们通过“100860”号码群发“您的账户余额少于10元，请适时充值以免停机，欢迎使用短信形式的手机账单服务（免费）！请回复短信号码”的信息。由于与移动客服“10086”只差一个0，很多人会按短信要求回复，结果话费被扣。请广大市民提高警惕，仔细甄别！
text: #Early Warning Tip# [Beware of the new "100860" SMS scam] Scammers send mass messages through the "100860" number, "Your account balance is less than 10 yuan, please recharge in time to avoid downtime. Welcome to use the mobile phone bill service in the form of SMS (free)! Please Reply SMS number" message. Since there is only one 0 difference from the mobile customer service "10086", many people will reply according to the text message request, and as a result, the phone bill will be deducted. The general public is requested to be vigilant and screen carefully!

chinese_text: 【连小s都关注的微博，你值得关注】聪明女人记住： 和别人交往，你要知道，你只是他的一个选择而非唯一，你也只能把他当成你的一个选择而非生命中的某个优先。不要轻易去依赖一个人，当分别来临，你失去的不是某个人，而是你精神的支柱。【一个让女人受益终生的微博@聪明女人养成术，怎么能少了你！】
text: [Weibo that even Xiao S follows, you deserve to follow it] Smart women remember: When dating others, you have to know that you are just a choice for him, not the only one, and you can only treat him as a choice for you, not the only one. A priority in life. Don't rely on someone easily. When separation comes, what you lose is not a person, but your spiritual support. [A Weibo that will benefit women for a lifetime @ Smart Woman Cultivation Technique, how can I miss you! 】

chinese_text: 经历了10年的风雨，终于，盛大时刻结束，盛大游戏，盛大在线打包出售，目前在与360洽谈中，早已散落在各处的盛大人轻声叹息后，唯余沉默。我们在盛大，或者在腾讯或者在巨人或者在其他地方有过辉煌，人依人，属已殊，再见了，记忆中的盛大。
text: After 10 years of ups and downs, Shanda's moment is finally over. Shanda Games and Shanda Online are being packaged and sold. Currently in negotiations with 360, Shanda people who have been scattered everywhere sigh softly and remain silent. We have had brilliance in Shanda, or in Tencent, or in Giant, or elsewhere. People depend on each other, but they belong to each other. Goodbye, Shanda in memory.

chinese_text: 【城管为了赶走路边卖小动物的小贩，把小贩的小动物全部活活踩死】因为小贩收摊慢了点，城管把小动物活活摔死，有小狗、小兔子、小乌龟和宠物鼠。小兔子被踩扁了，小狗的嘴里被踩出了鲜血，好多动物都摔成一团！！就算你要管理，但是也请你们珍惜生命。
text: [In order to drive away the vendors who were selling small animals on the street, the urban management staff trampled all the vendors’ small animals to death] Because the vendors were slow to close their stalls, the urban management staff crushed the small animals to death, including puppies, rabbits, turtles, and pet rats. . The little rabbit was crushed, the puppy's mouth was trampled with blood, and many animals fell into a ball! ! Even if you have to manage, please cherish your life.

chinese_text: 【佛山交通严整】8月23日开始， 高清探头全启，副驾不系安全带同罪，开车打电话罚50，闯黄闪罚200，为期60天，全国交警集中查酒驾，一经查获，一律拘六月，五年不得考证。 每月10、20、30日由省厅带队检查，每月3、7、13、17、23日和每周五、六由市局组织检查，时间为中午 12点至下午2点，晚上7点至9点
text: [Foshan Traffic Control] Starting from August 23, the high-definition sensors will be fully turned on. The co-driver will be fined 50 RMB for talking on the phone while driving and 200 RMB for driving without wearing a seat belt. For a period of 60 days, traffic police across the country will focus on checking for drunk driving. Once caught, all persons will be arrested. In June, no examination will be allowed for five years. The provincial department will lead the inspection team on the 10th, 20th and 30th of each month, and the municipal bureau will organize inspections on the 3rd, 7th, 13th, 17th and 23rd of each month and every Friday and Saturday. The time is from 12 noon to 2 pm. In the evening 7 a.m. to 9 p.m.

chinese_text: 今天下午六点开始，高清探头全部启动，副驾驶室不系安全带相同处罚，开车时打电话罚款50元，闯黄闪罚200，越线停车罚100，今天起晚六点半至深夜二点，为期60天，全国交警集中查处酒驾，一经查获，一律拘役六个月，五年内不得考证。专拍是否有带安全带！（实施区域包含但不限于泉州via@JameyC ）。
text: Starting from 6 o'clock this afternoon, all high-definition sensors will be activated. Not wearing a seat belt in the passenger compartment will be subject to the same penalties. You will be fined 50 yuan for talking on the phone while driving, 200 yuan for flashing yellow, and 100 yuan for parking over the line. From 6:30 p.m. to midnight today, For a period of 60 days, traffic police across the country will focus on investigating drunk driving. Once caught, they will be detained for six months and will not be allowed to test for five years. Specially shoot whether you are wearing a seat belt! (The implementation area includes but is not limited to Quanzhou via@JameyC).

chinese_text: 唱支国歌给党听： 孩子，妈去街上卖点山竹，挣完钱了给你买点肉吃，娘知道你一星期没吃到肉啦。”重庆一妇女对她孩子说。孩子开心回答：“好啊，中午我在家先洗菜淘米，等你回家来烧饭哦”想不到半路上遇到城管执法把她推下台阶成了永别！这名妇女卖水果辛苦拉扯3个孩子。
text: Sing the national anthem to the party: Son, Mommy goes to the street to sell some mangosteens, and after making money, I’ll buy you some meat to eat. Mom knows you haven’t eaten meat for a week. "A woman in Chongqing said to her child. The child happily replied: "Okay, I will wash the vegetables and wash the rice at home at noon, and wait for you to come home to cook." Unexpectedly, she encountered urban management and law enforcement on the way and pushed her down the steps and said goodbye forever. !This woman works hard to raise three children while selling fruit.

chinese_text: 【80吨国库黄金下落不明】香港《动向》：财政部、央行、监察部和审计署已经成立专案组，调查存放在八个省市国库内的黄金储备有八十吨下落不明。若属实，相关官员肯定有合伙盗窃的重大嫌疑。战乱时期，蒋介石把450万两黄金运往台湾都没弄丢一两，国库的80吨黄金为什么会不翼而飞？http://t.cn/zWRbr1N
text: [The whereabouts of 80 tons of gold from the national treasury are unknown] Hong Kong "Trends": The Ministry of Finance, the Central Bank, the Ministry of Supervision and the Audit Office have set up a task force to investigate the whereabouts of 80 tons of gold reserves stored in the treasury of eight provinces and cities. If true, the relevant officials must be seriously suspected of collaborating in theft. During the war, Chiang Kai-shek shipped 4.5 million taels of gold to Taiwan without losing even one tael. Why did the 80 tons of gold from the national treasury disappear? http://t.cn/zWRbr1N

chinese_text: #最新闻#【80吨国库黄金下落不明 】香港《动向》报道：财政部、央行、监察部和审计署已经成立专案组，调查存放在八个省市国库内的黄金储备有八十吨下落不明。列作调查的有山东济南三号黄金库、江西南昌五号黄金库、福建三明七号黄金库。http://t.cn/zWRld3n
text: #mostnews# [The whereabouts of 80 tons of gold from the national treasury are unknown] Hong Kong's "Dongxiang" reported: The Ministry of Finance, the Central Bank, the Ministry of Supervision and the Audit Office have set up a task force to investigate the whereabouts of 80 tons of gold reserves stored in the treasury of eight provinces and cities. unknown. Listed for investigation are the No. 3 gold vault in Jinan, Shandong, the No. 5 gold vault in Nanchang, Jiangxi, and the No. 7 gold vault in Sanming, Fujian. http://t.cn/zWRld3n

chinese_text: 【中国80吨国库黄金下落不明】香港《动向》：财政部、央行、监察部和审计署已经成立专案组，调查存放在八个省市国库内的黄金储备有八十吨下落不明。如果属实，一定是官员合伙盗窃。战乱时期，蒋介石历时半年把450万两黄金运往台湾都没丢一两。现在国库黄金不翼而飞？ http://t.cn/zWRbr1N 凤凰东方传媒
text: [The whereabouts of 80 tons of gold in China’s national treasury are unknown] Hong Kong’s “Trends”: The Ministry of Finance, the Central Bank, the Ministry of Supervision and the Audit Office have set up a task force to investigate the whereabouts of 80 tons of gold reserves stored in the treasury of eight provinces and cities. If true, the theft must have been a collaboration between officials. During the war, Chiang Kai-shek spent half a year transporting 4.5 million taels of gold to Taiwan without losing a single tael. Now the gold from the treasury is missing? http://t.cn/zWRbr1N Phoenix Oriental Media

chinese_text: 查地沟油的记者李翔，身中10余刀，惨死。他为不能吃特供的十多亿人民的食品安全付出了年轻的生命。我们能为他做的就是：动一下鼠标，转发，表达一下谢意。把油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，就是地沟油:炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜子，蒜子对于黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜子变红色，就是地沟油。
text: Li Xiang, a reporter who investigated waste oil, was stabbed more than 10 times and died tragically. He sacrificed his young life for the food safety of more than one billion people who cannot eat special food. What we can do for him is: move the mouse, forward it, and express our gratitude. Put the oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil: put a peeled garlic when cooking. Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it’s gutter oil.

text: The 70-year-old man makes a living by selling the vegetables he grows. A young man got out of the law enforcement vehicle and slapped the old man several times and pushed him to the ground. The old man was looking for the law enforcer everywhere, and just wanted to tell him that it took me more than 3 hours to get here by riding a bad bicycle from the mountains. I just wanted to sell some money to buy medicine for my wife who was sick in bed. [Anger]. If you have a conscience, help me repost it. It won’t dirty your Weibo account, right? If you have a heart, just change it, if you don’t have a heart, forget it!

chinese_text: ：【严正抗议联合国造谣】近日，联合国首次公布《全球幸福指数报告》，在被调查的156个国家中，北欧国家丹麦、芬兰、挪威分列前三，被认为是世界上最幸福的国家。我们伟大的复兴之路已走了62%的中国排名112位。再看看我们排名的左邻右舍。顿时，我感觉自己像一只长满毛的猴子在原始森林里觅食
text: : [Sternly protesting against the United Nations for spreading rumors] Recently, the United Nations released the "Global Happiness Index Report" for the first time. Among the 156 countries surveyed, the Nordic countries Denmark, Finland, and Norway ranked in the top three and are considered the happiest countries in the world. 62% of our great road to rejuvenation has been completed. China ranks 112th. Let’s take a look at our ranked neighbors. Suddenly, I felt like a hairy monkey foraging for food in the primeval forest.

chinese_text: [话筒] 【人民检察官，你算是人吗？】 三岁半的小奥林被三条大狼狗咬得遍体鳞伤，昏迷4天4夜,抢救13天,已经花了15万,接下来几次手术,医生说最低还需要30万以上,狗主人>浙江诸暨人民检察官拒绝拿钱治疗，并威胁我不要在绍兴和诸暨打官司，要打官司到北京打！没人性，请转发扩散！让邪恶势力无所遁形！
text: [Microphone] [People's Prosecutor, are you considered a human being? 】 Three-and-a-half-year-old little Olin was bitten all over by three big wolfdogs. He was in a coma for 4 days and 4 nights. He was rescued for 13 days and cost 150,000 yuan. For the next few operations, the doctor said that at least 300,000 yuan will be needed. Dog owner> The People's Prosecutor of Zhuji, Zhejiang Province refused to pay for treatment and threatened me not to file a lawsuit in Shaoxing or Zhuji, but to bring the lawsuit to Beijing! It’s inhumane, please repost and spread it! Let the evil forces have no escape!

chinese_text: 【哈尔滨垮塌大桥施工方称填充泡沫系正常做法】在垮塌的桥梁体内，充塞着鹅卵石、木棍和编织袋的混合物，钢筋是铺在箱梁内的，并没有看到捆扎的情形。对此，该桥施工方福建交建集团称，所谓“编织袋”应指无纺布，在桥梁伸缩缝中用无纺布和泡沫等是正常做法，对“建筑质量有信心”。艹，一起说脏话吧！
text: [The builder of the collapsed Harbin Bridge said that foam filling was a normal practice] The collapsed bridge was filled with a mixture of cobblestones, wooden sticks and woven bags. The steel bars were laid inside the box beams, and no bundling was seen. In this regard, Fujian Communications Construction Group, the construction company of the bridge, said that the so-called "woven bags" should refer to non-woven fabrics. It is normal practice to use non-woven fabrics and foams in bridge expansion joints and that it has "confidence in the quality of the construction." Fuck, let’s talk dirty together!

chinese_text: #三星赔了苹果100W，不过都是5美分的硬币…30卡车…#今天上午30辆装满5美分硬币的的卡车停在了加利福尼亚州的苹果公司的总部。最初，公司的安保部门以为是转移错了地方，但是在数分钟之后，蒂姆·库克收到一个来自三星CEO的电话，电话中解释道这就是他们将要支付给美国苹果公司的10亿美元的罚款。
text: #Samsung lost 1 million to Apple, but they were all 5-cent coins...30 trucks...# This morning, 30 trucks filled with 5-cent coins were parked at Apple's headquarters in California. At first, the company's security department thought it was moved to the wrong place, but a few minutes later, Tim Cook received a call from Samsung's CEO, who explained that this was the $1 billion they were going to pay to Apple in the United States. fine.

chinese_text: 昨晚起六点半至深夜二点，为期60天，全国交警集中查处酒驾，一经查获，一律拘役六个月，五年内不得考证。每月10、20、30日由省厅带队检查，每月3、7、13、17、23日和每周五、六由市局组织检查，时间为中午12点至下午2点，晚上7点至9点，从今天起陆续启用高清摄像，专拍前排驾乘人员安全带是否系扣。转
text: From 6:30 last night to 2 o'clock in the evening, for a period of 60 days, traffic police across the country will focus on investigating drunk driving. Once caught, they will be detained for six months and will not be allowed to test for five years. The provincial department will lead the inspection team on the 10th, 20th and 30th of each month, and the municipal bureau will organize inspections on the 3rd, 7th, 13th, 17th and 23rd of each month and every Friday and Saturday. The time is from 12 noon to 2 pm. In the evening From 7 a.m. to 9 a.m., high-definition cameras will be activated starting today to take pictures of whether the front-row drivers and passengers are buckling their seat belts. change

chinese_text: 【三星赔30卡车的硬币 苹果你慢慢数去吧】今天上午30辆装满5美分硬币的卡车停在了加利福尼亚州苹果公司的总部。最初，公司的安保部门以为是转移错了地方，但是在数分钟之后，蒂姆·库克收到一个来自三星CEO的电话，电话中解释道这就是他们将要支付给美国苹果公司的10亿美元的罚款。
text: [Samsung compensates Apple with 30 truckloads of coins, count them slowly] This morning, 30 trucks filled with 5-cent coins were parked at Apple's headquarters in California. At first, the company's security department thought it was moved to the wrong place, but a few minutes later, Tim Cook received a call from Samsung's CEO, who explained that this was the $1 billion they were going to pay to Apple in the United States. fine.

chinese_text: 由杨澜承认自己是美国人想到的是，我们这个国家真是包容性很强的国家，人民是最包容的人民，我们国家最高议事机构竟然有一大半的外国人指指点点决定着这个国家应该怎样。就此我也终于理解了北京精神中的“包容”的真正含义了。因为我从来没有在北京的实际城市生活中看到一点包容的影子。
text: What comes to mind when Yang Lan admits that she is an American is that our country is really a very tolerant country, and its people are the most tolerant people. Our country's highest deliberative body actually has more than half of foreigners pointing fingers and deciding what this country should be like. At this point, I finally understood the true meaning of “tolerance” in the Beijing spirit. Because I have never seen a trace of tolerance in actual urban life in Beijing.

text: [Aspirin] If you have a heart attack while sleeping, the severe chest pain is enough to wake you up from a deep sleep. Take two aspirin in your mouth, chew them up and swallow them. The cardiologist emphasized that if everyone who sees this Weibo forwards 10 copies to others, at least one life will definitely be saved. Please spread the word! And follow @ creative new horizons

text: [[Tears] I was moved to tears by a Korean today] South Korean President Lee Myung-bak apologized to the people for the sexual assault of a 7-year-old girl. The regions in China where major cases of official sexual assault of young girls have occurred: Zhejiang Lishui, Zhejiang Yongkang, Henan Zhenping, Henan Yongcheng, Shaanxi Lueyang, Guizhou Xishui, Fujian Anxi, Fujian Xiapu, Sichuan Yibin, Gansu Chengxian, Liaoning Yingkou Dashiqiao... No one apologized, but there was a strange incident in which the person who sexually assaulted a young girl was fine, and the mother of the child was sent to a labor camp.

chinese_text: 【怎么鉴定地沟油】炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头(蒜子)，蒜子对黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜子变红色就是地沟油，含有大量黄曲霉素。把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，那就是地沟油。转给身边滴朋友吧！关注@史上第一震惊 [转发] 震惊你……震惊你……
text: [How to identify gutter oil] When cooking, put a peeled head of garlic (garlic). Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Forward it to your friends! Follow @ the first shock in history [Repost] Shock you...Shock you...

chinese_text: 马兆麟1915年2月生于甘肃省靖远陡城，黄埔军校第六期学生。1936年 黄埔军校毕业，分到96军177师1058团，先后担任2营排长、连长、营长。1941年 任1058团团长，在中条山战役中被任命为84师师长、17军代军长。至今 一直生活在甘肃农村，捡破烂为生，生活十分凄惨。
text: Ma Zhaolin was born in Doucheng, Jingyuan, Gansu Province in February 1915. He was a student of the sixth batch of Huangpu Military Academy. After graduating from Huangpu Military Academy in 1936, he was assigned to the 1058th Regiment of the 177th Division of the 96th Army, and served successively as the platoon commander, company commander, and battalion commander of the 2nd Battalion. In 1941, he served as the commander of the 1058th Regiment. During the Battle of Zhongtiao Mountain, he was appointed as the commander of the 84th Division and the acting commander of the 17th Army. Until now, I have been living in rural Gansu, making a living by picking up rags. My life is very miserable.

chinese_text: 矢野浩二回国后真被本族人打了？ 浩二是我尊敬的为数不多的日本人 那次天天向上直播谈到日本侵华战争的时候 浩二没有说话 而是跪下来给观众道歉 那次之后 我就对浩二有了崇敬之意 据说浩二被打住院后日本右翼分子仍不肯放过浩二 还扬言要蹂躏他女朋友 但是浩二却高声叫道：没人能阻止我爱中国。
text: Was Yano Koji really beaten by his own people after returning to Japan? Koji is one of the few Japanese people I respect. When the Tiantianxiang live broadcast talked about Japan's war of aggression against China, Koji did not speak but knelt down and apologized to the audience. After that time, I started to respect Koji. It is said that Koji was beaten. After being hospitalized, Japanese right-wingers still refused to let Koji go and threatened to ravage his girlfriend. But Koji shouted loudly: No one can stop me from loving China.

A netizen uploaded a photo of a transfer check on Weibo. The evidence is clear. However, the person who uploaded the photo of the transfer check was a girl from the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China. Now he is fired from the bank.

chinese_text: 杨澜昨天终于承认了自己的美国籍身份。她理直气壮地说：“虽然我入了美国籍，但我出身于中国，所以从原产地角度而言，我不出席美国的两会而出席中国的两会，而且还回答得“理直气壮”，也终于使我们亿万网民松了一口气，毕竟这么多天卖力的“深度挖掘”有了结果。@聚贤德之淋@叶匡政@薛蛮子@刘春
text: Yang Lan finally recognized her American citizenship yesterday. She said confidently: "Although I am an American citizen, I was born in China, so from the perspective of my place of origin, I did not attend the two sessions in the United States but attended the two sessions in China. I also answered "justly and confidently", which finally made it possible." We hundreds of millions of netizens breathed a sigh of relief. After all, the "deep digging" that we have worked so hard for so many days has come to fruition.@ Juxian Dezhilin@叶塡正 @雪素子 @六春

text: [Attention drivers] Starting from 6pm yesterday, all high-definition sensors in Wuhan City were activated. Not wearing a seat belt in the passenger compartment will lead to the same penalty. You will be fined 50 yuan for talking on the phone while driving, 200 yuan for flashing yellow, and 100 yuan for parking over the line. Starting today, From 6:30 p.m. to 2:00 p.m. for a period of 60 days, traffic police across the country will focus on investigating drunk driving. Once caught, they will be detained for six months and will not be allowed to test for five years. Tell each other to relatives and friends and notify colleagues to avoid being punished! (via@乐里街)

chinese_text: 【 解体后你不知道的俄罗斯 】1、全民免费医疗，治病不需要任何费用。2、俄罗斯联邦实现了学龄前，基础和中等职业教育的强制性和完全免费，并提供免费午餐。3、在俄罗斯女55岁，男60岁就可以领取养老金，不管你有没有为国家工作过。4、住房虽然私有化了,但物业管理、房屋修缮、水、电，仍由国家承担。
text: [What you don’t know about Russia after its disintegration] 1. Free medical care for all, and there is no cost for treatment. 2. The Russian Federation has made preschool, basic and secondary vocational education compulsory and completely free, and provides free lunches. 3. In Russia, women can receive pensions at the age of 55 and men at the age of 60, regardless of whether you have worked for the country or not. 4. Although housing has been privatized, property management, house repairs, water, and electricity are still borne by the state.

chinese_text: 【Wi-Fi杀精于无形 精子DNA受损严重】科学研究：从健康男子收集精液样本，把其放在接收Wi-Fi上网的计算机旁4小时后发现，精液竟然「熟」了 部分更出现DNA受损的情况。无线上网期间散发的电磁辐射正是「杀精」的元凶！ 男士们注意了…珍爱生命，远离Wi-Fi！(关注@学点电脑知识 让你快速成为电脑高手)
text: [Wi-Fi spermicide causes serious damage to invisible sperm DNA] Scientific research: Collect semen samples from healthy men and place them next to a computer that receives Wi-Fi access. After 4 hours, it was found that the semen was "ripe" and some parts appeared. Damage to DNA. The electromagnetic radiation emitted during wireless Internet access is the culprit of "spermicide"! Attention gentlemen... cherish your life and stay away from Wi-Fi! (Follow @learn some computer knowledge and you will quickly become a computer master)

chinese_text: 【震惊 北大学生强奸母猪？】江苏籍北大学生小马爆料：前段时间跟同学张某回老家安徽游玩，结果张某居然让他用手机拍自己强奸母猪，张某一边对圈里的母猪实施奸淫，一边让他帮忙拍下照片作纪念。待张某发泄完毕，还要拉他也来试试。微评：国内最高学府竟有如此学生，到底扇了谁的脸？by：木尔
text: [Shocked that Peking University students raped sows? 】Xiao Ma, a student from Peking University in Jiangsu Province, broke the news: Some time ago, he went back to his hometown of Anhui with his classmate Zhang, but Zhang actually asked him to use his mobile phone to film himself raping a sow. Zhang raped the sow in the pen and asked him to help film it. Take the photo as a souvenir. After Zhang finished venting, he was asked to try too. Micro-comment: There is such a student at the highest university in the country. Who is being slapped in the face? by：Muer

chinese_text: 【喝易拉罐一定要吸管[话筒]】一妇女喝了罐饮料，被送进医院，离开了世界。验尸死于於细螺旋体病，追踪她喝的饮料，是直接用罐对嘴饮用。实验证明罐头受到鼠尿感染细螺旋体病毒。鼠尿含有毒性和致命物质。运输过程没有清洗的····研究显示罐上面的毒菌很多！！这些你知道么？
text: [You must have a straw when drinking from a can [microphone]] A woman drank a can of soft drink, was sent to the hospital, and passed away. The autopsy revealed that she died of leptospirosis, and the drink she drank was traced to drinking directly from the can to her mouth. Experiments have shown that canned food is infected with Leptospira virus in rat urine. Rat urine contains toxic and lethal substances. It was not cleaned during transportation... Research shows that there are many poisonous bacteria on the can! ! Do you know this?

chinese_text: 美国高二的数学...请用一句话概况你的感受！
text: Mathematics for high school students in the United States...please summarize your feelings in one sentence!

chinese_text: 求证：【中国红会——你凭什么购买这么多路虎】一种无耻可以肆无忌惮！一种诈骗可以正大光明！一种抢劫可以毫无顾忌！一种挥霍可以明目张胆！一种贪污可以合情合理！——最后，一种法律对它视而不见！一个国家的慈善机构，贪婪到连慈善捐款都不放过，你们真是穷凶恶极了吧！企鹅的刀手们，我们来比赛。
text: Verification: [China Red Cross - Why did you buy so many Land Rovers] A kind of shamelessness can be unscrupulous! A scam can be fair and square! A kind of robbery can be done without any scruples! A splurge can be blatant! A kind of corruption can be justified! —Finally, a law that turns a blind eye to it! A country's charity organization is so greedy that it doesn't even let go of charitable donations. You guys are really vicious! Penguin swordsmen, let's compete.

chinese_text: 【19000亿•中国官员行政开支】全国人大常委会办公厅特约研究员王锡锌在《新闻1+1》节目透露：我国公款吃喝、公费出国、公车开支一年19000亿。王提供的数字，让主持人柴静很吃惊，重复问：您再说一遍，是多少？王再次肯定地说：公款接待、公费出国考察、公车，一年19000亿，占行政开支的60% @念起向善
text: [1.9 trillion • Administrative expenses of Chinese officials] Wang Xizhen, a special researcher at the General Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, revealed on the "News 1+1" program: my country's public expenditure on food and drink, public travel abroad, and public transportation is 1.9 trillion a year. The number provided by Wang surprised the host Chai Jing and asked repeatedly: "Tell me again, how much is it?" Wang once again affirmed: public-funded receptions, public-funded overseas inspections, and official buses cost 1.9 trillion yuan a year, accounting for 60% of administrative expenses.

chinese_text: “换个国家，这件事大概能拉下一个总统，解散一个内阁，催生一个制度。在天朝，只能换得几人围观，几声叹息。 今下午1点多，宁波妇幼医院一妇女因负担不起医治孩子的高昂医药费，怀抱仅4个月大的宝宝在住院楼跳楼自杀，经抢救无效死亡。——全民医保，何时来到？”
text: "In any other country, this incident would probably bring down a president, dissolve a cabinet, and give birth to a new system. In China, it would only get a few people watching and a few sighs. At around 1 o'clock this afternoon, a woman from Ningbo Maternity and Children's Hospital died because of her burden. Unable to afford the high medical expenses to treat the child, the 4-month-old baby committed suicide by jumping off the building in his arms. After resuscitation failed, he died. - When will universal health insurance come?"

chinese_text: 【湾仔码头水饺吃出饰品珠子】网友@minami_e 爆料:女儿在@湾仔码头WanChaiFerry 的水饺里竟然吃出了2颗饰品珠子，承诺产品质量安全的湾仔码头，安全何在！难道我们有幸吃到了戴耳环的时髦猪！真是三生有幸啊[衰]这哪儿是湾仔码头，分明是湾仔河蚌水饺。
text: [Wan Chai Pier dumplings ate jewelry beads] Netizen @minami_e broke the news: My daughter actually ate 2 jewelry beads out of the dumplings at @wanchai wharf WanChaiFerry. Wan Chai Pier promises product quality and safety, so where is the safety? Were we lucky enough to eat a fashionable pig with earrings! I'm so lucky. [Short] This is not Wan Chai Pier, it's clearly Wan Chai clam dumplings.

chinese_text: 特大好消息：继北京出台95岁老人看病不要钱后，山东泰安宣布100岁可免费登泰山，初步预估：接下来应该有城市跟进宣布110岁放宽生3胎政策，120岁老人可分配住房，130岁可取消一夫一妻限制！希望大家注意保重身体，好日子在后头呢。大家努力活过100岁！via：南都
text: Great news: After Beijing announced that 95-year-olds will receive free medical treatment, Shandong Tai'an announced that 100-year-olds can climb Mount Tai for free. Preliminary estimates: There should be cities following up and announcing that 110-year-olds will relax the policy of having three children, and 120-year-olds can allocate Housing, monogamy restrictions can be lifted at the age of 130! I hope everyone will take care of themselves and good days are ahead. Everyone strives to live to be 100 years old! via: Nandu
