chinese_text: 换个国家，这件事大概能拉下一个总统，解散一个内阁，催生一个制度。在天朝，只能换得几人围观，几声叹息。 今下午1点多，宁波妇幼医院一妇女因负担不起医治孩子的高昂医药费，怀抱仅4个月大的宝宝在住院楼跳楼自杀，经抢救无效死亡。——全民医保，何时来到？
text: In another country, this incident could probably bring down a president, dissolve a cabinet, and give birth to a new system. In the Celestial Dynasty, you can only get a few people to watch and a few sighs. At around 1 o'clock this afternoon, a woman from Ningbo Maternity and Children's Hospital committed suicide by jumping off the building with her 4-month-old baby in her arms because she could not afford the high medical expenses to treat her child. However, rescue efforts failed and she died. ——When will universal health insurance come?

chinese_text: 【豆腐能卖肉价钱】今日资兴市交警大队几协警未开单据就扣走一台价只千元的旧摩托，赎车时粗算罚款保险得花二千来块钱。纳闷，豆腐岂能卖肉价？后发现交警队内有个卖旧车的小店，恍然大悟！原来你不赎它就卖。祝陈江警官，生意兴隆、财源广进！@御史在途 @郴州市交通警察支队
text: [Tofu can be sold for the price of meat] Today, several police officers from the Zixing City Traffic Police Brigade took away an old motorcycle worth only 1,000 yuan without issuing a receipt. When redeeming the car, it was estimated that the fine and insurance would cost about 2,000 yuan. I wonder, how can tofu be sold at the same price as meat? Later, I discovered that there was a small shop selling used cars in the traffic police team, and it suddenly dawned on me! It turns out that if you don’t redeem it, sell it. I wish Officer Chen Jiang a prosperous business and abundant financial resources! @皇史在路@陈州市 traffic police detachment

chinese_text: 【交通新规】2013年1月1日施行:1闯红灯，记6分，罚100元。2酒驾，5年内不得再考取驾照。3不系安全带，记3分，罚100元。4副驾不系安全带，记1分，罚50元。5行驶中拨打手机，记3分，罚100元。6行驶中抽烟，记1分，罚100元。7有意遮挡号牌，记12分，顶额处罚。8超速驾驶，记6分。
text: [New Traffic Regulations] Effective on January 1, 2013: 1. Running a red light will result in 6 points and a fine of 100 yuan. 2. If you drive under the influence, you will not be allowed to obtain a driver's license again within 5 years. 3. Failure to wear a seat belt will result in 3 points and a fine of 100 yuan. 4. If the passenger does not wear a seat belt, he will be deducted 1 point and fined 50 yuan. 5. If you make a phone call while driving, you will be deducted 3 points and fined 100 yuan. 6. Smoking while driving will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan. 7. Intentionally blocking the number plate will result in 12 points and the maximum penalty. 8. Speeding will result in 6 points.

chinese_text: 【美国务卿希拉里的不正当私生活】英国《每日邮报》报道称,国务卿希拉里因不满老公克林顿私生活泛滥，其助手近日披露了她目前的糜烂生活——与多名男性发生或保持不正当性关系，从狂野的性生活到对要求男性性伴侣服用春 药、使用增强性功能等药物，让人大跌眼镜。 http://t.cn/zlTIUN5
text: [US Secretary of State Hillary’s Improper Private Life] The British Daily Mail reported that Secretary of State Hillary Clinton was dissatisfied with her husband Clinton’s extensive private life, and her assistants recently disclosed her current corrupt life—having or maintaining inappropriate relationships with multiple men Proper sexual relations, from wild sex life to requiring male partners to take aphrodisiacs, use drugs to enhance sexual function, are shocking. http://t.cn/zlTIUN5

chinese_text: 钓，鱼，岛 事件谈判再次失败！今日凌晨，我国去年赠送日本的大熊猫兴兴被麻醉取精后暴死！[熊猫][熊猫]如果你看到此条新闻你愤怒了！请转发起来！让更多人知道日本“人”的恶行！竟然残忍地拿世界上最珍贵的动物之一,国家一级保护动物熊猫下手做实验！日 本“人”是不是人？是不是？ [怒][怒][弱]
text: Negotiations on the fishing, fishing, and island incident failed again! In the early hours of this morning, the giant panda Xingxing, a gift from my country to Japan last year, died violently after being anesthetized and semen extracted! [Panda][Panda] If you see this news you are angry! Please forward it! Let more people know about the evil deeds of Japanese "people"! They even cruelly experimented on one of the most precious animals in the world, the panda, a national first-level protected animal! Are Japanese "people" human beings? Yes or no? chinese_text: “孩子，妈去街上卖点山竹，挣完钱了给你买点肉吃。”重庆一妇女对她孩子说。孩子开心回答：“好啊，中午我在家淘米，等你回家来烧饭哦”——想不到半路上遇到城管执法把她推下台阶成了永别！旁边的小贩说，这名妇女卖水果辛苦拉扯3个孩子。如果你看到此图愤怒了，请团结起来，替妇女夺回公道!!!
text: "Son, mommy goes to the street to sell some mangosteens, and after making money, I'll buy you some meat to eat." A woman in Chongqing said to her child. The child happily replied: "Okay, I will wash rice at home at noon, and wait for you to come home to cook." Unexpectedly, the city management and law enforcement officers pushed her down the steps and said goodbye forever! The vendor next to her said that this woman had to work hard to raise three children while selling fruits. If you are angry when you see this picture, please unite and get justice for women!!!

chinese_text: MZ-劳苦大众: 图片女孩叫刘爱玲，她家被政府强拆，父亲因此上访而被打残关进黑监狱！最后她不得已上陕西省上访，在。上访路上竟被政府抓回来永寿县，最后被陕西省永寿县司法局长杨志斌和手下轮强奸，她感到痛苦绝望而最后跳楼自杀。她人死了，难道正义的呼声也随她而去？不！正义转发！
text: MZ-Working people: The girl in the picture is Liu Ailing. Her home was forcibly demolished by the government, and her father was beaten and imprisoned in a black jail because of her petition! Finally, she had no choice but to go to Shaanxi Province to appeal. On the way to appeal, she was arrested by the government and brought back to Yongshou County. She was raped by Yang Zhibin, the judicial director of Yongshou County, Shaanxi Province, and his subordinates. She felt so miserable and desperate that she committed suicide by jumping off a building. If she dies, will the call for justice also die with her? No! Justice forward!

chinese_text: 图片女孩叫刘爱玲，她家被政府强拆，父亲因此上访而被打残关进黑监狱！最后她不得已上陕西省上访，在。上访路上竟被政府抓回来永寿县，最后被陕西省永寿县司法局长杨志斌和手下轮强奸，她感到痛苦绝望而最后跳楼自杀。她人死了，难道正义的呼声也随她而去？不！正义转发！
text: The girl in the picture is Liu Ailing. Her home was forcibly demolished by the government, and her father was beaten and imprisoned in a black jail because of her appeal! Finally, she had no choice but to go to Shaanxi Province to appeal. On the way to appeal, she was arrested by the government and brought back to Yongshou County. She was raped by Yang Zhibin, the judicial director of Yongshou County, Shaanxi Province, and his subordinates. She felt so miserable and desperate that she committed suicide by jumping off a building. If she dies, will the call for justice also die with her? No! Justice forward!

chinese_text: 【驾驶证新规】2013年1月1日起：1.闯红灯，记6分，罚100元。2.酒驾，5年内不得再考取驾照。3.不系安全带，记3分，罚100元。4.副驾不系安全带，记1分，罚50元。5.行驶途中拨打手机，记3分，罚100元。6.行驶途中抽烟，记1分，罚100元。7.有意遮挡号牌，记12分，顶额处罚。8.超速驾驶，记6分。 (via搜狐）
text: [New Driver's License Regulations] Effective from January 1, 2013: 1. Running a red light will result in 6 points and a fine of 100 yuan. 2. If you drive under the influence, you will not be allowed to obtain a driver's license again within 5 years. 3. Failure to wear a seat belt will result in 3 points and a fine of 100 yuan. 4. If the passenger does not wear a seat belt, he will be deducted 1 point and fined 50 yuan. 5. If you make a phone call while driving, you will be deducted 3 points and fined 100 yuan. 6. Smoking while driving will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan. 7. Intentionally blocking the number plate will result in 12 points and a maximum penalty. 8. Speeding will result in 6 points. (via Sohu)

chinese_text: 【除了双膝跪倒，普通中国人还能怎么办？】——为了保住学校，学生家长已经坚持了四天——浙江省缙云县大洋镇中心学校，被纳入“撤并”对象，五六百初中生适龄学童，需走六七十里路求学 。记者采访车刚开到现场,村民就跪倒一片——大洋村村民已经坚持四天了。多转发一次就多份希望 @徐昕@袁裕来律师
text: [In addition to kneeling down, what else can ordinary Chinese people do? 】——In order to keep the school, the parents of the students have been insisting for four days—The Central School of Dayang Town, Jinyun County, Zhejiang Province, has been included in the "dissolution and annexation" target. Five to six hundred junior high school-age students have to travel 60 to 70 miles to study. As soon as the reporter's interview vehicle arrived at the scene, the villagers fell to their knees - the villagers of Dayang Village had been holding on for four days. The more you repost, the more hope you will get@Xu Xin@元宇来 lawyer

chinese_text: 看到二则消息：中国免除越南到期500亿美元贷款；侵占我9个海岛的菲律宾拒绝向中国偿还5亿美元铁路项目贷款。不知消息是否属实，恳请当局能够严厉追究责任人。——500亿美元相当于3000多亿人民币，实现全民免费医疗也不过1600亿人民币。建议对上千亿的外援，国家应立法全民公决。反对公决者，必是公敌！
text: I saw two pieces of news: China exempted Vietnam from a $50 billion loan that was due; the Philippines, which occupied nine of our islands, refused to repay China a $500 million railway project loan. I don’t know if the news is true, but I urge the authorities to severely investigate the person responsible. ——50 billion US dollars is equivalent to more than 300 billion yuan, and achieving universal free medical care only costs 160 billion yuan. It is suggested that the country should legislate a referendum on hundreds of billions of foreign aid. Those who oppose the referendum must be public enemies!

chinese_text: [围观]十万火急---请帮忙转下：一个重庆打工者，22岁，叫吴云飞，不知道在什么地方，请他速回重庆，直接到重庆鱼嘴人民医院。家中失火，父母双亡，妹妹伤势很严重，想见他最后一面。舅舅：15523263869[爱心传递]。这个不转对不起自己的良心 ,[心]重庆市綦江县古南街道百步梯社区党委罗东托[爱心传递]
text: [Onlookers] It's an emergency --- Please help me. Next: A migrant worker from Chongqing, 22 years old, named Wu Yunfei. I don't know where he is. Please return to Chongqing as soon as possible and go directly to Chongqing Yuzui People's Hospital. There was a fire at home, both parents died, and my sister was seriously injured. She wanted to see him one last time. Uncle: 15523263869 [pass on love]. I feel sorry for my own conscience if I don’t change this. [Heart] Luo Dongtuo, Party Committee Member of Baibuti Community, Gunan Street, Qijiang County, Chongqing City [passing on love]

chinese_text: 【怎么鉴定地沟油】炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头(蒜子)，蒜子对黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜子变红色就是地沟油，含有大量黄曲霉素。把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，那就是地沟油。请发出你的爱心，转给身边滴朋友吧！
text: [How to identify gutter oil] When cooking, put a peeled head of garlic (garlic). Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Please send out your love and pass it on to your friends around you!

chinese_text: @杜楠 爆料称：小姑娘被开除了，为正义付出代价 。谦谦女是余姚工商银行的员工，当她看到这张支票的时候，十分气愤，吃顿鲍鱼五万多!财政局怎么能这样糟蹋纳税人的钱呢?于是上传了这张支票，现在她已经被银行开除，她的微博也删除了全部内容，真为她担心
text: @DUnan broke the news: The little girl was fired and paid the price for justice. Qianqiannu is an employee of Yuyao Industrial and Commercial Bank of China. When she saw this check, she was very angry. A meal of abalone cost more than 50,000 yuan! How could the Finance Bureau waste taxpayers' money like this? So she uploaded this check, and now She has been fired from the bank and all the content on her Weibo has been deleted. I am really worried about her.

chinese_text: 神秘】他们有钱，有权，有势，有名，唯一没有的就是安全感。一本美国护照好比传说中的软猬甲，金钟罩铁布衫，给他们一种贴身的安全感，使他们游走于正邪善恶间时刀枪不入，辗转腾挪时毫发无伤。美国护照真是一部通往武林至尊宝座必修的神功秘籍呀。杨澜终于承认自己是美国国籍的人大代表了。
text: Mysterious] They are rich, powerful, powerful, and famous, but the only thing they don’t have is a sense of security. An American passport is like the legendary soft hedgehog armor with a golden bell over an iron shirt, giving them a sense of personal security, making them invulnerable when they wander between good and evil, and unscathed when they move around. The American Passport is really a magical secret book that must be learned to lead to the supreme throne of martial arts. Yang Lan finally admitted that she is an American National People's Congress representative.

If the passenger does not wear a seat belt, he will be deducted 1 point and fined 50 yuan. 5. If you make a phone call while driving, you will be deducted 3 points and fined 100 yuan. 6. Smoking while driving will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan. 7. Intentionally blocking the number plate will result in 12 points and the maximum penalty. 8. Speeding will result in 6 points. Spread it to everyone! "Guangzhou Daily"

chinese_text: 【怎么鉴定地沟油】炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头(蒜子)，蒜子对黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜子变红色就是地沟油，含有大量黄曲霉素。把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，那就是地沟油。请发出你的爱心，转给身边滴朋友吧！
text: [How to identify gutter oil] When cooking, put a peeled head of garlic (garlic). Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Please send out your love and pass it on to your friends around you!

text: # seeking the truth # [Jinghua reporter was beaten again during an interview] A female reporter was picked up like a chicken by a few burly men, and she even said it was to protect the safety of the reporter. A person in charge later asked to keep it private and asked for money to keep it secret. We chose to report without hesitation: We must not only safeguard the dignity of journalists, but also defend the sanctity of journalists’ right to interview @ 张立峰 @袁宇来 Lawyer @ He Bing @ Zuo Xiaozu Curse@杨金麟@张兴生@李春

chinese_text: 【银行卡忘拔被占取1.82万元 警方称取款人相当于捡钱不违法】李先生到南京某银行ATM存钱后卡忘取，被人取走18200元。报警后警察调取监控，取款者容貌清晰，但警方称其不违法，相当于捡到钱不归还，只是道德上要受到指责，民事纠纷无法立案（图为取款男） @袁裕来律师 @徐昕 @@烟台日报传媒集团
text: [Forgot to take out his bank card and 18,200 yuan was taken from him. The police said that the withdrawal was equivalent to picking up money and it is not illegal.] Mr. Li went to a bank ATM in Nanjing to deposit money and forgot to take out his card, and 18,200 yuan was taken away. After calling the police, the police obtained surveillance and found that the person who withdrew the money had a clear appearance. However, the police said that it was not illegal. It was equivalent to picking up the money and not returning it. However, it would be morally criticized and the civil dispute could not be filed (pictured is the man who withdrew the money) @元宇来 lawyer@雪昕@@Yantai Daily Media Group

chinese_text: 这是人民当家做主的社会吗？@求人证: 【活埋】活埋是战争时常用的手段。因为省力，速度也快。战争里的活埋，都是叫战俘自己挖坑，有时会先杀死俘虏再把他们推下去，但时间不够的时候，就直接把他们推进去以后盖土。现在有些钉子户，为了抗议拆迁，会把自己活埋，然后只露出头部。这是现代社会的悲哀。
text: Is this a society where the people are the masters of the country? @ seeking witness: [Buried alive] Buried alive is a common method used in war. Because it saves effort and is fast. When burying alive in war, prisoners of war were forced to dig their own pits. Sometimes they would kill the prisoners first and then push them down, but when there was not enough time, they would just push them in and cover them with soil. Nowadays, some nail households, in order to protest against demolition, will bury themselves alive and then expose only their heads. This is the tragedy of modern society.

chinese_text: 【维稳机制保怪胎】浙江师友通报，在台州黄岩区院 桥中学，初二某男本周因琐事纠纷，持刀将三个初三学生捅死，省 委宣传 部封锁媒体，不准报道，该中学有恃无恐，不但不疏导学生情绪，反而控制和威胁学生。请问宣传 部等，追问教育危机难道不比粉饰盛世门面继续唱赞歌更重要？掩盖真相就能维稳到底？
text: [Stability Maintenance Mechanism to Protect Freaks] Zhejiang teachers and friends reported that at Yuanqiao Middle School in Huangyan District, Taizhou, a boy in the second grade of junior high school stabbed three junior high school students to death with a knife this week due to a trivial dispute. The Propaganda Department of the Provincial Party Committee blocked the media and prohibited According to reports, the middle school was so arrogant that instead of calming students' emotions, it controlled and threatened them. I would like to ask the Propaganda Department and others, isn’t it more important to investigate the education crisis than to whitewash the facade of a prosperous era and continue to sing praises? Can you maintain stability by covering up the truth?

text: [Who gave the Chinese people a weekend holiday] Around 1994, at the most difficult moment of the Sino-US accession negotiations, the United States suddenly proposed to the Chinese side: Today, when the whole world implements weekend holidays, China must respect human rights, also give the Chinese people a weekend day, and This is one of the conditions for joining the WTO. Therefore, from May 1, 1995, my country began to implement a weekend working system. Who should we thank?

text: [New traffic regulations] Effective on January 1, 2013: ① Running a red light will result in a penalty of 6 points and a fine of 100 yuan. ②Drunk driving will not allow you to obtain a driver's license again within 5 years. ③ Failure to wear a seat belt will result in 3 points and a fine of 100 yuan. ④ If the passenger does not wear a seat belt, he will be deducted 1 point and fined 50 yuan. ⑤ If you make a phone call while driving, you will be deducted 3 points and fined 100 yuan. ⑥ If you smoke while driving, you will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan. ⑦ Intentionally blocking the number plate will result in a maximum penalty of 12 points. ⑧Speed driving will result in 6 points! !

chinese_text: 【人间惨剧】不能忘却的历史：1984年12月3日晨，印度博帕尔市的联合碳化物有限公司一P~X项目发生氰化物泄漏，覆盖方圆60公里。2.5万人直接致死，55万人间接致死，另外有20多万人永久残废的人间惨剧。现在，当地居民仍然要忍受癌症及胎儿畸形的折磨。@宁波发布
text: [Human tragedy] History that cannot be forgotten: On the morning of December 3, 1984, a cyanide leak occurred in the P~X project of Union Carbide Co., Ltd. in Bhopal, India, covering a radius of 60 kilometers. It was a human tragedy that caused 25,000 direct deaths, 550,000 indirect deaths, and more than 200,000 people who were permanently disabled. Today, local residents still suffer from cancer and fetal malformations. @宁波release

chinese_text: @中原焦点:【广东佛山一在建16层楼盘发生坍塌，太恐怖了】广东佛山，已经建到16层了，一起是八栋。哥在另一个楼顶，眼睁睁的看着整栋楼倒下去，吓死哥了啊！太可怕，现在现场已经封锁，公安，防暴的来了十几车
text: @中元focus: [A 16-story building under construction in Foshan, Guangdong collapsed, it was so scary] Foshan, Guangdong, has been built to 16 floors, with eight buildings together. I was on the top of another building and watched the whole building fall. I was scared to death! It's so scary. The scene has been cordoned off, and more than a dozen vehicles of police and riot control personnel have arrived.

It was a human tragedy that caused 25,000 direct deaths, 550,000 indirect deaths, and more than 200,000 people who were permanently disabled. Today, local residents still suffer from cancer and fetal malformations. @宁波published

chinese_text: 朝鲜日报最新披露中日军力对比称：日本空军自卫队飞行员每周平均飞行训练为168小时，这一训练时间是中国空军的4倍。日本虽然没有核武器，但是拥有先进的核技术，一旦发生战争组装一枚核武器的时间只需要4小时，而中国导弹从内地发射打到日本本土需要4周时间。差距明显，这就是中国只敢抗议的根本原因。
text: Chosun Ilbo’s latest disclosure of the military strength comparison between China and Japan states that Japan’s Air Self-Defense Force pilots receive an average of 168 hours of flight training per week, which is four times that of the Chinese Air Force. Although Japan does not have nuclear weapons, it does possess advanced nuclear technology. In the event of a war, it only takes four hours to assemble a nuclear weapon, while it takes four weeks for Chinese missiles to be launched from the mainland and hit the Japanese mainland. The gap is obvious, which is the fundamental reason why China only dares to protest.

chinese_text: 【虐童幼师疑似微博骂网友】颜艳红：我已经反省完了，公安局也让我交5000元罚款姐都交完了，没姐什么事了，你们这些没素质的人就爱骂骂吧，洗澡睡觉，没人搭理你们了，一群没素质没教养的人，祝你们早日车祸撞死。这些绯言绯语，根本不是人话，也不是你们家的孩子，公安局处罚我也交了，有你们什么事呢
text: [The suspected child abuse kindergarten teacher scolded netizens on Weibo] Yan Yanhong: I have finished reflecting. The Public Security Bureau also asked me to pay a fine of 5,000 yuan. Sister, I have already paid it. There is nothing wrong with me. You unqualified people just like to curse, take a shower and sleep , no one pays attention to you, a group of uneducated people, I wish you will be killed in a car accident as soon as possible. These dirty words are not human words at all, and they are not your children. I have also paid the punishment from the Public Security Bureau. What does it have to do with you?

chinese_text: 没有买卖，就没有伤害：一只幼猴紧紧搂住即将被“活取猴脑”的妈妈。[泪][泪]——希望更多的人行动起来保护和我们生活在一起的动物。 #恳请人类口下留情吧#世界万物皆有灵性的，不信不代表它不存在啊！！！！[伤心]
text: No business, no harm: A baby monkey hugs its mother who is about to have her brain harvested alive. [Tears][Tears] - I hope more people will take action to protect the animals that live with us. #Please humanity, please be merciful#Everything in the world is spiritual. If you don’t believe it, it doesn’t mean it doesn’t exist! ! ! ! [sad]

text: [Renren.com will announce its closure] Sources revealed that the top management of Renren is currently holding a coordination meeting to arrange the aftermath. In addition, as compensation for employees, Renren’s Hong Kong-listed stocks will be distributed to employees. According to the latest news, this morning, Renren website employees received severance pay at the HP Building. At present, the senior management of Renren website... http://t.cn/zl12eSS

chinese_text: ★今日十大神秘震惊事件之二★【油炸美女大便】这是日本美食金粒餐。餐厅先侯选美少女，让她们每天严格按照要求运动喝水吃饭起居一个星期。餐厅就派人再选取她们中最符合要求的排泄物作为原料，佐以各种名贵的调料锅蒸油炸，再裹上食用金粉，就大功告成了！（转）★神秘，我们正在解释★@神秘震惊事件
text: ★Top 10 Mysterious Shocking Events of Today 2★【Fried Beauty's Poop】This is a Japanese gourmet golden meal. The restaurant first selects beautiful girls and asks them to exercise, drink, eat and live in strict accordance with the requirements every day for a week. The restaurant will send people to select the excrement that best meets the requirements as raw materials, steam and fry it in a pot with various expensive seasonings, and then coat it with edible gold powder, and you're done! (Repost) ★Mysterious, we are explaining ★@ mysterious shocking event

chinese_text: 1984年12月3日晨，印度博帕尔市的联合碳化物有限公司一所化工厂（PX项目）发生氰化物泄漏，覆盖方圆60公里区域。大灾难造成了2.5万人直接致死，55万人间接致死，另外有20多万人永久残废的人间惨剧。到现在，当地居民仍然要忍受癌症及胎儿畸形的折磨。PX悲剧别在中国上演，让PX项目滚出中国！
text: On the morning of December 3, 1984, a cyanide leak occurred at a chemical plant (PX project) of Union Carbide Co., Ltd. in Bhopal, India, covering an area of 60 kilometers. The catastrophe caused 25,000 direct deaths, 550,000 indirect deaths, and more than 200,000 people were permanently disabled. To this day, local residents still suffer from cancer and fetal malformations. Don’t let the PX tragedy happen in China, let the PX project get out of China!

chinese_text: 目前见过最大的王八！据怺逺啲兲岼微博， 今天中午11点左右，在湖州市南浔新桥下面的河里面，发现一只400多斤的甲鱼。。。10几个人，才把它抓起来。@钓技知识大全 @快乐垂钓网 @蔡奕微 @艾素
text: The biggest tortoise I have ever seen! According to Weibo, a turtle weighing more than 400 kilograms was found in the river below the Nanxun New Bridge in Huzhou City around 11 noon today. . . It took more than 10 people to catch it. @ fishing skill knowledge encyclopedia @happy fishing network @ CAI Yiwei @ aisu

chinese_text: 【转自微博】他死了，为保护一群陌生人。而这群被保护者事后一拥而散，无人愿做目击证人。22日，天津50路公交出现小偷，司机提醒乘客小心。结果，在全车人围观中，被小偷连捅数刀。受伤后，他被独自留在工作多年的公交上，流干了血，去世。 @上海派對SHClubbing
text: [Reposted from Weibo] He died to protect a group of strangers. The group of protected persons dispersed in droves afterwards, and no one wanted to be a witness. On the 22nd, a thief appeared on Tianjin’s No. 50 bus, and the driver reminded passengers to be careful. As a result, with everyone in the car watching, he was stabbed several times by the thief. After being injured, he was left alone on the bus where he had worked for many years, bled dry, and died. @上海partySHClubbing

chinese_text: 《老爷子讲真话了吗?》电视台请一抗日老英雄做节目，主持人问：老爷子，当年您为什么要打鬼子？ 老人说：当年小鬼子在我家乡烧杀抢掠。主持人又问：那您老现在最大的心愿是什么？老人答：我想有一把枪，把我们书记乡长毙了，他们比小鬼子还祸害人！http://t.cn/zWgCOCg 问：@范炜，老爷子有这个胆量吗?
text: "Did the old man tell the truth?" The TV station invited an old anti-Japanese hero to do the program. The host asked: Old man, why did you fight the Japanese? The old man said: Back then, the little devils burned, killed and looted my hometown. The host asked again: What is your biggest wish now? The old man replied: I want a gun to kill our secretary and mayor. They are more harmful to people than the little devils! http://t.cn/zWgCOCg Question: @Fan Wei, does the old man have the courage?

chinese_text: 洗车店老板潘先生患有忧郁症，因生意不景气情绪激动，邻居报警，公安局出动11名警察到场，潘当时正在家抱着19个月大的女儿，但警察根本不理会潘妻和在场群众的恳求，硬是朝潘和他女儿开枪扫射。最终可怜的父女俩身中300多枪身亡。警方表示，潘有酗酒史，女婴死警方不用负责。http://t.cn/zldTL2S
text: Mr. Pan, the owner of the car wash shop, suffered from depression and was agitated because of the downturn in business. Neighbors called the police, and the Public Security Bureau dispatched 11 police officers to the scene. Pan was at home holding his 19-month-old daughter, but the police ignored Pan's wife and the presence of his wife. In response to the pleas of the crowd, they shot Pan and his daughter. In the end, the poor father and daughter were shot more than 300 times and died. The police said that Pan had a history of alcoholism and the police were not responsible for the death of the baby girl. http://t.cn/zldTL2S

chinese_text: 【真正的汉奸】梅思平是五四运动领头学生之一，爱国的口号叫得最多、最响，火烧赵家楼第一把火就是他放的。倭国侵华后，以前的“汉奸”曹汝霖、章宗祥、陆宗舆三人宁死不接受正式伪职。倒是当年最爱国的者梅思平摇身一变，成为汪精卫投敌策划人，铁杆正牌汉奸。——高喊爱国者，往往最容易变成汉奸！
text: [The real traitor] Mei Siping was one of the leading students of the May 4th Movement. He shouted the loudest and loudest patriotic slogans. He was the one who set the first fire that burned the Zhaojia Building. After the Japanese invaded China, the former "traitors" Cao Rulin, Zhang Zongxiang, and Lu Zongyu would rather die than accept formal pseudo-jobs. However, Mei Siping, who was the most patriotic at that time, suddenly transformed into the mastermind of Wang Jingwei's surrender to the enemy and a true traitor. ——Those who shout patriots are often the easiest to become traitors!

chinese_text: @重磅微新闻  卫生部长陈竺接受采访时说：我们免费为一农村大妈做了白内障手术。当摘下纱布时她看见了,她的确要感谢党！感谢政府！靠她自己，她一辈子也做不起手术。崔反问道：她辛苦一辈子，连个白内障手术都做不起，那她得恨谁呢？ @袁裕来律师 @叶匡政 @章立凡 @徐昕 @五岳散人 @老徐时评  @杨锦麟
text: @ Heavy Micro News Minister of Health Chen Zhu said in an interview: We performed cataract surgery for a rural aunt for free. When she took off the gauze, she saw that she really wanted to thank the party! Thank you government! On her own, she would never be able to afford the surgery in her lifetime. Cui asked back: She has worked hard all her life and can't even afford cataract surgery, so who does she have to hate? @ yuanyulai lawyer @叶桡正 @ 张立峰 @雪昕 @五月三人 @老 Xushi comment @杨金麟

chinese_text: 通过长达十天两会的召开.新的婚姻法中规定 男女双方只要年满18周岁就可以结婚.并不是之前女方满20周男方满22周才可制成婚约.如今结婚证是国家级证书.高考时还可加3学分.现在在大学期间结婚.学费还可减半;跨民族结婚 生一个孩子奖励一万.请大家相互转告.好完成那些早婚人的梦想.
text: Through the ten-day two sessions, the new Marriage Law stipulates that both men and women can get married as long as they are 18 years old or older. It is not the case that a marriage contract can be made only when the woman is 20 weeks old and the man is 22 weeks old. Now the marriage certificate is a national certificate. You can also add 3 credits in the college entrance examination. Now if you get married during college, the tuition fee can be halved; if you get married across ethnic groups and have a child, you will be rewarded 10,000. Please tell each other so that the dreams of those who get married early can be fulfilled.

chinese_text: 【盘锦市公安局又在自己查自己了】村民王树杰被警察张研开枪杀害，调查结果却是警察开枪合法！李洪娜被盘锦派出所所长伙同地痞轮奸，面对网友3万条转发，盘锦市公安局坐不住了，在网上发微博回应网友，叫大家耐心等待调查结果，这么多天过去，女孩连发两条求救微博都被删除，你们把她关在哪里？
text: [Panjin City Public Security Bureau is investigating itself again] Villager Wang Shujie was shot and killed by policeman Zhang Yan, but the investigation result was that the police shooting was legal! Li Hongna was gang-raped by the director of the Panjin Police Station and gangsters. Faced with 30,000 retweets from netizens, the Panjin City Public Security Bureau could not sit still. It responded to netizens on Weibo and asked everyone to wait patiently for the results of the investigation. After so many days, the girl continued to post The two Weibo posts asking for help have been deleted. Where do you keep her?

chinese_text: #年检#在德国，汽车、公司都无需年检。我问德国人：汽车不年检，坏了怎么办？答：自己修车。问：企业不年检，公司倒闭如潮怎么办？德国人答：你看德国是这样的吗？我问：德国政府为何不强制年检？德国人反问：谁给了政府这个权力？如果政府对年检感兴趣，说明这种事对它有好处。@杨建国 @袁裕来律师
text: #ANNUALINSPECTION#In Germany, cars and companies do not need annual inspections. I asked the Germans: If the car is not inspected annually, what should I do if it breaks down? Answer: Repair the car yourself. Question: What should I do if companies fail to conduct annual inspections and companies close down like a wave? German replied: Do you think Germany is like this? I asked: Why doesn’t the German government mandate annual inspections? The Germans asked: Who gave the government this power? If the government is interested in annual inspections, it means that this kind of thing is good for it. @杨江国@元宇来 lawyer

chinese_text: 通过长达十天两会的召开.新的婚姻法中规定 男女双方只要年满18周岁就可以结婚.并不是之前女方满20周男方满22周才可制成婚约.如今结婚证是国家级证书.高考时还可加3学分.现在在大学期间结婚.学费还可减半;跨民族结婚 生一个孩子奖励一万.好完成那些早婚人的梦想. 中共18大开完。亲。 我们结婚吧。[哈哈]
text: Through the ten-day two sessions, the new Marriage Law stipulates that both men and women can get married as long as they are 18 years old or older. It is not the case that a marriage contract can be made only when the woman is 20 weeks old and the man is 22 weeks old. Now the marriage certificate is a national certificate. You can also add 3 credits in the college entrance examination. Now if you get married during college, the tuition fee can be halved; if you get married across ethnic groups and have a child, you will be rewarded 10,000 yuan, so that you can fulfill the dreams of those who married early. The 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China is over. relative. Let's get married. [Ha ha]

chinese_text: 【调查地沟油的记者李翔，死了】 身中10余刀，惨死。他为全国不能吃特供的十多亿草泥马的食品安全努力过。他付出了年轻的生命。草泥马们，请动一下鼠标，转发，表达一下谢意。不过分吧？恭请转发！！！。
text: [Reporter Li Xiang, who investigated gutter oil, died] He was stabbed more than 10 times and died tragically. He has worked hard for the food safety of the more than one billion grass-mud horses in the country who cannot eat special supplies. He gave his young life. Guys, please move your mouse, forward it, and express your gratitude. Not too much? Please forward it! ! ! .

chinese_text: 【2个简单方法：检测是否地沟油】方法1：在炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头（蒜子），蒜头对于黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜头变红色，就是用地沟油，含有大量黄曲霉素。食油良好的话，蒜头是白色的。 方法2：把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，那就是地沟油。赶快把这2个方法告诉更多的人吧。
text: [2 simple methods: Check whether there is gutter oil] Method 1: Put a peeled garlic (garlic) when cooking. Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means you have used gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. If the cooking oil is good, the garlic will be white. Method 2: Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Hurry up and tell more people about these two methods.

chinese_text: 【360浏览器盗取淘宝店主佣金？！】媒体猛料：用户使用360浏览器上淘宝，一些链接的淘宝客代码会被360篡改，店主本不该花的佣金，会被360旗下上海奇泰获得。“几天前的回头客，买了同样的商品，居然也被扣推广费。”想起“淘宝店主猝死”的新闻，360的良心呢？http://t.cn/zle4pIW
text: [360 browser steals commissions from Taobao store owners? ! 】 Media news: When users use the 360 browser to access Taobao, the Taobao code of some links will be tampered with by 360, and the commission that the store owner should not have spent will be obtained by Shanghai Qitai, a subsidiary of 360. "Repeat customers from a few days ago bought the same product, but promotion fees were also deducted." Thinking of the news about "the sudden death of a Taobao store owner," what is the conscience of 360? http://t.cn/zle4pIW

chinese_text: 有一个信息请大家关注。曹小东告诉我郑州金水路经八路派出所里有个被拐卖的越南小女孩求助。警察却怀疑她卖淫的。要先把她留下三十天。警察里没有人懂越南语，只有小东能和她英语交流几句，她大概说她叫阮什么兰，是河内人。小东说他亲眼见到的很多警察在其他人面前无顾忌的调戏她。吃饭时只给她冷馍。
text: There is a message for everyone to pay attention to. Cao Xiaodong told me that there was a little Vietnamese girl who was abducted and asked for help at the Jingba Road Police Station on Jinshui Road in Zhengzhou. The police suspected her of prostitution. She must be kept for thirty days first. No one in the police knew Vietnamese, and only Xiaodong could exchange a few words with her in English. She probably said her name was Ruan Shilan and that she was from Hanoi. Xiaodong said that he witnessed many police officers molesting her without scruples in front of other people. Only give her cold steamed buns during meals.

chinese_text: 在德国，汽车、公司都无需年检。我问德国人：汽车不年检，坏了怎么办？答：自己修车。问：企业不年检，公司倒闭如潮怎么办？德国人答：你看德国是这样的吗？我问：德国政府为何不强制年检？德国人反问：谁给了政府这个权力？如果政府对年检感兴趣，说明这种事对它有好处。
text: In Germany, cars and companies do not need annual inspections. I asked the Germans: If the car is not inspected annually, what should I do if it breaks down? Answer: Repair the car yourself. Question: What should I do if companies fail to conduct annual inspections and companies close down like a wave? German replied: Do you think Germany is like this? I asked: Why doesn’t the German government mandate annual inspections? The Germans asked: Who gave the government this power? If the government is interested in annual inspections, it means that this kind of thing is good for it.

chinese_text: [话筒]【亲，我们结婚吧】亲们，咨询得知，新的婚姻法中规定男女双方只要年满18周岁就可以结婚了啊，并不是之前的男方22、女方20噢。而且结婚证是国家级证书，加3个学分现在大学期间结婚，学费减半；跨民族结婚，生一个孩子奖励一万。[花心]
text: [Microphone] [Dear, let’s get married] Dear friends, after consultation, I learned that the new marriage law stipulates that both men and women can get married as long as they are over 18 years old. It is not the previous 22 for the man and 20 for the woman. Moreover, the marriage certificate is a national certificate. If you add 3 credits, if you get married during college, the tuition will be reduced by half; if you marry across ethnic groups, you will be rewarded 10,000 yuan for having a child. [Favorite]

chinese_text: 【委员如此无德】全国政协委员王平建向党中央建议：取消录取农村小孩上大学资格，不鼓励农村孩子上大学。其认为农村孩子身上有很多坏毛病，农村孩子上大学，城市孩子会被影响，这样城市的孩子会变坏！中央必须采取行政手段禁止农村孩子上大学；农村人身上很多坏毛病，任何一个有文化城里人都忍受不了。
text: [Members are so unethical] Wang Pingjian, a member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, suggested to the Party Central Committee: cancel the qualifications for rural children to go to college and discourage rural children from going to college. He believes that rural children have many bad habits. If rural children go to college, urban children will be affected, and urban children will become bad! The central government must take administrative measures to prohibit rural children from going to college; rural people have many bad habits that no educated urbanite can tolerate.

chinese_text: 都是中国城市，理念、标准、气度咋就这么不一样呐：据日媒报，北京国际马拉松赛组委会近日决定，11月25日的比赛将不接受日本选手的报名和日本企业的赞助，理由是“从安全考虑”。而11月3日，日本花滑女将浅田真央在上海国际花滑大奖赛中国站上获得自由滑冠军，上海观众为其鼓掌，向她献花。
text: They are all Chinese cities, but their concepts, standards, and attitudes are so different: According to Japanese media reports, the Beijing International Marathon Organizing Committee recently decided that the race on November 25 will not accept registrations from Japanese runners or sponsorship from Japanese companies. , the reason is "for safety reasons". On November 3, Japanese figure skater Mao Asada won the free skating championship at the Shanghai International Figure Skating Grand Prix China. The Shanghai audience applauded and presented her with flowers.

chinese_text: 【全世界最小的猫】美国伊利诺斯州发现了一只小巧可爱的猫,这只小猫名叫皮堡斯,今年两岁,体重只有3磅,相当于一袋糖果。它是世界上最小的猫,现已列入吉尼斯世界纪录。皮堡斯已达到猫的正常发育年龄,但是体形仍然如果小巧,实 属罕见。专家指出皮堡斯体形小巧可能是由于基因缺陷造成的
text: [The smallest cat in the world] A small and cute cat was found in Illinois, USA. This kitten is named Peebles. He is two years old and weighs only 3 pounds, which is equivalent to a bag of candy. It is the smallest cat in the world and is now listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. Peebles has reached the normal developmental age of a cat, but his body shape is still small, which is rare. Experts suggest that Peebles' small stature may be caused by a genetic defect

chinese_text: 【魔都离婚率为神马高?】瑞典研究:如果夫妻中有一人每天上下班路程花费45分钟以上,回家时就会因过于疲劳而无法分担家务.而另一方会有被忽视的感觉.冲突便逐渐增加; 那些要花很长时间乘车或驾车上下班的人和配偶离婚的可能性比其他人要高出40%..上海离婚率全国排名第2,高达38%;再看看拥堵程度,准阿!!!
text: [How high is the divorce rate in Shanghai?] Swedish research: If one person in a couple spends more than 45 minutes commuting to and from work every day, they will be too tired to share housework when they get home. The other partner will feel neglected .Conflicts gradually increase; those who spend a long time commuting or driving to and from work are 40% more likely to divorce their spouses than others. Shanghai’s divorce rate ranks second in the country, as high as 38%; look again It depends on the degree of congestion, it’s accurate!!!

chinese_text: 2013年1月1日施行： 1、闯红灯，记6分，罚100元； 2、酒驾，5年内不得再考取驾照； 3、不系安全带，记3分，罚100元； 4、副驾不系安全带，记1分，罚50元； 5、行驶中拨打手机，记3分，罚100元； 6、行驶中抽烟，记1分，罚100元； 7、有意遮挡号牌，记12分，顶额处罚； 8、超速驾驶，记6分。 对照下自己
text: Effective on January 1, 2013: 1. Running a red light will result in 6 points and a fine of 100 yuan; 2. Drunk driving will not allow you to obtain a driver's license within 5 years; 3. Failure to wear a seat belt will result in 3 points and a fine of 100 yuan; 4. The co-pilot will not Wearing a seat belt will be deducted 1 point and fined 50 yuan; 5. Making a phone call while driving will be deducted 3 points and fined 100 yuan; 6. Smoking while driving will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan; 7. Intentionally blocking the license plate will be deducted 12 points, maximum penalty; 8. Speeding, 6 points will be recorded. Check yourself

chinese_text: 转：孩子啊，妈去街上卖点山竹，挣完钱了给你买点肉吃，娘知道你一星期没吃到肉啦。”重庆一妇女对她孩子说。孩子开心回答：“好啊，好啊，中午我在家先洗菜淘米，等你回家来烧饭哦”——想不到半路上遇到城管执法把她推下台阶成了永别！旁边的小贩说，这名妇女卖水果辛苦拉扯3个孩子。怎这么杯具啊！
text: Re: My child, Mom will sell some mangosteens on the street. After making money, I will buy you some meat to eat. Mom knows that you haven’t eaten meat for a week. "A woman in Chongqing said to her child. The child happily replied: "Okay, okay, I will wash the vegetables and wash the rice at home at noon, and wait for you to come home to cook." Unexpectedly, she was pushed by urban management and law enforcement on the way. Going down the steps was a farewell! The vendor next to me said that this woman had to work hard to support three children while selling fruit. How could she be so useless!

chinese_text: 全国政协委员、北京中华民族博物馆馆长王平建议不鼓励农村孩子上大学，认为他们即使留城也是二等公民。知识就是力量，知识改变命运，这么简单的道理，王委员不懂吗？疯涨的GDP掩盖不了目前位居庙堂之上当政议政人士的无耻，这样自高自大，信口开河的委员还是尽早下台，去做你的一等公民吧！
text: Wang Ping, a member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and director of the Museum of Chinese Ethnology in Beijing, suggested not encouraging rural children to go to college, arguing that they would still be second-class citizens even if they stayed in the city. Knowledge is power, and knowledge changes destiny. Doesn’t Commissioner Wang understand such a simple truth? The skyrocketing GDP cannot cover up the shamelessness of those who are currently in power and discuss politics. Such arrogant and nonsensical committee members should step down as soon as possible and become your first-class citizens!

chinese_text: 济南城，11岁的小杰和9岁的妹妹蓉蓉，每天凌晨三点半就会被爸爸强行弄醒，放在三轮车上，跟着爸爸妈妈去扫街。因为是黑户，没有户口，学校拒收这两个孩子。尽管他们渴望上学读书，但这只是遥远的梦，9岁的蓉蓉至今还不识字。为什么上学一定要户口？只要是中国孩子，就应无条件让他们在中国土地上上学。
text: In Jinan City, 11-year-old Xiaojie and his 9-year-old sister Rongrong are forcibly awakened by their father at 3:30 every morning, put on a tricycle, and follow their parents to sweep the streets. Because they were from illegal households and had no household registration, the school refused to accept these two children. Although they long to go to school, this is just a distant dream. 9-year-old Rongrong is still illiterate. Why do I need a hukou to go to school? As long as they are Chinese children, they should be allowed to go to school on Chinese soil unconditionally.

chinese_text: : 全国政协委员王平建向党中央建议：取消录取农村小孩上大学资格，不鼓励农村小孩上大学。其认为农村孩子身上有很多坏毛病，农村孩子上大学，城市孩子会被影响，这样城市孩子也变坏！中央必须采取行政手段禁止农村小孩上大学…农村人身上的很多坏毛病，任何一个有文化的城里人都忍受不了@历史断片

He believes that rural children have many bad habits. If rural children go to college, urban children will be affected, and urban children will also become bad! text: [The Times Needs Heroes] Lai Ning was highly short-sighted. During the fire, his glasses fell off while watching the fun with his classmates and he was burned to death. He did not participate in the firefighting at all. In his hometown of Shimian County, Sichuan, his father Lai Zhenggang was the director of the Water Conservancy and Electricity Bureau. After Lai Ning's death, his father teamed up to fabricate stories about Lai Ning's heroic firefighting and reported it to the central government, making him a hero. Later, his father faced investigation due to financial problems, and the central leadership instructed: The glory of the hero must not be tarnished!

chinese_text: 【怎么鉴定地沟油】炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头(蒜子)，蒜子对黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜子变红色就是地沟油，含有大量黄曲霉素。把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，那就是地沟油。请发出你的爱心， 转给身边滴朋友吧！
text: [How to identify gutter oil] When cooking, put a peeled head of garlic (garlic). Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Please send out your love and pass it on to your friends around you!

chinese_text: 恰恰瓜子在美国1.99美元，买一箱哦！折合成人民币，也就是12.4元人民币一箱。一箱有18包，也就是6毛8分钱一袋。在中国超市里面，这样一袋要6.9元。也就是美国超市的恰恰瓜子是中国是10倍。美国佬拿着10倍于中国人的工资，却买着10分之一价格的产品。相差100倍的消费水平啊！
text: Cha Cha melon seeds are $1.99 in the United States, buy a box! Converted into RMB, that is RMB 12.4 per box. There are 18 bags in a box, which is 6 cents and 8 cents per bag. In Chinese supermarkets, a bag like this costs 6.9 yuan. In other words, the Cha Cha melon seeds in American supermarkets are 10 times more expensive than those in China. Americans earn 10 times the wages of Chinese people, but buy products at one-tenth the price. The consumption level is 100 times different!

chinese_text: 【怎么鉴定地沟油】炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头(蒜子)，蒜子对黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜子变红色就是地沟油，含有大量黄曲霉素。把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，那就是地沟油。请发出你的爱心， 转给身边滴朋友吧！
text: [How to identify gutter oil] When cooking, put a peeled head of garlic (garlic). Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Please send out your love and pass it on to your friends around you!

chinese_text: 山东网友爆料：2012年11月16日晨，聊城官府纠集1000多人，动用警察、消防等机器，对八里庙南街57户居民进行扫荡式暴力强拆！居民反抗，寡不敌众！报警！公安称不属其管辖范围！？并将其中数人以“妨害公务”抓走！政客们想用强拆表现政绩吗？！荒唐！下图令我想起GD就义时的情形。
text: Shandong netizens broke the news: On the morning of November 16, 2012, the Liaocheng government gathered more than 1,000 people and used police, fire-fighting and other machines to carry out a sweep-style violent demolition of 57 households on Balimiao South Street! The residents resisted and were outnumbered! Call the police! The police said it was not within their jurisdiction! ? And several of them were arrested for "obstructing official business"! Do politicians want to use forced demolitions to show their political achievements? ! absurd! The picture below reminds me of the scene when GD died.

chinese_text: 【@任志强 语录】1、天黑路滑，社会复杂。2、频频回头的人，自然走不远。3、要不是我劝着自己，我早和这个世界翻脸了。4、手里捧着地图，心中却没有目的地。5、乞丐不一定妒忌百万富翁，但肯定妒忌收入更高的乞丐。6、有一种人只做两件事：妒嫉你成功；笑话你失败。
text: [@人志强Quotations] 1. It’s dark and the roads are slippery, and society is complicated. 2. People who look back frequently will not be able to go far. 3. If I hadn’t persuaded myself, I would have fallen out with the world long ago. 4. Holding a map in hand, but no destination in mind. 5. Beggars are not necessarily jealous of millionaires, but they are certainly jealous of beggars with higher incomes. 6. There is a kind of person who only does two things: jealous of your success; laughing at your failure.

chinese_text: 上海今天下午六点开始， 高清探头全部启动，副驾驶室不系安全带相同处罚，开车时打电话罚款50元，闯黄闪罚200，越线停车罚100，为期60天，全国交警集中查处酒驾，一经查获，一律拘役六个月，五年内不得考证。每月10、20、30日由省厅带队检查，每月 3、7、13、17、23日和每周五、六由市局组织检查
text: Starting at 6 pm today in Shanghai, all high-definition sensors will be activated. Those who do not wear seat belts in the passenger compartment will be subject to the same penalties. Those who talk on the phone while driving will be fined 50 yuan, those who flash yellow will be fined 200 yuan, and those who park outside the line will be fined 100 yuan. For a period of 60 days, the national traffic police will focus on investigation and punishment. Anyone caught drunk driving will be detained for six months and will not be allowed to test for five years. The provincial department will lead inspections on the 10th, 20th and 30th of every month, and the municipal bureau will organize inspections on the 3rd, 7th, 13th, 17th and 23rd of every month and every Friday and Saturday.

text: #八岁Do you want to get married# The 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China passed. Men and women can register for marriage after they are 18 years old. It is no longer the past for men to be 22 years old and women to be 20 years old. [Awesome] [So happy]. Follow @Breaking News Community

chinese_text: 【我们结婚吧[心]】通过长达十天两会的召开.新的婚姻法中规定 男女双方只要年满18周岁就可以结婚.并不是之前女方满20周男方满22周.如今结婚证是国家级证书.高考时还可加3学分.现在在大学期间结婚.学费还可减半;跨民族结婚 生一个孩子奖励一万.想早婚的童鞋可以考虑起来了。via：乐婚礼
text: [Let’s get married [Heart]] Through the ten-day two sessions, the new marriage law stipulates that both men and women can get married as long as they are over 18 years old. It is not the same as before when the woman was 20 weeks old and the man was 22 weeks old. Now the marriage certificate is national Level certificate. You can also add 3 credits in the college entrance examination. Now if you get married during college, the tuition fee can be halved; if you marry an inter-ethnic person and have a child, you will be rewarded 10,000 yuan. Children who want to get married early can consider it. via: Le Wedding

Yesterday, the Quanzhou City Police Department in Fujian Province caught several criminal gangs that abducted and trafficked children, and a 5-year-old child was rescued on the spot. Because he was still young, he couldn't tell him his home's detailed address or home phone number. I only know that he is from Zhaotong City, Yunnan! Please take a few seconds to forward it. Maybe you can help reunite their family by simply forwarding it! @薛素子 @李凯Fu @水奇

chinese_text: 杨澜原话：虽然我入了美国籍，但我出身于中国，所以从原产地角度而言，我不出席美国两会而出席中国的两会是“天经地义”。不知道她的奥巴马总统怎么看？
text: Yang Lan’s original words: Although I am a naturalized American, I was born in China, so from the perspective of my place of origin, it is “natural” that I will not attend the Two Sessions in the United States but attend the Two Sessions in China. I wonder what President Obama thinks of her?

chinese_text: 这是著名的云南怒江傈僳族女孩飞索渡江求学！每年都有十几个孩子掉进滚滚怒江，修一座桥40万，当地县政府说没钱，因为是国家贫困县，新华社现代金报记者高天俊质问：为何书记的奥迪车70多万？ 大家转起！来为孩子能有一座上学的桥而转！-欧阳国忠
text: This is the famous Lisu girl from the Nujiang River in Yunnan flying across the river to study! Every year, more than a dozen children fall into the rolling Nu River. To build a bridge costs RMB 400,000. The local county government said it has no money because it is a nationally impoverished county. Gao Tianjun, a reporter from Xinhua News Agency’s Modern Financial Daily, asked: Why does the secretary’s Audi car cost more than RMB 700,000? Everyone, turn around! Come and help your children have a bridge to go to school! -Ouyang Guozhong

text: Netizens revealed that Kingkey Chairman Chen Hua lost Kingkey 100 in gambling in Macau today and is now going through the transfer procedures. It may not be true, for your reference, but it is always right to stay away from gambling and cherish life!

chinese_text: “孩子啊，妈去街上卖点山竹，挣完钱了给你买点肉吃，娘知道你一星期没吃到肉啦。”重庆一妇女对她孩子说。孩子开心回答：“好啊，好啊，中午我在家先洗菜淘米，等你回家来烧饭哦”——想不到半路上遇到城管执法把她推下台阶成了永别！旁边的小贩说，这名妇女卖水果辛苦拉扯3个孩子。你转不转？
text: "My child, mommy went to sell some mangosteens on the street, and after making money, I'll buy you some meat to eat. Mom knows you haven't eaten meat for a week." A woman in Chongqing said to her child. The child happily replied: "Okay, okay. I will wash the vegetables and wash the rice at home at noon, and wait for you to come home to cook." Unexpectedly, she encountered urban management and law enforcement on the way and pushed her down the steps and said goodbye forever! The vendor next to her said that this woman had to work hard to raise three children while selling fruits. Can you turn around?

chinese_text: 【城管疯了 福州城管围殴女摊贩 满身是血】10日晚上11点左右，福建福州城管暴力执法，在广达路汇多利对面殴打围殴手无寸铁的一个卖炒面的妇女，被打者满脸是血，女摊贩都躲到仓库了，城管居然追进去，那女摊贩最终倒地昏迷。最后倒地不起。http://t.cn/zjAZ7TC

The victim’s face was covered with blood. It was blood. The female vendor hid in the warehouse. The urban management actually chased her in. chinese_text: - 通过长达十天两会的召开.新的婚姻法中规定 男女双方只要年满18周岁就可以结婚.并不是之前女方满20周男方满22周才可制成婚约.如今结婚证是国家级证书.高考时还可加3学分.现在在大学期间结婚.学费还可减半;跨民族结婚 生一个孩子奖励一万.结婚吧咱。
text: - Through the ten-day two sessions, the new marriage law stipulates that both men and women can get married as long as they are 18 years old or older. It is not the case that a marriage contract can be made only when the woman is 20 weeks old and the man is 22 weeks old. Now the marriage certificate is a national certificate . You can also add 3 credits in the college entrance examination. Now if you get married during college, the tuition fee can be halved; if you marry across ethnic groups and have a child, you will be rewarded with 10,000 yuan. Let's get married.

chinese_text: 爱心接力： 大家好，我是医院里面的护士。前几天医院来了一位小女孩，她叫胡云星，女，6岁，运城人。大家帮忙救救她，她患有罕见的“布加氏综合征”对激素已经产生抗体，体重不断上升，每天不停地重复一句话：妈妈，疼!她爸妈整天哭着跪在大街上乞讨为她治病。可惜一天只能乞讨几十来块。
text: Love Relay: Hello everyone, I am a nurse in the hospital. A little girl came to the hospital a few days ago. Her name is Hu Yunxing, female, 6 years old, from Yuncheng. Everyone helped to save her. She suffered from the rare "Bud-Chiari syndrome" and had developed antibodies to hormones. Her weight continued to rise and she kept repeating one sentence every day: Mom, it hurts! Her parents cried and knelt on the street all day long. Begging for medical treatment for her. It's a pity that I can only beg for a few dozen yuan a day.

The latest performance fee is 1.8 million yuan for three songs, with an average of 600,000 yuan per song. In addition, he will be transported by a special plane. text: [Grandma picked up the baby in the toilet and was thrown to death by family planning officials after being confiscated] On the afternoon of the 15th, Grandma Liu picked up the baby from the feces in the toilet of the township finance office, cleaned it briefly, cut the umbilical cord and injected it for disinfection. When the child was properly taken care of and given water, five people from the Family Planning Office of Caidian Township, Huangpi District, Wuhan appeared, took the child away, threw him to the ground, kicked him, and let him flood the rice field. It caused public outrage among the local people. @上海partySHClubbing

text: [Embarrassing] When Xiaoping visited Britain and saw turbine engines, the British readily agreed to introduce Chinese production. Xiaoping paid tribute to British scientists, but the British stood up and saluted Deng instead. It turns out that Chinese scientist Wu Zhonghua studied the principle of turbine engines in the 1950s and wrote a paper on the three-dimensional flow equation of turbomachines. The British built turbine engines based on this. At that time, Wu was raising pigs at the May 7th Cadre School in Hubei Province. Transfer to http://t.cn/zWkuoyI

chinese_text: 1 闯红灯，6分，罚100元 2 酒驾，12分、5年内不得再考取驾照 3 不系安全带，记3分，罚100元 4 副驾不系安全带，记1分，罚50元。 5 行驶中打手机，记3分，罚100元。 6 行驶中抽烟，记1分，罚100元。 7 有意遮挡号牌，记12分，顶额处罚。 8 超速驾驶，记6分。 9 副驾驶不满14周岁乘坐，记6分，罚300元。
text: 1. Running a red light, 6 points, fined 100 yuan. 2. Drunk driving, 12 points, and will not be allowed to obtain a driver's license within 5 years. 3. Not wearing a seat belt, 3 points, and a fine of 100 yuan. 4. The passenger driver not wearing a seat belt, 1 point, and a fine of 50 yuan. 5. If you use a mobile phone while driving, you will be deducted 3 points and fined 100 yuan. 6. Smoking while driving will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan. 7. Intentionally blocking the number plate will result in 12 points and the maximum penalty. 8. Speeding will result in 6 points. 9. If the co-pilot is under 14 years old, he will be deducted 6 points and fined 300 yuan.

chinese_text: 【关于张海迪】偶小时候，官府宣传她胸部以下失去知觉，生命只有10年。偶那时感动得稀里哗啦，把她当作励志的偶像。30年过去了，她能坐在轮椅上跷二郎腿了；她能开车了也结婚了；她的官也越做越大了；她的妹纸生意也越做越大了；网传她也移民日本了.......是偶朝的医学越来越发达还是30年来偶是2B青年
text: [About Zhang Haidi] When I was a child, the government publicized that she had lost consciousness below her breasts and had only 10 years to live. I was so moved at that time that I regarded her as an inspirational idol. Thirty years later, she can sit in a wheelchair and cross her legs; she can drive and get married; her official position is getting bigger and bigger; her girl business is getting bigger and bigger; it is said on the Internet that she has also emigrated. Japan... Is it because medicine in my country is becoming more and more advanced or is it because I have been a 2B youth in the past 30 years?

text: [Hold it, don’t say bad words! ] Zeng Kai, an expert from the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security: Countries such as Europe, the United States, Dubai, and Greece have led to national economic and national crises due to high welfare benefits for their people. It is obvious to all that the people are lazy and uncreative. China has learned from these experiences and lessons and decided to provide appropriate benefits to its people. Putting pressure on people's lives and reducing welfare will not only help improve the people's enthusiasm for life, but also provide more fiscal revenue for the country to build the country.

text: This tragedy does not usually happen, but who could have predicted it? As a friendly reminder, you must unplug the power source to answer calls on your mobile phone. A few days ago, a young man was charging his mobile phone at home. At this moment, the phone rang, and he listened without unplugging the charger. A few seconds later, a strong current flowed through the phone through the power supply, and the young man was knocked to the ground. By the time his parents rushed into the room, he had lost consciousness, his heartbeat was weak, and his fingers were burned. This is a painful lesson, please tell your relatives and friends to take it seriously!

The second-hand housing market suddenly exploded: Beijing suddenly had 3.81 million vacant houses on the market, and the number of second-hand housing listings in Shanghai increased from 410,000 to 410,000. The number of second-hand housing listings in Guangzhou jumped from 260,000 to 1 million units, and the number of second-hand housing listings in Shenzhen jumped from 80,000 to 120,000 units to 300,000 units. According to incomplete statistics, the price reduction range is more than 50%?

chinese_text: CCTV今天播出交通新规： 1闯红灯记6分罚100元。2 酒驾记12分5年内不得再考取驾照。3 不系安全带记3分罚100元。4 副驾不系安全带记1分罚50元。5 行驶中拨打手机记3分罚100元。6 行驶中抽烟记1分罚100元。7 有意遮挡号牌记12分，顶额处罚。8 超速驾驶记6分。9 副驾驶有不满14周岁乘坐的记6分罚300元。
text: CCTV broadcast new traffic regulations today: 1. Running a red light will result in 6 points and a fine of 100 yuan. 2. A person with 12 points on the drunk driving record will not be able to obtain a driver's license again within 5 years. 3 Failure to wear a seat belt will result in 3 points and a fine of 100 yuan. 4. If the passenger does not wear a seat belt, he will be penalized with 1 point and a fine of 50 yuan. 5. If you make a phone call while driving, you will be deducted 3 points and fined 100 yuan. 6. Smoking while driving will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan. 7. Intentional blocking of the number plate will result in 12 points and the maximum penalty. 8. Speeding will result in 6 points. 9. If the co-pilot is under 14 years old, he will be deducted 6 points and fined 300 yuan.

chinese_text: 中国红十字会——你们凭什么购买这么多路虎？一种无耻可以肆无忌惮！一种诈骗可以正大光明！一种抢劫可以毫无顾忌！一种挥霍可以明目张胆！一种贪污可以合情合理！一种发言可以掩盖真相！——最后，一种法律对它视而不见！一个国家的慈善机构，贪婪到连慈善捐款都不放过，你们到底是什么人——？？？
text: Red Cross Society of China - Why do you buy so many Land Rovers? A kind of shamelessness can be unscrupulous! A scam can be fair and square! A kind of robbery can be done without any scruples! A splurge can be blatant! A kind of corruption can be justified! A statement can hide the truth! —Finally, a law that turns a blind eye to it! A national charity that is so greedy that it doesn’t even let go of charitable donations. Who are you—? ? ?

chinese_text: 【恰恰瓜子在美国1.99美元，买一箱哦】折合成人民币，也就是12.4元人民币一箱。一箱有18包，也就是6毛8分钱1袋。在中国超市里面，这样一袋要6.9元。也就是美国超市的恰恰瓜子是中国是10倍。美国佬拿着10倍于中国人的工资，却买着10分之1价格的产品。相差100倍的消费水平啊！
text: [Cha Cha melon seeds are US$1.99 in the United States, buy a box] Converted into RMB, that is 12.4 yuan per box. There are 18 bags in a box, which is 6 cents and 8 cents per bag. In Chinese supermarkets, a bag like this costs 6.9 yuan. In other words, the Cha Cha melon seeds in American supermarkets are 10 times more expensive than those in China. Americans earn 10 times the wages of Chinese people, but buy products at 1/10 the price. The consumption level is 100 times different!

chinese_text: 【我们都是受害者！】羊城晚报爆出一条新闻，“中国电力违法收费27.4亿，这一数字还仅仅是专项检查核实的数字”。那么这高额的违法收入是如何获取的呢？电表生产企业道出实情：一些电力公司为获取不正当的利益，私下要求企业在生产电表过程中将电表调快，而且是越快越好。否则拒绝购买该厂家电表.
text: 【We are all victims! 】Yangcheng Evening News broke a news, "China's illegal electricity charges are 2.74 billion, and this number is only a number verified by special inspections." So how is this high amount of illegal income obtained? Electric meter manufacturers told the truth: In order to obtain unfair benefits, some power companies privately require companies to adjust the meter speed during the production process, and the faster the better. Otherwise, refuse to buy meters from this manufacturer.

chinese_text: 【中国双休日的来历】 1994年前后，中美入世谈判最艰难的时刻，美方突然向中方提出：在全世界都实行双休日的今天，中国必须尊重**，也给中国人双休日，并把这一项作为入世条件之一。1995年5月1日后起我国开始实行双休日工作制~！
text: [The origin of China’s weekend holidays] Around 1994, at the most difficult moment of Sino-US negotiations to join the WTO, the United States suddenly proposed to China: Today, when the whole world implements weekend holidays, China must respect Japan and give the Chinese people a weekend holiday, and treat this as a holiday. item as one of the conditions for accession to the WTO. text: A few days ago, an emergency occurred at Carrefour in Taiping, Harbin. All entrances and exits were closed with iron gates during business hours. No entry or exit was allowed. The trafficker was nowhere to be found, and the gang committed crimes quickly.

chinese_text: 家乐福发生突发事件，营业时间所有出入口用铁门封闭，不许进不许出，原因是一名女士在结账时跟在身边的孩子突然失踪，幸亏及时报警，家乐福立刻封闭所有出入口寻找孩子，后来孩子在二楼卫生间找到，头发被剃光，衣服已经被换掉，人口贩子不知去向，团伙作案手法迅速，年关将至，请大家务必带好孩子。
text: An emergency occurred at Carrefour. All entrances and exits were closed with iron gates during business hours. No entry or exit was allowed. The reason was that the child who was following a woman at the checkout suddenly disappeared. Fortunately, the police were called in time. Carrefour immediately closed all entrances and exits to look for the child. Later, the child Found in the bathroom on the second floor, her hair had been shaved and her clothes had been changed. The trafficker was nowhere to be found. The gang committed crimes quickly. The New Year is approaching, so please take care of your children.

chinese_text: 【亲，睡觉时把手机扔远点】近十年来，胶质瘤患者明显增多。胶质瘤是最常见的脑肿瘤，致死和致残率极高。其高发与过度使用电子产品有关，贴身携带手机、常煲电话粥、睡觉时手机放枕边，会导致人体内辐射累积，让体内自我修复系统“疲劳”。儿童头皮与头骨都较薄，对辐射更敏感。（都市快报）
text: [Dear, put your cell phone away when you sleep] In the past ten years, the number of patients with glioma has increased significantly. Glioma is the most common brain tumor with extremely high mortality and disability rates. Its high incidence is related to the excessive use of electronic products. Carrying a mobile phone close to the body, talking on the phone frequently, and placing the mobile phone next to the pillow while sleeping will lead to the accumulation of radiation in the human body and "fatigue" the body's self-repair system. Children's scalps and skulls are thinner and more sensitive to radiation. (City Express)

chinese_text: [我的钱呢？]央行今天承认增发了43万亿人民币，这相当于给每个中国人发了3万元！ 巨大通胀压力将由你我来买单，但多发的这3万元我确实没有拿到过。诸位！谁没拿到那3万块钱的请转发一下.汉奸们直接从我们口袋里掠夺去3万多！无价飞涨的黑手就是印制钞票，掠夺之后的痛苦留给屁民！究竞谁是幕后黒手？转

chinese_text: 【山洞里的希望小学】网友爆料贵州省紫云县中洞希望小学建于山洞内。当地条件艰苦，很多孩子为省下10元钱住宿费每天走几十里山路上下学。当这所奇怪的小学照片出现在全球网络上时，最后愤怒的官员关闭了学校，理由是中国作为世界经济第二大国，这山洞小学让中国看起来像个“原始国家”，太没面子了。
text: [Hope Primary School in the Cave] Netizens revealed that Zhongdong Hope Primary School in Ziyun County, Guizhou Province was built in a cave. The local conditions are difficult, and many children walk dozens of miles of mountain roads to and from school every day to save 10 yuan for accommodation. When photos of this strange elementary school appeared on the global Internet, angry officials finally closed the school on the grounds that, as the world's second largest economy, the cave elementary school made China look like a "primitive country" and was too shameful. .

chinese_text: 【中国双休日的来历】 1994年前后，中美入世谈判最艰难的时刻，美方突然向中方提出：在全世界都实行双休日的今天，中国必须尊重**，也给中国人双休日，并把这一项作为入世条件之一。1995年5月1日后起我国开始实行双休日工作制~！@薛蛮子 @徐昕 @袁裕来律师 @左小祖咒
text: [The origin of China’s weekend holidays] Around 1994, at the most difficult moment of Sino-US negotiations on accession to the WTO, the United States suddenly proposed to China: Today, when the whole world implements weekend holidays, China must respect Japan and give the Chinese people a weekend holiday, and treat this as a holiday. item as one of the conditions for accession to the WTO. After May 1, 1995, my country began to implement a weekend working system~! @雪人子@雪昕@元宇来 lawyer@zuoxiaozuca

chinese_text: #北京说事#【谨防宝宝被拐】天津阿姨家邻居带着3岁儿子去超市，付账片刻发现孩子不见，立即找保安求助。保安很给力，马上对讲机通知关闭所有入口进行排查。最后找到了小孩，头发被剃了，衣服被换。人贩子团伙太恐怖，家长带小孩外出一定要非常谨慎! ps:上周北京就发生类似两起，大家小心！（转）
text: #京说事# [Beware of your baby being abducted] A neighbor of an aunt’s family in Tianjin went to the supermarket with her 3-year-old son. After paying the bill, she noticed that the child was missing and immediately asked the security guard for help. The security was very good, and the intercom immediately announced that all entrances would be closed for investigation. The child was eventually found, his hair shaved, and his clothes changed. The gang of human traffickers is too scary. Parents must be very cautious when taking their children out! ps: There were two similar incidents in Beijing last week, everyone, be careful! (change)

text: In another country, this incident could probably bring down a president, dissolve a cabinet, and give birth to a new system. What a filial son!

chinese_text: 【泰国签证最新动态 困难或将成为现实[衰]】明年1月2日起，泰国将严格区分赴泰旅游团体签证和个人签证，个人签证要求申请者自己递交材料，自由行必须使用个人签证出境。新政策出来之后，可能会使一些原本准备自由行的游客为规避麻烦的签证手续而改选跟团游，赴泰旅游者或将感觉手续更费钱费时费力[囧]
text: [The latest developments in Thailand visa difficulties may become a reality [depreciation]] From January 2 next year, Thailand will strictly distinguish between group visas and individual visas for tourism in Thailand. Individual visas require applicants to submit materials themselves, and independent travelers must use individual visas to leave the country. . After the new policy comes out, some tourists who originally planned to travel independently may choose to travel in a group to avoid the troublesome visa procedures. Tourists going to Thailand may feel that the procedures are more expensive, time-consuming and laborious [囧]

chinese_text: 新骗局来了：如果你收到任何一个电话（包括1008600）说在检查你的手机线路，并要求你按“#”或其他任何键，不要按键，并结束通话。那是一家欺诈公司，他们的机器能在你按键后连接到你的SIM卡，并用你的钱来打电话。记者了解到，很可能有人安装了类似号码修改器的软件。抓紧【转】走！☞@全球奇闻异趣
text: Here comes the new scam: If you receive any call (including 1008600) saying that it is checking your mobile phone line and asking you to press "#" or any other key, do not press the key and end the call. That's a fraudulent company, their machine connects to your SIM card after you press a button and uses your money to make phone calls. The reporter learned that someone may have installed software similar to a number modifier. Hurry up and go! ☞@global strange news and interesting things

chinese_text: 【这是两回事】外交部新闻发布会，记者问为何中国要实行网络实名制？华春莹答：“每个人都必须为其言论负责。现在有一些人利用网络造谣，所以必须实行实名制。”“是否每个人都需要对自己的行为负责？”记者又问：“既然如此为何没人对四川地震豆腐渣工程害死儿童的负责？”华答：“这是两回事！”转
text: [These are two different things] At the press conference of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, a reporter asked why China wants to implement an online real-name system? Hua Chunying replied: "Everyone must be responsible for their speech. Now some people use the Internet to spread rumors, so a real-name system must be implemented." "Does everyone need to be responsible for their own actions?" The reporter asked: "Why is that so? No one is responsible for the deaths of children due to the shabby construction of Sichuan earthquake?" Hua replied: "These are two different things!"

chinese_text: 国足１：５背后不为人知的利益黑幕，今天欧州博彩公司赔付了多笔来自中国大陆同一代理的投注，投注合计金额多达1.2亿美元，竞猜泰国队净胜3球以上获胜，赔率为1:37.5，支付超过280亿人民币的奖金。博彩公司首席执行官鲍勃里维斯称：这场比赛是一个明晃晃的骗局，是赌徒直接操纵了比赛的结果
text: The unknown interests behind the national football team's 1:5 score. Today, a European betting company paid out multiple bets from the same agent in mainland China. The total amount of bets was as much as 120 million U.S. dollars. The odds were that the Thai team would win by more than 3 goals. 1:37.5, paying out more than RMB 28 billion in bonuses. Bookmaker CEO Bob Reeves said the game was a blatant scam and that gamblers directly manipulated the outcome of the game.

text: [Lightning] A new version of counterfeit currency is here again. The beginning is CE86 and CH31, and this time the simulation level exceeds the HD90 version. 100 yuan banknotes starting with numbers CE86, CH31, HB90, and WJ1 are all counterfeit. 50 yuan banknotes with serial numbers beginning with FA are all counterfeit. The 10 yuan coins starting with AB77, AB88, and AB99 are all fake coins. Please forward them to your friends to let more people know.

chinese_text: 《央视焦点访谈》可口可乐承认旗下(果粒橙)含有美国禁用农药「多菌灵」，多菌灵可致脑麻痺、肝脏腫瘤等癌症。包括香港正在销售的（果粒橙），香港食环署正在了解此事件。 专家指出，（多菌灵）跟其他农药一样，对脑部影响最大，可引致局部麻痹，并会导致癌症。 请火速转给你的朋友，别再喝这种饮料。
text: "CCTV Focus Interview" Coca-Cola admitted that its Orange brand contains the pesticide "carbendazim" banned in the United States. Carbendazim can cause cerebral palsy, liver tumors and other cancers. Including (fruit oranges) being sold in Hong Kong, the Hong Kong Food and Environmental Hygiene Department is learning about this incident. Experts point out that (carbendazim), like other pesticides, has the greatest impact on the brain, can cause local paralysis, and can lead to cancer. Please tell your friends immediately and stop drinking this drink.

text: Yesterday, a woman jumped from the building of Shenyin & Wanguo Securities Co., Ltd. in Wenzhou. The stock market plummeted, investors were desperate, and the stock market crashed, which was very spectacular. A stock, a "brick" makes life fall vertically. From now on, in this world, people in this world, jumping off buildings and drowning in rivers, are considered to be the greatest pleasures in life! chinese_text: #新闻#【果粒橙事件：少喝饮料多喝水】央视《焦点访谈》播出：可口可乐承认旗下(果粒橙)含有农药多菌灵。多菌灵在美国是违法的，但在国内属合法，属于农药中的“低毒”，已经喝了就不用太担心了。孕妈、哺乳妈妈、备孕妈妈以及小盆友们，少喝加工饮料、多喝白开水，减少添加剂、残留农药等摄入风险~
text: #news# [Orange Incident: Drink Less Beverages and Drink More Water] CCTV’s “Focus Interview” broadcast: Coca-Cola admitted that its (Orange) product contains the pesticide carbendazim. Carbendazim is illegal in the United States, but it is legal in China. It is a "low-toxicity" pesticide, so you don't have to worry too much if you have already drank it. Pregnant mothers, nursing mothers, mothers preparing for pregnancy, and friends with young children should drink less processed drinks and more boiled water to reduce the risk of intake of additives, residual pesticides, etc. ~

chinese_text: 【赶紧牢记下】新交规施行：闯红灯记6分，罚100元。酒驾记12分、5年内不得再考取驾照。不系安全带记3分，罚100元。副驾不系安全带记1分，罚50元。行驶中抽烟记1分，罚100元。有意遮挡号牌记12分，顶额处罚。超速驾驶记6分。副驾驶有不满14周岁乘坐的记6分，罚300元。
text: [Hurry and remember this] New traffic regulations are implemented: running a red light will result in 6 points and a fine of 100 yuan. Drunk driving will result in 12 points and you will not be allowed to obtain a driver's license again within 5 years. Failure to wear a seat belt will result in 3 points and a fine of 100 yuan. If the passenger does not wear a seat belt, he will be deducted 1 point and fined 50 yuan. Smoking while driving will be deducted 1 point and fined 100 yuan. Intentionally blocking the number plate will be worth 12 points and the maximum penalty. 6 points for speeding. If the co-pilot is under 14 years old, he will be deducted 6 points and fined 300 yuan.

chinese_text: 【美国调查发现易拉罐上的细菌比马桶多】一妇女喝了罐饮料,被送进医院,离开了世界.验尸死于於细螺旋体病,追踪她喝的饮料,是直接用罐对嘴饮用.实验证明罐头受到鼠尿感染细螺旋体病毒.鼠尿含有毒性和致命物质.因罐头运输过程没有清洗的.喝易拉罐一定要用吸管！请转给你关心的朋友。[可怜]
text: [A U.S. survey found that there were more bacteria on cans than on toilet bowls] A woman drank a can of beverage and was sent to the hospital and passed away. The autopsy revealed that she died of leptospirosis and the trace of the beverage she drank showed that she drank it directly from the can to her mouth. Experiments have shown that cans are infected with Leptospira virus from rat urine. Rat urine contains toxic and lethal substances. Because cans are not cleaned during transportation, you must use a straw when drinking from cans! Please forward it to your concerned friends. [Pitiful]

chinese_text: 【台湾愿意回归大陆,条件看好啦!】马英九：如果大陆方面解除党禁报禁，台湾政党将赴大陆参选大中华区国家总统、内阁总理等职位，大陆和台湾统一将不存在任何障碍。台湾没有独立倾向，如果大陆实现民选政治普世价值观，台湾没有理由拒绝和大陆统一，并表示‘希望对岸在人权自由上取得进步是统一的前提
text: [Taiwan is willing to return to the mainland, and the conditions are promising!] Ma Ying-jeou: If the mainland lifts the ban on political parties and newspapers, Taiwanese political parties will go to the mainland to run for president, prime minister and other positions in the Greater China region. There will be no obstacles to the reunification of the mainland and Taiwan. Taiwan has no tendency to become independent. If the mainland realizes the universal values of democratically elected politics, Taiwan has no reason to refuse reunification with the mainland, saying that it hopes that the other side of the Taiwan Strait will make progress in human rights and freedoms as a prerequisite for reunification.

chinese_text: 他曾被关压27年，受尽虐待。就任总统时，邀请三名虐待过他的看守到场。当其起身恭敬地向看守致敬时，在场所有人乃至整个世界都安静了。他说：当我走出囚室，迈过通往自由的监狱大门时，我已经清楚，自己若不能把悲痛与怨恨留在身后，那么我仍在狱中。今天曼德拉走了，以此故事吊唁这位心胸似海的伟人。
text: He was imprisoned for 27 years and suffered all kinds of abuse. When he took office as president, he invited three guards who had abused him to be present. When he stood up and respectfully saluted the guards, everyone present and even the entire world fell silent. He said: When I walked out of the cell and stepped through the prison door leading to freedom, I already knew that if I couldn't leave my grief and resentment behind, I would still be in prison. Today Mandela passed away, and this story is a tribute to this great man with a heart as big as the sea.

chinese_text: 河南一妇女为了给孩子凑钱治病，上街卖盗版CD，被城管发现后逃跑，CD被缴后跳入冰冷的水中躲避，城管还不肯放过她，要她把非法所得也交出来，她百般向城管哀求，这是孩子的救命钱，城管丝毫不为所动，不交钱就不许上岸，妇女在水中冻了两个小时，最后昏死过去
text: In order to raise money for her child's medical treatment, a woman in Henan went to the street to sell pirated CDs. She was discovered by the city management and ran away. After the CD was confiscated, she jumped into the cold water to escape. The city management refused to let her go and asked her to hand over her illegal gains. She begged the city management in every possible way, saying that this was the child's life-saving money. The city management was unmoved and would not allow her to go ashore unless she paid the money. The woman froze in the water for two hours and finally passed out.

text: [Don’t buy fish that are too active] When I went to buy fish, I saw a shocking scene. The vendor added a white powder into the water basin and quickly stirred it with his hands. After a while, the white powder did not dissolve, and the half-dead fish and shrimp were dissolved. Pour it into it, and it will jump away in a while, as if it was just caught from the river. This is a catalyst that can cause cancer, commonly known as fish floating spirit, and it also affects intelligence. Tell each other, it is necessary to let more people know!

chinese_text: 中国开始立法实行一妻多夫制：鉴于中国男多女小，相关部门开始制定措施。实行一妻多夫制，由于现在90后男女比相差太大，如果按照以前的一夫一妻制度，将会有38.86%的男性会单身，这样会导致21世纪新一轮的“离婚热”这次将是离婚率最大的一次，实行一妻多夫制，这样可以避免38.86%的男性遭遇“无妻烦恼
text: China has begun to legislate polyandry: in view of the fact that there are many men and women in China, relevant departments have begun to formulate measures. Polyandry is implemented. Since the male-to-female ratio of the post-90s generation is now too different, if the previous monogamy system was followed, 38.86% of men would be single, which would lead to a new round of "divorce fever" in the 21st century. This time will be the one with the highest divorce rate. The implementation of polyandry will prevent 38.86% of men from suffering from the "wifeless troubles".

text: #polyandry# was jointly decided by China’s Ministry of Personnel, the Standing Committee, and representatives of the Political Consultative Conference, and stipulated in the Chinese Constitution and Marriage Law. Starting from August 26, 2013, polyandry can be practiced, and it can also be obtained from government departments According to the corresponding subsidies, if there is a major conflict between the "husband" in the family, the wife has the right to divorce any man. This has also virtually improved the status of women in our country. Therefore, the phenomenon of "stepping in on the other side" may become common in the future.

chinese_text: 【吴其轺】1943年加入飞虎队，对日飞行作战800小时，击落5架日机，4次成功飞越死亡之线，自身也曾被击落过3次，都死里逃生。1949年收到家书，当年12月辗转从香港到北京，任职南苑机场教官。大难不死的他却没逃过1950年镇反运动而入狱，74年方才出狱，一代飞虎，沦落到蹬三轮车养老的地步……
text: [Wu Qijin] joined the Flying Tigers in 1943, flew 800 hours against Japan, shot down 5 Japanese planes, successfully crossed the line of death 4 times, and was shot down 3 times, all of which escaped death. I received a letter from home in 1949, and in December of that year I moved from Hong Kong to Beijing to work as an instructor at Nanyuan Airport. Although he survived the catastrophe, he did not escape the anti-counterrevolutionary movement in 1950 and was imprisoned. He was just released from prison in 1974. A generation of flying tigers was reduced to riding a tricycle to support his retirement...

chinese_text: 她是非诚勿扰的女嘉宾，她叫王佳，她今年32岁了，她是西安人，她是出版社的编辑，她在2012年5月结婚，她婚后两个月就杀了人，她杀的人是自己熟睡中的老公，她身手敏捷只用了两刀，她思维敏捷还制造了家暴假象......回顾整理一下：5月结婚，7月杀夫，8月产子，9月火化。
text: She is the female guest of If You Are the One, her name is Wang Jia, she is 32 years old, she is from Xi'an, she is the editor of a publishing house, she got married in May 2012, and she killed someone two months after her marriage. The person she killed was her sleeping husband. She was agile and only used two knives. She was quick-thinking and even created the illusion of domestic violence... To review: she got married in May, killed her husband in July, and gave birth to a child in August. , cremated in September.

chinese_text: 朋友们听好了！⚠⚠公安部.张育铭，特别提醒，若有人在路上接近你，向你推销福建安溪铁观音，又让你闻一下，你一定注意不要上.当！那是观音土，是种迷-昏-药，一闻即晕！作.案时，轻者劫.财劫色，重者杀害高价出售器官！非常残忍，现在已经在广东，河北，黑龙江，天津等省市出现了！

chinese_text: 【板门店谈判真相】板门店谈判前彭徳怀要求在铁原挡美军两星期，结果只挡了两天，63军3万多人打得只剩1400人。志愿军守上甘岭， 美军假装佯攻，实际是运用优势火炮诱敌集中大量歼敌。最终美军伤亡400多人，美军清点志愿军遗尸3万7千。美国民众大骂指挥官为屠夫，间接促成和谈。
text: [The truth about the Panmunjom negotiations] Before the Panmunjom negotiations, Peng Dehuai asked to block the US military in Cheorwon for two weeks, but he only blocked it for two days. The 63rd Army defeated more than 30,000 people and only 1,400 people were left. The volunteers defended Shangganling, and the US military pretended to attack, but actually used its superior artillery to lure the enemy to concentrate and annihilate them in large numbers. In the end, the US military suffered more than 400 casualties, and the US military counted 37,000 volunteer corpses. The American people called the commander a butcher, indirectly promoting peace talks.

chinese_text: 鸠山参观南京大屠杀纪念馆引起争议。据日语维基百科记载，南京大屠杀纪念馆是时任日本社民党委员长田边诚1980年访问南京时，提出要建设的。并捐赠了3千万日元的资金。纪念馆的设计者也是日本人。3千万元中只有870万日元用于建设，其余使途。。。。。。？
text: Hatoyama's visit to the Nanjing Massacre Memorial Hall caused controversy. According to the Japanese Wikipedia, the Nanjing Massacre Memorial Hall was proposed to be built by Makoto Tanabe, then chairman of the Japanese Social Democratic Party, when he visited Nanjing in 1980. And donated 30 million yen. The designer of the memorial hall is also Japanese. Only 8.7 million yen of the 30 million yen was used for construction, and the rest was used for other purposes. . . . . . ?

chinese_text: 大家買牙膏請留心,注意牙膏管反面底部的顏色條,因为顏色條是有含意的。盡量選擇*綠色*和*藍色*，共分4種； *綠色*：純天然； *藍色*：天然+藥物； *紅色*：天然+化學成份； *黑色*：純化學 國内的兒童牙膏居然大多是純化學的，真是不可思议！
text: When buying toothpaste, please pay attention to the color bar at the bottom on the back of the toothpaste tube, because the color bar has meaning. Try to choose *green* and *blue*, divided into 4 types; *green*: pure natural; *blue*: natural + medicine; *red*: natural + chemical ingredients; *black*: pure chemical domestic children It’s incredible that most toothpastes are purely chemical!

chinese_text: 【杭州出现新公交骗局】杭州最近发生了系列高级骗局，乘公交车的亲人们警惕哦。骗子最新手法：在公交车上，三人一组，三个骗子围坐在你周围，借机把手机放在你手袋或衣袋中，之后就说不见手机了。骗子借同伙致电自己手机时，你袋里的手机就会响起，令你变成小偷，屈你钱。在杭州的朋友要当心了！（转）
text: [New bus scams appear in Hangzhou] A series of advanced scams have recently occurred in Hangzhou. Relatives who take buses should be careful. The latest trick of scammers: On the bus, in a group of three, three scammers sit around you, take the opportunity to put your mobile phone in your handbag or pocket, and then say that the mobile phone is missing. When a scammer borrows his friend's phone to call him, the phone in your pocket will ring, turning you into a thief and taking your money. Friends in Hangzhou, beware! (change)

chinese_text: 李盟盟，21岁，河南开封县陈留四中学生，今年高考565分。因县招办失职把她的志愿 申请锁在柜子忘了提交，造成任何大学都上不成。河南省高招办回应，此事不予处理！ 李盟盟是农村孩子，为供其上学妹妹辍学打工，父亲打工摔断了腿。你的一次转发也许 就能帮她改变命运！试试能否创造奇迹！  ！
text: Li Mengmeng, 21 years old, is a student of Chenliu No. 4 Middle School in Kaifeng County, Henan Province. He scored 565 in this year’s college entrance examination. Because the county admissions office was negligent and locked her application in a cabinet and forgot to submit it, she was unable to get into any college. The High Recruitment Office of Henan Province responded that the matter will not be handled! Li Mengmeng is a child from a rural area. He dropped out of school and worked to support his younger sister in school. His father broke his leg while working. Your forwarding may be able to help her change her destiny! See if you can create a miracle! !

chinese_text: 【国有资产对财政贡献几何？】政协副主席黄孟复：现国有资产有100多万亿，加金融、国资近140万亿，这么多国有资产。去年财政报表上，国有资产经营收入800亿，其中700多亿返还给国有企业，解决国有企业困难，最后上缴财政就70亿。100多万亿国资，最终上缴财政的才70多亿。 @思想汇聚人生
text: [What is the contribution of state-owned assets to the finance? 】Huang Mengfu, Vice Chairman of the Chinese People’s Political Consultative Conference: The current state-owned assets are more than 100 trillion, and the financial and state-owned assets are nearly 140 trillion. There are so many state-owned assets. According to last year's financial statements, the operating income from state-owned assets was 80 billion, of which more than 70 billion was returned to state-owned enterprises to solve the difficulties of state-owned enterprises. In the end, 7 billion was handed over to the government. Of the more than 100 trillion state-owned assets, only more than 7 billion was finally handed over to the government. @thoughts gather life

chinese_text: 【南京大屠杀纪念馆】今天迎来第三位日本前首相鸠山由纪夫的参拜。该馆1981年由日本社会党委员长田边诚倡议修建，当时中国政府以资金缺乏为由反应冷淡，田边诚随即筹集了30万美元交给南京市。1982年中央在田边诚的再三请求下同意作为爱国基地修建，设计师中包括日本人。85年邓小平题名开张。06年扩建。
text: [Nanjing Massacre Memorial Hall] Today we welcomed the third former Japanese Prime Minister Yukio Hatoyama to pay homage. The museum was built on the initiative of Makoto Tanabe, chairman of the Japanese Socialist Party, in 1981. At that time, the Chinese government responded indifferently due to lack of funds. Tanabe Makoto immediately raised US$300,000 and handed it over to Nanjing. In 1982, the central government agreed to build it as a patriotic base at the repeated request of Makoto Tanabe, and the designers included Japanese. It was opened in 1985 under the title of Deng Xiaoping. Expanded in 2006.

During the investigation by the British police, Zhong Zhiming detected the victim's address and mobile phone number in the UK in China, issued a death threat, sent someone to the UK to follow the threat, and expressed his willingness to pay 4 million in exchange for the woman withdrawing the case.
