text: [More than 200 sanitation workers in Guangzhou took to the streets to demand a salary increase and clashed with the police] Recently, more than 200 sanitation workers gathered at the intersection of Zhongshan 7th Road and Liwan Road in Liwan District, Guangzhou to demand a salary increase. An emotional ordinary citizen stood up for the sanitation workers. After shouting excitedly, he was taken into a police car by the police, which provoked the sanitation workers to surround the police car. It is reported that the minimum monthly salary for sanitation workers who do dirty work is only about 1,100 yuan. PS: Support a wage increase for sanitation workers. . .

text: [Emergency search for the owner of the ticket [microphone][microphone][microphone][microphone]] A kind-hearted person picked up a wallet on the 689 bus in Huizhou, which contained an ID card, a driver's license, and three train tickets from Huizhou to Wuchang on January 25. Their names are Chen Cuizhen, Gao Yanlin, and Zhang Xinyuan. After multiple inquiries, the owner may be a Hubei national working in Huizhou or Dongguan. The owner is asked to contact 0752-2180812. With a little effort, it can be forwarded and spread to help the owner and his family reunite smoothly.

chinese_text: 求证：【轮奸12岁少女的干部 为何免刑事处分？】昨晚8时30分，略阳县委召开常委会决定对郭镇党委书记、镇长、纪委书记等领导干部给予党内严重警告处分，略阳县人劳社保局对涉嫌犯罪的郭镇干部赵某、蒋某作出停职决定。但是我要问了，轮奸未成年少女，为何免刑事处分？谁来给个说法？

The Lueyang County Labor and Social Security Bureau issued Guo Town cadres suspected of crimes Zhao and Jiang made the decision to suspend their duties. But I have to ask, why is gang rape of an underage girl exempt from criminal punishment? Who can give an explanation?

text: New high school freshmen, after failing well in the exam, you will have to take the national test, and there will be no distinction between arts and science. There are nine subjects in total. I wish you happiness! For new high school sophomores, the HKCEE will be more difficult and the proctoring will be more difficult. The HKCEE results will be included in the total score of the college entrance examination. I wish you happiness! For the new high school seniors, English listening and physical education have been added to the total score! I wish you happiness! Congratulations to the new graduates, we are so honored that we haven't caught up yet, go home, eat noodles and work hard! Don’t let down the blessing God has given us!

chinese_text: 天津、北京、山东、江苏、发出警示！ 隐翅虫，也叫青腰虫，若在你身上时绝对不要打，她身上有 毒液，接触到皮肤，就死定了！ 跟你的孩 子、朋友讲，万一身上有这虫，用嘴巴轻轻 吹走就好。绝对不要用手打. 医师强调,如果 每个收到这份邮件的人,能够转发给其他 人,肯定至少有一条生命将会被挽救回来
text: Tianjin, Beijing, Shandong, and Jiangsu issue warnings! The cryptid, also called the green-rumped worm, must not be hit if it is on you. It has venom on it and will be dead if it comes into contact with the skin! Tell your children and friends that if you have this bug on your body, just blow it away with your mouth. Never hit with your hands. The doctor emphasized that if everyone who receives this email can forward it to others, at least one life will definitely be saved.

chinese_text: 在德国，汽车、公司都无需年检。 问德国人：汽车不年检，坏了怎么办？ 答：自己修车。 问：德国政府为何不强制年检？ 德国人反问：谁给了政府这个权力？如果政府对年检感兴趣，说明这种事对它有好处。
text: In Germany, cars and companies do not need annual inspections. Ask the Germans: If the car is not inspected annually, what should I do if it breaks down? Answer: Repair the car yourself. Question: Why doesn’t the German government mandate annual inspections? The Germans asked: Who gave the government this power? If the government is interested in annual inspections, it means that this kind of thing is good for it.

chinese_text: 朋友妈妈在公交捡到了个钱包，里面有两张身份证，驾驶证，和三张1月25号惠州到武昌的火车票，名字分别是陈翠珍，高艳林，张馨元。春运期间，不知道失主花了多少功夫买这三张卧铺票，没了身份证如何回家过年，一定急疯了。转发举手之劳。 (联系:陈珉岩 13006609059) @紫色浪漫小白 @温柔善良33 @李平
text: My friend's mother found a wallet on the bus, which contained two ID cards, a driver's license, and three train tickets from Huizhou to Wuchang on January 25. Their names were Chen Cuizhen, Gao Yanlin, and Zhang Xinyuan. During the Spring Festival travel period, I don’t know how much effort the owner spent to buy these three sleeper tickets. chinese_text: 广州32岁的杨吃货昨日早晨7点24分抢救无效死于休克,全身皮肤呈黑紫色.州医三院神经内科医生康博士告诉记者,这是肺鼠疫,死亡率非常高.医生断定这是杨姐昨日吃猫引起的,但家属称他们吃的猫绝无鼠疫症状,为此记者请教了传染病教授陈菊梅.原来,猫自身有抗鼠疫的免疫故不易被感染,但鼠疫杆菌会残留在体内.
text: Yang Chihuo, a 32-year-old man from Guangzhou, died of shock at 7:24 yesterday morning after resuscitation failed. His skin all over his body turned black and purple. Dr. Kang, a neurologist at the Third Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University, told reporters that this was pneumonic plague and the mortality rate was very high. The doctor concluded that it was pneumonic plague. Sister Yang was infected by eating cats yesterday, but her family members said that the cats they ate had no symptoms of plague. This reporter asked Chen Jumei, a professor of infectious diseases. It turns out that cats have their own immunity against plague and are not easily infected, but the Yersinia pestis bacteria will remain in the in vivo.

chinese_text: [双休日原来是这么来的] 1994年前后，中美入世谈判最艰难的时刻，美方突然向中方提出：在全世界都实行双休日的今天，中国必须尊重人权，也给中国人双休日，并把这一项作为入世条件之一。于是，1995年5月1日起，我国开始实行双休日工作制。
text: [This is how weekend holidays originally came about] Around 1994, at the most difficult moment of Sino-US accession negotiations, the United States suddenly proposed to China: Today, when weekends are observed all over the world, China must respect human rights and give Chinese people weekend days, and make this a priority. as one of the conditions for accession to the WTO. Therefore, from May 1, 1995, my country began to implement a weekend working system.

Half an hour later, her family found the girl, her internal organs were removed, and she was sent to a hospital in Huainan. They refused to accept her and sent her to a hospital in Huainan. chinese_text: 想想222】主权在民，才有人权。98年，有三名福建工人在以色列被炸死！以政府找到中国使馆商议赔偿及处理后事，中使馆以三名工人是偷渡客为由不予理睬！以政府对此硬是一查到底，后来不远万里来到福建，把受害者骨灰交到家属手中、向三名受害者各赔了70万美元。这钱后来还被我们政府收了每人18万的税！
text: Think about it 222】Sovereignty lies with the people, only then can we have human rights. In 1998, three Fujian workers were bombed to death in Israel! The government approached the Chinese Embassy to discuss compensation and funeral arrangements, but the Chinese Embassy ignored the three workers on the grounds that they were stowaways! The Israeli government insisted on investigating this and later traveled thousands of miles to Fujian to deliver the victims' ashes to their families and compensate each of the three victims US$700,000. This money was later collected by our government at a tax of 180,000 per person!

chinese_text: 重庆市人民政府新闻办公室发布公告称：肖烨等人采取色情勾引、秘拍不雅视频等手段,敲诈数名党政干部和国有企业负责人,肖烨等人已被批准逮捕。官员被免职。重庆，您想转移话题？@老榕 @谓贤 @元芳视角

Xiao Ye and others have been approved for arrest. Officials were dismissed. Chongqing, you want to change the topic? @老榕@伟贤@元方perspective

chinese_text: 【崔永元:年检政府[赞]】在德国，汽车、公司都无需年检。我问德国人：汽车不年检，坏了怎么办？答：自己修。问：企业不年检，公司乱搞怎么办？答：你看德国是这样的吗？问：德国政府为何不强制年检？反问：谁给了政府这个权力？如果政府对年检感兴趣，说明这种事对它有好处。为什么不去年检政府？
text: [Cui Yongyuan: Annual Inspection Government [Like]] In Germany, cars and companies do not require annual inspections. I asked the Germans: If the car is not inspected annually, what should I do if it breaks down? Answer: Fix it yourself. Question: What should I do if the company does not conduct annual inspections and the company messes up? Answer: Do you think Germany is like this? Question: Why doesn’t the German government mandate annual inspections? Rhetorical question: Who gave the government this power? If the government is interested in annual inspections, it means that this kind of thing is good for it. Why didn't you indict the government last year?

chinese_text: 她，本是花样年华，可以花前月下，但她扛起了反腐重任，承担了一个弱女子不该的责任。在12个月的时间里,分别和雷政富、九龙坡区委书记彭智勇,璧山县委书记范明文,西南证券董事长罗广,长寿区区长韩树明,重庆城投副总经理粟志光等6人走完了上床、拍片、捉奸的全套流程，她是赵红霞！为反腐写下经典篇章
text: She was originally in the Mood for Love, and could spend her time there, but she shouldered the heavy responsibility of anti-corruption and took on responsibilities that a weak woman should not have. Within 12 months, he worked with Lei Zhengfu, Jiulongpo District Party Committee Secretary Peng Zhiyong, Bishan County Party Committee Secretary Fan Mingwen, Southwest Securities Chairman Luo Guang, Changshou District Mayor Han Shuming, Chongqing Urban Investment Deputy General Manager Su Zhiguang and other 6 After a person has gone through the entire process of having sex, filming, and catching an adulterer, she is Zhao Hongxia! Write a classic chapter in the fight against corruption

chinese_text: 她，没有编制，没有财政拨款，没有固定办公场所，靠一人之力，扛反腐重任，已拿下11位厅级贪官，还有近20位即将归案，战斗力远超地市级检察院。——记年度“全国反腐创先争优先进个人”赵红霞同志。
text: She has no establishment, no financial allocation, and no fixed office space. She relies on one person to shoulder the heavy responsibility of anti-corruption. She has taken down 11 department-level corrupt officials, and nearly 20 more are about to be brought to justice. Her combat effectiveness far exceeds that of the prefecture-level and municipal procuratorates. ——Comrade Zhao Hongxia is remembered as one of the “National Anti-Corruption Pioneers” of the year.

chinese_text: 赵红霞，你不要编制，不靠拨款，没有两规措施，没有组织后援，靠一人之力，凭一张床，扛反腐重任，已拿下11位厅级贪官，还有20位高官已锁定目标，你让纪委、反贪局的同志情何以堪?
text: Zhao Hongxia, you don’t need establishment, you don’t rely on appropriations, you don’t have two regulations, you don’t have organizational back-up, you rely on one person and one bed to carry out the heavy task of anti-corruption, and you have captured 11 department-level corrupt officials, and 20 senior officials have been targeted. , how can you embarrass the comrades of the Discipline Inspection Commission and the Anti-Corruption Bureau?

chinese_text: 君子坦荡荡,小人玩红霞；商女不知亡国恨,一天到晚玩红霞；举头望明月,低头玩红霞；洛阳亲友如相问，就说我在玩红霞；少壮不努力，老大玩红霞；垂死病中惊坐起,今天还想玩红霞；生当作人杰，死亦玩红霞；人生自古谁无死，来生继续玩红霞；众里寻他千百度，蓦然回首，那人正在玩红霞。@左小祖咒
text: A gentleman is magnanimous, but a villain plays with the red clouds; a businesswoman does not know the hatred of her country's subjugation, and plays with the red clouds all day long; she raises her head to look at the bright moon, and lowers her head to play with the red clouds; when relatives and friends in Luoyang ask each other, they say I am playing with the red clouds; a young man does not work hard. , the boss played with Hongxia; he sat up in shock when he was dying, and he still wants to play with Hongxia today; he was born as a great man, and even after death he played with Hongxia; since ancient times, no one has died, and he will continue to play with Hongxia in the next life; people searched for him thousands of times, and suddenly he appeared Looking back, the man was playing with Hongxia. @zuoxiaozucurse

text: 【Train box lunch only costs 5 yuan! Have you eaten? 】Recently, "Xinwen Lianbo" cctv reporter boarded the train in person and reported that the things on the train are not expensive at all#trainbox meal5元#! If migrant workers are not full, they can also add rice! Netizen: "How did the CCTV reporter buy the train ticket? Can you please stop being ridiculous? Have the people who broadcast the news broadcast never taken a train?"

chinese_text: 你们都错了，字幕打错了，配音也配错了，不是5块钱的盒饭，是5块钱的饭盒。
text: You are all wrong, the subtitles are wrong, the dubbing is also wrong, it is not a 5 yuan lunch box, it is a 5 yuan lunch box.

chinese_text: 他们都坐飞机！—【火车盒饭只要5元！ 你吃过吗？】近日，《新闻联播》cctv记者亲身登上火车，报道火车上的东西一点都不贵#火车盒饭5元#！农民工朋友如果吃不饱，还可以加饭！网友："央视记者是怎么买到火车票的?、能不能别逗了？最便宜矿泉水都要五块以上，还能买盒饭？央视记者难道没做过火车？"
text: They all fly! —[Train lunch box only costs 5 yuan! Have you eaten? 】Recently, "Xinwen Lianbo" cctv reporter boarded the train in person and reported that the things on the train are not expensive at all#trainbox meal5元#! If migrant workers are not full, they can also add rice! Netizen: "How did a CCTV reporter buy a train ticket? Can you please stop being ridiculous? The cheapest mineral water costs more than five yuan, and you can also buy a box lunch? Have CCTV reporters never been on a train?"

chinese_text: [衰]【网传不实旧图，火车盒饭只要5元？】坐鸟10年火车，五元的盒饭见所未见闻所未闻，如今竟出现在央视的《新闻联播》里，记者报道火车上的东西一点都不贵！火车上的便民盒饭仅需5元！肉和菜都冒尖尖了只要5元！农民工朋友如果吃不饱还可以加饭！原来这一切都是假的……
text: [Bad] [Untrue old picture circulated on the Internet, train box lunch only costs 5 yuan? 】After riding the train for 10 years, the five-yuan lunch box was unheard of and unheard of. Now it appears on CCTV's "News Network". The reporter reported that the things on the train are not expensive at all! Convenience box lunches on the train only cost 5 yuan! Meats and vegetables are all top-notch and only cost 5 yuan! Migrant workers can also add rice if they are not full! It turns out that it was all fake...

chinese_text: 网上搜到的反腐巾帼英雄赵红霞靓照，撼动官场，感动中国，效率超过整个中纪委，中国反腐指明了方向，为全人类反腐斗争提供了中国模式。从此，"红霞反腐”应当像牛顿定律、欧式几何、凯恩斯主义、马克思主义一样，写入人类文明史。顶起来！
text: The beautiful photos of the anti-corruption heroine Zhao Hongxia found online have shaken the officialdom and moved China. Their efficiency exceeds that of the entire Central Commission for Discipline Inspection. China’s anti-corruption has pointed out the direction and provided a Chinese model for the anti-corruption struggle of all mankind. From now on, the "Hongxia Anti-corruption" should be written into the history of human civilization like Newton's laws, Euclidean geometry, Keynesianism, and Marxism. Top up!

chinese_text: #北京说事#坐鸟10年火车，五元的盒饭见所未见，闻所未闻，如今则个竟在央视上出现鸟。五元的盒饭啊，列车长还说，吃不饱还可以加饭。套用@郑渊洁 的话说：童话都不敢这么写。（两位大厨实在看不下去了~~）
text: #京说事# After 10 years of riding on the train, a five-yuan lunch box has never been seen or heard of, but now it actually appears on CCTV. It’s a five-yuan lunch box, and the train conductor also said that if you’re not full, you can add rice. To paraphrase @hengyuanjie: Even fairy tales would not dare to write like this. (The two chefs really can’t stand it anymore~~)

chinese_text: 【新闻联播：火车盒饭只要5元！ 你吃过吗？】《新闻联播》记者亲身登上火车，报道火车上的东西一点都不贵。网友吐槽："央视记者是怎么买到火车票的？"、"能不能别逗了？5元太能扯了！最便宜矿泉水都要五块以上，还能买盒饭？播新闻联播的人难道没做过火车？"
text: [News Network: Train lunch box only costs 5 yuan! Have you eaten? ] A reporter from "Xinwen Lianbo" personally boarded the train and reported that the things on the train were not expensive at all. Netizens complained: "How did CCTV reporters buy train tickets?", "Can you please stop being ridiculous? 5 yuan is too ridiculous! The cheapest mineral water costs more than 5 yuan, and you can also buy a lunch box? People who broadcast the news broadcast Have you never been on a train?"

chinese_text: 求证：1945年《中华民国和苏联加盟条约》约定50年以后中国收回海参崴。2001年， 中华人民共和国和俄罗斯联邦政府签订中俄条约，确认海参崴等150万平方公里被俄罗斯侵占的中国土地属于俄罗斯，中国大陆官方对海参崴用俄文音译：符拉迪沃斯托克，不过在台湾的中华民国政府依旧称呼海参崴。顾志坚文
text: Verification: The 1945 Treaty of Accession between the Republic of China and the Soviet Union stipulated that China would take back Vladivostok after 50 years. In 2001, the People's Republic of China and the Government of the Russian Federation signed a Sino-Russian treaty, confirming that Vladivostok and other 1.5 million square kilometers of Chinese land occupied by Russia belong to Russia. Mainland China officially uses the Russian transliteration of Vladivostok: Vladivostok, but The government of the Republic of China in Taiwan still calls Vladivostok. Gu Zhijianwen

chinese_text: 网爆“非洲牛郎门”恐再度井喷，数百女高官落入情色陷阱！本月初爆发的中石化“非洲牛郎门”丑闻尘埃未落，据提供服务的“奥巴马总统俱乐部”的员工证实，俱乐部老板魏某在每个房间都安装了针孔摄像头，出事后魏某带走了大量视频文件，如果他将这些文件公布，将会对涉事的数百女高官带来灭顶之灾。
text: The Internet explosion of the "African Cowherd Gate" may blow up again, and hundreds of female senior officials have fallen into an erotic trap! Sinopec’s “African Cowherd scandal” that broke out earlier this month has not yet settled. According to employees of the “President Obama Club” that provides services, the club’s owner, Mr. Wei, installed pinhole cameras in every room. After the incident, Mr. Wei took him away There are a large number of video files. If he releases these files, it will bring disaster to the hundreds of female senior officials involved.

chinese_text: 【我爸是市长】儿子打死同学，校长老师旁观。因为老师不让他们作弊，然后有位同学王某喊了句“不要打老师”。两天之后，这几名恶少找到了该学生，在学校里进行了毒打  恶少殴打王某时校长和3名老师冷眼旁观，最后该15岁初三学生被打死，三名凶手逃逸，打人者中有一位是市长的宝贝公子
text: [My dad is the mayor] My son beat his classmate to death while the principal and teachers looked on. Because the teacher didn't let them cheat, then a classmate named Wang shouted, "Don't hit the teacher." Two days later, these young men found the student and beat him severely in the school. The principal and three teachers looked on with cold eyes. In the end, the 15-year-old junior high school student was beaten to death. The three assailants escaped and the one who beat him was killed. There is one who is the mayor's precious son

chinese_text: 【2012感动中国——反腐斗士赵红霞】：她是一个女人，却睡了11位重庆高官； 她只用一张床单，却揭开了重庆反腐序幕； 她拿到的仅仅是劳动所得，却让贪官丢了亿万家财； 她不是党员，却深入虎穴反腐； 她是一个人在前线战斗，身后却站了千千万万站着说话不用腰疼的我们。她就是————赵红霞！！
text: [Moving China in 2012 - Anti-corruption fighter Zhao Hongxia]: She is a woman, but she slept with 11 senior officials in Chongqing; She only used a bed sheet, but she kicked off the anti-corruption in Chongqing; What she received was only the income from labor, but she let Corrupt officials have lost hundreds of millions of wealth; she is not a party member, but she goes deep into the tiger's den to fight corruption; she is fighting alone on the front line, but behind her are thousands of us who can stand and talk without pain in the back. She is——Zhao Hongxia! !

chinese_text: 【震惊：打死同学不留情 市长老爸来撑腰】因为老师不让学生考试作弊，几位作弊的准备对老师动手，同学王某喊了句"别打老师"。两天之后，这几名恶少找到了该学生，在学校里进行了冷酷的毒打 ，当时校长和3名老师竟然冷眼旁观，看着15岁初三学生被打死，三名凶手逃逸 @徐昕 视频http://t.cn/zYLeVAz
text: [Shocking: Beating classmates to death without mercy, the mayor’s father came to support them] Because the teacher did not allow students to cheat in the exam, several cheaters were ready to attack the teacher. Classmate Wang shouted, "Don't hit the teacher." Two days later, these villains found the student and brutally beat him in the school. At that time, the principal and three teachers looked on with cold eyes, watching the 15-year-old junior high school student being beaten to death, and the three murderers escaped @Xu Xin Video http ://t.cn/zYLeVAz

chinese_text: 赵红霞女士: 你创造了一次单兵作战就扳倒了10多名厅级贪官的骄人战绩。女人的一生应当这样度过，当回首往事的时候，她不至于因为虚度年华而痛悔，也不至于因为过去的碌碌无为而羞愧，在临死的时候，她能够说；我的整个生命和全部精力，都已献给世界上最壮丽的事业，-----为人类的反腐而斗争。
text: Ms. Zhao Hongxia: You have created an impressive record of bringing down more than 10 department-level corrupt officials in a single battle. A woman's life should be spent in this way. When she looks back on the past, she will not regret for wasting her years, nor will she be ashamed of her inaction in the past. When she is dying, she can say: My whole life and everything. All the energy has been dedicated to the most magnificent cause in the world - the fight against corruption for mankind.

chinese_text: 【忍住，别说脏话】人社部专家曾凯：欧美迪拜希腊等国由于给人民高福利待遇导致国家经济危机和国家危机，人民懒散无创造力的情况是大家有目共睹的，中国已经吸取这些经验和教训，决定适度给人民的生活施加压力，减低福利，不仅有利于提高人民的生成积极性，而且为国家提供更多的财政收入建设国家……
text: [Hold it, don’t say bad words] Zeng Kai, an expert from the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security: Countries such as Europe, the United States, Dubai, Greece, etc. have caused national economic and national crises due to high welfare benefits for their people. It is obvious to everyone that the people are lazy and uncreative. China has learned from these experiences. and lessons learned, the decision to moderately put pressure on people's lives and reduce welfare will not only help improve people's enthusiasm for life, but also provide the country with more fiscal revenue to build the country...

chinese_text: 98年，某国三名工人在以色列被炸死！以帝政府找到该国使馆商议赔偿及处理后事，该国使馆以三名工人是偷渡客为由不予理睬！以帝政府对此硬是一查到底，后来不远万里去到该国把受害者骨灰交到家属手中，向三名受害者各赔了70万美元。后来三名死者被该国政府每人收取18万的税！该死的以帝。
text: In 1998, three workers from a certain country were killed in a bombing in Israel! The Israeli imperial government approached the country's embassy to discuss compensation and funeral arrangements, but the country's embassy ignored them on the grounds that the three workers were stowaways! The Israeli imperial government insisted on investigating this, and later traveled thousands of miles to the country to deliver the victims' ashes to their families, and paid US$700,000 to each of the three victims. Later, the government of the country charged each of the three deceased people 180,000 yuan in taxes! God damn it.

chinese_text: @范炜 ：【“我爸是沈市长”打死同学 】江苏新沂市棋盘中学15岁的王振雨见班主任被殴打出头劝阻，2天后这3名学生找到他在校园将他打死，当时校长和3名老师在旁没有制止，因一打人者平日被同学称“沈市长”，其父在北京做官。江苏卫视新闻有误，但打人者系官二代无疑！新闻链接http://t.cn/hbzwum
text: @ Fan Wei: ["My dad is Mayor Shen" beat his classmate to death] Wang Zhenyu, 15, of Qipan Middle School in Xinyi City, Jiangsu Province, saw his class teacher being beaten and stepped forward to dissuade him. Two days later, three students found him on campus and beat him to death. At that time The principal and three teachers stood by and did not stop him, because the one who beat him was usually called "Mayor Shen" by his classmates, and his father was an official in Beijing. Jiangsu Satellite TV's news is wrong, but there is no doubt that the person who hit the man is a second-generation official! News link http://t.cn/hbzwum

text: [Shocking: Train lunch boxes only cost five yuan! You can also add meals for free! How many years have we been extorted by the Ministry of Railways! News Network broke the news that the official price of train lunches is only 5 yuan, and you can add rice if you are not full. But anyone who has taken a train knows that the price of the box lunch sold to us on the train is 15 yuan, and no additional meals are allowed. The Ministry of Railways not only withholds our free water but also sells us high-priced box lunches. Please @12315 Consumers Association intervene in this matter and return 5 yuan box lunch to passengers!

chinese_text: #关注#【火车盒饭只要5元！ 你吃过吗？】近日，cctv《新闻联播》的记者亲身登上火车，报道火车上的东西一点都不贵，火车盒饭5元！农民工朋友如果吃不饱，还可以加饭！网友：央视记者是怎么买到火车票的?能不能别逗了？最便宜矿泉水都要五块以上，还能买盒饭？播新闻联播的人难道没坐过火车？新浪安徽
text: # Follow #【Train box lunch only costs 5 yuan! text: [News Network: Train lunch box only costs 5 yuan! Have you eaten? ] A reporter from "Xinwen Lianbo" personally boarded the train and reported that the things on the train were not expensive at all. Netizens complained: "How did CCTV reporters buy train tickets?", "Can you please stop being ridiculous? 5 yuan is too ridiculous! The cheapest mineral water costs more than 5 yuan, and you can also buy a lunch box? People who broadcast the news broadcast Have you never been on a train?”

chinese_text: 【微博揭露：云南德宏党委书记酒驾肇事逃逸 致22岁女大学生身亡】1月31日20时，云南德宏芒市文体广电旅游局党组成员、书记黄双虎，酒驾致一女大学生死亡。目击者称：该车撞人后加速离去，姐弟两人1死1重伤，当时两个孩子被撞飞，擦着路边的树叶（高3米左右）飞出去20多米。双双头部着地，横仆在路面。
text: [Weibo reveals: Yunnan Dehong Party Committee Secretary was involved in a drunk driving hit-and-run that killed a 22-year-old female college student] At 20:00 on January 31, Huang Shuanghu, member and secretary of the Party Committee of the Mang City Culture, Sports, Radio, Television and Tourism Bureau in Dehong, Yunnan, was involved in a drunk driving incident that killed a female college student. Witnesses said: The car hit someone and sped off. One of the siblings was killed and the other was seriously injured. At that time, the two children were hit and flew more than 20 meters against the leaves on the roadside (about 3 meters high). Both of them landed on their heads, lying on the road.

chinese_text: 【7.6万箱含氯可口可乐流入市场】2月初，可口可乐山西饮料公司因管道改造，致使消毒用的含氯处理水混入9批次12万箱可口可乐中，目前确认76391箱流入市场。山西质监局调查事件时发现，该公司以维修电脑为由删除了2月4日到8日部分相关生产记录和全部电邮，关键证人被安排带薪休假。http://t.cn/zY4kOZE
text: [76,000 boxes of chlorine-containing Coca-Cola flowed into the market] In early February, Coca-Cola Shanxi Beverage Company's pipeline modification caused chlorine-containing treatment water for disinfection to be mixed into 9 batches of 120,000 boxes of Coca-Cola. Currently, 76,391 boxes have been confirmed to have flowed into the market. When the Shanxi Quality Supervision Bureau investigated the incident, it was found that the company deleted some relevant production records and all emails from February 4 to 8 on the pretext of repairing computers, and that key witnesses were placed on paid leave. http://t.cn/zY4kOZE

chinese_text: 轰动全国的安徽籍民工秦某在上海市长宁区新泾地区散落17600元遭哄抢，今查实，警方在秦某取款的银行处查实，秦某仅取款7600元，而非秦某谎称的17600元，而截至今日秦某的7600元已全部返还，所以剩下的一万元永远不可能出现了。秦某的演技，使得上海市民仅去电视台为其捐款就达三万余元。
text: Qin, a migrant worker from Anhui who caused a sensation across the country, was robbed of 17,600 yuan while he was scattering 17,600 yuan in Xinjing area, Changning District, Shanghai. Now it is confirmed that the police checked at the bank where Qin withdrew the money and found that Qin only withdrew 7,600 yuan, not the 17,600 that Qin falsely claimed. Yuan, and as of today, Qin’s 7,600 Yuan has been fully returned, so the remaining 10,000 Yuan will never appear. Qin's acting skills caused Shanghai residents to donate more than 30,000 yuan just to the TV station.

text: Starting at six o'clock this afternoon, all high-definition sensors will be activated. Failure to wear a seat belt in the passenger compartment will result in the same penalty. You will be fined 50 yuan for talking on the phone while driving, 200 yuan for flashing yellow, and 100 yuan for parking over the line. text: [The gang rape case of Li Shuangjiang’s son was settled? 】On the evening of the 25th, a certified blogger said: Li Guanfeng (Li Tianyi) was under 18 years old and committed the crime while in a state of drunkenness. chinese_text: 【和解坑了谁？】有消息称,李家及其他4名嫌疑人家长经与女孩父母长谈,受害人在得到包括落实北京户口工作及一套房产的补偿后已同意撤销控诉和解。尽管法律倡导和解李案和解也在预料中,但对一个"屡教不改"的"惯犯"说没他爹摆不平的事,却总归不是什么好事,我们不想增加仇恨撕裂社会,你也不能罩你儿一辈子!
text: [Who was cheated by reconciliation? 】It is reported that the Li family and the parents of the other four suspects had a long talk with the girl's parents, and the victim agreed to withdraw the complaint and settle the matter after receiving compensation including the implementation of Beijing household registration and a property. Although the law advocates for a settlement of Li's case, it is also expected, but it is not a good thing to tell a "habitual criminal" who has "repeatedly refused to change" his father's injustice. We don't want to increase hatred and tear apart the society, and you can't cover you up. Son for life!

chinese_text: 这是比李天一轮奸更大的新闻：经李天一及其4名嫌疑人家长奔走，最终联系上女孩父母，并进行“长谈”，受害人落实北京户口、工作、一套房产，达成和解，撤销控诉。轮奸是严重刑事犯罪，属公诉案件，私下允许和解吗？这不是权钱战胜法律吗？—— 李天一轮奸了受害人，金钱也轮奸了法律！
text: This is bigger news than Li Tianyi's rape: After Li Tianyi and the parents of the four suspects ran around, they finally contacted the girl's parents and had a "long talk." The victim secured her Beijing household registration, job, and property, reached a settlement, and canceled the Accusation. Gang rape is a serious criminal offense and is a public prosecution case. Is reconciliation allowed in private? Isn’t this the victory of power and money over the law? ——Li Tianyi raped the victim, and money also raped the law!

text: Recently, a group of photos of the tragic scene after a car accident in Nanjing and the traffic police throwing the victim's body into the car like livestock have gone viral on the Internet. chinese_text: 【为"爱"当"人肉奶粉罐" 香港海关查获第一起人体藏奶粉出境案】图为从该女子体内排出的奶粉包。3月1日晚，香港海关查获一起年青女子人体藏奶粉案件，涉案奶粉达2000克。该女2月29日入港，出于对孩子的“爱”，竟然无视特区法律，甘当“人肉奶粉罐”。目前，该案已移交香港海关缉奶部门作进一步侦办。
text: [For "love", Hong Kong Customs seized the first case of milk powder hidden in a human body and exported it from the country.] The picture shows the milk powder packet excreted from the woman's body. On the evening of March 1, Hong Kong Customs seized a case of milk powder hidden in the human body of a young woman, involving 2,000 grams of milk powder. The woman entered Hong Kong on February 29. Out of her "love" for her children, she ignored the laws of the SAR and became a "human flesh milk powder can". At present, the case has been handed over to the Milk Enforcement Department of the Hong Kong Customs for further investigation.

chinese_text: 我不相信这是真的！！河南郑州，76岁的菜农张全会，被一个从执法车上下来的男子连连扇脸。事后，他到处寻找打人者，只因想对他说一声：“我赶着毛驴车走了8个小时，到郑州卖红薯，只为给家中瘫痪两年的大儿子挣点买药钱。”
text: I don't believe this is true! ! In Zhengzhou, Henan, 76-year-old vegetable farmer Zhang Quanhui was slapped repeatedly in the face by a man who got off a law enforcement vehicle. Afterwards, he went around looking for the attacker because he wanted to say something to him: "I drove a donkey cart for 8 hours to sell sweet potatoes in Zhengzhou just to earn some money for medicine for my eldest son who has been paralyzed for two years. "

chinese_text: 周孝正：98年，三名福建工人在以色列被炸死，以政府找到中国使馆商议赔偿处理后事，中使馆以三人是偷渡客为由不予理睬，以政府对此硬是一查到底，不远万里来到福建，把受害者骨灰交到家属手中、向三名受害者各赔70万美元。这批钱后来还被我们的政府收了每人18万的税！转。求证！@隆裕太后 @高会民
text: Zhou Xiaozheng: In 1998, three Fujian workers were killed in a bombing in Israel. The Israeli government approached the Chinese Embassy to discuss compensation and funeral arrangements. The Chinese Embassy ignored the three people on the grounds that they were stowaways. The Israeli government insisted on investigating the matter. He traveled thousands of miles to Fujian, delivered the victims' ashes to their families, and paid US$700,000 to each of the three victims. This money was later collected by our government at a tax of 180,000 per person! change. Ask for proof! @皇太后@高会民

chinese_text: 摸奶节是中国云南双柏县鄂家镇彝族传统文化的庆典就是农历的7月14日、15日与16日这三天，包括外来的游人,如果在街上遇见喜欢的女子，都可以摸一摸女子的胸部。姑娘们表面躲躲闪闪，但决无责怪之意因为这是他们这个地区的百姓延续了1000多年的风俗。小伙子以摸到奶为吉祥，姑娘们以被摸奶为幸运和祝福!
text: The Breast Touching Festival is a traditional cultural celebration of the Yi people in Ejia Town, Shuangbai County, Yunnan Province, China. It falls on the three days of July 14th, 15th and 16th of the lunar calendar. Including foreign tourists, if you meet a woman you like on the street, you can Touch the woman's breasts. The girls were evasive on the surface, but they never meant to blame because this was a custom that the people in their area had continued for more than 1,000 years. Young men regard touching breasts as good luck, and girls regard having breasts touched as luck and blessing!

chinese_text: 红歌王为“李衙内轮奸案”请的76人律师团领队、法律大学副校长张爱国教授对媒体表示，李天一因第一个与被害女子发生性关系，不构成轮奸罪，只是以判罚较轻的强奸罪批捕，又一个“戴套不算强奸”的中国特色幽默出笼，不过这次是出自法学校长之口！有这类人渣当校长，法律大学还能培养出尊重法律学生吗？
text: Professor Zhang Aiguo, the leader of the 76-member legal team hired by the King of Popular Songs for the "Li Yanei gang rape case" and the vice president of the University of Law, told the media that because Li Tianyi was the first to have sex with the victim, it did not constitute a crime of gang rape, but he was sentenced to a lighter punishment. Arrests for rape have been announced, and another piece of humor with Chinese characteristics has emerged, saying "wearing a condom does not count as rape", but this time it comes from the mouth of the law school principal! With such a scumbag as president, can a law university still cultivate students who respect law?

chinese_text: 天明:[ 强奸的意思：不懂如何表达对女孩子的纯真爱情！] 公安大学李玫瑾教授也替李天一求情了，她说，小天一是个好孩子，他只是太淘气了，他是个激情的孩子，不懂如何表达对女孩子的纯真爱情！社会应该原谅他的过错，让他写个检讨，好好学习，上个清华或者哈佛甚么的，将来报效祖国！
text: Tianming: [The meaning of rape: I don’t know how to express my pure love for a girl! ] Professor Li Meijin of the Public Security University also interceded for Li Tianyi. She said that Xiao Tianyi was a good boy, but he was just too naughty. He was a passionate child and did not know how to express his pure love for girls! Society should forgive his mistakes, let him write a self-reflection, study hard, go to Tsinghua University or Harvard, and serve the motherland in the future!

All members of the legal team "worked together": Mr. Li was the first to have sexual relations with a woman, which did not constitute gang rape. He was only arrested for the crime of rape with a lighter punishment.

chinese_text: 人性已经崩溃到最低点了，婴儿大家都听过，但是婴儿汤我估计没有几个人听过，有一些畜生在骇人听闻的在烹制这种婴儿汤，据说很能补气养血，又能补阳气，有人烹制就有人品尝，我不知道你怎么能吃的下去，难道都不怕吃死你吗？希望你补一补你的人性吧。
text: Human nature has collapsed to its lowest point. Everyone has heard of babies, but I guess not many people have heard of baby soup. Some beasts are cooking this kind of baby soup in an appalling way. It is said that it can nourish qi and blood, and it can nourish the blood. Yang Qi, if someone cooks it, then someone will taste it. I don’t know how you can continue to eat it. Aren’t you afraid of eating it to death? I hope you can replenish your humanity.

chinese_text: 【国税总局：继续提高个税起征点没可能】全国政协会议分组讨论时继续呼吁提高个税起征点。国税总局副局长宋兰现场回应，将个税起征点提高到3000元已让纳税人从9000万人减少到3000万人，继续提高起征点没可能。宋兰称“不能简单的说税减老百姓就富了，而要看总体。”
text: [State Administration of Taxation: It is impossible to continue to raise the threshold for personal income tax] The group discussion at the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference continued to call for raising the threshold for personal income tax. Song Lan, deputy director of the State Administration of Taxation, responded on the spot that raising the individual tax threshold to 3,000 yuan has reduced the number of taxpayers from 90 million to 30 million, and it is impossible to continue to raise the threshold. Song Lan said, “We cannot simply say that tax cuts will make people rich, but we must look at the overall situation.”

chinese_text: 【第一个上不是轮奸】李双江之子李天一涉嫌强奸罪被批捕。李的76人律师团领队、法律大学副校长张爱国教授对媒体表示，李天一因是第一个与被害女子发生关系,所以不构成轮奸罪,只是以判罚较轻的强奸罪批捕,这是律师团所有成员共同努力的结果。张教授的一番话,深受李家一致好评。记住啊,轮奸要第一个上！
text: [The first one is not a gang rape] Li Tianyi, son of Li Shuangjiang, was arrested on suspicion of rape. Professor Zhang Aiguo, the leader of Li's 76-member legal team and vice president of the Law University, told the media that because Li Tianyi was the first to have a relationship with the victim, it did not constitute a crime of gang rape. He was only arrested for the crime of rape with a lighter punishment. This is the lawyer team. The result of the joint efforts of all members. Professor Zhang’s words were well received by the Li family. Remember, you have to be the first to be gang-raped!

chinese_text: 一张记录邪恶的照片，血腥的一幕刺痛了所有人的心，年过古稀的老人在街头卖菜时被城管人员威严执法，当他捂着鲜血直流的伤口痛苦地蹲在地上时，怎么也想不通这些年龄跟自己孙子一般大的孩子为什么下手如此狠毒！举国上下都在整顿市容，底层生活只限于当权者纸上谈兵，繁华背后的肮脏又如何能清除得了！
text: A photo that records evil. The bloody scene stung everyone's heart. An old man who was over seventy years old was being strictly enforced by urban management officers while selling vegetables on the street. When he squatted on the ground in pain while covering his bleeding wound, what happened? I can’t understand why these children, who are as old as my own grandchildren, are so vicious! The whole country is rectifying the city's appearance, and the life of the lower class is limited to the words of those in power. How can the filth behind the prosperity be cleared away!

chinese_text: 揭露中國《地溝油》 的記者李翔，死了！ 他才 30歲就死了。 。 。 。 揭露地溝油的記者李翔，死了，身中10 餘刀，慘死。 他為全中國十多億人民的食品安全努力過。他付出了年輕的生命。 為了人們的健康，他付出了年輕的生命。我們能為他做的就是： 請動一下滑鼠，轉發，表達一下謝意。
text: Li Xiang, the reporter who exposed China’s “gutter oil” scandal, is dead! He died when he was only 30 years old. . . . Li Xiang, the reporter who exposed gutter oil, died tragically after being stabbed more than 10 times. He has worked hard for the food safety of more than one billion people in China. He gave his young life. He sacrificed his young life for people's health. What we can do for him is: please move your mouse, forward it, and express your gratitude.

chinese_text: 只是看图，看看这些人渣的行为！！！！
text: Just look at the pictures and see what these scum are doing! ! ! !

chinese_text: 李天一涉嫌强奸罪被批捕。李的76人律师团领队、法律大学副校长张爱国对媒体表示，【李天一因是第一个与被害女子发生关系，所以不构成轮奸罪，】只是以判罚较轻的强奸罪批捕，这是律师团所有成员共同努力的结果。真是将门无犬子啊。不知李将军参加两会没?有什么好提案?
text: Li Tianyi was arrested on suspicion of rape. Zhang Aiguo, the leader of Li's 76-member legal team and vice president of the Law University, told the media that [Li Tianyi was not guilty of gang rape because he was the first to have a relationship with the victim,] but was arrested for the crime of rape with a lighter punishment. This is what the lawyer said. The result of the joint efforts of all members of the group. It’s really a general without a dog. I wonder if General Li participated in the two sessions? Does he have any good proposals?

chinese_text: 【越南乳瓜】越南商务部发言人说：预计越南乳瓜2013年将全面流入中国的市场，流向中国千家万户的餐桌，你会想试下吃么？
text: [Vietnamese Milk Melon] A spokesman for the Ministry of Commerce of Vietnam said: It is expected that Vietnamese milk melon will flow into the Chinese market in 2013 and flow to the dining tables of thousands of Chinese households. Would you like to try it?

chinese_text: 【第一个上不是轮奸】李双江之子李天一涉嫌强奸罪被批捕。李的76人律师团领队、法律大学副校长张爱国教授对媒体表示,李天一因是第一个与被害女子发生关系,所以不构成轮奸罪,只是以判罚较轻的强奸罪批捕,这是律师团所有成员共同努力的结果。张教授的一番话,深受李家一致好评。记住啊,轮奸要第一个上!
text: [The first one is not a gang rape] Li Tianyi, the son of Li Shuangjiang, was arrested on suspicion of rape. Professor Zhang Aiguo, the leader of Li's 76-member legal team and Vice President of Law University, told the media that because Li Tianyi was the first to have a relationship with the victim, it did not constitute a crime of gang rape. He was only arrested for the crime of rape with a lighter penalty. This is the lawyer team The result of the joint efforts of all members. Professor Zhang’s words were well received by the Li family. Remember, you have to be the first to be gang-raped!

chinese_text: 有个朋友刚发了一个腾讯微博team挂了一个的消息，我想。。。没日没夜的努力，换来的不是安逸，不是平静，甚至不是世俗的酒色财气，却突然暴毙了，这样的人生，遗憾估计会很多吧。。。从前有个人，他从小就很努力，努力读书，努力工作，努力筹备未来，后来....他死了！亲们保重哦
text: A friend just posted a message about a Tencent Weibo team being down, I thought. . . Working hard day and night, what you get in exchange is not comfort, peace, or even worldly wine, sex, and wealth, but you suddenly die suddenly. In such a life, you will probably have a lot of regrets. . . There once was a man who worked hard since he was a child, studying hard, working hard, and preparing for the future. Later... he died! Dear friends, take care

chinese_text: 1996年在澳大利亚悉尼，一只野狗在水库大便，结果当地水务局鉴定水质污染，悉尼水业在电视台和报社打广告，告诉大家自来水被污染；2013年在中国上海，几千头死猪出现在黄浦江，结果当地水务局宣布水质没有问题...潘评：上海现在烧壶开水再加两片藕就是排骨汤，这生活多好啊！
text: In 1996 in Sydney, Australia, a wild dog defecated in a reservoir. As a result, the local water bureau determined that the water quality was contaminated. The Sydney Water Industry advertised on TV stations and newspapers to tell everyone that the tap water was contaminated; in 2013, in Shanghai, China, thousands of dead pigs appeared in Huangpu River, the local water bureau announced that there is no problem with the water quality... Pan Comment: In Shanghai, boil a kettle of water and add two slices of lotus root to make pork rib soup. What a great life!

chinese_text: 据爆料，给留几手、郑渊洁、何润东等每人10万元让他们在同一时间发微博黑苹果品牌的某公关公司受雇于三星。该公司相关人士此前和上述人士联系，询问是原创还是写好微博内容发给他们。留几手和郑渊洁都是玩笔头子的，但何润东这胸无点墨的坑爹货直接把私信内容中的发布时间也当成内容发出来了……（转）
text: According to reports, a public relations company that gave Liu Jishou, Zheng Yuanjie, Peter Ho and others 100,000 yuan each to post about the Apple brand on Weibo at the same time was employed by Samsung. Relevant people from the company had previously contacted the above-mentioned people and asked whether it was original or written Weibo content and sent to them. Both Liu Jishou and Zheng Yuanjie are good at writing, but Peter Ho, a clueless cheat, directly sent the release time in the private message as the content... (reposted)

chinese_text: 【爆料】给留几手、郑渊洁、何润东等10万元，让他们在同一时间发布微博黑苹果的微博的某公关公司，受雇于三星。公关公司就和上述人士有过联系，并询问过是原创，还是写好复制给他们。留几手和郑渊洁都是玩笔头子的，但何润东这胸无点墨的傻逼这次坑爹了，把私信内容的发布时间也当做内容发出来了。
text: [Breaking news] A public relations company that gave 100,000 yuan to Liu Jishou, Zheng Yuanjie, Peter Ho, etc. to post Black Apple on Weibo at the same time was employed by Samsung. The public relations company had contacted the above-mentioned people and asked whether it was original or whether it should be written and copied for them. Liu Jishou and Zheng Yuanjie are both good writers, but Peter Ho, an idiot with no ink, cheated on his father this time by treating the release time of the private message as the content.

chinese_text: 都跟你们说过很多次，微博草根大号都是营销账号，日常维护只是为了左右民意，粘合粉丝。想知道这次315他们都得到多少公关费用吗？何润东3W，郑渊洁3W，留几手4.5W。大家还记得作业本小鲁事件吗？

Do you want to know how much public relations fees they got for this 315? Peter Ho 3W, Zheng Yuanjie 3W, leaving a few hands with 4.5W. Do you still remember the Xiaolu incident in the homework book?

text: [The Big Bang Theory in Sydney] In 1996 in Sydney, Australia, a wild dog defecated in a reservoir. As a result, the local water bureau determined that the water quality was contaminated. chinese_text: 北京时间3月12日消息，在83版《西游记》中扮演孙悟空的演员六小龄童（章金莱），3月12日早上八点半病逝于浙江绍兴慈济医院，享年53岁。如果他给你的童年带去了无数欢乐，如果你觉得他是无可超越的经典，请默默的转发，让更多人祝愿猴哥·一路走好！[流泪]
text: According to news on March 12, Beijing time, actor Liu Xiaolingtong (Zhang Jinlai), who played Sun Wukong in the 1983 version of "Journey to the West", died of illness at 8:30 a.m. on March 12 at Tzu Chi Hospital in Shaoxing, Zhejiang. He was 53 years old. If he has brought countless joys to your childhood, and if you think he is an unsurpassed classic, please forward it silently, so that more people can wish Brother Monkey a good journey! [tears]

chinese_text: 中国最美丽的乡村"江西婺源"一"教师打死学生" 昨晚，在被誉为中国最美丽的乡村江西省婺源县清华中学发生了一起“老师打死学生”的校园暴力事件 。这一骇人听闻的消息引起了全社会的极大震惊，本应为人师表的教师，缘何致学生于死地？中国的教育 改革问题在不少地方容... http://t.cn/zY1QWp0
text: A "teacher beat a student to death" in China's most beautiful countryside "Wuyuan, Jiangxi Province" Last night, a school violence incident in which a "teacher beat a student to death" occurred in Tsinghua Middle School in Wuyuan County, Jiangxi Province, known as the most beautiful countryside in China. This appalling news caused great shock to the whole society. Why did a teacher who was supposed to be a role model cause the death of his students? China's education reform issues are contained in many places... http://t.cn/zY1QWp0

chinese_text: 1988年3月13日，四川石棉县发生森林火灾，石棉中学组织学生扑火，因火势太大，县里用车将学生强制送下山，学生周伟等三人强行下车执意不走，后火势蔓延，周伟和王海匆匆逃离，而另一学生高度近视，惶恐中在火海中罹难。县宣传部长原为罹难学生父亲部下，后将事迹通报中央，“赖宁的故事”广为传播。
text: On March 13, 1988, a forest fire broke out in Shimian County, Sichuan. Shimian Middle School organized students to put out the fire. Because the fire was too big, the county used a car to force the students to go down the mountain. Student Zhou Wei and three other people forcibly got out of the car and refused to leave. As the fire spread, Zhou Wei and Wang Hai fled in a hurry, while another student, who was highly short-sighted, died in the sea of fire in panic. The county propaganda director was originally a subordinate of the father of the student who was killed. He later informed the central government of his deeds, and "Lai Ning's story" spread widely.

text: # express # [Leslie Cheung’s true cause of death will be announced] April 1 this year is the tenth anniversary of Leslie Cheung’s death. His former friend and agent Chen Shufen will announce a secret that has been kept for ten years. According to media reports, Leslie Cheung committed suicide when the police arrested the suspect Zhou Fengguo in Mong Kok, Hong Kong. The Hong Kong police said that the arrest took only two hours and that they had a large amount of evidence proving that Leslie Cheung was killed by Zhou Fengguo.

text: 3.16 Story about CCTV: CCTV brought a group of media red vests to interview with 315 exposure companies over the weekend. After the forced execution was completed, they called the media today to tell them that they had received money from the public and asked the media group not to write anymore. At the same time, he asked the paper media: Didn’t you receive the money?

If you don’t change, you’ll be sorry for your own conscience. @长江直播@一微信@公智勇- @时 Commentary Focus

chinese_text: 这是一位94岁的老奶奶，老伴死了，两个儿子在外打工，每天捡垃圾捡到凌晨两点，不足五点又要去捡，每天只赚5、6块，生病了也不去医院。每转一次腾讯公益就会给她一毛钱，不勉强，有良心的人自然会转。帮帮这位可怜的老人吧，若觉得脏了你的微博可以不转！
text: This is a 94-year-old grandmother. Her husband is dead and her two sons are working outside. She picks up garbage every day until two in the morning, and she has to pick it up again before five o'clock. She only earns 5 or 6 yuan a day, and she does not go to the hospital when she is sick. . Tencent Charity will give her a dime every time she transfers it. People with conscience will naturally transfer it without forcing it. Please help this poor old man. If you think your Weibo is dirty, you don’t have to repost it!

chinese_text: 【这是一个外国人无法理解的国家】北京，一名外国大姐挡在一辆驶入非机动车道的汽车前，微笑着劝司机回到机动车道去，司机先是鸣喇叭，再谩骂，后推搡，要老外让开，老外坚持着不让。司机最后夺过自行车丢在了路边，在非机动车道上扬长驶去。围观的国人在边上笑看不知所措的外国大姐.... via@i彭三金
text: [This is a country that foreigners cannot understand] In Beijing, a foreign lady stood in front of a car that entered the non-motorized lane. She smiled and persuaded the driver to return to the motorized lane. The driver first honked, then cursed, and then pushed back. He pushed and asked the foreigner to get out of the way, but the foreigner insisted and refused to let go. The driver finally grabbed the bicycle and threw it on the side of the road, then drove away on the non-motorized lane. The onlookers were laughing at the foreign lady who was at a loss.... via@iPeng Sanjin

chinese_text: 【这是一个外国人无法理解的国家】北京，一名外国大姐挡在一辆驶入非机动车道的京HL2021车前，微笑着劝说司机回到机动车道去，司机先是鸣喇叭，再谩骂，后推搡，要老外让开，老外坚持着不让。司机最后夺过自行车丢在路边，在非机动车道上扬长驶去。围观的国人在边上笑看不知所措的外国大姐....（转）
text: [This is a country that foreigners cannot understand] In Beijing, a foreign lady stood in front of a Beijing HL2021 car that entered the non-motorized lane. She smiled and persuaded the driver to return to the motorized lane. The driver first honked and then cursed. He pushed and pushed the foreigner to get out of the way, but the foreigner insisted and refused to let go. The driver finally took the bicycle and threw it on the side of the road, then drove away on the non-motorized lane. The Chinese people who were watching were laughing at the foreign lady who was at a loss... (redirected)

chinese_text: 他是一普通屠夫，卖肉的，被人看上了摊位，然后开始被工商税务城管卫生防疫等部门找茬儿，他一不上访，二不喊冤，直接操刀就剁，死伤的都是这些部门欺负过他的人，杀的这些人的家属吓得都躲进派出所。被抓后他只有一件事说后悔：没杀干净他们。
text: He was an ordinary butcher and meat seller. He was attracted by his stall, and then he started to be troubled by the industrial, commercial, taxation, urban management, health and epidemic prevention departments. He did not appeal or cry out for injustice, but just cut the meat with his knife. These are the people who were killed and injured. The family members of those who had been bullied and killed by the department were so frightened that they hid in the police station. After being captured, he regretted only one thing: not killing them all.

chinese_text: 这就是种水螳螂，生活在下水道中，以老鼠为食。头部有剧毒，为河豚的2-3倍。中毒后无解，只能保守治疗。中毒后五年存活率为0.032。没要小心！
text: This is the water mantis, which lives in sewers and feeds on rats. The head is highly venomous, 2-3 times more toxic than pufferfish. There is no solution for poisoning and can only be treated conservatively. The five-year survival rate after poisoning is 0.032. Don't be careful!

chinese_text: 1949年，中国的人均收入是韩国的3倍，比日本略高。但经过63年“翻天覆地”的增长，据2008年数据：韩国已是我们的29倍，日本是我们的33倍！够令人震惊吧！ 美国总统奥巴马日前接受采访说：中国人的平均生活水平大致相当于美国1910年的标准。但是其官员的生活水平超越美国50年。
text: In 1949, China's per capita income was three times that of South Korea and slightly higher than Japan's. But after 63 years of "earth-shaking" growth, according to 2008 data: South Korea is 29 times ours, and Japan is 33 times ours! Shocking enough! U.S. President Obama said in a recent interview that the average living standard of the Chinese people is roughly equivalent to the American standard in 1910. But its officials' living standards surpass those of the United States by 50 years.

chinese_text: 【4月起上海交通卡扩大异地使用范围】自4月18日起，南昌、永州、葫芦岛、锦州、江油、抚顺、昆山、江阴、淮安这九个城市加入交通卡互联互通的系统。这意味着连同第一批的7个城市，上海交通卡将可在16座城市使用。需要提醒的是，在这些城市必须使用以C或U开头的交通卡（via@上海轨道交通俱乐部）
text: [Shanghai transportation cards will expand the scope of use in other places from April] Starting from April 18, nine cities, namely Nanchang, Yongzhou, Huludao, Jinzhou, Jiangyou, Fushun, Kunshan, Jiangyin, and Huaian, have joined the transportation card interconnection system. This means that together with the first batch of 7 cities, the Shanghai Transportation Card will be available in 16 cities. It should be reminded that in these cities you must use a transportation card starting with C or U (via@Shanghai Rail Transit Club)

text: @ Dongfeng Zhoumi @political and economic observer Fan Lixiang @ Du Yan: The latest results of the national census are announced: amazing! After the "Fang Sister", "Fang Mei", "Fang Uncle" and "Fang Aunt" incidents broke out on the Internet, the Ministry of Public Security launched a thorough investigation into the household registration management issues involved in "sexual intercourse". After a 48-hour and overnight check by the 567,100 police officers nationwide who manage household registration, it was found that there were more than 350 million overlapping household registrations, with the largest number of people holding household registrations in 176 different cities and towns at the same time.

text: [Human pies, one after another] Yunnan Information News reported on the 30th that netizens broke the news to our reporter that a rights-defending farmer in Badong, Hubei Province was crushed by a tanker this morning and his body was incomplete. According to Mr. Li, an eyewitness, the incident took place in Section 29 of the Yiba Expressway in West Biantang Village, Yanduhe Town, Badong County, and it was caused by human intervention. There have been similar incidents locally in the past. Micro-comment: The Chinese people’s civil rights are fought for little by little by relying on this kind of courage.

chinese_text: 上海地铁2号线晚22点左右，这小孩唯一不同其它的是，他根本不会去要钱，只是捧着杯子一直往前走，眼睛里充满无辜与渴望，特别可怜。此时欲收工，杯子好像是被粘在手上的，杯子拿下来时，明显感觉特别疼；该男不停责骂。确定这不是一位父亲。这孩子白白嫩嫩的，一看是娇生惯养，是不是被拐卖了？！
text: It was around 22:00 on Shanghai Metro Line 2. The only thing that was different about this kid was that he didn’t ask for money at all. He just kept walking forward with the cup in hand. His eyes were full of innocence and longing, which was very pitiful. When he was about to call it a day, the cup seemed to be stuck to his hand. When he took it off, he felt a lot of pain; the man kept scolding him. Make sure this is not a father. This child is fair and tender, and it looks like he has been pampered. Has he been trafficked? !

chinese_text: #生活热点# 【信不信由你】如果你被匪徒挟持要求输入提款机密码， 你可以用倒输入密码的方式去间接报警。例如你的密码是123456的話，你可以输入654321，提款机会识别到你是以倒输方式输入密码，提款机会按你要求吐出金额，但是会在匪徒不知情的情況下通知警方！ 請尽可能告诉給每一個人~~~~~~~~~
text: #生活热# [Believe it or not] If you are kidnapped by a gangster and asked to enter the ATM password, you can indirectly call the police by entering the password backwards. For example, if your password is 123456, you can enter 654321. The ATM will recognize that you entered the password backwards and the ATM will spit out the amount according to your request, but it will notify the police without the criminal knowing! Please tell everyone as much as possible~~~~~~~~~

chinese_text: 各位注意：5月12日不要去电影院。 请大家一定别进影院，大家一起为《贞子》票房为零，做努力！ 中国人拍的《金陵十三钗》在日本小鬼子票房为零。小日本拍的《贞子》3D将于5月12日在中国大陆上映。而5月12日既是南京大屠杀纪念日，又是国难日。勿忘国耻！！作为中国人，敢不敢让贞子3D 5月12日票房为零
text: Attention everyone: do not go to the cinema on May 12th. Please don't go into the theater, and let's work hard together to make "Sadako" have zero box office! "The Thirteen Beauties" produced by the Chinese had zero box office in Japan. The 3D film "Sadako" produced by Little Japan will be released in mainland China on May 12. May 12th is both the Nanjing Massacre Memorial Day and the National Disaster Day. Don’t forget the national humiliation! ! As a Chinese, do you dare to let Sadako 3D have zero box office on May 12?

chinese_text: 这是一位94岁的老奶奶，老伴死了，两个儿子在外打工，每天捡垃圾捡到凌晨两点，不足五点又要去捡，每天只赚5、6块，生病了也不去医院。每转一次腾讯公益就会给她一毛钱，不勉强，有良心的人自然会转。帮帮这位可怜的老人吧，若觉得脏了你的微信可不转！http://t.cn/zjeR9ON
text: This is a 94-year-old grandmother. Her husband died and her two sons work outside. She picks up garbage every day until two o'clock in the morning, and she has to pick it up again before five o'clock. She only earns 5 or 6 yuan a day, and she does not go to the hospital when she is sick. . Tencent Charity will give her a dime every time she transfers it. People with conscience will naturally transfer it without forcing it. Please help this poor old man. If you think it is dirty, please don’t repost it on WeChat! http://t.cn/zjeR9ON

chinese_text: 4月2日，沈阳一群汉服党身穿汉服,到北陵皇太极陵前祭拜.
text: On April 2, a group of Hanfu party members in Shenyang, dressed in Hanfu, went to worship in front of the Emperor Taiji Mausoleum in Beiling.

chinese_text: 据传移动9月1日开始对微信微博进行收费：1、包月10元/月；2、按收发条数收费，100条以下免费，100-600条5元，600-1200条10元，超过1200条每条0.02元。联通暂不针对微信等产品收费，将对新入网用户赠送为期一年免费流量，每个送500M的国内流量，超出部分按0.0003元/KB收费。又传电信正在积极接洽微信。
text: It is rumored that China Mobile will start charging for WeChat and Weibo on September 1: 1. Monthly subscription of 10 yuan/month; 2. Charges based on the number of messages sent and received, free for messages below 100, 5 yuan for messages between 100 and 600, and 10 yuan for messages between 600 and 1,200. More than 1,200 items cost 0.02 yuan each. China Unicom will not charge for products such as WeChat for the time being. It will give free traffic for one year to new Internet users. Each user will receive 500M of domestic traffic, and the excess will be charged at 0.0003 yuan/KB. It is also rumored that China Telecom is actively contacting WeChat.

Zhao Benshan, a famous Chinese performing artist and China's first-class actor, suffered a sudden myocardial infarction at Peking Union Medical College Hospital at 23:00 on April 3, 2013. He died due to untimely rescue at the age of 64. [candle][candle][candle][candle][candle][candle][candle]

chinese_text: 【高考阅卷老师冒死揭露内幕】新浪博友@波涛万顷 ：一位参加过高考阅卷的教师，为我们揭露了阅卷中不为人知的内幕真相！让我们惊讶于一个如此重要的、决定一个学生前途命运的考试，其分数竟然是在这样难以想象的粗放流程中产生的！！！我们想问一句，到底有多少学生，是这样被耽误的？？？
text: [The teacher who marked the college entrance examination risked his life to reveal the inside story] Sina blogger @波波万强: A teacher who has participated in the marking of the college entrance examination revealed for us the unknown inside truth in the marking! We are surprised that the scores for such an important test, which determines a student's future and destiny, are generated in such an unimaginably rough process! ! ! We would like to ask, how many students are delayed in this way? ? ?

chinese_text: 【不该忘记】邹小帛举报公安副局长腐败被枪 杀、蒋卫锁揭露三鹿毒奶而被死亡、曝光地沟油李翔被乱刀砍 死、药品打假第一人高敬德进派出所离奇死亡。请牢记英雄！清明快到来，不该忘记他们。[蜡烛]
text: [Should not be forgotten] Zou Xiaobo was shot dead for reporting the corruption of the deputy director of public security, Jiang Weisuo was killed for exposing Sanlu’s tainted milk, Li Xiang was hacked to death for exposing waste oil, and Gao Jingde, the first person to crack down on counterfeit drugs, died mysteriously at the police station. Please remember the heroes! Qingming Festival is coming soon, we should not forget them. [Candle]

chinese_text: 再爆【河南许昌房屋遭强拆 20岁少女讨说法被扒光上衣受辱】 河南许昌市东城区“恒达·名门尚居”强拆现场，禽兽拆迁人员扒掉戚小芳（22岁）的上衣羞辱。记者连线打人者，打人者称：“我以一个共产党员保证，没有打她。”戚小芳报案，警方也不给任何说法。
text: Another explosion [20-year-old girl whose house was forcibly demolished in Xuchang, Henan Province was stripped naked and humiliated when she asked for explanation] At the demolition site of "Hengda Mingmen Shangju" in Dongcheng District, Xuchang City, Henan Province, beastly demolition workers stripped off the top of Qi Xiaofang (22 years old) and humiliated her. The reporter contacted the attacker online, and the attacker said: "I guarantee as a Communist Party member that I did not beat her." Qi Xiaofang reported the case, but the police did not give any explanation.

chinese_text: 中文台张婉:党内奇闻!书记实名举报市长！河南息县项店镇书记洪友强举报息县书记张富治:张贪污受贿4.6亿!勾结黑社贩卖毒品 开赌场！强迫少女卖淫 ！包养有三名二奶 奸淫幼女8人！后耗费9600万向省领导买得信阳市副市长官帽！张把政府工程承包给其兄张富山 获利三个亿！张时常把女下属叫办公室进行开光!
text: Chinese Channel Zhang Wan: Weird news within the party! The secretary reported to the mayor with his real name! Hong Youqiang, Secretary of Xiangdian Town, Xixian County, Henan Province, reported to Xixian County Secretary Zhang Fuzhi: Zhang was embezzled and accepted 460 million in bribes! He colluded with the underworld to sell drugs and open a casino! Forcing girls into prostitution! He kept three mistresses and raped eight young girls! Later, he spent 96 million to buy the title of deputy mayor of Xinyang City from provincial leaders! Zhang contracted government projects to his brother Zhang Fushan and made a profit of 300 million! Zhang often calls his female subordinates to the office for consecration!

chinese_text: 【爆炸消息：中国移动9月1日起对微信微博收费】两种收费标准：1，包月10元/月；2、按条数收费，100条以下免费，600条5元，600至1200条10元，超过1200条每条收两分钱。联通牵手百度制衡微信，电信与网易合作以翼信对抗微信；中移动对微信收费的同时，还要给电信上缴长途光缆租赁费以及流量网间结算费。
text: [Breaking News: China Mobile will charge WeChat and Weibo fees from September 1] Two charging standards: 1. Monthly subscription of 10 yuan/month; 2. Charge based on the number of messages, free for less than 100 messages, 5 yuan for 600 messages, 600 to 1,200 It’s 10 yuan per ticket, and two cents per ticket for more than 1,200 tickets. China Unicom joins hands with Baidu to check and balance WeChat, while China Telecom and NetEase cooperate to use Yixin to counter WeChat. While China Mobile charges WeChat, it also has to pay long-distance optical cable rental fees and traffic inter-network settlement fees to Telecom.

chinese_text: 马英九： “如果大陆方面解除党禁报禁，台湾政党将赴大陆参选大中华区国家总统、内阁总理等职位，大陆和台湾统一将不存在任何障碍。台湾没有独立倾向，如果大陆实现民选政治普世价值观，台湾没有理由拒绝和大陆统一，并表示‘希望对岸在人权自由上取得进步是统一的前提。’”我们期待被解放的那一天。
text: Ma Ying-jeou: "If the mainland lifts the ban on political parties and newspapers, Taiwanese political parties will go to the mainland to run for president, prime minister and other positions in the Greater China region. There will be no obstacles to the reunification of the mainland and Taiwan. Taiwan has no independence tendency. If the mainland implements democratically elected politics, Based on universal values, Taiwan has no reason to refuse reunification with the mainland, and stated that 'hoping that the other side will make progress in human rights and freedom is a prerequisite for reunification.'" We look forward to the day we are liberated.

chinese_text: 据传移动9月1日开始对微信微博进行收费：1、包月10元/月；2、按收发条数收费，100条以下免费，100-600条5元，600-1200条10元，超过1200条每条0.02元。联通暂不针对微信等产品收费，将对新入网用户赠送为期一年免费流量，每个送500M的国内流量，超出部分按0.0003元/KB收费。又传电信正在积极接洽微信。
text: It is rumored that China Mobile will start charging for WeChat and Weibo on September 1: 1. Monthly subscription of 10 yuan/month; 2. Charges based on the number of messages sent and received, free for messages below 100, 5 yuan for messages between 100 and 600, and 10 yuan for messages between 600 and 1,200. More than 1,200 items cost 0.02 yuan each. China Unicom will not charge for products such as WeChat for the time being. It will give free traffic for one year to new Internet users. Each user will receive 500M of domestic traffic, and the excess will be charged at 0.0003 yuan/KB. It is also rumored that China Telecom is actively contacting WeChat.

chinese_text: 【反对微信收费】一个微信，在几个月内，把巨头的电话短信收费逼死。难怪急的跳脚，做出没水平举动。在有关部门和运营商双重压力下，企鹅没顶住。微信收费将于7月1日开始，信息5分/条，语音1毛/条，其实微信使用已经包含了流量费。中国不差这点钱，但不应该为垄断商干预市场。反对微信收费者大力转！
text: [Opposition to WeChat charges] WeChat, within a few months, has forced the giants’ phone and text message charges to death. No wonder he jumps around in a hurry and makes immeasurable actions. Under the dual pressure of relevant departments and operators, Penguin failed to withstand it. WeChat charges will start on July 1st, with 5 cents/message and 1 cent/voice. In fact, the use of WeChat already includes traffic fees. China is not short of money, but it should not interfere in the market for monopolies. Those who oppose WeChat charges are strongly encouraged to repost!

chinese_text: 最新内部消息：中移动已确认将对微信收费，从今年9月1日起，移动对微信单独计费，分为包月和实时流量计算两种方式，包月费用为10元，流量计费的具体政策还在商议中。内线透露，联通会跟微信合作，可能继续免费，据说联通准备对新用户赠送每月500兆流量。电信收不收费还不好说。总之，移动用户悲催了！
text: Latest internal news: China Mobile has confirmed that it will charge WeChat. Starting from September 1 this year, China Mobile will bill WeChat separately. There are two methods of monthly subscription and real-time traffic calculation. The monthly subscription fee is 10 yuan. Specific policies for traffic billing. Still under discussion. Insiders revealed that China Unicom will cooperate with WeChat and may continue to be free. It is said that China Unicom is preparing to give new users 500 megabytes of data per month. It’s hard to say whether Telecom will charge a fee. In short, mobile users are miserable!

text: [Guangxi is shocked to find that the emperor's director is receiving 509 subsistence allowances] Yang Huifeng broke the news on Weibo: Guangxi Duan Civil Affairs Bureau Director Huang is receiving 509 subsistence allowances, nine houses, and six wives. The third wife, Liu Ru, was beaten by the director for having an affair with someone. She refused to accept it. chinese_text: 【10万元可全家移民瑞典？】新华网：欧洲移民又推新渠道，10万瑞典克朗（约10万元RMB）成立一家公司即可获全家居留许可。无经营范围限制，无员工数量要求，无须收入证明。即可与瑞典人享有同等的“从摇篮到坟墓”的福利与政策，免费教育，免费医疗，父母津贴，儿童津贴，学习津贴，失业救济同时享有。
text: [With 100,000 yuan, can the whole family immigrate to Sweden? ] There are no restrictions on business scope, no requirements on the number of employees, and no proof of income is required. That is, they can enjoy the same "cradle to grave" benefits and policies as Swedes, including free education, free medical care, parent allowance, child allowance, study allowance, and unemployment benefits.

chinese_text: 双休日是谁带给你的福利？这曾是中美入世谈判中一个重要筹码，美方向中方提出：在全世界都实行双休日的今天，中国必须尊重劳动者，必须让中国人也享受有双休日的权利，并把这一项作为入世条件之一。迫于压力，又急于入世，在1995年5月1日后，中国开始实行双休日工作制。@卫庄 @谈笑古今V @历史断片
text: Who brings you the benefits of weekends? This was an important bargaining chip in the WTO accession negotiations between China and the United States. The United States proposed to China: Today, when weekends are implemented all over the world, China must respect workers and allow Chinese people to enjoy the right to have weekends, and regard this as an important step in joining the WTO. One of the conditions. Under pressure and eager to join the WTO, China began to implement a weekend working system after May 1, 1995. @伟庄@ Talking about ancient and modern times V @ Fragments of history

chinese_text: 当需要论证中国牛逼时,他们说：“中国有五千年的历史文明，美国才区区两百多年,美国算什么？”当需要论证中国不适合与美国等国家接轨时,他们说：“国情不同,再说中国才发展了六十年，美国都已经两百多年了，怎么比啊？”在如此＂伟大＂的唯物变戏法面前，时间真可怜，历史真可怜，真理真可怜！--赵晓
text: When they need to prove that China is awesome, they say: "China has a history of five thousand years of civilization, and the United States only has more than two hundred years. Who is the United States?" When it is necessary to prove that China is not suitable for integrating with countries such as the United States, they say: "The national conditions are different. Besides, China has only developed for 60 years, and the United States has been developed for more than 200 years. How can we compare?" In the face of such a "great" materialist magic, time is so pitiful, history is so pitiful, and truth is so pitiful! --Zhao Xiao

chinese_text: 国家发改委已批复7万亿投资。
text: The National Development and Reform Commission has approved an investment of 7 trillion yuan.

chinese_text: 【谁把海参崴变成了符拉迪沃斯托克】1856年中俄签订《瑷珲条约》，海参崴被“共管”了。1860年中俄签订《北京条约》，海参崴成了沙俄的领土，被迫改名。1945年《中苏加盟条约》苏联同意50年以后中国收回海叁威，2001年7月16日中俄签署《中俄睦邻友好合作条约》，中方确认放弃领土主权，至此归俄所有。
text: [Who turned Vladivostok into Vladivostok] In 1856, China and Russia signed the "Aihun Treaty", and Vladivostok was "co-administered". In 1860, China and Russia signed the Treaty of Beijing, and Vladivostok became the territory of Tsarist Russia and was forced to change its name. In the 1945 "Sino-Soviet Alliance Treaty", the Soviet Union agreed that China would take back Hai Sanwei 50 years later. On July 16, 2001, China and Russia signed the "Sino-Russian Good-Neighborly Treaty of Friendship and Cooperation". China confirmed that it would give up territorial sovereignty and it would now belong to Russia.

chinese_text: 【反腐女侠杨琳被自杀】杨琳女士10月23日在西安新城广场维权律师唐荆陵发起的“全民不日，合作反腐败抗议书”被警察抓走。10月31警方通知杨琳家属，她己自杀。家人看到时她己昏迷一天一夜并且浑身青紫。信息封杀很严重，直到现在开始披露！紧急求证，请网友彻查，追究责任人，不可饶恕！
text: [Anti-corruption heroine Yang Lin commits suicide] On October 23, Ms. Yang Lin was arrested by the police after she launched the "Protest for National Day and Cooperation in Anti-Corruption" initiated by human rights lawyer Tang Jingling in Xi'an Xincheng Square. On October 31, the police informed Yang Lin's family that she had committed suicide. When her family saw her, she had been unconscious for a day and a night and was covered in bruises. The information blockade is very serious, until now it starts to be disclosed! Urgent verification, netizens are requested to investigate thoroughly and hold those responsible accountable. This is unforgivable!

text: [This... is heartbreaking] The Twitter account YourGentleman tweeted to reveal that a man planned to propose to his girlfriend who was participating in the marathon at the finish line of the marathon. text: [Moment of silence] Two explosions occurred in the Boston Marathon yesterday, killing at least 2 people, one of whom was an 8-year-old child, and nearly 100 people were injured. Twitter said that the 8-year-old deceased was this little girl. May the deceased rest in peace and the living be strong. . While most eyes are turning to Boston, please don’t forget that the fire in Hubei killed 14 compatriots and injured 60 others. They also need our care and support, even though they are no longer in the news.

chinese_text: 真的假的？美国人民太阴谋论了……波士顿马拉松爆炸案的“新闻”演员又被认出来了。被炸掉双腿的这个人是美军士兵，在阿富汗失去双腿。现场视频均是安排好的摄像师拍摄的，所以只看到镜头乱晃，甚至有意朝上拍摄，避免第一时间拍到现场画面，工作人员也好趁乱布置现场……http://t.cn/zTff61B
text: real or fake? The American people are so conspiratorial...the "news" actor from the Boston Marathon bombing has been identified again. The man whose legs were blown off was a US soldier who lost his legs in Afghanistan. The on-site videos were all taken by arranged videographers, so you only see the camera shaking around, and even shooting upwards intentionally to avoid capturing the scene in the first place, so that the staff can take advantage of the chaos to arrange the scene... http://t .cn/zTff61B

chinese_text: 太震惊了[吃惊] 波士顿马拉松爆炸案的“新闻”演员又被认出来了。被炸掉双腿的这个人是美军士兵，在阿富汗失去双腿。 http://t.cn/zTfsMyj这个视频http://t.cn/zTfsMyW是伊拉克路边炸弹爆炸的场面 大家对比下！然后再看看波士顿的炸弹，仅仅是可怜的一小团烟雾而已，恐怖分子难道是在玩鞭炮么？
text: So shocked [Surprised] The "News" actor from the Boston Marathon bombing has been recognized again. The man whose legs were blown off was a US soldier who lost his legs in Afghanistan. http://t.cn/zTfsMyjThis video http://t.cn/zTfsMyW is a scene of a roadside bomb explosion in Iraq. Let’s compare it! Then look at the bomb in Boston. It was just a pitiful little cloud of smoke. Were the terrorists playing with firecrackers?

chinese_text: 『波士顿爆炸案，美帝自导自演的一出戏？』谁能告诉我，为什么这名在阿富汗被炸断腿的美军士兵会出现在爆炸地点？他是如何再一次成功的被炸断原本已经残缺的双腿，进而成为得到无数人的怜悯和祈祷的可怜的受害者？这是巧合呢？还是巧合呢？还是巧合呢？我不懂，求证万能的微博了。
text: "The Boston bombing, a play directed and acted by American imperialism?" "Who can tell me why this American soldier whose leg was blown off in Afghanistan appeared at the explosion site?" How did he successfully have his already mutilated legs blown off again, and then become a poor victim who received the mercy and prayers of countless people? Is this a coincidence? Or is it a coincidence? Or is it a coincidence? I don’t understand, I’ll ask the omnipotent Weibo for confirmation.

There is even speculation that it used special effects props from "The Walking Dead". Video of the scene was exposed, showing a small cloud of smoke and no missing limbs. Click: http://t.cn/zTff61B The Americans who rushed to the scene at the same time did not participate in the rescue, but took the opportunity to rob. Poke: http://t.cn/zTfpmnu

chinese_text: 波士顿爆炸案，现在是随便美国人说死伤了多少。事实告诉全球人民，一个声光烟的表演后，各演员向舞台中心跑去，包围现场，驱离围观者。然后一个个本来就是残疾人的演员被抬上轮椅，抱着假肢，图上鸡鸭血后出来摆拍。小布什开始笑话奥巴马，下手虽比911留情了，但却是更假了。全怪执行导演找错了演员。
text: In the Boston bombing, Americans can now tell how many casualties there were. Facts tell people around the world that after a performance of sound, light and smoke, the actors ran towards the center of the stage, surrounded the scene and drove away the onlookers. Then, actors who were originally disabled were lifted into wheelchairs, holding prosthetic limbs, and came out to pose for pictures after chickens and ducks were bleeding. George W. Bush began to laugh at Obama. Although his actions were less merciful than those on 9/11, they were even more fake. It's all the fault of the executive director casting the wrong actor.

chinese_text: #复旦大学投毒事件#故事应该是这样的：投毒嫌疑人林森浩的本意并不是毒杀黄洋，而是同舍的另一人姜成，他曾于2012年在百度注册名为“诛姜成”，并提了很多关于有毒化合物的问题，他的本意应该也并非直接投毒致命，而是小剂量缓慢的让他中毒，最终致死，却不曾想放错了剂量，并误杀黄洋，最终造成惨剧。
text: #Fudan大学PoisoningEvent# The story should be like this: The original intention of the poisoning suspect Lin Senhao was not to poison Huang Yang, but to another person in the same dormitory, Jiang Cheng. He had registered on Baidu in 2012 as "Zhu Jiang" "Success", and raised a lot of questions about toxic compounds. His original intention was not to poison him directly to death, but to slowly poison him in small doses and eventually kill him. However, he never intended to put the wrong dose and accidentally kill Huang Yang. Eventually it resulted in tragedy.

In order to support their children, the couple worked early and late, but they still worked hard to support their children. chinese_text: 【无耻的航空公司】#现在是旅游淡季，原本广州、北京飞成都的机票全部打折，然而，七级地震发生几小时后，航空公司坐地起价，即时变为全价票。现在飞成都的乘客，多是救援、志愿者、医护、记者、伤亡者亲人。各大小航空公司，你们对这些乘客真下得了手啊！转。@徐昕 @吉祥三宝一家 @于建嵘 @孔智勇-
text: [Shameless Airlines] # Now is the off-season for travel. All air tickets from Guangzhou and Beijing to Chengdu were originally discounted. However, a few hours after the magnitude 7 earthquake, airlines raised prices and immediately changed them to full price. Most of the passengers flying to Chengdu now are rescue workers, volunteers, medical staff, reporters, and relatives of the casualties. Airlines, big and small, are really good at treating these passengers! change. @Xu Xin@吉祥三宝家@元洁徘@康智勇-

chinese_text: 中国红十字会总会 #雅安地震#中国红十字会总会向四川灾区调拨第二批救灾物资，5000个家庭包，5000床棉被，5000件棉衣，1200顶单帐篷，用于支持当地红十字会开展灾害救助工作。@迟夙生律师 刚刚看见电视了地震地区非常炎热，急需遮阳，红会送棉衣了，是过季打折吗？PS：迟大姐的疑问也是我的疑问！
text: The Red Cross Society of China #亚安 earthquake # The Red Cross Society of China allocates the second batch of relief materials to the disaster-stricken areas in Sichuan, including 5,000 family bags, 5,000 quilts, 5,000 cotton coats, and 1,200 single tents to support the local Red Cross Society. The Cross Society carries out disaster relief work. @Chisushenglawyer just watched TV. The earthquake area is very hot and urgently needs shade. The Red Cross Society has given away cotton-padded clothes. Is it an out-of-season discount? PS: Sister Chi’s question is also my question!

chinese_text: 成都新闻频道的记者和主持人，在屏幕上大骂现在还在收费的成雅高速公路！成雅高速真该骂！这么多去应急救灾的车辆排起长龙，居然还在一个个收卡收钱。记者说请你们把杆抬起来，居然回应：我们没收到上级命令。 在生命面前中国的各级官员是多么的冷漠、残忍又自私？举世罕见！@李咏勤报道  @孔智勇-
text: Reporters and anchors from the Chengdu News Channel cursed the Chengdu-Ya Expressway, which is still toll-free, on the screen! Chengya Expressway should be scolded! There were so many vehicles waiting in long queues for emergency relief, and they were still collecting cards and money one by one. The reporter asked you to lift the pole, but he responded: We have not received orders from our superiors. How indifferent, cruel and selfish are Chinese officials at all levels in the face of life? Rare in the world! @李永凯 reported @康智勇-

chinese_text: 【竹子还会再长，家园定能重建】雅安是大熊猫栖息地之一，大熊猫保护中心碧峰峡基地距芦山县约20公里，内有百余熊猫。地震时200多游客与熊猫均安然无恙。地震时，部分大熊猫惊慌失措，不过也有大熊猫较淡定，甚至在地震前后完成了自然交配。via东方早报 图为一只害怕的熊猫死死地抱住警察叔叔的腿。
text: [Bamboos will grow again, and homes will be rebuilt] Ya'an is one of the habitats of giant pandas. The Bifengxia Base of the Giant Panda Conservation Center is about 20 kilometers away from Lushan County, and there are more than a hundred pandas in the area. More than 200 tourists and pandas were safe during the earthquake. During the earthquake, some giant pandas panicked, but some were calmer and even completed natural mating before and after the earthquake. via Oriental Morning Post The picture shows a frightened panda hugging the leg of a policeman.

text: @ChinaRed Cross Society, just forget it, do you still have the dignity to commemorate the "150th anniversary of the International Red Cross Movement"? Therefore, it should be called an illegal fake Red Cross.

chinese_text: #1024微雅安#【感动又被萌翻】地震发生时，一只害怕的熊猫死死地抱住警察叔叔的腿。据中新网，雅安市中国保护大熊猫研究中心碧峰峡基地内的工作人员和熊猫暂无伤亡。熊猫生性胆小，地震发生后，基地内的熊猫受到惊吓，经工作人员呵护安抚已恢复平静，食物和供水均有保障。
text: #1024微亚安# [Moved and cute] When the earthquake happened, a frightened panda hugged the policeman’s leg tightly. According to China News Service, there are no casualties among the staff and pandas at the Bifengxia base of the China Conservation and Research Center for Giant Pandas in Ya'an City. Pandas are timid by nature. After the earthquake, the pandas in the base were frightened. However, they have returned to calm after being cared for and comforted by the staff. Food and water supply are guaranteed.

chinese_text: 网友：刚接到的消息，如属实，当严办！求相关机构尽快核实！因当前属四川旅游淡季，广州、北京飞往成都机票都有折扣，但地震发生几小时后，航空公司却将打折取消，变身全价票。现飞成都乘客多是救援队、志愿者、医护、记者、伤亡者亲人。何为卑鄙？何为无耻？天良何在？人性何在？何况航空公司多为国企
text: Netizen: If the news I just received is true, it will be dealt with strictly! Please ask relevant agencies to verify it as soon as possible! Because it is currently the off-season for tourism in Sichuan, there are discounts on air tickets from Guangzhou and Beijing to Chengdu. However, a few hours after the earthquake, the airlines canceled the discounts and changed them to full-price tickets. Most of the passengers flying to Chengdu are rescue teams, volunteers, medical staff, reporters, and relatives of the casualties. What is despicable? What is shameless? Where is the conscience? Where is the humanity? What’s more, most airlines are state-owned enterprises.

chinese_text: 【中国.红.十.字会是山寨货】中国是唯一不加入国际红.十字.会的国家。加入国际红.十字.会要求账目必须向国际红.十字.会公开，中国认为这是干涉内政。所以成立了不同于国际.红.十字的冒牌货，简单点说，这个隶属于民政部的红十字.会是山寨的。且是红色山寨货。
text: [China Red Cross is a knockoff] China is the only country that does not join the International Red Cross. Joining the International Red Cross requires that accounts must be disclosed to the International Red Cross. China considers this to be interference in internal affairs. Therefore, a counterfeit that is different from the International Red Cross was established. To put it simply, this Red Cross Society affiliated with the Ministry of Civil Affairs is a copycat. And it’s a red knockoff.

text: The Red Cross Society of China is the only Y Cross that does not join the International Red Cross. Because joining must comply with international standards in terms of personnel arrangements, actions, management, etc., and accounts must be made public, the Red Cross Society of China used the excuse of interfering in my country's internal affairs as an excuse not to join. change.

chinese_text: 【山寨红会】囯际红十字会是世界性卫生救护和社会福利团体，是一个独立、中立的组织，其使命是为战争和其他暴力局势的受害者提供人道保护和援助。中国红十字会是唯一不肯加入国际红十字会的会员国。加入国际红十字会就意味着在人事安排、行动、管理等方面符合国际规则，且账目必须向国际红十字会公开。
text: [Shanzhai Red Cross] The International Red Cross is a world-wide health rescue and social welfare organization. It is an independent and neutral organization whose mission is to provide humanitarian protection and assistance to victims of war and other violent situations. The Red Cross Society of China is the only member state that refuses to join the International Red Cross Society. Joining the International Red Cross means that personnel arrangements, actions, management, etc. are in compliance with international rules, and the accounts must be disclosed to the International Red Cross.

chinese_text: 【雅安地震灾难奸商发财】求扩散！本来现在是旅游淡季，广州、北京、合肥等地飞往成都的机票都是打折扣的，然而，在地震发生几小时后，航空公司却将打折取消，变为全价票。现在飞成都的乘客，多是救援、志愿者、医护、记者、伤亡者亲人。什么叫卑鄙？什么叫无耻？
text: [Profiteers make money after Ya'an earthquake disaster] Please spread the news! It was originally the off-season for tourism, and air tickets from Guangzhou, Beijing, Hefei and other places to Chengdu were all discounted. However, a few hours after the earthquake, the airlines canceled the discounts and changed them to full-price tickets. Most of the passengers flying to Chengdu now are rescue workers, volunteers, medical staff, reporters, and relatives of the casualties. What is despicable? What is shameless?

chinese_text: 【竹子会再长，家园定能重建】雅安是大熊猫栖息地之一，大熊猫保护中心碧峰峡基地距芦山县约20公里，内有百余熊猫。地震时200多游客与熊猫均安 然 无 恙。地震时，部分大熊猫惊慌失措，不过也有大熊猫较淡定，甚至在地震前后完成了自然交 配。图为一只害怕的熊猫死死抱住警察叔叔的腿。via东方早报
text: [Bamboos will grow again, and homes will be rebuilt] Ya'an is one of the habitats of giant pandas. The Bifengxia Base of the Giant Panda Conservation Center is about 20 kilometers away from Lushan County, and there are more than a hundred pandas in the area. More than 200 tourists and pandas were safe during the earthquake. During the earthquake, some giant pandas panicked, but some were calmer and even completed natural mating before and after the earthquake. The picture shows a frightened panda hugging the leg of a policeman. via Oriental Morning Post

chinese_text: 披露中国的贪官:今天有两个中江县红十字会的人来我们这里购买了1万多元的救灾药品，要求开5万多元的发票。我们（成都制药一厂）没答应，结果由隔壁通化一家药厂经营部开给他们了。强烈谴责中国红十字会，并要中国红十字会对所有捐款去向做出解释，我们的捐款不是让你这样贪污的！
text: Exposing corrupt officials in China: Today, two people from the Red Cross Society of Zhongjiang County came to us to buy more than 10,000 yuan of disaster relief medicines and asked for an invoice of more than 50,000 yuan. We (Chengdu No. 1 Pharmaceutical Factory) did not agree, so the business department of a pharmaceutical factory in Tonghua next door issued the prescription to them. We strongly condemn the Red Cross Society of China and ask the Red Cross Society of China to explain the whereabouts of all donations. Our donations are not for you to embezzle like this!

text: #亚安 Disaster# [A great mother died trying to save her son] An eight-year-old boy was rescued from the rubble in the disaster area of Lushan County, Ya'an, but his mother died while protecting her son, so that the son was not hit. The little boy’s name is Yang Yujie, and his mother’s name is Yang Shuangmei, 37 years old. Great mother, have a good journey! (via Mr. Lu Guoping)

chinese_text: 【深圳城管直接开车碾压收报纸老人】这次摄像头没失灵，深圳再一次走在了全国前面。城管抢走了收废报纸老人秤，老人向城管索要，坐在车前不起，城管的汽车直接从老人身上活活碾压过去，老人目前生命垂危。向报道此事的深圳电视台 致敬，求大家扩散人肉这帮人渣。 [视频]http://t.cn/zOex2Al [怒]
text: [Shenzhen urban management drove over an old man collecting newspapers] This time the camera did not malfunction, and Shenzhen once again leads the country. The city management took away the old man's scale for collecting scrap newspapers. The old man asked the city management for it and sat in front of the car to get up. The city management's car ran over the old man alive. The old man is currently in critical condition. I pay tribute to the Shenzhen TV station who reported this incident, and I beg everyone to spread the word of human flesh against these scumbags. [Video] http://t.cn/zOex2Al [angry]

chinese_text: 【红会——你凭什么购买这么多路虎】 一种无耻可以肆无忌惮！一种诈骗可以正大光明！一种抢劫可以毫无顾忌！一种挥霍可以明目张胆！一种贪污可以合情合理！——最后，一种法律对它视而不见！一个国家的慈善机构，贪婪到连慈善捐款都不放过，你们真是穷凶恶极了吧！
text: [Red Cross Society - Why did you buy so many Land Rovers] A kind of shamelessness can be unscrupulous! A scam can be fair and square! A kind of robbery can be done without any scruples! A splurge can be blatant! A kind of corruption can be justified! —Finally, a law that turns a blind eye to it! A country's charity organization is so greedy that it doesn't even let go of charitable donations. You guys are really vicious!

chinese_text: 【中国红十字会，你们到底是谁？在做些什么？】国际红十字会成员帕特里夏·奎因博士：她透露没有任何文献能确认中国红十字会的身份.同时，奎因表示，摆脱政府章程、快速响应、协助无政府者、受灾受害者、启动医疗与搜寻行动免除灾难痛苦并帮助受难者找回尊严，是红十字会的主要任务，而不是募集金钱。转
text: [Red Cross Society of China, who are you? What are you doing? 】Dr. Patricia Quinn, a member of the International Red Cross: She revealed that there is no document to confirm the identity of the Red Cross Society of China. At the same time, Quinn said that getting rid of government regulations, responding quickly, assisting anarchists and disaster victims , initiating medical and search operations to relieve the suffering of disasters and help victims regain their dignity is the main mission of the Red Cross, not to raise money. change
