text: Ruan Cishan: The Red Cross of China is the only member country that does not join the International Red Cross - it turns out to be a copycat. To join the International Red Cross, it must comply with international standards in terms of personnel arrangements, actions, management, etc., and the accounts must be submitted to the International Red Cross. text: The most ridiculous and shameless proposal! Officials’ assets will be disclosed again after 60 years! The People's Daily published an article "Why it is more feasible for newly promoted officials to disclose their assets" claiming that "the county level will be disclosed in 20 years, the municipal level in another 20 years. The provincial level will be disclosed in 20 years. Until this method is used at the top! After 60 years , and then switch to the full implementation of property disclosure." Such a ridiculous proposal was actually acquiesced by the government! Not to mention 60 years, no one can guarantee what will happen in 10 years.

chinese_text: #技术贴#微博悄悄关注功能是有bug，发现悄悄关注你的人其实很简单。点开“我的粉丝”，上面写的是按关注时间排序。你改选成其他二种，然后慢慢翻你的粉丝。关注你的粉丝上面有√号，而偷偷关注你的粉丝没有对号。粉丝少的同学有福了，快快找找谁偷偷关注你吧。我找了半天，发现有俩关注我，还是男的。
text: #techPost# There is a bug in the function of following you quietly on Weibo. It is actually very simple to find people who follow you quietly. Click on "My Fans" and it says they are sorted by follow time. You change to the other two, and then slowly turn over your fans. Fans who follow you have a √ mark on them, while fans who follow you secretly do not have a check mark. Blessed are the students who have few fans. Find someone to follow you secretly. I searched for a long time and found that two people were paying attention to me, and they were both men.

chinese_text: 中华骨髓库，中国红十字会主办，以慈善之名号召捐献骨髓，取样建库，如有匹配的患者，再联系志愿者捐献骨髓。多美好！但是患者查询一下每次收费500元，查到了要得到骨髓还要再交至少5万元！北大学生激于义愤，成立了民间骨髓库，从查询到移植都是真正免费，起名“阳光骨髓库”。
text: China Marrow Bank, sponsored by the Red Cross Society of China, calls for bone marrow donations in the name of charity, takes samples to build a bank, and if there are matching patients, volunteers will be contacted to donate bone marrow. How wonderful! However, the patient inquired about the fee of 500 yuan each time, and found out that he had to pay at least another 50,000 yuan to get the bone marrow! Peking University students were so indignant that they established a private bone marrow bank. From inquiry to transplantation, everything is truly free, and they named it "Sunshine Marrow Bank."

chinese_text: 【不患寡而患不均】获悉赵红霞或判15年以上，我震精了！ 一些人眼中，她是十恶不赦的拜金女，为了钱 财出卖肉体和灵魂；一些人的口中， 她是反腐奇女，为重庆反腐提供了最 有力的直接证据……凭此判15年？又刚听闻李刚之子驾车致死仅判6年，实际只服刑2年半！刑不上大夫，处处存在，百姓何堪？@徐昕
text: [Don’t worry about scarcity, but worry about inequality] I was shocked to learn that Zhao Hongxia might be sentenced to more than 15 years! In the eyes of some people, she is a heinous money worshiper who sold her body and soul for money; in the eyes of some people, she is an anti-corruption prodigy who provides the most powerful direct evidence for Chongqing's anti-corruption... Based on this, she is sentenced to 15 years? I just heard that Li Gang’s son was only sentenced to 6 years for driving to death, but he actually only served 2 and a half years! If the punishment is not good enough for the officials, it exists everywhere, so what do the people have to do? @Xu Xin

text: [I'm not the hero, I'm a tool] The Red Cross Society of China sent a congratulatory message: Warm congratulations to student Guo Meimei for being named the cover figure of Time Magazine!

chinese_text: 【“我爸是李刚”案件主角李启铭已出狱】记者透露，原本被判6年的李启铭，今已出狱。从被抓那天算，其服刑也不过2年半。李启铭于2010年10月16日在河北大学校区驾车致人死亡，并称“有本事你们去告我，我爸爸是李刚”。2011年1月30日，李启铭被判处6年有期徒刑，并赔偿46万元
text: [Li Qiming, the protagonist of the "My dad is Li Gang" case, has been released from prison] Reporters revealed that Li Qiming, who was originally sentenced to 6 years, has now been released from prison. Counting from the day he was arrested, his sentence was only two and a half years. Li Qiming drove someone to death on the Hebei University campus on October 16, 2010, and said, "You can sue me if you can. My father is Li Gang." On January 30, 2011, Li Qiming was sentenced to 6 years in prison and ordered to pay 460,000 yuan in compensation.

chinese_text: “反腐英雄”赵红霞或被判15年以上；而当年凭借“我爸是李刚”一句红遍中国的李启铭却被爆出狱。6年的刑期，辛苦关了两年半终于重出江湖。现实就是这样，可以猜想如此大幅度减刑怕是当初都计划好的吧？李天一呢？是不是也计划好了？这种法律面前人人不平等的事件真的让民众很受伤！法律的威严何在？
text: "Anti-corruption hero" Zhao Hongxia may be sentenced to more than 15 years; but Li Qiming, who became famous in China for his "My dad is Li Gang", was released from prison. After serving a six-year sentence, he finally returned to prison after two and a half years of hard work. This is the reality. It can be guessed that such a large reduction in sentence was probably planned from the beginning, right? Where is Li Tianyi? Have you planned it too? This kind of inequality before the law really hurts the people! Where is the majesty of the law?

chinese_text: 特权婚车牛逼！警车开道！交通管制！今天上午10点40分，新街口四个路口交通信号灯全红，计时不再显示，一警车开道领一婚车队伍自中山东路驶入，婚车打头的是辆陆虎，后面的车恕我眼拙，太高端没认出，绕孙中山铜像一圈后驶回中山东路。全程约四五分钟左右，路口多车鸣笛送行。大领导结婚了？
text: The privileged wedding car is awesome! Police car clears the way! Traffic control! At 10:40 this morning, the traffic lights at the four intersections in Xinjiekou were all red, and the clock was no longer displayed. A police car opened the way to lead a wedding car procession from Zhongshan East Road. The wedding car was led by a Land Rover. Please forgive me for the cars behind it. My eyes were blind and I was too high-end to recognize it. I circled around the bronze statue of Sun Yat-sen and then drove back to Zhongshan East Road. The whole journey takes about four or five minutes, and many cars at the intersection honked to see them off. Is the big boss getting married?

chinese_text: 有日本的客户来，一起约去吃饭。无论怎样劝都不吃小龙虾，还笑嘻嘻的看我们吃。追问起理由，才知道不吃的原因。回来在网上搜了一下：居然真是这么回事情！！！！ 小龙虾是二战时期日本军队输入中国用来处理尸体的！中国过去并不出产小龙虾，小龙虾的来历要追溯到二战时... http://t.cn/zTHQATM
text: A Japanese client came and we made an appointment to have dinner together. No matter how much I tried to persuade him not to eat crayfish, he still watched us eat them with a smile. After asking for the reason, I found out the reason for not eating. I came back and searched online: This is really what happened! ! ! ! Crayfish were imported to China by the Japanese army during World War II to dispose of corpses! China did not produce crayfish in the past. The origin of crayfish can be traced back to World War II... http://t.cn/zTHQATM

chinese_text: 1945年中华民国对苏签订条约，苏联重新承认中国对海参崴的主权，但1949年，是谁将海参崴拱手相送苏联？1957年，是谁将夜莺岛送给越南？1960年，是谁将相当于整个安徽省面积的南坎、江心坡送给了缅甸？1962年是谁将长白山一分为二送给了朝鲜？。。。所有毛粉，诬蔑别人是汉奸前，请先弄清谁是真的汉奸！
text: In 1945, the Republic of China signed a treaty with the Soviet Union, and the Soviet Union re-recognized China's sovereignty over Vladivostok. But in 1949, who handed over Vladivostok to the Soviet Union? Who gave Nightingale Island to Vietnam in 1957? In 1960, who gave Nankan and Jiangxinpo, an area equivalent to the entire Anhui Province, to Myanmar? Who split Changbai Mountain in two and gave it to North Korea in 1962? . . . All fans, before you falsely accuse others of being traitors, please first find out who the real traitors are!

chinese_text: 喜欢游泳的人注意了。传说中的水鬼是真的，一般藏匿于深水污垢之处，多见水库，河沟。身体像老鼠，脑袋像侯，也称水猴，在水中力气大过牛，人遇上毫无还手之力，基本只有死亡。上岸跟松鼠力气差不多。已经出现过很多该动物在水中谋害人姓名的事例，岸上也有发生。希望更多人看到，免遭遇难！
text: Attention swimmers. The legendary water ghosts are real. They usually hide in deep water and dirty places, mostly in reservoirs and rivers. It has a body like a mouse and a head like a Hou. It is also called a water monkey. It is stronger than an ox in the water. If a person encounters it, it has no power to fight back. Basically, it will only lead to death. Going ashore is about as strong as a squirrel. There have been many instances of this animal taking names in people's lives in the water, but also on shore. I hope more people can see it and avoid trouble!

chinese_text: 【家长注意】@儿子带着我一起长大 :"今天下雨，平时外婆接小家伙从幼儿园回家所经过的国权路，今天竟然比较冷清。离黄兴路还有大概30／50米，迎面走来一个40多岁的中年妇女，没有任何征兆的手上拿着一大团白色的餐巾纸朝外婆口鼻捂过去..."详见长微博！特哈人了！转
text: [Attention to parents] @SON Grew Up With Me: "It's raining today. The Guoquan Road where my grandma usually takes the little guy home from kindergarten is relatively deserted today. It's about 30/50 meters away from Huangxing Road. A middle-aged woman in her 40s walked over. Without any warning, she held a large white napkin in her hand and covered her mouth and nose with her grandmother..." See Chang Weibo for details! Teha is here! change

chinese_text: 【中国工商银行阿根廷分行为新生儿赠送千元大礼】 http://t.cn/zTYYyqf 新闻称:中国工商银行宣布，将无偿捐助阿根廷每名的新生儿1000比索（相当于1200元人民币）的定期存款作为礼物。生在这样的国家，我突然感到无上光荣，计生国策干掉自己的孩子，却资助别人家孩子，中国人民很行，真的行，相当行。
text: [Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Argentina Branch gives a gift of 1,000 yuan to newborns] http://t.cn/zTYYyqf News said: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China announced that it will donate 1,000 pesos (equivalent to 1,200 yuan) to each newborn in Argentina free of charge. Fixed deposits as gifts. I suddenly felt extremely honored to be born in a country like this. The national family planning policy kills my own children but subsidizes other people's children. The Chinese people are very good, really good, quite good.

chinese_text: 雅安总人口153万， 三星苹果富士康三家共捐款加起来是1亿6000万， 平均分给每个人是105万左右。 现在还在缺物资，缺钱， 各地方各组织各学校还在圈钱。 钱去哪了我们不知道，真的不知道该说啥。 再加上加多宝集团的一个亿。 还有香港一个亿。我只想问。钱呢。 给老百姓们的钱呢? 修竹
text: The total population of Ya'an is 1.53 million. The total donations from Samsung, Apple and Foxconn are 160 million, and the average donation to each person is about 1.05 million. We are still short of supplies and money, and various localities, organizations and schools are still collecting money. We don’t know where the money went, and we really don’t know what to say. Plus 100 million from Jiaduobao Group. And Hong Kong has 100 million. I just want to ask. Where's the money? Where is the money for the common people? Xiuzhu

chinese_text: 【高考阅卷老师冒死揭露内幕？！】#高考阅卷内幕#一位自称参加过高考阅卷的教师，近日发帖揭露阅卷中不为人知的内幕真相！如果所述是真，我们不禁惊讶于如此重要的、决定一个学生前途命运的考试，分数竟然在这样的粗放流程中产生！到底有多少学生，是这样被耽误的？？[话筒]via陈天哲
text: [The college entrance examination marking teacher risked his life to reveal the inside story? ! 】 # College Entrance Examination Marking Insider # A teacher who claims to have participated in the college entrance examination marking recently posted a post revealing the unknown inside truth in the marking! If what is said is true, we can't help but be surprised that the scores for such an important test that determines a student's future and destiny can be generated in such an extensive process! How many students are delayed in this way? ? [Microphone] via Chen Tianzhe

chinese_text: 转【下岗夫妻双双上吊自尽，女记者失声痛哭 】 这是个双双遭遇下岗的工人家庭,因其无特长不得不在街头蹬三轮,擦皮鞋、摆地摊，为了供养孩子,夫妻二人起早贪黑,但仍入不薄出,夫妻二人绝望了,撇下两个孩子，竟双双选择自缢而死， 这是怎样一个社会,夫妻拼命干活，养不活一个家！转@拍客视线 @袁裕来律师
text: [The laid-off couple both hanged themselves, and the female reporter burst into tears] This is a family of workers who were both laid off. Because they had no special skills, they had to ride a tricycle on the street, shine shoes, and set up a street stall. In order to support their children, the couple worked early and late, but still The couple was so desperate that they left their two children behind and chose to hang themselves to death. What kind of society is this? The couple work hard and cannot support a family! Retweet@shooter’s sight@ yuanyulai lawyer

chinese_text: 【法院无底线】湖南长沙一位小朋友上学路上捡到3万元，原地不动等失主，结果被人冒领。不知情的孩子到学校告知老师，被表扬，好人好事很快传开。真失主听说后，找上门要钱未果，竟然把孩子告上法庭。法院判决孩子家长赔偿6000元，气得家长大骂孩子：谁让你手贱捡那钱！@袁裕来律师 @于建嵘 @洪晃ilook
text: [The court has no bottom line] A child in Changsha, Hunan Province picked up 30,000 yuan on the way to school. He stayed put and waited for the owner, but someone pretended to claim it. The unsuspecting children went to school to inform their teachers and were praised, and word spread quickly about the good deeds. After the real owner heard about it, he came to ask for money but failed, and even took the child to court. The court ordered the child's parents to pay 6,000 yuan in compensation. The parents were so angry that they yelled at the child: Who asked you to pick up that money! @袁宇来 lawyer@元盈grong@红黄ilook

chinese_text: （转）云南小山村发生怪事 母猪生下8个小孩(1) - 昨天凌晨12点，云南省昆明市宜良县的一个小山村发生一件怪事，一只母猪居然生下8个男婴儿。在场所有人都不敢相信自己的眼睛！各国专家都赶到现场后都无法解释这一，奇特迹象！这将成为世界历史上的未解之迷！ http://t.cn/bleIH
text: (Repost) A strange thing happened in a small mountain village in Yunnan. A sow gave birth to 8 babies (1) - Yesterday at 12 o'clock in the morning, a strange thing happened in a small mountain village in Yiliang County, Kunming City, Yunnan Province. A sow actually gave birth to 8 male babies. . Everyone present couldn't believe their eyes! Experts from various countries rushed to the scene and were unable to explain this strange sign! This will become an unsolved mystery in world history! http://t.cn/bleIH

chinese_text: 《北大猛男，持刀刺官！！！》“可歌可泣”的是王同学投案自首之后冷冷说了一句话是 “我并不后悔。是他们不让我依靠自力生存！！！！！！”微评：认真读图文字，不要说话！[泪]
text: "The strong man from Peking University stabs an official with a knife!" ! ! "What's so touching is that after classmate Wang surrendered, he said coldly, "I don't regret it. It's because they didn't let me survive on my own!!!!" Micro-comment: Read the pictures and text carefully and don't talk! [tears]

chinese_text: 【@郭美美Baby 死于澳门，你信吗？】网友 @Tinysalt 微博爆料:郭美美死于澳门，称消息已封锁长达半个月，亲属已进行交涉，骨火六月将送回大陆！
text: [@国美美Baby died in Macau, do you believe it? 】Netizen @Tinysalt broke the news on Weibo: Guo Meimei died in Macau, saying that the news has been blocked for half a month, relatives have negotiated, and the bone fire will be returned to the mainland in June!

chinese_text: 网传@郭美美baby 或死于谋杀，据澳门媒体传来的消息，郭美美已经意外死亡于澳门，具体原因当地警方在调查中，民间传闻死于谋杀，美美家属已经赶往澳门。郭美美自从到了澳门以后微博再无更新，孰料阴阳两隔！知情网友前往微博悼念，悲痛溢于言表，蜡烛一片！只能一句：一路走好，天堂没有红十字会！
text: It is reported on the Internet that @国美美baby may have died of murder. According to news from the Macau media, Guo Meimei has died unexpectedly in Macau. The specific cause is under investigation by the local police. There are rumors that the baby died of murder. Meimei's family members have rushed to Macau. Guo Meimei has not updated her Weibo since she arrived in Macau. Who would have expected that Yin and Yang are separated from each other! Netizens who knew about the incident went to Weibo to express their condolences. Their grief was beyond words and candles were lit! I can only say: Have a good journey, there is no Red Cross in heaven!

chinese_text: 经再次确认：@郭美美baby 已亡故，昨日大量爆料郭美美死于意外疑为谋杀的帖子出现，当夜郭美美给予了辟谣，但网友发现，这些照片均为4月3日所拍，场景一样，非自拍，均旁人所拍。知情人透露：郭美美香消玉殒已确定无疑，其微博帐号已被人控制。今日下午媒体将发布消息。
text: It has been confirmed again: @国美美baby has died. Yesterday, a large number of posts broke the news that Guo Meimei died in an accident and was suspected of murder. Guo Meimei refuted the rumors that night, but netizens discovered that these photos were all taken on April 3, with the same scene. , not selfies, taken by others. An insider revealed: Guo Meimei's death has been confirmed, and her Weibo account has been controlled. An announcement will be made to the media this afternoon.

chinese_text: 【怎么鉴定地沟油】炒菜时放一颗剥皮的蒜头(蒜子)，蒜子对黄曲霉素最敏感。如果蒜子变红色就是地沟油，含有大量黄曲霉素。把你家里的油放到冰箱里2个小时，如果出现白色的泡沫一样，那就是地沟油。请发出你的爱心，转给身边滴朋友吧！@减肥常识（转）
text: [How to identify gutter oil] When cooking, put a peeled head of garlic (garlic). Garlic is the most sensitive to aflatoxin. If the garlic turns red, it means gutter oil, which contains a large amount of aflatoxin. Put your home oil in the refrigerator for 2 hours. If white foam appears, it is gutter oil. Please send out your love and pass it on to your friends around you! @ Common sense about losing weight (reposted)

chinese_text: 各位同胞们注意了，最近内地拐卖份子阵地转移到西藏了，他们利用藏族人的同情心，通过问路或迷路等方式，拐走中小学女生，西藏各地已发生失踪女学生多起，希望我们政府注重这些问题，警力转移到这些事上，充分利用各路的检查站，让犯罪分子有来无回！不要赞，请转发。
text: Dear compatriots, please note that the traffickers from the mainland have recently moved to Tibet. They take advantage of the sympathy of the Tibetan people and abduct girls from primary and secondary schools by asking for directions or getting lost. There have been many missing female students in various parts of Tibet. I hope we The government pays attention to these issues, and the police force is diverted to these matters, making full use of checkpoints on various roads, so that criminals can never come back! Don't like, please repost.

chinese_text: 【重要提醒！花露水属易燃品 涂完别马上做饭】夏天来了，蚊子也来了，需注意的是：花露水属易燃品，涂抹完之后不要马上做饭、抽烟等。花露水的酒精浓度达70%-75%；且燃点低，一般24℃就能燃烧。花露水燃烧有多可怕？看动态图就知道了。切记！速速转走。（央视新闻）
text: 【Important reminder! Toilet water is flammable, so don’t cook immediately after applying it. Summer is here, and so are the mosquitoes. It’s important to note that toilet water is flammable, so don’t cook or smoke immediately after applying it. The alcohol concentration of toilet water reaches 70%-75%; it has a low ignition point and can generally burn at 24°C. How terrible is the burning of toilet water? Just look at the dynamic diagram to find out. Remember! Turn away quickly. (CCTV News)

chinese_text: 【屌丝中奖一夜变高富帅 买豪车回单位辞职得瑟】上海青浦区练塘一位20岁出头小伙买彩票，中了6000万，税后4800万。然后，他开着兰博基尼LP700跑车到单位高调辞职，还请全车间吃饭，饭店订30几桌，每人一条熊猫香烟。据说当时厂领导的脸一会红一会绿。屌丝逆袭，一夜变高富帅啊。（猫扑）
text: [A diaosi won a lottery and became rich and handsome overnight, bought a luxury car, returned to work, and resigned] A young man in his early 20s from Liantang, Qingpu District, Shanghai bought a lottery and won 60 million, 48 million after tax. Then, he drove a Lamborghini LP700 sports car to the work unit to resign in a high-profile manner. He also invited the entire workshop to dinner, booked more than 30 tables in the restaurant, and gave each person a pack of Panda cigarettes. It is said that the face of the factory leader at that time alternated between red and green. Diaosi counterattacked and became tall, rich and handsome overnight. (mop)

chinese_text: 孩子啊，妈去街上卖点山竹，挣完钱了给你买点肉吃吃，娘知道你一星期没吃到肉了。”重庆一妇女对她孩子说。孩子开心回答：“好啊，中午我在家洗菜淘米，等你回家来烧饭哦” ——想不到半路上遇到城管执法把她推下台阶！竟成了永别！旁边的小贩说，这名妇女卖水果辛苦拉扯3个孩子
text: My child, Mommy goes to the street to sell some mangosteens, and after she earns the money, I’ll buy you some meat to eat. Mom knows you haven’t had meat for a week. "A woman in Chongqing said to her child. The child happily replied: "Okay, I will wash vegetables and wash rice at home at noon, and wait for you to come home to cook." Unexpectedly, the urban management law enforcement officers pushed her down the steps on the way! Farewell! The vendor nearby said that this woman had to work hard to support three children while selling fruit.

chinese_text: 《被抓到然后被解放然后解放别人然后又被抓到然后又跑了然后又去解放自己的妻子然后放了一分钟又被抓起来的姜戈》又被解放了。明天正式上映。另外，明天还是日本电影3D版贞子内地上映的日子，同胞们敢不敢让它的票房为零。虽然我不敢，但是我相信你们敢，加油吧！
text: "Django, who was caught and liberated and then liberated someone else and then got caught again and ran away and then went to free his wife and then let go for a minute and was captured again," was liberated again. It will be officially released tomorrow. In addition, tomorrow is also the day when the 3D version of the Japanese movie Sadako is released in mainland China. Do our compatriots dare to let it have zero box office? Although I don’t dare, I believe you do, so go for it!

chinese_text: 40分钟的生命权值多少钱？美国一死囚执行死刑前，照例大吃一顿。这家伙吃了大餐还喝了红酒，没想突发脑溢血当场挂了。比执行死刑早死了40分钟。其亲属因此状告监狱：救护不力，明知高血压还让喝酒，让死囚丧失了本应享受40分钟的美好生命。官司赢了。40分钟的价值是350万美元。@波波船长
text: How much is 40 minutes of life worth? A death row inmate in the United States had a big meal as usual before his execution. This guy had a big meal and drank red wine, but unexpectedly he suffered a cerebral hemorrhage and died on the spot. He died 40 minutes before his execution. His relatives therefore sued the prison: the rescue was inadequate and the prisoner was allowed to drink despite knowing he had high blood pressure, depriving the death row inmate of the 40 minutes of good life he should have enjoyed. The lawsuit was won. The value of 40 minutes is $3.5 million. @Bobo captain

chinese_text: 【提醒！涂完花露水切勿接触明火！】夏天来临，蚊子出没。花露水必不可少！不过，花露水属易燃品，一般花露水里面的乙醇浓度在70%—75%，最低也会达到30%以上；且燃点仅为24℃。所以，涂完花露水后如遇明火...将会发生闪燃现象！所以：涂完花露水后，请远离火源！否则......
text: 【remind! Do not touch open flames after applying toilet water! 】Summer is coming and mosquitoes are out. Toilet water is a must! However, toilet water is flammable. Generally, the ethanol concentration in toilet water is 70%-75%, and the minimum can reach more than 30%; and the ignition point is only 24°C. Therefore, if you encounter an open flame after applying toilet water...flashover will occur! So: after applying toilet water, please stay away from fire! otherwise......

chinese_text: 用一次性筷子做笋干炒肉，好吃哦
text: Use disposable chopsticks to make fried pork with dried bamboo shoots, it’s delicious

chinese_text: 一种最新骗术 请大家一定要看看，并引起警惕： 一.近日，社会上出现了一种最新骗术，骗子具体操作的程序是：自称快递公司人员先给诸位打电话(随机)，告诉你有快递物品，但由于天气潮湿看不清你具体地址、姓名，只知道电话，请你提供地址、姓名，然后真有快递公... http://t.cn/zTdoegE
text: Please be sure to take a look at a latest scam and be alert: 1. Recently, a latest scam has appeared in society. The specific procedure used by scammers is: someone claiming to be a courier company employee will first call you (randomly) and tell you There are express items, but due to the humid weather, I can’t see your specific address and name. I only know your phone number. Please provide your address and name, and then there is really a courier company... http://t.cn/zTdoegE

chinese_text: 40分钟的生命权值多少钱？美国一死囚执行死刑前，照例大吃一顿。这家伙吃了大餐还喝了红酒，没想突发脑溢血当场挂了。比执行死刑早死了40分钟。其亲属因此状告监狱：救护不力，明知高血压还让喝酒，让死囚丧失了本应享受40分钟的美好生命。官司赢了。40分钟的价值是350万美元。（网摘）
text: How much is 40 minutes of life worth? A death row inmate in the United States had a big meal as usual before his execution. This guy had a big meal and drank red wine, but unexpectedly he suffered a cerebral hemorrhage and died on the spot. He died 40 minutes before his execution. His relatives therefore sued the prison: the rescue was inadequate and the prisoner was allowed to drink despite knowing he had high blood pressure, depriving the death row inmate of the 40 minutes of good life he should have enjoyed. The lawsuit was won. The value of 40 minutes is $3.5 million. (Internet excerpt)

chinese_text: 香港方面称，充气大黄鸭在港不幸爆掉，乃大陆沈阳某旅行团的胡某扔烟头所致。此旅行团13日晚搭乘豪华客轮「莫利亚第」号经过大黄鸭旁，胡某向其投掷了30个点燃的烟头并向周围游客表示“不信弄不死你”，昨晚大黄鸭倒下后经导游指认港警已将其收监
text: Hong Kong authorities said that the inflatable yellow duck unfortunately exploded in Hong Kong because Hu from a tour group in Shenyang, mainland China, threw a cigarette butt. The tour group took the luxury liner "Moliadi" and passed by the big yellow duck on the evening of the 13th. Hu threw 30 lit cigarette butts at it and said to the tourists around him, "I can't kill you if you don't believe it." The big yellow duck fell down last night Later, the tour guide identified him and the Hong Kong police took him into custody.

chinese_text: 【有车的朋友注意了 加油员频繁跳枪那是在偷你的油！】你肯定遇到过这种情况：加油员在加油时突然停掉油枪，然后又打开，又停掉，这样来回几次，那么他就是在偷你的油！以后一定要下车看他操作，有这个小动作马上警告他：加油请不要中间停顿！一般他们会懂的[c无语]整理自新浪新闻、新华网等各大官媒。
text: [Friends who own cars, please note that the gas attendant frequently jumps to steal your gas! 】You must have encountered this situation: when the refueling attendant suddenly stops the oil gun, then opens it again, then stops it again, and goes back and forth several times, then he is stealing your oil! In the future, you must get out of the car and watch him operate. If he makes this little move, he will immediately warn him: Please don’t pause in the middle of refueling! Generally they will understand [c无语] compiled from Sina News, Xinhuanet and other major official media.

chinese_text: 【一个死囚的40分钟 “天价”生命】54岁的美国死囚乔·哈里斯，应在2012年11月27日下午两点执行死刑，死前最后一餐，这家伙吃了大餐还喝了红酒，没想突发脑溢血当场挂了，早死了40分钟。其亲属因此状告监狱，明知高血压还让喝酒，让他丧失了40分钟的美好生命。最后，官司赢了，亲属获赔350万美元。(转)
text: [40 minutes of a death row inmate’s “sky-high price” life] Joe Harris, a 54-year-old American death row inmate, should be executed at 2 p.m. on November 27, 2012. In his last meal before his death, this guy ate a big meal and drank too much. Red wine, I didn’t expect to have a cerebral hemorrhage and die on the spot, 40 minutes earlier. His relatives sued the prison because they allowed him to drink alcohol even though he knew he had high blood pressure, causing him to lose 40 minutes of his beautiful life. In the end, the lawsuit was won and the relatives were awarded US$3.5 million. (change)

chinese_text: 美国死囚乔·哈里斯，应在2012年11月27日下午两点执行死刑，死前最后一餐，他吃大了餐喝了红酒，没想突发脑溢血当场挂了，早死了40分钟。其亲属因此状告监狱，明知高血压还让喝酒，让他丧失了40分钟的美好生命。最后，官司赢了，亲属获赔350万美元。[bm抬腿]「坑爹事天天有，请关注@今天真坑爹 」
text: Joe Harris, an American death row inmate, was due to be executed at 2:00 pm on November 27, 2012. During his last meal before his death, he ate a large meal and drank red wine. Unexpectedly, he suffered a cerebral hemorrhage and died on the spot. He died 40 minutes early. His relatives sued the prison because they allowed him to drink alcohol even though he knew he had high blood pressure, causing him to lose 40 minutes of his beautiful life. In the end, the lawsuit was won and the relatives were awarded US$3.5 million. [bm raises his leg] "Things that cheat my dad happen every day, please pay attention @Today is really cheating"

text: Philippine elite special forces Lieutenant Colonel Pacquiao gave a tough speech on the situation in the South China Sea. He teased that a certain country's military could only be ranked number one in the world in goose-stepping. Lieutenant Colonel Pacquiao's words caused laughter from all walks of life present.

chinese_text: 西班牙《国家报》：【逍遥法外的红色小王子】，在近两个月的沉寂中，人们似乎已将其淡忘。同时据北京消息，李天一案中被“轮奸”女孩已撤回供词，李天一不负任何刑事责任，只需做义工300到400小时！此外，李天一赴美的计划仍在进行中。法律面前人人平等依旧是笑谈，“钱”似乎可以解决一切！求辟谣！！
text: Spain’s El Pais: [The Little Red Prince on the loose], in the silence of the past two months, people seem to have forgotten it. At the same time, according to Beijing news, the girl who was "gang raped" in Li Tianyi's case has withdrawn her confession. Li Tianyi does not bear any criminal responsibility and only needs to do 300 to 400 hours of volunteer work! In addition, Li Tianyi’s plan to go to the United States is still in progress. Equality before the law is still a joke, and "money" seems to solve everything! Please refute the rumor! !

chinese_text: 【这是两回事】外交部新闻发布会，记者问为何中国要实行网络实名制？华春莹答：“每个人都必须为其言论负责。现在有一些人利用网络造谣，所以必须实行实名制。”“是否每个人都需要对自己的行为负责？”记者又问：“既然如此为何没人对四川地震豆腐渣工程害死儿童的负责？”华春莹答：“这是两回事！”
text: [These are two different things] At the press conference of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, a reporter asked why China wants to implement an online real-name system? Hua Chunying replied: "Everyone must be responsible for their speech. Now some people use the Internet to spread rumors, so a real-name system must be implemented." "Does everyone need to be responsible for their own actions?" The reporter asked: "Why is that so? No one is responsible for the death of children due to the Sichuan earthquake tofu construction project?" Hua Chunying replied: "These are two different things!"

chinese_text: 周立波：我11名船员被杀，政府没有表态；利比亚丢掉400亿，政府不敢讲话；韩国海警先打人，政府没有力争；… …。联想到：美国护照中写着：“不管你身处何方，美国政府都是你强大的后盾”。在中国护照中写着： 请严格遵守当地的法律，并尊重那里的风俗习惯。”   http://t.cn/zTBdgcN
text: Zhou Libo: 11 of my crew members were killed, but the government did not express its position; Libya lost 40 billion, but the government did not dare to speak; the South Korean Coast Guard beat people first, but the government did not fight hard;... Think of it: The U.S. passport says: "No matter where you are, the U.S. government has your strong backing." In the Chinese passport it says: Please strictly abide by local laws and respect local customs. ” http://t.cn/zTBdgcN

chinese_text: 2013年3月5日，《明报》做了题目为《如果有来生，你愿不愿意再做中国人？》的投票调查，截止4月18日晚8时的投票结果是，在89896名投票中，竟然有高达92%的网民称来生不再愿再做中国人！不做中国人的理由是：做中国人没有尊严、没有公正、没有希望。
text: On March 5, 2013, "Ming Pao" published an article titled "If there is an afterlife, would you like to be Chinese again?" 》Polling survey, the results of the voting as of 8 pm on April 18 were that among 89,896 people who voted, as many as 92% of netizens said they no longer want to be Chinese in the next life! The reason for not being Chinese is: being Chinese has no dignity, no justice, and no hope.

chinese_text: 最新通知：國內海關新規定，今年6月1日之後所有進入中國境內的包裹以及任何形式的運輸容器中不能有超過2罐的奶粉，超過的話要如數退回，消息確鑿，中國海關已經通知了各大物流運營商，各位媽媽們趕緊囤貨了！
text: Latest notice: New domestic customs regulations stipulate that all packages entering China after June 1 this year and any form of transportation container cannot contain more than 2 cans of milk powder. If more than 2 cans of milk powder are exceeded, they must be returned. The news is confirmed. China Customs has notified All major logistics operators, mothers, hurry up and stock up!

chinese_text: @kimka1913 :昨晚从北京站行至台基厂，有辆布加迪压车霸道，我老公鸣笛提醒，结果 一个小个子男人从车上下来就挑衅，说我用手机拍他的车，狂得不行，还动手打了我和我老公。我只好报警。后来才知此人就是所谓京城四少之一王烁。经警方调解，最后王烁在电话里两次向我道歉。人有点钱，就可以这样作吗？
text: @kimka1913: Last night when we were walking from Beijing Station to Taiji Factory, there was a Bugatti driving aggressively. My husband blew the whistle to remind me, but a short man got out of the car and started to challenge me, saying that I was taking pictures of his car with my mobile phone. He was so crazy. No, he even beat me and my husband. I had to call the police. Later I found out that this person was Wang Shuo, one of the so-called Four Young Masters in Beijing. After mediation by the police, Wang Shuo finally apologized to me twice on the phone. Can a person do this if he has some money?

chinese_text: 今天2013年5月17日早上区伯路过豪贤路肉菜市场门口，看到一辆警车前后号牌都用“武警特勤”牌子遮盖住。警车也遮挡车牌？于是区伯上前质问司机，再细看，原来是一辆公车假冒“武警特勤”车。司机是中国银行领导张振龙，被遮盖的原车牌粤A06888，于是区伯马上报警，广东电视台也到场采访。
text: On the morning of May 17, 2013, Ou Bo passed by the entrance of the meat and vegetable market on Haoxian Road and saw a police car with its front and rear number plates covered with "Armed Police Special Service" signs. Do police cars also cover their license plates? So Uncle Ou stepped forward to question the driver. Upon closer inspection, he found that it was a public bus pretending to be an "Armed Police Special Service" vehicle. The driver was Zhang Zhenlong, the leader of the Bank of China, and his original license plate was covered up, Guangdong A06888. So Uncle Ou immediately called the police, and Guangdong TV station also came to the scene to interview.

chinese_text: 【中菲友谊】2010年8名香港人在菲律宾被枪杀，一个月后菲总统访华，得500亿美元订单大礼。4个月后菲获赠价值1千多万的8辆“流动医疗车”3个多月后，菲海军以“执法”名义扣中国渔船和5名渔民。10天后，菲遭天灾，中国送上的慰问金超过美、日、韩、法国的总和。！（转）
text: [China-Philippines Friendship] In 2010, eight Hong Kong people were shot dead in the Philippines. A month later, the Philippine president visited China and received a gift of US$50 billion in orders. Four months later, the Philippines received eight "mobile medical vehicles" worth more than 10 million. More than three months later, the Philippine Navy detained a Chinese fishing boat and five fishermen in the name of "law enforcement." Ten days later, the Philippines suffered a natural disaster, and China sent more condolences than the United States, Japan, South Korea, and France combined. ! (change)

chinese_text: 赶紧检查一下你家里的牙膏，如果是黑色条赶紧扔掉！大家買牙膏請留心,买牙膏时注意牙膏管反面底部的颜色条,今天才知道，原来颜色条有含义的，尽量选择绿和蓝，共分4种:绿色:纯天然；蓝色:天然+药物；红色:天然+化学成分；黑色:纯化学。 国内的牙膏包括儿童牙膏居然大多都是化学的，太过分了[可怜]
text: Quickly check the toothpaste at home. If there are black streaks, throw them away! Please pay attention when buying toothpaste. When buying toothpaste, pay attention to the color bar on the back and bottom of the toothpaste tube. I just found out today that the color bar has a meaning. Try to choose green and blue. There are 4 types in total: green: pure natural; blue: natural + Drugs; red: natural + chemical ingredients; black: pure chemicals. Most domestic toothpastes, including children’s toothpastes, are chemical-based, which is too much [poor]

chinese_text: 【全国人民死不瞑目的日子终于要来了】国家卫生计生委表示，正在制定强制性文件，将适时要求全国每一例死亡后捐献器官。 马勒戈壁的，死人都不放过！
text: [The day is finally coming for people across the country to die in silence] The National Health and Family Planning Commission stated that it is formulating mandatory documents that will require organ donation after every death in the country in due course. In the Male Desert, even the dead will not be spared!

chinese_text: 【中国人有几个知道?】《美国地理杂志》报道，根据美国遥感测绘卫星的数据：中国的国土面积只有712万平方公里。图片：第一张，1919年，民国北洋政府时期的国土面积。第二张1949年，国民政府撤离大陆时留下的是1141万8174平方公里的国土面积。现在中国的国土面积只有712万平方公里。@元芳视角@杂谈五味
text: [How many Chinese people know this?] "American Geographic Magazine" reported that according to data from American remote sensing mapping satellites: China's land area is only 7.12 million square kilometers. Picture: The first one, in 1919, the land area during the Beiyang Government of the Republic of China. In the second picture, in 1949, when the Nationalist Government withdrew from the mainland, it left behind a land area of 11,418,174 square kilometers. China's current land area is only 7.12 million square kilometers. @元方perspective@miscellaneous talk about five flavors

chinese_text: 今天才知道牙膏尾巴上的学问！彩条共四种，绿色，蓝色，红色，黑色。绿色=纯天然。蓝色=天然+药物。红色=天然+化学成分。黑色=纯化学！国内的牙膏包括儿童牙膏居然大多是化学的。刚才赶紧看了看球球的，还好是蓝色。以后买牙膏要留神了啊。
text: I just learned about the knowledge on the tail of toothpaste today! There are four kinds of color bars, green, blue, red and black. Green = all natural. Blue = natural + medicine. Red = natural + chemical ingredients. Black = pure chemistry! Domestic toothpastes, including children's toothpastes, are mostly chemical-based. I quickly looked at Qiuqiu just now, and luckily it was blue. Be careful when buying toothpaste in the future.

chinese_text: 刚学了个知识，和大家分享一下：如何判断你的牙膏是否健康。在每个牙膏袋的尾部都有个色块，绿色表示牙膏成份纯天然，蓝色表示天然且含药物，红色表示含化学成份，黑色表示纯化学成份合成。建议大家使用绿色和蓝色的，快看看你家的牙膏健康吗?
text: I just learned some knowledge and would like to share it with you: how to judge whether your toothpaste is healthy. There is a color block at the end of each toothpaste bag. Green means that the toothpaste ingredients are purely natural, blue means that the toothpaste is natural and contains medicine, red means that it contains chemical ingredients, and black means that the toothpaste contains pure chemical ingredients. It is recommended that you use green and blue toothpaste. Check if your toothpaste is healthy?

chinese_text: 40分钟的生命权值多少钱？美国一死囚执行死刑前，照例大吃一顿。这家伙吃了大餐还喝了红酒，没想突发脑溢血当场挂了。比执行死刑早死了40分钟。其亲属因此状告监狱：救护不力，明知高血压还让喝酒，让死囚丧失了本应享受40分钟的美好生命。官司赢了。40分钟的价值是350万美元。@袁裕来律师 @徐昕
text: How much is 40 minutes of life worth? A death row inmate in the United States had a big meal as usual before his execution. This guy had a big meal and drank red wine, but unexpectedly he suffered a cerebral hemorrhage and died on the spot. He died 40 minutes before his execution. His relatives therefore sued the prison: the rescue was inadequate and the prisoner was allowed to drink despite knowing he had high blood pressure, depriving the death row inmate of the 40 minutes of good life he should have enjoyed. The lawsuit was won. The value of 40 minutes is $3.5 million. @元宇来 lawyer@Xu Xin

chinese_text: 【宁波一中学图书馆无门无管理员 馆名叫“信任” 】有人问：怎么不设管理员？校长：6人一年30万工资，只要丢书不超30万就值；偷书是受教育不够，多看书多受教育，偷拿过书也会放回书架。年终盘点，原来10万册书变成了10万6千册。不教而诛谓之虐，为什么总有人说中国人素质低？(BY_-冰翼-_)
text: [The library of Ningbo No. 1 Middle School with no door and no administrator is called "Trust"] Someone asked: Why is there no administrator? Principal: The salary of 6 people is 300,000 yuan a year. As long as the lost books do not exceed 300,000 yuan, it is worth it; stealing books means that you are not educated enough. The more you read, the more educated you will be. If you steal books, they will be put back on the bookshelf. At the end of the year, the original 100,000 books turned into 106,000. Why do some people always say that Chinese people are of low quality if they are punished without teaching? (BY_-icewing-_)

chinese_text: 【小崔说事】卫生部部长接受采访时说：我们免费为一农村大妈做了白内障手术。当摘下纱布时她看见了，她的确要感谢党！感谢政府！靠她自己，她一辈子也做不起这个手术。小崔问道：她辛苦一辈子，连个白内障手术都做不起，那她得恨谁呢？（转）
text: [Xiao Cui talks about things] The Minister of Health said in an interview: We performed cataract surgery for a rural aunt for free. When she took off the gauze, she saw that she indeed wanted to thank the party! Thank you government! On her own, she would not be able to afford this surgery in her lifetime. Xiao Cui asked: She has worked hard all her life and can't even afford cataract surgery, so who does she have to hate? (change)

chinese_text: 【在美国做潜伏？】1999年5月8日，中国驻前南斯拉夫大使馆突遭美军轰炸，北京高校冲击美国驻中国大使馆，六名攻击美国大使馆最积极的学生后来全部到美国留学，他们现在都留在了美国。那个曾当着克林顿面痛责美国人权状况恶劣的马楠不但移民美国、还嫁给了一名美国白人，给美帝国主义生了一个孩子。
text: 【Being a lurker in the United States? 】On May 8, 1999, the Chinese Embassy in the former Yugoslavia was suddenly bombed by the U.S. military. Beijing universities attacked the U.S. Embassy in China. The six students who were the most active in attacking the U.S. Embassy later all went to study in the United States, and they all remain in the United States now. . Ma Nan, who once criticized the poor human rights situation in the United States in front of Clinton, not only immigrated to the United States, but also married a white American and gave birth to a child for American imperialism.

chinese_text: 【朝鲜战争为何停战】传：板门店谈判前彭德怀要求在铁原挡住美军两周，结果只挡了2天，63军3万多人打得只剩1400人。对上甘岭， 美军表面佯攻，实则运用优势火炮诱敌集中歼灭， 结果美军伤亡400多，志愿军遗尸37000多。 视频传到美国内，引发反战浪潮，美民众和议员大骂美军屠夫，直接促成停战谈判！
text: [Why the Korean War ceased war] Rumor: Before the Panmunjom negotiations, Peng Dehuai asked to block the U.S. military in Cheorwon for two weeks, but he only blocked it for 2 days. The 63rd Army defeated more than 30,000 people and only 1,400 people were left. Against Shangganling, the US military pretended to attack on the surface, but actually used superior artillery to lure the enemy to concentrate and annihilate them. As a result, the US military suffered more than 400 casualties and the volunteers left more than 37,000 corpses. The video spread to the United States, triggering an anti-war wave. American people and congressmen cursed the U.S. military as butchers, directly promoting armistice negotiations!

chinese_text: 美国的死囚哈里斯，执行死刑的时间是12年11月27日下午2点。按惯例，他死前点要了牛排、鲟鱼、红酒等。1点20分，患有高血压的哈里斯因酒精引发脑猝死，哈的家人将狱方告上了法庭，要求赔偿哈40分钟的“活价”--350万美元。狱方败诉，哈家人将350万的赔偿全部捐给了公益组织。--摘自《报刊文摘》第3268期
text: Harris, the death row inmate in the United States, will be executed at 2 pm on November 27, 2012. As usual, he ordered steak, sturgeon, red wine, etc. before he died. At 1:20, Harris, who suffered from high blood pressure, died of sudden cerebral infarction caused by alcohol. Ha's family took the prison to court, demanding compensation for Ha's 40 minutes of "living price" - US$3.5 million. The prison lost the lawsuit, and Ha's family donated all 3.5 million yuan in compensation to charity organizations. --Excerpted from Issue 3268 of "Newspaper Digest"

chinese_text: 【加速韩战停战原因之一】板门店谈判前彭德怀要求在铁原挡住美军两周，63军3万多人打得只剩1千多人。上甘岭， 美军佯攻，实则用优势火炮集中歼灭， 结果美军伤亡少数，志愿军遗尸37000多。 视频传到美国内，引发反战浪潮，美民众和议员大骂美军屠夫，直接促成停战谈判！转@薛蛮子 @作家崔成浩 @袁腾飞
text: [One of the reasons for accelerating the ceasefire in the Korean War] Before the Panmunjom negotiations, Peng Dehuai asked to hold off the US military in Cheorwon for two weeks. The 63rd Army defeated more than 30,000 people and only 1,000 people were left. In Shangganling, the U.S. military feigned an attack, but in fact used superior artillery to focus on annihilation. As a result, the U.S. military suffered only a few casualties and left more than 37,000 volunteers dead. The video spread to the United States, triggering an anti-war wave. American people and congressmen cursed the U.S. military as butchers, directly promoting armistice negotiations! Repost@雪人子@writer Cui Chenghao@袁腾飞

chinese_text: 【朝鲜战争为何停战?】肖仲华:板门店谈判前彭德怀要求在铁原挡住美军两周,结果只挡了两天,63军3万多人打得只剩1400人.对上甘岭,美军表面佯攻,实则运用优势火炮诱敌集中歼灭,结果美军伤亡400多人,志愿军遗尸37000多.视频传到美国内,引发反战浪潮,美民众和议员大骂美军屠夫,直接促成停战谈判!各位以为然?
text: [Why did the Korean War cease?] Xiao Zhonghua: Before the Panmunjom negotiations, Peng Dehuai asked to block the U.S. military in Tiewon for two weeks, but he only blocked it for two days. The 63rd Army defeated more than 30,000 people and only 1,400 people were left. Against Ganling, the U.S. military pretended to attack on the surface, but in reality Using superior artillery to lure the enemy to concentrate and annihilate them, the U.S. military suffered more than 400 casualties and the volunteers left more than 37,000 corpses. The video spread to the United States, triggering an anti-war wave. The American people and congressmen cursed the U.S. military as butchers, which directly led to armistice negotiations! What do you think?

chinese_text: 【牙膏的秘密[嘘]】牙膏底部的条色共分4种:绿、蓝、红、黑. 绿色:纯天然；蓝色:天然+药物；红色:天然+化学成分；黑色:纯化学。绝大部分品牌是黑色的，买牙膏时注意牙膏管反面底部的颜色条,尽量选择绿色和蓝，国内的牙膏和儿童牙膏居然大多都是化学的，太过分了[怒][怒][怒]你的牙膏是什么颜色呢？
text: [Secret of Toothpaste [Shh]] The bar colors at the bottom of the toothpaste are divided into 4 colors: green, blue, red, and black. Green: pure natural; blue: natural + medicine; red: natural + chemical ingredients; black: pure chemical. Most brands are black. When buying toothpaste, pay attention to the color bar on the back of the toothpaste tube and try to choose green and blue. Most of the domestic toothpastes and children's toothpastes are chemical, which is too much [angry][angry][angry ]What color is your toothpaste?

chinese_text: 【牛奶的谎言与内幕】科学家终于找到牛奶致癌的确实证据！美国国家癌症研究所最近研究发现雌性激素、雄性激素和胰岛素的生长因子就是牛奶内的主要致癌物质。加拿大的肿瘤专家建议：除了那些发展中国家的儿童和营养不良的成人，一般人并不需要喝太多牛奶。据说，这是一篇不看会悔恨一辈子的报导文章。转
text: [Milk Lies and Inside Stories] Scientists finally found conclusive evidence that milk causes cancer! A recent study by the National Cancer Institute found that estrogen, androgen, and insulin growth factors are the main carcinogens in milk. Canadian oncology experts suggest that except for children in developing countries and malnourished adults, the average person does not need to drink too much milk. It is said that if you don’t read this article, you will regret it for the rest of your life. change

chinese_text: 立刻检查一下你家里的牙膏，注意牙膏管反面底部的颜色条，如果是黑色条的马上摔掉，尽量选择绿色的买！！！牙膏颜色条共分4种:绿、蓝、红、黑，绿色:纯天然；蓝色:天然+药物；红色:天然+化学成分；黑色:纯化学。 黑色的在国内占大部，要选到绿色可要点眼力啊[衰][衰]转吧
text: Check the toothpaste at home immediately. Pay attention to the color strip on the bottom of the toothpaste tube. If it is a black strip, it will fall off immediately. Try to buy a green one! ! ! The toothpaste color bar is divided into 4 types: green, blue, red and black. Green: pure natural; blue: natural + medicine; red: natural + chemical ingredients; black: pure chemical. Black is the majority in China, so you have to be discerning to choose green.

chinese_text: #潮汕微提醒#【科普贴：家里的牙膏要严选！】大家買牙膏請留心,买牙膏时注意牙膏管反面底部的颜色条,今天才知道，原来颜色条有含义啊！尽量选择绿色和蓝，共分4种:绿、蓝、红、黑。 绿色:纯天然； 蓝色:天然+药物； 红色:天然+化学成分； 黑色:纯化学！ 国内的儿童牙膏居然大多是化学的，太过分了！
text: #Chaoshanmicro-reminder# [Popular science post: Choose carefully the toothpaste at home! 】Everyone, please pay attention when buying toothpaste. When buying toothpaste, pay attention to the color bar on the back and bottom of the toothpaste tube. I just found out today that the color bar has a meaning! Try to choose green and blue, divided into 4 types: green, blue, red and black. Green: Purely natural; Blue: Natural + medicine; Red: Natural + chemical ingredients; Black: Purely chemical! Most of the children’s toothpastes in China are chemical-based, which is too much!

text: [China’s US$900 billion turned into waste paper in an instant] On May 9, mainland China owned US$376.3 billion in junk bonds from Fannie and Freddie, which plunged 88% the day before and has almost returned to zero. It also owns more than US$500 billion in US Treasury bonds. It seems that sooner or later Also rubbish. The combined total exceeds $900 billion. Hong Kong financial expert Liu Mengxiong sternly questioned China's fiscal and financial management authorities. It was caused by officials taking kickbacks! Most of the wealth gained during the 30 years of reform and opening up has been trapped in it. [angry]

chinese_text: 【中国特种兵】抗战时国军一新兵的枪被同伴收起来了。他以为枪没了,吓了一身冷汗。于是趁天黑摸到鬼子的阵地干死几个鬼子拿了3支步枪和一挺机枪就往回跑,在回跑的过程中竟然还击毙了8名日本鬼子。他这次私下行动一共打伤打死23名鬼子,简直就是奇迹。后来被授予青天白日奖章,此人乃中国特种兵的始祖。转
text: [Chinese Special Forces] During the Anti-Japanese War, the gun of a new recruit of the Chinese Army was put away by his companions. He thought the gun was gone and broke into a cold sweat. So he took advantage of the darkness to sneak into the Japanese position, killed several Japanese soldiers, took 3 rifles and a machine gun, and ran back. In the process of running back, he actually killed 8 Japanese soldiers. In this private operation, he wounded and killed 23 Japanese soldiers, which was simply a miracle. Later, he was awarded the Blue Sky and White Sun Medal. This man was the ancestor of the Chinese special forces. change

I almost knocked down an old lady crossing the street. After being stopped by the traffic police, he yelled at reporters and traffic police. Extremely arrogant! The woman shouted, "Do you know who my man is? I'll scare you to death if I tell you!" It turns out that her husband is Zhao Hang, the deputy president of the Beijing Municipal People's Court, which scared me to death.

chinese_text: 津南开区二马路一户家庭，爸妈为80后儿子买婚房，耗尽积蓄还外借30万元。婚期临近，儿子又按女方要求，找爸妈索要6万聘礼钱，接连闹几天。妈妈心疼儿子，又拿不出钱，哭说，儿啊，你这是逼妈妈去死。儿子说，那你就死吧！绝望的妈妈从五楼纵身跃下，当场身亡[泪] 现在的人为了钱 ! 都丧尽天良了吗 ？
text: In a family on Erma Road in Jinnankai District, the parents spent 300,000 yuan on loan to buy a wedding house for their son who was born in the 1980s. As the wedding day approached, the son followed the woman's request and asked his parents for a bride price of 60,000 yuan, causing trouble for several days. The mother felt sorry for her son but couldn't get the money, so she cried and said, "Son, you are forcing my mother to die." The son said, then you die! The desperate mother jumped from the fifth floor and died on the spot [tears] Are people these days losing all their conscience for money?

chinese_text: 【抗美援朝中真的赢了？】据传板门店谈判前彭德怀要求在铁原挡住美军两周，结果只挡了2天，63军3万多人打剩1400人。对上甘岭， 美军表面佯攻，实则运用优势火炮诱敌集中歼灭， 结果美军伤亡400多，志愿军遗尸37000多。 消息传至美国，引发反战浪潮，称赴朝美军屠夫，直接促成停战谈判！图为美埋中尸体
text: [Did China really win in the War to Resist US Aggression and Aid Korea? ] It is said that before the Panmunjom negotiations, Peng Dehuai asked to block the US military in Cheorwon for two weeks, but he only blocked it for 2 days, and the 63rd Army was defeated by more than 30,000 people and only 1,400 people were left. Against Shangganling, the US military pretended to attack on the surface, but actually used superior artillery to lure the enemy to concentrate and annihilate them. As a result, the US military suffered more than 400 casualties and the volunteers left more than 37,000 corpses. The news spread to the United States, triggering an anti-war wave, claiming that the U.S. troops sent to North Korea were butchers, and directly led to armistice negotiations! The picture shows the corpse buried in the United States
